space: The apartment will comfortably accommodate 4 adults in two bedrooms, each equipped with a plush new queen bed. In the lounge, the large white couch converts into a queen size sofa bed (ideal for children). The apartment also boasts two very modern bathrooms, both with walk in showers, and all the five star hotel trimmings, including bath robes for your convenience during your stay. Complimentary Continental Breakfast is provided to start you day, and for those that enjoy home cooking, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the pots, pans & utensils you will need. If you prefer to relax in front of a good movie or the latest TV series, there is free wi-fi and Netflix for your entertainment. Head down the lift to the ground floor, and a heated swimming pool with adjacent BBQ and large seating area is available for our guests enjoyment. Secure underground parking is provided for one car, with easy lift access directly to the apartment, perfect for those that dislike stairs. W
host_about: I love to travel and returned to Melbourne 6 years ago after 24 years in London. My partner is French, and we share a love of good food and making new friends. I love water sports and have recently been hooked by kayak fishing. I work in childcare, and love nearly every minute of it. I couldn't live without good wine, coffee & chocolate.

name: Room in Point Cook Gay friendly with free WiFi.
summary: My place is gay friendly,  close to public transport (Williams Landing Stations), close to freeway, 22 km for the CBD,  restaurants, dining, and family-friendly activities such as Werribee Zoo, free WiFi close to Airports. You’ll love my place because of the location and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. I have a cat called Winston. So it's pet friendly
space: Unknown
host_about: I am a 50 year old gay male. I am easy going and friendly. I have a 14 year old cat named Winston. I go to the gym and try to stay fit. I like curries and all different foods.

name: Budget room in Toorak close to everything
summary: Short walk to supermarket, 15 mins drive to Chadstone Shopping centre & 15 mins walk to Chapel Street where many nice restaurants and bars can be found. You will have access to your double bedroom.  You will be sharing bathroom, toilet & modest kitchen with me.  You are welcome to prepare light meals in the kitchen.
space: Spacious room with double bed for 1 person or 2 people. Light cooking is welcome. Minimum cooking utensils available with Fridge, microwave and kettle. Washing machine is available at extra cost. No wi-fi, no sofa and no TV. Off street parking available. Smoking in balcony or outside building.  8 minutes walk from Toorak station. 4 stations to CBD - 15 mins train ride. 2 minutes walk to tram 72 stop and bus 220 stop. 15 min walk to chapel street.
host_about:
Hi!

My name is Lili. Lives in Melbourne, Australia.

I work 9 - 5 in a digital agency.  On the weekend I usually out to catch up with friends, working on my goals or shopping :)

My fave travel destinations are Greece and Venice. 

I like the beach, outdoors, movie, inspirational books and travelling.

name: Mid Century Modern Bungalow
summary: Comfortable spacious private bungalow with lush gardens in a leafy part of Melbourne. Queen sized bed with 100% cotton sheets.  Day bed and desk with large windows overlooking the vegetable and herb garden (which guests can use for salads and teas). Access via driveway and carport.  Outdoor seating with shade and BBQ access.  Outdoor bath accessible in summer. Friendly cats and quiet neighbours. 10 minutes from beach, 30 mins from city centre. Very close to Monash Uni and Caulfield Racecourse.
space: This 1940's house has had a wonderful 60's makeover.  This is reflected in the mid century furniture throughout the house and into the Bungalow.  The large north facing sunroom is brimming with plants, collections of baskets and shell necklaces and overlooks the back garden and vegetable patch.   The main bathroom has a shower, and separate bath and toilet with fabulous pink and silver wallpaper. There is another toilet in the separate laundry.  The Bungalow is a large space, very private with wooden blinds and insect nets on windows and door.  It tends to stay cool in summer and there is an oil heater for colder times.  The kitchenette has a kettle, toaster, fridge, crockery, cutlery, and utensils. Tea-towels, dishcloths, towels are all in the cupboard.  There is a guide in the Bungalow on how to use the washing machine and dishwasher.
host_about:
I have a fabulous job as a Set Decorator in the Film and TV industry. This means I am out shopping most days or dressing sets from all eras and areas in Melbourne. I love to share my knowledge of good shops/cafes/restaurants/galleries with my friends and guests.

The garden I have created is very edible and produces crops of tasty veggies which I feast on most nights, guests are free to help themselves and perhaps do a little watering!

I am not a big regular TV watcher, enjoying box sets of shows like Dexter, Mad Men, Weeds, Veep. I enjoy lots of different music: alt country, retro, 70's…. and tend to listen to a lot of Radio National shows, big fan of This American Life.

Melbourne has lots of great art shows and I regularly get out and look. 
I eat out often and can guide guests towards the yummiest cafes and restaurants to be had, either close by or all over the city.

Originally from NZ, I have made Melbourne my home and am enjoying travelling to different spots in Australia…Port Douglas being the last great escape, with some time at the amazing Paronella Park just south of Cairns. 

I am pretty chilled and enjoy a good chat. 
My fav new hobby is Ping Pong…got a great table, which can be used outside in summer.

name: On the beach at St. Kilda Melbourne
summary: Light, light, light,,, sunrise on the left over the city, and on the right, a huge bay and bayside amenities; good neighbours, two minutes to beach and a 20 km bicycle path; and within 10 minutes, more than 50 eateries and cafe's and music venues and clubs; bus and tram at 5 minutes walk.  Melbourne's most diverse playground with cultural creativity at every view, plus sailing, parasailing, skateboards, tennis, galleries, gym clubs, gardens, parks .....
space: St Kilda Beach, everyone's playground
host_about: Unknown

name: Amazing City view Apartment
summary: Enjoy a glass of wine while looking at the amazing views of city skyline from your balcony or jump in the roof top spa to get a 360 views of Melbourne, the choice is yours. This apartment is beautifully located on Bray st, just behind the popular chapel st.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I’m living in this beautiful country almost 2 years and every day I have an opportunity to learn more about myself, people and different cultures.
Love Melbourne as my hometown. I have amazing friends and lovely family which I miss a lot.
I enjoy  camping, be in touch with the nature, hanging out with friends, dancing, listen and learn to enjoy different world songs.
Every kid and puppy make me feel fascinated.
I wish I had opportunity to travel more and see each part that the world has made.
I invite you to stay with us and would like to say that I’m happy to help you to make your stay a wonderful experience.
Welcome to Melbourne!

name: Art Deco, Rooftop Garden & Spa
summary: If you're looking for an Art Deco apartment with a Private Rooftop garden & SPA then perhaps the photos say it better than I could Includes furniture by B&B Italia, Poliform, Josef Hoffman, Minotti & the usual suspects...
space: The unique thing about the Apartment is the Rooftop Garden with Spa It's for your use Only Not shared
host_about:
If you've ever listened to the BBC radio programme Desert Island Discs, 
you might remember that each guest chooses some items to take with them 
if they were marooned on an island

My items would be....
- Books, Alain de Botton & Saul Bellow
- Music, Stone Roses, Beatles, Paul Weller & Blur
- An iPad to video call family & friends
- Films, Indy, Cannes & Hollywood classics

I hope the photos gives some flavour as what to expect

I think you'll enjoy your stay......

name: Glorious 2 Bed CBD Apartment on Flinders + NETFLIX
summary: You’ll love my place because of the apartment is brand new and finished with high-quality fixtures, fittings, and high-end appliances including granite bench top in kitchen and bathrooms, Gaggenau cooktop, oven and dishwasher and soft closing drawers.  All furniture and bedding are of high quality. It includes Kitchen pantry with a fridge, microwave, pots/pans, cutlery ,Hand towels, Laundry with a washer/dryer, Heating and air-con & SONY 50"LED TV with NETFLIX FREE WI-FI 24/7  carpark on request
space: The apartment comes with a big living room, dining table, sofa, and television. It is perfect for family gathering. It has an air-condition and heating systems. The bedrooms are furnished with a Queen bed and a Double bed. And Australian Open is about 30 Mins walk from the property.
host_about: Unknown

name: Sea View Apartment in St Kilda--1BD+Wifi+Parking
summary: Situated in the heart of the vibrant neighborhood of St. Kilda, the brand new contemporary building project - Meridian. The bright living room leads to a large balcony offering spectacular sea views. Only a short stroll away from St Kilda Beach, Albert Park Lake, Fitzroy Street, Chapel Street, St Kilda Botanic Garden... The tram downstairs runs every 5 minutes throughout the day or 15 minutes walk to Windsor Railway Station. Great accessibility to CBD, Universities and Melbourne Cricket Ground
space: Breathe in the fresh morning air while gazing across treetops and sea views from the balcony.
host_about: Unknown

name: Luxurious 5-Star Sub-Penthouse Docklands
summary: This stunning 3 bedroom apartment boasts incredible panoramic views of Vic Harbour stretching as far West as you can possibly see all the way across to Marvel Stadium. Front row seats to New Years fire works!
space: Beautifully appointed with luxury features the apartment feels like a luxurious ‘bubble’ that enables you to enjoy all of the benefits of being so close to the CBD yet far enough removed to enjoy the quiet of the surrounds of the Docklands precinct if you wish. A wonderful kitchen containing European stainless steel appliances faces North and overlooks the harbour. The living room is spacious surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows enabling huge amounts of light and unabated views. The entertainment system features a 60 inch TV with access to Netflix. World-class Paradigm surround sound and super fast WIFI included. Each bedroom have built in robes. The master bedroom has its own en-suite with bath and dual basins. The master bedroom sleeps two people. The spare bedroom also sleeps two people. Which the final bedroom sleeps one person on a fold out sofa.
host_about: Unknown

name: Bright, funky 2 bd apartment
summary: Light and spacious 2 bedroom apartment in St Kilda with a west facing balcony. This retro style apartment is homely and has all the mod cons and comforts you would want while staying away from home, including a fully renovated kitchen and living room. Surrounded by trees and shrubbery, the apartment is in a quiet street. Although very close to everything - shops, restaurants etc -  you awake to the sound of birds!
space: There is a super comfortable queen sized bed in the main bedroom and for additional guests there is a double sofa bed in the second bedroom.
host_about:
Hi all, I'm Australian and, like most people, love travelling. Luckily my work allows me to get around to some fascinating parts of the world. 

I enjoy a healthy lifestyle and dedicate time to yoga,swimming, tennis and more recently learning to surf! I love nature and the country side and also cities with diverse sub cultures, bars, galleries, cinemas, restaurants etc.

I'm pretty easy going, respectful and I tidy up after myself  -so quite housetrained. I enjoy the prospect of meeting new people and getting a glimpse of different ways of life through the airbnb experience.

name: South Yarra Spacious Apartment
summary: In the heart of South Yarra. Situated off Toorak Rd, and a stones throw away from Chapel Street (shoppers paradise!). Next to South Yarra train station for easy access to MCG, Rod Laver, etc. Open living. Complete with all the amenities you need.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Private bedroom right in the heart of the CBD!
summary: Amazing room right in the cbd. You have everything at your doorstep (2mn from Melbourne central train station, shopping center and restaurants accross the street)right in the free tram zone.  You have a private room with shared bathroom with one lovely norwegian girl. Pool and gym access. Secure building with key pass and lift access.
space: right near Melbourne Central, you have everything at your door step, from public transport in the free tram zone, train, cafe, restaurant and shopping hub
host_about: Unknown

name: Single Accommodation Melbourne CARLTON 286
summary: There are 3  upstairs bedrooms here and a kitchen and bathroom downstairs. Best suited to a short stay for a busy person.  Downstairs is used as a display area for my husbands woodwork. My place is close to University of Melbourne. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood. My place is good for solo adventurers.
space: Kitchen and bathroom shared
host_about:
WELCOME!! PLEASE FEEL FREE TO ASK ANY QUESTIONS BEFORE BOOKING as we have a variety of accommodation options.

 We love meeting new people and helping them enjoy Melbourne and especially Carlton! We love a chat if your up for it, if not we are more than happy to respect your privacy.

We have a cafe called The Heart of Carlton where we invite all our guests to complimentary tea and coffee and whatever else we have on offer. Open everyday from 7am. Close by to all our accommodations on Elgin St.

name: Renovated Victorian family home | dog friendly
summary: Newly renovated Victorian family home set on a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of St Kilda East. Walking distance to Carlisle Street which plays host to a wide variety of dining options, retailers,  grocers, barbers and everyday services. Travel around in ease with easy transport options including train, tram and the St Kilda Airport bus.  Head to neighbouring Windsor for some of the city's best dining or spend the day in St Kilda,  Melbourne's beachside playground.
space: This Victorian family home has recently undergone major renovations. Upstairs, you'll find the master bedroom which features a King size bed, soft carpet, linen curtains with adjoining ensuite and WIR.  Downstairs, the north-facing open living space features timber floors with a designer kitchen complete with Miele appliances, coffee machine and everything you would need to create a meal. Relax on the chaise longe couch and enjoy watching films on the large Samsung TV complete with Netflix.  Stacking sliding doors open up the space and lead to a small courtyard with outdoor dining set for 6 people and a Weber BBQ.  Two additional carpeted bedrooms are set downstairs in the original Victorian part of the home. The front bedroom features a large wardrobe and queen size bed. There is also an additional child's bedroom which can be used for babies or toddlers during your stay. If travelling with children, you will have access to a highchair, children's dinnerware and toys and books. Both b
host_about:
I am a Marketing Manager working for a well-known Australian retailer. 

I love travelling and lived in London for 6 years. My favourite travel destinations are: Paris, French Riviera, Provence, Ibiza, Santorini, Budapest, New York and Lake Como. 

I share my St Kilda East home with my husband Luke, who works in IT and our toddler son.

name: Victorian Terrace in Great Location, Master B/R
summary: Welcome to Richmond! This traditional Victorian home is in a prime location, a minutes walk from bridge road cafe's and restaurants, and a short tram ride into the city. You will have a large, private, master bedroom, with ornate fireplace and stain glass windows. There is a ceiling fan in the room for summer, and a heater for winter, as well as a convenient work space with unlimited WiFi. A very comfortable room, in a traditional cosy house, with a considerate, thoughtful host.
space: This is a traditional, older style home, which is very well maintained and presented, giving a homely feel to the space. I've lived all around Melbourne and this is the best spot I've come across. It has easy access to the cafe, restaurant and shopping life on bridge road, is very close to the city, yet still feels homely and suburban in its own way.  The room itself is the master bedroom of the house. It has a vast book collection, a work pace and wardrobe, and a very comfortable bed. The bathroom in the house is shared - it's an older style bathroom so it's nothing flash, but it's clean and functional. I also have a beautiful, friendly cat with me named Rufus.
host_about: Unknown

name: 墨尔本市中心温馨舒适高楼美景*独立2房2卫*临近电车*火车站*公园*免费车位*健身房游泳池
summary: 5 minutes walking distance to Southern Cross Railway Station. Miller appliances including gas cooktop, microwave, electric oven,  Modern bathroom with laundry facilities Free Tram downstairs 30, 35 and 86 are going to Melbourne city and Docklands shopping centre at 5 minutes walking distance, Coles shopping centre and Asian Grocery just one street away Flagstaff garden just 5 minutes
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: 温馨舒适便利的度假屋,五室六床二卫｡
summary: 温馨舒适便利而安静社区的度假屋屋正等待您和家人的到来｡整幢的独立屋,位于墨尔本东南中心区域,生活交通及其便利,出门步行百米至公交车站可直达Box Hill华人区,75路电车站可四通八达,步行二百米可至多家高级餐馆,七百米至大型购物中心和超市,2.2公里至Deaken大学,4.5公里至Glen Waverley,周边更有众多各类学校｡家门口的公园绿草有儿童游乐设施供孩子尽情玩耍的空间｡宁静的独立屋拥有五个房间三大三小共六张床位,二个卫生间,设施齐全的厨房,宽敞明亮的餐厅,客厅与Deaken相联一起组成了完美的共享空间,是适合家庭朋友出行和旅行居住的上佳居所｡
space: 温馨舒适便利而安静社区的度假屋屋正等待您和家人的到来｡整幢的独立屋,位于墨尔本东南中心区域,生活交通及其便利,出门步行百米至公交车站可直达Box Hill华人区,75路电车站可四通八达,步行二百米可至多家高级餐馆,七百米至大型购物中心和超市,2.2公里至Deaken大学,4.5公里至Glen Waverley,周边更有众多各类学校｡家门口的公园绿草有儿童游乐设施供孩子尽情玩耍的空间｡宁静的独立屋拥有五个房间三大三小共六张床位,二个卫生间,设施齐全的厨房,宽敞明亮的餐厅,客厅与Deaken相联一起组成了完美的共享空间,是适合家庭朋友出行和旅行居住的上佳居所｡
host_about: 我是一个快乐的家庭主妇,我会努力的让我的房客满意｡

name: Melbourne Central, 2BR FREE carpark included**
summary: A refreshing apartment located in the heart of Melbourne's CBD, it is across the road from Melbourne Central on the corner of La Trobe and Elizabeth street, which means it's convenient to travel to anywhere with tram, train and bus at your doorsteps!  The apartment is fully fitted with all the essentials and faces north along Elizabeth street. A great place to be in the centre of everything but cozy enough to unwind from your adventures. Car park included!
space: Unknown
host_about:
When Alice and I travel we love the little extra things hosts do to make sure it's an enriching experience, we are fortunate to open up our homes to our guests in the "most liveable city" and always aim to do more than what is generally expected. 

We are not perfect, but will always aim to be.

name: Lovley apartment in Fitzroy North
summary: Fantastic spacious apartment in Melbourne's best suburb! 20 mins to city, with city views from balcony. Trams, buses and trains close by. Great area with pubs, cafes, shopping and Edinburgh Gardens. In charming converted historic pub building.
space: Very light, each room has a big window with wonderful views.  High ceilings.  The apartment is in a converted old pub, lots of charm and character, with a lovely old-fashioned staircase leading up to apartment on the 2nd floor. No lift. Spacious living and dinning area. Sweet shady balcony with table and chairs and BBQ to relax on. Great for sunset wines.
host_about: Unknown

name: high level Ocean View 2bed 2bath FREEtram zone
summary: This two bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies apartment offer you a beautiful ocean view.  Variety of restaurants downstairs. We are located in TRAM FREE ZONE.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I graduated at Holmesglen TAFE at Melbourne, Australia in hospitality, which gives me confident of serving customers with professional attitude. 

I love cooking, and spending time with my family on my spare time. 

You will find everything easy and handy when you live in my apartment. Honest is my promise.

name: Fantastic Views Over Docklands/Bay
summary: MINIMUM STAY 5 NIGHTS - STRICTLY NO SMOKING PERFECT FOR 1 PERSON/COUPLE WITH ALL THE LUXURIES OF HOME. IDEAL FOR: Relaxing, Tourists, Conventions, Sport etc High Level Unit with Fantastic Views both Day and Night, overlooking the Docklands/Yarra River, & the Bay in the distance.  Southern Cross Railway station is directly over the road for easy movement around Melbourne & Suburbs for guests. Trams - Melbourne CBD are now free. Airport Skybus terminal is directly opposite unit.
space: Luxury high floor apartment with "incredible views" overlooking Southern Cross, the Docklands & Port Phillip Bay. Apartment is in Spencer Street, on the 38th floor, & centrally located in the City for tourists, corporate, conventions, sporting events, relaxing. Lights at night are quite spectacular. Quality Furniture throughout with balcony to relax and take in the views. This new apartment has one bedroom with reading tub chair to relax, balconies with furniture, beautiful lounge & dining table, washing machine / dryer, microwave, dishwasher, large TV with Free to Air Local Stations, air conditioner / heater, ensuite bathroom, kitchen with all facilities. The complex have lap pools, sauna, and terrific gymnasium. Car park available in the building if required.  ROOFTOP LANDSCAPED GARDENS FOR BBQ, READING, & RELAXING on 6th Floor. Over the road is the Southern Cross station for both local and interstate trains, trams including free city circle tram. Skybus from Airport stops at the tra
host_about: Local Property Owners personally looking forward to assisting you with your accommodation needs.

name: Beautiful Beach Apartment!
summary: Beautifully furnished one bedroom apartment with views over St Kilda. Next to St Kilda beach, Acland Street, Luna Park and an abundance of boutique shops, restaurants and bars! Free unlimited internet and NETFLIX!
space: Includes: Unlimited Wifi NETFLIX TV Underground car space $8/day Split System Air Con/Heating Washer/Dryer Hair Dryer This apartment block is perfectly located next to all the attractions in St Kilda and has been beautifully finished. This central yet quiet apartment is the perfect way to experience St Kilda! The apartment consists of stainless steel appliances throughout, dishwasher, euro laundry (washing machine and dryer), split system heating and cooling with built in robes, open plan living and dining, a secure underground carpark, NETFLIX TV and free wifi. The 96 tram stop is about 20 steps away on the famous Acland St which takes you directly to the city in less than 15 minutes. An ideal location to explore Melbourne from, stay for business or pleasure! Please enjoy the complimentary coffee + tea. Everything you need to cook will be in the kitchen but if you'd rather dine out please also take a look at the house manual with lots of local recommendations. If you have a special re
host_about: I am an ex ballerina turned interior designer and property manager. I love all sports and all food! I am a big believer in airbnb and think it's the best way to travel, living like a local is a great way to explore new places and neighbourhoods. I worked in hospitality through-out my dance career and genuinely enjoy going above and beyond to make sure my guests feel right at home :)

name: Sweet Studio Perfectly Located
summary: This sweet little studio apartment is located in the heart of Fitzroy. Conveniently positioned close to all Melbourne's best sporting venues, plus great bars and restaurants and don't forget all the art galleries and theatres. It has everything you could need for a fabulous trip to Melbourne!
space: This beautiful studio apartment is ideally located in Fitzroy within walking distance to Melbourne CBD. It is ideal for solo travellers or a couple. The apartment is on the first floor of a small block of units surrounded by greenery. Our studio apartment is tastefully decorated and has a large window letting in natural light.
host_about:
I have always enjoyed using Air BNB when I have been overseas. Through it I have met such incredible people that have been so passionate about their cities and lifestyles. I now have the opportunity to provide two great homely spaces in Melbourne for similar travellers. 

My top three favourite things in life? 1. Travelling (of Course!), 2. Food (Cooking, sharing, eating and of course drinking) and 3. Bikes!! (I love to ride my bike everywhere!)

I am happy to give out any advice I can on Melbourne and further travel destinations in Australia. Please just give me a call during your stay or email me with any questions :)

name: Private ensuite Queen Bedroom, beautiful view
summary: Welcome to my spacious, bright duplex apartment in St Kilda.   Just 2 blocks from the beach, cafes around the corner, the botanical garden of St Kilda. Or take the train to go to the city, Melbourne CBD in 15min.  Restaurants, bar, shops and supermarkets are within 1 min walk.  Also enjoy the view from the apartment by the large windows or on the terrace.
space: This apartment is big and quiet and filled with light.
host_about: Unknown

name: A warm & welcoming home awaits you
summary: Boarding house with 12 rooms (single and double rooms). There are four bathrooms in total. There is a big kitchen and a separate fridge, a backyard and a ping pong table for you to enjoy. Only available in December-January.
space: The house is fully furnished and all the amenities are easily available. The kitchen is also well set up.
host_about: Hello, we are Mano and Malcolm Guy, and we are a couple who have lived in lovely Melbourne for the past 25 years. We have travelled extensively and love discovering new cultures and cuisines, which is why we are delighted to welcome you into our home. We love hosting people from different cultures and nationalities. We will be happy to show you around and assist you in making your stay in Melbourne as comfortable as possible. Happy travels everyone!

name: Traditional Terrace Artist's home, room a
summary: Kensington only two km from Melbourne's heat.  2 train line and 1 tram only 400m to train and tram stations and 2 stops to city center.  Melbourne’s Premier Racecourse, Show groungs. Victoria, Melbourne and RMIT Universities, and Melbourne cup, Victoria market close by. Great cafes, restaurants nearby pool, gym and park.  Quality double bad with your. host is offer a welcoming shared beautiful art living environment.
space: Kensington is the best that Melbourne has to offer in inner -city suburban living. The Kensington village shops, premier cafe restaurant strip and great ethnic food offering in nearby Flemington. A few minutes walk from a great local recreation center with pool, gymnasium and exercises classes. Large Woolworth supermarket open 7am to midnight. My place is a classic terrace house with fantastic art collection inside as you can see! A private big room ideal for 1 upto 2 people. I offer a relaxed, clean share environment, fully furnished cost room, features double bed and wardrobe.
host_about: Hello and Welcome! I am a passionate, creative genius artist. Living and working in the most amazing city, Melbourne! I live in Kensington in a art creative house and i make with the opportunity i have here. I would love to share this with everyone as i believe everything and everyone is connected. I love creative art, music and travel and individually. I love to go out and have memorable experiences and live my lives. I'm non smoking majority of the time. I love to learn from others and would love to teach and inspire others in return. I look forward to meeting you soon.

name: Contemporary Art Deco Apartment with Patio
summary: Lounge around a bright modern design space set in a historic building. Wake up feeling refreshed in this renovated apartment featuring original Art Deco finishes, chic furnishings, a private patio,  and a shared building courtyard.
space: Our furnished apartment was renovated in November, 2015.  Everything was new Queen bed plus single foam  mattress at no extra cost . Beach towels, picnic basket and rug provided. New carpet and new appliances. Ground floor, easy access, quiet location. Great Location, Beach, Water Activities, Dining, Shopping, Entertainment and Live Music. Palais Theatre across the road.
host_about: Unknown

name: Taledo, St Kilda Designer 1BDR Apartment close to St Kilda Beach
summary: Close to shops and transport as well as the iconic St Kilda Pier and Luna Park, be right at home in this stylish pad. Includes wifi and parking!
space: This beautifully styled, modern Richmond apartment is perfect for those looking for a Melbourne getaway, surrounded in the rich culture and history of iconic St Kilda. Inside is a comfortable queen sized bed in the main bedroom. You won't feel the cold in this brand new apartment, the insulation is amazing and the heating and cooling is there as a backup despite it staying fairly moderate all year round and opening the balcony makes for a refreshing breeze by the plants. The kitchen is fully decked out with everything you need to cook up a storm including cooktop, electric oven and bench. The bathroom is cozy, with overhead shower and laundry facilities including washing machine and a clothes rack for drying. Features: -Large living and dining space -Laundry facilities -Organic soaps and shampoos -Balcony with plants and outdoor furniture -Queen sized bed -Secure underground parking -Close to St Kilda beach Local area highlights: Most notorious for the smiling face of the Luna Park gat
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Modern 1BR Private Unit Flemington
summary: "The Stables" is a newly built, stand alone 1BR unit located at the back of an inner-city Melbourne property with its own street access. The train and tram are less than a 5 minute walk away, making The Stables an ideal base for city access.
space: 'The Stables' is a brand new 1BR stand alone unit built at the back of a private property. It's built on the footprint of the property's private horse stables. The unit has a separate living area, bedroom, bathroom and toilet along with a full kitchen.
host_about: We are a professional couple who love to travel and know how important it is to have a good accommodation base.  As proud Melbournians we value the opportunity of helping others to explore our great city.

name: Charming Richmond Bedroom for 1-2
summary: This large,well-lit,fully furnished bedroom is positioned in the heart of Richmond's famous Bridge Rd & Swan St.Surrounded by restaurants & bars & 5 minute walk from Richmond train station.2 housemates (27 & 30 yr old). Perfect for 2 or 1 guest.
space: It's a large bedroom in a 3 bedroom home, with 2 housemates, male 27 and female 30 in a beautiful townhouse in the heart of Richmond. Foxtel in main living area and WIFI is also available. A short 20 minute walk into Melbourne CBD and Southbank, across the road from MCG, walking distance from Rod Laver Arena and other sporting venues, 5 minutes from Richmond train station which connects directly with 8 other train lines. This is the perfect location in a beautiful townhouse in a quiet laneway right in the center of Richmond's best locations Bridge Rd and Swan St. Loads of bars and restaurants surrounding and lots of options for food home delivery.
host_about: Unknown

name: Spacious 2BR Corner Apt + Stunning Views
summary: * Spacious modern 2 Bedrooms apartment in heart of Melbourne CBD. * 270 degree stunning view towards Victoria Habour, from balcony! * Free access to Gym, Swimming Pool & Sauna! * Yes! You are in the FREE TRAM ZONE! * Southern Cross Station (Skybus) just across the road! How convenient! * Countless cafe, restaurants, bars and shops nearby! * Melbourne's iconic Etihad Stadium, The Crown, South Wharf DFO nearby! * High speed fibre internet up to 100mbs!
space: Positioned high on 30 floors overlooking to the west of CBD, this modern corner apartment boasts uninterrupted 270 degrees of stunning views towards Southern Cross Station and Victoria Harbour. You can see as far as Geelong and even people sailing in Port Philip Bay! This spacious apartment is filled with abundance of natural light. Enjoy the convenient Melbourne CBD living style with shops and cafes across the road. There is even a Coles Supermarket and a Asian Grocery shop just across the road. Tramlines are at your doorstep. The free city circle tram is just a 4 minutes walk from the apartment. A short stroll will bring you to the Docklands, Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and South Wharf DFO. The apartment is just opposite the Southern Cross Station where the Skybus terminal is located. So getting to/from the Melbourne airport via the Skybus is really easy! NOTE : Apartment is strictly for up to 6 occupants whether it's adults or children. Be aware the third bed is a queen-s
host_about:
Hi! Thanks for viewing my profile!

What I love the most about living in Melbourne is that Melbourne is a multicultural city where you can enjoy variety of foods, street arts and nature.

Both myself and my co-host Simon (both Airbnb Superhosts) have been hosting for more than 5 years. We will do our best to make sure you enjoy your stay with us! Our reviews speak for themselves!

Also have a look at my Airbnb guidebook where I listed some of the highlights of Melborne. Also I have a 'secret' list of my favorite foods specially prepared just for my guests! ;)

Below are the list of all my apartments :
https://www.airbnb.com.au/s?host_id=10394006
or
https://www.airbnb.com.au/wishlists/209489358

If you are new to Airbnb, you can use this link to get travel credit towards Airbnb booking!
https://www.airbnb.com.au/c/dlee824

Why book with Superhost?
First what is a superhost? https://www.airbnb.com/superhost

As a guest, what could be worst then arriving at the Airbnb and find that the host has cancelled your booking! Your previous time which can be used to explore the city is now spend calling Airbnb and fanatically looking for another accommodation. You may even ended up blowing your travel  budget because what's available in the last minute is higher than what you originally booked.

Booking with Superhost means you peace of mind and much lesser chance of having your booking cancelled.

name: A Huge, Private Room in Northcote
summary: This big and bright apartment is situated right in the heart of the cool, coffee, vintage, arty, yogi thriving suburb of Northcote. You will have a private room, BIG, beautiful and comfortable space - with easy access to public transport and a tram stop right out the front.
space: You will have a private room with a king single bed, in the apartment where my boyfriend and I are super friendly, respect each others privacy but also enjoy a tea or a wine and a chat together in the window sil. We are very busy so you will rarely see us. We do have another spare room which gets airbnb'd also so there may be another guest also. The apartment is on top of a massive selection of cafes and tons of restaurants ranging from Korean, Tibetan, Indian, Vegan, Israeli and Egyptian (just to name a few) , plus heaps of pubs, bars and boutique and vintage shopping, filled with artisan goodies from local Melbourne designers. Northcote is a very inspiring area and you are close to the city while enjoying a hidden gem of the northern suburbs. I also have a cat, he is very friendly, loving, cuddly and playful.
host_about: I am 26 years old, I just got back from a year or traveling the world. I use airbnb frequently and I am easy to get along with, enjoy conversations and learning about people and am a well mannered and pleasant house guest. Sometimes I like to think I'm funny too!

name: Melbourne Garden Hostel Queen bed
summary: Rooms are in a granny flat; Two rooms share all amenities including kitchen, washing machine, bathroom and toilet. Guest will need to pay AU$20 deposit for key of flat (which will be returned when you return the key)
space: There are two rooms. One with three single beds and the other with two queen-size beds; guests who enter the queen-bed room will need to pass the other room.
host_about: Unknown

name: A bright room in a lovely part of Melbourne.
summary: This room is in a family home in Melbourne's eastern suburbs around 10.9 kilometres from Melbourne CBD. Easy access to public transport - 10-15 mins walk from trains (Surrey Hills & Chatham Stations) and 5 mins walk to the 109 tram. Close to shops - Balwyn, Surrey Hills, Maling Road and Box Hill.  Suitable for relaxed couples and solo travellers who are looking for a lovely and convenient location, are happy to share a bathroom and comfortable with a large friendly dog.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: The Burrow at Wombat Bend B&B
summary: Secluded private self contained Yarra Valley retreat for one couple, close to everything you want to see and do. We know our Airbnb friends feel very much at home, from the moment you arrive.   Experience nature in a serene Australian landscape and revel in complete relaxation and tranquility. You’ll never want to leave.
space: Perfect for one couple, spacious yet cozy, our mudbrick and timber retreat welcomes you as family, yet guarantees your privacy. You'll have the best sleep ever, and wake to fresh country air and a lavish classic country breakfast that is ready for you to prepare.  Time stands still at The Burrow.  That's part of its magic.
host_about:
With my husband Bill Molyneux, I share a passion for Australia's precious environment and wildlife, and we devote our lives to their protection and conservation.  Botanical research, wildlife rescue & conservation, outback bush travel, and Airedale Rescue work, together with running our B&B, still enables us to cherish the special moments of each day when the wildlife of Wombat Bend and the light across the billabong capture and hold our attention, and we become part of the landscape that we have created.  We welcome all who share such a vision.  I'd say our life philosophy is that everyone can make a difference ~ for the better.  

Though we've been hosting guests here at Wombat Bend for years, we're thrilled to now offer this unique retreat through Airbnb.  Recent guests captured the spirit of the space when they wrote to us afterwards.....

 'We had a wonderful stay at The Burrow.  We felt our shoulders just drop when we arrived...  The cacophony of frogs' songs at night, perfect starry skies, rolling out of bed late to have coffee on the veranda with the birds and the billabong... plus a perfect homebase for all that the area has to offer.  Thank you for hosting us and our children - we can see how budding naturalists are inspired by your space and your passion! ‘

And from the heart ..... "Thanks for such an amazing getaway.  From the second we walked in, we instantly felt relaxed.  Your hospitality and kindness is amazing, and accompanied by such a beautiful tranquil cottage, makes for perfection. We can't wait to visit again!"

It doesn't get any nicer than that, does it?

name: Bohemian retreat, north side.
summary: This historical home in eclectic Northcote has more character than James Brown. Features include Art Deco details, outdoor area, marble fireplaces and a wide, first-floor window sill – perfect for people watching (or staring at the moon).
space: ***NOW WITH POCKET WIFI**** Below you'll see pics of my charming 2-bedroom townhouse right in the middle of Northcote (just 3.5km from Fitzroy and about 6km from the CBD).  Super spacious for one person and comfortable for two, the room on offer is perfect for the refined bohemian traveller.  Complete with succulents, the airy courtyard out back provides extra space and a nice place to chill out in the sunshine.
host_about: Unknown

name: Premium Modern One Bedroom Apartment CBD/Nth Melb
summary: Modern 1 bedroom apartment with a beautiful double bed and built-in wadrobe with mirror sliding doors. Effortless Luxury. Open space kitchen/dining and living area plus covered balcony. The apartment is clean, quiet, private and secure. It is situated within walking distance (2 mins) to tram stops, (5mins) to Royal Melbourne Hospital, Queen Victoria Market and Melbourne University. Easy stroll (10min) to CBD, Errol Street, Carlton and Lygon Street with its array of restaurants, cafes and bars.
space: Designed with clean lines, a flowing floor plan and absolute functionality, this stylish one bedroom apartment offers unique lifestyle and convenience. It opens into a bright living zone with sophisticated home kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, including gas cooktop and dishwasher, marble stone splash-back bench tops and space optimising cabinetry, while the flexible lounge/dining space adjoins a private covered terrace balcony. The sleek bathroom has a full-length walk-in shower, recessed mirror and separate and discreetly placed euro laundry.
host_about: Unknown

name: Collins St *SkyHigh Spectacular Views in CBD*
summary: Brand new building, 47th floor, one bedroom apartment in the heart of CBD, Collins St.  Enjoy stunning uninterrupted horizon views from your living room, sunsets over the bay from your bed, floor to ceiling windows, free-tram zone, free unlimited WiFi, fully equipped stainless steel kitchen. Pool, gym, spa, sauna, on level 33 and much more! Walk to: Cafes, Restaurants, Shopping (DFO), Train station, Coles/Woolies, lot more If it's fully booked out, please check out our other listing as well!
space: Brand new one bedroom apartment located on the 47th floor of one of the highest buildings to grace the Melbourne skyline. Welcome to the heart of Melbourne city, with Southern Cross train station around the corner and Spencer / Collins St Tram stop a few steps away from the building, the city beckons at your doorstep. Using Melbourne trams is a breeze, and it is free for you within the CBD zone and Docklands as you are in the Melbourne CBD Free Tram zone. We will provide you with a Melbourne Myki travel card so you can venture further than the CBD if so you should wish, please ensure you return it upon departure so following guests may also enjoy the same benefits. The apartment comes fully equipped with a modern kitchen, brand new spotless bathroom, Unlimited WiFi, 32" Sony LCD TV, Pillow-Top Freedom queen sized mattress and more! In terms of bedding, in the bedroom you will find the queen sized Freedom pillow top mattress bed, suitable for 2 people and in the living room you will hav
host_about:
A little about us:

Adam was born 26 years ago in beautiful Budapest, moved to Melbourne at the age of 12 and have lived here ever since. 
Currently completing my Masters in Mechatronic Engineering at Melb Uni, I enjoy making the most of my time off. I love to cook, photograph, travel, discover and be awed by this world and its mysteries with my beautiful wife, Anita. We have travelled, lived and worked together across 3 different continents, and have recently married in our birth home, in a small town near Budapest, in June, 2014. Although we have recently moved into our brand new apartment high up in the skyline of Melbourne CBD, we still love being tourists exploring our new home town of Melbourne.
We have, throughout our travels used AirBnb as guests with great pleasure, and through the positive experiences we decided to open our doors to host. We hope to meet many more travellers to tell us of their adventures, and share with us all the stunning places in the world to discover!

Anita & Adam

name: Swanston St, Walk to CBD, Car Park/Wi-Fi/Netflix
summary: Spacious one bedroom on 604 Swanston Street, Carlton, surrounded by beautiful parks. Here, you can avoid the hustle-bustle of Melbourne's CBD but remain within walking distance to it. Also walkable to Lygon Street (restaurants, cafes and gelaterias), University of Melbourne, RMIT and major hospitals (RMH, RWH, Peter Mac). Comes with car park, high speed Wi-Fi, Netflix, bluetooth speaker, linen, bathroom amenities, washer, dryer, fully-equipped kitchen and a balcony overlooking Lincoln Square.
space: Unknown
host_about:
Hi there, my name's Kevin. I'm a working professional originally from Penang, Malaysia, with an interest in food, travel, nature, technology, soccer and poker.

I've been living in Melbourne, Australia, since 2003, and feel privileged to now call this beautiful city my home. If you're planning a visit to Melbourne, I'd love the opportunity to host you at my place.

name: 4 bedroom, 4 living, built in trampoline.
summary: Renovated 4 bedroom house. 4 living areas & 3 full Bathrooms.  Our house is perfect for family’s.  With a big open plan kitchen with pantry, living with large doors opening to a great sunny court yard with BBQ.   Plus a large secure fenced yard for the kids with a built in trampoline, the kids and parents love it. Close to train (east Malvern train station is 200m away, a great cafe 4 doors down, and the worlds best shopping a 20 minute walk away.  Built in trampoline for the family to enjoy
space: Out house is the perfect space to stay if you are visiting. There is plenty of space to get away and not feel on top of each other.  4 bedrooms -  Master bedroom - downstairs king bed Bedroom 2 upstairs - Queen bed Bedroom 3 - Single bed Bedroom 4 - Single bed  The house has 4 living spaces A front sitting room A front TV room- Foxtel, Netflix, Stan Kids retreat upstairs with TV, Netflix, Stan, free to air, Appletv.  Open plan living area - Foxtel, Netflix, Stan Great secure yard for kids. With Massive built in trampoline.  Off street parking  A great cafe and coffee just around the corner.  3min drive to Chadstone shopping centre.  Football oval and new park with fantastic equipment over the road.  East Malvern train station 150m Into the city in 29min Great heating in winter Great cooling in each bedroom and living living space for summer. (Just not in one living space but the rest of it keeps this area cool.
host_about: Hi. We have a 3 places on Airbnb. One in the city and two in the country.  I run the accommodation for the 3 of them. It keeps me busy. We love using Airbnb.

name: Private Room with own bath in Brunswick West
summary: Carpeted room with a queen size mattress, desk and chair. Has wardrobe. Bed sheet, pillow and quilt with clean covers provided. Bathroom is next door to your room and not shared with anyone. Its a 2 bed 2 bath apartment and you will share apartment with only one person. Fully equipped kitchen, TV and sunny balcony for you to use. Free high speed WiFi internet.
space: The place is about 7KM from CBD. Tram 58 to city is 6 minutes walk from here. Train station is about 20 minutes walk. There is free street parking in front and back of the building.
host_about: Unknown

name: Relax in large, comfortable beachside home.
summary: Comfortable and spacious. 3 bedrooms + study/ bedroom. Walk to shops, restaurants, beaches. Indoor, outdoor living areas. Kayak and bicycle may be used. Wifi + printer. Public transport easily accessed. Fold out bed available, suitable for child.
space: Comfortable home with secure garden for children. There is a sandpit and some outdoor toys such as a tricycle and scooter. Plenty of indoor activities for  children too - games, books and toys. Many books and games for adults. Various places in the garden to relax with a drink or cup of tea.
host_about: Unknown

name: Trinity Camberwell - 3 bedroom luxury abode
summary: Refined living in Camberwell. Walk to the famous Camberwell Junction, Camberwell Market, Rivoli Cinema, Town Hall, Library, Restaurants, Cafes, Shops, Woolworth or Coles and more! Tram stop outside your door and just a short stroll to Riversdale Train Station. Parking also available. With no expense spared, our newly renovated ground floor home is luxury apartment living at its best. We invite you to make our home, your home away from home.
space: Entire apartment
host_about:
A long-term Melbournian who has also lived in France and South Africa. 

Having experienced AirBnB for the first time in Paris, I have wanted to offer guests a similar experience here in Melbourne. 

Speak French, English and a little Mandarin. 

Avid entrepreneur.

name: Modern 2 bdr apartment in the heart of south yarra
summary: Modern 2 bedroom apartment located in the heart of South Yarra. A short walk to Chapel st, trains, trams & a 10 mins travel to CBD. Surrounded by great cafes & shops. A little gem for travellers wanting connivence and the ultimate Melbourne experience!
space: Welcome to my apartment! Situated on Daly Street/Claremont Street. It is perfectly positioned with endless choices of cafes, restaurants, shops, bars and clubs. Also with public transport right at your footsteps for those who are looking to explore the city!  It is a two bedroom apartment with high ceilings on the 10th floor. It is the ultimate perfect apartment, for those who are looking for the ultimate travel experience - perfect for couples, families or if you are travelling with friends. The entire apartment can accommodate a maximum of 3-4 people.
host_about: Unknown

name: Large room in heart of Brunswick
summary: Groovy corner house with large rooms and spacious living area. Veggie patches out back and table tennis in the shed. You’ll be sharing with my lovely housemates Emily and Tim who are always down for a beverage and a chat over a game of cards.
space: Unknown
host_about:
Hey fellow b'n'b-ers,

I'm John a 25 year old environmental engineer originally from Radelaide. Been over in Melbourne for just under 2 years and it's the business. I think my big 5 would be something along the lines of gardening, diving, wining, dining and fantasy-ing. If you're thinking likewise I think this may be the start of a long and beautiful friendship.

name: Stylish 1BR Apt in central location
summary: Modern, stylish and convenient 1BR apartment on High St, Northcote.  Close to Number 86 tram and train and centrally located to dozens of quality restaurants, cafes and bars.  1 minute walk to supermarkets and fresh food outlets.
space: You will feel right at home in this brand new apartment with modern, quality furnishings and décor throughout.  Gorgeous large balcony with spacious lounge area and lots of potted greenery, with views along High St. A fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances; you are welcome to use all of the equipment and supplies during your stay.  Lovely plantation shutters on the windows allow you to let the light stream in, or can provide total privacy if you prefer. Route 86 Tram is within close proximity and will take you along Smith St, Collingwood, to Gertrude St and all the way to the city.  A short walk will get you to Northcote station for trains on the Hurstbridge and South Morang lines. A choice of supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, pubs and music venues are all within close walking distance. Choose from Greek, Vietnamese or Japanese restaurants right outside. Also, conveniently located close to gyms and three yoga studios. Free private parking space provided.
host_about:
I think of myself as a traveller at heart and wish I could do more.

At the moment, I work in radio, but most of my media career has been in Television, with a stint writing restaurant reviews.

I trained originally as a registered nurse.

My interests include reading, current affairs, social justice, gardening, music, skiing, walking and writing.

Places I've been to and loved: Europe, USA, Bali, Fiji, Mauritius.

Some movies I love: Gone Girl, Baghdad Cafe, Lars and the Real Girl, Good Will Hunting, Hotel New Hampshire

Books I've read more than once.: The Colour Purple, Until I find you, Shantaram, Harry Hole series, On writing.

Music is important to me on a cellular level: Prince, Pink Floyd, Rolling Stones, Nick Cave, Michael Franti,The Church, ACDC, Paul Kelly, Ray LaMontagne, Morcheeba, Dave Matthews Band

Food: Mexican, Italian, Thai, Modern Australian

name: Tidy share room in convenient location^.^.
summary: Ringwood Nancy's House Address : 30 Lena Grove Welcome to our lovely accommodation in Melbourne Ringwood. Please feel free to send us any enquiries, love to hear more from you!!!  We offer single bed share room and double bed whole room to suit different client needs.  Booking inquire is welcome anytime.
space: 【Services】 Water, Electricity, Gas, Wifi Internet (High-speed Optus Cable) Beds, Blankets, Washing Machine, Brand new Fridge, Cooking appliances and accessories, Heating blanket (for winter)
host_about: Unknown

name: My Petite Room South Yarra  Botanic Gardens
summary: Unknown
space: ‘My Petite Room’ is one of four upstairs en-suite bedrooms which once formed part of an exclusive small hotel run by my family. Each room has its own lock and key for guests' complete privacy. This beautiful heritage building is situated in the most accessible part of South Yarra with the wonderful Royal Botanic Gardens at one end of the street, and Fawkner Park, with tennis courts and café, at the other end.  ‘My Petite Room’ is a small room with the original vintage blue Laura Ashley wallpaper. The Room has: o      Lock and Key to your own room, and free WiFi o.    Double Victorian black iron bed o    Two bedside tables o.    Chest of drawers o.    Wall hooks for your clothes o.    Electric wall heater o.    Overhead ceiling fan o     Shutters to keep the room nice and cool on a hot day o.   Television  0    Iron & Board All bed linen, bath towels, feather pillows, and doonas (duvets/comforters) are provided.     The original en-suite bathrooms were installed in 1986 (when the proper
host_about:
I am a student & graphic artist, who also works in the food and hospitality industry,  and have recently returned from study and work in Europe.  I have just experienced living and working in a small hostel in Barcelona, which has inspired me to now welcome you to one of 'My Rooms'

I like to paint and draw and I'm lucky to live in a home that is filled with natural light.

I have lived in Melbourne my whole life and love living here. I ride my bike most places and find it a really easy city to get around.

I love travelling and meeting people from around the world. I look forward to welcoming you here to 'My Rooms' in South Yarra.

name: Cozy Apt at Riverside
summary: My place is close to I Love Pho, Victoria Street, and Seoul Soul. You'll love my place because of the cosiness, the comfy bed, the river view. My place is good for solo adventurers.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I'm in the real estate business and totally love it.
I've been to Europe & Africa. I speak Chinese, English & French.
I like travelling without rush, slowly explore a city, savour the local food & the vibe.
I love jazz, chamber music & classics.

name: Queen Bedroom near Mornington Peninsula
summary: We have a small house which has a shared driveway with 3 other houses which are separately titled. The room has a comfortable Queen size bed which sleeps two. It also has a TV/DVD player and the bathroom and kitchen facilities are shared. Guests have access to a lovely enclosed outdoor area if they wish. We have a well behaved and good natured 2 year old cat called Eddie who loves people. Bus stop to Frankston 20 metres from house. Close to Peninsula Link.
space: Bedroom has TV/DVD player, a selection of DVDs, comfortable queen size bed with warm doona, view of outside garden and full length wardrobe with sliding mirror doors. Room is close to the road so there may sometimes be some road noise although the room has an external roller shutter that reduces any noise by up to 70%. Please note that the room does not have a heater.
host_about: I am a 48 year old professionally self-employed person who lives in an outer Melbourne suburb about an hour south of the centre of Melbourne.

name: Luxury apartment 5 minutes from Melbourne's CBD
summary: Unwind in the sensational rooftop hot tub while enjoying stunning views overlooking Albert Park Lake, Melbourne's CBD and the bay. This luxury city side apartment boasts a stylish open-plan design with its own balcony, ideal for a glass of wine after a day in the city. Perfectly located on Albert Rd, South Melbourne, the apartment is only minutes away from Chapel St, CBD, Albert Park Lake, MCG, tennis sports district & cosmopolitan St Kilda.
space: Stylish, Spacious, Elegant, Classy, Friendly, Central, location location
host_about: Unknown

name: Cozy Home.Walk to Beach, Wetlands.Wifi,Netflix,Pet
summary: Enjoy your stay in this cozy, older single level home, walking distance to Seaford beach! Beautiful unique Wetlands, with a walk/bike track directly behind the home. You might want to bring your bikes! A perfect stay for your family getaway, weekend escape, or short-stay holiday. Huge secure backyard. Driveway parking for up to 3 vehicles.  Old garage a bit of an eyesore, but adds some character! Everyone is welcome, including your four-legged friends!   Gas barbecue and outdoor table setting .
space: Bedroom Plan: Bedroom #1: Queen bed with built in-robes Bedroom #2 Double bunk bed ( bottom double , top single) ,wardrobe Bedroom #3: Double bed,wardrobe Included in your stay: FREE Unlimited wi-fi & Netflix ALL INCLUSIVE!! We hope you will enjoy the wonderful wetlands and the pristine beach as much as we do. Please follow the map provided to access the locals entrance to the beach. Please don't hesitate to contact us during your stay, we are willing to make it as enjoyable as possible for you.  We look forward to having you stay
host_about:
My name is Mel and I love to travel, hence Airbnb is perfect for me, both as a host and a guest!

I have just recently returned from my 30th country, India, where I was volunteering. I will aim to make it the best stay possible for you, as I know how important comfort, relaxation and convienience is. 

We will be contactable at all times. My mother helps co-host all properties, especially if I am away.

Please don't hesitate to contact us at any stage as our aim is to make your home away from home as enjoyable as possible.

name: Cozy apartment, king bed and roof-top garden
summary: You’ll love the comfort of living in a calm building located in an active and good-vibes area, Brunwsick East, which is wellknown for its artistic background. You will always have an event waiting for you (Comedy Shows, open-mike, live concerts, fashion and art markets) and all that less than 10min away.   The appartment is well decorated to feel relax and have a cozy atmosphere after a long day in the exciting streets of Melbourne. (Connect your divice to the projector with our HDMI cable).
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Classic city fringe apartment
summary: A light and classic apartment with a scenic outlook over a leafy communal courtyard. Compact, comfortable and close to all that Queens Parade and Fitzroy North has to offer. * Please note there is no internet at the apartment.
space: Couples and solo travellers.
host_about: I'm a retired decorator who now travels extensively. Because of that, my lovely little apartment is looking for happy people to enjoy it right in the heart of Melbourne's inner north.

name: Dockland's Sunset Views with Private Room
summary: Luxury private room in Docklands Harbour with contemporary decor and stunning views!! Secure parking & wifi included Hotel restaurant on Lvl 1 of apartment  Tram stop directly in-front of apartment  8min walk to Southern Cross Station, Coles  & Airport shuttle (Skybus)  Reservations with more than one guest will incur a fee of $29 per guest per night
space: Southern Cross Station, Coles and DFO are just around the corner, as well as Crown Casino! South Wharf, Southbank, Queen’s Victoria Market, and Etihad Stadium. It is also surrounded by Flagstaff Garden and Batman Park, which provides you both CBD living lifestyle and fantastic leisure environment. This apartment is located within the free-tram zone so take advantage of it and explore this amazing city! For the apartment I will let the pictures speak for themselves as everything is brand new and high quality.
host_about:
The best memories throughout my travels was the company I was with, the food I ate and most importantly the little secrets I learnt about places from the locals. Being a local myself in Melbourne for 4 years now, I can help you figure out what to do and how to get around. It would be my pleasure to host you and give you insight into what Melbourne can provide and help you create memories so you can share your experiences of Melbourne :)

Hi, my name is Lance and I am a Canadian who now lives, studies and works in Melbourne. I am very friendly, well traveled and would love to host you in the best city in the world- Melbourne.

name: LOVELY BRICK COTTAGE
summary: In the midst of a peaceful leafy landscape on the east side of Melbourne, my 4 bedroom brick cottage enjoys a picturesque setting surrounded by parklands and stunning views of the nearby hills. There is one bedroom available for one guest.
space: My comfortable 4-bedroom house and a large garden are shared only with my loveable dog, Jakie - a labradoodle. There is a 7 min walk to transport and a large shopping centre with shops, cafes, restaurants and a cinema. The location is close to tourist attractions (10 min drive to Yarra Valley wineries, 15 min drive to Dandenong Ranges, 30 min to Healesville). A beautiful Lilydale Lake Park with a beach and swimming area is 10 min drive (also 3 swimming pools are 5-10 min drive away).  There is one bedroom available for one guest: the guest room has a single bed, TV and a PC.  When I am away guests can have all the house for themselves. My guests have access to almost everything: the lounge room, TV sets, PC, WiFi, kitchen with all utensils, dining area, washing machine, car parking, bikes, large garden, pergola and patio with all facilities, such as two barbecue grills, outdoor sofa, tables, chairs and deck chairs .  As an avid traveller myself I am also able to organize itineraries, t
host_about: I am a person who pursues to live out of the square and to the very fullest. Information Management Specialist by profession, fortunately my 9 to 5, “hamster-on-a-wheel” days are well over. Nowadays I am enjoying my life running a small business globally and doing what I love to do. Aside from my passions (photography, graphic design, computers, etc.) and love for my adorable Jakie the labradoodle, my real Life Motto is travelling the world...  I live in Melbourne, have emigrated twice and visited about 60 countries. My highlights were Cairo (Egypt), Sorrento (Italy), Bordeaux (France), Vancouver (Canada), Goa (India), Dalat (Vietnam), Jerusalem (Israel), Macao (China), Kyoto (Japan) and Maui (Hawaii). My list can go on and on… I visit Europe quite often, especially UK and Poland where I used to live before Australia. I also travel a lot in Oz (especially in Victoria and to the Gold Coast). I was AIR BNB guest in several countries (eg: Ireland, Ukraine). I meet many people overseas, making friends all over the world. I also invite people to my place as AIR BNB host, trying my best to be hospitable and helpful, assisting in a new town (including lifts / rides), sharing all the tourist information about Australia and Melbourne. I can also be a tour guide and help in sightseeing (considering my travel experience and diploma in tourism).

name: Private 3 Bedroom Townhouse - Kew (Sleeps 6)
summary: Kew Serviced Apartments is located six kilometres from Melbourne's CBD,  in the leafy suburb of Kew.   Our 3 Bedroom Townhouse offers spacious living & dining  areas, fully self contained kitchen, 2 Bathrooms, Laundry, WiFi and a generous private courtyard. The Townhouse also includes 2 carparks with Remote operated gates to provide secure access to the underground basement car park.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Arty, earthy Kiln house close to beach and city
summary: City beach house! Feel like you're on a holiday in this unique architect designed home modelled on tobacco kilns in the Ovens Valley. Close to city, light rail, Bay Street cafes, bars and restaurants, South Melbourne market and of course, the beach. Everything you need for a weekend escape or easy city commute for work. In a quiet and convenient location with off street parking, open fireplace, lots of natural light and a great backyard ideal for relaxing.
space: Entire place is yours!
host_about: Unknown

name: The Old Station Hotel,  rooftop,  city views
summary: A unique property, a beautiful spacious home with 4 metre ceilings. Open plan Kitchen, dining relax and lounge on super comfy couches. Located across the road from transport into the city, beach. Enjoy a 180 degree view of the city from the Roof top.
space: The home feels warm and cosy from the moment you walk inside
host_about:
Hey I'm Tarine
I'm a passionate host on Airbnb.
I've lived in Melbourne most of my life, spent three years in Brisbane and 2 years in Sydney. I've travelled around the world and extensively within Australia.  I'm very eager to share my knowledge and appreciation for the Melbourne culture  and introduce my guests to all the hidden secrets with in Melbourne.  My home is unique as it was once the original Station Hotel in Port Melbourne, the roof top alone has 180 degree private view of the Melbourne city, which is a light show in itself at night. Just outside this special location is the Light Rail (Tramline) which takes you either directly to the Port Melbourne beach or into the CBD.  We are located just two tram stops away from the Crown Casino, which house Melbourne's finest Restaurants, gaming tables, bars, cinemas and nightlife  .  I'm very excited to meet my guests and make you feel super special and offer you an unique experience. If your here to shop, I work fulltime in fashion and can support any fashion vista in shopping tips.  I also have a passion for fitness and can recommend some great running tracks and gyms to visit in walking distance from my home.  It is not essential to have a car when you stay at my place, all facilities are walking distance and transport is just outside the door.  I  look forward to meeting you soon.

name: Room in light-filled,spacious apartment in Fitzroy
summary: Located right near the heart of Fitzroy, this light-filled, spacious apartment is a stones throw away from Brunswick street shopping precinct, the Fitzroy pool, Smith street and Edinburgh Gardens. The North-facing apartment is situated at the back of the block, so remains quiet through the evenings, with loads of natural light through the day.  There are lots of great eateries and things to do in the area, and I'm happy to assist you wherever possible to ensure you have an enjoyable stay.
space: The room itself has a queen-size bed, wardrobe space, split heating/cooling and your own balcony looking out to the communal courtyard. The apartment has a large dining/lounge area, 1 communal bathroom, a second larger balcony, and a silly amount of plants. I also have a comfortable pull-out couch that sleeps 1 if required, charged at $30 a night (which will be included when booking for 3 people) PLEASE NOTE: If you wish to use both the Queen bed and pull-out couch between 2 people it will be an extra $15 a night.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Bindi !

I grew up in New Zealand, and since leaving 11 years ago have spent time in the US and Europe before permanently settling in Melbourne.
I live in my 2 bedroom apartment in Fitzroy North and work in Fitzroy as a Textile designer.
I enjoy travelling, experiencing different cultures, and love meeting new people along the way.

name: HarbourView Apartment - Two Bedroom Apt
summary: Self-contained two bedroom apartment, perfect for small group of friends and families. Perfectly located with a few minutes walk to Southern Cross Station, Etihad Stadium and Queen Victoria Market. We provide 24 hours reception / customer service to ensure that you have a great time during staying with us. Mid - Long term stay available, please contact us directly for more info.
space: Spacious apartment with hotel service standard which make your stay more comfortable and convenience.
host_about:
We have run this self-contained serviced apartment hotel for over 10 years with experience and service mind to ensure guests always have a memorable stays. 
It is a perfect place to stay for a night, a week or even longer or relocation with central location in the heart of Melbourne CBD.
We love Melbourne so much and would like to enjoy you to experience this famous multi-culture city which most people agree that it is the most liveable city.

space: 设施 The room with a garden view has separate entrance from the street. You can come and go as you please through your own entrance. It has a comfortable queen size bed with quality linen. An en-suite with full facilities, offering plenty of light. The study can be set up as the second bedroom with the double sofa bed. This self-contained unit also offers full kitchen and laundry facilities.  这幢带花园的景观民宿有独立的入口｡你可以自由出入,而无需经过主人房｡舒适的大床与优质的纯棉床上用品让你尽享舒适｡带天窗的卫浴设施齐全｡大小适中的书房可以很容易地改为卧室,提供双人沙发床｡该民宿还提供了齐全的厨房设施和洗衣设备｡
host_about:
Hi, I am Patrick, working as a part time coffee barista at a prestigious cafe in Hawthorn. I am normally the person who will welcome you with my big smile. My wife Yi works in real estate industry as a senior property consultant in Doncaster East. She is the one who left home first and come back as the last. Our primary school age daughter plays piano/violin/Ukulele. 

We all love friends, fine foods, beaches and sunshine. 

You are very welcome to have a chat with us on either property market, coffee making, or playing instruments when you have time and would like to enjoy tea with us. We are ready to share our local knowledge with you.

Welcome all feedback and want to you to help us help you enjoy your stay in Melbourne.

name: Multi-level style and comfort near CBD!
summary: Modern, spacious and fresh! This magnificent, multi-level apartment is situated in the heart of Collingwood's bustling scene of unique culture, entertainment, food, bars, parks and activities. Featuring two balconies and offering plenty of private space, this is the PERFECT pad to settle in and explore. Live in absolute comfort and enjoy special company while exploring the best of what Melbourne has to offer! Relax, unwind and enjoy!!
space: This modern, light, multi-level apartment has its own entry off a quiet street in Collingwood, an inner city suburb of Melbourne.  GROUND LEVEL - Large study space and/or additional living space SECOND LEVEL - Generous living area - Fully equipped kitchen Kitchen - Dining area with a table that can extend to seat eight people - Bedroom with Queen-size bed and private balcony - Bathroom - Second Balcony THIRD LEVEL - Bedroom with Double bed - Bathroom 2 - Second living area  - European laundry with washer and dryer Wi-Fi is unlimited throughout the house and there is reverse cycle air con in the main area. There are two smart TVs with Netflix and Stan. Please inquire about parking.
host_about:
G'day,

I'm Joel, i'm born and raised in Sydney, which is in my opinion one of the most beautiful major cities in the world. My goal in life is to one day visit every country in the world, I hold no bias to any of them and hope that I get the opportunity. So far I have visited 42 countries. Last year I spent 1 year travelling in South and Central America and loved the opportunity I had to learn Spanish. It was a great experience and one that I will never forget. 

My hobbies include all forms of board sports, skating, surfing and snowboarding primarily. I enjoy learning about new cultures especially their foods. I grew up in an Italian restaurant so my love for food and cooking is deeply engrained in my personality. 

My style of hosting and living life in general is pretty relaxed. I will do my best to greet you at the door and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. But if you just want to chill I can totally relate. 

I also love music and watching live music. I mostly go out to see House, deep house and techno music as that scene in Sydney is easily accessible. However at home you will find me listening to hip-hop, reggae, latin, afro-beat, jazz and anything with a smooth and funky beat. 

If you need recommendations about food or music in Sydney these are probably my two strongest topics, so please don't hesitate. 

Looking forward to meeting more crazy, fun and cool people through Airbnb. 

Joel

summary: Adorned with beautiful boutique and designer furniture and fittings, this vintage apartment in the heart of Fitzroy will provide you with all the luxuries of a unique Melbourne experience. Discover all the best coffee, shopping and culture right here.
space: Safe and secure with security screen ground floor entry. Mirrored glass windows on the living room provide privacy during the day and the location is super central to the best parts of the city. Although in the heart of Melbourne, the apartment is a comfortable quiet place to retreat. The lounge room is spacious and stylishly furnished, with ornamental fireplace, heating and comfortable couch (B&B Italia the Andy) that folds out to generous bed for one. The bedroom has a queen size bed and desk with ample cupboard space.  The adjoining bathroom is generous with bath, shower, toilet and laundry cupboard with washing machine and dryer. Six seater dining table, perfect for entertaining others, and suitable for professionals requiring a meeting space.   Separate large kitchen contains all working amenities required to cook up a storm and opens out to an easement. Fireplace, heater in bathroom and gas central heating mean its nice and cozy to stay warm and mirror coated windows ensure you h
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Central, Spacious, Free WiFi
summary: This large spacious well appointed quiet and very comfortable apartment is located within minutes of the fabulous features of this iconic suburb including restaurants, bars, cafes, fashion and boutique shops, supermarket, cinemas, Botanic Gardens, parks, Chapel Street, Toorak Road, Yarra River, MCG, train, tram and close to CBD. To celebrate being awarded Super Host by Airbnb, we have just increased our discount rate. Thank you to the Airbnb community for this recognition.
space: Guests love: the spaciousness of the apartment,  the great range of appointments, the abundance of cupboard, wardrobe and storage space  and the proximity to our iconic local features and attractions plus the convenience of public transport, restaurants, shopping centres, supermarket, cafes etc
host_about:
Melbourne is my home. My heart, history and future are all here. I absolutely love the people, the culture and the atmosphere.

Some personal things about me that you may like to know is that I had a hard life as a child, joined a volunteer counselling service called Lifeline in my 20's.

I was awarded the best business person in my region in 2012 and two years later was awarded best tourism product in Australia for a B&B that I  owned in Queensland. I was also keynote speaker at the annual national Vinnies CEO Fund Raiser where they raised millions for the homeless.

I  enjoy coffee, people, good/healthy food and staying fit.

My wish is to do everything in my power to ensure that your stay is everything that you expect it to be. I am available at any time to help make that happen
