name: Yarra Valley-Lakes-Yarra Glen Town-Wineries-Rm 2
summary: 5 Star on a budget! Its lovely. Treed court minutes walk from 3 beautiful lakes; mountain views, wetlands birds and Yarra Glen township.  Mornings the birds are singing and evenings the crickets lull you off to sleep. My home has a soothing ambiance. The guest bedrooms are very lovely with brand new furniture and luxurious bedding.  Room 2.  There's an authentic looking log fire (gas) for a wonderful warmth and ambiance.
space: Just a short walk to the end of the street has you at three beautiful lakes, that provide a sanctuary for wetland birds  and the most beautiful sight of the mountain range that you can imagine.  Evenings provide beautiful sunsets lakeside.   Melbourne's iconic Yarra River flows behind the lakes. The lakes are in the Yarra Glen township where you will find supermarkets, cafes and many restaurants.  Also the Yarra Glen Grand Hotel, Atticus Wine Bar and Hargreaves Brewery. All WITHIN walking distance from home.Close to all of the places of interest in the Yarra Valley. The Yarra River flows through Yarra Glen just behind the nearby lakes.  Within 700mtrs from my place is the Atticus Wine Bar and the Grand Hotel, open most nights; WALKING, no driving required!  The Valley boasts more than 60 wineries. WITHIN 10 minutes is Levantine Hill Estate (Top International Wine Award 2018 for Syrah) Domaine Chandon, Yarrawood Estate, Punt Road, St Hubert's, Meletos, Napoleons Cider House, De Bortoli,
host_about: G'day from Australia.  I work in a Secondary School just 15 minutes from home.  I love cycling and hiking.  A huge enthusiast who loves the outdoors, friendship, lots of food and wonderful wine.  I'm very blessed to live in the Yarra Valley home of magnificent eateries and world class wineries.  If you stay here you will be within minutes of this magnificent country playground. I've travelled to USA, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Fiji, the Cook Islands and New Zealand.  I've cycled and hiked in all of these countries.  The Yarra Valley is on par with the most beautiful places in the world.  Come and share some of this paradise with me.

name: Appealing Abbotsford - Top Location and Amenities!
summary: Welcome to my top floor 1 BDR apartment in a first class complex–with a pool, gym, spa and sauna. Abbotsford is a real inner-city gem; located by the Yarra River and its beautiful surrounding parklands, you’re just a couple of kms from the CBD. Experience the best of Melbourne from this great area with its unique cafes and restaurants, funky bars, boutique shopping and easy access to public transport. Perfect for friends, couples, a small family and business travellers on your next city getaway

host_about: 53 year old Married

Apart from that, the apartment itself is furnished beautifully, has great natural light exposure, great unblocked view of the city and it's very spacious. space: The apartment is located just a walk away from Melbourne's Chinatown, bustling with delicious Asian food. host_about:
My family moved to Melbourne around 15 years ago and we feel blessed by every bits and alleys of this gorgeous city.

About me - I am an IT graduate from RMIT University Melbourne and worked in tech company for last few years. Now, I'm running accommodation business with my brother. We are hosting a number of apartments around Melbourne CBD and ensure the rooms are guest-ready all the time.

Aside from working, we love travel and enjoy great coffee, so you bet we can recommend you some of iconic Melbourne brunch places and cafes that definitely make your stay in Melbourne memorable.

name: Large 2BR apartment CBD- Casino,MCEC,SouthernCross
summary: Spacious and light filled 2BR apartment with views towards the Bay, centrally located across the road from Crown Casino, a short walk to Southbank restaurants, Exhibition Centre, South Melbourne Markets and  Southern Cross Station. Excellent public transport links-trams at doorstep. Secure entry with great on site facilities including a tennis court, swimming pool and BBQ area, 1 secure parking space available on request. This beautiful apartment gives gives you Melbourne life at its best!
space: 90m2 apartment with large open plan living area- floor to ceiling windows with expansive views. Great layout with 2 large bedrooms on opposite sides of floor plan both with views to the bay. Spacious combined bathroom and laundry with washer and dryer. Built in robes in both rooms.
host_about: Unknown

name: Artist Warehouse Apartment Fitzroy
summary: If you like Art, Food, Design and Fashion you haven found the place, Located in the heart of Fitzroy in between Brunswick St and Smith St in what was formally a chocolate factory now a stylish Warehouse conversion, filled with my art and others.
space: me and my girlefriend are renting out the second bedroom in my renovated warehouse apartment, the medium sized room is fully furnished has built in robes, queen sized bed, lounge, books, and large warehouse style windows and polished floors.  The flat rotates around the themes of art, literature, good food and sustainability with a big open space with a large kitchen and dining room looking out onto a well stocked vertical garden so if you love to cook, read, relax and enjoy art this place is for you.     Ideal for guests in Melbourne for a short time who want to live like a local in vibrant Fitzroy and who are interested in staying in lovely bright, Art filled apartment and want something much more then a hotel.
host_about:
I am full time Artist, Writer, Designer, philosophy loving, well traveled, open-minded and sociable. 
I have currently returned to Melbourne after living in Paris and am now starting up a business aimed at helping the creative industry become more sustainable. 
I have lived in france, UK, germany, china, japan, vietnam as well as travailing to numerus other places around the world.

I have a broad range of interest from art, fashion, architecture, design, philosophy, sustainability, news and current affairs and food!  

I studied sculpture and spacial practises at the Victorian college of the Arts and have goon on to exhibit here in Australia and overseas you can see more of my art and writing on  my website (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

On returning to melbourne I renovated my warehouse apartment instilling all my loves of food, sustainability, art, and socializing  at the core of the design.
When it is not being rented out on AirBnB I run a residency program called the philosophical rose (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

I am easy going and love a good glass of wine, food and good conversation.

summary: Unknown

Experience heightened boutique accommodation with a stay at District Apartment Hotels South Yarra. Featuring contemporary self-contained apartments with free high-speed Internet access and flat-screen TVs. All tastefully furnished with wood floors, washer/dryers, and stylish living rooms incorporating dining tables adjacent to the well equipt kitchens and all offer balconies. One, Two and Three bedroom options and basement car parking available (charges apply).

It is not only the friendly faces that greet you at reception that will have you returning for your every Melbourne visit. It is also the location of District Apartment Hotels South Yarra which will entice you back time after time. Only a minute's walk from South Yarra tram/train station, 2 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria and 6 km from the Queen Victoria Market and perfectly positioned in the heart of the vibrant cafe precinct that South Yarra is famous for and one stop away from Melbournes prestigious sporting and concert venues.

name: Lovely Southbank apartment close to everything
summary: An ENTIRE apartment unit ALL TO YOURSELF right across Crown casino. Only minutes walk to DFO Southwarf and free trams zone towards Melbourne Central, and the Crown just on your doorstep. This stylish Southbank apartment is only moments to Melbourne’s vibrant city centre, the Yarra River, the Melbourne convention center and an array of arts-related attractions. Surrounded by fabulous restaurants, cafes, bars and boutique stores. You can enjoy your fantastic city life here!
space: It is a two bedrooms apartment with an unobstructed view of South Melbourne. The main bedroom is equipped with brand new queen-sized bed, soft pillows and enough wardrobe space for long stays. The second tiny room is just perfect for one single guest (please note this room has got no windows, so make sure you leave the door open when you sleep, refer to the photo for what it looks like). The kitchen is combined with the living room which is fully equipped with fridge, freezer and hob including toaster, kettle, etc. We also provide: -linens and towels (it will be changed every 3-4 days with no extra cost if you stay longer than a week) -microwave, oven -dishwasher and washing machine -iron and ironing board -hair-dryer -shampoo and shower gel -tea and coffee -cooking essentials Coming to my favourite part of the apartment, it is my favourite time of the day to sit in the balcony and watch the sunset over this beautiful city. The night view is spectacular.

host_about: Live love laugh, love to get around, meet new people, try new bars around the city.

name: Hotham heights, multi-level 2BDR Melbourne Home
summary: A fully equipped two bedroom apartment, with modern interiors, centrally located in North Melbourne with city views + free wifi and parking.
space: Spacious and recently renovated, open plan 3 storey home with a rooftop terrace overlooking the city. Features 2 bedrooms with queen sized beds on the lower level with bathroom and laundry facilities, open plan kitchen, living and dining on the mid level and then a study space at the top by the roof terrace. Perfect for corporate travellers! North Melbourne is a vibrant and eclectic neighbourhood only walking distance to Melbourne's CBD. Two streets away is Errol Street, a classic North Melbourne promenade that features one of Melbourne's best spots for coffee and breakfasts, Auction Rooms at 103 Errol Street. Just a little farther down the street from there, are great restaurants to choose from and a famous spot for stand up comedy, The Comic's Lounge. If fresh produce and great food is what you are after, head towards Queen Victoria Markets, a few blocks away down Victoria Street. If you are arriving to the apartment from the airport via the Skybus to Southern Cross station, our home
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

I'm the type of traveler that only researches the best spot for accommodation and nothing else.  I love arriving to a city not knowing what's in store for me.  The best parts about travel are the food, nightlife, shopping and scenery.

name: Room- City View- Spa at your window -Own bathroom!
summary: My place is opposite to Crown Casinos Metrapol hotel and the CBD! Also a hop skip and jump from the SouthMelbourne markets and the wonderful beaches of port Melbourne, Elwood and St Kilda. Tram stop out the front that will take you to St Kilda in 10 Min!. You’ll love my place because you will have the city at your fingertips but also feel like home. With everything here and more! The bed is super comfy and there is WiFi, pool, spa (out your window), gym and sauna. Not to mention the Views!!!
space: I am a property stylist by trade so my home is very clean and stylish, with a collection of things i have gathered from my years of travel and work.
host_about:
I am a buisness owner, I run a Property styling company and sometimes work from home. I also part time Dog sitting so you  must love dogs because there might be one of my regular furry friends staying too!

I love Melbourne and was born here but have lived and travelled to many other places but I love this city! Can't wait to have you and point you in the best direction to the most delish food and drinks and to see all of the action in the city!

name: Melbourne at your finger tips
summary: Our light, bright 3 bedroom home is perfect for a couple, friends or a young family. In the midst of a vibrant culture with delicious food, coffee, art & community. A 5 min walk to a train, 10 mins commute to the city & to the waterfront Docklands.
space: The famous Footscray Olympic Doughnuts originated  here!     Our converted shop front residence is light, bright & fun.  Our 3 Bedrooms consist of: 1 Queen Bed 1 Queen Bed 1 x bunks with single beds Open plan kitchen living area which opens up to the courtyard is a perfect way to start a day with a cup of tea or coffee made from our easy to use coffee machine and at the end of the day with a glass of wine!    Cook up a storm on the BBQ or in the kitchen after a visit to the amazing local markets or the fish & other produce stores.  A separate TV room with Netflix & Foxtel is comfy & cosy when the time comes to chill out or is a great  room for the kids to play. Central bathroom with shower & bath. In our courtyard we have a few ropes, clibers and swings set up to create a Ninja Warrior Challenge for kids between 4-9 years old. What's here: Coffee machine BBQ Dishwasher Washing machine Internet Netflix Foxtel Please bring your own sheets - Doonas,doona covers & Pillows will be provided.
host_about:
My husband & I love travelling. Our work & our passions have taken us to amazing places where we love getting off the beaten track & meeting the people who live there.  Our next adventure is to introduce our daughters to the world!
We love living in Footscray Melbourne.  It is our way of having the world at our finger tips.   We hope you enjoy our home & the vibrant community we live in.

summary: Soak up the sun and admire unobstructed views from the spacious balcony overlooking South Yarra and Melbourne's business district. Cook a meal at the modern kitchen island, then head outside for some fresh air while you dine at sunset.
space: Beautifully fitted out apartment including: - Fully equipped kitchen with Miele appliances - Laundry with Bosch Washing Machine & Dryer - Beautifully appointed bathroom and en-suite - Loccitane Amenities provided (Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash, Hand Soap) - Plenty of storage space - Free High Speed Wi-Fi Internet - Large outdoor balcony - Light filled corner apartment Please note if third bed setup in living room is required please advise in advance at time of booking if the third bed is required. Additional charge of $20 per night is applicable.
host_about:
We are a couple born and bred in Melbourne. We travel a lot for business and pleasure, passionate about good food and restaurants, love great conversation & connecting with inspirational people. 

Airbnb has given us an amazing opportunity to meet lots of great people. We are passionate about hosting and ensuring our guests experience this beautiful city like locals.

summary: Recently renovated in glamorous, art-deco style with new appliances, new bathroom, walk in robe etc. 3 br + 2 bathroom. Less than 5 min walk to supermarket, restaurants and train. Train 2 CBD in 25 min. Deck w bbq and garden. Drive fits 3 cars.
space: Recently renovated in the Art Deco style with high ceilings, a big deck and lovely garden.  Polished floorboards throughout. This house will comfortably fit five guests. It suits families but will also fit two couples and a single. *Three bedrooms - two with double beds and one with a single bed (+floor mattress if required). *Two bathrooms - both with showers, one with a bath. *Two separate toilets. *Large open plan kitchen/dining/living space designed for entertaining and relaxation. *TV and media centre. *Large deck with BBQ and six seat outdoor dining table.

name: Quiet pad with parking/gym/Netflix
summary: My 1 bedroom apartment is in a classically styled building on Melbourne's leafy St. Kilda Road boulevard. The CBD, Botanic Gardens Shrine of Remembrance and National Gallery are nearby, along with many other things to see and do. The apartment is fully furnished and self contained, including private laundry facilities, WiFi (NBN), 43 inch TV with Netflix, a secure parking space and access to the rooftop gym, making it a great home away from home for short or long stays.
space: The apartment is a simple one bedroom plus bathroom and living/kitchen. My intention is that it is clean and free of clutter, containing everything you need to make it your home away from home.
host_about: I've lived in and around the Melbourne CBD for some time. I enjoy snowboarding, motorcycling and travelling when I have the time.

name: Cosy private cottage
summary: Newly renovated and artistically built, this unique cottage has a cosy and charming feel, sure to make you feel comfortable and relaxed for your next visit/adventure. The lounge has a comfortable couch and TV, with a deluxe bathroom. The bedroom has an adjoining kitchenette with fridge, microwave, and cooktops. Rendered stone walls, a handmade double bed with comfortable new mattress and electric ‘wood fire’ fireplace complete the ambiance.
space: Unknown
host_about:
When we were younger we loved to travel the world. At home, our house was always full of life an laughter and we always love to host people. 
Now that our kids have moved out, our lives have settled down but we still love to discover the world through talking to different travellers.

We have lived in this neighbourhood for over 25 years and we love it. So close to the CBD and to shopping centres and coffee shops yet far enough to be away from all the commotion and hustle and bustle of the busy city life.

Rita is an artist whether its painting or pottery, felting or mosaics, Rita will be more than happy to share her passion with you.

name: Richmond Hill Cottage
summary: Bright cottage-style holiday rental is set behind a white picket fence in Melbourne’s Richmond Hill area. Laid out on two levels, the 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is a dream. It includes some thoughtful indulgences such as the spa bath in the master en-suite, a fireplace in the living area providing a welcoming focal point and Bi-fold doors fully open onto a private courtyard garden with deck. It’s the perfect place for enjoying a good book or pre-dinner cocktails.
space: Minutes from lively Swan and Church streets, yet a remarkably quiet retreat nestled atop Richmond Hill, this contemporary 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom stylishly renovated home is a light filled, spacious and contemporary urban space.    This home has a delightful private, green courtyard space accessed from the living area via bi-fold doors and features polished floor boards, a mix of eclectic designer and vintage décor, luxury soft furnishings, choice of pillows, 5 star quality fluffy towels and bed linen, cosy open fireplace, flat screen smart TV in living room and TVs in two bedrooms, modern stainless steel European appliances and laundry, spa bathtub, extra living space in upstairs hub, WIFI, car parking, coffee machine and some air-conditioning. This pet friendly holiday rental is 3 minutes’ walk from Richmond Hill shops and 4km from Melbourne city centre attractions.   Walking distance to the Melbourne sports and entertainment precinct - MCG, Rod Laver Tennis Centre, AAMI Park, Hisense
host_about: With a focus on quality Property Management and a fantastic range of properties to suit all budgets, we aim to take the guess work out of choosing the right holiday rental for you. Launching in 2004 with our flagship site, 'A Perfect Stay' now has a number of Territory websites with many more to come. The Management of these regions has been modelled on our successful Byron Bay Holiday Rentals structure which focuses on providing quality experiences for our clients in the form of personalized customer service; clean and well presented properties.

name: Stroll to Beach and Cafes From Trendy St Kilda Pad
summary: Catch morning rays through floor-to-ceiling windows in the plush bedroom, then slide open the doors for a coffee on the balcony. Take a stroll to the beach for a day in the surf, before snuggling up in the grey tub chair in this soothing space.
space: Please also check my other listings if this property is not available on your preferred dates. Great specials for long-term bookings, just ask!! Substantial discounts also available mid-week. Set in this architecturally inspired block of apartments, the space in this apartment is amazing. With a very large bedroom (with queen sized bed and super comfy mattress), open plan living and dining area and an external entertainers balcony, a party of 3 is easily accommodated. Please note we allow up to 3 guests to occupy the apartment, however, the sofa may not be appropriate for all people to sleep on. If you have any concerns about the sleeping arrangements for the 3rd person please contact us prior to making the booking to ensure it is suitable. Maximum length (including tow-bars, bike racks etc) 5.0m. Maximum width 2.0m. Maximum height (including roof racks etc) 1.5m, maximum load 2,000 kg."
host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

name: Cozy 2BR apartment in peaceful area of South Yarra
summary: 2BD private apartment. Centrally located to all of Melbourne’s great features – Chapel St, Yarra River, MCG and the City all 10 mins away. Walking distance to Hawksburn train station and trams on Toorak Rd. Great place for couples to spend a lovely weekend away.
space: The apartment is located on Williams Rd, South Yarra, around the corner from Toorak and Hawksburn villages, where there is a great supply of cafes, supermarkets, delicatessens, restaurants and bars.  The kitchen comes with everything one would need, along with a dishwasher and dining table. The bedrooms contain very comfortable Queen size double beds. There is a washer/dryer.  The apartment contains heating, air-conditioning and ceiling fans.  There is a nice outdoor private balcony.  The apartment would be ideal for AFL finals!  There is access to 2 bicycles in good working order; with helmets and bike locks - perfect for a ride down to the botanical gardens.  The MCG, Chapel St, Richmond and the City are all a matter of a few minutes away from the apartment.

name: Gem Apartments 2 Bedroom Freshwater Deluxe
summary: Location, Location, Location – 40 metres from Crown Casino and literally on Southbank Promenade. The CBD is across the river, with easy access via footbridges. This spacious two bedroom, two bathroom apartment on the thirty fourth floor is the perfect choice for travellers looking for something special.
space: Open plan living areas, balconies and fully equipped kitchen boast spectacular views over the Yarra River, CBD skyline and to the horizon. Main bedroom comprises a Queen size bed, balcony, large walk in robe and an enormous ensuite with large bath, separate shower and double vanity.
host_about:
My name is Kellie and I started Gem Apartments with one fantastic apartment in 2009. We have since grown to manage a network of 25 apartments around Southbank. 

Gem Apartments successfully straddles the traditional serviced apartment market / and individual holiday market by keeping strict control over all of our apartments. 

Our apartments are all furnished and fitted out by Gem Apartments to the same standard, and have the same inclusions. 

I work full time in the business out of an office on Whiteman Street, and am available for our guests each day. 

I oversee each apartment on a daily basis to ensure that each apartment is kept to the standard of Gem Apartments. Value Executive Accommodation with all the touches of home. 

Our business is structured to offer our guests all the benefits of individually owned and operated holiday apartments, but with the staff and professionalism behind it to offer our guests peace of mind if something does go wrong.

name: Pleasant Room in Two Bedroom Unit
summary: Front home theatre and gaming lounge, near to the station, decently sized room, clean and tidy, pleasant to live in. The nearby tram goes straight to St Kilda, which is where all the backpackers seem to hang out.
space: Unknown
host_about:
Hi, I'm Ashley. I'm an engineer by profession and during the week, I like to go out, exercise, watch movies and play video games. I also like to go out and hit a pub or two on the weekend.

I'm originally from England but I've been in Melbourne since I was a kid so I'm pretty familiar with this city.

name: Need a dose of Vitamin Sea?
summary: Beach Side 2 bedroom Ground Floor apartment for 6 to 7 people. Ideal for Families and Groups.  Pets also accepted.  Free Onsite Parking. Public transport close by. Unlimited WIFI and Netflix. Apartment is situated in a charming tree-lined street, snuggled among grand old Edwardian homes. Comfortable and quiet, this apartment has everything you need for a short or longer stay. The sands of the Beach, Restaurants, Cafes, Wine Bars, Supermarket, Boutiques and Bakeries - All 2 minutes walk away.
space: The ENTIRE apartment is yours - No sharing with anyone else. The apartment, having 2 bedrooms, a lounge room (which can also be used as bedroom), a bathroom,  and kitchen can accommodate up to 6 guests comfortably and up to 7 with a bit of a squeeze.  If you'd like an earlier check-in time then please ask, as this may become possible depending on circumstances at the time. We provide Shower gel/ Shampoo & Conditioner Laundry and Washing powder Dish washing liquid The Beach is 1 minute away. Voted one of the best beaches in Melbourne, Elwood Beach is exceptionally clean with a wide expanse of beautiful white sand. Build a Castle !  Bike and Pedestrian Paths along the foreshore. Toilet facilities are good. Dig your toes in the sand, go for a dip or just have a FREE Beach BBQ with friends - BYO Beach Towels and Wine... Lovely at sunset. Take the Beach Path to St Kilda and Luna Park (2.5 km) and stop for an Ice cream along the way at the 100 yr old Point Ormond Kiosk.  There are tiles etch
host_about: I've been living in Melbourne most of my life, so I know it pretty well. But yet when I get on my bike I ride through areas which are so different to what I am used to that I often feel that I am in a different city altogether.

name: Newly Renovated 2BD Apt in Heart of Collingwood
summary: Welcome to our modern apartment in Melbourne's Collingwood neighbourhood!  This newly renovated spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a full kitchen, an open concept living/dining space and two balconies. Situated off Smith Street, the apartment is a stones throw away from some of Melbourne's best restaurants and cafes or just a quick 15 minute tram to the CBD. Perfect for small groups, friends, families and even business visitors - come one come all!
space: The Apartment: - 2 Bedrooms - 2 Bathrooms - Open Living Space -  Fully-Equipped Kitchen - Balcony  Amenities: - Professionally cleaned - Hotel-quality high thread-count bed linen and towels - Tons of natural light - 24/7 check-in - WiFi Open Living Space: - Relaxing living area with comfy furniture - Tons of natural light - Fantastic open-plan space Kitchen: - Fully-Equipped - Oven - Stove - Fridge  - Dishwasher Bedroom 1: - Queen-sized bed - Large work desk - Private balcony access Bedroom 2: - Queen-sized bed - Build in wardrobe Bathroom 1: - Full bathroom with bathtub Bathroom 2: - Full bathroom

Superb location, only 2-minute walk to Melbourne Central Railway Station, Woolworths supermarket and major shopping centres. La Trobe Street and Elizabeth Street tram stops are just on your doorstep. Enjoy a 5-minute leisure stroll towards Flagstaff Gardens or a 6-minute walk to the renowned Queen Victoria Market. This apartment will be your perfect base to have a pleasant stay in The World’s Most Liveable City!
space: This North-facing 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment is located in a private building of only 5 units on each floor. It has all the modern amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. You will find double-size bed in each carpeted bedroom, timber flooring, air conditioning and heating, an exposed concrete ceiling with track lighting, modern kitchen equipped with oven, dishwasher and microwave, floor-to-ceiling glazing and full-height sliding windows which opens towards the leafy La Trobe Street. Fast NBN internet is also available free of charge.
host_about:
We are three young and passionate Melbournians that love to travel and food lovers. Feel free to ask us and we will give our recommendation some of the best food in Melbourne.

We hope you enjoy your stay in our modern cozy apartment!

Just minutes walk from shops, cafes, restaurants, parks, public transport and more. With easy access into the centre of Melbourne, you will love this fantastic area!
space: This is a beautiful family home from which to enjoy one of the best parts of inner Melbourne.  Located within close proximity to the city, but also just a couple of minutes walk from the bustling atmosphere of Glenferrie Road, Malvern Train Station and Malvern Central Shopping Centre - you will love the leafy surrounds and the local green spaces of relaxing Malvern.  My home is a renovated single fronted Victorian terrace with a light-filled living space with polished wooden floor boards where you can enjoy chilled out afternoons, and cosy nights in. The large comfortable leather couch provides the ultimate in comfort and relaxation – in the cooler months curl up with a glass of local wine in front of the open fireplace.  The lounge area also features media storage & surround sound wiring, and a plasma TV with access to cable channels (Foxtel). There are also plenty of DVDs and books, and full wireless internet access.  The modern kitchen is fully equipped with anything you may need to

name: Art Deco gem in St Kilda's heart!
summary: Our beautiful two-bedroom Art Deco apartment is perfectly located for all the fun of St Kilda and the city of Melbourne.  Only a 10 minute walk from parks and beaches, it is an inviting, comfortable space where you will feel immediately at home.
space: Our beautiful two-bedroom Art Deco apartment is perfectly located for all the fun of St Kilda and the city of Melbourne.  Only a 10 minute walk from parks and beaches, it is an inviting, comfortable space where you will feel immediately at home. Please read our listing thoroughly and message us with an enquiry before reserving dates so that we can make sure our apartment is the perfect match for you! Where will you be staying? Our apartment is nestled up in the top corner of one of St Kilda's beautiful old Art Deco buildings, constructed in 1921. It has generous rooms and high ceilings, and special quirks that we have fallen in love with - in particular our beautiful arched windows. Both bedrooms have double beds, but provide very different experiences. The master bedroom is large and restful, located at the rear of the apartment. The 'sun room', our smaller second bedroom, is at the front of the apartment and has large arched windows on two walls - and no curtains. We live on a busy,
host_about:
Hello!

I am Alanna, an Australian who lives in Glasgow with my lovely wife, Rachel.

When I lived in Australia, my former flatmate and I were Air BnB hosts in St Kilda, Melbourne, and I have been an Air BnB traveller for many many years. I truly love Air BnB and I have been fortunate enough to make some lifelong friends from my Air BnB adventures!

My most exciting travel experience was the 3 months I spent in India in 2009, but I am also a sucker for beautiful New Zealand.  This said, my favourite city in the world is New Orleans. As an Australian living abroad, I love meeting new people and experiencing different cultures as much as possible.

I'm a freelance photographer - mostly I shoot weddings, but I also shoot portraits, pets, and property.

As a former host, I am a respectful and considerate guest. I'm looking forward to meeting you!!

summary: Centrally located in Melbourne's famous arts precinct, this apartment with a homely feel is the perfect place to stay. It is located in a low rise complex with direct walking access to the CBD, Yarra River, Crown Casino, Federation Sqr, Exhibition/Conference Cntr. Beach is a 5 min tram ride from stop outside front door. Many more Melbourne highlights on the doorstep like the Botanic Gardens Melb Aquarium & DFO Southbank. Situated in a lovely resort with free pool/spa, gym & tennis within complex
space: If it's an easy lifestyle with resort-style living that you are looking for with a personal touch this is the property for you. I offer an allergy free home with beautiful polished wooden floors. Free wifi accessibility for all my guests. Additional room may be available for bookings of more than 2 people.
host_about:
I am a fun loving outgoing fit happy and healthy lady who enjoys the city lifestyle, I love to host and meet new people whether from overseas or,  local country people,  I do some travelling myself, so I have some idea of what people are looking for. My home is clean and modern.
 I like to accommodate my guests with any requests they may have.  Please feel free to ask me any questions so I can help you any way possible.

summary: Tranquility cottage is a romantic cottage sure to impress with an intimate living space and beautiful furnishings. Cross the antique bridge to your very own private getaway...
space: This luxury cottage has a loft bedroom featuring a queen bed fitted with gorgeous ivory bed linen. The stained timbers of the staircase rise to the quaint bedroom with vaulted ceilings. Feel the cosy atmosphere of the living space that features a big comfy sofa with throw cushions set in front of a Coonara log wood fire with bay window glass door for maximum visual effect. The warm glow from the fire allows you to snuggle the night away in a haven made for romance. Stunning picture windows display the gardens and forest views. No interior doors, just a beautiful open living/dining area to relax and enjoy a tranquil vista.  The fully equipped kitchen and enclosed bathroom are easily accessible from the living area. The double oval spa is set in an alcove of windows within the open plan living area, with a stunning view of the outside tree fern glade. At night an outside light illuminates the garden area to create an even more romantic ambiance for your special occasion. The sofa turns i

name: Stunning 8th floor PENTHOUSE, 3BR, wifi, Netflix
summary: Ideally situated in one of Melbourne’s most iconic inner city neighbourhoods, Collingwood. A stone’s throw away from a diverse offering of bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, parks and more, the apartment is perfect for a family getaway or fun weekend away exploring the city's inner north, close to the CBD and Melbourne sports precinct. With sweeping north views from one of two huge balconies, this 8th floor penthouse is beautifully decorated. Complimentary Hi-Speed Unlimited Wifi and Netflix.
space: An easy drive from the airport, the penthouse apartment is located conveniently close to public transport, with trams within a 5 min walk, ensuring that discovering the wonderful city of Melbourne couldn’t be easier.   The apartment is tastefully and thoughtfully furnished with comfort and convenience in mind.   Whether you’re enjoying a weekend away or traveling for business, you will love this beautiful spacious apartment. Private and quiet, yet so close to everything.   Enjoy complimentary Hi-Speed Unlimited Wifi, Netflix and internal Laundry.   The master bedroom has a quality king bed with full ensuite opening to expansive balcony. Bedroom 2 has a quality Queen-size bed and built-in wardrobes. The third bedroom has two king single beds or King bed option. 1000TC sheets and soft fluffy towels provided for all guests. A fold out single bed and portacot are available on request.   The second luxury bathroom includes a bath tub. Both bathrooms have luxurious rain showers. A hairdryer
host_about: Milieu Stays offers a great range of modern, beautifully designed and fully furnished spaces, ideally situated in some of Melbourne’s most iconic neighbourhoods, including Collingwood and Fitzroy. A stone’s throw away from a diverse offering of bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries and more, our spaces are perfect for those looking to explore the city’s inner north. Each apartment has been sustainably designed, with emphasis placed on natural lighting, good ventilation, accessible outdoor space, and uncluttered interiors. Located conveniently close to public transport, our spaces ensure that discovering the wonderful city of Melbourne couldn’t be easier.

My sunny, north-facing Two Bedroom Apartment is on the top floor up two flights of stairs in a quiet block. It is nicely furnished with a super comfortable double ensemble bed, lounge area, dining table, balcony, TV, free unlimited internet, air-conditioner, fully equipped kitchen, large bathroom, bath/shower, washing machine and more!
space: Kitchen has a new fridge/freezer, microwave, toaster, kettle and all essential equipment/utensils. Bathroom has shower/bath, toilet and washing machine.  Street parking on footpath is allowed.     Amenities: Free parking on premises Wireless Internet Kitchen including electric cooktop, oven & microwave Iron Air conditioning Washing Machine TV

space: This 2 bedroom apartment is set over two levels, including a mezzanine-style master bedroom with fully fitted walk in robes, huge en-suite including a luxe spa-bath and separate shower. name: Centre of CBD, Great views, free WIFI and PARKING!
summary: Nestled in the superb QV complex, the apartment is situated right in the heart of the city with every convenience just steps away. Surrounded by bars, cafes, supermarkets and retail shopping malls the apartment also provides easy access to trains and trams, with the added bonus that tram rides within the CBD are completely free. The apartment is beautiful, light-filled and well furnished - the perfect base from which to explore and enjoy the the world's "most-liveable" city.
space: There are two comfortably sized bedrooms, the master with direct access to the bathroom contains a queen bed and the second bedroom with sweeping views contains a double bed. Both bedrooms include built-in wardrobe space to store your things. Relax on the balcony taking in the expansive northerly vista. The lounge includes a large screen TV and free wifi is provided.  The bathroom is clean and modern with a large shower enclosure, rainfall head and hand held unit. The kitchen is equipped with gas stove-top, electric oven, microwave and dishwasher. A washing machine is also provided. There's a 25 meter lap pool on the top floor of the building with a splendid view across Melbourne, as well as a small gym with running machines and a few weights. Use of the facilities is free for guests.
host_about: We are both busier enjoying bringing up our son these days but still enjoy traveling when we can. Travelling is now more a relaxed wander through a new city and finding good food, with a few new experiences thrown in!

The apartments come with full laundry facilities, free unlimited Wi-Fi and Foxtel TV. 500m away from Lygon Street which is full of Italian eateries, Melbourne has a variety of different styles, sports and cultural events that are a short walk or quick tram ride away from the apartment.
space: Brand new apartment, Fully self contained in a great location.
host_about:
I have traveled around the world for a number of years and have now settled back in Australia currently based between Brisbane and Melbourne. I work in property management and host several properties on Airbnb. 
If you stay at mine I might come stay at yours.

My home is modern, immaculately clean, beautifully set up, and fully fitted out with everything you could need for your next trip to Melbourne. Relax in beachside suburb of St Kilda!
space: **Strictly no parties allowed.  This is a gorgeous well equipped apartment, offers privacy and a relaxed space. The extremely comfortable 2 double-sized sofa beds in the living area are fitted out with fresh bedding and linens and is tastefully appointed for comfort and restful relaxation. An open plan living area with a fully equiped kitchen. Guests can take advantage of the facilities to prepare food at home. The living room has two comfy couches - perfect for curling up and reading a book. Doors open from the living area onto a spacious balcony. In summer there is loads of natural sunlight soaking the balcony and the main living area. In winter, crank the heater and sprawl out on either of the comfy couches with a glass of red! All the furniture in the apartment is new and very stylish. My guests will also love the use of extra amenities such as washer and split system heating and cool

name: Beautiful Unit, Free Parking, Public Transport.
summary: Beautiful unit in the centre of Fitzroy,  "the inner-city mecca for all things cool and kooky. Wander along Brunswick Street, Fitzroy’s main drag, for tonnes of vintage clothing stores and second-hand bookshops. Take your pick from an array of cafés and restaurants, like the Vegie Bar, or stop for some of Melbourne's finest cocktails. Just minutes north of the CBD on the 86 tram, discover the artsy heart of Melbourne". Only minutes walking from Melbourne Museum and the Carlton Gardens.

name: Everything at your fingertips!
summary: Everything at your fingertips! Only a short stroll to explore what Thornbury has to offer - shops, cafes and bars. Plus train and trams into Brunswick Street, Fitzroy and the city are also within easy walking distance.
space: We hope you feel at home in this clean, one bedroom unit in the heart of Thornbury.  Situated in the back of an older style brick building, this little gem has one queen sized bed in the bedroom and a double fold out sofa in the living room. The modern bathroom is equipped with a washing machine, small clothes drying rack, ironing board, hair drier and space to put your belongings.  The kitchen has a microwave, oven, toaster and coffee/tea facilities.  The living room opens up to a lovely little balcony to enjoy your morning coffee or a wine in the evening.  Melbourne gets pretty cold in the winter, so we provide guests with two portable heaters and an electric blanket that can be adjusted on either side of the bed. As we are locals ourselves, we provide guests with a local area guide and map (e.g. where to get good coffee) and two Myki cards for you to use on trains/trams during your stay.

Work to live, not live to work.
Travel several times a year, if only up to Noosa.

Melbourne is an amazing place for restaurants, Cafes and trendy Bars.

name: Fantastic Artist Loft (private) Fitzroy, carport
summary: In Fitzroy, Melbourne's cultural heart, this private room/area in an artist loft is full of character, creative energy and art.  Centrally located, spacious, quiet, big views, in a graffiti art/mural decorated street, in between Smith and Brunswick Streets.  All the pleasures of The Arts - independent theatres, Circus Oz, galleries, music venues, food are minutes from your doorstep. Gorgeous cafe just steps from the door. WIFI, MYKI, parking permit /carport. The CBD is a short tram ride or walk.
space: My shoe-free/chemical free warehouse is a well positioned oasis in one of Melbourne most happening hotspots, inner city Fitzroy. The bright, super spacious industrial/retro style '70's solid brick warehouse offers a unique private guest bedroom and lounge area. You also have your own toilet (off the kitchen area).  Original artworks grace the walls giving you a glimpse of the world through the eyes and hand of an artist. There's heaps of space to relax/work/entertain as you wish.  Large windows pour in natural daylight and offer unrestrained views of the sky, Fitzroy, the CBD... the stars at night...bats on an evening breeze....Winter clouds passing by.... (bring your own telescope)...  This stand alone Warehouse loft feels open yet also very private. The sofas become more beds to accomodate bigger groups, or a family,  MAIN GUEST BEDROOM:  For couples or two people: The Queen size bed is fitted with organic (Blessed Earth) bed linen and wool pillows for a divine slumber. Now with wool
host_about:
I'm a performer and visual artist. 
 I get excited about art, nature, health, travel and things such as how do plants clean the air inside your house.....(not that i sit back while they clean the apartment)
i am currently growing a rockmelon in my window garden (is this even possible?)
I have traveled/performed all over the world with Melbourne theatre company Snuff Puppets.
 Having lived/travelled abroad has helped me understand what makes a traveller feel welcome, safe and comfortable.
I've been a Fitzroy local for 14 years, I love it's central location with access to everything by foot, bike, tram or car. 
 Being a host is a fun way to connect with people !

summary: Located on 250 Elizabeth Street, this popularly known simply as ' 250E' has plenty to offer with a central location for both Holiday Travellers and Business Executives. The internal access to arguably one of the largest shopping precincts in Melbourne full of boutiques and designer showrooms makes this building a paradise for shoppers! space: Walk to the new GPO, Melbourne Central or Myer Store in just seconds. Melbourne Business, Financial and Legal precincts, shopping, restaurants, sports facilities, art galleries, transport and the delights of the CBD are all at your doorstep. The light, airy space also boasts a beautifully open balcony; the perfect spot to enjoy a glass of wine against a backdrop of blue skies and St Kilda skyline. Located on the second floor the studio is serviced by a lift as well as a video entry intercom system. When you are ready to step out, you could not be closer to the heart of St.Kilda. Less than 100m from the beach, less than 50m from the restaurants, bars, cafes and shops of Acland St and in full view of Luna Park the
host_about: I am an ex ballerina turned interior designer and property manager. I love all sports and all food! I worked in hospitality through-out my dance career and genuinely enjoy going above and beyond to make sure my guests feel right at home :)

DOMO Headquarters is located here in Melbourne, dedicating to vacation rental management, channel management, and planning and promotion. By integrating local resources such as advertisement, real estate, and hospitality, DOMO has created a fully integrated, seamless system to manage vacation rental apartments on a large scale, that is from portfolio development to hospitality and hotel management. DOMO has competitive advantages in helping property owners maximising their investment returns by providing professional solutions on how to manage vocational rental properties in scale in an effective manner. 

DOMO team is full of elites from different industries. With years of experiences in property management here in Australia, we aim to provide tailor-made solutions for each and every respective customer of ours. By appreciating local and international cultures, with thorough knowledge of the local markets, DOMO utilises creative and effective planning and ideas to increase the property value for our clients. We are looking forward to having you on board right here in Melbourne.  

DOMO公司总部位于文化之都墨尔本,是一家致力于BNB管理､策划和推广为主导的专业管理公司｡通过多方面当地优势资源的整合,DOMO已建立了整套完善的BNB服务体系——从开发房源到客房管理,DOMO全力帮助业主在市场中获得先机,紧扣市场脉搏,第一时间为客户提供及时有效的BNB全方位解决方案｡

DOMO集结行业精英,凭借丰富的BNB管理经验和执行能力服务于澳洲本地的各类物业｡我们追求“度身定制”的个性化服务理念,尊重本土人文及家居理念,无论是公寓或是别墅,DOMO都将采取有效的策略及富有创意的空间规划帮助客户获得更大的发展空间,提升物业价值｡我们期待您的加入,我们在墨尔本等待您的光临!

The upstairs ensuite / bathroom is yet to be renovated and can't be accessed by guests, this has been blocked off with a gate for your stay. Hi future guests! 


My wife (Sally) and I live in a charming two story town house right in the heart of Toorak. 
Toorak is regarded as the premium suburb of Melbourne and you will find there are many things to do.

Sally enjoys shopping, local entertainment and a nice glass of wine. 
Myself works full time in the CBD in the financial markets. We are both really easy going, sociable and enjoy going out for a nice dinner together.

summary: A private cottage for 2.  Near Tatra Receptions, on 11 acres forested gardens, 5 mins from Mt Dandenong Village. This cottage is beautifully refurbished and awaits your indulgent stay.  Perfect for a honeymoon, or to prepare for a wedding. We hope to see you soon!

Puffing Billy Steam Train is about 20 minutes drive - country drives to Emerald lakeside, Gembrook to dine at the Independent, or Avonsleigh to enjoy the latest eatery, Bam Bam.      So much, or so little to do. We want to let you know that only natural cleaning products are used to prepare this lovely cottage for your stay.
host_about:
After 24 years offering accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges just an hour from Melbourne, we are now offering a beautiful little group of cottages for Air BNB guests.
We live in The Dandenongs, have lived in Fiji and PNG before moving to Melbourne 30 years ago.     
We have a large family, 2 cats and 2 dogs to keep us in hand!     They will not annoy you as your cottage is on a different property.

name: "THE SHED" at WONGA PARK.
summary: The Shed is close to many function venues in the valley. Continental breakfast provided. Wake up to nature. Breathtakingly beautiful and peaceful. 45 minutes to Melb. CBD via Eastern Freeway, or airport via Ring Road. Stroll along the river, visit nearby wineries, restaurants, breweries, cafes and galleries.   Historic Warrandyte is a 10 minute drive  Golf or ballooning next door at Heritage Golf Course.
space: "The Shed" was the original accommodation for the owners while they built their forever home. A comfortable, roomy studio apartment with a real country feel.  It is completely separate from the main house so your privacy is guaranteed.  Queen size bed, bathroom and kitchenette. There is a toaster, kettle, sandwich maker, electric frying pan and microwave.  Reverse cycle air conditioning and a comfy lounge, mean you can relax in comfort on a warm night or feel cosy when it gets chilly outside. large TV with DVD player.  There is a large range of books, DVDs and board games.  Everything you could need for a quick getaway or longer stay is here.  Wake to the sounds of the country. The peaceful views need to be seen to be believed. Pictures do not do it justice.  Set on 12 magnificent acres with all nature has to offer.  Brushy Creek runs through our property.  Perhaps you will spot a platypus.  Go bird watching. We regularly have ducks, ibis, lapwing and even pelicans on our dam.  A pair
host_about:
Having been a regular Airbnb guest on numerous overseas trips, I have decided to return the favour and offer my own slice of heaven to other travellers. 

Ive always been a city girl but have now embraced living on the land. Raising chickens, growing fruit and vegetables and caring for our farm animals. 

Enjoying the peace and quiet while watching a spectacular sunset is the perfect end to a busy day. 

I'd love to share it with you.

These apartments have a large living/dining area and private balcony with city lane way views, fully appointed kitchen with quality appliances, internal laundry facilities, Master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, and two additional bedrooms with BIR's. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a car space in the CBD. host_about:
I am energetic, passionate and outgoing, this is natural for me and yet I also enjoy attention to detail, time to think and privacy too. Its a rare combination of extravert & introvert. Where I am most comfortable is where I have a combination of both. I love being with others creating new possibilities and focusing externally and then love coming home and enjoy time to recharge, reflect and analyse the events and plan ahead.



My Free time is Spent:

1. Attending courses and training to further my knowledge. 
2. Seeing comedy shows and anything that promotes outside the box thinking. 
3. I'm fascinated by architecture, design and innovation. Anything that seeks to improve the standard of living for human beings in a sustainable and ecological manner. 
4. The simple things in life
5. I enjoy nature walks, soccer and song lyrics.

What I consider Important:

1. Maintaining a healthy mind and healthy body
2. Creating, maintaining and nurturing extraordinary relationships
3. Sustainably building true financial independence while enjoying a quality life.

summary: Peaceful and private, in between Healesville & Warby, with STUNNING views from large decks overlooking tree tops and beyond. Our spacious two story property backs onto the Lilydale to Warby Rail Trail- access is just a minute's ride from the doorstep. Relax on the daybed, hammock or couches. Lots of room outside too, with a big tree filled yard. Watch the abundant birdlife, look out over the mountains, or enjoy a BBQ, all from the comfort of our home, nestled in the heart of the Yarra Valley.
space: We have a two story house with private double decks and great views. The lower level has the master bedroom with queen bed, full length mirrors and private deck, including daybed.  Second bedroom has a queen bed and storage space. The bathroom is roomy and bright, with toilet, separate shower (with fantastic shower head!) and bathtub. Upstairs has the open plan lounge room, kitchen (with big stainless steel gas stove and large oven). There is also a bright study area with desk and a dining table. Front yard has a driveway as well as double uncovered carport. The sizeable backyard merges from grass into a great tree filled place for children to explore, with an outdoor fire pit and bike trail running right behind the property.
host_about: Brad is a self employed signwriter/graphic designer, working locally in the community. He has lived in the Yarra Valley for nine years where he has raised his two daughters. Together with his partner Natalie they enjoy the peacefulness and beauty that the Valley has to offer.

host_about: Hi I'm Marta and am a Naturopath, Homoeopath, Women's educator and Art of Feminine Presence teacher, with my own successful natural health clinic "Shine Health Wellbeing Centre". I love my work and I practice what I preach (as much as possible :P). I'm about creating a world that's happier, more enlightened and healthier for those who live in it. Running a busy clinic, I work Tuesdays to Saturdays and am usually home by about 7.30-8.00, however I have many hobbies and am usually out and about in the evenings. I practice yoga regularly, dance Salsa, Bachata and Zouk, so if you need to know where to go out and have fun dancing or where the closest yoga class is, I can point you in the right direction. You can sit on our front porch or lawn under the shade of a tree, or enjoy the large wooden deck in our backyard.  We don't have TV, but we do have Wi-Fi, board games and books, and Sonos speakers.
space: When guests are not staying, the guest room doubles as my massage room where I practise Hawaiian Massage on female clients. The room is beautifully decorated and generally filled with the fragrance of relaxing essential oils.

name: Historic, iconic and central CBD
summary: The 1893 former headquarters for the Victorian Railways was converted into apartments in 1997. Grandeur and serenity, with high ceilings and excellent amenities. Enjoy your Melbourne experience from a convenient and easily accessible central location. Located within the free tram zone, a few minutes walk from the Skybus airport terminal and Southern Cross train station. Cross the river to the Crown Casino & Entertainment Complex, or to the Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre.
space: A comfortable and inviting 2-bedroom apartment offers you accommodation to make your stay in Melbourne memorably enjoyable. Walk through the main door of the building, and leave the hustle and bustle of the city behind. Glide up the Grand Stairs and experience how the building was when it opened in 1893. The apartment has 6m (23ft) ceilings, with a mezzanine floor added for the bedrooms. Downstairs is the main living area, laundry and extra toilet. I also live in the apartment, so all the normal facilities are available. You will see from the photos that the bedrooms have a balcony, open to the lounge below. They are not fully enclosed. If the open plan layout will make you feel uncomfortable, please do not book the room. I want you to have a positive experience both here and in Melbourne. The windows are double-glazed for a peaceful night's sleep. With one meter thick external walls, the temperature inside the apartment is stable, rising gradually during the summer months and falling
host_about:
I have been fortunate to have travelled throughout my working life, including working in China. I have visited around 30 countries, but Africa and South America are still on my list. When I travel, I like to take the back roads. It often means discovering interesting places off the worn tourist routes.

I was in a professional technical role, but decided to retire early. Now I am happy to give back a little and provide a positive experience to Melbourne visitors.

I enjoy cycling, art, architecture and history. I try to keep abreast of current events. My musical tastes are fairly broad, but I am not across the latest music. I don't have much time for celebrity culture.

host_about: Professional fun loving young family looking to Air B & B our lovely home while we are away overseas. We will welcome guests that want to enjoy our awesome pad and amazing surroundings :)

name: Upstairs Bedroom/Lounge 10minutes to Melb airport.
summary: The upstairs bedroom and lounge area have recently been refurbished, we are located at the end of a court in a quiet area of Westmeadows and we’re approximately 10 minutes away from Melbourne Airport. Local transport, restaurants/pubs, service stations and shopping centre/village are within walking distance 15-20 minutes and major shopping complex’s such as DFO and Highpoint are not too far away either. Self check-in is also available for late arrivals.
space: The entire upstairs area of our home is dedicated to Airbnb guests, 2 bedrooms and a spacious lounge area. This bedroom comes with a very comfortable queen size bed, bedside table and lamp, built in robe and air conditioning/heater and is situated just off the spacious lounge area. The shared lounge has a 60" Plasma TV with Apple TV, air conditioning/heater, large couch and bean bags. Bathroom and toilet are located downstairs along the hallway second door on the right.
host_about: We love to travel when the opportunity arises, especially the overseas winters in places such as Switzerland, Japan and New Zealand. We're always planning the next holiday whilst on one, being spontaneous and we never take anything to serious. We enjoy being Airbnb hosts because it's fun and love meeting people, we have met some interesting travelers which some have now become friends.

name: Family home in Toorak. 1 min walk to train & tram
summary: We live in a great part of Melbourne, 2 minute walk to public transport, both trains and trams, directly taking you to Melbourne's CBD and major attractions such as The MCG and Rod Laver Arena.  We have some beautiful parks and are right on the bike path along Melbourne's yarra river, & a little strip of local shops including a cafe, wine store, chemist, newsagent, hairdresser, physiotherapy, and beatitician. No parties!
space: The space includes a large master bedroom downstairs with ensuite and 3 further bedrooms upstairs. Each with a king single and fold out king single bed underneath. The 3rd bedroom is currently "loft style" and open to a big play area with toys - ideal for children.  The house includes high end Moss River and Sheridan linen as well a mixture of both soft goose-down & firm latex pillows which should suit all types of sleepers!  All bathrooms have a supply of designer soaps and hand wash. The house includes a seperate sitting room with TV, and the full sized kitchen is equipped with Riedel glasses, Wedgwood dinnerware and French made Laguiole cutlery. A large Ilve oven and a thermomix are also there for the keen cook.  The kitchen and living area open out to a landscaped garden and swimming pool. There is a seperate laundry and powder room downstairs and bathroom upstairs. The house has high end stereo systems throughout, each room equipped with Sonos. You can always find a quiet place to

name: Modern 2BR Home at CBD QVM with Stunning View
summary: Perfect for mid to long-term stay, this modern 2 Bedroom apartment is designed for temporary living in Melbourne. High up with a stunning view, this apartment is centrally located in the city, served by free trams, convenient trains and buses. Apartment features simple living with fully equipped necessities, including a balcony. The building has gym, pool, jacuzzi and steam room. Indeed a home away from home. Not to be missed!
space: The apartment is modern, stylish and has everything to make you feel just like home. High up on the 42nd floor with stunning unobstructed view.  BEDROOMS Master bedroom has a spectacular glass wall with stunning view of north of the City all the way to the mountains. It comes with a Queen size ultra-premium mattress medium firm with pillow top (you will love it for sure!), a compact work station and a closet. The compact and quiet second bedroom comes with a large, comfortable (Double size) bed made up of premium mattress of medium firmness with a pillow top. Plenty of room for one or two people to sleep on. A desk space with office chair is provided for those here for work. Ceiling high wardrobe offers plenty of storage space. One of the walls has a glass panel for natural light to come in. Bathroom is right across the bedroom for easy access.  KITCHEN Fully equipped with gas stoves, microwave, dishwasher, rice cooker, toaster and coffee machines.  LIVING, DINING ROOM and BALCONY VIEW
host_about:
Having been an Airbnb host since 2014 (and superhost since 2017), I love meeting people from around the world and getting to know them. Chatting, sharing food and drinks are some of my favorite activities. 

My apartment in Melbourne is the first love of my life :) I lived there for two years, and I spent a lot of time and thoughts into the decor. I also wanted to make sure my guests feel comfortable and homey so I got the best premium mattresses and a nice leather couch. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do! 

As a guest, I am a very clean and tidy person, meticulous compared to your average guy. I enjoy quiet and lone time, but am equally happy with nice conversations. I am also considerate and am sensitive to the host's privacy.

I play the cello as a profession--ask me for a song!

summary: 35 Darling Street South Yarra – ‘St James’ Large Studio Apartment, stylishly renovated. Situated in the heart of Sth Yarra. Modern furniture and home-wares, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, study nook, open-plan lounge, bathroom. All utilities, linen and towels included. Reverse cycle Air-conditioning / Heating. 42" TV. Unlimited WI-FI is available at an extra cost of $22.00 per week Housekeeping service available $120.00 per service Laundry  Bedding - 1 king or 2 singles
space: Studio includes:  Fully furnished All housewares Modern fully equipped kitchen and dishwasher Utilities connection and usage charges Linen and towels 42" LCD television Split system heating and cooling Study nook & desk  Laundry Unlimited wi-fi is an additional $22 per week There is a once of exit clean fee of $250 Bond $2,500 Housekeeping Servcice availble $120 per service Bedding Configuration: 1 x King Size Bed or 2 x Single Beds
host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

name: Lovely apartment in central Brunswick
summary: Our lovely home has an open plan living/kitchen space. It offers a great bedroom with a queen bed and built in robes. The bathroom has a great tub and separate shower. This is a great place for a couple. Downstairs is a study and reading room. It's next to buzzing Lygon St, the number 1 and 6 tram, restaurants, bars, the capitol city trail and basically all you could want.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Backpacker Bungalow
summary: We have a cheap and cheerful bungalow at the back of our garden.  It has a queen size bed, a bunk and spare futon that can be used on the floor.  It could fit 5 at a squeeze and three comfortably.  Its nothing fancy, large and more private than the rooms in the house. People interested in eco living might like it best. We have goose down doonas that are super warm and will do our best to welcome you to our home. There are several ways to set the room up so please tell us of you group.
space: This is a cheap and cheerful bungalow at the rear of our extensive garden.  It has a double futon, bunk bed and spare mattress, two wardrobes, a chest of drawers and a single couch.
host_about: We are having a ball with Airbnb, meeting lovely people from all over the world and sharing lots of stories of life and adventures.  Our home is a somewhat rambling old austerity era home that we have 'ecofied' with PV panels, water tanks, straw walls, earthern render, water recycling, compost toilet, chooks, aquaponics, extensive food garden with over 100 edibles, combustion heater and more.  The rooms vary, a couple with straw walls with an earthern render, loft queen size bed, desk and a queen size corner sofa bed (that we designed, built and upholstered ourselves).  Oh and its 900m from a zone one train, close to bikeways including one direct from the airport.

name: Beautiful, Cosy and Modern South Yarra Apartment
summary: KID FRIENDLY & Traveller friendly ready apartment.  5 min drive to Chapel Street.  2 min walk to Trams taking you directly into the CITY 5 min to trendy weekend market 5 min to Prahran Market 10 min drive to Luna Park and Stkilda Beach You will love being on the cusp of chapel street,  and the city.    Beautiful big windows and chilled apartment.   YES- Wifi & Nespresso machine is included and a HUGE PLASMA!
space: Please note the kids room now has a double bunk bed.  This means the bottom is a doubler bunk bed - sleeps 2  The top bed is a single bed.  This is a white timber bed and safe for children. The cot is no longer available however upon request I will supply a portable cot and pram.  There are kid toys and books.  To be clear there are 2 beds in two separate rooms (two separate master rooms) plus a pull out couch in the living room so the place accommodates 7 guests.  I have created a space that is clean and calming and provides my guests with a relaxed environment , great books to read and movies to watch whilst you enjoy your stay.  I work in media and I love this apartment it's a creative space with a massive comfortable red couch that sits next to books about spirituality and personal growth. A great apartment for self reflection or meditation or simply to relax, there's a big screen tv on the wall that plays movies from a USB . I always leave a USB in the tv with great films! And ofc
host_about:
Hey there, I love hosting people from all over the world, I try my best to give my guests accommodation that has very high standards and great coffee! I pride myself on a clean space for your stay and easy communication between the host and the guest.
Airbnb has changed my life for the better as a mum raising a toddler, the gift of having my airbnb apartments booked is immeasurable and in return I offer 100% commitment to my guests working tirelessly to ensure a happy holiday for all my guests and business travellers. 
I believe in kindness and karma and being someone who is a contribution to the world I live in.

St Kilda junction is 300metres away providing access to Melbourne's famous trams and  Windsor Station is also less than a km away allowing access Melbourne's train network. The Astor Theatre and Luna Park are all in close vicinity of this apartment. My place is perfect for couples and solo adventurers.
space: The apartment has all modern facilities Wi-Fi,  Netflix,  washer/dryer, cooking appliances to make it a perfect St Kilda stay.

name: Brunswick two bedroom townhouse with garage
summary: Two-storey townhouse in Brunswick in a quiet location but only minutes walk to the 1 and 6 trams into the city, South Melbourne and St Kilda and a 10 minute walk to the heart of Lygon Street precinct. Quality interior with two double bedrooms (with built-in robes) and stylish central bathroom, open-plan living area leading out to a private north-facing terrace. Each room has split-system heating and cooling, plantation shutters and an oversized single garage provides secure off street parking.
space: Our home is split over two levels with the bedrooms and bathroom downstairs with a light and bright open plan living upstairs. The kitchen has essential cooking equipment, a large fridge/freezer and a dishwasher. There is a TV with Apple TV and Netflix in the living space with a sofa and armchair. The north facing balcony is accessible via the living room and has decking and synthetic turf to relax on! There is a shade sail for hot days in case you would like to be outside. The bedrooms have a queen and a double bed and build in robes. If you are travelling with young children, a child’s travel cot can be provided as can a high chair, baby bath and a child gate for the stairs.  There is a large remote controlled garage attached to the property and there is also ample street parking if you have multiple or very large vehicles. The area is a few minutes walk north of the heart of Brunswick meaning it is easily accessible but with a friendly and quiet vibe. The tram is less than a minute
host_about: Melb Based

name: Enjoy Harbour Views from a Stylish Waterfront Flat
summary: Modern, clean and spacious. A beautiful sunny space in the heart of Docklands with unobstructed views of the Yarra. With everything you need for a comfortable stay this spot is  Ideal for a solo traveler or couple who want to experience Melbourne like locals.  Sits within Free-Tram zone and is moments from Crown Casino, South Melbourne Market and Southern Cross Station, as well as National Gallery of Victoria, and Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre.   Pool, gym also included.
space: THE APARTMENT.. This beautiful apartment has two bedrooms and has been recently renovated and newly furnished. Nested on the 14th floor of a modern high rise and surrounded by greenery.  This apartment offers premium location in the CBD and would ideally suit a single professional, couples or two friends.  The lounge views are my favourite part of the apartment. The peacefulness of the water every morning and evening is so relaxing.. And at the same time very rare to find while still so close to the CBD. If you're looking for Melbourne's premium waterfront apartments, with all the value and prestige that go with it, you've found the right place.
host_about:
Hello there, 

I am a modern expressionism art amateur, a diehard soccer fan and work in Digital Data Analytics. 

Airbnb is a good way to meet new people and I have a lovely apartment which I wouldn’t mind sharing with guests.

I am a French National from Paris but have lived in Melbourne for few years now and just love this city. I mean I might come from the city of lights but Melbourne is definitely the best city to live in the world. 

In my spare time I like exploring new places in the neighbourhood, attending gallery openings, going to museums, watching movies and concerts, trying new places to eat etc…I also enjoy traveling and have explored most of Europe and some countries in Asia and Africa. 

I really consider myself to be laid back, down-to-earth, and have enjoyed having roommates in the past. I try to be helpful and accommodating to anyone who visits me from out of town, always happy to give them advice about places to see in the city.

Ohh yeah, did I mention that I was also a gym junky and can really help with fitness and nutrition tips for those who might feel the need to work on their bodies :)  Afterall my life motto is “Pain is temporary and pride is forever”…

Thank you

name: Your 2BR Southbank home WTH STUNNING SKY VIEWS
summary: STUNNING SEA AND CITY VIEWS OF  MELBOURNE WITH AMPLE SPACE AND LIGHTING As you step out of the artistically designed foyer you are only a short walk to city entertainment, public transport, CROWN Casino, MELBOURNE EXHINITION CENTRE, FEDRATION SQUARE, EUREKA SKYDECK, SEALIFE AQUARIUM, shopping and restaurants. The excellent building facilities include a communal rooftop theatre, dining room and BBQ terrace, communal sky gardens located on every third floor and bike storage.
space: Sitting on the fringe of Southbank and South Melbourne you will have the perfect balance of city and suburban lifestyle. Generously sized floor space, light filled, modern and vibrant apartment is complemented with oak floorboards throughout the living areas and plush carpet in the bedrooms. A superior layout which is comprised of a grand entrance hall, modern bathroom, well-appointed kitchen with European appliances and stone bench tops.

name: Spacious Studio Queen Room with ensuite bathroom

space: Daily housekeeping.
host_about: Conveniently located opposite Westfield shopping complex in Wantirna South, the homely Hotel Cavalier is just a few minutes walk to numerous retail stores, restaurants, bars and clubs. With the foot of the Dandenong Ranges and access to some of Melbourne's most beautiful landscapes close by, we are also a great base for day trips to the famous Puffing Billy, 1000 steps, State basketball centre and much more. Or stay by the pool where our warm and refreshing bbq area provides a relaxing surround for your informal dining requirements.

My 1BD apartment features a comfortable lounge room/breakfast nook combo with floor-to-ceiling windows and tons of natural light, a fully-equipped kitchen, a full bathroom with stand-up shower, and a bedroom with a queen-sized bed.  Perfect for couples, solo travelers or even business visitors.
