host_about:
Hi, travellers around the world!

I am Julia from Taipei, Taiwan. 
Now currently based in the beautiful Melbourne city.

Good food and nature are the two things that I have passion in the most. Love Hehuanshan in Taiwan; Tongariro Alpine Crossing in New Zealand. Had spent some great time in Grand Canyon and made it to the peak of Mount Kinabalu. Now very excited to be able to explore more in Australia. 

I am a beginner host of Airbnb, but very looking forward to meeting you and sharing stories with you!

name: Windsor Warehouse
summary: Self contained downstairs bedroom with en suite and spa in renovated warehouse in a quiet lane-way.  200 metres from bustling eclectic Chapel Street with cafes, restaurants, bars, theatres and shops. Train or tram to the city in 15 minutes.  Perfect!! Includes ensuite with shower and spa bath.  Bedroom has a bench / desk.  Very private and clean. One on street free car park.
space: The space includes a very clean ground floor bedroom with queen bed, desk and full ensuite with spa. It is in a converted warehouse which has a quaint industrial rustic charm. The ensuite includes a toilet, shower and spa bath.
host_about: Lawyer and property developer based in Melbourne.

name: Private Top floor studio
summary: This huge and wonderfully renovated Brighton family home, has a top floor with it's own toilet , vanity area, a double bed, and black out blinds for your stay.  There is a second room that can be used with a sofa bed, window seat and access to porch
space: The bedroom has it's own floor, and toilet .  It has air-conditioning.  The windows in the loft roof let in great light, but also have james Bond style black out blinds if you need them.
host_about:
I am a Producer in the Film & TV industry. I love travelling and meeting new people. I have used Air BnB on my travels and thought I would open at my home to welcome people to stay. 
I love cooking, and socialising. I am pretty house proud, but love a house to lived in and enjoyed. I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Fantastic City Views at a Sleek Modern Pad
summary: Take in sweeping views of South of Melbourne from this contemporary apartment in the business district. Admire original artwork by talented Australian artists, sweat it out in the gym, or hop on a tram at the nearby stop for a day at St Kilda Beach.
space: Housed within a newly completed building along Flinders Street, the apartment is conveniently located within 5 minute walk from Crown Entertainment Precinct and the Southern Cross Station.  Complementing its exceptional location is the thoughtfully decorated art-inspired interior. The walls around the apartment are adorned with a collection of original oil paintings by talented Australian artists - Stuart Evans. We provide professionally laundered fresh towels, hand towels, bed linens and premium L’Occitane bathroom amenities. The Queen size bed provided in the bedroom features a chiropedic mattress, high-warmth quilt and four pillows, all to ensure that you receive the support and comfort required for a good night’s sleep. The kitchen well equipped with high-end ILVE appliances, pots, pans, utensils, crockery, salt, pepper and oil is at your disposal during your stay should you wish to prepare a home-cooked meal. Fresh ingredients are easily accessible with the Coles Supermarket only
host_about:
Inspired by and dedicated to Australian contemporary artists, Canvas Suites aims to provide boutique hospitality experience to our guests. Each of our Suites are personally handpicked and meticulously setup as the place our guests call home when in Melbourne.

At Canvas Suites, we believe that no visit to a place is complete without immersing oneself in its unique culture and central to any culture is its art. We view each of our art-inspired Suites as carefully curated galleries with walls adorned by original Australian works of art which our guests may enjoy in private during their stay.

But great spaces with great art do not by themselves create great hospitality experience. We know what counts for our guests to have a great stay in Melbourne – a friendly face to meet them, top-of-the-line chiropedic beds made with pristine sheets, the towels and toiletries taken care of to our exacting standards. We also know that our guests want the space and freedom to experience what Melbourne has to offer at their own pace. So we are available 24/7 for when our guests need us, but we step back when they do not.

name: Clean And Comfy New House
summary: Make yourself at home when you step into this place. It's a small house yet warm and cozy inside with all the basic need for a house. Our house offers three bedrooms for the total of six person.

Best Location in Melbourne City for long stays of 3 weeks or more - Walk to everything including Melbourne Central CBD  :: Carlton :: Fitzroy :: Collingwood :: Federation Square :: Flinders Street  :: Theatres  :: Attractions Fully Furnished & Self Contained Executive Living in Melbourne City's top geographical and secure area! This perfect location is the ideal base for exploring this sophisticated city, whether your visit is for business or leisure travellers.

summary: Healesville Valley Views is a stylish and comfortable 3 bedroom recently renovated house, so come and experience the beautiful Yarra Valley.  Sitting on half an acre amongst the trees with vistas of green and lovely views of the Yarra Valley you will feel instantly relaxed in this tranquil getaway just 1 hour from Melbourne. Located a leisurely 2 km walk from Healesville township, the house provides room for up to 6 guests and is ideal for families, groups or couples.
space: Located a leisurely 2 km walk from Healesville township, the house provides room for up to 6 guests, ideal for families, groups or couples. Leather couches, throws and warm colours, open plan living with lots of natural light. Air conditioned.  Central heating ensures a cosy hideaway for winter escapes or relax on the decking(outdoor seating for 6) with a glass of local wine or ale in the warmer months overlooking the valley. Life is too short not to stay in wonderful places.

summary: A bright, sunny, one bedroom self contained flat, 30 seconds walk to a great range of restaurants, cafes and shops. This is a great place to base yourself while exploring Melbourne. Fifteen minute train journey to the city, the MCG, National Gallery, and the Victorian Arts Centre. Handy to the Yarra River parklands. Off street parking and Myki cards included. Want to stay in and cook for yourself? Perfect! Do you fancy eating out? Lots of choice! Coffee? Cafes, lots of cafes!
space: This great little flat is in excellent condition with a combined (well fitted out) kitchen, dining and living area plus a separate small bedroom. It has reverse cycle air conditioning/heating and includes high speed Wi-Fi. The bathroom has a clothes washer so longer stays are easy to manage. Visiting family in the area? This is a great base, make yourself at home.
host_about: I am a science educator and curriculum developer. My wife and I have travelled extensively including a lot of bicycle touring. We like good food, good wine, crime fiction, exercise (especially cycling and bushwalking), good music, art, history, architecture ... In fact anything which shows quality and good design! We are footy supporters and concertgoers. We have four chooks, two cats and a cockatiel.

name: Highett/Moorabbin- King of the Court
summary: Ours is a comfortable spacious bedroom in light/airy partly updated home with character. You will have a private spa bathroom and toilet; use of a large dining room and garden in a safe and tranquil court. Within minutes you will find buses and a train. We are close to Monash University, Southland Shopping Centre, Holmesglen Tafe, other training centres and  the beach. Walk for 10 minutes and you can hire a car. If you wish, we can provide a pushbike for guest's use, but a bond is required.
space: The bedroom is a large, comfortable, updated room with a queen sized bed fitted, electric blanket. Room has ceiling fan. Plenty of cupboard space for clothing and other items, and Includes a safe for your valuables . The view from the large window next to the bed is of the beautiful front garden full of trees and flowers. The room also includes a large brand new Samsung Smart TV, with Netflix and internet access. The fully equipped guest bathroom includes a shower, bath, and hot spa. There is a separate toilet/powder room exclusively for guest's use.
host_about: We are youthful grandparents, living in a relatively large home, willing to share it with weary travellers. We offer a refuge, and a wealth of local knowledge. We are close to Moorabin Tafe, Monash University, shops, beach trains and buses, parklands and sporting grounds as well as playgrounds. We hope you will enjoy your stay with us.

Boxhill is renowned for its restaurant scene while still being a quiet and secure area. Tram & train to city center or to the dandenong ranges tourist attractions like Puffing Billy.

space: Stylish, Spacious, Elegant, Immaculately Clean, Classy, Friendly, Central, French Inspired and Very Cozy.
host_about: Hi , my name is Rani and I’m so loving this Airbnb experience. I started in 2017 as a trial run and have enjoyed every moment with every booking so far. It’s my little hobbie and I’m thankful for the opportunity. It’s always so exciting to meet new people and share my apartment. I try to help out wherever I can and I always want my guests to have the best time each time !!

name: Right in the heart of St Kilda
summary: With a location hugged by the softer edges of Melbourne’s most vibrant neighbourhoods, this gorgeous self-contained apartment radiates possibilities and gives you the choice to explore and relish the great food, entertainment, beaches and parkland in nearby St Kilda,  Windsor and Albert Park. Tucked away in a superb leafy area yet still so close to all the action, this unit will give all you need and more for a memorable stay!
space: The unit offers a huge open plan lounge / dining area with kitchen. The glass doors open out to a private courtyard that extends the lounge area for entertaining on a nice sunny day. The kitchen comes complete with stainless steel appliances and large island bench and is fully equipped with anything you need for a comfortable 2 day or 2 week stay - from cooking utensils and slow cooker, to coffee machine, juicer and Nutribullet to help you start the day with a healthy juice/smoothie and fresh coffee! ☺  The bedroom is really spacious, with a queen bed and full wall of built-in robes, which offers lots of storage room for your clothes and suitcases. Fresh sheets and towels will be provided for you to use as needed. The bedroom is complimented by another courtyard allowing loads of natural light and has direct access to a large en-suite bathroom.  There are laundry facilities in the apartment as well, which you can use if needed. The apartment is featuring reverse cycle heating and cooli
host_about:
I am a free spirit and travelling is my passion. I find travelling to be so stimulating and inspiring. I love discovering new places, learning about other cultures and meeting new people. I take a genuine interest in blending into the local cultures and soaking in the uniqueness and beauty of every place I visit or live in. I often return to places that I really liked, as I know there is so much more left to learn about them..

I've been fortunate enough to have lived in several countries and visited many more. I've met interesting people and made many friends all over the world. I travel to break free from the daily routine that I every so often find myself bogged down into - a great way to remind myself that there is a whole world out there awaiting to be discovered and treasured... and it only gets better and more exciting with every new experience... They say travelling is addictive; well, then I've got that one addiction!

name: MCG and Swan St bars, pubs, cafes & shops!
summary: Beautifully renovated art deco apartment in a small block. Blonde timber floors throughout, with modern fixtures, modern styling, SMEG appliances, and plumbed fridge. Located just behind Swan Street, and only 2 minutes walk to Richmond Train Station and trams. 5 minutes walk to shops, cafes and pubs. 10 minutes on foot to the Botanical Gardens, and MCG / sports precinct. 20 minutes on foot to the city. Family home for years, and painstakingly renovated by us. Loved, loved, loved living here.
space: Perfect for 4, but a roll out single and 2 fold up cots mean you can have a cosy weekend for a larger crew. We've done as much as we can to deal with the road noise - triple glazed windows but be warned, you might notice it at night (although feedback so far has been "not too bad").
host_about: Respectful, considerate, down to earth. Love food, meeting new people, sunshine and music. Would usually be using AirBNB for work.

name: Enjoy the view - RICHMOND tree tops
summary: Come and enjoy retro living! Our cosy, light filled, one bedroom apartment with its architecturally designed Kitchen, is located in Melbourne's leafy inner city suburb of Richmond. This abode is the ideal home away from home. Come and see what Melbourne is all about!
space: Welcome to Melbourne - come and stay in Richmond! This home is a fabulous 70s light filled one bedroom apartment with a comfy double bed and living space with single sofa bed for an extra guest. The open living area and freshly renovated kitchen are all yours. There is an ensuite bathroom, walk-in-robe and a coin operated washing machine and dryer in the communal laundry downstairs. We have everything you need - an iron, ironing board and drying rack in the apartment. This is an older style apartment building (she has seen better days) but has stunning views from the second floor over the Richmond roof tops to the hills beyond!  Close to numerous public transport options, great cafes, restaurants, pubs and bars, parks and the Yarra River where there is a path for walking, running and riding. The city centre is 20 mins away by tram, closer by train. Plus it is easy to get to many different parts of Melbourne such as South Bank, Fitzroy, Hawthorn, plus the southside including South Yarra
host_about:
Hello! My name is Lisa and I have been a keen AirBnB host for over 5 years. It has been my pleasure to welcome guests into our own home and our little abode in Richmond, Melbourne. 

I am an Architect and run my own small business. I especially love working on our own home. I enjoy gardening and renovating, cooking for friends, learning Italiano (ciao!), reading, watching films from around the world, walking our beloved pooch and, of course, travel.

Send me message, I look forward to welcoming you to Melbourne!

name: 2 Bedroom Apt near Casino (RS1603)
summary: This is a self-contained 2 Bedroom/1 Bathroom apartment with a private balcony and views. The master bedroom includes a queen size bed with built in robes. 2nd bedroom includes a double size bed with built in robes. This apartment is well-equipped with a full kitchen with convection microwave, fridge, dishwasher, stove top cooking facilities and European style laundry facilities (Washer/Dryer). It offers a dining and lounge area with a 42-inch flat-screen TV including 30+ Foxtel channels. It features a fully reversed cycle air conditioner and a superior quality mattress. There is a secure entrance and elevator access in the building. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a fitness center. All the guests are provided fresh clean towels and linen as well as complementary guest amenities on arrival.  Size: 70 m2.    Amenities: Iron  Ironing Board, Hair Dryer, Bed Linen  Towels, Cable TV, DVD, TV, Balcony, washing machine with drier, air conditioning, heating, swimming pool, dining

host_about: I'm a 26 year old Designer from Brisbane, Australia. I love travelling. I don't very much like 'describe yourself' forms...

name: Mulan, Central 1BDR Music lovers apartment
summary: Fully equipped 1 bedroom apartment with sofabed perfect for a city getaway. Fast wifi, free public transport out front and full sized kitchen included
space: Perfectly positioned in the heart of the city is this cozy 1 bedroom apartment with full kitchen, open plan living space and dedicated study desk space for 2 people is ideal for business travellers and couples looking for a hub to explore the city. The home features an extensive music collection and stereo to listen to your own favourite tunes and a sofabed to sleep an extra two guests if you're travelling with a friend and looking to save some money. There are heaps of herbs and spices and basic condiments for you to cook with at home, but with such a large range of restaurants and cafes nearby why would you!!? Laundry facilities are also available in the apartment to get a bit of washing done and it's got great airflow too with big opening juliet balcony in the living space. There is a tram stop out front so getting around is super easy and a convenience store a few doors down and bakery next door if you're feeling peckish.
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Room 101S in the heart of Melbourne
summary: Spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Southbank high rise complex.  Fully equipped with kitchen, laundry and entertainment systems. The building has gym, pool and tennis court. Onsite concierge service and 24 hours check in.
space: Fully serviced 3 bedroom apartment. All bedrooms are furnished with either a king or 2 king single beds. The living room is furnished with couch, coffee table, flat screen tv.  Fully equipped kitchen complete with fridge, dishwasher and all the utensils you need to cook up a feast.
host_about: I am a melbourne girl with a finance professional background.  Due to passion for travelling, meeting  new people and property, i have, over the last few years, managed to combine my hobbies into owning a guesthouse and a number of apartments in and near the Melbourne city. I hope I can cater all types of groups with the range of accommodation options I offer. I also love the opportunity to show all my guests what a wonderful city Melbourne is. As an airbnb guest, I will look after your place like its my own.

Only two minutes walk to South Yarra Train station (two stops to the CBD), Toorak Road, Chapel Street, bars, cafes and restaurants. It truly is in the heart of the action The property also has a gym and pool on the 22nd floor.  Access to Wifi and Netflix. South Yarra is home to the famous shopping and dining precinct known as chapel street.

host_about: We live a healthy and vibrant lifestyle in this magical suburb of Warrandyte. We have been hosting people for the last two years and most have returned for more of our hospitality. We travel quite often and understand what is expected from a Host.

name: Wild Orchid Olinda Private Luxury Cottage
summary: Set among towering mountain ash and tree ferns, Wild Orchid Olinda is a Luxury Private self-contained cottage in the Dandenong Ranges Victoria, Australia.  The perfect place to get away from it all, have some time out, retreat into nature - recharge and relax, from the moment you step onto the property you will be drawn into the magic of the garden and surrounding forest.
space: Enter your private cottage with enchanting story book style exterior and modern, elegant interior. The living area has a large sofa to sink into by the cosy log fire, where you can curl up to watch a movie, listen to music, read a book or just to BE. Adjoining is the cosy country kitchen which is fully equipped, everything you need including a washing machine and dryer so you can stay for a few days, a week or a month.  Upstairs the romantic bedroom has a queen size bed, electric blanket, beautiful bamboo and cotton sheets and private balcony from which you can enjoy tree top views with glimpses of Melbourne city, glorious sunsets and star gaze at night through the telescope. The adjoining bathroom has a spa bath, fluffy robes and towels.
host_about: Hello!  I love a spontaneous conversation as much as I love to retreat and have quiet time in nature. I’ve been in business for many years so I know how essential it is to have time out. I believe it is  important it is to be surrounded by beautiful things and keep this in mind whilst creating a space for relaxation, meditation or contemplation. I have a Scandinavian background and have travelled since I was very young, I am a free spirit yet I love having my feet on the ground and need nature around me. Hence the reason I live in The Dandenong Ranges surrounded by the forest and tree ferns where we have our beautiful cottage, it is just the perfect place to retreat, relax and recharge. Living in Australia is incredible as there is so much here to see and do, I love adventure and to experience new places, especially riding my motorcycle and get away as often as possible staying in places you wouldn’t usually find. I hope to host a stay for you soon :-)

name: Straw Bale House in Healesville
summary: Our straw-bale, earth rendered two storey loft house is in the heart of the Yarra Valley, a short drive to wineries, gourmet food and Healesville Wildlife Sanctuary. With a log fireplace, private deck and open plan living you'll be cosy and relaxed.
space: Nestled on a quiet, bushy street on the edge of Healesville, this brand new moroccan styled loft provides guests with the perfect getaway in the heart of the Yarra Valley.  Featuring unique straw bale walls, wood heater and polished concrete floors throughout. A large kitchen will accommodate all your cooking needs plus a dishwasher to handle the dirty work.  Relax on the rear deck while barbecuing on the Weber Q as the sunsets through surrounding bushland.  Short walk to a beautiful Thai restaurant and Boato Craigo Boutique Winery. A five minute drive to Healesville Animal Sanctuary, Maroondah Reservoir and Badger Creek Picnic Area. You've chosen the perfect weekend escape to the country.
host_about:
Hi I'm Levi. I'm a full time professional musician and part time choir instructor with the Choir of Hard Knocks from Melbourne. I'm the father of two hilarious boys and husband to one gorgeous woman! I love expensive guitars and fast cars, though I can't afford either. I live for travel, prefer experiences over things, learning to enjoy healthy eating and fitness and love pushing my son on the swing at the park. 
I love my local town, its cafes and quirky-cool shops and fresh, organic produce from the farmers markets. I know you will too!

name: Best location in Melbourne in stylish apartment
summary: Perfectly located and within incredibly easy reach of the CBD, Chapel St, Albert Park, The Alfred Hospital, St Kilda and Prahran Market.We aim to provide a peaceful, relaxed and friendly environment.The building is safe and secure-ideal for business travellers (within quick and easy reach of the CBD),solo travellers and couples visiting Melbourne.We are a busy working couple but will do everything we can to make your visit as enjoyable as possible and are always contactable if we are not at home
space: We live in a quiet 2 bed apartment in a safe and secure building. You will be sharing with me and my wife. Our guests will have the master bedroom. We have been told that the bed is heaven to sleep on! Your bedroom has a built in wardrobe with lots of hanging space (perfect for people staying longer periods), shelves as well as a personal safe in your bedroom for extra piece of mind. Your lovely bedroom has had a makeover by a designer. You have beautiful 1000 thread count Designers Guild linen and towels. We have a fantastic heating system as well as air conditioning as well as another separate heater and cooling system for your room so you can be as comfortable as possible.We have also provided you with a hairdryer and the essentials such as shower gel, shampoo and conditioner etc etc as well as tea, coffee, fruit and bread for toast

name: Races Ready for 6 in Fancy Flemington
summary: Light filled and airy. On a quiet street, moments from the train, trams and the racecourse. Just through the underpass you'll find lovely cafes, wine bars, pubs and beautiful shops. 5 minutes to everything Flemington and Kensington have to offer!
space: Two bedrooms, at the opposite ends of the house. A fold out couch that sleeps 2. On a quiet street, surrounded by beautiful period homes you'll find our place. Lots of flooding light from every window, the perfect place to unwind and explore Melbourne.
host_about:
We are Emily and Jack, two country kids who have been braving the big city for a while now.

Both passionate travellers, we have both spent years living abroad separately and done a lot of travelling through Europe, America and Asia. Next we are off to South Africa to watch two of our best buds get hitched!

We both love basketball, Emily plays netball and Jack loves all things American sports, both in person and on his Xbox. 

We both love to dine out, and try new things. 

We had a shared apartment, which was our first home together. We rented this through Air Bnb which was a wonderful experience. 

We have since upgraded and purchased a home.

Both passionate about music, Jack plays in a southern rock band, and Emily enjoys anything from jazz to hip hop. 

Emily loves design and interiors, an avid hunter of vintage and antique furniture (no relics allowed in the house at present). 

We both studied law together at university and debated for years over Jack's topical fashion choices. Leading separate careers now, Jack is a lawyer and Emily transferred into creative endeavours, which have lead to her working a pre-sale styling and makeovers company locally in Kensington.

We love Air BnB and all the opportunities it brings to our doorstep. 

We hope to stay or host you soon!

name: Majestic Retreat in the Dandenong Ranges
summary: This couples retreat offers you the opportunity to enjoy a cosy wood burning fireplace, wander in the peaceful and beautiful gardens, or sip a glass of wine on your own private deck in the soft sunshine and listen to the birds.
space: Majestic Retreat at Adeline is around 1km from the village of Mt Dandenong and 2km from Olinda. This couples retreat offers you the opportunity to enjoy a cosy wood burning fireplace, wander in the peaceful and beautiful gardens, or sip a glass of wine from your own private deck in the soft sunshine and listen to the birds. A Queen bed with luxurious linen begs you to sleep in. Wake to a generous continental breakfast hamper: it's included for the first 2 days of your stay.   Pig and Whistle Tavern is a 400 meter walk away.   The wedding venues of Tatra and Skyhigh are nearby too, so perfect for a wedding group. Olinda, Sassafras and the gardens of The Dandenongs are all within easy reach. Peace filled walks in gardens or the forest, or a drive to the Yarra Valley if you wish.  Enticing shopping in the Villages. This retreat is on a property with a second retreat next door, so you may want to bring friends to join you - we'd love to have you stay with us!
host_about:
After 24 years offering accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges just an hour from Melbourne, we are now offering a beautiful little group of cottages for Air BNB guests.
We live in The Dandenongs, have lived in Fiji and PNG before moving to Melbourne 30 years ago.     
We have a large family, 2 cats and 2 dogs to keep us in hand!     They will not annoy you as your cottage is on a different property.

Top brand kitchenware, heater and cooler. 2 showers and 2 bathtubs (one with massage spa). Free wifi access. 宽敞而明亮的起居区域,整栋房屋全部配有澳大利亚独有的贾拉硬木地板和手工制作的欧式家具｡铁栅栏移动大门及可视对讲系统｡顶级品牌厨具和卫浴,中央热空调器和冷空调器｡ 2个淋浴和2个浴缸 (其中一个带按摩水疗)｡免费WiFi接入｡

name: Amazing City Loft
summary: Unique two story one bedroom. Comfortably fits two centrally located in the heart of the CBD on the top floor of a heritage building of only twelve. In walking distance to public transport, galleries, shopping precinct, bars and restaurants.
space: Known as the 'Baby' penthouse it is just that. A small and cosy south east facing light filled apartment with a wonderful vista. With two outdoor spaces, a balcony off the bedroom upstairs and a terrace off the living area downstairs gives you a sense of space. Very minimalistic with all the basics you need. Lets face it, if you are here for business or leisure chances are you will be busy exploring all the wonders of the city and will only need a place to rest your weary heads at the end of the day!
host_about:
I'm a friendly busy professional. 

I love my little apartment and the city is my playground.

summary: My place is right above Emporium Shopping Centre,  a few steps to Bourke Street shopping malls, Hardware Ln, Melbourne Central shopping complex, China Town. Tram stop in front.  You’ll love my place because of the location which is convenience to major tourist attractions, famous shopping malls, fantastic restaurants.
space: Apartment features: Bedroom - 2x queen size bed  - 3x single size bed Living room -1x sofa bed (double bed size) (bed will be made if more than 7 guests)  -Internet/WIFI -Central Fan/Cooling -LCD TV -intercom Bathroom -toilet and shower - Shampoo, conditioner, body wash and hand wash - Hair dryer -Tooth brush, tooth paste - Towels Kitchen: - Kettle, bread toaster, sandwich toaster - Fridge  - Tea, coffee, sugar  - Crockery, cutlery and glassware - Stove, microwave - Dishwahser - Oven Laundry - washing machine  - Ironing Board, Iron Others -First aid kit -Fire extinguisher -Bedroom slippers

Be a traveller, i will organise my trip myself, and will not prefer travel agent. 
Be a host , i will be nice to people and try to get them enjoy the house and trip. Make people more comfortable.

summary: This is a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom/toilet apartment which my partner and I live in Guests will access the main bathroom/ toilet so it won't be shared as we have our own ensuite Located within walking distance from Crown Casino and Eureka Tower Apartment balcony has city view and secured entrance While in Melbourne, there are plenty of things to see and do, we provide you with flyers, brouchures and maps for your convenience
space: Private room with queen size bed Own bathroom/toilet The kitchen is fully equipped, the dishwasher makes cleaning a very simple task, so don't worry about washing after yourself. No smoking in the apartment under any circumstances, please go outside

Young professional whom loves to meet new people, cultures and ideas!

I've co-hosted a number of properties and used airbnb for myself and family.

My hosting style is to make guests feel as though they're visiting a friends home, which is what started Airbnb altogether.

Whether you are here on holiday, work or just a relaxing weekend getaway, this place will suit you.

But if I had to choose my favourite holiday destination - nothing beats Paris. Or sitting on a banana lounge in Hawaii!

name: LUXICO - Arthouse (Abbotsford)
summary: Set on a peaceful street in the beautiful area of Abbotsford, Arthouse is a family-friendly, pet-friendly, spacious and stylish property with the benefit of a number of fabulous green, open spaces nearby. Just a hop, skip and a jump from the city and great restaurants and shops.
space: Set on a peaceful street in the beautiful area of Abbotsford, Arthouse is a spacious and stylish property with the benefit of a number of fabulous green, open spaces nearby. When you first step inside the property you’ll feel like you’ve just arrived at a luxurious boutique hotel, but one that you don’t have to share with other guests. That’s right, it’s all yours!  One of your favourite parts of this fabulous property is bound to be the enormous open plan living space, with a gorgeous living room area containing the most comfortable sofas you could imagine, spectacular kitchen with high end appliances and a dining area that overlooks the private garden. Speaking of the garden, this property really lets you bring the outside in, with full height bi-fold doors that span two sides of the kitchen and dining areas and lead out into the well maintained garden. The garden, with its peaceful sitting area, letting you take advantage of the sunshine and fresh air, and even when the weather is c
host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

name: BEACHSIDE LUXURY LOFT APARTMENT
summary: Situated 2 mins walk to the beach, opposite the famous Catani Gardens this Victorian mansion home has been converted into a unique and luxurious 5 Star Loft Apartment.  Architecturally designed space complimented by original art works and modernist furniture.  We have a fully equipped chefs kitchen, marble bathroom, king size bed with freshly ironed egyptian cotton sheets.  Secure off street parking and 2 mins walk to restaurants, shops cafes you will feel very safe in this beautiful apartment.
space: Our apartment is newly renovated,with high end finishes,  light and airy and is a 52 sqm of architecturally designed spacious split level loft. We are all about making your stay in the Loft 5 star and special. Some of the attention to detail you will find within are crisp and ironed bed linen, freshly ground organic coffee in the larder and fresh cut flowers from the local market.  You will love your stay in this contemporary and sophisticated luxury St.Kilda apartment. Enter into the original 4.5m soaring high pressed metal ceilings.  Polished natural timber floors, a huge open fire cleverly converted to a gas log heater creates a warm and intimate space for guests to enjoy.  Bookcases filled with interesting reads, original designer light fittings all add to a stay you won't want to end.  We have lots of fun games in the sideboard, such as Cludo, Scrabble, Monopoly, the games you don't have time to play at home.  -Master Suite with King Size Bed with Egyptian cotton sheets, cashmere
host_about: We are easy going and friendly people. We love houses that are homes, warm and modern designs, art, architecture and music. We travel as much as we can and do so as often as possible. On shorter trips we explore the shores of Australia in our Coaster Bus.  We love the outdoors, sunrises, sunsets, vineyards, good food, fishing, bush walking and bike riding.  Angeline is Irish, runs a small Marketing Company and also manufactures beautiful Blankets and Umbrellas (as seen in the Loft!).  Richard is of Irish Decent and works in the Property Industry.   We love living in St.Kilda West, its an amazing vibrant place with always something new going on.   xx

name: Your modern retreat in beautiful Clifton Hill
summary: Secure top floor renovated and beautifully furnished apartment overlooking parkland. Enjoy inner-city living perfectly located. Short stroll to Clifton Hill train station. Free on and off street parking available. Unbeatable value for weekly and monthly stays with huge discounts.
space: An ideal inner city retreat I am excited to share with you! Ideal for a couple or solo traveller. Perfectly positioned to enjoy Melbourne's night life, for lovers of food and shopping adventurers.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Olga and I'm from Melbourne. With bay beaches and beautiful world class ocean beaches we have a coastline that you must explore. Also our mountains are an easy drive and a must see during any season. Our natural environment is the envy of many, not to mention our amazing food culture and our arts and entertainment culture are world class. 
I have been a host for about a year and absolutely love it. I always do the very best to look after my guests and I take pleasure in looking after my property too.
I  love to travel- one of my favorite places in the world at the moment is the Northern Territory. I love the desert - color of the red dirt, Kakadu National Park and flying over Katherine gorge is stunning but Kings Canyon was awesome too. I walk,  cycle indoors and do pilates, love meeting people, cooking for family and friends and generally enjoy life!
My motto in life is treat people the way I want to be treated.

name: Northcote one of the prestige suburb in Melbourne
summary: Very cozy and comfortable walking distance to tram and bus stop  7.4km to CBD Northlands shopping centre not to far plus High Street with plenty of cafes and restaurants
space: All guests can use all facilities in the house
host_about: I am 47 Years Old I’m very easy going I’m not home during the day as I will be at work and weekends I’m usually away working I leave Friday night and come back Sunday anytime

space: Unknown

It is a perfect place to stay for a night, a week or even longer or relocation with central location in the heart of Melbourne CBD.
We love Melbourne so much and would like to enjoy you to experience this famous multi-culture city which most people agree that it is the most liveable city.

name: Clean and comfortable 2 bedroom unit **Free WiFi**
summary: My place is good for couples, young families and business travellers. It's a clean and comfortable two bedroom unit with an open plan living area.  It is walking distance to Hogans Corner shops and Pacific Werribee Shopping Centre. Easy access to public transport.
space: It is a cosy unit with an open plan living space, kitchen with a large island bench that opens up to the deck & BBQ area, and a green backyard! You will have the entire unit to yourself. the rooms have comfortable beds, bedside table, laptop desk, luggage stand, mirrors and a big wardrobe. Complimentary fresh towels, bed linen and toiletry. Easy access to public transport (Werribee, Hoppers Crossing and Tarneit train stations) Coles, Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Kmart, Big W, Target, Village Cinema, McDonald, KFC and plenty of restaurants are all just a few mins away.
host_about: Friendly person, working full time.

name: Cosy 2bdr City Gem
summary: City central, our modern 2 bdrm apartment is located in the QV complex, close to Lygon st, Chinatown, bars, clubs, museums and next door to the State Library. Trains and trams at the door step and restaurants and cafes in abundance. You will love it!
space: City dwelling close to everything activities that Melbourne has to offer
host_about:
Hi there, a keen traveler I have used airbnb to rent accommodation in  other places.
Please feel free to ask questions about my city I am happy to help.

summary: Cool, quiet, and homey apartment that makes you feel just like at home!  Right in the heart of South Yarra, one block from Fawkner park and 5 min away from the Royal Botanic Gardens.  5 min walk to South Yarra train station! Only 2 stations from CBD. Just 10 min walk from the iconic Chapel St - Explore all the restaurants, cafes, bars, night clubs, music venues, shopping, galleries & the Prahran Market.
space: Free Wifi Double bed 4-people dining table Kitchen  With kettle, mixer, oven, gas stove top and cooking appliances. Living Area Comfy cushions, relaxing sofa, amazing inner garden view! Bedrooms Double bed, sheets and towels, shampoo, conditioner and body wash provided. Other Appliances Washing machine.

Industrial Engineer that loves to travel and discover the world. 
Love Sports: Surfing, MTB, Rock Climbing, Snowboarding, Sailing.
Open to meet new people and enjoy great company.

name: Northcote hideaway for city lovers
summary: A quiet, easy apartment just 300 metres off High St right near trams and trains and excellent cafes.  This is your little launchpad for seeing the very best of Melbourne - you really are just 10 mins from a fabulous time!
space: This is a small one bedroom apartment, polished concrete floors, small kitchen and ensuite bathroom with bath. You have just the right space you need for coming home to crash after a big day or night out in Melbourne. The bathroom is now fully renovated and ready for guests.
host_about: I'm into arts and community development, currently working as a grant writer for 2 not for profit organisations. I am in my 30s and hope to travel until I'm 90.  Melbourne is the place I'll probably always come back home to though!

name: CBD apartments with spectacular city views!
summary: This big apartment is so in the city but also in a quite location compare to the others. You will have all convenient spots around you like:  MELBOURNE Victoria market  Flagstaff park Southern cross train station  A convenient store just locate under the building  Walking distance to Docklands  Harbor town shopping center and restaurant  Combine with a heritage building, this residential apartment is a icon in the street.  The apartment locate at the highest level with a large indoor balcony.
space: Except the internal apartment, guest also can use gym and swimming pool as a residence public access facilities.
host_about:
Hi this is Cynthia. I am doing architect design after university and into property area for 8 years since graduate. 

We are selling and leasing properties in Melbourne. In air bnb, We are looking forward to assist more client with warm accommodation where like home, and easy check in and check out for all busy traveler.

name: New York style loft on Chapel St
summary: This bright, spacious apartment is in the heart of Chapel St! This is a fantastic base if you're visiting Melbourne. Chapel St is famous for it's shopping, night life and great food. Just a 17 minute tram ride from the city centre or 10 mins by car.
space: The apartment has a really great vibe. It has an open mezzanine layout. There is a large living and dining area for relaxing or having some friends for dinner.
host_about:
I work in the advertising and film industry and live in Melbourne, Australia. 

I was born in New Zealand and have travelled a little through Vietnam, Japan, Thailand and Europe. When I'm travelling, I like to be pretty low key and experience local culture and food, I love food!

I'm excited to share my Chapel St apartment with travellers because I believe it's a perfect place to explore and experience Melbourne. I have provided a very extensive guide to the area because I know how valuable local knowledge can be when you travel and I want my guests to have the best time possible.

name: Cozy room next to University of Melbourne
summary: A cozy furnished room 4rent in a cozy townhouse in Barkly Square, locates just 3 mins from University of Melbourne, in the middle of everything: green park in front of the door, less than 1 min to Shopping Mall and supermarkets, 1 min to Sydney Road with full of selection of bars, restaurants, shops, 1 min to Tramp, Train station, etc.
space: This new townhouse have three bedrooms locating in three floors with all facilities and Scandinavian style furniture. It locates in a quiet area and very well connected to the transportation. The area is famous for its restaurants, bars, shops, spa & massage, etc. and the house is in the middle of everything with supermarkets, tramp and train stops just next to the door.
host_about: Unknown

name: Uptown Frankston - Retreat style private bedroom
summary: This bedroom features a double bed along with large desk  Perfect for Medical staff on placements, Monash Peninsula Uni students, professionals, visitors to the area or anyone requiring above average short term accommodation. The house has a great atmosphere with plenty of living space to share with other guests. The garden views from the kitchen and living areas are beautiful and the Al Fresco dining options are fantastic. This is my house next door to where I live and I can assist at any time.
space: The  bedroom is beautifully presented and in immaculate condition.  Extra clean, quiet and elegant. Clothes hanging space, clothes drawers, bookcase, desk, lamp and all good clean linen and towels provided.
host_about: Unknown

name: Here's something a  bit different!
summary: Your private guest suite has a queen bed with latex mattress  & memory foam overlay;  ensuite, kitchenette, TV/DVD &  balcony with city views. Airport pick-up available. Close to city, easy access to sporting venues, universities and tourist sites.
space: This private retreat is the entire upstairs of our recently renovated California bungalow. It has everything you need for a weekend in the city for a football game or other sporting event or for a couple of weeks exploring all the fantastic tourist sights of Melbourne. There is a queen size bed, reclining chair, table and kitchenette with microwave, toaster, fridge, sink, coffee maker, ensuite with shower, dresser and closet space for your clothe s, TV, DVD, WiFi (free). All toiletries, towels and linens are supplied and for your first morning we will provide a free breakfast basket. Your space also has a reverse cycle air con/heater so  you can control the temperature to your liking.
host_about:
Hi, and welcome to our home. Donna is a retired teacher and Ann is a semi-retired psychologist. We've travelled many places around the world and know how great it is to have insider  knowledge from the locals and a friendly face at the end of the day. We've personally used AirBNB and found it to be great.
We like to host others in our lovely home in Melbourne. 

Donna's originally from Canada and Ann from New York City. We've lived in Australia most of our adult lives. We like independent movies, junk TV, great food, and lazy days.
Our White Swiss Shepherd is a sweetie. Very friendly and likes visitors.

name: Graceful double room ,300m to train station
summary: This is a historic building, it has spacious and bright rooms, stunning heights. Renovation makes it more comfortable. Located in Melbourne's most prestigious district of Toorak, surrounded by numerous shops and café restaurants, it is easy to get a tram train to all major attractions in Melbourne. Choosing accommodation here is the best choice to experience Melbourne's high quality of life.
space: On two floors, our exquisite rooms are particularly spacious and sunny. Each room features a leather or solid wood bed, as well as a good wardrobe and writing desk. We provide the finest bedding products, and others include free 24-hour hot water and Wi-Fi.
host_about: Unknown

summary: Apartment is located near the beach and bars. Great night life. St Kilda is a great area to hang out.  Trams are within 100m distance.  Only 7km to the CBD.
space: Unknown

name: A plant filled, inner city escape.
summary: Tucked away in a small alleyway, this loft has the benefit of being inner city without being in a 20 story apartment building. It’s close to southern cross station and airport facilities, surrounded by good restaurants and clubs but still provides a calm getaway from the hustle and bustle.  You have access to a whole bookshelf, record collection and even my skateboard. Hell, borrow my jacket if you’re cold x
space: There is a small kitchen, a laundry and storage available to guests as well as upstairs bathroom and downstairs lounge.  Apologies, I don’t have a TV, I just don’t use them so don’t have them in the house. But there is a portable wifi modem.
host_about: I am a 24 year old artist, I travel a lot for work so rent out my humble little studio. I’m a big fan of books and records so my house is full of them.

name: Room To Let Next to Chilsom Tafe
summary: One clean and tidy room available, Rent includes gas, electricity and water.  Very short walk to Dandenong Hospital.The bedroom is lockable for your privacy.  Minimum period of 3 months to be considered as long term pricing
space: Good-sized, clean and tidy, lockable room available for independent person to live with 5 others in large house in Dandenong. Access to shared cooking facilities, bathroom & laundry.  Rent includes gas, electricity and water. Very short walk to Dandenong Hospital and 2 Min walk to Chisholm Tafe. The bedroom is lockable for your privacy  Shared facilities of kitchen. Rental amount is $160 per week for minimum 6 months period and bond is two weeks rent. Note: bedding & toiletries are not included for long-term stays unless specifically requested at time of booking.  Suit day time working people or students. Looking for people who are considerate, tidy and respectful of others and property. For an inspection please call (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
host_about: I love life! Everyday is a new experience! I love to help others and enjoy laughing and watching others have a good time! I am a very honest person who will bust his butt to to achieve goals in life! I am very into nature and will pull over on the side of the road to move a turtle so it doesn't get run over. I like all kinds of weather (except when it is over 80 degrees) I don't like watching people get hurt and I will defend people that can't defend themselves! I don't like people who lie or are high and mighty! People who purposely hurt others are scum and should be put away forever! But for the most part I am a content person who believes that we should all stop and enjoy life when ever we can because we are only here a short time and letting life slip by without enjoying it is a waste! I could go on and on but you get the idea of how I am!

name: Manhattan Apt Caulfield North 2 Bed Standard
summary: Experience luxury inner east living in our spacious 2 bedroom 1 bathroom plus separate powder room Manhattan-styled apartments. These fantastic apartments are situated in the heart of Caulfield North, with close access to the train station, shopping village and Monash University Caulfield Campus, everything is on your doorstep.
space: The open plan kitchen, living and dining spaces makes the most of the abundance of natural light. The well appointed stone benchtop kitchen with stainless steel 4 burner hob gas cooktops, oven, dishwasher and microwave allows you to engage with guests or family whilst entertaining. Wake up to a fresh coffee from your very own espresso pod coffee machine and enjoy breakfast whilst reading a newspaper sitting on your private balcony. The master bedroom includes a luxurious 5 star hotel quality queen bed with a wall mounted television & built in robes. A separate powder room is also conveniently located within this 2 Bedroom Standard apartment. An additional bedroom comes with queen sized beds and built in robes. A functional central bathroom with shower also services our 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments. A European laundry with separate washing machine and dryer can be found within the self contained apartment.
host_about:
All our properties: https://www.airbnb.com.au/users/37181360/listings

We are the team from Corporate Keys Australia, Melbourne's premier provider of furnished apartments.

We are a professional short & long stay property management team, which means you can book with complete confidence for a stress-free stay during your visit! 

We're always here to help you find your way around Melbourne. Do not hesitate to get in touch for further information.

name: Light bright 4 bedrm house in Funky Fitzroy North!
summary: Our home is located in the wonderful Fitzroy North - a vibrant inner city suburb within walking distance to restaurants, bars, cafes, bike paths, supermarkets, the lovely Edinburgh Gardens, as well as easy access to the city with a short direct tram ride straight into the CBD. The house has 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen area leading to a large sunny backyard.
space: You will feel completely at home in our clean, comfortable and beautifully set up home that will make you feel like a local on your visit to Melbourne. The house has floorboards throughout, and is well set up with 4 large bedrooms at the front of the house, leading to open plan living at the rear. Each of the 4 bedrooms has a queen size bed, complete with electric blankets for those chilly nights. There are also 2 single trundle beds that can be made up on request, allowing 10 people to stay. A porta-cot is also available if required. The living space looks out onto a north facing garden with decked entertaining area and large grassy yard.  A smart TV equipped with NETFLIX in the lounge can keep you entertained when not out exploring Melbourne. Adjacent to the spacious living and dining area is a well equipped kitchen with oven, gas top stove and a dishwasher. A gas wall heater quickly warms the living areas and master bedroom, with portable heaters provided for the other rooms. Althou
host_about: Hi! My name is Annette and I live in Melbourne. I enjoy travel, music, food and spending time with friends and family. Love to take it easy with a glass of wine and a good book / movie / documentary!

name: Stylish living -One Bedroom(double)
summary: Stylish Brand new town house. 15min drive or 19min bus to city CBD. 10min to beautiful Williamstown (best city view) and Altona beaches. Shopping centre is just 2min walk. Very spacious house with a cute backyard to relax. en suit bathroom + bathroom
space: Modern house. newly built. A clean room and a lovely back yard.
host_about:
I love to travel and enjoy experiencing other cultures. organised and responsible. I work as a Snr.Strategy Analyst at Metro Trains Melbourne..
Love to meet and accommodate people.

name: Harmsworth
summary: Calm, spacious and comfortable warehouse apartment in the heart of Collingwood. Walking distance to cafes, bars and supermarket. Fitzroy's vibrant nightspots just up the road. Close to all trams and trains - 15 minutes from the city centre.
space: Originally a coachhouse, this double story old brick building has been creatively converted into a comfortable studio style space.  The neighbourhood is diverse and lively in the heart of Melbourne’s alternative district.
host_about: Unknown

name: Spacious Sunny Room, close to Cafe, Shopping Cntr,
summary: We are a friendly couple and enjoy to meet new people :).  We are living in the same amazing house. You will be sharing the house with us (me, my hubby and little daughter), and other guests. this is quite big and spacious house. Kitchen, bathroom and toilets are shared. The house is just 15 minutes drive from the Melbourne airport. You will be living close to everything you need, transport, shopping centre,  and Cafe. My house is also close Creek and Park! host_about:
Hi, we’re Frank and Vince.

Thanks for reading our profile.

We love hosting, and when time permits, travelling!

As guests, we understand and appreciate the guest/host relationship, so will always be respectful of both you and your home, and look forward to sharing the experience.

As hosts, we thank you for considering us for your Melbourne stay. You can view all our airbnb apartments and homes here: https://www.airbnb.com.au/users/50121/listings

We've been welcoming guests to our homes since 2009, when we established 'a2c urban stays Melbourne', a collection of unique, hand-selected inner Melbourne properties, specifically designed for welcoming, memorable short stays.

Featuring stylish contemporary interiors, in the best lifestyle locations, our properties are situated in the very heart of Melbourne’s hippest inner-city areas. All our apartments and homes are within a short stroll of cafes, restaurants, shopping, night life and public transport. Cultural and sporting facilities including MCG/Hisense/Etihad Stadiums, Melbourne waterfront, Melbourne City Centre and some of Melbourne’s best beaches are easily accessible.

Our guests enjoy free wifi, superior comfort beds, high quality bed linens and towels, entertainment systems offering large flat screen TVs, sound systems, books, magazines, air-conditioning*, heating, full size fully equipped kitchens with Euro appliances, laundry facilities*, parking*, complimentary starter provisions and housekeeping service for longer stays*.
*Please enquire before booking.

Exceeding guest expectations is what we’re about.

If you’re looking for a truly special and authentic Melbourne experience, in a warm, stylish inviting space that is close to the many wonderful attractions our city is famous for, then we’re the perfect choice. Feel free to contact us and we’ll be happy to assist you plan your perfect stay.

As hosts, we look forward to welcoming you. As guests, we look forward to discovering your home and surrounds.

Warm regards,

Frank and Vince

name: A lovely townhouse near La Trobe University
summary: This is a brand new townhouse. It is a safe, quiet, pleasant place, very close to a park, with  tree views and birds in the morning, as well as  fresh air. The location is close to La Trobe University, Austin Hospital, and Northland shopping Centre.
space: It is a brand new place, clean and pretty, with leafy views from the bedroom which is on the upper floor.  The front facing bedroom, with an electric blanket on the bed is the one I let out. The kitchen/dining is a shared space. It is available to guests to make breakfast and meals between 8 am and 8 pm.
host_about: I am a classical singer, and not long ago finished studying a Master's in Classical singing . You can see me on the music website as rednvocal. I love singing and you may hear me, if I am around, because I love singing, especially while I prepare dinner.  I have traveled to many countries, and I know what it is like to be a traveler and that it is nice to have a "home" where you are away in a new place. I like languages, and I can teach my guests some Bulgarian including the Bulgarian alphabet. I enjoy meeting people from different cultures and we can have a meal together too if I am there during your stay. I do travel a bit, so I may not meet you, eventhough meeting guests and welcoming them is one of my favourite things!

summary: Bright and renovated Victorian home in Northcote. House is a two story with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and large open plan kitchen, huge dining and living room opening onto garden. Our home is 1 minute walk to Dennis train station takes you direct to MCG and the City within 10 minutes. Short walk to local shops, vibrant and hipster High Street boasting cinema, bars, cafes and terrific restaurants. Parks only 5 minutes walk. Wifi, Foxtel and Netflix..We love our home. We know you will love it too.
space: Our Victorian home has recently been renovated. Off the main entrance hall is a huge moody master bedroom with queen bed, television (with foxtel), and a dreamy antique chandelier. The room has been furnished in a luxe nod to the Victorian history of the house. Further down the hall is a children's bedroom - sleeps 1 or 2 and main bathroom with large deep freestanding bath and large rain shower. The hall opens onto a huge modern sunlit dining room, large windows overlook the garden - perfect for your morning coffee and paper. The dining room leads into a  modern chefs kitchen and large living room with polished terrazzo style concrete floors, hardwood cabinetry and a beautiful industrial french wood burning fireplace. The living area has a TV with Foxtel and Netflix. Large and expansive doors open out onto the garden with deck and BBQ.  Up stairs is another good size queen bedroom with built in robe, a childs bedroom with king single and trundle (can be made into a queen) also with bui

And the place itself is top of the line. Think marble bench tops, a spacious balcony, Miele appliances and access to a pool, gym and spa.

summary: The northern experience - everything you need within walking distance! The house is located seconds from High Street Thornbury and all the bars and restaurants it has to offer. space: You can hang out in the lounge, cook in the kitchen, work in the dining room. The house is open to you while you are here. Your room has a private entrance through a side garden, although you are very welcome to use the front door. There are two dogs who live here, so you will need to love dogs. They are lovely and well behaved, although will definitely greet you with excitement! They are inside dogs, so will be in and out of the house while you are here. Also, full disclosure, they have left the garden looking a little bit worse for wear, so no garden parties on the lawn!

name: Beautiful 3 bedroom home in Elwood
summary: Stylish, light filled house situated on a quiet street In Elwood, a short walk from (seriously good) cafes and restaurants, the St Kilda Botanical Gardens and Elwood Beach. On the doorstep of St Kilda, the CBD, MCG and Tennis Centre be reached within fifteen minutes (just a few minutes walk to the train station). Or jump on the tram at the end of our street to reach Albert Park, South and Port Melbourne or Chapel Street. A great location to experience the real Melbourne.
space: A light filled period home with stylish, uncluttered interiors.  Set up for our own family's use for weekend getaways in the city, the house is well equipped for families with a cot, high chair and kids toys. The house has two queen bedrooms and a king single bunk bedroom leading off a large entrance hall. Two bedrooms have generous built in robes and the bunk bedroom has a desk so can alternatively be used as a study.  An integrated living, dining and kitchen area overlook and open onto a landscaped courtyard. The house has a european laundry with washing machine and dryer, bathroom with walk in shower and claw foot bath, outdoor bbq and well equipped kitchen.
host_about: We are a family of five living on Melbourne's Mornington Peninsula. We have set up our Elwood property for weekends in Melbourne, which are, unfortunately, as few and far between as visits to our Sri Lanka house. So it is that both properties are available for short term rental most of the year.  We love cooking, eating out and have three little children and have set up both houses to cater for this.

summary: What could be more Melbourne than staying in a chic industrial apartment in the centre of town? The apartment is just as comfortable as it is convenient, with soaring ceilings, new furniture and everything you'll need to make your stay in Melbourne amazing!

Only a short stroll to Balaclava Shopping strip; within easy access to all local amenities including Balaclava train station and bus routes, the popular hub of Chapel Street restaurants and cafes!

host_about: Originally from Darwin, Australia and love to travel. Recently used AirBnB with my friend across North and South America and thoroughly enjoyed the experience so thought it time I opened my own account.

name: A cosy studio apartment in CBD with awesome view
summary: This studio apartment is one of a kind in the Melbourne CBD. The view that it offers is breathtaking, especially in the early morning or late at night. At this location, you get the best of both worlds - the fast & upbeat pace of the City, and the peace & tranquility of the Flagstaff Garden right opposite our building. Train Station and Tram Stops are right at the doorstep. You'd have the convenience of moving about, eating and shopping your way around Melbourne's best restaurants and boutiques.
space: Balcony - You can sit and relax at the balcony and enjoy the beautiful city view at the same time. The balcony door is a bit heavy, you need to pull harder to open it. To unlock, flip down the lever; to lock, flip it up.  Kitchenette - Feel free to use the kitchen. When you cook, please Pull Out the range hood to minimise the smoke. To turn on the fire, you’d need to press and turn the knob, keep it pressed, when you see the fire, give it another press.
host_about:
"To see a world in a grain of sand
And a heaven in a wild flower,
Hold infinity in the palm of your hand 
And eternity in an hour."

A poem by William Blake that really parallels my view towards Life. Be thankful with all the little miracles happening... little miracles like the raindrops, the sun rays, and the smile I see on people’s face.

I'm an extroverted introvert. I can be alone but not feeling lonely; or I can hang out with friends and become crazy. I like to travel, shopping, sightseeing... I like to sleep in a luxurious 5-star hotel. I like mountain climbing, trekking, camping... I enjoy sleeping under the million stars in the wild. What I like most about traveling is to be able to get close to different people and culture. It never fails to amaze me. One of the most unforgettable places would be Nepal.

I like to make people happy... sometimes my jokes may be dumb, but well, at least I've tried. With the Airbnb platform, I have a chance to make my guests happy too... not by cracking dumb jokes thou, but rather, giving them a clean and cosy space, and to make sure that all their needs are in place.

name: Stylish Modern Comfort by the Park with Balcony!
summary: Modern, spacious, bright, and only meters from the park! Comfortable and new, this is your perfect home away from home, with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a spacious balcony, secure parking and fantastic open plan living.  Situated in the peaceful neighbourhood of Caulfield North, you are a short stroll to cafe's, shops, and parks. Enjoy easy access to Melbourne's bustling scene of culture and entertainment with transport on your doorstep! Relax and unwind in style!
space: This fantastic apartment is extremely spacious and bright, located in the peaceful suburb of Caufield. You are only minutes away from the beachside suburb of St Kilda, and the hip and stylish Chapel Street precinct of Windsor, Prahran and South Yarra. Comfortably sleeping 4 and with a large open-plan living space, this home is perfect for families and couples, featuring everything you need for your stay, including a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities, aircon/heater, Wifi, and secure underground parking. MASTER BEDROOM - Luxury queen size bed - Ensuite bathroom - Wardrobes  - Full-length mirrors - Bedside tables SECOND BEDROOM - Double size bed - Wardrobes  - Full-length mirrors - Bedside tables LIVING/DINING - Dining table - TV - Couches, chairs - Coffee table - Outdoor balcony BATHROOM x 2 - Fresh towels  - Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap - Toilet rolls KITCHEN - Complimentary coffee, tea, sugar, milk - Microwave - Refrigerator - Dishwasher - Stove, oven - Pots, pans, di
host_about:
G'day,

I'm Joel, i'm born and raised in Sydney, which is in my opinion one of the most beautiful major cities in the world. My goal in life is to one day visit every country in the world, I hold no bias to any of them and hope that I get the opportunity. So far I have visited 42 countries. Last year I spent 1 year travelling in South and Central America and loved the opportunity I had to learn Spanish. It was a great experience and one that I will never forget. 

My hobbies include all forms of board sports, skating, surfing and snowboarding primarily. I enjoy learning about new cultures especially their foods. I grew up in an Italian restaurant so my love for food and cooking is deeply engrained in my personality. 

My style of hosting and living life in general is pretty relaxed. I will do my best to greet you at the door and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. But if you just want to chill I can totally relate. 

I also love music and watching live music. I mostly go out to see House, deep house and techno music as that scene in Sydney is easily accessible. However at home you will find me listening to hip-hop, reggae, latin, afro-beat, jazz and anything with a smooth and funky beat. 

If you need recommendations about food or music in Sydney these are probably my two strongest topics, so please don't hesitate. 

Looking forward to meeting more crazy, fun and cool people through Airbnb. 

Joel

Can accommodate one couple and an additional guest. Just 2 minutes away from the train station (north Richmond) and a 3-minute walk to a tram stop. You will be in the CBD within 10 minutes! It is equipped with all facilities you need to have a comfortable stay, whether you are visiting Melbourne, have recently moved or are wanting a quiet place that is close to transport and the CBD.

You cannot beat the location. 5 minutes walk to Plenty Road tram stop and bus terminal. 10 minutes to La Trobe Uni on foot. 15 minutes tram ride to RMIT Bundoora campus. 50 minutes to City by tram or bus.  The place is only 8 years old, very quiet and offers an excellent atmosphere to stay. All furniture included ( Queen bed, sofa, study desk, chair & wardrobe ).
space: Unknown
host_about: Hello everyone, thanks for checking out my page. Pretty much I am an all around guy, I can be funny, I can be annoying (this happens rarely), I can be optimistic, pessimistic, upset, happy... But most of the time I just like to keep it cool, I like all sorts of outdoor activities such as camping, hiking, running and mountain climbing. I don't live in regret, enjoy life every second, day by day! That's my motto. There are a few things that I strive towards in all facets of my life: honesty, genuineness, and reliability. I believe that when you abandon these qualities is when you truly become untrustworthy.

space: Unknown
host_about: Hi, I'm an architect and designer from Melbourne, Australia ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) I live and breathe design and very passionate about my work. I'm neat and tidy, polite, respectful and expect the same. I love travelling and use airbnb as a host and guest. If you'd like to know more, feel free to drop me a line.

name: Romantic Mount Dandenong Cottage in the Forest
summary: Enjoy a leisurely stroll around the lush property and relish in the privacy of this romantic cottage at the edge of a forest. The spacious bedroom features a high ceiling and a black four-poster bed with a relaxing spa bath right next to it.
space: This is a petite cottage just specially built for 2.     The lounge/dining/spa is open plan.   There is a big new TV for you, Wifi of course.  The bathroom is spacious, the kitchenette is well equipped with a cooktop, microwave, dishdrawer, toaster, kettle etc.   A generous continental breakfast hamper is included in the tariff for your enjoyment. Only natural cleaning products are used to care for this little cottage, so we hope you will enjoy this aspect of your stay too.
host_about:
After 24 years offering accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges just an hour from Melbourne, we are now offering a beautiful little group of cottages for Air BNB guests.
We live in The Dandenongs, have lived in Fiji and PNG before moving to Melbourne 30 years ago.     
We have a large family, 2 cats and 2 dogs to keep us in hand!     They will not annoy you as your cottage is on a different property.

name: CR8 Single Rm Guest House Brunswick
summary: Rm 8 Single occupancy private lockable room.  Typical guests, professionals 23 - 40 yo All bills & Linen inc. Internet $16 per wk extra
space: The property boasts high quality internal fixtures and fittings: a fully equipped kitchen with granite bench tops, chic bathrooms with porcelain finishes. Generously proportioned deluxe single rooms, have warm timber tonings, quality fixtures and fittings, where the focus is on comfort and convenience in a friendly and inviting environment and a ready made home away from home.  The room is furnished with furniture you would find in a 4.5 star hotel. There is a reverse cycle air-conditioning unit, 32” TV and DVD player. King single bed, two seat couch, desk, side drawers, bookshelf. All linen, included towels are provided.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Valeria. My husband Ben and I own and manage a number of upmarket guesthouses located in the inner Melbourne suburbs. 

We specialise in offering a new and unique opportunity to overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, teachers and other business specialists to gain superior inner Melbourne accommodation and lessen the stresses of moving to a new town, new state or a new country.

We offer fully furnished, centrally located properties with plenty of parking and quality fixtures and furnishings, each has an alfresco entertainment area and BBQ in a garden setting, a fully equipped property in an exclusive professional apartment house environment, where new arrivals, to Melbourne, or people going through a lifestyle transition, can experience an instant community atmosphere for medium (from two weeks), or long term stays, and say goodbye to lonely, restrictive and expensive apartment living.

No more solitary TV dinners! Each property provides apartment house accommodation on a room-by-room basis with shared kitchen, dining and lounge facilities. This style of apartment house living provides opportunities for new arrivals, to Melbourne to quickly, form friendships, build networks with other likeminded people and settle more easily into a new life. This helps to alleviate homesickness and improves their effectiveness in the workplace or place of learning.

A safe and comfortable home life makes for a happier Melbourne experience.

Typical Tenant Profiles

Flexi (Hidden by Airbnb) is open to a wide range of people from professional backgrounds usually between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) years of age. Typical residents are overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, corporate and career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, nurses, teachers and other specialists or people in the throes of re-establishing a home and life in Melbourne.

Ben and I hope you choose to stay with us and we have the opportunity to make your stay in Melbourne a life long happy memory.

name: Character Cottage in the Heart of Fitzroy!
summary: You can't get more "Melbourne" than our gorgeous Victorian cottage right in the heart of Fitzroy – the ultimate in everything inner city cool.  Enjoy diverse dining options, cafes, bars, vintage shopping, galleries, markets, street art, the best nightlife and Melbourne's sports and entertainment  precinct are all within walking distance from home.  Our home is perfect for couples, friends or a small family – Live like a local in Melbourne's best suburb!
space: This is an absolutely fantastic location with everywhere accessible on foot, so you'll be able to enjoy the charms of Melbourne's first suburb with ease.  The cottage was built in the 1800s and was part of the original subdivision of Fitzroy and is full of heritage features. Enjoy the sunny private courtyard – lovely for relaxing with a cup of coffee in the morning or a beer in the afternoon.  Just pop down to Industry Beans for one of their award winning coffees! You'll love the character of our heritage home which has been lovingly restored. The living area is light-filled and has an extremely comfy couch – prefect for chilled out nights in with a movie on the TV and a nice glass of local Yarra Valley wine.    The living area leads onto an adjoining kitchen, so you can live like a local and prepare some of your meals at home!  It's easy with all the mod cons provided for your convenience. The kitchen is fully fitted out with Miele appliances – including a cooktop, an oven and a dishw

Nestled in a quiet tree lined street with all amenities close at hand. 2 min walk to beach, funky restaurants, cool cafes with a village feel. 15 mins walk along the beach to St Kilda and Acland Street. Close to Brighton beach, Chapel St, South Melb market. Easy transport options to take you into the city or to and from airport. Best suited for 2 but a comfortable sofa bed in the lounge opens for 2 more if travelling with family.
space: My apartment is a  comfortable, large, bright, airy space in a quiet block in a beautiful tree lined streets close to all amenities. We have traveled with young children before so this is a space that welcomes parents with young babies and we will provide portacot for free.
host_about:
I love travelling and over the years have travelled and lived in lots of places in the world. 
I love food, growing food, cooking food and sharing food with others. 
I believe in leaving a small footprint on this beautiful place we call earth.
I believe that people are mostly generous and kind.
Our family have used Airbnb a lot when travelling and we have also hosted lots of overseas visitors to our farmhouse as well and I would now like to share my beachpad too. 
I hope to be able to make travelling as fun and an enjoyable experience for you as it is for us by sharing with you what we have.
