name: 1 BR apartment in the central Melbourne CBD
summary: Centrally located in the middle of Melbourne CBD, Melbourne Central Station and Shopping Centre is just a stone throw away. The apartment is located within FREE TRAM ZONE to ease your travel in Melbourne CBD. Cafes and restaurants are just couple minutes walking distance. Closest grocery shops are in Melbourne Central or Queen Victoria Market which is just a stop away.
space: The bedroom is furnished with a queen size bed and an extra single size sofa bed in the living room which able to accommodate up to 3 people.  Kitchen is provided with some essential cooking utensil, cutleries, kettle as well as toaster. Stovetop and microwave for cooking and heating.  A combo dryer and washing machine for laundry. Parking is subject to availability and have an additional charge of AU$25 per day. Please inform us in advance if you need one.
host_about:
We are three young and passionate Melbournians that love to travel and food lovers. Feel free to ask us and we will give our recommendation some of the best food in Melbourne.

We hope you enjoy your stay in our modern cozy apartment!

name: Location location location!!!
summary: Our new, light and spacious house will make you feel like home. Located only 20 min by train from Flinders Station, 12 min walk from Brighton beach and 3 min walk from fancy Church St, it makes it a perfect place for your holidays.
space: #YOUR ACCOMMODATION# - Two bedrooms separated from the living room and kitchen by the big sliding door - One bedroom includes a double real bed and another comes with a sofa-bed with a firm mattress  - Bed linen and towels provided
host_about:
Hi lovely people,

thanks for stoping by :)

A little about us:
Ksenia: I'm originally from Moscow, but before moving to Melbourne in 2011 with my husband Marco I was living in Italy for 12 years.
I am a freelance fashion and portrait photographer who loves capturing beauty and soul of people I photograph. I am chatty and love talking about anything, especially about different life experiences due to my international background. 

Marco: Italian, works as a freelance landscaper and loves practicing any kind of sport, particularly kite-surf and surf. If it's windy in the afternoon, you will be able to spot him at Brighton kite Beach 12 mins from home.
He is also a great cook (Italian yummy food of course) that is always helpful :)

We love travelling and exploring amazing places, together with meeting fantastic personalities on our way. 

Both of us are very relaxed and laid-back. We respect your space and would like you to respect ours as well. :) 

Hope you enjoy staying at our cosy place.

name: LUXICO - Grand Loft (Fitzroy)
summary: Located in the heart of urban cool suburb of Fitzroy, this incredible warehouse townhouse is a must see. Direct street access, high ceilings and a private roof terrace are just some of this townhouses spectacular features. Designed with a theme in mind, Grand Loft is the epitome of urban chic.
space: A spectacular warehouse conversion, Fitzroy Loft is the epitome of urban chic.  Heading through the front door and up the stairs into the kitchen and living area, the double height ceiling is an absolute knockout. Exposed brick walls decorated with colourful artwork sit beautifully next to the sleek leather sofas and modern dining furniture. Tucked away to the rear of this level are two large bedrooms, one with a ladder to a mini mezzanine level. A shared bathroom with Subway style tiled shower completes this floor. Upstairs houses the master retreat, a huge space with en suite (featuring a sunken bath). From this room, a wooden spiral staircase leads you to the private roof terrace - the perfect spot to enjoy a BBQ and the stunning views over the city  and especially the spectacular fireworks display on New Years Eve. Home Truths : Bedroom #1: Queen bed with ensuite and sunken bath Bedroom #2: Splittable Queen Bedroom #3: Queen bed  Bathroom with shower  Garage parking for one car Thi
host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

name: The place amongst the trees
summary: This is a bright and breezy space set amongst 2 acres of gorgeous groomed bushland. You are free to access all areas and enjoy the beautiful grounds. The space itself is newly decorated with gallery style stairs and fantastic facilities. There is a brand new kitchen space, travertine floors with rugs and ample room to move around. Would suit families and couples/ friends sharing. You also have your own garage thats fits two cars comfortably at the top of your space.
space: The space is joined off to the side of the main house but with its own separate entrance and another exit point in the main bedroom. You have two private exit points all to yourself. The main entrance that leads directly into the kitchen from the carport has some steps as shown in the pictures. In front of the main entrance you have your own private garden that will only be used by you. The open garage with roof is for your use only and fits two cars comfortably. Steps down lead straight into the kitchen so, a very short walk with shopping and kids!The second exit is through the sliding doors in the main bedroom. This drops down to a flat garden for your use only.  You have your own private kitchen, dining area in the kitchen, bedroom, living area/ TV room and bathroom. The space is completely isolated from the main house and private. How many places have two good sized gardens for your use only?
host_about:
I am a Learning Leader in a Catholic School for boys. I love teaching and have had an exciting journey in this profession from a Specialist Leader of Education in the UK to supporting schools and teachers/ Leaders to improve the standards of teaching and learning through the means of quality training and professional support and expertise. I come from a musical family and my heritage is of a Scottish background. My dad plays the Scottish pipes and has played at the Edinburgh Tattoo. I am proud of my family heritage and my family tree and my parents really inspire me and have taught me, that learning is a life long journey that needs to be embraced. My partner is an architect and loves anything to do with buildings! Our son, now coming up to 2 years old, is a lovely, polite and gentle child. He is an outdoors baby and is obsessed with animals! 
We take our hosting seriously and want you to have the best stay possible. Anything we can do to improve your stay, please just ask.

name: Above the clouds Olinda Dandenong Ranges Retreat
summary: Welcome to our house in the sky. With 3.5 acres of private garden and picture perfect views across the Dandenong Ranges, this is perfect place for family getaway or a couples retreat. Also perfect for watching the stars twinkling above the Dandenong Ranges.  We are situated just a 5 minute drive to gorgeous cafes and antique shops for an afternoon wonder or short 10 minutes drive to all the beautiful walks and picnic grounds. Sleep well with luxury Sheridan linen and towels provided.
space: Private house. Wood burning fireplace, spa bath.
host_about:
Hi everyone, 

I love travelling to places with lots of interesting activities yet come back home to somewhere I can rewind and relax. And thats why I loved coming up to our house in the Dandenongs for weekends or school holidays with my family. Now that I am working in banking, we can't come up to enjoy the property as much, so I thought why not share this beautiful place with everyone around the world. 

Hope you have a magical stay and leave refreshed and revived to take on the world. See you soon :)

name: Lovely Room
summary: Unknown
space: In Blackburn / Burwood East  I have two lovely rooms available for just $45 per day or $65 per day for 2 people with a queen-sized bed and fully furnished room!  Please note there is also a $29 cleaning fee.  We can discuss this and I can give you a special offer for long term rental. The house is very conveniently located with plenty of transport and a bus stop right outside! The house is fully furnished with high speed internet and a Queen sized bed in each room.  It's a 5 min walk to the Shopping Complex - Kmart Plaza / Coles on Burwood Hwy and 24/7 shopping! This area is perfect for Uni students as it is just 10-15 mins by tram to Deakin University.  We have generous sized backyard for you to relax in!   The rooms come with a wardrobe and you'll get your own privacy. This is a friendly, easy going household!  There is Wifi, Heating and laundry facilities! Please message Yvonne if you have any further questions!
host_about: This is a friendly, easy going household, you'll be living with 2-3 other people!  Please message Yvonne if you have any further questions!

name: Private room ensuite Southbank,perfect view
summary: The Space This is beautiful and brand new two bed two bath apartment located right next to crown. Your own bathroom is completely private for you. Lovely room comes queen bed, built in closet with mirror & floor-to-ceiling windows to look out over the city. Open kitchen, dining area with balcony. Kitchen is fully equipped and you are most welcome to use it. We provided towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, iron, hangers...etc. And you will love the place.
space: There is a big living room which  has a good view to cbd.
host_about: Easy going tidy man...up to chat and having some beer

name: Waterfront two bedders in the most Iconic Building
summary: The iconic Banksia Building located in the Docklands Area. An amazingly beautiful two bedders on the fourth floor with a very large balcony. Perfect for families with small children, and business people who are participating conferences in the Melbourne City. All essentials are provided, including a coffee machine. Beautifully designed  by an interior designer in Shanghai, and expensive furnitures from local designers.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Beautiful terrace with courtyard in ideal location
summary: You'll love our beautifully renovated terrace in one of Melbourne's most sought after neighbourhoods. GREAT LOCATION - only 20 min on tram or train to the city & 5 min walk to High St Northcote with loads of cafes, bars, restaurants & boutiques. We are on a quiet, leafy street, close to the Merri creek and Merri train station. Light filled rooms with comfortable beds, wooden floor boards, large bath, WIFI, well equipped kitchen overlooking sunny courtyard. Ideal for couples & families.
space: Renovated 1890's terrace, land size 189sqm, internal is 130sqm, so there is lots of room. Light-filled and airy. Wooden floorboards, carpet in bedrooms and terrazzo in kitchen. Great hot water service, good wifi, A/C, oven, stove, TV and a small dishwasher. The washing machine is in the shed. We have two comfy queen size beds in each bedroom with wardrobe and shelf space. An extra blow-up mattress if needed. Our place is super quiet even though we are near many fantastic music venues, bars and restaurants. Terra Madre Health Foods is a huge attraction for the area. Bike riding is so easy in Melbourne. A bike ride down the bicycle  lanes to the city takes 25 mins. The Merri creek walks are stunning. Ceres is a 20 min walk away.
host_about:
Adena and Luisa live in this beautiful house and we'd like to share it with you too!
We both work in the arts and we love to travel. Northcote is the perfect location for your stay in Melbourne with everything that you need at your finger tips. Enjoy Melbourne.

name: Private room in Hawthorn!
summary: This place has the greatest location! Hawthorn Station is at the end of the street and a tram stop at the back of the house. A supermarket, restaurants and all you can need within a 5 minutes walk. 15min walking to Glenferrie Rd and Swinburne Uni.  The area is clean and nice. The house is fully furnished, you will share it with a Mexican guy, a Colombian girl and a Zambia girl, all working and friendly. You will have at your disposal a kitchen, a living room, two bathrooms and a washing machine.
space: The room is clean, spacious and fully furnished. You will count with two fans and a heater at your disposal. The room, as well as the kitchen and the living room are located on the second floor, and you can use all kitchen utensils at your convenience, just remember to maintain shared spaces clean ;)
host_about: Unknown

name: Stylish Albert park apartment 2BDR+WIFI+PARKING
summary: This stylish apartment has a spacious living & dining area, fully equipped kitchen, 2 large bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 powder room, 1 balcony and 1 parking space. It is located right next to Albert Park, You will enjoy having some of the best Cafés at your doorstep, a fresh morning run around the lake. 3 minutes walk to Domain Interchange Tram Stop with a quick access to the CBD, South Yarra, St Kilda and everything Melbourne has to offer.
space: Centrally located between the CBD, Southbank, the Arts Precinct and St Kilda, this is one of the most sought after area in Melbourne, it has pretty much everything Melbourne has to offer. Great restaurants, bars, nightlife, entertainment and well as the famous Botanical Gardens, Albert Park Lake, The National Gallery, Crown casino, South Melbourne Market, Chapel street shops, Rod Laver Arena and MCG - all within easy reach. Finished to an extremely high standard, ultra-modern and sleek, This stylish 2 bedroom apartment is a showcase of sophisticated inner city living with key features including:  * Spacious open plan living area * Fully equipped kitchen with top quality appliances, cooking and dining ware. * Integrated Fridge/Freezer * Large bedrooms with BIRs * Comfortable mattress & quality 1000TC linens * Washing machine, dryer and iron. * Ducted heating and cooling system * American Oak Timbers floors through out the property * Secure underground parking * Balcony with views across
host_about: Unknown

name: Room In Modern Brunswick East Apartment
summary: I live in a lovely first floor apartment, balcony right on Lygon St, in Brunswick East.  One of the coolest suburbs in the inner city, only 5kms from downtown. The location is amazing - every service you'd want right at the doorstep (a tramline, shops, bars, restaurants). 17 minutes to get to the city by tram. The apartment itself is lovely, timber floorboards, open plan living area, large balcony (with a view of the city). Unlimited NBN internet. Modern kitchen appliances. Laundry.
space: The apartment is a relatively modern two bedroom apartment. Smallish rooms (3m x 3m approx). Open plan living area. Large balcony looking out on to Lygon St, with a view of the city.
host_about: Hi there. Emmanuel here. I live in Melbourne, am a 38 year old professional. I travel a bit for work and also for holidays. Around Australia and also around the world. I’m polite, respectful of other people’s spaces. An all round great guy!

name: Historic Stables and Garden
summary: Newly converted with many original details, our beautiful self contained brick Stables date from the 1880's and belong to the rich history of the area. A stones throw from both Kensington and Flemington it's just 10  minutes to the city CBD. The stables has it's own private entrance - and looks out onto it's own garden.
space: Our stables have been loving restored and converted into a light, warm, one bedroom townhouse with a private garden courtyard. There's a nice big and comfy Danish sofa bed in the living room, a laundry and fully kitted out kitchen. We also have a single bed that slides under the main bed upstairs - perfect for families travelling with one child. We also have a high chair and a baby gate for the stairs if needed. Please note we do have skylights in the bedroom so although there are curtains if you have small children that need a full black out room to sleep this will not give you that.

Victoria-

It located within a rather lush apartment building with lots of greenery and an elevator (which makes travel with a suitcase a little easier!) The apartment is on the 3rd and top floor, and it faces north - which means we get great sun from sunrise till late afternoon.

I speak English, can somehow read French, and have some German capabilities (written/ spoken) - but it's pretty limited!

name: Inner City Home near Yarraville Village
summary: Welcome to our little oasis in the heart of Yarraville! Enjoy the true Melbourne life in one of the best (and most cafe and coffee filled) areas, on the edge of the city. Less than a 10 minute walk into the Yarraville village - known for its village-vibe, cafes, art-deco Sun Theatre, wine bars, restaurants, and just a quick train ride into the city, Fully equipped cosy home with AC/heating, great kitchen, large living room, and sunny north-facing back garden (including big veggie garden).
space: We are long time users of airbnb but first time hosts!  You will have full use of the house. Our circa 1910 house has a modern interior and decorations. We are big cooks and entertainers so our kitchen has plenty for you to enjoy - including Kitchen Aid, Magimix, and other accessories which will help you cook up a storm! We have put a lot of work into our back garden and vegetable patch - no doubt there will be something in there for you to enjoy during your time at our home - or simply enjoy the sunny backyard. - Free WIFI - Evaporative cooling (air conditioner) + ducted heating - TV with Apple TV - Plenty of books and cook books to read - Fully equipped kitchen  - Music system including Sonos - Indoor + outdoor dining tables - Gas and charcoal Weber BBQs for summer dinners - Vegetable patch with lots of home grown veggies - On street (permit) parking
host_about:
I am a lawyer, living in Yarraville with my fiancé Dave.

Dave and I have been using airbnb since 2012 - and have travelled far and wide staying in airbnb accommodation of all shapes and sizes!

We love to cook, entertain, and to travel. We lived in Switzerland for over two years - during which time we did lots of amazing travel through Europe.

Now we are back settled in Melbourne and enjoying the culture and food that the city has to offer! We love spending our weekends trying out new cafes and restaurants, or surfing down the coast.

name: 1BD Artist's Apartment in the Heart of Collingwood
summary: Artist's apartment in uber cool Collingwood, just off smith Smith Street - home to the best bars and restaurants in Melbourne.  With Melbourne's world famous art, live music, cafes, unique shops and trams to the city, Northcote and St Kilda on your doorstep, my place is the perfect base of anyone looking to explore all this great city has to offer!
space: Building:  - Modern low-rise in the heart of Collingwood  - Elevator in the building Amenities: - Professionally cleaned - Hotel-quality high thread-count bed linen and towels - 24/7 check-in - Fully-equipped kitchen - Private balcony Kitchen: - Fully-equipped - Oven - Cooktop - Fridge - Dishwasher Bedroom: - Comfortable Queen Size bed - Hotel quality bed linens Bathrooms - Separate bathroom with walk in shower
host_about: Visual Artist my website is (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: YESSIE Flemington | 1BR + study | Wifi + Parking
summary: YESSIE Flemington is a lovely place on the 2nd floor of a small & secure apartment building with undercover parking.  The apartment features one bedroom with a comfortable queen bed, good sized bathroom w/shower, balcony with city views,  kitchen with stovetop, oven, microwave, laundry facilities, small study room with desk, lounge (sofabed) with flatscreen TV & AC unit, dining table.  Only short walking distance to  Flemington Racecourse, Melbourne Showgrounds and Racecourse Rd eateries!
space: The apartment is located on  the 2nd level topfloor of the building. It is light and bright with a balcony with city views. The queen bed is comfortable for 2 guests, convert the sofa into an extra bed for a 3rd guest (bedding & linen supplied)! Bathroom with shower, washing machine & clothes dryer provided. Great study niche with desk, Wifi included. Convenient undercover parking on secure building premises.
host_about:
Hi there, we are bnbpal, and we are here to help hosts make your trip great. We work with a number of hosts in Melbourne, all of whom have one thing in common, they want their guests to enjoy a 5-star stay. 

To help our hosts, we cater for all your needs. Just let us know whether you are on a business trip, or on a romantic getaway, and we will make sure your trip runs smoothly and you want to return again.

During your stay you will have a dedicated bnbpal point of contact who can help you out with anything. Arranging airport transfers, a restaurant recommendation, whatever you might need is just a phone call or text away.

name: Sophia - Eclectic 2 Bdrm Apt That Feels Like Home
summary: This chic, eclectic two-bedroom apartment is located in a prime location on Collins Street in a heritage-listed building. Being nearby Flinders and Southern Cross Station, you are in a perfect spot to explore Melbourne. You will find the apartment to perfectly reflect Melbourne’s creative and diverse culture. Accentuated with warm woods and saturated colors throughout the entire apartment, we are sure you will feel home in no time and don’t ever want to leave!
space: Living Space The living room has huge, cozy couch which makes the room super comfortable. Tall ceilings, lots of greenery and warm colours provide a sense of airiness and creativity. Many different styles and elements of art are coming together in this room creating one harmonious, relaxing space. Feel free to lift up your legs, enjoy Netflix on the Smart TV or listen to your favourite tunes through the high-quality kardon/harman speakers we provide. The living room also features a small creative space for those needing to get some work done or simply wanting to read a good book.  A split-system is also featured in the living room, so you can adjust the temperature to one suiting you.  Sleeping Space Two lovely decorated bedrooms, both equipped with super comfortable queen-sized beds and more than enough wardrobe space for you to use. The beds have a mixture of textures to make your nights rest more enjoyable. Modern decoration elements meet traditional pictures and art and the warm li
host_about:
LittleStay is a boutique short stay company specialising in homemade hospitality. We are passionate about traveling, exploring, and sharing. Bitten by the travel bug when we were young, we love to jump on a plane and explore the world. Spending our days and nights away from home with new friends, exchanging our experiences, and building new unforgettable memories. LittleStay is here to help create those memories. 

That's the idyllic part, but in our real life we all have bills, mortgages and obligations that we wish we could leave at home and don't have to travel with.

Consequentially LittleStay was born to help with that dream, a company that allow people like us and others to travel, live, experience or start a new life without the everyday struggle of life back “home”.

LittleStay wants you to feel comfortable entrusting us with your largest asset. We will consider your home our home while we manage it. It is our reputation on the line if something is amiss. We do not take that lightly.  LittleStay wants you to be a part of our LittleFamily. We value your partnership and thusly, if you are holidaying and want to stay at one of our properties, you’ll receive insider rates. You can even reserve your own property for your family and friends that are visiting. 

We take care of virtually everything. Our level of cleaning is second to none. Our customer service is beyond compare. Our commitment to you, the owner, our guest, our community is unquestionable. 

We believe a happy home is a filled home so if you have a property that is not happy, please contact us to see how we can help you. 

Or if you're one of our amazing guests helping us, please let us know how we can make your stay more enjoyable. 

Warmest Regards
The LittleStay Team

name: Sun Kissed Apartment in Melbourne's Inner West
summary: Soak up the sun this north-facing apartment in central Footscray. The open-plan space is outfitted with elegant, Scandinavian-style furniture and adorned with a variety of cheerful plants, which thrive in this sunny environment.
space: ☆ Not yet an Airbnb member? Use this link to receive a credit off your first stay: www.airbnb.com.au/c/vcarson12   Welcome to CHARLIE, a modern, secure and private 4th floor apartment setup to provide everything you'll need to be self sustainable during your trip to Melbourne.  It suits guests looking for a central place in (or around) Footscray visiting friends or family, working locally, attending Victoria University or Footscray Hospital. It is also a great fit for those coming to the city for a longer stay, and don't mind staying three stops (20 minutes) out of the CBD.  FEATURES: • Unlimited high speed Wi-Fi (>11 mbps) supplied by the NBN. • Sleeps four in two comfortable queen size beds with quality bed linen. Both bedrooms feature blackout blinds and large wardrobes to store your luggage out of the way. • 43" smart HDTV with complimentary Netflix connected to a multi purpose sound bar allowing you to pump the latest movie, sportscast, podcast or playlist around the apartment. •
host_about:
G'day & welcome, as I’m sure you’ve noticed my name's Vincent, though feel free to call me Vince, Vinnie, or Vincenzo! If you've made it here, check out the links below to the listings I host and if you do book with me, you'll be in for a great Airbnb stay! I look forward to hosting you! 
 
MY AIRBNB LISTINGS:
https://www.airbnb.com.au/users/2246291/listings
 
WANT TO HOST YOURSELF?
Use the following referral to get yourself up and running: www.airbnb.com.au/r/vcarson12 
 
AIRBNB HOSTING STORY:
I dived into the world of full time hosting in November (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , after a restructure at my former employer prompted me to explore an idea which had been kicking around in my head since (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 
 
I’ve since hosted over 300 groups, however I still feel like I'm just getting started, with more ideas than hours in the day! My current plans are for four listings spread around Melbourne, each offering different experiences and styled in different ways, each reflecting a little part of my personality.
 
My hosting style is all about:
— Providing great spaces to guests which surpass expectations 
— Taking the stress out of arriving in a new city by providing clear directions, self check in instructions & being very responsive with communication,
— Sharing local insights on Melbourne and its surroundings, so as to provide guests with a local experiences, and to enable them to discover things they may not have found sticking to the usual tourist haunts.
 
A LITTLE MORE ABOUT ME:
I was born in Melbourne, have lived in the Pilbara (Western Australia), have flown around the world a couple of times, am very good with airport security, and have an affinity for problem solving, organising spaces and improving things.
 
I have lived full time in the world's most liveable city since (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and love the coffee culture, craft beer, amazing food and street art the city has to offer - I'm looking forward to sharing this knowledge with my guests through my guidebooks.
 
AIRBNB TRAVEL STORY:
I first stayed with Airbnb in their hometown of San Francisco in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Since then I’ve stayed in peoples homes in Sydney, Munich, New York, Vancouver, Tulum, Mexico City, Courmayeur, Beaune & Amsterdam. I love being able to stay in uniques spaces, meet interesting hosts and explore neighbourhoods off the tourist track.

Rockmans apartments have modern european kitchens plus free Wi-Fi and  Foxtel plus free on site parking. Security doors,lovely garden with BBQ facility. Our apartments are occupied with carers who have people at the Alfred Hospital and Airbnb this makes for a quite and safe environment.

name: Beautiful apartment in South Yarra
summary: Our apartment is located in the heart of the No.1 Suburb of Melbourne, South Yarra; a stone’s throw from the city, and the best shopping and eating in Melbourne.  The place is approximately 70m2, in an art-deco block of 4 with two large bedrooms, one bathroom, a kitchen, living and dining room and a huge shared courtyard out the back to enjoy in the warmer months. Your Super Hosts Adam + Gemma have received over 40 5 Star reviews and also have another AMAZING listing in the CBD. Check it out!
space: We have designed a modern, spacious and newly furnished two bedroom apartment perfect for stays of any length and time.  The place is decorated with artworks from aspiring young Australian Artists curtesy of the Ten Cubed philanthropic family gallery in Malvern Road, Glen Iris. All the furniture and bedding has also been handpicked by an upcoming designer in the Melbourne scene.   The main living room is very welcoming and comfortable with a big couch, kitchen table and chairs and vinyl record player from Adam’s personal collection. The kitchen is stocked with all cooking equipment and few necessities to get you going.  The two bedrooms are large at approximately 20m2 with all brand-new furniture, including Queen size Sealy Posturepedic Energise Medium mattresses (153 x 204 cm), Jasmine Silk pillows and duvet and top quality linen & towels to complement the perfect night’s sleep.  There is also a huge, private courtyard at the back of the property which you are welcome to use and share
host_about:
My wife Gemma and I are back from four years living in Europe (Amsterdam and London) and travelling South America. Inspired from our previous listing in Clerkenwell, London (5 star rating from 26 reviews), we have rented our home in South Yarra and recently uploaded our second listing in the heat of Melbourne's CBD!.

We have received over 70 5 STAR REVIEWS and have been acknowledged the Airbnb Community as SUPER HOSTS.  

We are late twenties, Melbourne born and bred, and big supporters of the sharing economy. We welcome travelers from all walks of life to come and share our home with us, and have the opportunity to experience Melbourne like a local. 

We can't wait to meet you.

space: Unknown
host_about:
Faith, family & friends best describe my love for life
I enjoy travelling, discovering other peoples' way of life, interactions with diversified community is a continuous education, learn about their history, visiting Museums whenever possible.

I consider myself as kind, trustworthy, honest, respectable, resourceful, organized and clean.

I prefer staying with others for accommodation when travelling, not only cheaper but staying with locals also may help me to easily learn about the community, points of interest, the locals practices.

  I am  considerate, respectful and sensitive of others expectations. I abide by the hosts' house policies the same way  I expect my guests do the same.

I use all modes of transport when travelling. Airplanes, boats; cars; trains etc.

The many years of travelling and staying in various kind and styles of accommodation has given me knowledge on being a host. Finding out what works, what's lacking during my travels equipped me with  ideas on the "Do's and Don't's"  on being a host.

I am happy being a host with Airbnb. I find it easy and comfortable doing business with them. 

"I may not pass this way again, in good terms I want you to remember my name"

I am not able to answer any questions or accept any reservation without this information, so please make sure this is included in your profile and enquiry message. Thank you! **  *Ensure you have read the FULL listing, so you are not disappointed by location or amenity and  you accept the house rules.' The room has a double bed, dresser, armchair, lots of wardrobe storage and big windows. The room is secure as it has its own lock.  You will share the bathroom and kitchen with myself and occasionally one other Airbnb guests, who maybe staying in the living room of the apartment, a

name: Charming 2BR Apt. Fitzroy Oasis Close to CBD.
summary: So you want to be close to the CBD and hang out in one of Melbourne's coolest pockets? This is the place for you!  Offering a modern 2 bedroom spacious apartment overlooking a beautiful garden and pool. Great for business or holiday stays.
space: This renovated, spacious and sophisticated 2 bedroom apartment is located in the heart of North Fitzroy, one of Melbourne's most desirable inner city suburbs. Solid brick and over looking a stunning garden, tranquility is yours.   The bedrooms have built in robs and the beds and pillows are good quality and comfortable.  The kitchen is appointed with modern appliances and formal dining area with a six person dining table.  With all the modern conveniences, this is the perfect base to explore Melbourne or stay in and relax in the garden or by the pool. The apartment is within close proximity to food, shops and some of Melbourne’s best restaurants. It’s fully furnished, secure, clean, and ready for you. LOCATION Only 3 km to Melbourne CBD  500 meters to Edinburgh Gardens 4.5 km to the MCG and Australian Open Tennis Arena  3 km to Yarra River 2 km to Melbourne Zoo and Princess Park Short distance to some of Melbourne's best cafes and restaurants in Carlton, Fitzroy and Brunswick and CBD.

host_about: Hola! Soy Clau, soy de Mexico y vivo en Australia actualmente. Tengo una licenciatura en psicología y me encanta viajar y conocer gente nueva.

name: Private room in cosy and stylish apartment
summary: Our cosy apartment is located in the heart of the southeast areas so you`ll easily be able to get around Melbourne and surroundings. Staying at our place will be extremely relaxing and enjoyable and you can rely on me and my partner for any question or just for a friendly talk. Short and long term stays are available for either couples, solo adventurers or business travellers. Feel free to message me for more info.
space: Me and my partner have been furnishing our apartment following our principles of sustainability and waste reducing. The beauty of our place is the result of upcycling so, while staying with us, the house will tell you countless stories and you will feel at home.
host_about:
I am easy going and very reliable. One of  the things I love doing the most is making people feeling comfortable and always at home. 
I hope to meet you soon... :-)

name: Spacious 1BR With Contemporary Edge
summary: Airy and Unique 1 bedroom with a Contemporary edge, in the very heart of Richmond's shopping/cafe precinct.
space: Large windows fill the open living/dining area floorplan with natural light and concrete floors give the apartment a unique, contemporary 'industry' feel.  The kitchen comes with fully integrated fridge and washing machine, along with a coffee machine for your use and bathroom features a marble vanity and striking frameless bath. The room adjoining to the open living area has a useable washing machine and desk space, the bedroom is light and airy. We have a beautiful fighting fish called Larry, all he requires is a small pinch of food morning and night. Update 31st August, 2016: Our bedroom and living has room has been upgraded. The bedroom now has a larger double bed, with a high quality deluxe mattress and sturdy frame. Additionally, there is also a bigger TV and prettier cupboards, night stands etc. The living room has been redesigned to feature a long white table next to the window. The perfect, sunny workstation! :)
host_about:
I'm a pretty dedicated globetrotter, and love traveling, or even just relocating and making it work. I'm a tech guy through and through, and have been self employed (running a software - marketing company) since I was 14... funnily enough after getting denied for a job KFC. 

I'm not one for mass consumerism, but much prefer spending money on experiences and memories rather than items. Though, we all have certain vices right? :)

No judgement in any respect, I believe that everybody has their own path in life, and mistakes only come from when one tries to take somebody else path as your own.

Interests: writing, skateboarding, piano, investments & business, pharmacology & neuroscience and anything that fuels societal progression and human development. 

Life motto: Keep on keepin' on

name: Three Bedroom, Townhouse in Healesville
summary: Our place is a short stroll to town, one the children can enjoy as you wander down to grab a coffee (think Habitual), hit the park, enjoy a pizza (Innocent Bystander) or for something more formal  head to (Giant Steps) or lets not forget the iconic Healesville Hotel. A modern townhouse, allowing space to sprawl out, offering plenty of room for the children to play, whilst you enjoy the afternoon sun, a good book or the paper and a glass of one of the Yarra Valley's many wines.
space: Our place is a three bedroom home with a generous kitchen/living/dining area and a second lounge/parents retreat. Opening onto one of three decks overlooking a small/secure landscaped garden of ornamental pear trees, Japanese maple's,  magnolias and much more.  With just enough room to kick the ball with the kids or sit back and enjoy the surroundings. With lots of toys and books, a porta cot for the babe, side rail for the toddler's bed and a highchair, we are completely kid friendly. We even have a scooter and plastic trike that your little ones are welcome to use. Room to sleep 5 guests and a baby as a portacot is available.
host_about: Unknown

name: MODERN PRIVATE STUDIO-Wetland Views
summary: #NAME?
space: Our Location: What makes our place special to us is that it is located in a quiet street adjacent to a nature reserve. We enjoy the serenity that surrounds us, the wetland views and the birdlife and yet still being close to the city.  The studio: what we like about the studio is that it is fully self contained, modern with good quality appliances. - Fully self-contained studio at the back of the main house, detached, above the garage - private bathroom - fully equipped kitchen with cooker, oven, fridge/freezer,microwave - king size bed with hotel quality mattress - flat screen TV with DVD player - air-conditioning (heating/cooling) - washing machine, dining table and office desk - FREE tea and coffee - FREE linen and towels The studio accommodates 2 adults, no additional guests. If you are travelling with small child/children and you would like to bring your own port-a-cot, children under 2 will be free of charge. Children aged between 2 and 12 are $10 per child.
host_about:
Hello and Welcome!
We are  a professional couple from Germany and Croatia with our little son.
We look forward to welcome you in our studio apartment, a little sanctuary away from home with beautiful views on to the Point Cook wetlands with its bird and other wildlife.
We love to travel and getting to know people from all parts of the world. From our own travel experiences we liked the places we stayed to be clean, tidy and of good quality and this is what we would like to offer to you, too.

name: EARTH MUD STRAW
summary: The straw bale structure makes you feel warm and secure. One large room with open plan kitchen and comfortable bed, shower with sustainable compost toilette in seperate room as part of the same structure.  Stunning views onto surrounding hills of the Yarra Valley in a peaceful rural setting.  My property is surrounded by farm land, mostly strawberry farming. It can get a bit noisy when the farmers are working the land.  Enjoy Earth Mud Straw as a place with a difference, or two.
space: Earth Mud Straw is only 2.5 km away from the centre of Healesville. It takes a  half hour walk or 3 mins by car. There is a Coles supermarket, lots of restaurants, cafes and parks in the immediate area.
host_about: Down to earth, German born, living environmentally conscious life with solar power, rain water, minimal waste. We have 4 chooks, that love being pet and are very appreciative of yummy food scraps. I work part time as a Theatre nurse. I live here with my partner Soren and my two children and our ginger cat Meggs.

name: Board by the night $58 double room - free wifi
summary: Room or Temporary Accommodation available ( family accommodation available). Enquire with your  host if you require breakfast ( not included in the room price.) Cooked Breakfast $20.00 per person.  Beautifully furnished, warm and spacious deluxe double bed room. Alpaca bedding & electric blanket available. Move around a farm of alpacas, sheep, chickens & a pony. Leave the noise of the city behind. Have a good nights sleep at this quiet location. 60 sq home in a semi rural suburb - Strathtulloh
space: Set in a large semi-modern home, this accommodation has been a winner with international guests for the past 10 years.  Guests are treated with a warm welcome and freedom to move about. A large, spacious and colourful meals area is a bonus and is one of the best features of the home. A 5 minute drive to the main shopping of Melton and less to the station; located in the South of Melton South. The property is on the Corner of Ferris road and the Strathtulloh Circuit, Strathtulloh. A comfortable country train (V-Line train) leaves from Melton station directly into the City of Melbourne; approximately every hour during non-peak times. Travel time is about 40 minutes from Melton to Southern Cross Station.  A V-line train also runs from Melton station, in the opposite direction to the West, to the historical City of Ballarat and beyond.
host_about: I am very friendly, warm and caring person with an outgoing personality. I run my farm on my own. I am a petite person with a lot of energy. I do not smoke nor drink alcohol but I have no problem with people that do both or either.  I welcome all nationalities and their cultures. I have travelled extensively over the past seven years to countries like the U.K. Ireland, Scotland,  England, Wales, Switzerland, France, United States, China, Vietnam, Japan, Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia.  I will welcome you with open arms and a friendly smile and treat you like a part of my family. You can have as much or as little of my attention as you like.

At my place guests will experience the unique Melbourne home design and our style of living, so that it will remains in their memories forever. And this is the gift I like to bring for my guests. 
As a guest, what could be worst then arriving at the Airbnb and find that the host has cancelled your booking! Your previous time which can be used to explore the city is now spend calling Airbnb and fanatically looking for another accommodation. You may even ended up blowing your travel budget because what's available in the last minute is higher than what you originally booked.

Booking with me means you will have a peace of mind and much lesser chance of having your booking cancelled.

name: Spacious Federation Terrace in Prahran!
summary: Stay in our federation house in the beautiful suburb of Windsor, next to Prahran and South Yarra. Situated on a quiet side street in arguably Melbourne's best suburb, enjoy this spacious house as a hub for your next Melbourne adventure! We are a 3 minute walk to Windsor train station (10 minutes on a train to the city), 2 minutes to tram stops, 1 minute to buzzing Chapel Street with hundreds of Melbourne's best cafe's, shops, restaurants and bars to choose from.
space: We have both a nice backyard with barbecue, and massive rooftop balcony to enjoy the sunshine! We have a large living area which receives plenty of afternoon sunshine, joining onto a good sized kitchen. There is a separate dining room, and a large foyer, so plenty of spaces to find some peace and quiet in the house. There are 2 bedrooms upstairs, one queen and one double with a WC in one bedroom.  We also have an outdoor laundry.
host_about:
My wife and I are both Sydney born and raised, but 5+ years in Melbourne has won us over. We'll always call Sydney home but have fallen in love with the easy pace, great food and drink, culture and sport that Melbourne has to offer.

We've stayed in beautiful houses and apartments with Air BnB in New York, Turkey, London, Rome and southern France, and around Australia, and are keen to return the favour!

I live by the ocean and love the outdoors. 
I am a traveller.

I think if you travel you just need your credit card, your passport, a change of underwear and your toothbrush. So I guess they are the 4 things I can't do without. The fifth would be good friends who bring me laughter and love.

name: NEW Modern, bright and open apartment
summary: Modern, bright and open 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Richmond.  If you’re looking for a stylish and cosy stay in inner city Melbourne, then you’ve found the spot! This warm and inviting apartment is a short walk to Bridge Road, The Yarra Trail and many beautiful parks and shops.
space: The apartment has an open plan kitchen and living area with a mounted TV (Netflix included), very comfortable sofa and an island bench, perfect for enjoying a cheese platter and wine. The timber flooring and white stone finishes add to the bright and stylish nature of the apartment. There is one main bedroom (Queen) with an en suite bathroom and a smaller bedroom (King Single) with floor to ceiling windows which overlook Richmond and the Dandenong Ranges. The lighting and views are absolutely beautiful at sunrise and sunset. Due to the floor to ceiling windows, the apartment can become very warm in summer. There is an air-conditioning unit in the apartment that cools it down, but please ensure you keep the blinds down throughout the day to prevent the rooms from becoming warm.
host_about:
I am new to the Airbnb game! It was an easy decision for me as I love hosting people and welcoming them into my space. I'm a full-time secondary school teacher. So getting away overseas on the school holidays is a must for me! I tend to chase the sun as much as possible, as I love the beach and warmth.

I play in bands and see live gigs as often as possible. Music is an important part of my life.

I am a registered nurse working in a Radiology practice and live in beautiful South Melbourne
I have two sons one of which lives in Melbourne and one who currently lives on the Gold Coast Qld.
I love walking along the beach, reading and travelling.
I love experiencing new cultures, food and getting to know different people from all around the world.

name: Healesville Yarra Valley Cottage
summary: The cottage is a small self contained cabin on a picturesque property. It is simple, comfortable, clean and private. This space is perfect for people  looking for a quiet stay in a rural location with access to all the Yarra Valley offers.
space: Comfy private self contained cabin set on 3 hectare rural property. A short 5 min drive from the picturesque town of Healesville, renowned for its wildlife sanctuary, bush walks, food and wine and burgeoning arts scene. The location provides easy access to town, but in a rural and picturesque setting The cabin is one bed/sitting room with ensuite bathroom and a really nice deck looking out over a vast expanse of lawn. It has a comfy double bed with electric blanket,and there is tea and snack making facilities, mobile phone coverage, ipod dock, and CD player.We are happy to loan from our CD collection during your stay. The room isn't huge, but it is cosy and comfortable, with a  floor to ceiling window next to the bed so that you can lie in bed and look out to the mountains. Most times you will get to see mobs of kangaroos grazing on the lawn. It is situated far enough away from the house for privacy without feeling abandoned. If you're up for the walk into town it is a 30 min walk, or
host_about:
Karen & Michael live on a 4 acre property with two grown sons, their Australian Terrier and a range of assorted wildlife, including a mob of kangaroos, marauding wombat and the occasional echidna. 
They have a strong connection to community, and love living in this part of the world. 
Karen loves to read, paint, and create things, as well as playing in a ukele band with 4 friends. Michael loves football,music, and with his background in horticulture is in charge of the garden at the property. which consists of open space as well as a vegetable garden and range of fruit trees.
They have both travelled extensively, but travelling has been on hold for a few years now. They love meeting new people

name: Amazing Accommodations: Standard Studio
summary: Its a Studio apartment with full kitchen , private balcony and a smart bed that can be fold away if required.
space: Its a nice self contained studio apartment. It has a full size fridge, cooking utensils, a washing machine/dryer combo, a queen bed and a balcony. On the top floor there are couple of spas, outdoor decking area, big screen tv etc. for guests to enjoy.
host_about:
I love travelling. I have travelled extensively around the world(India, China, Thailand, Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Brazil are a few to name) and also lived in many different cities around the globe. 

While travelling, I always felt that there is dearth of affordable home-like places to stay. So, when I returned back to Melbourne, I decided to bridge the gap. All my apartments are furnished with standard size fridge, washing machine, dryer, microwaves, kitchen and kitchenette etc. to give you a home-like feeling. 
This is my small business which I  run more  from heart than mind. You don't have to look at the watch before contacting me. I will try my best to make sure that you have a  great stay in one of my apartment.

name: Stunning St Kilda Bayside Apartment

space: Welcome to the Ivy Apartments, I'm sure your stay will be amazing! This modern apartment has everything you need to make your stay in St Kilda a memorable one! St Kilda comes alive over summer and you are in the best location for everything it offers!  The apartments has an open plan living, dining, kitchen area that looks over a private tropical courtyard. If you don't want to go to one of the many restaurants in st Kilda the kitchen is decked out with Miele appliances and all the essentials to cook up a storm.  You also have a Nespresso coffee machine and plenty of pods for your morning fix. There will also be some treats in the fridge for you, mineral water, juice and some goodies for breakfast. The bedrooms have really comfy Queen size beds in each. The bathrooms have beautiful mosaic tiles, nice fluffy towels, Aesop body wash and huge shower heads so you feel like you are in a rain forest. There is free WIFI throughout the apartment and a phone for local calls. If you just want a
host_about:
I have been a St Kilda local for years, there is so much here to do, see, eat and drink!
I have put together a brochure of all my favorite local places, I'm sure you will love them as I do......

name: 1 Bedroom Apt near the Casino (RS2803)
summary: This is a self-contained 1 Bedroom/1 Bathroom apartment with sea views.    The master bedroom includes a queen size bed with built in robes. This    apartment is well-equipped with a full kitchen with convection    microwave, fridge, dishwasher, stove top cooking facilities and    european style laundry facilities (Washer/Dryer). It offers a dining    and lounge area with a 42-inch flat-screen TV including 30+ Foxtel    channels. It features a fully reversed cycle air conditioner and a    superior quality mattress. There is a secure entrance and elevator    access in the building. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi. All the guests are    provided fresh clean towels and linen as well as complementary guest    amenities on arrival.  Size: 5 m2.    Amenities: Hair Dryer, DVD, TV, air conditioning, Queen size bed, Cribs Available, Free Local Telephone Calls, Wireless Internet;  Bathroom, Bedroom, Kitchen
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Beachfront pad- Modern Stylish St. Kilda
summary: Welcome to our modern, stylish and recently renovated apartment! With incredible views overlooking the beach, this one bedroom apartment is located in a secure complex in trendy St Kilda. The beach is just outside your door and it's only a short walk to St Kilda’s best bars, cafes, restaurants and local tram stops, giving you the opportunity to explore Melbourne and the surrounding areas! The apartment has everything you could need for your stay and is warm, cosy and spacious.
space: The space Bedroom: The bedroom is fitted with a comfortable queen sized bed and topped with hotel quality linen and towels, professionally cleaned after every stay. The built-in wardrobes contain hangers, shelving, an iron and ironing board and enough space to store your luggage. Living Room: Relax on our comfortable couch in front of a flat screen smart TV and Bluetooth stereo. Balcony: Soak up Melbourne’s four-seasons-in-a-day weather! From the lounge room, you can access the spacious balcony through the double glazed sliding doors. Take in the epic view of the beach while enjoying a wine! Kitchen: Our fully-equipped kitchen comes complete with an oven, cook top, dishwasher, cooking utensils, appliances (microwave, nespresso machine, kettle, toaster), a fridge and basic pantry supplies for those times when you just want a home cooked meal. Carpark: For those with a car, yes, this apartment does come with its own carpark. Located under the apartment, the carpark is secure and easy to
host_about: Australians who luckily get to do a little travel with work.

name: Charming and full of character Room 1
summary: This 4 bedroom 2.5 bathroom characteristic home has everything to offer. With its cathedral style ceilings it is the perfect place to relax or have a quiet evening. Located on a quite little street, close to public transport, and eateries.
space: Cathedral style ceilings, tiled floors throughout, large backyard, under cover car parking space, plenty of space. Close to Werribee Zoo, Werribee Mansion, Racecourse, Equestrian Centre, Wyndham Harbour or beaches, great place to start or finish The Great Ocean Road trip, Avalon Airport, Wineries and shopping centres. Perfect for single travelers, couples, business people, visiting family or friends, people attending conferences in Geelong, events in the local area, City or the Werribee Uni Vet Clinic. There is one medium to large dog and one cat that lives on the property. Both are house trained and very well behaved as I am also a dog trainer. Tea & coffee, sugar, butter, cooking oil, tomato sauce, salt & pepper will be supplied.
host_about:
I enjoy a good laugh, not a party animal at home, but I do like going to live pub bands, comedy nights, camping, board games and social tennis. Also enjoy being a dog instructor for the last 4 years.
Have been to Fiji, North to South along the East coast of America. Would love to go to Japan and the UK. I do a bit of camping around Australia and love going for a couple of weeks here and there with my dog.
Running my own Pet Minding Business takes up most of my time and I love doing it. 
My hobbies are European style board games and go to a meet up every week as well as social tennis.
Favourite TV shows are Game of Thrones, Supernatural, The Big Bang Theory, The Stranger Things, Heroes. There are heaps more but I'm not going to list all of them.
The biggest part of my life is my dog (Akira). She is very well trained and very sweet so there will be no problems with her except she is not a hugger :)
My Airbnb guests are to feel welcome and safe. I do live at the property, so am more then happy to help in anyway I can with information about the area but I'm not the kind of person that is in your hair as I'm in and out all the time.

name: Creative relaxation in best part of Melbourne
summary: Our place is close to  some of the coolest cafes, bars and streets in Melbourne. You’ll love the ambiance and the neighbourhood.  The light filled room with a comfy bed is good for couples and solo adventurers. So close to everything to see and do in Melbourne with great transport options. Whatever your plans in Melbourne you will love staying in Collingwood!
space: Welcome to a creative, light-filled space, nestled in a redesigned Distillery in Collingwood. Full of character, this apartment is set inside two old silos. This property and the neighbouring buildings are full of charm and grace. The space is adorned with local artworks and filled with indoor plants, making for a tranquil getaway.  We offer a room with wardrobe, lots of hanging space and storage, a comfortable double bed with designer linen and fresh towels. It is your haven of uncluttered calm. You are very close to the city attractions, but tucked away from the hustle and bustle, in this comfortable and well-equipped apartment.  It is a 5-Minute walk to the bustling Smith St, 10-Minutes to Brunswick St and a 5-minute stroll to two different tram-lines running directly to the City. The famous Melbourne tram network takes about 10-minutes to make its way into the CBD, so a very convenient way to see the city, while experiencing the Café’s, Bars and Shopping that Fitzroy and Collingwoo
host_about: Hey, we are Andrew and Tom, your hosts. Originally from Australia, we have relocated to the UK in 2018. Andrew works as a researcher and podcaster in the Arts, studying male dancers and connecting communities. Tom is an actor and performance artist who has a great love of theatre and film. We have been through Eastern Europe, Iceland, UK, the US (NYC, LA, San Fran, etc.) Japan, Fiji, New Zealand, India, Germany, Turkey, Vietnam, Cambodia, Thailand and other places along the way. We love cooking and good food (and an occasional great wine). We eat mostly Vegetarian and love a well brewed coffee. We both have a strong love of the arts, with theatre, dance and performance art being some of our strongest passions. As much as we love living in the city, we have a deep appreciation of the bush (or woods, depending where you come from) and being surrounded by nature, be it a nice garden, a secluded beach or lost in the middle of a national park. So much more, lets have a tea and a chat!

name: City View! Southern Cross Nearby! Private room
summary: Super city views!! Free car park!! Brand new apartment!! Convenient location!! About the location My apartment is close to: * Southern Cross Station * Flagstaff Station * Airport Sky Bus Station * Free Tram Zone  * CBD * Queen Victoria Market  * Flagstaff Gardens * Docklands All the places mentioned above just spend you 4-8 minutes to get there(on foot).
space: Brand new contemporary apartment is situated in a convenient place with 180 °stunning views from 21st floor looking over Melbourne city and Docklands. It’s very suitable for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers!! *This listing is a private room( not a entire place). You will share  the other facilities in the apartment with host (I live in the other room of the apartment) . *Luggage deposit service (only after check-out): For example, if you will be back to Melbourne after you check out in a few days, you can leave your luggage to me. One for $10 per day and Large one for $15 per day, there is a discount over 3 days. It is absolutely below the market price, but we need to discuss how many days and when you collect.
host_about: I am a Chinese who live in Melbourne. I study and work here. I like travel especially camping and road trip. I love to associate with new friends from the world. That’s why I start Airbnb. I look forward to meet you here!!

name: Private ensuite w balcony - Brighton Beach 1
summary: Beautiful unit with backyard. Few steps away from Brighton Beach. Close proximity to shops and public transport. Free parking on the street. It is a private large room with exclusive ensuite, aircon, access to the backyard. Lock on the door. It is like having your own studio. Kitchen and living room are shared . The place is available from the 22nd of December. More pictures of the room furnished will be posted. But you will have a double bed and shelves and hangers to organise your luggage.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Birdsland Heights Nature Retreat
summary: 'Wow' is the most common term uttered by 'Birdsland Heights' guests when they walk through the front door, and instantly take in the view from the entrance through the home, to the back deck.   Like a fine piece of art, this stunning property took many years to build, carved by a furniture maker with a mind to create a masterpiece which capitalises on the natural mountainous environment. An entertainer's dream, or a well needed place of respite.  This property caters for all.
space: Unknown
host_about: I’m pretty outgoing and independent, and nothing much phases me. I appreciate a genuine smile backed up with a positive perspective on life’s challenges.  I love hosting and travelling and hope to do more of each in the decades ahead.  I love hearing that a guest has enjoyed a deserved break at any of our properties as much as I appreciate and glean from the honesty of guests’ ideas for improvement. Life is one big, amazing lesson - gone in a flash...  too good to waste ...

name: Apartment in the heart of Richmond
summary: Apartment is in the heart of Richmond, walk out of the secure complex and onto Bridge road for some of Melbourne's best restaurants and bars. Walking distance to the MCG and City CBD it's perfect for business or pleasure. Includes internal laundry
space: Easy to navigate from the airport, the apartment complex includes secure parking, a gym and a home cinema.  This modern apartment includes internal laundry, reverse cycle air conditioning/heating and an internal balcony. The bedroom has a Queen size bed, floor to ceiling windows and a built in wardrobe.
host_about: Unknown

name: Cosy 1959 Vintage Caravan
summary: Bessie is a sweet little 1959 vintage caravan, plenty of room for two and enough for three. The cosy caravan is heated, lovely and snug no matter the weather. Offering a minimum of one night stay for a quick getaway or stay longer & enjoy the peace. Set on 5 acres of beautiful gardens with plenty of sunny areas, our own private rainforest walk & miles of bushwalks from our front gate. There's an undercover area with a chiminea so guests can have a campfire. This is a 'no smoking' property.
space: Our garden is part of the 'Secret Gardens of the Dandenongs' tour and is one of the nicest gardens in the hills. The cool temperate rainforest walk on our property is just beautiful with a meandering path beside a little creek which runs through the property. Private and secluded. Along with the beautiful forest of Mountain Ash trees and amazing tall tree ferns, we are fortunate to have plenty of open areas with lots of sunshine too. Our two Shetland ponies, Winston and Churchill,  will often come up to say hello and look for attention. There is a shelter by the caravan with a chiminea and seating so guests can enjoy a fire (we usually have some wood but it helps if guests can bring some too).  The shelter catches the late morning and afternoon sun, making it a lovely spot to read and relax by the fire. The Olinda Falls are a short walk away (about 30 minutes) and our 'local' is the Pig and Whistle Tavern (Mt Dandenong) - 15 minutes walk away, via an unsealed road with a few hills to i
host_about:
We have been living in the Dandenong Ranges for over 10 years and love life in the hills.
Discovering the walking tracks of the Dandenongs has evolved into a website that I created known as Explore The Dandenongs. Over 32 walking trails listed!

Welcoming visitors to the Dandenongs and helping them to explore is a pleasure!

name: The Bridge Studio Appartment
summary: Quiet spacious bedroom
space: Upstairs, studio bedroom, bathroom toilet. Wifi TV Bar fridge,  Microwave,  Coffee machine, Electric kettle, Toaster Reverse cycle air conditioning
host_about: Unknown

name: BRAND NEW Two-bedroom Apartment with Views
summary: This brand new 2BR apartment is conveniently located to the major precincts and landmarks of Melbourne, which makes it perfect for weekenders, tourists and business travellers with a great range of shopping, food and entertainment options offering just in a waking distance such as Emporium, Melbourne Central, Collins St and Crown Casino.  Public Transport is easily accessible including Southern Cross Train Station situated in only 500m, tram stop and bus terminal is just at your door steps.
space: The apartment is fully furnished. Large for 1, spacious for 2, a maximum of 4 people.
host_about: Unknown

name: New! AUSTRALIA 108 overlooking Melbourne panorama
summary: Australia 108 is the real first residential tower in the Southern Hemisphere, Australia's thundering "Tomson's One". It is adjacent to the Yarra River in the north, the Royal Botanical Garden in the east, Albert in the south, and the Philips Bay in the west. It offers a panoramic view of Melbourne's stunning scenery and unrivalled views.
space: Fender Katsalidis, the world's top architectural firm, re-presented the legendary work behind the Eureka Tower, with a height of 319 meters and a height of 100 layers. With super-high design skills, it fully interprets the highest skyline of Melbourne's futuristic world, allowing the vision to be far away.
host_about: Big welcome to Melbourne, Australia.

name: Sunny and Friendly apartment!
summary: Sunny and friendly apartment in St Kilda beach. The apartment has one bathroom and 2 rooms and it'is just opposite St Kilda beach and 5 minutes walk from restaurants, cafes, shops & public transport.breakfast at no extra cost. The furniture in the apartment are different now as I've bought all new things and the room is bigger then the one on the pictures but same furniture, Will update new picture ASAP. :)
space: Unknown

name: Bright guest room in Murrumbeena-M1
summary: Our high ceiling house is located in a  safe and quiet neighborhood, about 10 mins walk to Murrumbeena train station.  Bus line 625  is right in front of the house.  The house is about 1.9  kms to Chadstone shopping centre, 1.8 kms to Carnegie commercial district, where you can find lovely restaurants and grocery stores, including Woolsworths and Aldi. This is one of the three rooms has duct heating and air conditioning.  There is a  brand new kitchen for guests use, unlimited Internet access.
space: The house is high ceiling and very bright. There is a brand new kitchen and two bathrooms for guests to use. There is a swimming pool for guests to enjoy, its a very convenient location, very close to Chadstone shopping center and Carnegie shopping center.
host_about: Unknown

name: 1 bedroom with private bathroom next to Crown
summary: 3 mins to Crown Casino Easy and convenient access to CBD and suburbs: trams straight to CBD/ South Yarra/ St Kilda etc Wireless wifi Pool/ gym  24/7 Reception Concierge  Private bathroom Private bedroom

name: Ellia Apartments - Doncaster ( G5 - N )
summary: ELLIA Apartments in Doncaster are available for both short and long term stays, these fully furnished apartments offer the best of modern and luxury living.  These comfortable 2 & 3 bedroom apartments boast an expansive open plan layout with a fully-equipped kitchen and spacious living/dining areas. Other amenities include LED TV, high speed Wi-Fi/internet, air-cond and heating. These perfectly located apartments are in close proximity to surrounding restaurants, Westfield Doncaster
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Quaint and Quiet North Fitzroy Oasis
summary: Welcome to this neat little oasis amongst cafes & restaurants. If for a chilled weekend away, attending the local galleries or Melbourne Museum, here for a show in town, shopping, the Melbourne Cup, Formula One or the summer of Tennis, this is your spot! In the heart of the bar and restaurant district, also close to museums shops and parks, this apartment will surprise and delight. You'll find many places to eat, rest, play and discover. Light double room with wardrobe and separate bathroom.
space: This is a beautiful apartment. There's a huge choice of bars, pubs, galleries, restaurants, cafes and parks. It's cosy warm in winter and cool in summer, with reverse cycle air conditioning and a wall heater in your room. We know how important your restful sleep is, so we work hard to ensure the apartment is quiet and tranquil. You'll have a modern separate bathroom. The location is perfect for anyone wanting to see a lot of Melbourne in a short time, or for short or longer term work stays. We have a full visitor guide available for you, and since we've tried out all the local eateries and bars, you'll know which ones to head to for a great meal or drink that suits your particular style.
host_about:
I love travel and frequently travel overseas and love to explore every part what eventuates from meeting others through travel.
My friends are extremely precious to me and I cherish times when we can indulge in fine food and some wine to catch up and connect.
I always aim to contribute as much as I take away from each enriching experience.

name: Comfortable room in Fitzroy
summary: location is the best feature of this room. Cafes, bars, pubs and trams are unbelievably close. Brunswick St.Fitzroy (graffiti art and foodie capital of Victoria) extremely close. Very convenient for single traveller. Your host is a young adult man.
space: Unknown
host_about: My name is Mohammed, I am an independent and open minded person. My interests are including Languages and culture, Reading, cycling, travelling, and web designing. Lived in Melbourne for 6 years, now working in Riyadh, SA.

name: Beautiful apartment great location
summary: Beautiful wooden floorboard apartment with everything you could need. 2 bed flat with sofa bed in lounge area. myself and my partner live normally but we’ll be away for Xmas. Queen bed, double bed and sofa bed.  In a lovely location next to tram stop to get you into city or chapel street. Internet, as much tea and coffee as you can drink, quiet, kitted out with cooking equipment etc.
space: Secure apartment located just off of Dandenong road, 2 mins from tram stop to chapel street/the city. 20min walk to chapel street.
host_about:
Hi All,

Originally from the UK I'm lucky enough to have the pleasure of calling Melbourne my home and owning a 2 bed apartment.  I have travelled a bit and lived in shared houses a fair bit in the past. I would be happy to give advise on melbourne if you need any.

I work in a regular office job (8-5ish mon-fri), play hockey so spend plenty of time training and playing.  I also try to get to some of the many restuarants/cafes.

I tend to be out a fair bit or you'll find my cooking or maybe watching something on Netflix.  I try and keep the place tidy.  

I have travelled a bit and have experienced massive shared dormitories to top notch hotels (through work!) to camping. Hopefully you agree I can offer a safe, homely place to stay with all the necessities you need (including plenty of tea as I work for a tea company!!) and am happy to share my tips.

name: 2BRM South Bank Oasis in Melbourne
summary: Unwind in a spacious 2 BRM inner city oasis in the heart of Melbourne's art precinct, minutes to bustling city, close to public transport, and many of Melbourne's attractions. Relax in the pool or spa, hit the gym or play tennis *free foxtel/Wifi.
space: Resort style living....Melrose Place (without the drama) and a perfect location. Whether you are hear to explore in town, attend one of Melbourne's many sporting or fashion events, or just have a relaxing weekend with hubby, friends or the kids, you wont be disappointed with the spacious, bright apartment and quiet relaxing neighbourhood.  The apartment is a modern 2 bedroom apartment, newly fitted out in April 2016 with great quality items, so expect a comfortable bed and quality linen.  There are two queen size bedrooms both with double wardrobes. In the master room is a queen bed, the second room has two king singles. A portacot and high chair are available if you are travelling with an infant. We provide sheets and a warm cot blanket but we recommend you bring your own cot blanket or baby sleeping bag to ensure your little one is comfortable.    The living area/dining area is spacious and has everything you need including premium Foxtel, Wifi, i-phone dock, and study desk. New carp
host_about: My husband and I are both from New Zealand and moved to Melbourne in 2008. A few years later we moved to London and living overseas allowed us to travel the world together. We now call Melbourne home and have a beautiful daughter together. We manage this great apartment for my parents who live in NZ and have so many great things to say about the location and amazing complex. We have loads of great tips (especially when it comes to food) and are available for anything you need during your stay. Look forward to meeting you!

name: Entire apartment + car park in heart of Prahran
summary: Newly renovated entire 1 bedroom apartment with private bathroom, kitchenette, balcony and secured basement car parking. Apartment is situated in a secured complex. It is small and modest in size and has a warm and cosy, welcoming feel. The apartment is fully furnished with a reverse cycle air-conditioner, 42 inch LED TV and comes with a free bicycle for you to use! Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Gay friendly.
space: This small and private apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a kitchenette and balcony with floor to ceiling windows.   There are shared communal areas to socialise, laundry/dryer facilities onsite and a lift.
host_about: Friendly, polite, clean, professional executive

name: Poplar Sanctuary 202 (2B)
summary: The ‘Venti’ offers a sense of exclusivity nestled within a secure block with all things to Box Hill at your fingertips. We are offering 20 well-designed 1 & 2 bedroom homes for holiday lease, complete with the highest quality fixtures and fittings. Comprising an open plan layout with bedrooms flaunting built in robes and a large entertaining balcony. The Light-filled Kitchen and meals area boasts top of the range appliances, Caesarstone bench-tops, and split system heating-cooling and a laundry.
space: The total area for this unit is 62.9 sqm which consist of a balcony area of  6.1 sqm.
host_about: Unknown

name: Funky Kensington warehouse conversion
summary: Warehouse conversion just a few hundred metres from Kensington Village. Large open living area upstairs with huge north facing window catches the winter sun. 3 train stations within 900m and only 3.5km from the city. Features full size queen bed in main bedroom, king single bunk beds in 2nd and a double fold out sofa bed in the 3rd.
space: This warehouse conversion was completed in 2000, with the curved corrugated ceiling an addition to the 1880's building. Cobblestone entrance reflect the era of the place.
host_about: We're from Melbourne Australia. Married in 2011. I work in Public Relations for a national heart charity and my husband Peter works as a lobbyist for the bicycling industry. We first used AirBNB in 2012 when we travelled through Spain for three weeks - and loved it. Now with two kids, we're now enjoying hosting at our own home in Kensington, Melbourne.

name: Premium South Yarra Apartment with Hot Tub & Pool
summary: A beautiful studio apartment in the exclusive Vogue Apartments building. Swim in the apartment complex swimming pool, shop nearby on Chapel St and relax/unwind for your December holidays.
space: Beautiful spa/sauna/gym in the common area and only a couple minutes walk from Chapel St and Bars (including the Olsen and Two Wrongs).
host_about:
I’m a 29 year old advertising/marketing executive. I’m into old school music/vinyl and probably work a little too hard.

My partner, Emma, is in aged care.

I’m on Airbnb for new experiences and hopefully forcing myself away to a lovely weekend get away with my partner where possible.

name: Contempo CBD Suites with POOL, GYM + FREE WiFi
summary: An ENTIRE apartment unit ALL TO YOURSELF on Lonsdale St, opposite the Southern Cross station marks this dreamy inner-city condo a must for any weekenders, business travellers or holiday makers. Fully furnished with FREE WiFi and access to the pool, gym, sauna and rock climbing facilities. BOOK NOW and receive 15% OFF car rentals with Europcar across Australia, New Zealand & UK wide along with 10% OFF any food and beverages at Andrew's Hamburgers on Franklin St!
space: Spacious for 1, roomy for 2, ideal for 3, accommodates a maximum of 4. A fabulous and convenient inner-city crib laced with modern architectural facades. This magnificent self-contained apartment unit houses a generous bedroom with a queen sized bed. A warm and cozy en-suit. A very spacious living area with a comfy 3-seater sofa bed that folds out to a queen. A fully decked kitchen and dining. Complimentary coffee and tea. A laundry area with a washer, dryer, iron and an ironing board. A private balcony. ALL TO YOURSELF! Please click on the photos to view more about this property and it's surroundings. This fully equipped and furnished 50sqm home is ready to go with:     - 32 inch LCD TV      - Air Conditioning & heating      - Wireless internet     BEDROOM      - Roller blinds for all windows      - Queen sized bed      - Quilt, pillows, sheets, throws & covers      - Bedside table & lamp      - Storage closet     - Hangers     BATHROOM (EN-SUITE)      - Shampoo, body wash & hand soap
host_about:
Your trusted international host across major cities. Feel at home wherever you are! LIVE · LOVE · EXPLORE

- Melbourne
- Sydney
- Gold Coast
- Auckland
- London
- Kuala Lumpur
- George Town
- Johor Bahru

I speak fluent English, Cantonese (广东话), Mandarin (普通话), Bahasa Melayu, Bahasa Indonesia & Tagalog.

If the dates you're after are available on my calendars, you may proceed to "INSTANT-BOOK" em'.

My calendars on AirBnb are always up to date, so if they're blocked and you can't select them, it pretty much means someone else has already booked em'.

Happy stays & safe travels :)
