name: Private bedroom | New house | 20 mins to airport
summary: A nice and cozy private room with big window, a comfortable queen bed, bedside tables and a walk in robe. The private bathroom includes all essentials. Towels and blankets shall be provided. We also provide a kettle, toaster, microwave and complimentary tea and coffee. Happy for guests to use the kitchen and dining as required. The train station is less than a 5 minutes drive. Major shopping centers are pretty close-by. Explore the world famous Macedon Ranges and Daylesford Spa Regions.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Light filled apartment - Prahran
summary: A premier tree-lined location - Walking distance to Chapel St as well as a 10 minute commute on public transport to the heart of Melbourne CBD. Gorgeous furnished apartment with sun filled sitting room and all amenities needed for the perfect stay!
space: Unknown
host_about:
Currently living in Melbourne after living in Sydney for the past 20 years. Working in Finance and a keen lover of music!

Quick and friendly communicator will go out of my way to be an accommodating host. Whether a local or a tourist, happy to help make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

I look forward to meeting you soon!

name: Sweet House (CBD Private room 3)
summary: This apartment is a private room, but you don't need to share the bathroom with other people. we still have some personal belongings inside the room, but we already package them. so don't worry about it.  The living room you need to share with the others. However, you have a private balcony can enjoy the view of the city. we offering shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toothpaste, and bath tower. However, we do not offer toothbrush which is consumables.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: New York Style Living in East Melbourne
summary: This two-bedroom apartment has an open plan living and dining area with a gourmet kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances and marble bench tops, built-in robes, an ensuite with a bath to soak in at day’s end plus guest bathroom with built-in laundry. The location is highly convenient, and the onsite gym, rooftop pool, shops, cafes, supermarket and landscaped courtyards are all part of the charm.  It is quiet, but so close to transport, Fitzroy Gardens and the CBD.
space: Unknown
host_about:
Hello Travellers, 

We are a house of two women, however, you will have the whole apartment to yourself over Christmas should you decide to rest at our humble abode (Christmas decorations and obnoxiously large flat screen included). 

I work full time and study on the side. My housemate also studies full time. As we are both Master's students it may come as no surprise that we cannot live without yoga, red wine and living within walking distance of the city. 

This will be our first Airbnb hosting opportunity and we would like to welcome you to come and stay in the beautiful, green suburb of East Melbourne. If you have any questions or would like a Facetime tour, please send me a message!

name: Amazing City view with free wifi
summary: This apartment has amazing view to the city skyline. The apartment is decorated artistically with 50" TV, Fridge, washing machine, dryer,microwave etc. for a pleasant and comfortable stay.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I’m living in this beautiful country almost 2 years and every day I have an opportunity to learn more about myself, people and different cultures.
Love Melbourne as my hometown. I have amazing friends and lovely family which I miss a lot.
I enjoy  camping, be in touch with the nature, hanging out with friends, dancing, listen and learn to enjoy different world songs.
Every kid and puppy make me feel fascinated.
I wish I had opportunity to travel more and see each part that the world has made.
I invite you to stay with us and would like to say that I’m happy to help you to make your stay a wonderful experience.
Welcome to Melbourne!

name: Beautiful area to hang with two Labradors
summary: Beautiful area with views of the dandenongs scattered among the gum trees with 945 sqm to explore. I have two awesome dogs and hopefully a bunch of puppies soon! Bring your own! I'm happy to let the place for short periods on an irregular basis if it suits us both. We can discuss that later.  I have * WiFi * Netflix * A bbq * big cooker  * a galaxy gear vr. * two friendly dogs that hump in weird ways * Offstreet parking * Swamp-cooler aircon * 945 sqm plot * Storage  * 7 mins to Boronia Stn
space: Unknown
host_about:
I'm an easy going fun guy who's happy here with his two dogs. I have the space available in this beautiful area to make people comfortable for a while and give them somewhere to hang out with two awesome dogs and rest.

If you don't like dogs I'm happy to keep them fenced off during your stay. I'm new to this so I'll be sure to make this place as awesome for you as it is for me.

name: Light filled oasis
summary: Old style, sunny and spacious apartment, with renovated kitchen.  We're on the top floor with views of gorgeous sunsets. No elevator - about 40 stairs. 3km from Melbourne CBD, close to all major hospitals and public transport.   The place is great for singles, couples and business travellers. This is my home so you'll find bits and pieces of me around. I just wont be there when you are there.
space: The apartment has 2 bdr, bathroom, separate toilet, separate lounge and kitchen . It is close to Royal Park, so you can wander through the park to Melbourne Zoo, the State Hockey Centre, walk the bike trail to Brunswick or just hang about, soak up the sun and listen to the birds.  Comfortable double fold out sofa bed in 2nd bedroom.
host_about:
I'm a down to earth yogi who runs her own yoga retreat business. I like to travel, preferably with a bit of yoga thrown in, Some of it for work and some for pleasure, although I try to make work pleasurable. 
A backpacker for many years, I now prefer a little more comfort, exercise, meditation and 3 meals a day instead of 1 meal and copious beer - how times change with age!

I live without TV, and find life far more interesting without it. There's music, books and Melbourne has so many things to see and do, that I don't miss it. I live in a simple, relaxed environment, with quiet neighbours.

I want guests to enjoy their time visiting Melbourne, and know that they have a quiet, clean space to come home to and rest.

My travels have taken me across Europe, Scandinavia, Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam, Singapore, Israel, Egypt, Jordan, India, Nepal, Mexico and USA. 

As a host I like to meet my guests if we can make the time. I'm available by phone and am responsive to texts (although not in the middle of the night)! I'm not intrusive, but enjoy meeting travellers from around the world especially when they're staying in my home. As a guest I'm also happy to meet the host, and have contact as required. Friendships form in unlikely places and Air BnB was set up to build connections with others based on trust and goodwill, as such my place is not a hotel, it's my home and I hope the guests that I attract will treat it with respect and not abuse my hospitality. 

Life motto: Jump and the net will appear - don't know who said this, but I think it's a good one and it works most times.

host_about:
I discovered Airbnb as a guest on my travels over the past number of years and loved the concept and decided to become a host in March 2015. 
Since commencing as an Airbnb host, we have been thrilled to have almost 100% occupancy since we started. It's been a wonderful experience and have meet fellow Australians from all over the country and visitors from most parts of the world.  We are always interested in what guests are doing and their interest in travelling and think this is a great way to fund our own travels also!

It will be our sincere pleasure to make you feel at home in our apartment.
We look forward to meeting you and hearing about your travels and adventures!

summary: A beautiful Edwardian House, 7km from Melbourne City in the hip suburb of  Thornbury. Close to Trams and Trains. Opposite Penders Park.  3 bedrooms, 2 bathroom (bath in 2nd bathroom). Decorated with style and warmth plus toys for the kids.  A few minutes walk to high street where you will find numerous bars, cafes and restaurants. The Backyard has decking and outdoor setting. A beautiful garden. Lawn space, for kicking a ball around, a trampoline and two chickens offering fresh eggs daily.
space: Our artistically decorated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home has character, warmth and colour. The main open plan living space has large edwardian windows filling the space with natural light.  The back garden is luscious and spacious and has a trampoline. The kitchen is fully equipped with Smeg and Meile appliances and great cooking ware. When are you wanting more action high street Thornbury is 5 minute walk to the end of our street where there are numerous cafes, restaurants and bars to enjoy. The neighbouring suburb of Northcote is 5 min drive or tram ride down high street where there are boutique clothes and craft stores and a vibrant nightlight restaurant and bar scene. Northcote pool is 5 mins down the road and Yarra Bend Golf course a 10 min drive away.

host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

host_about: Welcome. We are Sean from Ireland and Lina from Colombia but both a long time removed. We love traveling, meeting new people, yoga, music, photography, a good book, good food and good conversation. We have travelled extensively over the years and have used airbnb in many countries around the world. We now want to return the favour and play host now that we are settled in beautiful Melbourne.

name: Wytheburn
summary: Wytheburn is a 100 year old historic home set on 1 acre of mature European style gardens. We are situated in the heart of Olinda, close to the Rhododendron gardens and a 5 minute walk to historic Olinda village. The bungalow occupies the downstairs or underneath of the home and is bright and airy. It has its own private entrance and comprises of a sun filled lounge/dining, 2 double bedrooms, a modern bathroom plus a small fridge, microwave, pod coffee, toaster, kettle, crockery & cutlery  etc.
space: The bungalow has a country charm with large picture windows overlooking the garden. Guests have their own garden seating area with seats for 5 plus there is a quaint glass Summer house equipped with comfortable chairs, power, a heater and loads of books. Also BBQ facilities are available. Wytheburn's gardens were planted in the 1920's comprising mainly of European plants and trees. We are surrounded by beautiful Mountain Ash and at night there is a twinkling of city lights.

space: My property is the epitome of convenience thanks to the numerous public transport options and easy access to restaurants, cafes, bars and shopping options. You’ll be on St Kilda Road and have the Commercial Road bus stop on your doorstep that will take you where you need to go. I recommend taking advantage of Melbourne’s efficient tram service. With frequent and reliable services, this is the best way to get around Melbourne. The closest stop just in front of my property and can take you directly into the Melbourne CBD. When it comes to food, you’re in luck! Melbourne is filled with Australia’s best restaurants and cafes all ready to satisfy your hunger. A 5 minute walk will get you a great coffee and meal. Moving into my home you will find that it has been recently styled by some of Melbourne’s best home stylists. The living room is well illuminated by the natural light passing through the glass floor to ceiling sliding doors. There’s a sectional sofa which can be put together to crea

name: "The Artichoke"
summary: Perfect for short term stays. 20 mins to the airport. Super comfortable couch, or an equally comfortable floor matress; your choice.  The house gets brilliant sunlight all day. Train to the city in 20 mins and the station is 200 meters from the front door. Sharing the house my flatmate and I - relaxed, quiet and respectful. I like to keep the public spaces clean and neat but I'm not obsessive about it. More than happy to cook and share dinner with you if you ask nicely.
space: Unknown

name: One or two bedrooms in my home.
summary: Close to everything, bright, clean and private. Comfortable and quiet surroundings.  One or two bedrooms in large apartment, both with queen beds sharing full bathroom. Book one bedroom or two, one booking at a time. Separate toilet & basin up the hall. Owner lives in apartment, her bed/ bathroom separate.
space: Large double bedroom with Queen bed. 2nd bedroom next door also with queen bed. Full bathroom shared by both bedrooms. Suit two couples, or singles. Wrap around balcony where visitors can smoke if desired. Wonderful views. Docklands City living, easy minutes walk to restaurants, train and trams which are free in Melbourne City. Casino, theatres, Melbourne Star, sporting venues including Etihad and tennis plus shopping. Visitor metered parking in building on ground floor also street parking available. On booking advise whether requesting one bedroom or two. Stunning views, everything you want on the doorstep. Bus available at call to transport to the airport or short walk to train & bus station for airport bus transfer.
host_about:
Mature woman, friendly and outgoing, 
Well travelled, work part time in welfare with children and families.
Interested in community. 
Hobbies include reading and travel.  
Enjoy apartment living and love all aspects of being close to everything, including eating out, activities, water views and new friendships.  
Walk to cinema, theatre, concert venues plus the casino, whatever is needed and wanted and if not up to walking tram and bus on the doorstep and train nearby.
Terrier dog in residence.
Although new to sharing my accommodation in this way have in my previous residences had many guests over the years from all over the world due to long history of involvement in service clubs, have always welcomed others and proud of my City and Country.

name: Triple+Ensuite+Wifi, City,House,Gdn
summary: 3km to CBD  2min - Collingwood Stn  Victoria Food | Smith | Gertrude | Brunswick St | Yarra Trail ~ 15min  Supermarkets | 24hr Kiosk & Macs ~ 3min Free Wifi & Pantry Private bath | Secured Rooms | Spring Mattress  Car : Free Street / Pay ~$7/12hr
space: The house has three bedrooms.  Each bedroom has its own private bathroom. All bedrooms and bathrooms are key lockable and have safety chains. *** To ensure guests' privacy, NO visitors are permitted in the house. ***
host_about:
After a decade in Asia, I am proud to call Melbourne home again.

My perfect weekend in Melbourne would start only after 9am on Saturday. Being in Abbotsford, I am blessed with a short crawl the to Allpress Expresso for my dosage of coffee. 

Armed with my travelling latte, I would venture down Smith Street. Popping to Happy Valley Book store to check out the latest edition of Monocle or one of countless trendy lifestyle editorials.. 

Lunch would usually be a takeaway roast chicken sandwich from Alimentari. I can never find an empty table here. Their Italian Pronto is easily the best in town.

name: Melbourne townhouse with sunset viewing terrace!
summary: Situated in the historic stockyards of Kensington, this cozy townhouse is the perfect retreat for anyone looking to discover Melbourne and the inner suburbs.
space: This three-story town house has 2 bedrooms, both with queen beds. The master room has an ensuite and courtyard, while the second bedroom is situated on the mezzanine level above the living space.  The living area is fresh, bright and offers the perfect space to cook and relax after a big day of exploring. It also has a generous terrace where you can sit and watch the sunset while cooking a BBQ.  The house has appliances including dishwasher, washing machine and smart television with Netflix.
host_about: Hi my name is Audrey and I live in Melbourne. I work in marketing and have just bought this gorgeous townhouse in Kensington that I would love to share with people visiting this incredible city.

name: Light+spacious: ideal location
summary: This quiet and secure apartment is close to Melbourne's best restaurants, galleries, theatres, botanical gardens and fantastic shopping. In one of Melbourne's beautiful historical buildings the location is fantastic. It's light, airy and spacious.
space: The interior is clean, modern and elegant. Original artworks fill the space.  The kitchen is fully equipped, including large fridge, dishwasher, oven. Although with such a choice of amazing places to eat within a 5 minute walk you might not use the kitchen much! Most importantly the bed is brand new, high quality and super comfortable. All linen, towels are provided.
host_about: We live with our two sons in a big country garden in the beautiful Macedon Ranges. We both work from home and Melbourne running our own businesses.

name: Jaw-dropping River Views Near The CBD w Pool + Gym
summary: Centrally located in Docklands, my open plan apartment is your perfect accommodation solution to your next visit to Melbourne! Comfortably accommodating 4 guests, this two bedroom apartment has everything you need and is near everything you would want to see in Melbourne. With an enclosed balcony area, laundry, fully equipped kitchen, gym and pool side access, my place is a top pick!
space: My home in Docklands is one of the best accommodation experiences for  a group looking to explore this city. You will be close to the best shopping district in Australia and some of the most culturally densest areas you can find. The beauty of Melbourne can be found literally at my doorstep.  Stepping inside my spacious home, you will be greeted with large window walls, displaying one of the greatest apartment riverside views of Melbourne! The shutters can be pulled down or half-way depending on your mood. But for the optimum experience, leave them open while you wind down on the large sofa, reading your favourite book or watching the latest episode of The Bachelor on the TV.  In this air-conditioned space you will also find the fully equipped kitchen with ample storage to store your favourite snacks. For the Masterchef, there’s a stove and an oven to cook your favourite meals. Inside the cupboards you will also find the necessary detergents for washing up, but if that’s not your thing

name: Newly Renovated House Close to Public Transport
summary: My place is close to Heidelberg Train Station, Austin Hospital and the Burgundy Street Precinct. The house has a newly renovated interior, natural light on both sides of the property, direct access to a park with BBQ and Basketball facilities and a beautiful neighbourhood. Kitchen and Laundry Facilities. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. A tenant is occupying the second bedroom, he is well-manured, clean and respectful.
space: A common area with two couches (three seater and two seater) and two person bean bag is available. Kitchen with dining table and area in the fridge and pantry is included.
host_about: Australian!

name: Luxurious 1br apartment in CBD
summary: This modern, luxurious apartment is located convenient at a prime central location that is close to universities (RMIT, University of Melbourne), Queen Victoria Market and Melbourne CBD (5-10min walk). Special features include The Sky Deck, a rooftop oasis with spas, cinema, BBQ facilities and lounge area. Stay luxuriously with free WiFi, a well-equipped kitchen and pantry, complimentary coffee & tea, as well as premium bed and bath products.
space: Spacious bedroom with built-in wardrobe, coat hangers and towels. Modern kitchen includes utensils, cutlery, pot and pans, dishwasher, microwave, ceramic stove and fridge. Pantry consists of basic cooking staples (e.g. oil, salt, sugar, soy etc) Washing machine and dryer are also provided with laundry detergent, making it suitable for short and long term stay.  This luxurious apartment is located on Melbourne's main street - Swanston Street. Be on the city fringe where you can take a 5-10min walk to the city yet enjoy a peaceful night's rest.  Take a dip in the rooftop spa or simply relax in the common lounge area that is exclusive to residents of the apartment. The panoramic views at the rooftop will leave you in awe of Melbourne's city skyline. Parking is available for $18 a day. Please let us know in advance if you would require a parking lot so we can give you details.
host_about: I'm an IT Consultant that loves to travel and explore the new food scenes/places in Melbourne and countries that I travel to!

name: Great place for everyone to enjoy!
summary: The room is charming with queen bed. It is a very quiet room & plenty of spaces! Modern looking room with plenty of storage. Location is great! Walking distance to local shops, tram & bus stop. Explore the local, you will love it! 35min tram ride to city, &10 walk to Deakin Uni.
space: It is a huge & charming room
host_about: Im a chinese indonesian and have been living in Melbourne for 24 years. Im an enterpreneur and based in Melbourne,. I love meeting people and talk about various cultures. Myself and fiance love travelling and enjoy eating. We love to share our experiences & adventures with others. Free feel to ask us anything! Thanks for reading..

name: Cosy and central modest renovated Victorian
summary: Space The Omstay Triple is a classic 3 bedroom Victorian terrace over shop frontage which has just been renovated and includes all basic modern conveniences required for a comfortable shared stay in North Melbourne.
space: This listing is for the back / smallest room, located next to the shared bathroom, and has the best value for money! The bed as you can see from the photos is a low to the ground futon style bed, which is harder than sprung mattress.
host_about: Busy, self employed, regular traveller and host with Airbnb so I understand your experience!

name: The Concrete Jungle
summary: Welcome to the Concrete Jungle, a space drenched in natural light and sky rocket ceilings. If you’re up for a less conventional experience, then this place is for you.
space: An open apartment, this space offers minimalist delights such as a hidden cooktop and secret door leading to a fridge. With very few doors, the Concrete Jungle welcomes open hearted beings comfortable sharing a space with others. With that in mind, privacy is attainable as we all know the importance of restoration and rejuvenation. Enjoy the restful vibe of the lounge room whilst sipping on a delightful coffee. Or escape to your private space and unwind on your comfortable queen bed. As night falls set your room to your mood with the help of Phillips Hue lighting which allows you to choose a setting best suited to ease your worries. You will also be greeted with a little welcome pack including a mini iPad featuring Netflix to use during your stay. *Please note - the living room has been slightly altered since the original shots. I will attempt to update the photos in due time.
host_about: I am in love with cities I have never been to and people I have never met!

name: Melbourne Central private double with Melb local

I am a Melbourne local and can recommend cafes and fun activities in the city. I am a regular local just making a bit of extra money, and will be living my life with friends and work etc. next door, so please keep that in mind during your stay. I look forward to hosting you!
space: Unknown
host_about: Hello, I'm Rafal, I am trying to be a writer so I rent out my second bedroom sometimes. I studied Philosophy and Literature, I have lots of books you can enjoy as well as a proper poker set, puzzles, legos and two guitars I can't play.

name: Light filled oasis in Carlton North
summary: Bright and airy one bedroom apartment in a secluded pocket of friendly Carlton North. This is inner city living: close to neighbourhood shops, bars and eateries.
space: This top floor apartment in a small complex provides modern living in a historic setting - the building was originally the engine house for cable cars. These days two flights of stairs lead you to a spacious open plan living area enjoying ample light and air flow. A private balcony is the perfect place to sample some wine and cheese while enjoying the sunset. You are welcome to harvest any of the herbs or vegetables growing in our balcony pots. A cosy bedroom with built-in robe comfortably sleeps two. The fully equipped kitchen has a gas stove, electric oven and dishwasher, while the separate bathroom comes with a bathtub, washing machine and dryer. Features:  • Complimentary tea, locally roasted coffee and dairy milk • Private balcony overlooking shared courtyard garden • Gas barbeque • Whole of apartment hydronic heating; split air conditioner/heater in living area • NBN fibre wifi internet • Garage car space
host_about: I'm a software developer with a love for the outdoors. I can be often found on the road searching for a new mountain bike trail to ride or beach to paraglide.

space: The open plan kitchen, living and dining spaces makes the most of the space on offer. The well appointed stone benchtop kitchen with stainless steel 4 burner hob gas cooktop, dishwasher and microwave allows you to engage with guests or family whilst entertaining. Wake up to a fresh coffee from your very own espresso pod coffee machine and enjoy breakfast whilst reading a newspaper sitting at the large stone island bench.  The master bedroom includes a luxurious 5 star hotel quality queen bed with a wall mounted television & built in robes.  A european laundry with a separate washing machine and dryer can be found within the main bathroom.
host_about: Our goal is to offer our discerning guests with exclusive access to luxury accommodation in an area normally reserved for Melbourne's elite. Being 130 metres from the amazing beach of Port Melbourne it was only fitting that our vision for this building involved styling it in the theme of The Hamptons. Our apartments are designed for everything from a romantic getaway to an executive needing nearby Convention Centre & Exhibition Centre accommodation

summary: Hit the remote-controlled sunshade and relax with family or friends on the deck of this renovated Victorian home built in 1890. Located in a safe, quiet neighbourhood close to the beach and local cafes, the home also features a Sonos sound system.
space: Renovated in 2015 with all new furniture , carpets, linen, dining & cookware. The front of the house retains the period features, built in 1890.  The back of the house and upstairs bedrooms reflect a modern, contemporary style of living. This house comfortably sleeps 6 adults.  The modern kitchen is well appointed with Miele appliances: integrated dishwasher, gas cook-top, cooker range hood, oven and microwave/combi oven.  2 fridge/freezers are fully integrated. The walk-in pantry is stocked with oil/ vinegar, spices, sugar, salt, pepper and more all free to use. Pots and pans, crockery, toaster etc are also housed in  the walk-in pantry.  Filtered drinking water tap is available. The laundry facilities available are: washing machine, dryer, iron and ironing board and outside washing line. There is a convenient, downstairs  powder room.  Family/dining room has folding doors that opens to inside/outside decked entertainment area with built in mains gas BBQ and seating.  Outside decked a

space: Welcome to St George Accommodation, the ultimate cosmopolitan lifestyle is right outside the door on the vibrant Chapel Street in the heart of stunning, sophisticated South Yarra. St George Accommodation is a collection of 8 tastefully furnished self contained studios quietly nestled away but yet only moments from the buzz and hype that all of Chapel Street has to offer. host_about:
Hi Everyone,
I would like give you $55 credit, if you book the apartment from us.
please use my link to create the new account, and book it. 
http://www.airbnb.com.au/c/kent177

I have 29 listings in airbnb, We have different variety of apartments, such as 
1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments
3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments

You can enter the date and number of guests from the airbnb listing page, then it will show up which one is available for you.




Being a Airbnb host for 5-6 years. I love being a host, because I know that when people, different group of people and family come to our place, when they feel, it is worth it. I love it and enjoy. That's the happiness that other job may not able to find it. I really love to see when my guests they start to step to the apartment and feel wow and impressed.
Honestly, being a host, it is not easy decision.
We have to make sure every details things in our place are the best to our guests. 
From check-in to check-out. It is an experience not only for guests. it is for us as well. It is the whole responsibilities. 

That’s what I think, the reason which motivates me to be a host.

Melbourne is a very multi-cultural city 
My objective is, if someone come here they should be connected to the right place.
Me, as a host, I think is kind of connecting these different piece together, a kind of connection.
The high point of my stay was how you made me feel. And how you made me feel, it sticks. It sticks with you.”
I have the traditional way to believe.
We believe it is the relationship that provide to the guests they will enjoy,  love the place to stay.
They trust me and I trust them. And that’s the reason it works.
So hospitalities if you ask me, is about care. It s about welcoming. This is about welcoming with open heart.  Welcome you to my Melbourne Apartment.

name: Rebecca's Fab Fitzroy pad
summary: Lovely 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment nestled right in the heart of Melbourne's vibrant Fitzroy North. A relaxing, clean and bright home with a few colourful and quirky touches. You’ll love my place because of the decor, the private courtyard, the kitchen, the location and the neighbourhood, as you'll be close to everything the vibrant inner north has to offer. My place is good for travellers, couples and solo adventurers. It's also set back away from the street-front so it’s very quiet.
space: The room is light and bright with lovely furnishings, plenty of power plugs, mirrored built in robes with plenty of storage and a sliding door that leads out to the private enclosed terrace. The window blind comes down completely.  The apartment itself is a stylish ground floor apartment furnished with an eclectic mix of danish, modern and retro style pieces. There are 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, double sofa bed in the lounge, polished wooden floors, WIFI, Chromecast, reverse cycle A/C, laundry with washing machine and a fully equipped chefs kitchen with stone bench tops, Scanpan cookware and Smeg appliances.  Perfect for a weekend urban getaway, family visiting relatives or for someone relocating to Melbourne and requiring temporary accommodation.
host_about: Hello my name is Bec. I work in marketing in the adventure travel industry and have travelled to 60 countries myself. My favourites are Nepal, Turkey, Slovenia, Scotland and USA. When I am not travelling, like any other Melburnian I'm eating at the latest pop-up joint, drinking craft beer at a local brew house, brunching with friends (Melbourne has the best brunch places!), drinking wine, running out, heading to the store to get more, seeing bands, going to festivals, having fun and forcing myself to go for a run/spin class/pump to work of all the fun. Im certainly in the right city for it and I can't wait for you to experience it too. When I'm at home I'm either cooking or relaxing in front of the TV. I'm clean, tidy and respectful.

name: South East Delight

host_about:
I am an Aussie currently living in East St Kilda, previously I was in London, I lived in London for around 2 years and worked as a civil engineer. 

I have travelled extensively in Europe, Asia, Australia and Nth America, I have also used couchsurfing all through Europe and hosted people in my home in Melbourne and London. I know how to be respectful to cultures, other people and property.

I love keeping healthy and active swimming, cycling, climbing, skiing and surfing are my favourites. I also love live music, art, politics, fashion, culture and the environment & sustainability.

please use my link to create the new account, and book it.

3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments

Being a Airbnb host for 5-6 years. I love being a host, because I know that when people, different group of people and family come to our place, when they feel, it is worth it. I love it and enjoy. That's the happiness that other job may not able to find it. I really love to see when my guests they start to step to the apartment and feel wow and impressed.
Honestly, being a host, it is not easy decision.
We have to make sure every details things in our place are the best to our guests. 
From check-in to check-out. It is an experience not only for guests. it is for us as well. It is the whole responsibilities. 

That’s what I think, the reason which motivates me to be a host.

Melbourne is a very multi-cultural city 
My objective is, if someone come here they should be connected to the right place.
Me, as a host, I think is kind of connecting these different piece together, a kind of connection.
The high point of my stay was how you made me feel. And how you made me feel, it sticks. It sticks with you.”
I have the traditional way to believe.
We believe it is the relationship that provide to the guests they will enjoy,  love the place to stay.
They trust me and I trust them. And that’s the reason it works.
So hospitalities if you ask me, is about care. It s about welcoming. This is about welcoming with open heart.  Welcome you to my Melbourne Apartment.

~ Melbourne sky Apartments~
Dear guests:

We are Eden Charmmy and Cony. We are professional management team . 

All our apartments are unique, therefore we do not offer early check in or late check out  as my apartments are unique, we cannot just put guests in a random available room. 

My team members can speak English Korean Indonesian and Chinese . Pls feel free to contact us anytime. Thank you 
我們可以講中文 
Our working hour is from 10AM TO 10PM. 
We always answer your question within 2 hours during our business hours. 

Important information:

* We provide car park for $15 per 24 hours  ( Multi-entry) . The car park is provided by third party, you will be given an allocated car park number a day before you arrive. 

* There are few car rental companies nearby. You can search car rentals in Southern cross station to save the parking fee if you only need car for few hours.

* We are airbnb not hotel. ( Means you are staying in host's house not a hotel).
Therefore, we do not provide daily cleaning service. Additional cleaning service can be provided at extra cost. 


* Please take your personal belongings with you when you check out. We are not responsible for any lost or damage to your personal belongings.

summary: Spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Southbank high rise complex.  Fully equipped with kitchen, laundry and entertainment systems. The building has gym, pool and tennis court. Concierge service from 6am to 10pm and 24 hour security guard.
space: The Apartment Fully serviced 2 bedroom apartment within Melbourne Tower Complex in the heart of Melbourne. Right across from the Crown Casino, 5 minutes walk to Flinder St station, Business District, Victoria Arts Centre. The apartment is located on the 10th floor with a nice city view to the north side. Master bedroom is furnished with a queen size bed. The other room is furnished with 1 king bed or 2 single beds. The living room also has a foldout couch that sleeps 2 additional people. Fully equipped kitchen complete with fridge, dishwasher and all the utensils you need to cook up a feast. Complex Facilites The complex has a heated pool and gym located on the 6th floor (opening hours are 6am to 10pm) and tennis court (day light only).  The building also has its own concierge desk which is attended from 6am to 10pm.  The concierge desk has weather report, direct telephone diallying for taxi and also collects dry cleaning items.   Transport The building is centrally located within walk
host_about: I am a melbourne girl with a finance professional background.  Due to passion for travelling, meeting  new people and property, i have, over the last few years, managed to combine my hobbies into owning a guesthouse and a number of apartments in and near the Melbourne city. I hope I can cater all types of groups with the range of accommodation options I offer. I also love the opportunity to show all my guests what a wonderful city Melbourne is. As an airbnb guest, I will look after your place like its my own.

name: Collins St Apartments 516
summary: Absolute Prime location sits this gorgeous boutique apartment in the heart of Collins street Melbourne's CBD. Located on the prestigious Collins St between Elizabeth and Swanston Street. Minutes walk to the fabulous theatres, shops, cafes, trendy European Laneway's.
space: You may know Collins Street  proper for its designer stores in heritage buildings, five star hotels, private clubs and exclusive jewellers. It boasts its very own "Paris end" and is often referred to as 'the top end of town'.  Head in this direction for the flag ship stores of Chanel, Giorgio Armani and Louis Vuitton. For more relaxed shopping stroll West where bustling retail centres like 234 and Australia on Collins house many chain and concept stores. Take a short cut through the block arcade and go to Bourke Street and head to Myer, David Jones and all the big brand name stores. Lane ways galore full of cafe's. Fabulous place to eat. For dinner: The laneway adjoining the apartment block is Manchester Lane and has a beautiful authentic Italian restaurant called Macaroni. A must. The owners David and Beth are a lovely Italian couple and provide the flavours of Italy. Meatballs is located in Flinders Lane, Chin Chin and the French brasserie. There is so many things to see and do. The
host_about: Unknown

name: Nice Main bedroom in perfect location
summary: Super convenient location: off Melbourne's busiest area, being quiet while close to everything. Nice bedroom with queen size bed. There is a separate area in living room for other guest who are living there.
space: Shared kitchen, bathroom and meal area. Living room space would be limited as half is separated and made to guests who live in the living room. Usage of garage would be extra charge of $10 per night, please inform in advance to see if it's available.
host_about: Unknown

name: Spacious Town House in the West
summary: Three-story townhouse in the west of Melbourne. The house is a two minute walk from public transport into the bustling CBD. Public transport into the city centre is around 40 minutes maximum. A 10 minute drive or 20 minute cycle to Footscray where you will find the best and cheapest Asian bites! A 15 minute walk to the three-story shopping mall that can provide you with all your shopping needs. River walks and cycle trails are 10 minutes away and feel free to use the two bicycles provided.
space: Two of the bedrooms, one with an ensuite, are both located on the top floor. Both with queen size beds (one being a queen size air mattress) and both have built-in wardrobes. The third bedroom is located on the ground floor with a private bathroom. Towels, hair-dryer and amenities are provided. The large open kitchen living room includes smart TV, Netflix, surround sound, PS, and wifi making for a comfortable night on the couch if the city gets too much. You can find a breakfast bench, fridge-freezer, oven, gas-top, and coffee machine in the kitchen. If the breakfast bench doesn't take your fancy then enjoy your breakfast out in the morning sun on the spacious balcony. There is a laundry room with a washing machine and sink. Free parking is provided should you wish to rent a car. Also there are two bicycles to take in the sites on.
host_about:
I am a professional chef with 16 years experience in the industry.  I moved to Melbourne 3 years ago and have been working at one of the country's best restaurants in the CBD. I absolutely love food and dinning out which go hand in hand with my travel habits! 

Melbourne is one of the most vibrant and dense food cities on the planet! It's a great city to live in, work in and travel to. The town-house is a 40 minute commute maximum into the city centre where there are an array of things to do. The west is much quieter than other surrounding suburbs of the city, which creates a perfect balance between the hustle bustle and quiet suburbia.

name: Amazing Accommodations South Yarra11
summary: Right in the middle of shopping mecca of Melbourne on Chapel st, this studio apartment has everything to lure someone looking for a break or here for work
space: Its a nice self contained studio apartment. It has a full size fridge, cooking utensils, a washing machine/dryer combo, a queen bed and a small balcony with view.  On the top floor there are couple of spas, outdoor decking area, big screen tv etc. for guests to enjoy. I have many apartments in the building. advertised separately.
host_about:
I’m living in this beautiful country almost 2 years and every day I have an opportunity to learn more about myself, people and different cultures.
Love Melbourne as my hometown. I have amazing friends and lovely family which I miss a lot.
I enjoy  camping, be in touch with the nature, hanging out with friends, dancing, listen and learn to enjoy different world songs.
Every kid and puppy make me feel fascinated.
I wish I had opportunity to travel more and see each part that the world has made.
I invite you to stay with us and would like to say that I’m happy to help you to make your stay a wonderful experience.
Welcome to Melbourne!

Just round the corner is a cafe called penny drop, a great place for coffee lovers. For convenience, boxhill central has trains and bus to the city so you dont have to worry about transport. If you are a deakin student, it's only a 15 min direct bus ride from boxhill central.
space: A simple room with a double bed. Modern setting with ample space.

All of Melbourne's main attractions are easily accessible by public transport.  Parking is also available on request. Self Check-in is available.
space: Your room is bright and spacious, furnished with a comfortable double bed, drawers and clothes rack. The Large built in wardrobe in your room can be locked.  Clean fresh linen, shampoo & towels will be provided for your stay. Natural and non-toxic detergent is used to wash the linen.
host_about: Easy going and fairly organised. I love to travel whenever I get the chance. What I love most is to immerse myself in a culture and live like a local. When not travelling, I enjoy cosying up to a good book with a nice glass of wine.

space: This beautiful and tidy apartment has fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Unlimited Wifi, TV.  It has a Queen bedroom and a sofa bed which make it spacious for 1, roomy for 2, ideal for 3, accommodates a maximum of 4. You also have access to pool, gym and sauna on the 5th floor Unlimited free Wifi
host_about:
Welcome to Melbourne!
 
 This is the city we live, play and work, it's incredibly beautiful, vibrant and diverse!
 
 Imagine a city where nobody is judged by the color of their skin, the money they make, their religion, address or sexual preference. Imagine a city where people relate to each other as one big community. 
 
 That's what we're out to find out....

space: Apartment has everything for a comfortable living: kitchen with dishwashing machine and all amenities, bathroom with washing machine and hair dryer, living room with the balcony and AC. If you are a little bit cold or want more comfort in bed, you can use the electric blanket to keep yourself warm.  Downstairs you'll find the IGA supermarket so you don't have to worry about shopping.
host_about:
Originated from Ukraine, I live in Australia the last 1,5 years. Always wanted to be an architect, I have a passion for modern architecture, contemporary art along with music and art festivals. 
Easy-going person and love having fun, yet I value privacy and focused on self-education when I have free time. 

I look forward to meeting you!

name: A walk to city centre Melbourne
summary: This stylish two storey, two bedroom apartment, with a sunny balcony and leafy courtyard, has a New York vibe. Enjoy its central East Melbourne location with a 10 minute walk to the CBD, Fitzroy, Collingwood and Richmond, and public transport on your doorstep.
space: This stylish two storey two bedroom apartment, with a sunny balcony and leafy courtyard, has a New York vibe. Enjoy its central location with a 10 minute walk to the CBD, Fitzroy, Collingwood and Richmond, and public transport on your doorstep. The fully furnished and self-contained apartment is set on the 4th floor of the Tribeca heritage development in East Melbourne. It is bright, sunny and quiet. There is a living/dining room and kitchen upstairs, with a balcony offering views of East Melbourne. Downstairs there are two double bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom, and a second bathroom with bath. Both bedrooms open onto a private courtyard. The kitchen has quality Blanco stainless steel appliances, including microwave and dishwasher. There is a European laundry with combined washer/dryer. Wifi is now available. The building has a rooftop pool and gym available to you. There is also a supermarket, bottle shop, pizza shop, fish shop, cafe and wine bar on ground level. East Melbourn
host_about: I live in Melbourne and am originally from Sydney. I love to travel, and have lived in USA for a year and UK for a year. I'm always planning my next adventure. I tend to spend my free time out and about with friends and soaking up the fun of Melbourne's cafes, bars and restaurants.  I like sunshine, outdoor spaces, markets, theatre, museums and galleries.

name: Relax in a Luxury Apartment in South Melbourne
summary: Enjoy waking up to the city views from this modern apartment. Clean and bright, it benefits from extensive natural light flooding in through the floor-to-ceiling windows. It's a stone's throw to trams, the city, and casinos.
space: The apartment has everything for you for a 7 night plus stay. It has even has a rice cooker. For those who don't want to cook there are great restaurants and shops within a 500m walk. We also have a  porta cot and high Chair available for $6.00 per night.
host_about: I am a hard working person and enjoy communicating with anyone and everyone. I love being an Airbnb host as it gives me a chance to help others and provide exceptional service. I love helping people make money and I experimented on my own apartment with Airbnb. It's been empty 27 days in 4 years. I now have 16 under Airbnb. They are properties that I have bought for investors (I'm a buyers advocate) and for landlords who wanted (needed) to double their incomes.  I take a budget and I purchase all the furnishing down to the potato peeler,  accept the deliveries, set it up, wash the towels, take the photographs and then list it on Airbnb. My motto is "We do everything for you except pay for it and move in." As the short stay business has grown let me introduce Motaz Alamarat. Motaz is my colleague and was head of "front of house" at a 5 star resort in Jordan. He is the most gorgeous young man and his mind set is completely focused on ensuring all our guests have an enjoyable experience. Most of the time Motaz will meet and greet our guests any time day or night. I help out where needed. He will ensure that the apartment is clean and everything is working on your arrival. We look to ensure our landlord's property achieves a 4.8 star score.

Perfectly positioned in the city's west-end with Southern Cross Station across the road, easy access to Melbourne's major universities and a collection of authentic eateries from every culture.  Sit back and read a book or enjoy a glass of wine while enjoying the view from the living room or head down to the pool, relax in the sauna or get in shape in the gym. This apartment has everything you need, whether you're spending the weekend taking in the sights of the city, or in the city on a business trip.   Perfect for business travelers or people just wanting to visit the area; Melbourne's business and  entertainment district are just a short tram ride away. name: 1 Bdr Apt Near Crown (RS1105)
summary: This apartment with a balcony has a true city feeling! It comfortably fits two and is centrally located, just 5 mins walk to Crown Casino, Melbourne convention center and 1 min to Public Transport. Enjoy a Kitchen, gym, hot tub and easy access to all attractions.
space: This is a self-contained 1 Bedroom/1 Bathroom apartment with a private balcony. The master bedroom includes a Queen size bed with built in robes. This apartment is well-equipped with a full kitchen with convection microwave, fridge, dishwasher, stove top cooking facilities and European style laundry facilities (Washer/Dryer). It offers a dining and lounge area with a 42-inch flat-screen TV including 30+ Foxtel channels. It features a fully reversed cycle air conditioner and a superior quality mattress. There is a secure entrance and elevator access in the building. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a fitness center. All the guests are provided fresh clean towels and linen as well as complementary guest amenities on arrival.
host_about:
Royal Stays is a family owned business providing quality accommodation in Melbourne since it started the operations in October 2012. Since then Royal Stays is a devoted and distinguished provider of premium transient residences, offering our guests ideally located, affordable alternatives to indulgence hotels accommodations for business tours, as well as protracted stays. Royal Stays believe in offering spacious and specially selected elements that simply exceed the requirements of our corporate guests and clients. Our comfortable and elegant furnished transient living elucidated solutions give amenities which deliver our guests home like comforts and relaxation, which gives delightful joy to our valued guests.

Since 2012 we have served 7000 guests staying over 20000 nights.

host_about:
DOMO Headquarters is located here in Melbourne, dedicating to vacation rental management, channel management, and planning and promotion. By integrating local resources such as advertisement, real estate, and hospitality, DOMO has created a fully integrated, seamless system to manage vacation rental apartments on a large scale, that is from portfolio development to hospitality and hotel management. DOMO has competitive advantages in helping property owners maximising their investment returns by providing professional solutions on how to manage vocational rental properties in scale in an effective manner. 

DOMO team is full of elites from different industries. With years of experiences in property management here in Australia, we aim to provide tailor-made solutions for each and every respective customer of ours. By appreciating local and international cultures, with thorough knowledge of the local markets, DOMO utilises creative and effective planning and ideas to increase the property value for our clients. We are looking forward to having you on board right here in Melbourne.  

DOMO公司总部位于文化之都墨尔本,是一家致力于BNB管理､策划和推广为主导的专业管理公司｡通过多方面当地优势资源的整合,DOMO已建立了整套完善的BNB服务体系——从开发房源到客房管理,DOMO全力帮助业主在市场中获得先机,紧扣市场脉搏,第一时间为客户提供及时有效的BNB全方位解决方案｡

DOMO集结行业精英,凭借丰富的BNB管理经验和执行能力服务于澳洲本地的各类物业｡我们追求“度身定制”的个性化服务理念,尊重本土人文及家居理念,无论是公寓或是别墅,DOMO都将采取有效的策略及富有创意的空间规划帮助客户获得更大的发展空间,提升物业价值｡我们期待您的加入,我们在墨尔本等待您的光临!

name: Comfortable and Affordable in Frankston South
summary: These rooms are in my house in bayside suburb Frankston. You have shared access to a well equipped kitchen, laundry, bathroom and lounge. It's not far from  Frankston CBD where there are lots of shops, a cinema, restaurants, a nice beach and yacht club. It's at the gateway to the Mornington Peninsula where there's a great variety of things to do including nature, wine and cheese tasting, surfing and sightseeing. The list price is for up to 2 people. Extra guests $20 each.
space: Other guests say it's homely and family-friendly. I agree. It's also pet-friendly and a just a short drive to the beach and shops.
host_about:
I'm semi-retired, mid fifties, interested in minimizing my impacts on the planet and I try to balance that against a modest amount of travelling.
Until a few years ago I worked as a weed scientist in the public sector in Victoria, Australia and these days I occupy myself mostly with a different part time public service job, some home improvement projects and local travel visiting friends and relatives.
I enjoy the good will of others in the Airbnb community as a traveler, host and also through its support teams.

I am a freelance designer who is getting master's degree of design in Melbourne. To me, exploring new places is one of the most exciting things ever. I like plants a lot and I enjoy arranging my place with various style and aesthetic. 

Get $55 AUD off your first trip : www.airbnb.com.au/c/ethany11

Both queen mattresses are soft, the sofa-bed is more firm. Hotel quality linen on the beds and hotel quality towels. High quality pillows. name: Sky Garden in Southbank, Melbourne
summary: Through traveling and learning from others the joy of being an airbnb guest, we want you to enjoy our home, our paradise on the 8th floor with beautiful relaxing garden. Please enjoy our cosy space filled with memories of past travels.
space: We are well travelled and have experienced many times the joy of being an airbnb guest and the pleasure of simple interactions with people from other places and cultures. In return we want you to enjoy our home, our paradise on the 8th floor with beautiful relaxing garden and to have the best memories of Melbourne. Please enjoy our cosy space filled with memories of past travels which we from time to time vary. We think you will find our place is in a most convenient location.  Make your self at home in the comfort of our open plan dining / lounge and kitchen, or relax in the spacious winter garden room which opens onto a large private balcony garden. Free WiFi internet access (unlimited) for your laptop There are two bedrooms . The master bedroom has two single beds which can be joined to make a King bed and the  second bedroom is 4.2 x 2.8, with a queen sized bed. Please let us know your requirement. You have hanging space with some drawers. Linen and towels provided.  Soap, Shampoo
host_about: We, Richard and Colin, have created a home out of our shared interests in travel, theater and gardening and design. We have travelled extensively in China, worked in India, and generally enjoyed amongst other places Turkey, Spain, Thailand, USA and Nepal. We moved to the city to be closer to the wonderful arts venues and dining experiences Melbourne has to offer. We were very lucky to find this place where we could create a garden retreat within 5 minutes walk of the CBD. We love Melbourne and traveling and so we are keen that visitors should go a way with a good impression and fond memories of their time here.

A big wonderful nature park is on rear. outdoor BBQ / picnic is possible.

name: Characteristic converted dairy
summary: An old character house right in the heart of St Kilda.  A converted dairy with great outdoor space, bright open living areas and a huge bedroom with private deck.  Close to the beach and famous Chapel St shopping district. Sharing the house with great hosts and a gorgeous dog.
space: In the heart of St Kilda, nestled under 3 huge eucalyptus trees.  This old character house has a country feel and retains all the charm from its dairy days in the late 1800's.  Original floors and ornate fire place.  Every room is big, bright and light.  Bedroom is double the normal size with its own private deck for your privacy.  Furnished very shabby chic country to keep with the theme.
host_about: The 4 "Dairy" residents, Kylie, Jo and Darren and the beautiful dog Kelsie, are all quirky, kind and charismatic friends.  We have all travelled extensively and love the opportunity to mix with other tourists and welcoming them into our house.  We are all busy running our own businesses, and have very active and social lives.

It's a five minute walk to the beach. It is on the number 96 tram line to the city its about 20 mins.  My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. Kitchen is fully functional. Note there is no TV, or washing machine but you have WIFI, and there is a laundromat 3 minutes walk. The key is in the lock box at the security door.
space: Unknown
host_about: Melbourne

name: Harvest Homestead - Urban Farm near the Dandenongs
summary: Nestled between the stunning Lysterfield valley and the Dandenong Ranges, this urban farm stay is a peaceful retreat only 40 mins from Melbourne's CBD. It is perfect for those wanting an idyllic country escape, but only want to travel a short distance. "Harvest Homestead" is a 3 acre property growing organic produce using permaculture principles with an abundance of farm animals to keep kids (and adults) entertained.
space: The farm styled home has high beamed ceilings, wood flooring and a generous rustic indulgence - from the hearty breakfast provisions, to the fresh flowers, to the opulent bed linen, to the handmade shelving crafted from wood hewn on the property.   It is a place for those who love beautiful surroundings and industrial farmhouse chic.  Relax and unwind in luxury in front of the wood fireplace on cold evenings or sit on the deck enjoying the private flower filled garden. The main bedroom has a queen bed overlooking the beautiful gardens, the second bedroom has a single bed and the living room has a queen sized sofa bed allowing for total of 5 persons. There is no extra charge per person.  For cold seasons, each bedroom has a heater unit, there is a reverse cycle air-conditioner for the living area and of course the wood fired heater with well stocked wood.  The large kitchen has all the appliances and cookware required to cook amazing farm style meals. A separate laundry is available to
host_about:
Welcome! We live on the outskirts of Melbourne, Victoria where we are fulfilling our dream of creating a home full of music, love for our Creator and being surrounded by natural beauty. My husband and I are both Engineers, but I am now a stay at home mum to our two beautiful children and take care of our homestead.  

Living in a lovely forested area with an abundance of birds, flowers and weeds helps to keep life an adventure filled with many opportunities - from spinning alpaca fibre, baking bread, growing mushrooms to making moss covered kokedamas!

 We love God, nature, ethnic food,  lighting huge bonfires with friends, all things homesteading and growing our own food. We've traveled extensively living 4 years in the US and RV'ing across the country, backpacked through Europe, New Zealand, Canada, Tahiti and have been to almost all the countries in Asia. 

During our travels we have stayed in many Airbnb's as guests and have thoroughly enjoyed our experiences, making many lifelong friends. This inspired us to host our own and invite others to our little slice of paradise. 
 
For us, family, friends and food make for good fellowship! We love sharing our beautiful farm and look forward to meeting you!

space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Light Up Your Life: Creative freedom - StKilda
summary: Hello! My name is Joe, I am a local from St Kilda. My goal is to ensure all my guests have the best experience possible and feel comfortable and happy with everything my house/city has to offer! I love meeting new people and hosting travellers in my home. I love sharing stories, eating nice food and having fun. My house is filled with local art from friends and visitors and I have the materials for any guests to get creative and add to the collection!
space: My Apartment is three bedrooms. One of those rooms is used for Air BnB. It is located only a 3 minute walk to the beach, 2 minute walk to Acland Street shops (great bars, restaurants and cafes) and is next to a variety of parks and open spaces. St Kilda is the perfect place to stay whilst in Melbourne and is only a quick tram ride away from the city centre. I offer my place as an EXPERIENCE to meet nice people and add to your travelling adventure! I work full-time, but am always up for showing guests around plus taking them out for drinks on the weekends! If the timing is right, I love to host barbecues and share nice food/drinks to ensure guests are having a good time and meeting other locals in the area.
host_about: Hi! My name is Joe, Im a very relaxed and easygoing person.  I am always very respectful of peoples spaces and love meeting knew people from all around the world. I am a very open minded person who respects all walks of life.  I am a new host to Air BnB and my goal is to give people an amazing experience in Melbourne and give them a real local inspired experience. I have travelled immensely throughout many countries and have seen some really great places. I can safely say my favourite memories travelling are always when I have met locals who have showed me around their beautiful cities, sharing food and experiences. I love knowing people from all around the world and learning about new cultures and languages.

space: This apartment includes;All furniture All housewares Fully equipped kitchen Utilities connection and ongoing usage charges (electricity, water & gas) All Linen and Towels LCD television Heating and cooling Laundry Unlimited wi-fi is an additional $22 per week Secure basement car park availbel $70 per week extra Housekeeping Service available - $120 per service There is a once of exit clean fee of $250 Bond $2,500 Bedding is a King, or two single beds depending on your requirements. host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

name: Riverlands art studios
summary: Enjoy a spacious room with high ceilings in this character filled, art clad, shared home. Very close to the city and Fitzroy and just a short walk to the beautiful Yarra River and parklands and Collingwood’s gallery café district. With 12 bus lines and Collingwood station outside the door, including bus direct to St Kilda it's very easy to get around.
space: This is a cozy and creative home. Situated just 2 km from the city, on a main road in the nexus of Fitzroy, Abbotsford, and Richmond.  The kitchen is well equipped for you to create meals with your amazing ingredients available only a short walk away, at the famous Victoria street (Little Vietnam) please also help your self to tea and coffee. The room is large, comfortable and a great place to unwind. In the front of our home, there is a shop front still in the prosses of being fitted out as an art space that will sell plants. As your host, I look forward to meeting you and filling you in on this amazing city, what’s available locally and anything else you may need.
host_about:
I’m a professional artist, designer, and photographer with lots of experience with travel, visiting over 40 countries. I love discovery, nature, art, new experiences and sharing. I look forward to welcoming you as a host or staying in your unique space.
kanealexanderimages

We love to cook - but not every night :)

name: Single room for female travellers
summary: Cosy room in a 3 bedroom Victorian house 8km from city centre (about 30 min bus trip away)  The room has a single bed, desk and wardrobe, a beautiful ornamental fireplace and lots of character.  The house has a lovely large living/kitchen area opening out to a small courtyard.
space: The home has lovely wooden floors throughout and the back room is huge with lots of natural light.  I have travelled quite a bit and have mementoes from my travels throughout the home.  The bathroom has a beautiful clawfoot bath which I highly recommend if you are here on a cooler day. Your room has a single bed, bedside table, built in wardrobe, a desk and chair.  There's a heater and electric blanket for those cold nights, a dressing gown and a universal adaptor.  If there's anything else you need I'm sure I can help you out. The bathroom has a supply of shampoo, conditioner, soap, toothpaste and a few airline toothbrushes if you need or forget anything!  You'll also get a towel and washcloth/face washer.
host_about: I am a 38 year old  who has lived in Melbourne my whole life.  I love to travel, but also love to come home as I love Melbourne and will never call anywhere else home. Your cozy bedroom is set up to give you a restful sleep during your stay so you can enjoy your days in Melbourne to the fullest.
space: Designed to make our guests feel at home, the bedroom comes with large built-in wardrobes, personal heater, wooden double bed, a reading lamp, pillows, cushions and linens. host_about:
Hello Wonderful people of Airbnb,

We are Ali and Sana, a married couple in our late 20-s.

Ali is a Ph.D. student at the University of Melbourne while Sana is from New York City and a Master’s grad in International Affairs. 

Our friends describe Sana as a chatty, energetic person and Ali as an amazing listener and problem solver. We are both coffee lovers and are always trying out different single-origin coffees from all the amazing cafes Melbourne has to offer. 

We love eclectic cuisines, diverse cultures, different languages and have both travelled extensively across Asia, the Middle East and the United States. 

At our home, we promise you unparalleled warmth, lots of smiles, and advice about getting around the city if you need it. 

P.S: Ali is a certified barista and we are happy to make you a cup of single origin latte on our very own professional grade Breville!

summary: Situated on the doorsteps of the CBD and just a stroll from the beach, retreat to your peaceful inner city oasis. Hidden behind a non-descript exterior, you will enter a truly unique, recently redone interior with the most soulful backyard you can imagine.  Whether you are here for a week or more to explore Melbourne, an overnight before catching the Spirit of Tasmania, or simply need a convenient and easy place to stay while here for business, you will feel perfectly at home here.
space: As a city retreat, you are next to the CBD. <3 min walk to the 109 tram. As a beach house, bike to the beach in 5 or stroll there in 20. As a Port Melb local, walk to the Railway Pub, or 1 block more to Rubiras. Or 2 more blocks to Bay St and all its food and shops. As a home, use our kitchen, dine in our backyard or under the bungalow. After kick back in the hammock or stay indoors and enjoy Netflix. And then escape to bedroom designed to feel like an edgy hotel room with plenty of space for making yourself feel at home. Even catch up on some work at your private desk by your window. Relax and enjoy.
host_about: After a few years living in the village in NYC, the city definitely stole my heart.  But my travels, for work and fun, have taken me all over the world and I have loved every second of it. I moved from NYC to Melbourne over 5 years ago, and Port Melbourne for the last two. If there is one place other than NYC that I love calling home, it is Port Melbourne - near the beach and city and full of warm, beautiful people.

space: This 98sqm spacious, light-filled and homely two bedroom, two bathroom apartment with beautiful bay views is conveniently located on the edge of the city which means it's easy to access to shops, sporting venues and more with a tram stop right outside the apartment.  The apartment has two beautifully furnished rooms with queen sized beds which make it perfect for two friends travelling together, two couples or a family. Each room has built-in wardrobes with hangers to provide plenty of storage for you to unpack and make yourself feel at home, as well as reading materials and a study desk for you to put your laptop and electronics. The master bedroom has an ensuite and the guest bedroom has access to a separate bathroom with a bath for you to relax in. The open plan living/kitchen overlooks the bay so you can enjoy the views while watching TV or enjoying your meals in the dining area. The kitchen has a microwave, gas stove and oven plus all the diningware and cooking utensils you need t
host_about:
Tom and I are young professionals who work and live in Melbourne as we love our city. We love to travel and have stayed at several AirBnBs ourselves which is what made us decide to list our apartment out to fellow travellers. Always happy to give suggestions and tips on what to do and see in Melbourne - there's always something on and we'd love to help you maximise your stay here.

Our recent trips include:
- Philippines – I worked about a year here on a very remote island 15 hours from Manila by ferry. The people were amazing and so was the country. Great place for diving!
- Malaysia – we indulged in so much street food.
- Singapore – more food!
- Japan – visited manga museums, awe-inspired by amazingly advanced technology, ate lots of raman ordered from vending machines
- France – I did a summer abroad in Angouleme in high school then in Vichy so try to go back whenever we get the chance!
- New York - so much to see & do. We love the art scene and indulging on street food.

We are always planning our next trip and hope to one day visit Norway and road trip through the US up to Canada to see friends in Vancouver then go up to the Rockies.

name: Cozy Heritage CBD Hideaway
summary: Gordon Snug is a beautiful, modern suite, as cozy as a Hobbit Hole in the stunning surrounds of heritage-listed Gordon House, right in the heart of Theatre District at the top end of the CBD. With a heated pool, two cafés and 24-hour access, it's the perfect base to explore Melbourne.
space: Gordon House was built in 1884 for theatrical entrepreneur, politician and philanthropist George Selth Coppin, one of the fathers of Australian theatre. The building provided custom accommodation for Coppin's theatrical colleagues, modelled on the Chelsea Model Lodging House in London. Designed by renowned architect William Pitt, its symmetrical façade reflects Gothic, Romanesque and Renaissance sources, and its spacious courtyards allow for maximisation of natural light and air. Little Bourke Street is a one-way street with no trams; its Paris End is one of the quieter parts of the city, particularly during week, with a few pedestrians, occasional cars, and sometimes the clip-clop of horse-drawn buggies going past. The Snug is situated on the Atrium level of Gordon House, with the beautiful courtyard just outside the door, and the pool and barbecue area steps away. The apartment is essentially a hotel suite, with a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and connecting corridor snugly occupying it

Private bedroom and shared communal spaces with a family friendly feel. inclusive of internet (also can provide dinner at extra cost) We also provide our guests to free access to our estates gym which includes SWIMMING POOL, GYM, TENNIS COURTS AND BBQ In the house its me and my parents who are more then happy to be of assistance to you during your stay with us no TV in the room any more, photos needs to be updated. name: Executive Living in Caulfield
summary: This spacious open plan apartment with sundrenched balcony is stylish as well as functional and caters for both the business executive and today's modern family.
space: The furniture, beds, bedding and linen are of the highest quality. We provide free access to Netflix and high speed unlimited internet. The apartment comes with security parking with lift access and the building has a security entrance.  You will find yourself superbly located on Hawthorn Rd in the heart of South Caulfield with easy access to Melbourne's Eastern suburbs and a short ride into the CBD.
host_about: Conscientious and hard working

name: Convenient Cosy Private University City Life!
summary: Tucked away in a welcoming, private and relaxing space. It comfortably fits two or one. It's centrally located to many City Spots including Queen Victoria Market and University of Melbourne. Wake up to award winning coffee around the corner. Less than 10 mins away, nearby neighborhoods include Southbank, Docklands, North Melbourne, Fitzroy, Collingwood, Brunswick and Flemington. Make yourself at home with a fully equipped kitchenette. FREE public transport at your fingertips.
space: Enjoy your our own space in the middle of Melbourne, close to everything you need! Complete with a quiet, private terrace to soak in the fresh air. Relax! The entire studio apartment is yours to enjoy 100%.  Comfortable modern amenities include Microwave, Fridge, utensils (cooking and eating), kettle, toaster and kitchenette for your use. Enjoy complimentary tea, coffee and bathroom amenities. Enjoy a peaceful night sleep in the Double bed, complete with linen and towels. Basic toiletries (Body  Wash and Handsoap) are provided so you can travel light! Coin operated Laundries and Dryers are also available in the building and clothes rack for drying is also provided in the apartment. Numerous Public Transport options at your doorstep. Best of all take advantage of Melbourne's FREE Tram Zone (less than 5 mins walk). It's walking distance to many Melbourne's bars, cafes, shopping and great tourist spots. It's excellent proximity to many Universities and Hospitals. Local brochures and guide
host_about:
I love eating and exploring new places. One of my favourite things in a new country is just to wander around a city aimlessly. For me it's not so much about ticking the list, I'm the kind of person who would rather spend a bit more time with some new friends enjoying a new experience.

I've studied a semester in Italy, and recently came home from living and working in Japan. Having Couchsurfed and Air BnB'd around the world, I've had a variety of experiences with many different people. I've met some amazing friends through it, and would love to share that similar experience with other's, now with my own place in Melbourne. I like to give people their own space to explore, but also be there to try and help make their life a little easier if needed.

I've driven across most parts of Australia ( I only need to drive from Broome to Darwin, but I'm not so great with a 4WD!), so if you have any questions or would like any suggestions feel free to ask!

I love Melbourne, it's the best city in the world! It has awesome cake and awesome brunch. I love sharing my city and helping new people discover how great it can be. Don't get me started about the coffee, it's holy water.

name: private room - Doncaster
summary: This luxury Townhouse is only 5 minutes walk to the one of the best shopping centers in Doncaster. Only 3 minutes walk to bus station and direct 907 bus route to CBD. Close to all amenities such as Supermarket, Office Works and Schools. This Room is good for couples, solo adventures and business travelers.
space: Unknown

space: Located at Melbourne East, bus station is around the street corner, a few minutes’ drive from train station, highway, shopping mall and restaurants. We could provide short-distance pick-up service, home catering or regional good food. We also provide local tour service, includes tour guide, car rental and personal tour plan designing service.
