If you are a backpacker who are seeing this post proves that we are meant to be friends. We also love traveling, love meeting people, love sharing stories and experiences together. We love the feeling of on the road. So we know what you need on the road. And the most important thing one needs when traveling--a safe accommodation with a helpful house-owner who are familiar with the city and able to help you with your perfect Melbourne travel (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Lifestyle on Lygon
summary: My place is close to Iconic Italian establishments 400 Gradi, Woodstock Pizzicheria and Zia Teresa along with a myriad of other Spanish, Asian, Greek and Middle Eastern restaurants, plus pubs, bars and craft breweries. You’ll love my place because of the vibrant neighbourhood and tram at the doorstep taking you straight into the heart of the CBD (Spencer Street, Federation Square, Bourke Street Mall and Casino/Southbank). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: King size bed, modern kitchen appliances and loads of natural light from the balcony.  Coles Express conveniently located across the road and Barkly Square Shopping Centre only 1km away. Other nearby places of interest include Melbourne Zoo, Princes Park and Royal Park Golf Course.  Located within a vibrant restaurant, bar and café strip and just a few tram stops from the Carlton dining precinct.  Tram stop right outside (Routes 1 and 8).
host_about: Unknown

name: Secret High Street Apartment
summary: Super lovely apartment behind a shop on high street. 1 minute away from 86 tram, restaurants and bars. 5 minutes away from Northcote station. 10 minute drive from Collingwood/Fitzroy.  There's a small kitchen/living area and a private bedroom with queen bed, an ensuite and balcony. I work at a live music venue and there's plenty in the area, happy to make you a little gig guide if that's what you're into, or recommend bars, food etc (Also pls note this is my actual house and contains my stuff)
space: Unknown
host_about: Hey, I'm a student from Melbourne. I work at a local music venue.

name: Southbank Room with a View
summary: The apartment is close to Everything!  The City is at your doorstep.  Adjacent to Crown Casino and a short walk to Flinders Street Station, Fed Square, South Melbourne Market, Trams, Buses and the Yarra River! While the place has many great qualities, you'll fall in love with the view.  The Bedroom has five floor to ceiling windows that encapsulate the stunning Melbourne skyline.  Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: Unknown

I provide the basic cooking and cocktail making equipment. Within the 5-10 mins walk, you can also reach a cafeteria, an Irish bar, 2 Asain grocery stores, a gym and many little restaurants. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

Offers a large Queen sized bed and a new pull out sofa bed that sleeps 2.  The apartment will come with a friend, 6 month old Oscar the cat. space: Brilliantly located in the heart of St Kilda.  A cosy 1 bed apartment with everything you need. No street noise.
host_about: Young professional living in Melbourne . I'm away on holiday between the 22nd December - 12th January when my apartment will be available.

summary: Clean, light room in a nice open-plan house. Coffee and tea making facilities, as well as cooking utensils are available. It is in a very quiet street close to local buses, and also about 7 minutes walk to the local train station. Yarraville is 5 stations (about 15 minutes) from the centre of the city. Yarraville village has cafes and restaurants. There are several shops and supermarkets a short walk away as well.
space: Unknown
host_about: I am an easy-going Chinese-Australian man and I live with my partner. I have recently travelled to Europe and America and enjoyed staying with several different Air BnB hosts. I am creative and really love meeting new people. I also like most kinds of music and travel has become a real passion.

name: Wonderful location in Balwyn North
summary: Total privacy and independence. Our home has two levels; we have the ground level and permanent tenants occupy the upper level.  We plan to travel a lot more in future and make our home available to Airbnb guests. The entry opens to a  spacious 2 bedroom townhouse with excellent facilities. Peaceful. Free Wi-Fi and free on street parking. Own private entry and exit. Lovely garden .
space: Off the spacious entry area, there are two large bedrooms both with queen size beds. Modern large bathroom with both bath and shower, and  2 vanity basins. There are large open plan living areas with a very comfortable sofa bed and a couch, also very comfortable lounge chairs. A formal dining table and a kitchen breakfast bar  with modern stools. Full kitchen facilities including washing machine dishwasher oven hotplates , microwave and refrigerator. Nice garden views from every window. In addition we have a  cot and a toddler sized bed available. Spacious and light filled townhouse with a large deck overlooking the back garden. Just around the corner from Aldi.
host_about: Semi retired couple. Airbnb hosts. We love living in Balwyn North (Melbourne, Australia).

name: East Melbourne 2BR+WIFI +CARP Walk MCG / CBD
summary: IMPORTANT: DEAR POTENTIAL GUESTS, PLEASE ENQUIRE WITH ME DIRECTLY VIA "CONTACT HOST" BUTTON TO CHECK SEASONAL PRICING/AVAILABILITY BEFORE REQUESTING A BOOKING, I CAN SEND SPECIAL OFFER FROM OUR END IF INTERESTED. THANK YOU My place is close to MCG, Melbourne Park, CBD and all that's Great about Inner Melbourne. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the light, the comfy beds, and the cosiness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).
space: Please note below re. rates and bedrooms: Pricing quoted may differ somewhat from the price quoted on the right of this screen. Higher rates apply for stays during peak periods (eg, Xmas / NY and premium Melbourne sporting events/special events). Rates are negotiable for long stays and last minute bookings.  Please use "Contact Host" button to enquiry with me directly. Please note, for all bookings  for insurance reasons, our guests must sign our short stay industry standard terms and conditions of stay PDF Form.  This will be emailed to you shortly after booking prior to arrival. small pet surcharge $25/stay. Maybe + for longer stays. Depends on breed/type too whether pets allowed Please Note: Carpark residents exclusive carpark pass is provided for residents only street parking. 24/7. No restrictions for directly easy to find carparking out the front. Permit works for most of East Melbourne area/streets as well
host_about:
Hi There!

I'm a corporate events professional based in East Melbourne/South Yarra in Melbourne. Friendly, easy going & accommodating. I am passionate about events, travel, food, wine, meeting new people & new experiences! 

Our homes are in inner city Melbourne. South Yarra/St Kilda Rd Precinct/East Melbourne. Brillant access to CBD but slightly removed for peace and quiet at night. They are certainly mere minutes from Melbourne's CBD and all major inner Melbourne attractions that make Melbourne "Marvellous".

We aim to provide the most cost effective and best value designer/boutique accommodation in inner Melbourne.  

They are ideal for leisure travellers who are looking for a unique place to call home whilst in Melbourne,or for corporate professionals working short-term in CBD/inner city. Perhaps you're coming to our fair city for one of our many special events....?

If you are interested in one of the properties i have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings under my profile or please email me through airbnb messaging system, as l will likely have another apartment/home available that will suit your needs.  I am here to provide suggestions where you see fit

Any questions please don't hesitate to call out, look forward to chatting with you about your finer requirements. 

Myself and our events network are here to assist you. More than happy to provide sights/restaurant/event/cafe or transport tips to ensure a memorable, extraordinary, safe  and convenient trip!

I have airbnb on my iphone, so i normally reply rapidly.

Feel free to contact me anytime.

Cheers Alex

name: Light filled master, bath/shower ensuite & balcony
summary: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony and large ensuite including a bathtub and a shower. The room is on the top floor and offers very good privacy. The room has a huge wardrobe. and two windows facing east, offering beautiful morning light. House is situated near vibrant chapel street (2min walk), tram stop to city is at our door step. All bedding is brand new. Facilities include unlimited wireless wifi and washing machine and dryer. Free street parking (guest parking tag available).
space: Our home is a 3 story townhouse, situated in this very cool looking little precinct.  Bottom floor has a garage and laundry facility, middle floor is where you will find the kitchen, a large dining room and cosy living room and the top floor is where the master bedroom can be found.
host_about: Hi there, I am Fabrice, 33 year old HR professional living in Melbourne. I love people, outdoors, particularly the ocean and generally just can’t get enough physical activity :)

name: Old Warburton Railway Cottage
summary: The "Old Warburton Railway Cottage" is a very cosy 100 year old home, oozing with charming character in the heart of the Warburton village. There are views from the cottage and verandah overlooking the Yarra River and Swing Bridge, combined with the sounds of ducks quacking in conversation. Leave your car at the cottage and either walk or ride your bike along the Warburton Trail accessed by the backyard steps.  Old Warburton Railway Cottage is only steps away from Warburton's cafes and shops.
space: Sitting by the welcoming fire in the lounge, reading a booking or playing a variety of board games provides a relaxing and fun time. There are three bedrooms, a comfortable sunroom and a lounge room. A well equipped kitchen with stove, microwave oven and dishwasher, pantry and fridge, laundry with washing machine and tub create the perfect self-contained getaway for a longer stay.
host_about: We are a property management company in the Yarra Valley, Yarra Junction, Victoria. We manage many holiday homes in our area and are more than happy to help you with your travel needs.

name: Home with a View
summary: Spacious self contained unit at the ground floor of a two storey home situated in a quiet circuit with separate entrance and stunning panoramic views.   Situated in Melbourne’s south-eastern suburbs, Narre Warren North is a unique community with green open spaces creating the ideal environment and is only 45 minutes away from the CBD.
space: This unit has a large bedroom with a comfortable queen bed (with the option of an additional sofa bed to sleep extra guests), walk-in-wardrobe and an ensuite wheelchair-accessible bathroom. The unit is fitted with reverse-cycle air conditioning and an open living/kitchenette/ breakfast area, with bar fridge, kettle, toaster and microwave facilities, as well as a lounge area with a TV. Wi-fi is available on request.  Our home is accessible via stairs directly to the front entrance and for those who cannot climb stairs a chair lift is available for use. This accommodation is a non-smoking home.
host_about: Unknown

name: 62nd floor 2 bedrooms Luxurious Apartment in CBD
summary: Next to Southern Cross train station, can take Airport Express Skybus to here !  King size bed in both bedrooms, deluxe mattress, best for 4 people, maximum 5-6 people, also provide a travel portacot. I can help you book parking space inside the building for $15 dollars per day. Free trams downstairs, cafes, luxury shops, CBD, close to everything..
space: It is a brand new apartment, french windows with great full view of CBD, Yarra River, and South bank area! It's a high standard luxury 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms apartment. You can use washer dryer combo, fridge, kettle,toaster, dishwasher, microwave, oven, pans& pots, cups, dishes& cutleries. I will prepare clean bed linen, bath towels, instant coffee & tea bags. shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer.  Free tram stop downstairs Easy to go anywhere A lot of restaurants cafes and shopping mall Melbourne Central Bourke street Mall Emporium Myer & David Jones Victoria Market Crown casino entertainment Melbourne Exhibition Convention Center Etihad Stadium Dockland Melbourne Aquarium Yarra Riverside Port Melbourne St Kilda Beach Carlton Fitzroy Garden Melbourne University  RMIT University Melbourne Zoo Melbourne Muzium Flinders station Federation Square Botanic Garden Melbourne Art Gallery Collins Street is a major street in the central Melbourne running approximately east to west. summary: This amazing one bedrooms apartment situated on the eight  floor . Offering resort style facilities including gym, indoor pool, sauna and tennis court . Door steps to tram stop and 3kms to CBD. 10 mins to St Kilda Beach. Close to convenience store, National Gallery. Perfect for business travellers with meetings on St Kilda Rd. Convenient for many of Melbournes events - including the F1 Grand Prix, Aust Tennis Open and the AFL Grand Final.

host_about: We are a young professional couple that loves travelling and meeting people from overseas. Very easy going and social. Originally from Peru, but living and loving Melbourne as much as home.

space: 1 Double bedroom available on a newly renovated house with ducted heating and refrigerator cooling. The house is fully furnished. Next to clayton station  and Clayton shopping centre. We accept transient tenants. Can accommodate couple.

space: In a large apartment, this large room is on the second level of the apartment offering full privacy with a private bathroom. Large built in wardrobes and tallboy. There’ plenty of floor space for bags or morning yoga!

name: Bright, modern flat right by Thornbury station
summary: A bright, modern one bedroom apartment with everything you could need for a comfy stay. The perfect Thornbury location, right next to the train station which takes you directly into the city and only a minute from High Street with all the delicious food it has to offer.
space: A one bedroom apartment, with an open plan lounge. The sofa in the lounge also pulls out into a double bed if you’re travelling with friends.
host_about: I'm an events manager, my husband and I have recently moved to Melbourne. I love travelling, going out for delicious meals in Thornbury and seeing live music. I spent the last 5 years in London and enjoy discovering new parts of the world as a local would.

name: Stunning family home in Melbourne
summary: Stunning family home in quiet residential area but close to a lively high street packed with cafes, 15 minute train ride to Melbourne City Centre. Perfect location for seeing Melbourne and surrounding areas.
space: Our house is stunning with large dining/living/kitchen area. The house is surrounded by outdoor spaces to sit and relax and enjoy within a native Australian garden. Main bedroom with very comfortable king bed, a separate studio with double sofa bed and en-suite bathroom, a teenage bedroom with king single and sofa bed and a small quiet lounge with long sofas which can be used as an additional bed. Three modern bathrooms. The house is situated in a friendly neighborhood,  5 minutes from a lively shopping street packed with cafes. Train runs direct to Melbourne's exciting city center.
host_about: I am from Brighton, UK. Came to live in Melbourne 7 years ago with my Australian partner and our children. Most of my family are in the UK so we frequently return. I am a nurse and also a teacher of English as a second language, my partner is an academic at Monash University. Our house is lovely, in a warm and friendly neighborhood  and just a short train trip away from the city and even nearer to all the sporting arenas.

name: QUEEN BED ROOM FOR FEMALE TRAVELLERS
summary: My place is close to Ebi Fine foods,. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the light, and the kitchen.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Charming two storey stable conversion in a mansion
summary: This two story leafy garden standalone property was a converted horse stables for the ajoining manor house at the front. You will have private access and your own pathway to the property. It's close to Fitzroy nightlife and great eateries. Wedged right in the centre of the golden triangle consisting of Brunswick, Lygon, Fitzroy. Its also walking distance to the city (about 20 mins). There are trams and buses in the area to take you further afield. But why would you need to its all right here...
space: The space This house was a horse stables for the adjacent Manor, and has been delightfully converted into a modern townhouse. This townhouse includes fridge, kettle, outdoor dining suite, bed, cupboard, clothing racks and air-conditioning. There is a leafy garden area that separates the stables from the main share house.

summary: Beautiful FF apt on St Kilda Road. Tram directly out front.  24 hour concierge/room service, front office , gym, wine bar and restaurant. 5 mins to city center on tram. A/C and heating, large TV.  Washer / dryer. Wifi can be purchased at reception as can secure parking.
space: If you are staying for more than a week.  I offer a maid service where I will come in and clean the apartment and change the bedding and towels.

name: Cozy quiet 2 bedroom sweet home Deakin Uni & Chady
summary: Cozy home away from home. This HAH home is an entire floor of a two-story house with separate entrance, the two bedroom flat had an updated kitchen equipped with modern compliances, luxury bathroom with complimentary toiletry, a sofa bed in the living room. if need any assistance please let us know immediately. hope you will enjoy your stay and feel like home Wifi and Foxtel TV available:) 2km to Deakin Uni 2km to train station 10 mins drive to Chadstone shopping center 20 mins drive to the city
space: Welcome to HAH Flat Mt Waverley this is a quiet neighborhood, birds to wake you up in the morning.  Restaurant and grocery store within walking distance (on Andrew St) This is spacious for 2-3 guests, ideal for 4 guests and accommodates a maximum of 6 guests. What we have for you: BEDDING 1 x King Bed 1 x Queen Bed  1 x comfortable Sofa Bed in the living area Others: Tontine Quilt(100% Australia made), pillows, sheets&cushions KITCHEN APPLIANCES: Complimentary tea & coffee Oven, microwave, cook top, range hood Fridge & freezer Dishwasher & detergents Kettle, mugs, cups, wine glasses & dishes Pots, pans, cutlery & cooking utensils LAUNDRY Washing machine & Dryer 2 in 1 BATHROOM Shampoos, conditioner, body Wash Floor mat, toilet rolls, bath and face towels Hair dryers, make up cotton LIVING ROOM Designer coffee table 3 seater sofa bed TV unit X-box Rugs Heater Bar fridge DINNIN AREA Modern dinning table with 4 chairs OTHER 46 inch Smart TV Air Conditioning & heating
host_about:
Hi, Jack and I are down to earth people who love a catch up with our friends over a coffee or a glass of wine and like to trying new places to eat and drink in Melbourne. 
We have all traveled, sharing wonderful experiences and stories. We enjoy hosting and you will feel very welcome in our home. Jack and I hope you get to explore this wonderful city of Melbourne!

name: Yorkshire Brewery Townhouse in Collingwood
summary: This refined city edge residence demonstrates the spectacular evolution of the former Yorkshire Brewery site from an iconic industrial landmark to a residential address of exceptional contemporary luxury. The passage of progress ensures these evocative surroundings now provide a fabulous setting for inner city living in a location that since the 1860s has been a focal point in Collingwood, acknowledged as Melbourne's foundation suburb.
space: Welcome to JW Residence JW Residence incorporates Modern Japanese Minimalist design with a contemporary interior and fittings to provide our guests with a comfortable and affordable stay.  Its well rounded styling makes it suitable for both business travellers and family leisure. The house is a brand new two level townhouse securely located within the Yorkshire Brewery apartment complex with 24 hour security patrol and concierge services.   The ground level consists of a living room (with a two seater sofa and two individual armchairs), a dinning room (with a timber dining table and 4 matching chairs) and a well equipped kitchen with European appliances.   The two-bedrooms are on the second level of the townhouse, each with their own individual bathroom.  Both bedrooms are fitted with a double size bed and topped with high quality bed sheets, professionally cleaned after every stay.
host_about: Unknown

name: Historic, Iconic and Central CBD
summary: The 1893 former headquarters for the Victorian Railways was converted into apartments in 1997. Grandeur and serenity, with high ceilings and excellent amenities. Enjoy your Melbourne experience from a convenient and easily accessible central location. Located within the free tram zone, a few minutes walk from the Skybus airport terminal and Southern Cross train station. Cross the river to the Crown Casino & Entertainment Complex, or to the Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre.
space: A comfortable and inviting 2-bedroom apartment offers you accommodation to make your stay in Melbourne memorably enjoyable. Walk through the main door of the building, and leave the hustle and bustle of the city behind. Glide up the Grand Stairs and experience how the building was when it opened in 1893. The apartment has 6m (23ft) ceilings, with a mezzanine floor added for the bedrooms. Downstairs is the main living area, laundry and extra toilet. I also live in the apartment, so all the normal facilities are available. You will see from the photos that the bedrooms have a balcony, open to the lounge below. They are not fully enclosed. If the open plan layout will make you feel uncomfortable, please do not book the room. I want you to have a positive experience both here and in Melbourne. The windows are double-glazed for a peaceful night's sleep. With one meter thick external walls, the temperature inside the apartment is stable, rising gradually during the summer months and falling
host_about:
I have been fortunate to have travelled throughout my working life, including working in China. I have visited around 30 countries, but Africa and South America are still on my list. When I travel, I like to take the back roads. It often means discovering interesting places off the worn tourist routes.

I was in a professional technical role, but decided to retire early. Now I am happy to give back a little and provide a positive experience to Melbourne visitors.

I enjoy cycling, art, architecture and history. I try to keep abreast of current events. My musical tastes are fairly broad, but I am not across the latest music. I don't have much time for celebrity culture.

name: Comfortable & Modern: Family Home in Elsternwick
summary: Family-friendly, beautifully renovated home located in the Gardenvale end of Elsternwick. 5 minutes walk to everything you need in Martin Street - Gardenvale station, cafes, Foodworks, takeaway shops. A 'home away from home', all your comforts are provided for - ducted heating and air-conditioning, wood fire, secure backyard and front gate, BBQ, car-parking, kids toys and books, wifi and Foxtel.
space: A beautiful, spacious, light-filled home with easy access to everything Brighton, Elsternwick, and Melbourne have to offer.   * All linen provided * Sleeps up to 6 guests (plus additional cot and portacot available).  * Modern, clean spaces with new appliances * Fully-equipped kitchen * Fully-equipped laundry * Open-plan kitchen, dining and living areas * Master bedroom with ensuite and large walk-in shower.  * 2nd bedroom with queen size bed * 3rd bedroom with king single, trundle and cot * Additional portacot available with room to set up in all three bedrooms.  * Wifi + Foxtel + Chromecast * Wood burner (wood provided) - the ultimate cosy winter night with a glass of red! * BBQ and outdoor dining * Pets allowed (on request) * Great home for kids - toys, secure and safe outdoor spaces to play, children's table & chairs, playground 200m away * Books, games, puzzles * Tea, coffee and milk provided, plus other pantry basics * 15-20 minutes to the city by train (Sandringham Line) * 5 min
host_about: Unknown

name: "Laetus" your 2 Level Warehouse CBD Apartment
summary: RELISTED MARCH 2018- UNIQUE MELBOURNE CITY WAREHOUSE 2 LEVEL APARTMENT  - being Co-hosted by an experienced 4 year plus Airbnb Host also hosts and lives in the building Great location in the heart of city in the free tram zone.  This freshly painted basic 2 level, 1 bedroom + study converted warehouse has living areas upstairs with separate laundry/powder room and bedrooms downstairs with full bathroom and study converted into a bedroom.
space: Our apartment is a unique upside down apartment, bedroom and study in the basement underground and living areas upstairs.  High ceiling and all you need for a self sufficient stay.  Full sized kitchen and laundry with washer/dryer. Great for families (note due to the stairs and layout no toddlers/ young children).  Great for groups of friends - Queen bed and bunk bed.
host_about:
We're David and Anne and we love our apartment hidden in a laneway in the legal district of Melbourne CBD. We are from down south in Tasmania and regularly travel to Melbourne and utilise our Melbourne base, when we don't use it, our daughter or friends do.  Instead of staying empty we are now opening it up to the world to live like a local and stay in the heart of Melbourne CBD.

Lucky for us, Penny an Airbnb host for over 3 1/2 years lives in the building and helps manage the property when we are not available.

Our interests are reading, gardening, walking, music, films, theatre and spending time family and friends.

name: Luxe City-fringe Ensuite Hawthorn East
summary: TWO BEDROOMS AVAILABLE. (book them each via separate listing) The downstairs private bedroom for 1 or 2 people is light, clean & fresh with 1 queen sized bed with en suite bathroom & robe. The other bed room is upstairs with it's own private bathroom & toilet  outside of the bedroom is at an ADDITIONAL COST. See: https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/18493154
space: Beautiful large town-house boasts modern design elements with luxurious bathroom fit-outs and a superb collection of indoor-outdoor areas.  Stylish open plan lounge/dining room setting. In winter there is a contemporary gas fireplace in the family living and all rooms have hydronic heating. The summer heat won't be an issue here thanks to the home's refrigerated cooling. If the indoor entertaining options are not enough, the spectacular outdoor area completes the picture, boasting a small beautiful in-ground pool and landscaped courtyard. Pets sadly no longer live on this property.
host_about:
Former Aucklander living & married for 34 years in Melbourne to a born & bred local Hawthorn girl. We are in our own fashion accessories business together & always seem to be planning a trip somewhere. 

We love checking out the roads less travelled soaking up the culture of other countries along with meeting new people. combine this with good food, wine & laughter & we have our ideal holiday break. 

Hopefully we can bring this to you if you wish during your stay with us.

name: Home close to beach, St Kilda, train and shops
summary: My place is good for couples and families (with kids).
space: Unknown
host_about: We are a family of 4 - two small girls.  We live in St Kilda.

name: Williamstown Beach Cottage
summary: 2 bedroom Victorian Cottage located in the heart of beautiful Williamstown. Five minutes walk to beaches, trains, shops and cafes. Cottage is older style but very clean, comfortable and everything works. Lovely north facing  courtyard at the rear. Williamstown has a quiet village feel yet it is only 20 mins by train or car to the city. Two push bikes provided. Preference for longer stays, minimum of 6 days.
space: Great location, in a lovely suburb. This house isn't modern and fancy but it has a good feel, is clean and comfortable and has everything you need for a self sufficient business trip or a relaxing holiday in Melbourne. Unlimited WIFI, Dishwasher, king bed, television, reclining sofa, 2 push bikes, private north facing courtyard with entertainment area and gas BBQ.
host_about:
Hi 
I'm Lisa. I am semi retired and enjoy sailing, gardening and being an Airbnb Host. I manage two gorgeous properties on the Great Ocean Road, a cute little cottage in Williamstown and a very cool boat house in Fiji. 
Aire River House
Aire River Escape
Williamstown Beach Cottage
Fiji Boat House
I work hard to make sure my houses are spotless and well equipped. My style of hosting is to leave you alone, unless you need my assistance of course. 
Its very important to me that my guests feel like they have got value for money and that I have provided all the requirements for a rewarding holiday, the rest is up to you! I also try to ensure my properties have a low impact on the environment; this is not just token. You wont find wasteful throw away toiletries or harsh cleaners.  You will find recycling, composting and little touches that help to minimize the footprint of your holiday.  I value clients that also respect this and are conscious of the resources that they use.  
I hope you have a great holiday, where ever you decide to stay.
Regards
Lisa

name: Botanical Garden Apartment -Free WIFI
summary: A large and modern studio apartment in a great location, close to Botanical Garden and Chappel St. Tram stop is right in front of the building.  Located on 77 Park St, South Yarra Free WIFI
space: 'Botanical Gardens Apartment' is perfect for a couple Bed can be configured as follows: Bedroom - 1 x double bed A porta-cot and high chair is available upon request (at no charge) - cot linen is not supplied. This is a private apartment in a residential building. This 1st floor apartment (no lift) has nice distant city views and is well located near the Royal Botanical Gardens, Domain Road cafes, and the trendy Toorak Road & Chapel Street upmarket shopping strips.  It's also only 15 minutes by tram number 8 to the Melbourne City Centre (CBD).   This lovely air-conditioned/heated apartment has a double bed in the bedroom. The apartment is well-equipped with cooking facilities, fridge/freezer, stove/oven, microwave oven, a full HD LCD television, dvd player, stereo system (with iPod dock),  a clothes washing machine and clothes airer.  There are coin-operated dryers in a communal area of the building.  Please note, this apartment has no balcony. Free WIFI Bedding, bath towels and basic

I am a full time mother with 2 children who is running my own business from home.
To me, family comes first.
I am trying my best to make my guests feel home when staying at my apartment. Children are always welcome!

name: 2 Bedroom Lavender spa @comocottages
summary: Retro Victorian style 2 bedroom cottage located in the Olinda village with a two-person corner spa, open fire, balcony, flat grass area and sunshine. Also featuring air-conditioning. Breakfast provisions are included.
space: If you can imagine a gingerbread cottage but with out all the lollies and gingerbread walls, this is the Lavender cottage. It is a 2 storey cottage with an attic style upstairs where the bedroom and bathroom are. Kitchen with full sized fridge and sunken lounge and dining area are on the ground level. Included in the price is breakfast provisions and tea and coffee.
host_about: I am creative and think outside the square. My wife and I love our cottages and our gardens. I am into art, music and the environment. I sometimes play my guitar. My passion for collecting and restoring antiques led me to refurbishing the cottages and 25 years later we are still here, loving our green environment. We have a farmhouse in France too which we travel to biannually. My wife runs Elle Naturale Olinda massage spa in the village, so you can enjoy both our talents!

name: Contemporary Minimalist Apartment with free wifi
summary: Enjoy the bustling city life of Melbourne and stay in our beautifully styled apartment which is a door step away to many Melbourne City attractions and conveniently within close proximity of public transport, supermarket, cafe and restaurants. (2 Myki's provided) The apartment consist of 2 bedrooms and a common space which can ideally fit 4 guests (with queen air mattress)
space: This Scandinavian inspired apartment showcases split-system heating and cooling, and spilling out to the full-width balcony that offers stunning views of the City.  Facilities also included are a 20m heated indoor pool, fully equipped gymnasium, yoga room, residents lounge with kitchenette and big screen, security indoor access and a landscaped outdoor terrace complemented with a teppanyaki BBQ, just perfect for entertaining. The accommodation is on floor 14 this ensures it is situated high enough to to give amazing views of the Southbank and also high enough to be away from the noise Kitchen:  our Fully equipped kitchen comes with an oven, cook top, utensils, fridge and freezer, microwave, toaster and dishwasher.  In case you want a break from Melbourne amazing cuisines.  Living Area:  Stretch out on our large L shaped couch in front of our 46" large TV. Enjoy HD movies through connectivity of HDMI ports.  Balcony:  Potted plants and greenery are decorated across the balcony accessibl

name: Stylish Family Home in Prime Elwood Beach Location
summary: Our home is located on a quiet no through road located 100 meters from Elwood beach and just off Ormond/Glenhuntly Rd, convenient to all the cafes and restaurants in Elwood Village.  Recently renovated with a chef inspired kitchen and a focus on natural light and open spaces, our home suits cooking, entertaining, leisure and of course families.  Elwood has so much to offer in lifestyle and location that its often named Melbourne’s best suburb.
space: Our family home is a semi-detached bungalow located on a no-through road near Ormond Esplanade.  There is a stoplight at the end of the street straight across to Elwood beach.  The house was renovated last year, creating an open space kitchen/lounge with heaps of natural light, and a new master bedroom with built-in robes and ensuite bathroom.  The kitchen is equipped with new Asko appliances (including a pyrolytic oven, induction cooktop with integrated gas hob for wok cooking and dishwasher).  Laundry facilities are also provided.  There is also a Weber gas grill outside near the deck and gardens, with an outdoor dining set for 6 people.  The concrete floors are equipped with sub-floor heating with additional hydronic heating units in the original timber floored bedrooms. The home is fully equipped for cooking, lounging, entertaining and comfort.  Our Toshiba stereo system and B&W speakers are compatible with bluetooth AirPlay and Spotify.  Cable wifi internet, Netflix subscription &
host_about:
We are originally from America, now citizens of Australia and currently living in Singapore.  We travel quite a bit and enjoy staying in airbnbs all over the world.  We are opening our family home in Melbourne to guests as we are on contract abroad.

We live for amazing food & wine, music, art and anything that involves being outdoors.  My background is in photography & wine and my partner Joel's in history & economics!  Our children are 6 and 8, they love Lego and Star Wars.  Thanks and hope to meet you someday!

summary: The house is open plan, arty and has a good feel. Great cafes and restaurants nearby. Williamstown beach is 8km.  The west is great for food options, cafes, shopping and the arts. Friendly area.
space: The bedroom is large with a queen bed and double wardrobe with  plenty of cupboard space available. It has a TV and desk. We are on the main road but this has not deterred anyone from staying here or complained about noise.  Victorian home with modern feel.  In the lounge we have a TV/DVD with access to Netflix! You will have free Wi-Fi connection, a turn table if you want to drop some old school beats and a bookcase with plenty to read.  You are welcome to use the kitchen and all its accessories.  The bathroom is large and has a separate bath tub that you can use after busy or not so busy day. We have two bathrooms, so you will have this space to yourself whilst staying here.  There will be towels, shampoo, conditioner and body wash provided. Train station is a 10 minute walk. You are a stop or two away from Footscray and Melbourne CBD is 15-20mins.  Seddon has great cafes, restauants and bar.Its only a 16 min walk away.  Yarraville is 2.7kms and also boasts great cafes, restaurants,

summary: One bedroom in a cool two-storey terrace house in Carlton - where the cafe culture lives. A 5-minute tram ride or 20-minute walk away from Melbourne CBD. Please note that the room is only available from December 2018 to February 2019.

The house is occupied by a good mix of fun-loving and friendly scholars and working professionals.

I love travelling and meeting people! 

Pop music, science, and historical fiction movies and books are definitely on my list. 

A dog person.

name: Amazing views! Great Location! Cable TV! WIFI!
summary: Welcome to our brand new apartment in the most liveable city in the world. You will be treated with breath taking views over our cosmopolitan city, on our 13th floor luxury apartment. Walking distance to the Free Tram Zone (that will take you everywhere in the city) Waterfront (1 km), Queen Vic market (0.8 km),  Sky bus terminal and Southern Cross station (0.7 km), Flagstaff Gardens (0.5 km), Etihad Stadium (0.75 km) are only a few highlights located nearby for your convenience.
space: Our Space is out of the norm! It is designed to ensure that all visitors feel at home!  We have gone to great lengths to include everything you would need on your visit to the Greatest City in the World.  From basic things like Breakfast and shampoos, all the way to luxury bedding (just to ensure you have that well deserved nap after a long day exploring Melbourne). We can organise secure undercover parking across the road for $15/day, please let us know if this is something you want us to book as parking spots are limited
host_about:
I am a well-travelled individual who now calls this stylish, arty, dynamic and cosmopolitan city, called Melbourne, home. Trekking through Patagonian, Rural Japan,  and the Andes, hiking the Great Wall of China, Bungy jumping at the adventure capital of the world (Queenstown)  are among the many adventures I have experienced in my life so far, with no plan of stopping :).

I love food, art, experiencing new cultures, restaurants, bars, sporting events and much more. Melbourne offers an abundance of all that with its collection of inner-city neighbourhoods. Seeing a new city as a local has been a key aspect of my travelling and I am here to give you that very experience in Melbourne.

summary: Paradise view BEACH and park front with playground close to Melbourne CBD, West Gate Bridge. Close to shops, restaurants and Coles. But it is not a bored some beach where people gathering, playing in the park and beach during day time. Suitable for family, working people and couple.
space: The cottage has a good view of the park and beach. It is a very relaxing environment from the inside. People are gathering to the park and beach. You will enjoy it by looking from the windows of the living, dinning and kitchen areas. There are 2 good size bedrooms.
host_about:
I m a part-time working mum. My work require me travelling interstate and Melbourne regions.
I love reading, relaxing music and spending time with the family. I love beaches, mountains and most nature view related.

I can speak English, Cantonese, Vietnamese and basic Mandarin.

name: Southbank by the River - at Quay West Suites
summary: Great place to stay for cricket fans attending Boxing Day Test.  You may see some of the Aussie team in the lift.  Fantastic location for a stay in Melbourne, right by the river next-door to Hamer Hall on Southbank in Quay West Hotel. Walk to MCG, Tennis Centre, AAMI stadium and much more.  Very close to Flinders Street Station and Federation Square and the free tram zone.  Look no further, stay here - you’ll love it !!
space: This is a spacious one bedroom apartment which is tastefully furnished.  The kitchen has all you will need for your stay, but with so many eating options on your doorstep you probably won't cook.  The bedroom has a king size bed and a second television.  The lounge has a very comfortable fold out sofa bed if for more than 2 people.  You have a view across St. Kilda Rd and the gardens to the MCG.
host_about:
I love to travel, and have a daughter married living in Switzerland and another daughter in the tourism industry, so there is always an excuse to get away.  Eating out, going to the movies, the spring racing carnival are other events I enjoy.
I aim to provide people with a comfortable retreat in a central location, so they can enjoy all Melbourne has to offer.
I look after a Resort in the City, A Resort in the City 2, A Resort in the City 3 and Melbourne River Retreat.  I look forward to communicating with you about your forthcoming holiday, and helping to make it a great experience.

name: Exclusive Luxury Villa in the Yarra Valley
summary: Entire villa Exclusive Luxury Villa in the Yarra Valley - Casa Valeri Warburton  Exclusive and private accommodation for one couple only in the most spectacular corner of the Yarra Valley.  Enjoy the luxury and privacy of this stunning villa set high above Warburton township, but overlooked by the neighbouring mountains.  Exclusive accommodation for two for that perfect romantic getaway.  Set on 40 acres, just 75 kilometer from Melbourne.
space: The Space Casa Valeri Exclusive Luxury Villa in the Yarra Valley is an idyllic retreat, built and furnished in impeccable taste, offering a style and opulence rarely encounted.  The building itself is very spacious, but in addition there are innumerable opportunities for outdoor relaxation – either in shady seclusion, or enjoying the sunshine and the mountain environment. Set on 40 acres of rolling pastures and woodland on the foothills of Mount Victoria, the property adjoins the State Forest giving easy access for forest walks with spectacular views. Relax by the massive limestone fireplace imported from France.  Iron chandeliers and antique   French doors provide an ambience that is matched by state of the art appliances and fittings. king size bed modern Italian kitchen, breakfast provisions included  polished hardwood floor boards throughout timber shutters  reverse cycle air-conditioning and ducted heating free standing Kaldewei bath plus large glass shower separate toilet/powder
host_about:
Natalie Baxter and William James Young, married, no children, two bichon dogs.  We live in the Upper Yarra Valley, Warburton, Victoria.  We're retired, senior citizens.  We live on a small farm, we have a few cows on the property.   I have also built a beautiful villa detached from my home which I let out.  Jim was a Uni. lecturer and I worked in tourism.  Jim is involved with U3A in Warburton.  We love to travel to France and Italy mainly but we've recently been to South America, Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires.  We have have also been on a few cruises.    
Love to travel to France and Italy, short trips only.  I don't like to be away from my dogs for too long.

name: Stunning Provincial 2BD Apartment
summary: Stunning open plan stand-alone apartment with 2 large double bedrooms located right in the heart of Toorak - one of Melbourne’s most prestigious suburbs.
space: Stunning open plan stand-alone apartment with 2 large double bedrooms located right in the heart of Toorak - one of Melbourne’s most prestigious suburbs. Spacious and light-filled with floor boards complete with modern conveniences. Large double bedrooms include King Bed & Queen Bed with linen, Built In Robes/Drawers. Master Bathroom with double vanity, Large shower/bath, European Laundry. Separate powder room with additional vanity. Spacious living entertaining area – includes 3 seater couch and beautiful French Day bed. 8 seater dining table, Flat screen TV Split system heating/cooling. Large open plan kitchen with modern appliances. Perfect for a Family, couples or even individuals. Ideally situated just 6km from Melbourne’s CBD and within 2 kilometres of Chapel Street/South Yarra shopping precinct.  Some of Melbourne’s finest restaurants, cafés and boutique shopping Limitless public transport options
host_about: Unknown

name: Beautiful Artists home, Fitzroy
summary: This cottage nestled behind our shopfront art studio in the electric heart of Fitzroy, is a peaceful oasis which will delight lovers of Art, Books and Music.  It is a doormat away from cultural and hedonistic delights, and a short walk to the CBD.
space: For a truly unique experience of Melbourne and its cultural life, this Victorian Cottage in central Fitzroy is ideal.  It is nestled behind an art studio & puppet theatre and surrounded by eclectic cafes, bars, shops and galleries.   The living room is cozy,  with an open fireplace, unlimited Wifi connection, record player, gramophone, and a DVD player. The kitchen is fully equipped and stocked with herbs, spices, legumes and condiments for people who love to cook, although Fitzroy is home so many wonderful and reasonably priced restaurants that you might not feel like cooking. We provide you with breakfast at no additional cost.   The bathroom has a bath and a reliable hot water service and is reached via a pathway in a small colourful courtyard with an outside seating área. In the courtyard there is a gas BBQ and seating, lovely for relaxing and cooking dinner over a beer or wine on balmy summer evenings. There are three bedrooms; This listing is for bedroom,  #1.  It is 3.7 x 2.7 me
host_about: We are a family of four, from Australia and Argentina.  We are both visual artists and together run a studio shop front which in addition to visual art encompasses pre cinema, puppetry and theatre.  We have two sons, one two year old and another 6 month old.  We have travelled and lived abroad  for many years and so are sensitive to the needs of travellers and happy to help in any way we can.  At home we usually speak Spanish but can easily switch to English should your language be English.

name: Stylish St Kilda 2 bed/2 bath, amazing location.
summary: Awesome 2 bed/2 bath in ultimate position! Enjoy the luxury of a main bathroom with bath, 2 balconies, large beautiful dining table and spacious lounge, all within a stones throw of everything St Kilda has to offer! Stroll 2 minutes to the beach, restaurants, bars and shops, Luna park, Palais Theatre Elwood and Albert Park.  Quality linens and fluffy towels are provided as well as basic kitchen ingredients and tea and coffee. I’m happy to help with any extras you may need during your stay.
space: My place is in the prime position for a great stay in St Kilda! Super close to public transport, great entertainment and dining. Car parking in the building can be arranged for an extra $10 per day.
host_about:
I'm a really chilled out person, social and friendly. I just want my guests to feel welcome and comfortable and enjoy their stay in Melbourne as much as I love living here. 
I am a lover of design, travel, food and good red wine.

I own my own events business which keeps me very busy, particularly on weekends. 

If you have any questions about myself, my place or the area please just ask ;)

name: VIEWS GALORE 2BD Southbank Gem *WIFI PARKING POOL
summary: "Bailey" - Resort style, impeccably presented, luxuriously decked out with views to die for. This 2 bedroom apartment on the 24th floor boasts amazing sweeping views of Phlllip Bay, the City and even glimpses of the MCG. Within a few moments walk to the CBD and Southbank DFO, Crown Casino and South Melbourne markets, you have access to a, POOL, COMPLIMENTARY WIFI and PARKING. Short walk to Crown Casino (1 min)river front cafes restaurants, convenience store, & public transport at your doorstep.
space: Please check my other properties if this is not available on your preferred dates. I offer huge discounts for last-minute bookings and specials for longer bookings too - just ask me! This architecturally inspired building is near new and is located right in the heart of the Southbank Casino district a moments walk to the CBD, South Wharf, South Bank, Crown Casino. It is the premier location for any visit to Melbourne: the nearby trams along Spencer and Clarendon St  will drop you in the city within a few minutes and also the funky and vibrant restaurants and cafes of Southbank are literally at your doorstep. The space includes 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, open plan kitchen with a wonderful entertainers balcony with views to Port Phillip Bay of Melbourne, the City, the Yarra River and beyond. Each bedroom contains 1 comfortable Queen bed, additional sleeping arrangements can be made if necessary in the living room to accommodate that extra guest or family member. If you are visiting Melbourn
host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

name: Melbourne CBD modern apt with sea view Etihad
summary: Near everything
space: Unknown
host_about:
I graduated at Holmesglen TAFE at Melbourne, Australia in hospitality, which gives me confident of serving customers with professional attitude. 

I love cooking, and spending time with my family on my spare time. 

You will find everything easy and handy when you live in my apartment. Honest is my promise.

name: Vibrant, City convenient Ensuite bathroom netflix,
summary: My place is close to Restaurants, Bars, Public Transport, MCG, Epworth Hospital.  Is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers wanting cosmopolitan area close to City.
space: The bedroom is very large with a writing desk, couch and your own ensuite bathroom.  There is an easy to use combination lock on your door, a rooftop BBQ area with great views of the City.  You have a wall mounted TV with Netflix in your room and one in the shared space, so you can either have your own privacy or mix with other guests.
host_about: Originally from Melbourne we loved Byron so much we did the sea change about five years ago.  We have four grown up sons who love travelling so have a large almost empty house at which we now host airbnb.  We are enjoying meeting lovely people from many varied places and are pleased to share our sustainable, environmentally friendly house with them.  We are a 15 min walk from the main part of town on an acre block so it is quiet and peaceful, close enough to town but away from the late night party noise.  I am sure you will enjoy your stay with us.

name: Luxury cosy high apartment - Close to Crown Casino
summary: Come stay at a luxurious high-rise in the heart Melbourne's Southbank. Furnished with quality amenities to meet your needs. Lay back and sink into the cosy leather couches while enjoying a cinematic experience on the 65" 4K TV. Separate bedroom with a large robe to hang your clothes and store other items.  Want to get some work done? There's a large study area to meet your needs and stay focussed. Kitchen has all the essentials. Free coffee, tea, milk and light snacks. Enjoy Melbourne!
space: Great location. Close to supermarkets and restaurants. Short walk to the Crown and the Yarra. Close to tram stops and 10minute walk to train station.
host_about: Unknown

name: Carlyle Cottage the perfect central location
summary: This  charming and historic cottage, attractively renovated, is set in a delightful, secluded, leafy garden - rare in the inner suburbs. Ideally located to access all the best that Melbourne has to offer. We welcome all comers and think our cottage is ideal for business people wanting a central but quiet location or couples wanting a weekend away. We have lived in the neighbourhood  for nearly fifty years - it is a friendly and safe community.
space: The cottage is one of the earliest in South Melbourne but now has modern   amenities such as air-conditioning and ducted heating. The deck at the rear provides a secluded, leafy space in which to relax after the day's activities. Whilst the kitchen is fully equipped, the local area abounds with eating places.
host_about:
I am an open minded, middle aged, well travelled, social person. I love reading, the arts, gardening and family. I am semi-retired and very active in my community. I love to travel with my husband of 45 years. We like to walk and explore the local environment and soak up the atmosphere. 

I am house proud at home and believe in leaving a place as I find it.. or better!

name: Best, Most Beautiful Water Viewing House
summary: Beautiful water view residence is waiting for you
space: Situated on one of the most sought-after islands in Sanctuary Lakes this architecturally designed Two-story house has one of the widest and beautiful water views on the lake,golf scenes and spectacular sunrises, and a golf club. This place is close to beach. Guests will have the entire house to themselves. Very suitable for family and group living, very cost-effective. Distance:  19 km from Melbourne city centre, 1.1 km from shopping centres and restaurants, 150 m from bus stop and 26.1 km from Melbourne airport.
host_about: Unknown

name: Balaclava 1950s 2bdr flat with charm and comfort
summary: Located just off the vibrant strip of Balaclava, less than 10 minutes by tram to St Kilda Beach & only 15 minutes to the CBD.  The space combines plenty of original 1950s features such as high ceilings and large windows with a modern kitchen and comfortable beds. An excellent base for whatever you have planned for your stay in Melbourne.
space: This is my home which I am offering to you as your base and home-away-from-home while you are visiting Melbourne.  Although it is only minutes from the cafes, bars and shops of Balaclava, it is a quiet and comfortable place to retreat to when you want to kick back and chill out.
host_about:
I am a mature, professional woman from Melbourne, Australia.  I am well travelled and a courteous, considerate houseguest: I will treat your home as if it were my own. 
I have made my home available to you at times when I am away - I hope you have a really great stay!

name: Cosy Unit with Backyard, minute from the beach!
summary: Very charming place, extremely well situated in Elwood, with great walking & riding tracks along the sea just next door. You will love it. Nice coffees & restaurants all around. You need 5 to 10 minutes by bike to be in the heart of St Kilda. The apartment is peacefull and very cosy, nestled in behind courtyard hedging, in the iconic Shelley Court building.  Backyard with BBQ, secure, easy off street parking (un-restricted). Free Wifi. Public Transport for Federation Square - 35 minutes.
space: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). Queen size bed, a single king size bed and Double size bed in 3 separate rooms (one master, two small). The apartment is double brick which keeps it nice and cool in summer. In winter you can turn on the gas fire heater in the living room, oil heater in each room. Great kitchen fully equipped with coffee machine, dishwasher, etc. Bathroom with bath tub and laundry.
host_about: I'm pretty easy going, curious and always happy to meet people. I'm a freelance cameraman. I also doing my very best to be a good dad 1 week on 2.

name: Flinders Magic
summary: Superbly located in Flinders House, this beautiful apartment is just steps away from the magic that Melbourne has to offer. Degrave's street, cafe and restaurant filled laneways, Flinders street station, The Arts Centre, Casino, Southbank, Federation Square, St Paul's Cathedral, NGV, The Botanical Gardens, MCG, Melbourne Town Hall, Collins Street Shopping, Bourke Street Mall  - just to name a few are all just minutes away. Within the free tram zone anything within the city is truly accessible.
space: Step out the front door and you have Dukes coffee in front of you and Brunetti's to your right. You truly can't beat this location.  Step into our beautiful apartment and you'll know why we've named this beauty Flinders Magic. High ceilings, fully equipped kitchen, beautiful bathroom - complete with bath, Walk in Robe, Luxurious Queen size bed with superb mattress and linen, 2 smart TVs, Beautiful stylish open living area, with leather lounge, dining table, chase lounge, and second bedroom with a king single bed and trundle for extra children's accomodation. Coffee machine, Pantry with essentials, cereals and spreads available for breakfast, smeg appliances, dishwasher, washer and dryer, you'll feel right at home. Perfect for a relaxing getaway, family holiday, business trip - whatever your need you won't find better!
host_about: I am an active dad with a beautiful wife and two amazing kids.  We love entertaining, movies, days at the beach and we love football.

name: Ascent on Collins in Melbourne CBD
summary: An ENTIRE apartment unit ALL TO YOURSELF on Collins St, round the corner from Southern Cross station marks this amazing inner-city residence with a great view of the city a must for any weekenders or holiday makers. Fully furnished with FREE WiFi and access to the pool, Jacuzzi, gym & sauna facilities. BOOK NOW and receive 15% OFF car rentals with Europcar across Australia, New Zealand & UK wide along with 10% OFF any food and beverages at Andrew's Hamburgers on Franklin St!
space: Spacious for 1, roomy for 2, fit for 3, accommodates a maximum of 4. One of the tallest towers to grace the skyline of Melbourne's CBD. This conveniently located, self-contained inner-city crib houses a generous bedroom with a queen sized bed. A warm and cozy bathroom. A spacious living area with a comfy 3-seater sofa bed that folds out to a queen. A fully decked kitchen and dining. Complimentary coffee and tea. A laundry area with a washer, dryer, iron and an ironing board. ALL TO YOURSELF! Wake up every morning to an amazing view of the city. Please click on the photos to view more about this property and it's surroundings. name: Modern apartment with amazing views
summary: Spacious apartment, 4kms to the CBD. Quiet street with golf course. One block from Princes Park with its running track. Enjoy your own sunny room and private bathroom, access to large living area, kitchen & laundry. Short walk to tram and train.
space: Located in a quiet, central part of inner Melbourne, this sun-filled apartment is the perfect place to explore everything the city has to offer. Set in a contemporary building, I would love to share this large apartment with you. Located in a quiet area, it is a short tram ride to the central city district. It is surrounded by parklands (Royal Park and Princes Park). The apartment features floor to ceiling windows, providing sensational views of Melbourne. Bedroom  Your room has floor-to-ceiling windows. It is a cheery and bright room. It has its own private balcony.  It comes with a large bathroom for your exclusive use. Wardrobe space is available.  Included in the price are: Use of the house facilities (kitchen, laundry) Fresh linen and towels. Secure underground car park  Air-conditioning or heating  A simple breakfast  High speed wi-fi. TV, radio and a piano, for those of you musically inclined! Make yourself at home in either of the two common living areas and the kitchen.  Use t
host_about:
Professional. Enjoy theatre, music, reading, cycling, walking AND travelling - anywhere off the beaten track. Favourite travel destinations are Norway and Spain.
I travel light and really enjoy staying with people, rather than impersonal hotels. I want to experience the day-to-day life of where I go, learn tips from the locals on what to do, where to go ... and generally, blend in and live like a local. 
As a host, I am friendly, open and very much enjoy getting to know people, who they are, what they do and sharing life's experiences. 
Fluent in italian, happy to provide italian conversation classes for those of you interested in brushing up on your language skills!!!!

name: GL Single Rm GuestHouse Brunswick
summary: Single Occupancy private lockable room.  All bills & Linen inc. Internet $16.00 per wk extra
space: The property boasts high quality internal fixtures and fittings: a fully equipped kitchen with granite bench tops, chic bathrooms with porcelain finishes. Generously proportioned deluxe single rooms, have warm timber tonings, quality fixtures and fittings, where the focus is on comfort and convenience in a friendly and inviting environment and a ready made home away from home.  There is a reverse cycle air-conditioning unit, 32” TV and DVD player. Double bed, two seat couch, desk, side drawers, bookshelf. All linen, included towels are provided.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Valeria. My husband Ben and I own and manage a number of upmarket guesthouses located in the inner Melbourne suburbs. 

We specialise in offering a new and unique opportunity to overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, teachers and other business specialists to gain superior inner Melbourne accommodation and lessen the stresses of moving to a new town, new state or a new country.

We offer fully furnished, centrally located properties with plenty of parking and quality fixtures and furnishings, each has an alfresco entertainment area and BBQ in a garden setting, a fully equipped property in an exclusive professional apartment house environment, where new arrivals, to Melbourne, or people going through a lifestyle transition, can experience an instant community atmosphere for medium (from two weeks), or long term stays, and say goodbye to lonely, restrictive and expensive apartment living.

No more solitary TV dinners! Each property provides apartment house accommodation on a room-by-room basis with shared kitchen, dining and lounge facilities. This style of apartment house living provides opportunities for new arrivals, to Melbourne to quickly, form friendships, build networks with other likeminded people and settle more easily into a new life. This helps to alleviate homesickness and improves their effectiveness in the workplace or place of learning.

A safe and comfortable home life makes for a happier Melbourne experience.

Typical Tenant Profiles

Flexi (Hidden by Airbnb) is open to a wide range of people from professional backgrounds usually between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) years of age. Typical residents are overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, corporate and career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, nurses, teachers and other specialists or people in the throes of re-establishing a home and life in Melbourne.

Ben and I hope you choose to stay with us and we have the opportunity to make your stay in Melbourne a life long happy memory.

My place is comfy and furnished with everyday use amenities, and the building has a pool, gym, sauna, BBQ area, visitor sitting lounge, and also a rock climbing wall! Roomy and comfy for 1 or 2, just nice for 4, accommodates a maximum of 6.  Inside the apartment  is modern, nice and comfy. host_about: Loves Food, Love to travel, Loves Cruises, Love to experience new cultures, Loves different languages, Loves a good laugh, Loves to read, Love a bit of odd gardening, Loves to have a chat (at times), Loves to ZzzZz, and last but not least, Love meeting new friends :)

name: Central Melbourne 2Bdrm unit, trams at doorstep
summary: Greetings! (墨爾本欢迎你!): Modern, self-contained apartment with carpark, in the heart of Melbourne, right in between CBD, Riverside Restaurant Precinct, Arts Centre, Crown Casino Entertainment & Cinema Complex, famous South Melbourne Markets, Melbourne Convention Centre and the Sports & Aquatic Centre (home of the Grand Prix). space: Tastefully & generously furnished throughout, this level 11 apartment (with balcony) is spacious with a great aspect allowing ample natural light and views towards Port Philip Bay. Double-glazed sliding doors to the balcony keeps the apartment very quiet and retains an even temperature for great comfort. Each bedroom has regular sized windows which enables good air circulation. host_about:
Easy going, tidy, non smoker. Enjoys the usual - movies, books. Love food and good wine! 
Cant live without my partner, my books, good music (e.g. Cassandra Wilson).
While travelling I love eating new foods, visiting art galleries and ancient buildings. 
Life Motto - appreciate everyday the small things that we take for granted. Many things are a privilege, not a right.

name: A place that you can't miss out
summary: 2 min quick access to Western Fwy M1, which leads you to: 15mins drive to Melbourne CBD, 20mins drive to Melbourne airport, Coles, Woolworth, Aldi, BigW, Target and restaurants, Mcdonald, KFC, pizza are just 2-3mins away. Our environment is great for families, there're parks close to us that kids can play around. Clean air, quiet and enjoyable atmosphere, exactly what you need for vacation. Our place suitable for stop-by travellers, easy access to airport in 20mins drive on freeway.

host_about:
Hi Everyone,
I would like give you $55 credit, if you book the apartment from us.
please use my link to create the new account, and book it. 
http://www.airbnb.com.au/c/kent177

I have 29 listings in airbnb, We have different variety of apartments, such as 
1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments
3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments

You can enter the date and number of guests from the airbnb listing page, then it will show up which one is available for you.




Being a Airbnb host for 5-6 years. I love being a host, because I know that when people, different group of people and family come to our place, when they feel, it is worth it. I love it and enjoy. That's the happiness that other job may not able to find it. I really love to see when my guests they start to step to the apartment and feel wow and impressed.
Honestly, being a host, it is not easy decision.
We have to make sure every details things in our place are the best to our guests. 
From check-in to check-out. It is an experience not only for guests. it is for us as well. It is the whole responsibilities. 

That’s what I think, the reason which motivates me to be a host.

Melbourne is a very multi-cultural city 
My objective is, if someone come here they should be connected to the right place.
Me, as a host, I think is kind of connecting these different piece together, a kind of connection.
The high point of my stay was how you made me feel. And how you made me feel, it sticks. It sticks with you.”
I have the traditional way to believe.
We believe it is the relationship that provide to the guests they will enjoy,  love the place to stay.
They trust me and I trust them. And that’s the reason it works.
So hospitalities if you ask me, is about care. It s about welcoming. This is about welcoming with open heart.  Welcome you to my Melbourne Apartment.

summary: No expense has been spared in making my home your dream escape. Light filled and immaculately furnished Boutique Beauty is a rare find indeed. space: Attention to detail is my passion, and you will appreciate all the finer things that make this space truly remarkable. A Sonos sound system has been provided in each room so you can listen to your favourite music broadcast via wifi throughout the entire apartment. Comfy couch settings in the outdoor garden patio, around the dining table and in the lounge room ensure a fun and relaxed experience all through the day. Massive windows in the kitchen open up to a lush outdoor garden patio that even boasts an outdoor breakfast bar. Quaint bi-parting double doors provide direct access from the garden patio to the master suite. Light filled, the master suite has an extremely comfortable queen bed with top quality linen to ensure only the best night sleep! And you can enjoy the colder nights at home, relaxing in the claw foot bath located in the master ensuite.

name: **Private, clean & self contained**
summary: The annex is 7kms from Melbourne CBD, a clean, comfortable, clutter free, quiet and completely self contained studio home with its own private access.  A few minute walk to train, tram and bus routes and Elwood, St Kilda and the foreshore a 30 minute walk away, the  annex is a perfect base to explore Melbourne.  Fast and stable wifi recently installed.
space: 7kms from Melbourne CBD, our annex is clean, comfortable, quiet and is a completely self contained studio home. It has its own access, bathroom, kitchenette with a bench top oven and has both heating and cooling. There's no washing machine but as I do a ton of washing for the family, I'm more than happy to do a load or two for our guests. If a launderette is more your thing, there's one just a few minutes away.   It also has a TV, digital radio/alarm, DVD player plus a huge random selection of DVD's, iPod dock, tea and coffee supplies, (why bother with coffee when cafes are nearby) fridge and towels. I can also arrange a baby travel cot too.  If you're here on holiday, thinking of moving to the area, have just arrived in Melbourne or you need a place for visiting family or friends without paying hotel or serviced apartment prices, this is just the place. With the safety of having us just next door, you can be sure you or your family will be looked after.   We are also happy to accommod
host_about:
Originally from England, Rob and I moved to Melbourne in 2008 with his work for a maximum of 18 months. 10 years later we are still here, now married, proud owners of two young children, an overweight and diabetic cat, dual citizenship, a house and an amazing group of friends. 

We tend to spend our Sunday afternoons catching up with friends with a glass of wine or two or... and a cheese platter whilst trying to fit in various FaceTime calls to the UK.

We still feel lucky to have stumbled upon Melbourne life, Rob still is amazed with the great coffee and I'm still amazed that I rarely find a cafe with a proper teacup!  

Teacups aside, we are a happy, relaxed and content family with a love for travel, laughing, food and wine. Rob also has a passion for getting up in the small hours to watch his football (soccer) team Southampton FC in action. (I think he's crazy)

Cups, bowls and cooking utensils provided, with many restaurants and take away options available nearby. Tea and coffee provisions are provided. BBQ is also available for use. There is a table that seats 2. It can be used as a dining table, or as a desk for work, with the internet provided. All linen is provided including towels and pool towels. A TV with Netflix installed will let you enjoy the room to its maximum. Coat hangers, iron and ironing board also provided. Washing machine and dryer available in our garage which can be used anytime. The poolhouse is suitable for 4 people (1 queen bed) and a sofa bed to accommodate an extra 2 people. $20 per additional person/child. The pool house is also suitable for couples with an infant.  If you are coming with an infant that requires our comfortable portable baby cot please ma
host_about:
Mother of 3 children ages 13, 17 and 19. We are originally from Israel but have lived in Prague and Spain as well as Melbourne of course..
We love travelling and understand that each traveler has their own individual way of travelling. So, if you are a backpacker, a couple or wanting a getaway we are happy to meet your needs!
Let us know if you need any recommendations of things to do in the area or in Victoria in general, we know it back to front!
Enjoy the beautiful Melbourne and see you soon!

name: Perfectly Located North Fitzroy Edwardian House
summary: Our sunny heritage home is perfectly located in Fitzroy North with the best of Melbourne’s inner north within walking distance.  Only 200m away is beautiful Edinburgh Gardens & multiple tram lines - just a 10 minute commute into the CBD. Within 5-10 minutes walk are dozens of eateries, hotels & shopping in the village strips of Fitzroy North, Carlton North, and iconic Brunswick St Fitzroy.   Fully renovated in 2010, you will enjoy the character & creature comforts that our home offers.
space: This is a light filled, family home located on a quiet one-way street in the heart of North Fitzroy and just 10minutes by tram into Melbourne’s CBD. Our home boasts many heritage features, architect designed bathroom and kitchen, and open living spaces opening onto a sun-bathed north facing backyard.  The house is set-up with 2 x generously proportioned formal bedrooms, and a 3rd room that functions either as a bedroom or second living room /study. -Bedroom 1 has a king size bed  -Bedroom 2 has a king single bed (and a single fold out bed on request) -Bedroom 3 (or 2nd living room/Study) has a fold out double bed (as required) with french doors that open onto a private courtyard. This room can be used as a games/TV room or study (with built in desk).  The beds are made up ready for you with sheets and blankets. Towels are provided.  The living spaces are perfect for entertaining and families. -The kitchen and dining area opens onto the backyard via sliding doors for great indoor/outdoo
host_about:
I am an interior designer and mum living in lovely North Fitzroy with my family. Having lived in other cities and being a keen traveller, I really appreciate the vibrancy of this great city and I now very happily call myself a Melbournian!
As a host, I look forward to sharing with you a slice of this very special city.

You will get multiple choices of transport: 2 mins walk to the tram stop where you can take the tram to St Kilda, Melbourne City and the University of Melbourne. 3 mins walk to the bus stop going to Monash University and Chadstone Shopping Centre (the biggest shopping mall in the Southern Hemisphere). 7 mins walk to the Carnegie Station where you can take the train easily and effectively.

The building also comes with great common facilities including a pool, gym, common guest/social lounge,BBQ facility, a sauna and a Rock Climbing Wall!
space: The WHOLE apartment ALL TO YOURSELF directly across Southern Cross Station (Main train station and transport hub) making this efficiently designed, inner-city place ideal for weekenders, business travellers or holiday goers.  My place is comfy and furnished with everyday use amenities, and the building has a pool, gym, sauna, BBQ area, visitor sitting lounge, and also a rock climbing wall! Roomy and comfy for 1 or 2, just nice for 3, accommodates a maximum of 4.  Inside the apartment  is modern, nice and comfy. It has a open plan living area including the lounge with a full kitchen, a sleeping loft, dinning area, laundry facilities and a functional shower room.  I have a full size double bed in my apartment for the first 2 guests and a sofa bed which pulls out into another double size bed for 2 more guests (3rd and 4th guests), convenient for those who are travelling on a budget. Else the sofa bed can fit your kids nicely and they may love the novelty of sleeping on a pull out bed :-)
host_about: Loves Food, Love to travel, Loves Cruises, Love to experience new cultures, Loves different languages, Loves a good laugh, Loves to read, Love a bit of odd gardening, Loves to have a chat (at times), Loves to ZzzZz, and last but not least, Love meeting new friends :)

Free Gym, pool, BBQ area, rock climbing and sky garden.  short walk to coles supermarket, Etihad stadium , spencer outlet, southern cross station and free tram is just at door step. host_about:
~ Melbourne sky Apartments~
Dear guests:

We are Eden Charmmy and Cony. We are professional management team . 

All our apartments are unique, therefore we do not offer early check in or late check out  as my apartments are unique, we cannot just put guests in a random available room. 

My team members can speak English Korean Indonesian and Chinese . Pls feel free to contact us anytime. Thank you 
我們可以講中文 
Our working hour is from 10AM TO 10PM. 
We always answer your question within 2 hours during our business hours. 

Important information:

* We provide car park for $15 per 24 hours  ( Multi-entry) . The car park is provided by third party, you will be given an allocated car park number a day before you arrive. 

* There are few car rental companies nearby. You can search car rentals in Southern cross station to save the parking fee if you only need car for few hours.

* We are airbnb not hotel. ( Means you are staying in host's house not a hotel).
Therefore, we do not provide daily cleaning service. Additional cleaning service can be provided at extra cost. 


* Please take your personal belongings with you when you check out. We are not responsible for any lost or damage to your personal belongings.

There will be three other 30 year olds in the house, it is not a party house at any stretch, but we do cook meals together regularly and have all lived together for 3 years, so it has more of a family vibe.Also, great wifi!!

Buses, tram, train (30 mins to CBD), Close to La Trobe Uni,  RMIT Uni Bundoora, High Street restaurants,  Preston Markets!!. Your extra large double bedroom includes a  comfortable queen sized mattress, that looks out to the garden, and has a study desk, lamp, bookshelf, chest of drawers and TV. The bathroom is shared. We are both professionals who love to host. Ray, my husband works from home.
host_about: We are a happy married professional couple in our early 50's who enjoy meeting people. We love our home, fresh food, cooking, gardening, reading, watching movie, cycling, chilling out, candles. We absolutely love to listen to our eclectic range of music. We hope you do too!!
