We are connected to the city via trams and close to bicycle routes. There is great outdoor seating with Webber BBQ, master bedroom has it's own balcony, and there is a garage to fit 2 cars.
space: Our cats Nancy and Tonya will be staying with you during your visit. We would love to invite guests who are happy to share the occasional snuggle and feed the girls 2x per day. We have lowered the rate to reflect this. We can accept 2 guests in the house as a couple for the master bedroom or 2 singles looking for 2 rooms.  This is a 3 bedroom property, and one single housemate will be here during your stay.
host_about: Unknown

name: Flinders Prime 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: These spectacular one bedroom apartments are tastefully furnished and located at near top floor of this neat and secure complex. Overlooking both Flinders Lane with windows that engulf the property in natural light these apartments are truly one of a kind! Note: Late check-in fee of AUD50 is required if guest will arrive at the hotel from 9pm onwards.
space: This 50 sq. meter apartment features 1 bedroom with a queen sized bed, Be spoilt by the multiple entertainment choices all around, the cafes and eateries that Melbourne is famous for, the endless shopping, the sensational sight-seeing spots, all within short walking distance. Several public transportation options available from the doorsteps. There is also cheap & secure car parking available in the building. Each apartment has a very large lounge room with multiple windows overlooking the city. A gourmet kitchen complete with microwave, fridge, stove, electric oven and much more, adjacent to the kitchen is an open plan living/dining area. A light-filled large & comfortable bedroom and a stylish central bathroom with shower room, toilet and vanity are on the other side of this modern apartment. The laundry includes a washing machine, dryer, and full ironing facilities. These apartments are fully wheelchair accessible.
host_about: Unknown

name: Garden studio
summary: Lovely private garden studio in Melbourne's inner north.  The studio has lots of natural light and is perfect for people who like their own space as it is at the back of the garden.  There is a locked private entrance from the rear laneway and it's close to public transport (a choice of trams or trains), bike paths and there's plenty of excellent places for eating out and seeing live music within a 10 minute walk.
space: There is no air-conditioning but we have a fan you can use if it's a warm night.  We usually welcome guests at the front door as the rear entrance is hard to find if you have never been here before. After that, you are free to use the secure laneway entrance if you prefer. (We'd also prefer this if you are going to be coming home super late after a fun night out in Melbourne).
host_about:

name: Charming 2 BD terrace apartment
summary: Light filled and spacious two bedroom apartment in North Fitzroy, seconds from vibrant Brunswick Street and the popular Edinburgh Gardens. Easily accessible by public transport to/from the city.
space: This charming two bedroom apartment is located on the second floor of an iconic Victorian building, with beautiful views from each window of the streetscapes below. The building once operated as an art gallery and artist studios, but has now been subdivided into 3 self contained apartments.  The main bedroom is very large and spacious. The second bedroom is medium sized. Each bedroom has a double bed and wardrobe. There's a  large open fireplace in the main bedroom. Firewood will be supplied in the cooler months to keep you warm and cosy.  There is a small and cute kitchen, which is well equipped for those who like to cook. (Please note there is a good sized bar fridge, but no freezer) The bathroom is small and basic, much like what you'd find in a small European apartment, but sufficient.  There's also a lovely courtyard that guests are welcome to use.
host_about:
I work as a full time artist and art therapist. I have lots of different creative projects on the go. I like variety in my work.
I also make my own art work, mostly papercuts.
I love traveling, immersing myself in new lands and new cultures. I have traveled, worked and lived in almost 30 different countries. I hope to see most of this world in this lifetime. 
I have a broad range of interest from art, design, film, philosophy, and food!
I love books and my home is full to the brim with them, so you'll have plenty to read.
I am very social, love a chat and getting to know people.

space: Your one bedroom studio gives you complete  privacy. Private patio, entrance, full bathroom and separate toilet. Located in Belgrave, Dandenong Ranges. Suitable for 2 people maximum. Walking distance to Puffing Billy and Belgrave station. One hour by train or car from Melbourne's Southern Cross station.  Break free of the busy city for a few days and visit this relaxing peaceful area.  Once here, the main attraction is Puffing Billy Steam Train which chugs along several times a day through fern gullies and massive mountain ash trees. Lots of walks through the forest where in the early hours you could spot a lyrebird, echidna or wombat. We have a Trees Adventure Park nearby for those that like to brave ziplining! You will be minutes from Belgrave village and a short drive or bus trip to Sassafras and Olinda. All have unique shops and top restaurants.  This room is part of our main house and is completely private, with it's own entrance and patio.  The bathroom has a clawfoot bath, separ
host_about:
I love Melbourne!! And happily run a B&B now after being in the fashion industry for years. Love meeting people from all over the world and hearing about their lives and travels. Personal travel can be difficult sometimes but we manage to get away a couple of times a year. I lived in the US for 23 yrs so I travel there a lot to visit friends and family.
Love being an AIRBNB host. Itry to keep my cottage and private suite in tip top condition with all the little necessities that I can think of to make your stay comfortable. I've lived in the area here in the Dandenong Ranges for 14 years and have a very extensive knowledge of what you should experience while here. There are lots of wonderful things to do and some fabulous restaurants too. I'll help you in any way I can. So come visit Belgrave.

summary: Live like a local in this city apartment conveniently located in iconic downtown Melbourne. Discover an urban escape featuring an open-plan layout, contemporary furnishings and decor, pops of colour throughout, and views of the bustling street below.
space: Light filled lounge with comfy couch and extendable dining table. 42" flat screen TV with complimentary Netflix.   Separate kitchen with oven, dishwasher, electric cook top and fridge.   2 full sized bedrooms with queen beds. 3rd bedroom is small with a set of bunks.  Full sized bathroom with shower over bath.  Laundry closet with washer and dryer. I have 3 other apartments in the same building, check my other listing if you have a big group and want to stay close to each other.
host_about:
I have lived in Melbourne for most of my life, and really love this city.  I have a keen interest in food, cocktails and our amazing cafes and restaurants.
If you want to know anything about this city, just ask!

name: Central Fitzroy, spacious room in charming terrace
summary: Make the most of your time in Melbourne - stay at the heart of Fitzroy, Melbourne's cultural epicentre. The private room is bright and of a good size. You'll be living in a two bedroom terraced house on a leafy Fitzroy backstreet. You're moments away from Brunswick St and Smith St, both lively strips that house some of Melbourne's best bars, cafes, pubs and restaurants. We're only a 20 minute walk or a 5-10 minute tram ride into Melbourne CBD. A must for any adventurous traveller.
space: The house is a beautiful terraced property on a leafy, Fitzroy back street. The bedroom has a large window and heaps of natural light.
host_about: Art, music and food lover living in Melbourne. Originally from London, UK.

name: Private room with easy access to public transport
summary: Welcome to Melbourne (it's ranked the world’s most liveable city by The Economist since 2011)! This is a private and comfortable room with a single bed in a beautiful and friendly apartment neighbourhood. This is suitable for 1 person and offers a welcoming place for guests to unwind and relax. We are 10 min walk to Box Hill Shopping Central which provides access to shops, markets, restaurants and bus/tram/train stations direct to CBD.
space: Unknown
host_about:
My brother and I used to live together but he and his wife have moved to Sydney for a relocated work.  I've lived in Box Hill all my life and love the diversity that the neighbourhood brings. 

I am an academic & researcher in higher education industry. And I work most days. I personally like travelling and sports, especially footy and tennis. 

I am keen to know person from other cities around the world. I wish your staying in my place is a happy one.

name: Richmond Escape
summary: Brand new apartment in a secure boutique block at Clifton on Swan with many trendy cafes, restaurants, bars and pubs at your door step! A short walk/tram ride to CBD, MCG and Melbourne Park (Rod Laver Arena, Hisense Stadium, AAMI Stadium) - Melbourne's premier sports and entertainment precinct. 100 meters away from Richmond Train Station. Stylishly furnished and equipped with many amenities (including high-speed WIFI). Idea for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
space: Unknown
host_about: A happy host

name: 1 bedroom apartment complete above cafe
summary: Apartment located above small cafe. Entry through private staircase in back courtyard. Apartment consists of lounge room adjoined to a kitchenette and bathroom. Large bedroom with 4 single beds overlooking church St. Tram #78 located at your door step which will take you straight to Chapel St shopping precinct, as well as Swan St Richmond, with all the best cafes, bars and restaurants. 5 minute tram ride to North Richmond station which will take you to Melbourne CBD in less than 5 minutes.
space: Huge bedroom that can sleep 4.  Separate sitting room, kitchenette and bathroom with toilet. Air conditioning and heating in room. Also free wi-fi provided
host_about: I was born and raised in South Sumatra but have been living in Melbourne for the past 17 years. I have been working in the hospitality for over 20 years. Currently i am the owner, manager and chef of my own cafe. I like to make guests wellcomed and provide a home like atmosphere.

name: Bright & Cosy Stay in Vibrant St Kilda East
summary: Located on a classically Melbourne treelined street, you will wake up to dappled light filtering through the Dutch Elm. Cook your own meals or check out the local offerings on Chapel or Carlisle Street's. Shower, or indulge in a bath, after a long day of exploring, then relax in the open lounge/dining room or out on the balcony! It's only a 10 minute stroll to the main street, with everything you need from a railway station, bakeries, florists, restaurants, supermarkets and outstanding coffee!
space: This is my regular home, my personal belongs will be present during your stay, please be respectful of them and leave them be!  The flat is located on the first floor, there is no lift, you will have to walk up a flight of stairs to enter the flat. The kitchen has a gas stove, electric oven, fridge, kettle and toaster, and the usual kitchen plates, cups and utensils--- but please provide all your own food. The previous owners sprayed the whole bathroom with enamel paint which has started to chip/flake away. The bathroom will be clean and sanitised, but it can look a little crusty due to the flaking.
host_about: Melbourne born and bred, I lived in London and Berlin for around 7 years before making a recent return to my home town.  I love to travel with friends and family. I love to experience the culture of a new city by indulging in the food, seeing the sights and finding the 'local way' to enjoy the surroundings. I am physically active, I like to ride, climb, jump, swim, and travel a lot! I keep a neat house and would love to share mine with you and yours in return.

name: Super close to everything in melbourne CBD
summary: Best location in the city, whether you want to go shopping to the malls, having food in the city, or go to any other attractions.  you can reach everywhere easily. Outside the building, there is a tram stop to Victoria market, and melbourne central station to any other place by train. Cozy bedroom with high quality queen bed. There is no TV, but projector with Netflix and NBN network.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Central, comfy and contemporary South Yarra
summary: Ideally located 2 mins from South Yarra station and 10 mins to the MCG and CBD, this fully equipped, tastefully styled apartment provides a quality alternative for your getaway or work trip.  Security parking adds to the convenience.
space: The LIVING ROOM contains a comfortable sofa and a flat screen, Smart TV providing access to Netflix and other streaming services. We have a balcony with amazing morning views of the rising sun. There is a heating and air-conditioning unit in the living room to ensure you stay at just the right temperature.  The sofa also converts into a large and comfortable double bed.  Please note there is an additional charge of $40 per stay if the sofa bed is required - see below. The BEDROOM comes with a queen bed, clean luxury linens and all seasons quilts to keep you warm throughout the year. There is sufficient storage space for your belongings and hangers for your clothes.  The BATHROOM is stocked with body wash, hand soap, shampoo and conditioner for you and your group. We also provide toilet paper and bath towels.  The separate LAUNDRY cupboard contains  a washing machine and dryer, detergent, an iron and ironing board and clothes horse. The KITCHEN is fully equipped with basic cooking items
host_about: Unknown

name: Apartment in Heart of Sport and Fashion Capital!
summary: A (literal) stone's throw away from the tenth largest sporting ground in the world, this property is a tourist's dream. The MCG, AAMI Park, Hisense Arena, Margaret Court Arena and Rod Laver Arena are all within comfortable walking distance for those visiting for a sporting or music event. East Melbourne is the closest residential suburb to the City, you can walk or hop on the tram (located within the 'Free Tram Zone'). A short 2km walk will get you to the heart of Melbourne, Bourke Street.
space: This is our first AirBnB listing and all furniture and amenities are brand new, especially for this space! We want you to feel comfortable and at home, and have done our best to fit it out to help you achieve just that. East Melbourne is one of the most desired and expensive suburbs in Melbourne due to its accessibility to everything the City has to offer! No matter what brings you to town, this property will ensure you're in the heart of the action.
host_about: Unknown

name: Modern townhouse to explore Melbourne
summary: Lovely townhouse (very close to Brunswick) is the perfect place in which to explore Melbourne city. The townhouse is modern, spacious and very comfortable. The open plan living area upstairs is a beautiful space with wooden floorboards, high lofty ceilings and architectural features which make this space a great place to kick back and relax. The kitchen, dining and living area has views out over to the city with a small balcony and has a great relaxed feel with long leather couches.
space: Our lovely townhouse is the perfect place in which to relax or explore Melbourne. There are 2 bedrooms (one with a super comfy queen size bed and the other has a baby cot and can fit a single blow up mattress if required). One full sized bathroom (bath, shower, toilet, sink) and one half bathroom (toilet and sink). The open plan living area upstairs is a beautiful space. The kitchen, dining and living area has big windows and views out toward the city with a small balcony and has a great relaxed feel with long leather couches.  There is a TV with Netflix and Stan available. The dining table sits 6 comfortably which looks out to the balcony. The kitchen is well equipped with dishwasher, microwave, gas stove/oven, fridge and essential cooking utensils and crockery. A split system with air con/heating is in each living space.
host_about: In development

name: Unique, character filled home close to the city!
summary: Unique little house with loads character, 20 minute walk from the city!
space: You will have access to the house which includes a bedroom, lounge/living/ study or work space/ kitchen and bathroom with a washing machine.
host_about: Student from Melbourne, Australia.

name: * Rooftop Pool, FREE cafe brekky & close to CBD! *
summary: Our apartment is up the "Paris end" of Fitzroy Street, with an infinity pool & BBQ on the rooftop & basement carparking. With stunning views of Port Phillip Bay, Albert Park Lake & Melbourne CBD, it's the perfect place to access the CBD, Chapel St, beach. It is a large 1 bedroom, with a luxurious King Size bed complete with French linen. The kitchen is fully appointed & Foxtel, Apple TV, Netflix & Wi-Fi are available for use. The bathroom includes dual shower heads & a laundry with washer/dryer.
space: It's a large 1 bed apartment perfect to stay while you’re in Melbourne. Included on the rooftop along with the Pool is a BBQ area which is available for use, and the building also has 24 hour visitor parking.  The kitchen remains fully stocked with anything you might need to cook, and the bathroom also has the basics so you can pack light.  The balcony is north-facing, so the apartment has fantastic natural light and part of the balcony is open-air so you can stay in the shade or get some direct sun.  The views are UNBELIEVABLE, the best view in Melbourne by far!  From our apartment you can see the city, the park, the lake and the bay all at once.
host_about: Unknown

name: Fully Furnished studio $350 incl. Utilities
summary: The Budget 1 Single offers an 8sqm micro studio layout, ideal if you are on the go and simply need a place to rest your head. You’ll find this cosy room offers air-conditioning, an LCD television with Foxtel, bar fridge, work station, wireless internet and shower over toilet.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Melbourne City Short Term Stay
summary: Master bedroom, including private en suite.  A beautiful home away from home. Located in tree lined East Melbourne, this centrally located townhouse offers the convenience of close promixity to the Melbourne CBD and the feel of home.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I am an American with the pleasure of calling Melbourne my home over the last 12 years. 

Ubuntu - an African word for the interconnection of all things wherein the dignity, safety and welfare of the individual is most valued over all other considerations. Therein this philosophy shall you find my open embrace for all peoples, cultures, languages and nations (whether tribal, traditional or nation-states); complemented by my studies in International Relationships/Institutions/Security Arrangements , by my passion for law and politics, and echoed in my life long interest in meeting, sharing and learning from people in all walks of life.

My Motto: Dare to reach for the potential within you and beyond!

name: Room in eco-friendly house + garden
summary: This quiet suburban home has been transformed into a peaceful sanctuary with a lovely organic veggie garden. It has a relaxed, welcoming  atmosphere and is the perfect place to chill out. There are 2 friendly dogs and 1 person living here.
space: This eclectic home is a green oasis and the perfect place to relax. If you'd like to learn about organic gardening, food sharing, meditation, or yoga then Michael is happy to share his knowledge. The 3BR house is shared with him and 2 lovely dogs. You will have one end of the house to yourself, with your own toilet and large bathroom with shower and bathtub. The middle bedroom is an empty spare room / study, and Michael's bedroom has an ensuite so the bathroom is all yours. There's an airy open-plan kitchen / dining / lounge area, a courtyard with BBQ, a large veggie garden, and sunny back yard where the two dogs hang out. Nixon and Bacon are both very friendly, well-trained doggies and love meeting people. You can sit around the outdoor fire at night and toast marshmallows under the stars, or chill out in a hammock on a sunny day.  The laundry has a washing machine, dryer, and indoor clothesline. There's off-street parking in the driveway and it's a lovely quiet cul-de-sac with friend
host_about: Unknown

name: Best position and price!
summary: next to M3 high way, if drive it will only take 25mins to City, 10 mins walk to Coles, Costco, 20 mins walk to shopping centre, 5 mins walk to the train station. The house is very quiet and behind the park!
space: Unknown

summary: This apartment size is 50sq Closed to southern cross station Free Tram Zone  Skybus station(airport Direct 1 stop) Lots of restaurant around the building Coles Supermarket only 2 minutes walk. Shopping center is near by Since you are in the free tram area -  You can take tram go to lots of sign seeing. Such as Victoria Market Flinder Station Crown Casino
space: This is around 50sq. it is 1 bedroom + 1  open living area
host_about:
Hi Everyone,
I would like give you $55 credit, if you book the apartment from us.
please use my link to create the new account, and book it. 
http://www.airbnb.com.au/c/kent177

I have 29 listings in airbnb, We have different variety of apartments, such as 
1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments,
2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments
3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartments

You can enter the date and number of guests from the airbnb listing page, then it will show up which one is available for you.




Being a Airbnb host for 5-6 years. I love being a host, because I know that when people, different group of people and family come to our place, when they feel, it is worth it. I love it and enjoy. That's the happiness that other job may not able to find it. I really love to see when my guests they start to step to the apartment and feel wow and impressed.
Honestly, being a host, it is not easy decision.
We have to make sure every details things in our place are the best to our guests. 
From check-in to check-out. It is an experience not only for guests. it is for us as well. It is the whole responsibilities. 

That’s what I think, the reason which motivates me to be a host.

Melbourne is a very multi-cultural city 
My objective is, if someone come here they should be connected to the right place.
Me, as a host, I think is kind of connecting these different piece together, a kind of connection.
The high point of my stay was how you made me feel. And how you made me feel, it sticks. It sticks with you.”
I have the traditional way to believe.
We believe it is the relationship that provide to the guests they will enjoy,  love the place to stay.
They trust me and I trust them. And that’s the reason it works.
So hospitalities if you ask me, is about care. It s about welcoming. This is about welcoming with open heart.  Welcome you to my Melbourne Apartment.

name: Melbourne 1 Bdrm overlooking Ruffey Lake Park
summary: The guesthouse is close to the eastern freeway, Doncaster Westfield shopping centre, public transport and the beautiful Ruffey Lake Park. You’ll fall in love with the area because of the views, the location, and the many many walks and trails in Ruffey Lake Park. The guesthouse is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: Unknown

summary: Treat yourself to stay at this beautiful apartment and enjoy the amazing views of city. Rest in comfortable bed, and take your time and relax in our swimming pool, sauna. All this in the CBD, heart of melbourne
space: This apartment sits in the corner of Elizabeth street and A'beckett street. A multitude of public transports options. Just 3 minutes walking to Melbourne Central Station. One minute by walk to tram stop. Enjoy the convenient Melbourne CBD living style with shops and cafes. A Coles supermarket and Asian Grocery in a walking distances. A short stoll will bring you to Crown Casino Entertainment Center and Southwharf DFO. This fully equipped and furnished condo is ready to go with -a sofa bed  -LED TV  -Air Conditioner -Wifi  -Dining table and chair  - bedroom 1&2  - roller blinds for all windows - 1 double size bed and 1 single bed - quilt , pillows,cushions,  & covers - storage closet - hangers. Bathroom -Shampoo - body wash& hand soap - Bath, face & hand towels -toilet rolls - toothbrush and tooth pasta, cups  - rubish bin. Kitchen - coffee &tea  -sugar, salt, white & black pepper -kettle, toaster, mugs, cups, wine glasses, dishes & bowls  - pots, pans, cutlery  -oven, microwave, cook t

name: Luxury experience with 180 degree water view
summary: *****Early birds: Book 1 month in advance, get 15% off***** Situated on the 20th floor of the brand new building,  the modern one bedroom apartment has most spectacular uninterrupted water views offering an experience you would not get from any where else. The building offers the most lavish facilities including indoor pool, gym and spa.Tram stop and woolworths are literally at your doorstep  Perfect for holiday, business trips and event stays. Enjoy!
space: Comprising of an open plan living area and contemporary kitchen fitted with top range MIELE appliances.This unique apartment also features a large screen-size LCD TV, comfortable queen size bed, cosy living space, and a working area with stylish table lamp, unlimited fast fibre Internet connection and a large desk.
host_about: Unknown

name: 2 bedrooms in a welcoming home!
summary: Two bedrooms are available in my lovely  townhouse ( I will be staying in the third bedroom). Depending on your group you can have queen size bed plus one or two single bed  in 2 separate bedrooms,  or three single beds in 2 bedrooms. Cot is also available for babies
space: The bedrooms is very light and spacious. Three quality single beds and a very comfortable queen bed are available, depending on your group you can have different configuration.  Cot and bassinet are available for babies. All bedding and towels are provided. The house have ample living space to share. There is heating in winter and cooling in summer throughout the house.
host_about: I live in the lovely suburb of Ormond in Melbourne, Australia. I has been working in the publishing and finance area for many years, but in my spare time I am a traveller, a keen dancer, a gardener and just a social person hwo likes meeting people and sharing a good time.  I speak English and Russian

name: Shinrin-yoku (forest bathing)
summary: This off-grid (no electricity) shack offers guests a minimalist - yet luxurious - experience. Sleep almost under the stars on a luxury double gel memory foam mattress, with quality pillows. Get the woodfired heater roaring (there’s a metho stove too), boil the kettle, make a cup of tea/plunger coffee, and gaze through large windows at mountains peeking between treetops. There’s tank water for handwashing and a composting toilet. If it’s warm, bring bathers for a swim in the Yarra River.
space: Great cotton linen and a feather doona will keep you cozy in bed. There are fern, forest and mountain views through the windows, and a skylight to the tree canopy. Boil up the kettle on the woodfired heater or with the metho burner for a peppermint or black tea or plunger coffee. Outside, relax in the hammock, or sit on chairs on the deck or by the outdoor fire pit (firewood is provided).  The bird life is amazing and curious about visitors!
host_about: Travel writer with a love of cycling, running and forests.

name: Large space, bright, convenient  for Girls/Family
summary: If you are looking for a clean and convenient accommodation with the helpful local in Melbourne city, our “HOME” should be your perfect choice. Spacious large room with big window can look outside and enjoy the scene and interiors offer everything you need. Cleanliness + convenience is our formula to keep you stay comfortably with us and we make sure you will love it. Our commitment is to host with respect and friendliness and be willing help any time you need during your stay
space: I'm a female live with my daughter. This place is Not suitable for male traveler  The space is  large, bright and convenient, really ideal for the girls/families and full furnished with: - Large space  with sunny big window    - Queen-size bed with high-quality bedding - A/C and very fast WiFi - Microwave (shared at the common space) - Refrigerator (shared at the common space) - Hair dryer (shared) - Ironer (shared) - Washing machine (shared) - Super hot pot (shared at the common space) - Gas Stove (shared at the common space) - Full set of cooking utensils (shared at the common space) - Hot water for a good shower - A bathroom to be shared.
host_about: Unknown

name: Charming pioneer cottage
summary: Our pioneer cottage is nestled in the Dandenong Ranges. Indulge in a home-cooked morning or afternoon tea by an open fire or in the garden; enjoy a private wing with two beautifully restored bedrooms, dining room and sitting room. Take walks to the forest and popular heritage Patch Post Office cafe. A  four minute drive or half hour walk takes you to the historic tourist village, Kallista. A short drive to key tourist destinations: Puffing Billy, wineries, tourist villages,cafes and craft shops.
space: Guests have use of a very roomy "wing" of this rambling cottage. A dining room and living room in addition to two beautifully decorated bedrooms are yours to enjoy. The dining room: Beautiful high ceilinged room with a large open fireplace, dining table and upright piano. Living room: Sunny and light-filled comfortable room with books, board-games, sofa and coffee table. Comfortable daybed allows for a 5th guest. T.V.,  bar fridge stocked with essentials, microwave, coffee machine and tea making facilities. Free Wi Fi available. Out in the garden, guests can make use of a Provincial style garden table with plenty of seating; a secret, vine-draped arbour to sit in and read a book or enjoy a quiet cup of tea; and a barbecue.  Whether it's unwinding from a day of sight-seeing and walks through the forest or just relaxing over a cup of tea, the rooms will welcome you and you'll feel like you're in your own country cottage. There is an information folder provided giving a range of useful fa
host_about: We are a married couple who enjoy our close community, the natural beauty and walks that surround us, as well as books and music. We are both involved in the creative arts. We have travelled quite widely. We genuinely enjoy having visitors and take pleasure in not only making people feel at home, but also helping people to make the most of their time in our spectacular Dandenong Ranges.

name: 2br apartment in Kensington village close to CBD
summary: My place is a cute two bedroom apartment in Kensington village. The first floor walk-up apartment has lovely views across Kensington and Flemington Racecourse. Kensington is the perfect place for you to experience life as a Melburnian with great coffee, cafes and shops nearby. It is less than 10 minutes into the city for you to enjoy all that Melbourne has to offer. You'll have the choice of cooking in my fully equipped kitchen or enjoying the nearby local restaurants.
space: My place is on the first floor of an eight unit apartment building. You'll need to walk up one flight of stairs to access my apartment that is nice and quiet as it is at the back of the property. You'll be able to enjoy two separate bedrooms both with queen size beds.  The bathroom has a shower over the bath and a washing machine. The toilet is separate from the bathroom so that makes it easier when sharing with friends. The lounge room has a comfortable couch and TV for you to relax when you get home.
host_about: Unknown

name: Modern Apartment by Chapel Street with Pool + Gym
summary: Centrally located in the heart of one of Melbourne's happening neighbourhoods with plenty to do both day and night. The apartment itself is located just a stones throw away from the iconic Chapel Street with loads of bars, restaurants and world class cafes! There's no better place than South Yarra to stay to experience Melbourne!
space: The apartment is located in modern building with world class facilities including communal sky-garden, cinema, gym and swimming pool available for guests use. Our apartment is fitted out with comfortable and modern furniture to ensure you enjoy your stay. We provide all amenities for guests including kitchen utensils, TV, Aircon, heating, Wifi etc.
host_about:
G'day,

I'm Joel, i'm born and raised in Sydney, which is in my opinion one of the most beautiful major cities in the world. My goal in life is to one day visit every country in the world, I hold no bias to any of them and hope that I get the opportunity. So far I have visited 42 countries. Last year I spent 1 year travelling in South and Central America and loved the opportunity I had to learn Spanish. It was a great experience and one that I will never forget. 

My hobbies include all forms of board sports, skating, surfing and snowboarding primarily. I enjoy learning about new cultures especially their foods. I grew up in an Italian restaurant so my love for food and cooking is deeply engrained in my personality. 

My style of hosting and living life in general is pretty relaxed. I will do my best to greet you at the door and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. But if you just want to chill I can totally relate. 

I also love music and watching live music. I mostly go out to see House, deep house and techno music as that scene in Sydney is easily accessible. However at home you will find me listening to hip-hop, reggae, latin, afro-beat, jazz and anything with a smooth and funky beat. 

If you need recommendations about food or music in Sydney these are probably my two strongest topics, so please don't hesitate. 

Looking forward to meeting more crazy, fun and cool people through Airbnb. 

Joel

name: Cosy, Stylish Modern Home in the Centre of CBD
summary: This is a brand-new apartment!!  The apartment comes fully furnished with everything you would need! AND Melbourne CBD is at your doorstep!  This fancy new apartment, filled with luxury design elements, is comfortable and within walking distance to countless CBD attractions. Rail, tram and bus stop only minutes away.
space: Supreme location –Here at the Avant Tower :    Melbourne is full of life, with the city's best-loved locations all just moments from Avant Tower: -	Melbourne Central, 4 minutes walk  -	The Queen Victoria market has been at the hear of Melbourne for more than a century. 7 minutes away. -	Oliver Laneway, a quintessential Melbourne laneway, 5 minutes away. -	RMIT University, 1 min walk  -	The University of Melbourne, 8 mins tram ride  -	The national Gallery of Victoria, the oldest and most visited public art gallery in Australia, 8 mins walk -	Flagstaff Gardens, 8 mins walk -	The Yarra River, 10 mins tram  Our room is spacious for 2 guests, ideal for 4 guests and accommodates.   BEDDING 1 x Double Bed in the bedroom  1 x comfortable Sofa Bed in the living area  Essentials: Quilt, pillows, sheets, throws & cushions  KITCHEN APPLIANCES Complimentary coffee, tea and snacks Oven, microwave, range hood, cooktop, toaster Fridge & freezer  Dishwasher & detergents  Kettle, mugs, cups, wine glasse
host_about:
Dear guests: 

Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Melbourne. Whether you are coming for business, pleasure, or visiting friends. We believe you will enjoy the rooms we elaborately prepared.

Weyou Stay is owned and managed by WeYouCorporation Ltd . Our team are all professional trained and fluent in English, Mandarin and Cantonese.

If there is anything we could provide to make your stay more enjoyable, please do not hesitate to let us know!

Cheers,

name: Degraves St - Melbourne's Heart
summary: A Melbourne postcard right in the heart of Degraves street!  A stylish and peaceful New York loft apartment in a cafe laneway location that cannot be beat.   Directly downstairs you have direct access to Melbourne's vibrant laneway culture on iconic Degraves St. The loft is situated in what was Melbourne's first department store.  The historic building structure ensures silence and privacy, while enjoying modern surrounds, including a king bed. Please ask about a paid on site parking option.
space: Wake up and smell the coffee on iconic Degraves St!  This dual level loft style apartment is stylishly furnished and is located in one of Melbourne's most famous laneways.  Flinders St train station, Federation Square and the banks of the Yarra river are right at your doorstep too. Inside, the well appointed kitchen features European appliances - including a dishwasher, stone bench top and a pantry with provisions.   The king size bedroom includes a hardwood king size bed and is accessible on the mezzanine level via the spiral staircase off the living area.   The lounge room features a soft leather couch that also doubles as a sofa bed, for additional guests.  Two double ceiling height windows let in filtered light and provide privacy.   A stylish occasional chair and unique artwork complete the comfortable ambience that resonates throughout the apartment. A modern bathroom, including a laundry cupboard with a clothes washer and dryer, and are also available to you.  The apartment has
host_about:
I'm a Melbournian who loves to eat well and travel. 

My properties in the Melbourne CBD, North Melbourne and Flemington offer very convenient access to the city, they are tastefully decorated and, of course, are private and secure.  Just enjoy!  

I'm a friendly host and will happily provide any information you require about the local area or Melbourne generally.  I have the airbnb app on my smart phone, so can readily be contacted if you have any questions.  Please feel free to ask.

name: Domi Rentals - Three Bedroom Townhouse
summary: Located on the city fringe within the heart of hip and fashionable St Kilda. Just a short 15 min tram into the city or the train is only 2 min walk away with a direct 10 min commute into central Melbourne. Search for our brand DOMI to see our range!
space: Stunning spacious and light filled three Bedroom and two Bathroom DOMI Townhouse. Property is impeccably furnished throughout.  Featuring:  - Three bedrooms - Comfortable pocket sprung mattresses  - Two Luxurious bathrooms - Modern fully equipped kitchen  - Open plan living and dining  - Free Wireless internet connection (wifi) Additional features include:  - Two reverse cycle air-conditioner/heater - 42 inch LED TV  - DVD player (on request)  - Car parking for one small car  - Free unrestricted street parking  - Private euro laundry - Desk/Workspace (on request) Extras:  - Baby cot available on request.  Bedrooms include 1 Double bed 2 King single beds and a single bed and trundle in the 3rd bedroom.  With Day-bed and trundle in the Lounge available on request. Linen and towels provided.  Ideal for couples, families and groups.  Walking distance to everything!  Fantastic central location.  Just a short walk or tram ride to:  - Beach (10 minute tram ride) - Restaurants and bars  - Fash
host_about:
Domi, means home.
Welcome to a beautiful range of homes to suit every person, on holiday or work short or long term.
There is a Domi rental for you!

name: Position Perfect The Loft Brunswick
summary: The Loft Brunswick is a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment. It is clean, modern and fresh. All our linen and towels are professionally cleaned.  We are available to answer any questions!
space: The Loft Brunswick is a two bedroom, two bathroom apartment situated towards the rear of the complex. The apartment has a king bed upstairs in the main bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and two long single beds in the second bedroom downstairs. You will also have the option to have four long singles or two king beds for a small fee. A second bathroom runs off the living area. This apartment has a small living area. We recommend The Loft Brunswick apartment for four- five guests comfortably. The fifth guest will sleep on a single fold out sofa in the living room. This apartment has external and internal stairs. It has  split system heating/cooling upstairs in the main bedroom and another one downstairs in the living room. We manage 7 other apartments in this building. This makes it great if you need to book with other friends and family who each want their own space. ABOUT US At Position Perfect, we are a family owned business dedicated to providing guests with comfortable, and clean ac
host_about: Position Perfect is a family owned business. We are two couples, with two children each. We love the freedom this venture gives us and we enjoy getting involved as a team.  We take pride in the accommodation we provide for our guests and take the time to renovate and decorate to suit the area.

name: Rivergarden 3 bedroom Apartment
summary: Rivergarden Apt is close to lots of Melbourne's attractions - walking distance to the Crown Casino, Exhibition Buildings, Convention Centre, Aquarium, Spencer St Station, South Melb Market, DFO, Cinemas, Food Courts, The Tramcar Restaurant, Supermarket/Bottle Shop and more.  You’ll love the Rivergarden apartment because of the cosy home away from home feel, it's very family friendly, really spacious and roomy with a great sized balcony overlooking the city, comfy beds and so close to everything.
space: Unknown
host_about: I live on Melbourne’s Mornington Peninsula with my husband and two children.  Our lives are full of their sporting activities on the weekends, spending as much time as possible on our beautiful beach and with friends and family.

name: Spectacular 1 Bedroom Apartment in FREE Tram Zone
summary: Magnificent one bedroom apartment in the heart of the city opposite Southern Cross Station, within FREE TRAM ZONE, close to every where!
space: Spectacular accommodation spacious for 2 people, ideal for 3, accommodates for 4. This apartment has a spacious bedroom with a firm and supportive queen sized bed. Sofa bed in the living area which converts easily into a queen sized bed with FIRM foam mattress. A fully decked kitchen with COMPLIMENTARY tea and coffee available. A private balcony and bathroom with providing shampoo, conditioner, body wash and hand wash. LIVING AREA - 32 inch Hisense TV - Air Conditioning & heating - Wireless internet - Extra quilts, pillows, sheets & covers  - Firm & comfy queen size sofa bed   Measurements when sofa: width 163 cm, depth 111 cm, height 41 cm    Measurements when bed: width 160 cm, length 205 cm BEDROOM - Queen size bed with measurements: length 206cm, depth 156cm,  height 40cm - Bedside table & lamp - Storage closet - Hangers - clothes racks BATHROOM - Shampoo, conditioner, body wash & hand wash - Bath, face towels - Bath mats - Toilet rolls - Hair dryer DINING AREA - Dining table & cha
host_about:
Welcome to Melbourne!

This is the city we live, play and work, it's incredibly beautiful, vibrant and diverse!

Imagine a city where nobody is judged by the color of their skin, the money they make, their religion, address or sexual preference. Imagine a city where people relate to each other as one big community. 

That's what we're out to find out....

name: Large Room in Thornbury
summary: I'm offering my large room in a big, spacious share house in Thornbury for a few days. The room itself has huge ceilings, lots of natural light, a big desk, a queen bed, bedside table, heater, and wardrobe. It is in no way fancy but if you're just looking for a place to call your own for a few days, cheaply, it's perfect. I live with three other students, all of whom are warm and friendly, and you're welcome to use the house as I would.
space: Unknown
host_about: My name is Omar J. Sakr, I'm a working writer and published poet, which means I am often away on short trips.

name: Executive 3br Caulfield North
summary: This apartment is stylish as well as functional and caters for both the business executive and today's modern family.
space: The furniture, beds, bedding and linen are of the highest quality. We provide free access to Netflix and high speed unlimited internet. The apartment comes with security parking with lift access and the building has a security entrance.  It is located close to the hustle and bustle of North Caulfield’s Orrong Rd shopping strip.
host_about: Conscientious and hard working

name: High St Northcote stylish 1 bedroom apartment
summary: Modern Apartment, well furnished with style located in the cultural hub of Northcote. Surrounded by beautiful parks and public Transport that's a short distance away.  The surrounding area provides an insight into Melbourne trendy northern suburbs with hidden cafes and popular shopping locations around the corner.
space: The Apartment is well lit has one spacious bedroom and one bathroom. The kitchen area is free for guests to use, smart TV and WiFi are included in the living room. The balcony with a BBQ is perfect for sunny afternoon meals,  its also very close to the surrounding park areas
host_about:
G'day,

I'm Joel, i'm born and raised in Sydney, which is in my opinion one of the most beautiful major cities in the world. My goal in life is to one day visit every country in the world, I hold no bias to any of them and hope that I get the opportunity. So far I have visited 42 countries. Last year I spent 1 year travelling in South and Central America and loved the opportunity I had to learn Spanish. It was a great experience and one that I will never forget. 

My hobbies include all forms of board sports, skating, surfing and snowboarding primarily. I enjoy learning about new cultures especially their foods. I grew up in an Italian restaurant so my love for food and cooking is deeply engrained in my personality. 

My style of hosting and living life in general is pretty relaxed. I will do my best to greet you at the door and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. But if you just want to chill I can totally relate. 

I also love music and watching live music. I mostly go out to see House, deep house and techno music as that scene in Sydney is easily accessible. However at home you will find me listening to hip-hop, reggae, latin, afro-beat, jazz and anything with a smooth and funky beat. 

If you need recommendations about food or music in Sydney these are probably my two strongest topics, so please don't hesitate. 

Looking forward to meeting more crazy, fun and cool people through Airbnb. 

Joel

name: Private Queen room in cosy sunny apartment
summary: Great little place in the perfect inner north location, light filled apartment and room with a view. Private room available and will be sharing  the lounge, kitchen and bathroom with my lovely housemate (who works full time hours).  The apartment is a 10 minute walk from the CBD, 96 tram at the doorstep, and Fitzroy and Carlton strips close by. Please feel free to get in touch if you have any more questions. People from all backgrounds are welcome.
space: Unknown
host_about:
hi! I'm Karli. Crave adventure and true animal lover. Main travel interests include wildlife, diving, live music and hiking. 

Trying to live a more ethical life. I enjoy getting a local experience, supporting & being involved in conservation efforts/projects . Also like to go  off the beaten path  and meeting new people from around the globe. good food, tea and coffee make me a happy gal too

Next destination Africa, a childhood dream. Hakuna Matata

name: Mansion Apartment
summary: My place is spacious older-style mansion apartment, previously used as an art studio residence with bedroom and glamours bathroom. . You’ll love my place because of The high ceilings, as it is  nestled in nature with a leafy garden. With Morning sun and Tranquil surroundings it has a romantic outlook, yet it is the heart of StKilda East, close to public transport and carlisle st shopping centre. Includes Marble fireplace and enchanting marble kitchen. .
space: It's a character filled 100 year old apartment. Spacious rooms with a queen size bed and a sofa bed that opens into a double bed. The kitchen is made of marble there is a microwave, but no stove. The bathroom is full of old world charm.
host_about: research scientist on a holiday

name: Merri61 - light airy three bedroom house
summary: A welcoming 3 bedroom house in one of Melbourne's most exciting multicultural precincts. Great base for a visit to Melbourne. Only 5 km to the CBD with excellent public transport. In a quiet safe street with Melbourne's best restaurants & cafes a short stroll away. Bike paths, universities, hospitals, the zoo, Exhibition Buildings, Melbourne Museum all a short tram ride away. A choice of playgrounds and parks nearby.
space: This house is bright and airy. We have established it as we would like to find a house that we rented ourselves - comfortable, clean, modern, good quality and ample kitchen equipment, great outdoor area with barbecue.  The bedrooms are very comfortable with good quality beds and bedding. The main bedroom has a bay window with a day bed. You can see glimpses of the city from here so is particularly nice at night and it is nice and sunny in the afternoon. This bedroom also has a TV. The other bedroom upstairs has great views over eclectic, multicultural Brunswick toward the Dandenongs. All bedrooms and the study nook have black out blinds for children and others who are light sensitive. The sofa bed is located in the study nook upstairs. It is Italian made and very good quality that will assure you a comfortable night's sleep. During the day it doubles as a quiet living space for getting away. The street has lovely federation and edwardian houses, and is quiet and safe. Parking is availa
host_about:
Hi, I am really excited to be an airbnb host. I travel a lot myself, use Airbnb and know what it takes to be comfortable and how important it is. I know holidays are treasures - I have  gone out of my way to make your experience memorable. 

I live in Brunswick so I know the area well. I eat out in the area and further afield often and can offer you recommendations.

I moved to Melbourne in my 20s because I love it so much. I am very willing to help you make the most of your stay.

name: 55*Unique Boutique@*3Bd1BTH*Carpark*
summary: A dreaming apartment with 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom located in Brunswick West is very lovely and peaceful for everyone who comes to Melbourne for vacation!!! and Top Brunch shops are all surrounding with walking distance. It is 10 minutes drive from the Melbourne City. Best place for getaway holidays. It is an apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with kitchenware, oven, refrigerator, stove top, microwave oven, toaster, electric kettle, iron, ironing facilities, washing machine.
space: A fully furnished apartment with 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, 1 living room.  *We provide basic goods that customer need,such as bed linens and towels.* This fully equipped and furnished 3 Bedroom Apartment is ready to go with: - NBN Wireless Internet - LED TV BEDROOM AREAS - Roller blinds for all windows - Queen size bed,Double size bed, two Single size bed, Quilt, pillows, sheets & covers - Bedside table & lamp - Wardrobe - Hangers BATHROOM - Shampoo, body wash & hand soap - Bath & hand towels - Floor Mats - Toilet rolls - Hair dryer LIVING AREA - Roller blinds for all windows - Coffee table - Comfy 2-seater Sofa DINING AREA - Dining table & chairs KITCHEN AREA - Oven, microwave, cooktop & range hood - Fridge & freezer - Dish washer & detergents - Kettle, mugs, cups, wine glasses & dishes - Pots, pans, cutlery & cooking utensils - Kitchen towels & bin LAUNDRY AREA - Washing machine& detergents

summary: Cosy house with one single bedroom/study available, shared kitchen, dining table  and laundry with me. Suit a student or traveller.  Easy walking distance to Stud Park shops (5 minutes), 10 minute drive to Knox city, bus transport and opposite Rowville Lakes to see the birdlife.  Undercover outdoor area with table and chairs, central heating and air conditioned.  Would also consider long term for home office business use or student accommodation.
space: A peaceful and clean homely environment.  Unwind from a busy day with access to TV/DVD player, a CD player for relaxation music to listen to, DVDs available to watch, books/magazines and even adult mindfulness colouring book and pencils available.  The bathroom has organic bath products for use by guests (eco-friendly too).

summary: Note: 2 rooms to be booked together. Hi there! Thank you for considering my listing! Amenities: A bathroom shared by 2 rooms. Toiletries and linens are provided. Language available: English Hindi Punjabi It is a spacious house which is 15-20 mins drive to Melbourne airport and 1 km to a major shopping center.
space: It is a spacious house which is 15-20 mins drive to melbourne airport and 1 km to a major shopping centre

I am 32 years old married guy and a successful Airbnb host.
A fun loving adventurous person who loves to travel and explore.

name: Bright and airy tree top apartment.
summary: Spacious and bright tree top apartment in Port Melbourne. Boasting views on three sides including CBD skyline.  Situated in a quiet but central location only 2km from the CBD. Our apartment is within walking distance to the beach, Princess pier, 109 tram to city, and Bay Street.  Bay street is bursting with cafes, bars, restaurants and shops. It's a great base to access all of Melbourne's festivals and events.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Melbourne Star
summary: Sparkling 2 bedroom apartment! Brand new and the option to sleep 5 is a bonus!!
space: Have Melbourne at your fingertips when you stay in this brand new apartment!  Brand new building just completed, amazing views and sleek fittings,  this superbly presented two bedroom two bathroom  apartment located on the 19 floor is the ultimate in inner city living. Fantastic outlooks  can be enjoyed from the balcony while  Natural light fills every room in this delightfully laid out city home with each bedroom equipped with built in robes. The main bedroom has a flat screen TV on brackets. The kitchen is well-appointed with stainless steel appliances, miele dishwasher ,oven, cook top and microwave. The open plan kitchen living area offers floor to ceiling windows which heads out on to the  balcony. The sleek modern bathrooms are bathed in natural light and nestled next to the concealed European laundry. Also offering a split system air conditioning in the living area ensures comfort all year round. Windows are double glassed for extra quite living and sleeping. With a quick stroll
host_about:
Stay With Style are a Melbourne team who offer individual quality accommodation in popular inner city areas of Melbourne . Our properties are carefully selected , most managed on behalf of our landlords and some which are our own.  Feel free to inquire for longer stays - we love a good deal!

If it is not us who check you in, it will be our very helpful cleaners/housekeepers who will provide you with just as much information as we would.

If you have a property we will be happy to look after that too. 

Happy travelling!

name: Alphington parking, private bathroom, warm welcome
summary: Our quiet upstairs guest room is a comfortable place to relax, a short walk to many great parks, cafes, restaurants and music venues. Park your car safely in front and use public transport or walk around the neighbourhood. The Yarra River bike paths are nearby and it's very quick to get to the city by train or bus. We provide tea and coffee making facilities as well as your own TV.
space: Our two storey, three bedroom townhouse is a comfortable place to relax with easy bus or train options to the city. The upstairs guest bedroom has a queen sized bed, plenty of wardrobe space, adjacent toilet and your own bathroom downstairs. There is a TV/DVD player in the room so if you feel like just taking it easy you can just relax with some screen time. The courtyard is a relaxing place to kick back with a coffee and a book.  The street is quiet but the train is a 5 minute walk and a bus to the city passes the end of the street.  Ours is the perfect place to be close to the CBD, Northcote, Fairfield, Carlton and Fitzroy but far enough away to be able to really chill out and enjoy some space.  Station St Fairfield, a short walk away has many cafes and numerous restaurants including Greek, Vietnamese, Indian, Japanese and Thai.  Cyclists can choose many directions to take bike paths all over the city. We are happy to provide suggestions for cycling and resources to help plan your ri
host_about:
My husband Allan and myself love to travel and meet locals when we do. In the last few years we have spent some months exploring Europe and Asia, as well as some fantastic road trips within Australia in our campervan. 
We love to share what we like about our neighbourhood and are passionate about the joys of living in Melbourne. 
We like it when prospective guests have a profile that tells us a little about themselves and in their booking enquiry, something about their stay. This helps us to  better anticipate our guests' needs and  prepare for them.
We enjoy cycling, kayaking, bush walking, theatre, cinema, cooking, reading and gardening.

My ground floor 1 bed home has a Lrge queen bedroom with private green outlook.  (small) bathroom (shower/bath) older style kitchen no dishwasher. 6 seater dining table which can extend to 8. A sofa you can melt into. Fire place, W/M, North facing, Courtyard, bbq, 50” TV, Wifi, Netflix.
space: My gorgeous one bedroom place is in a 1950’s block. It is one of six apartments. It has charm and a very homely feel ( it is my home after all). It doesn’t have the modern amenities of a new apartment block but you won’t find a one bedroom built like this anymore. It’s beautifully cool in the hot days and has is a very large 1 bedroom with all the spaces of a home.

name: Wiggley Bottom Farm Cottage
summary: Wiggley is a 15 acre farmstay and the Cottage is ideal for couples (pets welcome) and is private, beautifully decorated, and comprises a kingsize bedroom with floor to ceiling windows looking out over the hills, a large open plan sitting/dining room with a great kitchen area with everything you could possibly need.  The bathroom is light and bright with a large shower.
space: Wiggley Bottom Farm is a beautiful and vibrant country retreat located in the heart of Victoria's acclaimed Yarra Valley. The perfect getaway for couples, the farm, nestling at the end of a willow-lined way, has it all - beautiful, ever-changing views, elegant and thoughtful accommodation and those surprising, friendly touches that transform a simple stay into a memorable experience. Plus the culinary delights of the gourmet trail and all the local attractions right on your doorstep. And for some of our guests, the farm has an even more special appeal. Because at Wiggley Bottom Farm your pets are not just an afterthought.  Like their fortunate owners, your pets, if you choose to bring them, are warmly welcomed to share in the relaxed, rural atmosphere. THE COTTAGE The private, tastefully appointed cottage is Wiggley Bottom Farm's gem. Fully self-contained, this guest cottage looks out over the well maintained farm to the rolling, gently lit hills of the valley. The breathtaking views a
host_about: Fun, outgoing with a passion for great food and wine....

name: Modern, amazing location and view
summary: You’ll love my apartment because of It's incredible view of Melbourne, and proximity to everything. There's a rooftop gym/pool with even greater views of the city.  It is near new, being completed earlier this year and has modern appliances throughout, including a 60" TV/Netflix/internet. Directly across from Crown Casino, there are two tram lines heading straight to the city, which is also only a 15 minute walk.
space: The main bedroom has ceiling to floor windows with breathtaking views of the city, and Yarra river all the way out to Docklands.
host_about:
Hello!

You can see me on Insta: @grtshw
 
I am travelling as a lover of food, culture and the arts, and to take plenty of selfies. 

So far I've travelled throughout Asia; Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, China and Hong Kong, heaps of Europe, heaps of America.

name: Contemporary Apartment in Vibrant Inner City Area
summary: Welcome to my modern 1 bedroom apartment in Collingwood. An inner-city hub which is cool, edgy and quintessentially ‘Melbourne’. Live like a local just a stone's throw from Smith, Gertrude, and Brunswick Streets - and the best shops, restaurants, cafes and bars in the city. Close to the CBD and Collingwood train station, you can enjoy the best of urban Melbourne life. Perfect for business travellers, a couple or friends – you will have access to a gym and a rooftop garden lounge.
space: Enjoy local living from my stylish, fully furnished 1 bedroom Collingwood apartment, located close to Smith, Gertrude and Brunswick Streets. This heritage-listed former Yorkshire Brewery, now redeveloped, incorporates a sensational communal rooftop sanctuary with BBQ area and a gymnasium. My apartment itself, is light-filled, spacious and has a balcony that looks out over the neighbourhood. The open plan living area is beautifully set up. Relax on the cosy couch with a movie on the TV (Apple TV is provided) and have relaxing nights at home. The kitchen is neat and functional and perfect for meal preparation at home. All mods cons are available for your convenience, such as an electric oven, gas cook top, cooking utensils, appliances (microwave, kettle and toaster), an Italian coffee maker, a sandwich press and a large fridge. The bedroom is quiet and has a comfortable double bed, ensuring you of a really restful night sleep. There is plenty of cupboard space, so that you can unpack all

summary: This home with two living areas, one of them with large glass frame to get the best light from north. It also has 3 toilets, 2 bathrooms, 6 bedrooms, 2 Kitchens, 5 cars parking and a large outdoor decking area.  Its sits on top of the hill, overlooking the beautiful Dandenong mountains. Its only 100 meters directly facing the Glen Shopping Centre.  There is about 250 meters walk to train station and hundreds restaurants nearby.
space: Central of central. best view of the mountain, shopping centre and 100+ restaurants around the area.

I am enjoy playing chess, and attend most of the country or state level competitions. I would like to travel with my family or alone if I going oversea to visit my family and friends, pretty much like sea food and do the cooking on my own.   I would like meeting friends who would like to share the experience of healthy style living.

name: 靠近Monash大学和南半球最大的购物中心(Chadstone )舒适明亮的房间
summary: 客房位于墨尔本东南Hughesdale区｡出门有多条巴士线路,可直达Monash 大学(10分钟),南半球最大的Chadstone 购物中心(6分钟)｡步行12分钟可到Hughesdale火车站,火车20分钟直达City｡墨尔本一些著名景点如Brighton Beach, Mount Dandenong等都挺近｡Hughesdale是个小巧的居民区,周边的Oakleigh, Carnegie, Clayton等区有着丰富多元的购物选择和地道的各国餐馆,是体验墨尔本当地人生活和饮食文化的好地方｡ 我们的房子是一栋温馨的两层小楼,周围环境优美,毗邻公园､绿地,还有户外运动场所和儿童游戏设施｡房内各功能区明亮舒适､设备齐全､使用方便｡楼下是宽敞的共享空间 - 客厅､饭厅､厨房､洗衣房和卫生间,还有敞亮整洁的后院可以泡茶聊天晒太阳｡楼上除了房东卧室之外还有两间客房和一个带淋浴房的卫生间,其中一间是Queen size大床房,另一间有下铺可收放的两张单人床,如需要还可以提供婴儿床｡(您看到的价格是大床房单间的价格,如需使用另一个客房请参考price for extra people)
space: 本房源地理位置好,交通便利,客房宽敞明亮,非常安静｡
host_about:
你好~我们是Fen和Nick｡我们热爱烹饪､园艺､旅行, 也喜欢结识新朋友~~

Hello we're Fen & Nick. We love cooking, travelling, gardening and making new friends~

name: 2 bedroom apartment- Great location!
summary: 2 bedrooms, both with queen sized beds. Very close to trams, trains, st kilda, chapel st, albert park lake, street parking (not ticketed on weekends). Great sized kitchen and dining, balcony, air con and heating.
space: It's a lovely north facing apartment with a balcony, light, bright and comfortable in a fantastic location. In a block of only 24 apartments. Down a quiet side street in-between 2 busy roads - punt rd and st kilda rd. Wooden floor boards throughout.
host_about: I am a Registered Nurse and I love to travel both near and far to where I live in Melbourne.

name: Luxury new apartment in the heart of St Kilda
summary: Stunning new apartment in the heart of St Kilda - The Icon! Very private and quiet , positioned at the back of the building. And so central with trams and taxis on your doorstep, right in the St Kilda Junction. You have access to common facilities which include gym on the 5th floor, dining room, barbecue, fireplace.Unlimited high speed internet/wifi provided.
space: It’s an amazing apartment in a new building . Well located in a quiet/ back part of the building and giving you so much privacy. It’s a very secure building and has a gym and a communal area on the fifth floor to enjoy- a big kitchen , TV, balcony with the city views.
host_about: Unknown

name: Station On Greville
summary: This stunning 2 bedroom brand new architecturally designed apartment is in a stylish block of the recently transformed iconic Station Hotel.
space: This simplistic yet classy open plan living apartment comes with light Oak floors which flow straight out onto the balcony. Both bedrooms have queen size beds with quality linen provided, built-in wardrobes and well-appointed bathroom. The lounge area is beautifully furnished with comfortable designer sofa and comes equipped with a wall mounted smart TV with Netflix for your entertainment.  Whether you are on business or enjoying a short break, this apartment has everything you need and more to make your stay both memorable and comfortable. From the Italian designer kitchen, complete with high quality cookware, crockery and cutlery, to the Nespresso coffee machine we are here to make your stay effortless. Small families have not been forgotten either with the provision of a travel cot, baby bath, high chair and toys which can be provided.   For those guests who have their own transport, there is also an underground secure car space if needed.
host_about: Unknown

name: 3 Bedroom 3.5 bathrm, Art Deco Home
summary: My home is exactly that - a home! It has 3 bedrooms, 2 w ensuite and another full sized bathroom, 2 living areas, outdoor entertaining undercover area, large kitchen and laundry, 4th toilet, double garage w electronic gate opening, front and rear gardens and is a lovely quiet area. Stays of a month or more will have a cleaner attend to clean bathrooms and general tidy up and a gardener will also maintain the garden so you can spend your time doing other more enjoyable activities.
space: This is perfect for a family travelling to Melbourne and wanting somewhere quiet to stay but with all your own bedrooms.  The outdoor entertaining area has a vergola roof so you can enjoy the sun or it closes automatically when it starts to rain. I have a lovely garden, a large lock up garage and is located in a really safe, secure and quiet area close to everything. Plenty of public transport options and easy to access many areas.
host_about:
Hi

I've been hosting on airbnb for over 4 years now and have held Superhost status since it was introduced. I host several properties and respond to ALL requests and mostly within an hour - unless your request is from another time zone but even then I will respond asap. 

I am an energetic person that loves meeting new people and even if I don't get to meet you, I am always contactable and willing to assist with your enquiry. 

I try to ensure my guests have the experience of a wonderful stay and make their trip to Melbourne (or Yarrawonga) a memorable one. I have travelled extensively myself and know how important it is to obtain information and assistance without too much bother. 

I have lived in Melbourne all my life and like to share my passion with others to make their stay memorable.

I have several types of accommodation available and provide greater discounts for longer stays so please take a look at the pricing options.  I like to provide all the comforts to my guests as I myself would like them provided if I were to stay.  

You will see that there aren't too many reviews on my spaces considering the number of years that I have been hosting but that's due to the fact that many come and stay for longer periods as I provide significant discounts for stays of a month or more. I also have several guests coming back for 3 or more visits.

Melbourne has been voted now the most liveable city in the world - several times over in case you haven't already heard :)

Come and stay and see for yourself.

name: Stylish South Yarra Apartment
summary: Bring a beverage onto the cozy, sunny balcony and enjoy views across an upscale neighbourhood. Return from shopping to an ultramodern space with soothingly neutral decor, punctuated by black-and-white photography and warm, wide-plank wooden floors.
space: This one bedroom apartment is situated in South Yarra on the corner of Toorak Rd and Cunningham St. It features a spacious open planned living and dining area, bedroom with a queen size bed, large balcony, european laundry with washer/dryer along with a modern fully equipped kitchen fitted with a dishwasher, gas stovetop, Miele oven and stone bench. The spacious open planned living area offers all you will need for in-house entertainment with a Smart TV offering access to Netflix and youtube along with unlimited wifi. Located in the heart of South Yarra, this apartment is just minutes walk away from almost everything. - Tram Stop (1 minute walk) - South Yarra train station (5 minute walk)  - CBD (7 minutes by train)  - CBD (15 minutes by car) - Supermarket (5 minute walk) - Chapel St (1 minute walk) Secure car park is available for an extra $15 per night.
host_about:
Welcome to Luxuria Property Group! 

Luxuria Property Group provides designer short-term accommodation around Melbourne.

All Luxuria properties are fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, toiletries, complimentary Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Live like a local in a little bit of luxury with the help of a Local Information Book, unique to each property to provide you with the insiders guide to the best local haunts for great coffee, food, wine, shopping and activities.

We want to help make your next trip perfect, if there is anything we can do to help please don't hesitate to contact us!

name: Available tonight en suite room
summary: Same day and late in the afternoon bookings are allowed. Great house. Large Bedroom with private ensuite bathroom with bath and shower and toilet. All the essentials that you would require, including a fully equipped kitchen and two separate lounge areas.
space: It's a great relaxing place to unwind from a long flight or if you are passing through and want get a good nights sleep and freshen up before you head into the city of Melbourne.  A great place to stay. Close to Melbourne International Airport and M31 Hume Freeway. The Lodge is located in a quite street and the end of the street backs onto  Craigieburn golf course. Street parking avialable.
host_about:
We hope you enjoy Melbourne and your stay at our Airbnb. I am a friendly, creative person who respects all cultures. I love art, travel,  watching Netflix and trying new things. Airbnb is a great  way to meet people from around the world.

I love Australia and all it has to offer. My motto is treat others as you would want to be treated.

name: Near train station, great suburb, 12KM to CBD
summary: Want a convenient place but avoid overcautious with the owner? This place could suit you: 1. Quiet but 50 meters to Mont Albert Train Station, supermarket and restaurants.  2. 25 minutes to the city. 3. Close to top schools, colleges and universities. This spacious share room (14M2) has very high ceiling with 2 bunk beds, free wifi is provided.
space: Convenient! Convenient!! Convenient!!! Train Station, supermarket and restaurants are all around the corner.
host_about: I personally like travelling and sport. I am keen to meet people from around the world. I wish your stay at my place is a happy one.

name: The heart of Melbourne stunning city apartment
summary: My apartment is cosy and comfortable yet very modern with up to date styling and appliances. Only metres away from public transport and the famous Lygon street or 5 minute walk into the the heart of Melbourne's CBD.  Finish your day with a glass of wine or champagne on the terrace with beautiful unobstructed city views.
space: My space is unique because of its massive private terrace with city views, its close proximity to the city and the charm of walking through the side streets showcasing Carlton's stunning heritage listed townhouses and  Iconic buildings,  The Royal Exhibition building, Melbourne Museum ,The Imax cinemas, the tranquility of the beautiful Carlton gardens. The Vic market  and Melbourne's famous Lygon Street's Dining, Nova Cinemas ,Clothing stores and supermarket are all steps away. SO COME AND STAY!  Carlton Gardens, IMAX and Melbourne Museum right at the end of the street.
host_about: I just love Melbourne city and never tire of exploring it. I have put some pics of some of favourite places which are virtually on my doorstep and there is still so much (Website hidden by Airbnb) wonder Melbourne has been voted the most liveable city 7 years in a row! Enjoy your stay!

Great spot to spot fire works during New Year eve. one block away from popular Queen Victoria Market where you can find all fresh VG, fruits, meats, seafoods, coffee, souvenirs, etc. Flagstaff Station, two tram stops & a bus stop just at door step. within free tram zone. Lots of Restaurants and cafes nearby.
space: Plenty of Light! clean and fresh
host_about:
Friendly, love food, hiking, traveling and photography. Amazed by awesomeness of the nature.

Working Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm

Provide pick up from airport and drop off at airport for $40each way out side working hour

We chat rt28484
Line Robbdt

name: Best of Melbourne Stylish Private Master bedroom
summary: Beautifully renovated Victorian Cottage in one of the best areas of Melbourne. This is a two bedroom house, with modern bathroom and open plan kitchen and large living area opening into a private courtyard with outdoor sitting area and a spa. The bathroom is shared. Kitchen is fully equipped and you are welcome to use anything. Tea and Coffee in the morning included. Dishwasher coffee machine and of course the fridge is available for common use. The living room has a large couch and TV.
space: Spacious Master Bedroom furnished with high quality furniture, Queen size bed. Built in wardrobes with lots of storage space and lots of drawers, polished floors throughout, including air-conditioning in the room. Lots of light and plenty of space, very private. Door locks in from inside the room for extra security.
host_about: I am a proud Melbournian currently moved back to this amazing city, after almost 10 years living abroad. Happy to welcome you to my wonderful city and give you tips on where to go for great food, drinks and of course shopping.

name: Light-filled 2 bedroom Brunswick townhouse
summary: Amazing heating, free street parking, free cable wifi, Netflix. 4 minutes walk from the Lygon St tram, you’ll be in the CBD within half an hour. 2 storey townhouse, with 2 large bedrooms & spacious bathroom (full bath) upstairs. Lounge, kitchen, dining downstairs, with fully equipped kitchen (full fridge, dishwasher, gas stove/oven), 2nd toilet, European laundry with front loading washer.  Sleeps 5 upstairs & 3 downstairs (single daybed & sofabeds - see floorplan).
space: There is a lot of space in the house.  The 2 main bedrooms on the first floor are huge. One has a queen bed and a full size desk with large computer monitor and HDMI cable. The other has a queen and a single. All linen is provided and the bathroom in between is well stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, moisturiser, and hand wash. There is also a hair dryer for your use. On the ground floor, the front room is set up as a sitting & dining room with a single day bed (full size single bed). The back room is the heart of the house, containing the kitchen and lounge. There's a 3-seater sofa that converts into a double bed, TV with free Netflix, and Apple TV is connected and available if you have an account. There is a powder room on the ground floor, with an extra toilet and wash basin, and a European laundry with front loading washing machine and plenty of clothes drying racks should you need. Outside there's also a clothes line for quick drying in good weather. Get to live like a
host_about:
I'm a long time traveller, first time hoster!

I want to provide you with a taste of Brunswick living, by setting up my house to be as comfortable as possible so that you can return home after a big day of exploring, eating and drinking, and relax in the comfort of your 2 storey Brunswick townhouse.

It is my house, however I'll be staying with friends and family when it is booked, so you can rest assured that any issues during your stay will be taken care of but I'll not be in your space.

The whole house is yours to use, and there'll be plenty of space to store your belongings. I have a few cupboards and drawers containing my personal belongings locked, and anything that isn't locked (most of them!) is yours to use.

I love living in Brunswick, and will be updating my listing shortly with my favourite things to do and see, and places to eat and drink.

name: Position Perfect - City Views
summary: City Views is a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment with a lovely balcony providing  city views. It is clean, modern and fresh. All our linen and towels are professionally cleaned.  We are available to answer any questions!
space: CITY VIEWS is a two bedroom and two bathroom apartment situated on the 1st floor at the rear of the complex. It has a king bed upstairs in the main bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and two long single beds in the second bedroom downstairs. You will also have the option to have four long singles or two king beds for a small fee. A second bathroom runs off the living area. This apartment has a small living area, but it does have a nice balcony leading off the main bedroom upstairs with great views of the city. We recommend City Views apartment for four- five guests comfortably. The fifth guest will sleep on a single fold out sofa in the living room. This apartment has external and internal stairs. It has split system heating/cooling upstairs in the main bedroom and another one downstairs in the living room. We manage 7 other apartments in this building. This makes it great if you need to book with other friends and family who each want their own space. ABOUT US At Position Perfect, we a
host_about: Position Perfect is a family owned business. We are two couples, with two children each. We love the freedom this venture gives us and we enjoy getting involved as a team.  We take pride in the accommodation we provide for our guests and take the time to renovate and decorate to suit the area.
