host_about:
After a decade in Asia, I am proud to call Melbourne home again.

My perfect weekend in Melbourne would start only after 9am on Saturday. Being in Abbotsford, I am blessed with a short crawl the to Allpress Expresso for my dosage of coffee. 

Armed with my travelling latte, I would venture down Smith Street. Popping to Happy Valley Book store to check out the latest edition of Monocle or one of countless trendy lifestyle editorials.. 

Lunch would usually be a takeaway roast chicken sandwich from Alimentari. I can never find an empty table here. Their Italian Pronto is easily the best in town.

host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

host_about:
I love travelling. I have travelled extensively around the world(India, China, Thailand, Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Brazil are a few to name) and also lived in many different cities around the globe. 

While travelling, I always felt that there is dearth of affordable home-like places to stay. So, when I returned back to Melbourne, I decided to bridge the gap. All my apartments are furnished with standard size fridge, washing machine, dryer, microwaves, kitchen and kitchenette etc. to give you a home-like feeling. 
This is my small business which I  run more  from heart than mind. You don't have to look at the watch before contacting me. I will try my best to make sure that you have a  great stay in one of my apartment.

Hi There

name: Eporo Green -Stunning Light-Flooded 2 Bdrm Apt
summary: This amazing privately owned 2-bedroom cornerl apartment will make you not want to leave. With the rich decor and comfortable clean lines in the living spaces, you’ll be able to relax, enjoy and entertain with views up La Trobe street and Elizabeth street. The location is absolutely perfect. You are opposite Melbourne Central with free transport to any part of the CBD.
space: Living Space The lounge has a great partially open concept with a modern, luxurious design. You will fall in love with the floor to ceiling windows We really wanted you to have a comfortable space so used various accents of woods and deep, rich colours to create your lounge. The lounge has a 50” Smart HDTV with Netflix and a great Harmon Kardon sound system that can been seen and heard from the dinning room and kitchen.  Sleeping Space Both bedrooms are a comfortable size with heaps of storage space and views galore.  The larger bedroom features a great walnut desk with views of some of Melbourne’s famous landmarks. We have styled the bedroom with rich textures of white and charcoal for a relaxing nights rest. The second bedroom has soft muted colours to relax you after a full day of shopping. Eating Space Open to the lounge is a dining room that can seat 4-5 people comfortably. You will surely have a great backdrop for a nice dinner in for a romantic evening with all the views. The ki
host_about:
LittleStay is a boutique short stay company specialising in homemade hospitality. We are passionate about traveling, exploring, and sharing. Bitten by the travel bug when we were young, we love to jump on a plane and explore the world. Spending our days and nights away from home with new friends, exchanging our experiences, and building new unforgettable memories. LittleStay is here to help create those memories. 

That's the idyllic part, but in our real life we all have bills, mortgages and obligations that we wish we could leave at home and don't have to travel with.

Consequentially LittleStay was born to help with that dream, a company that allow people like us and others to travel, live, experience or start a new life without the everyday struggle of life back “home”.

LittleStay wants you to feel comfortable entrusting us with your largest asset. We will consider your home our home while we manage it. It is our reputation on the line if something is amiss. We do not take that lightly.  LittleStay wants you to be a part of our LittleFamily. We value your partnership and thusly, if you are holidaying and want to stay at one of our properties, you’ll receive insider rates. You can even reserve your own property for your family and friends that are visiting. 

We take care of virtually everything. Our level of cleaning is second to none. Our customer service is beyond compare. Our commitment to you, the owner, our guest, our community is unquestionable. 

We believe a happy home is a filled home so if you have a property that is not happy, please contact us to see how we can help you. 

Or if you're one of our amazing guests helping us, please let us know how we can make your stay more enjoyable. 

Warmest Regards
The LittleStay Team

name: Room w/Ensuite + Living/Kitchen
summary: My lovely cathedral ceiling timber lined loft bedroom is situated in leafy Kensington Banks with all the charm of a small village, just 4km from Melbourne CBD.
space: This light and airey loft bedroom is set up in the treetops on the top floor of a 3 level townhouse. The first thing you'll notice is the spacious feeling which is complemented further by the high, timber lined cathedral ceilings. There are two windows which let the light flood in from both directions with one window looking over the historic and tree lined stock route. There is a newly renovated private en-suite on this level. The bed is a comfortable timber framed queen size with all bedding included. The room is also air-conditioned/heated. In Melbourne you may need both in the same day!
host_about:
I'm a 33 year old, who after quite some time travelling thoughout Europe, India & Asia have put down roots in my home city of Melbourne. I'm open minded and love to meet new people from different places/cultures.

When I travel, I like staying with locals as you get a better insight into all the hidden gems and nooks and crannies that may not be immediately obvious to a newly arrived traveller. 

How you choose to experience your time staying at my place is completely up to you. I'm happy to just give you some tips and leave you to do your own thing, or be more involved. It's your trip, so it's completely up to you!

Both rooms have stunning skyline views of the area and have amazingly comfortable beds and the finest quality linen.  The apartment has state-of-the-art European laundry and kitchen appliances,  security entrance, smoke and CO2 detectors, entertainment system and home automating lighting. summary: Welcome to our lovely home! There are two large bedrooms, a bright and light kitchen/living area, dining room and sun room. And a beautiful deck area complete with hammock under two shady oak trees with a large garden. Close to the walking and bike paths of Merri Creek, as well as the cafes and bars of High Street.
space: Welcome to our lovely free-standing California bungalow situated in the heart of Thornbury. There are two large bedrooms towards the front of the house, the master with a queen-size bed and armchairs looking out over the magnolia tree in the front yard. The second room is our little boy's bedroom at the moment and there is a cot available for your use if needed (and a high chair and pram) as well as all those other kid-related things such as toys and games that you might need! If you don't have kids, we have an air mattress to accommodate extra 'big' people. Both rooms have split systems in them so air con and heating is available at the flick of a switch. A bright and light-filled open kitchen and living room provide a great place to relax. All crockery and cookware are available, as well as dishwasher and coffee machine. A fully stocked pantry is free to use as well. There is also a washing machine and iron in the laundry. The spacious living room includes a couch and tv with Foxtel,
host_about: Jane, myself and our little fella live in a wonderful home in Thornbury, Melbourne. I'm a primary school teacher and Jane a town planner and when not working, we try and head off overseas a couple of times a year to explore the world...

name: Designer NY Style Loft with Pool + Gym
summary: Modern NY style duplex loft apartment located within one of Melbourne’s beautiful heritage buildings, moments away from the CBD, Queen Victoria Market, Lygon Street, Carlton Gardens and many more that Melbourne has to offer!! Bright and spacious living area with high ceilings, fully-equipped kitchen, washer, upper level with cosy mezzanine bedroom. Full use of the facilities including indoor pool, spa, sauna and fully equipped gym.
space: Our beautiful duplex space comes well equipped with: Living area: - Light filled open plan living area with an open mezzanine bedroon - 46" flat screen tv - Fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, oven and microwave - Euro style laundry with washer Bedroom:  - Main bedroom with Queen-sized bed, all linens provided - Built in robes with hangers Bathroom - Walk-in shower - Towels
host_about:
I moved to Melbourne six years ago from London and absolutely fell in love with the place (and of course my now husband!).   Travelling, eating and drinking are definitely my passions. 

I love to explore and find new places.

name: Light filled apartment and garden.
summary: Light filled, comfortable, 1 br apartment, 7 km from Melbourne CBD, 1 km from the unique bars and cafes of Northcote High St. It has a large landscaped garden with a deck. Well serviced by both train and tram, you can be in the city in 15 minutes!
space: My small, cosy apartment is on the second floor at the end of the L shaped block, and has north facing windows which catch the natural light. There is cross ventilation and a beautiful, large garden with a deck out the back which guests can use. There is a modern ensuite bathroom and comfortable lounge and a queen sized bed for a comfortable night's sleep.
host_about: I work for the local government sector in the environment field, engaging the community in the restoration of landscapes using indigenous plants. I'm a keen cyclist and musician and enjoy the live music scene in Melbourne. I also play touch football, do yoga and several other outdoor pursuits.

name: Family resort style home with pool
summary: Newly renovated luxury double storey 4 bedroom family home with outdoor deck and plunge pool/spa. Brand new kitchen, appliances, bathrooms. Located in beautiful green suburb near to parks, St Kilda beach with tram stop 2 min away to city and shops.
space: This is our family home that we are renting out for 3 weeks over the summer/christmas/new year holiday period while we are away.  Our beautiful art-deco home has been extended and tastefully renovated  earlier this year. Downstairs comprises of a wonderful bright open plan kitchen and living area with recycled timber floors, floor to ceiling glass windows and sliding doors overlooking decking, garden and plunge pool/spa. Enjoy family meals at the dining room table or laze the afternoon on the huge comfy couch. A fully zoned sonos sound system, operable off a smartphone, allows you to listen to music inside and out. The master bedroom is at the front of the house equipped with pillow top queen size bed, walk in robes and modern, luxurious ensuite.  There is also a separate lounge and tv area, powder room and spare bedroom with double bed/couch and a laundry.  Upstairs the kids will love the playroom with a tv and full of books, toys and puzzles. There are 2 bedrooms, one with king size
host_about:
I'm 35 years old, living with my husband, Marty, 4 and a half  year old daughter,Ruby and 2 year old son, Ness..  I work as a physiotherapist and pilates instructor. I enjoy bike riding, gardening, travelling, reading, drinking good coffee, good music and just hanging with friends in the sunshine.  We have travelled the world extensively, but now enjoy being home in our beautiful house. We enjoy going camping, to festivals and making the most of what melbourne has to offer.

As hosts we enjoy meeting new people and bringing the travel world to our home.

name: Gem Apartments Luxury 3 bed 2 bath
summary: Unknown
space: Welcome to Melbourne Luxury Collection, presented by Gem Apartments This spacious apartment on the 20th floor has fantastic city views , large bedrooms, gourmet kitchen and spacious lounge and dining areas. BEDROOMS / BATHROOMS The main bedroom has a King bed, walk through robe and ensuite.  The second bedroom has a Queen bed, and the third bedroom has twin single beds. The family bathroom (with bath) and eurolaundry is located near bedrooms 2 and 3. KITCHEN This is a residential size kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook dinner for six people, including full size fridge, oven, stove top and microwave.  THE BUILDING Freshwater Place is one of Melbournes most exclusive buildings due it’s six star facilities and unbeatable location right on the Yarra River next to Crown Casino. This apartment has access to the facilities on the tenth floor.  The facilities on the 10th floor include well equipped gymnasium, swimming pool, spa, sauna, steam room and common areas to relax and ta
host_about:
My name is Kellie and I started Gem Apartments with one fantastic apartment in 2009. We have since grown to manage a network of 25 apartments around Southbank. 

Gem Apartments successfully straddles the traditional serviced apartment market / and individual holiday market by keeping strict control over all of our apartments. 

Our apartments are all furnished and fitted out by Gem Apartments to the same standard, and have the same inclusions. 

I work full time in the business out of an office on Whiteman Street, and am available for our guests each day. 

I oversee each apartment on a daily basis to ensure that each apartment is kept to the standard of Gem Apartments. Value Executive Accommodation with all the touches of home. 

Our business is structured to offer our guests all the benefits of individually owned and operated holiday apartments, but with the staff and professionalism behind it to offer our guests peace of mind if something does go wrong.

name: Newly renovated, spacious studio, handy location
summary: We are delighted to offer you our newly renovated apartment, a great base from which to explore the Yarra Valley Wine Region. Just minutes away are Healesville town, Healesville Sanctuary, TarraWarra Gallery, Four Pillars Distillery, Yarra Valley Railway and too many wineries to mention!
space: Drive along our quiet, tree-lined grove, say hi to the kangaroos and park up in a private garage. From the garage you enter the self contained apartment. The studio includes: *Queen size bed with quality memory foam mattress *Kitchenette with fridge, small electric stove, kettle, toaster and utensils *Partial open bathroom (enclosed shower and toilet) with claw-foot bath *Balcony with seating overlooking the garden *Comfy indoor seating area with TV *DIY breakfast provided, including milk, bread, eggs, cereal, tea and coffee *Iron and table-top ironing board *Clothes rail with hangers *Aircon and heating *Wifi is provided, but please be aware that in the country the connection can still be a little unreliable! *Indoor Parking in the garage with convenient access to the property
host_about:
Inspired by our love of wine and wildlife we recently set up home in Healesville, Yarra Valley. Having travelled all over the world to many stunning destinations, we think this is one of the most beautiful, peaceful and fun spots you can find: to have amazing views, gorgeous nature walks, hatted restaurants, award-winning wineries, Melbourne-worthy coffee AND distilleries on your doorstep is pretty awesome!

A warm, friendly, conscientious couple, Chris and I moved to Australia from the UK five years ago and have spent the last year searching for our perfect family home. We are delighted to be able to offer the self-contained apartment on our acre property for others to use as a base from which to enjoy all the treats the Yarra Valley Wine Region has to offer.

Should you have any questions, or require further information about the accomodation or the area, please don't hesitate to contact us.

name: Melbourne CBD 2 Bed Room  4+2persons.
summary: Address: 33 Rose Lane, Melbourne. Central city CBD location. Up to 6 guests suitable. Free Tram Zone area. Brand new apartment with modern furniture. Kitchen and laundry available. To see Melbourne at your feet. Security access. so close to Coles supermarket.  - 3 minutes walking to Southern Cross Station,  - 15 minutes walking to Yarra river,  - 20 minutes walking to Crown casino
space: About the apartment:  Come stay and enjoy this brand new two bedrooms,  one bathrooms apartment in CBD of Melbourne. The apartment has everything to make your staying comfy, include free tram zone.
host_about: I am working in Melbourne, my favourite city, I'd like to visit every corner of this amazing city, meanwhile, we like traveling, to visit different places with my camera to record different cultures.

name: The M22  2 Bedroom apt in  CBD skybus free tram
summary: The M22 apt is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom 60 sqm brand new apt. Located in front of Southern Cross station. 2 min walk to skybus terminal -24 hours access to airport .1 min walk to CBD free tram, restaurants, Cafe, supermarket. Suit for 4 guests - max. 6 guests if you are on budget. Features 2 large bedrooms with built in wardrobes . Each room comes with queen size bed . Double sofa bed in living room can sleep 2 adults. * If you want more space and privacy - Please book for 4 guests !
space: The Amora is a newly established 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in the heart of Melbourne CBD. The size is approx. 60sqm with balcony! 2 min walk to skybus terminal , southern cross station, spencer outlet , coles supermarket , cafe and restaurants. Free tram / train station / skybus terminal - 2 min walk  Supermarket / Asian grocery - 2-3 min walk there are famous Cafe / restaurants downstairs  Spencer outlet is right opposite of the building In room facilities: Aircon/ heater 32" LED TV free wireless internet  3 seater sofa bed can sleep 2 adults- ( we will only set up sofa bed if you have more than 5 guests or there is $10 surcharge ) coffee table Fully equipped kitchen with 4 burners rangehood oven and dish washer  kettle / toaster/ microwave/ cutting board/ can opener/ knife set /tea bags/ coffee / salt and pepper /sugar Wine glasses/ mugs / plates and cutlery sets Frying pan/ cooking pots/ spatulas/ kitchen towel and detergent  Large fridge with freezer Dining table for 4 people
host_about:
~ Melbourne sky Apartments~
Dear guests:

We are Eden Charmmy and Cony. We are professional management team . 

All our apartments are unique, therefore we do not offer early check in or late check out  as my apartments are unique, we cannot just put guests in a random available room. 

My team members can speak English Korean Indonesian and Chinese . Pls feel free to contact us anytime. Thank you 
我們可以講中文 
Our working hour is from 10AM TO 10PM. 
We always answer your question within 2 hours during our business hours. 

Important information:

* We provide car park for $15 per 24 hours  ( Multi-entry) . The car park is provided by third party, you will be given an allocated car park number a day before you arrive. 

* There are few car rental companies nearby. You can search car rentals in Southern cross station to save the parking fee if you only need car for few hours.

* We are airbnb not hotel. ( Means you are staying in host's house not a hotel).
Therefore, we do not provide daily cleaning service. Additional cleaning service can be provided at extra cost. 


* Please take your personal belongings with you when you check out. We are not responsible for any lost or damage to your personal belongings.

name: 2BR renovated Unit close to Station Dandenong Mt
summary: This lovely unit locates 1km from train station and shopping center with bus stop on the door step.   This unit being one of only two units in the block and next to school grass ground, was just recently renovated.  A new kitchen, bathroom, air conditioner, Telstra Wifi... all will support you towards a wonderful stay and around. Two spacious bedrooms are all equipped with queen size beds.   Parking are in the car space in the front yard.  There are enough room for 3 cars.
space: This unit being one of only two units in the block and next to school grass ground, was just recently renovated. It has new kitchen and bathroom, a breakfast bar bench to enjoy your breakfast, a modern dining table to enjoy your meal, a comfortable sofa and TV set to enjoy your time.   A new installed air conditioner will ensure a comfortable temperature and a Telstra wifi to help with your spare time surfing.
host_about: Unknown

name: BellView
summary: Dont stay in Hotel if u want to enjoy privacy and security. Centrally located between CBD and Melbourne Airport. Newly constructed warm and cozy furnished apartment with excellent view from balcony. Essential amenities, local market, busy High Street full of restaurants for your delights. AlDI and Woolworth close by. Adjacent to Bell Station for metro trains, and of course Trams are not far off. Ideal for business professionals, family and friends who endures adventure and exploration.
space: Place for complete privacy and secured living.Away from crowded city area but still reachable by train,tram and taxi.  Excellent balcony view.  Train takes 19 minutes and taxi 15 minutes in normal circumstances. Bell station just 2 minutes away. Metro train available every 15 minutes.
host_about: friendly and supportive,  care about you

name: Stunning, sun filled, Art Deco apartment St.Kilda.
summary: Stunning, sun filled Art Deco apartment in the heart of East St.Kilda  Huge windows, views into the canopy of trees surrounding the whole apartment. Spacious, sunny bedrooms. Breakfast with the sun streaming into the kitchen, filtered by the giant fig tree. Watch the sunset stream through the window and dance on the walls!  Only 23 minutes from the city centre. 10 minutes to the very vibrant St. Kilda Beach, 10 mins to Carslile St. and gorgeous Alma rd park right outside your door! PERFECT!
space: Too good to be true! Open plan, spacious, sun filled, light and airy apartment! Everything you need! The lounge room has huge windows that look out through the tree tops of a gorgeous 200 hundred year old ghost gum! It's an open airy and extremely relaxing environment! Art, culture and creativity are central to our lifestyle and is reflected in our environment with an eclectic mix of vintage and modern. Fabulous found art and original artists works hang on our walls. Or put your feet up kick back and enjoy a good read from artist monographs to the strange and curious, or if you prefer romantic journeys and adventures. Isabelle Alende, Frida Kahlo are always a great read! From the classics to science fiction theres something there for you to read.  Or watch your fav tv series on the 40 inch HD T.V. with unlimited access to Netflix or Stan.  The Kitchen has everything! Fantastic eating area. Brand new cooking facilities! All appliances you need to blend, cook and create your perfect meal
host_about: I am friendly and love good conversation and good food. I am a working photographer and involved in the theatre and the arts. I love cooking and I am told I am very good at it though I don't always have the time. I love gardening and repurposing furniture often for a photographic session I might be working on. I live with my daughter who is currently studying and working full time so she is often in and out. There is of course one very small dog Baci, Shitzu cross Maltese, she is 14 years old but you would never know it!. You are likely to become her next best friend! I work from home and can be in and out quite a bit. I am very helpful and a generous person and when not working I am very happy to have a chat and assist you however I can. I know personal space is also very important so feel comfortable knowing you are your own person! I know Melbourne well especially anything to do with the arts and great eating places! I love walking and we're lucky to have Caulfield Park within a 10 min Walk. The beaches are also a mere 10 mins away and the city centre 25 mins via train. There is very easy access to everything from my place and at least 5 Public transport routes to every where! I like a relaxed environment and enjoy the company of great friends!

name: Comfortable One Bed apartment-High floor city view
summary: Location, location, location.  Located in the heart of Melbourne city, this one bedroom apartment is walking distance to all the city has to offer, 3 mins walk to Southern Cross Station, free tram, shopping, supermarket, restaurant and cafe
space: Brand new 1 bedroom apartment is only 3 minutes’ walk from Southern Cross Station. There are free tram stops nearby as well as supermarket. Guests have access to an indoor heated pool, a fitness centre and unlimited free wifi. The whole apartment internal build-in 45 sqm plus 5sqm balconies. - In total 50sqm for this spacious apartment.  This self-contained one bedroom apartment has a kitchen with a microwave and full size refrigerator. Laundry facilities and air-conditioning facilities are included. There is a queen-sized bed in bedroom  Parking is not available at this apartment.  But guests don't really need a car - the tram is right there, train nearby and most things in Melbourne can be walked to in 5 minutes from this great location - central but quiet!! Airport transfer is very easy, Take airport shuttle bus (Skybus) from the airport to Southern Cross Train Station then walk 3 minutes’ to the apartment. Apartment address is Rose Lane, Melbourne
host_about:
Hello, I'm Bill 

Airbnb gives me a flexible schedule to spend time with my family. I'm an easy going person. I will do my best to make your stay as pleasant and easy as possible. I hope you enjoy our place.

name: Xmas Rental 5 Bedroom Seaside Resort in Brighton
summary: Large luxury resort style property in heart on Melbourne's seaside Brighton. Less than 5 minutes walk to Church Street shopping and trains and 5 minutes to Brighton's famous Dendy Beach.  No need for a car.  Very light and bright, 5 bedroom home, with 3 main living areas, 3 bathrooms, electric gates and security entry via front garden.  Huge level lawn with trampoline for all summer games, all adjacent to security fenced solar heated pool.  Heston Blumenthal BBQ, new 900mm oven, just move in.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Live like a local Richmond balcony, plants and art
summary: Stylish, modern, comfortable. Full of plant life, artwork and natural sunlight. You will enjoy the beautiful view and watching the sunset from the balcony while relaxing in the hanging chair.  Two bedrooms both with built in robes and one modern bathroom. One bedroom with has a queen bed and the other with comfortable queen sized portable bed.
space: So close to everything, 2 minutes to the train station, 5 minute walk to Victoria street full of delicious restaurants and convenience of woolworths. 10 minutes to Bridge road and 15 minute walk to Swan street, AAMI Park and MCG. Comfortable air conditioning/ heating, large LCD flat screen tv, Netflix and Wifi
host_about: We are from Australia- Queensland. We love travelling and staying in air bnb’s around the world.

name: Private room - Cherry Lake - Beach
summary: Comfortable queen bed in a fresh room with desk and chair. Located in a quiet neighbourhood that backs onto wetlands and short walk to the beach. Easy access to the the Freeway and 10min walk from train station.

With stunning floor to ceiling windows guests will have a spectacular view of Melbourne city skyline. Perfect for travel-weary guests and short-stay tenants alike. Essentials for a comfortable shower (shampoo/ conditioner/shower gel/ hand wash) 2. Hair dryer 3. One bath Towel per guest 4. One hand Towel 5. One foot mat This NEAR NEW hig
host_about:
We are a professional Short Stay Accommodation Management company. We aim to provide our guests with a comfortable, convenient and inspiring home in to stay in Melbourne while they are away from their own home. We strive towards delivering excellent customer service and bringing quality apartments to all our guests.

Welcome all feedback and want to you to help us help you enjoy your stay in Melbourne.

name: Above-shop space with vintage charm
summary: This charming space is located above our vintage menswear store right on Brunswick Street. Cosy kingsize bed with an optional daybed for an extra guest. Close to cool eateries, shops and trams, our retro, rustic hideaway has kitchenette, large bathroom, laundry facilities, wifi and a breakfast nook on the landing.
space: Laneway access true Melbourne style, this vintage hideaway is a private above-shop space in a Victorian era building nestled between cool Fitzroy eateries and in proximity to lots of vintage shopping. Perfect for a couple. Can also accommodate a third person on a daybed on request for an additional $15. Portacot also available on request.  Off street parking is available on request.  - wifi - toaster, kettle, fridge, microwave, TV, docking station (play music from your phone) - washing machine and tumble dryer  - towels, fresh sheets provided - bodywash, shampoo, laundry liquid provided - iron and hairdryer for your use  - coffee, hot chocolate, black tea and peppermint tea provided (coffee plunger and teapot) - bread, breakfast spreads, fruit n milk (soy n cow) provided - magazines & DVDs - sweets Main bedroom includes: kingsize bed, bedside table, lamp, desk, dressing table with mirror, two-seater couch, coffee table, clothes rack, hangers, TV (with DVD selection), chair, heater and
host_about:
I'm an artist, maker and collector who co-owns the vintage shop Isles of Man (downstairs from our Air BnB) with my partner Daryl, baby son Delroy and shop-dog Mary. We aim to provide a cosy, friendly stay above our shop in one of the most authentic parts of Melbourne. We love art, animals, vintage, vegan foods and community spirit. 
We are collectors of vinyl records, vintage scooters and cacti!

name: Stay somewhere that you can call "HOME", near CBD
summary: Stay somewhere that you can call "HOME" when you travel! Key feature: Gorgeous room with queen bed, Shared Bathroom. Melbourne airport to HOME: Urber/taxi 20mins  4.8km away from Melbourne City CBD, train ride: 10 min. Short walk to a ridiculous array of popular local cafes, restaurants(Asian&Western) &pubs, supermarket, McDonald, KFC, Hungry Jacks.
space: HOME is a beautiful spacious 3 bedroom apartment located in the heart of Kensington, which is only 10 min train ride from the CBD. It has a large communal area, kitchen and an amazing balcony. The kitchen is well equipped with coffee machine, juicer, blender, microwave, oven, toaster and fridge. HOME is also secured with intercom & alarm systems. Free undercover carpark. Free unlimited Wifi. Free fruit plate upon arrival. Free coffee & tea. Fresh towel upon arrival. LGBT friendly !!! Everything is ready and awaiting for your stay :)

space: Unknown

We travel extensively and understand what makes for a great travel experience. We have 4 unique houses on Airbnb both here, and overseas, and alway try to make our guests visits, an wonderful experience to remember.
We welcome you to enjoy our houses as we do.

name: MelbourneCentral/CityView/FreeTramZone/ VO11308
summary: Fully furnished one room apartment in Victoria One.  A brand new building with Italian design style. This one bedroom apartment in the coveted Victoria one building, is all about maximizing space and natural light with intelligent design, setting a new benchmark in inner city living.
space: There's no TV in this apartment at the moment.  A sofa bed is provided in the living room. However, only linens and towels for two people will be provided. We can set up the sofa bed with extra linens and towels for you and the extra costs is $39 per stay. Please let us know beforehand if you will need the sofa bed.
host_about: Unknown

name: Family friendly huge Art Deco flat!
summary: Huge, light-filled and very quiet  2 bedroom Art Deco apartment in highly sought after pocket  bordering Elwood & St Kilda, minutes walk to shops, beach, and gardens. Perfect for families and couples, featuring large lounge, seperate dining, sunroom, large outdoor terrace, master bedroom with queen bed, kids bedroom with bunk bed suitable for age 5-adult and child's bed suitable for age 2-7. Beautifully maintained and with everything you need to be self-sufficient! This is a true home away from home.
space: Our spacious, light-filled art deco apartment is located on the border of St Kilda and Elwood, a five-minute walk in either direction to Acland and Carlisle Streets, seconds from public transport and within easy walking distance of Elwood and St Kilda beaches. Less than two minutes down the street are the stunning St Kilda City Gardens, home to a lake, greenhouse, rose garden, playground, eco-centre, giant chessboard and Japanese garden.  The apartment comprises a wide entry hall, spacious lounge room with adjoining sun-room/study, separate dining and kitchen, and two bedrooms. We use the larger of the two bedrooms for our kids, and the smaller for ourselves. The kids bedroom has a toddler bed suitable for children age 2-7, and a bunk bed suitable for kids age 5-18. It is not a suitable bedroom for adult guests and we cannot accept booking requests for four-five adults. The master bedroom has an extremely comfortable Queen size bed. There’s also a bathroom with generous shower, washer

space: Unknown
host_about:
I’m living in this beautiful country almost 2 years and every day I have an opportunity to learn more about myself, people and different cultures.
Love Melbourne as my hometown. I have amazing friends and lovely family which I miss a lot.
I enjoy  camping, be in touch with the nature, hanging out with friends, dancing, listen and learn to enjoy different world songs.
Every kid and puppy make me feel fascinated.
I wish I had opportunity to travel more and see each part that the world has made.
I invite you to stay with us and would like to say that I’m happy to help you to make your stay a wonderful experience.
Welcome to Melbourne!

name: Perfectly Central CBD 3BR 2BTH - Pool/WiFi/Netflix
summary: Stay here for the perfect balance of everything to see and eat in Melbourne. Leave your doorstep right into the middle of the city. Located literally at Melbourne Central, everything is within walking distance. Melbourne's best highlights are its streets, and our place is your first step for a great visit. This is the most affordable, luxurious, and spacious apartment in the Heart of Melbourne without having to sacrifice privacy.
space: The LIVING ROOM contains a comfortable sofa, a 4-seater dining set, a flat screen TV, coffee table and comfy cushions. We have a quiet balcony with street views. There is a heating and air-conditioning unit in the living room, but please switch it off when not in use, we deeply appreciate it! The BEDROOMS come with clean luxury linens and all seasons quilts to keep you warm throughout the year. Both bedrooms contain a queen sized bed, with high quality mattresses and comfortable bedding. There is sufficient storage space for your belongings and hangers for your clothes. The BATHROOM is stocked with body wash, hand soap, shampoo and conditioner for you and your group. We also provide toilet paper and bath towels. In the bathroom there is also a washing machine and dryer, detergent, an iron and an ironing board. The KITCHEN is fully equipped with basic cooking items, such as pots and pans, kettle, microwave, gas stovetop, oven, toaster, cutlery, dining ware and some basic condiments for
host_about:
Roomerang is an end-to-end short stays team based in Melbourne.

We are avid travellers and know how hard it can be to find comfortable and cosy, yet affordable accommodation. We try to remove all the complications surrounding your stay, so you can focus on other important aspects of your trip. And if you feel we have left anything out, let us know and we would love to help.

Roomerang provides professionally cleaned and well-kept, affordable stays presenting you with a home to return to no matter who you are, where you're from or what you are here for!

name: One bedroom bungalow with bathroom
summary: Our bungalow fits 2 adults plus 1 portacot if required and is perfect for a short stay. Fantastic location with only a 2min walk to Maribyrnong river and tram stop, 5min walk to highpoint shopping centre and 10min drive to Flemington race course.
space: We have a small sized bungalow with a Queen size bed and bathroom. There is a wall that divides the bathroom from the bedroom and a curtain to close for privacy when using the bathroom. This space is suitable for 2 people, ideally a couple.  A portacot will fit if required. There is a brand new wall mounted plasma tv for your enjoyment and a small bar fridge to store your food/drinks. We have recently installed a brand new split system with airconditioning and heating.
host_about: Unknown

Mins from the CBD, NGV, CASINO, BEACH. ROOFTOP SPA and BBQ  (shared space with other residents in the building) with uninterrupted city views. Public transport at your doorstep.

Luxury apartment which has outstanding uninterrupted views of the Melbourne city skyline and botanical gardens/shrine.  Relax on the comfortable outdoor setting which seats 8 and looks directly at the best view in Melbourne. The perfect place to relax with a glass of wine/beer and order up take way from one of the delicious local places.  Full kitchen with everything you need including pots & pans,  champagne & wine glasses, basics like salt, pepper, oil as well as plastic plates, cups and cutlery for younger children.  There are hotel quality shampoo and conditioners in the bathrooms.  The laundry has a washing machine and dryer with laundry liquid, clothes horse, iron and ironing board. There are two high quality queen size beds and a sofa bed. Choice of pillows so you can choose which suits you.  We c
host_about:
Hi my name is Taylor my husband &  I are a couple in our thirties with two kids 4 & 9 and a lovely dog Skyler. We both love travelling. I always dreamed of owning a property and having a few cottages as bed and breakfasts. Now my dream has come true with my business Tailored short stays. 

I am a people person who just loves spoiling my guests. That's what makes Tailored short stays different. I pay attention to the details and believe it's the little extras that make all the difference. 

In my spare time I love relaxing down at our little caravan by the sea. My ideal evening is relaxing in the recliner under the stars with a glass of French Champagne listening to the roar of the ocean with David by my side, our dog Skyler at our feet and our boys tucked up in bed.

name: Private room in a contemporary light filled house
summary: A great room in a contemporary, light filled house in Fitzroy North. Close to cafes, local bars and parks with a 15 min walk to Brunswick Street and a tram ride to the city. Perfect the mature traveller or business person needing a clean, well designed welcoming space.
space: Unknown
host_about:
Hello my name is Bernie short for Bernadette and I live in Melbourne in Fitzroy North. I am a lover of art, food and discovery and founder of Walk to Art a boutique and intimate cultural art tour in Melbourne, New York and Venice. I walk everywhere and am passionate about sharing my insider knowledge.
Whether I am hosting or travelling I am always inclusive, communicative and open to new adventures!

name: Deluxe King bed  room with bath and balcony in CBD
summary: Deluxe and Modern house with Amazing Views.  Enjoy in a comfortable Super King Bed with Private Balcony and Bath.  Your own private and spacious balcony and beautiful views .!
space: You'll enjoy the sunsets from this 28th floor apartment, It's located next to Harbour and Marvel Stadium and just behind Southern Cross station, also  close to sophisticated bars, fine dining, relaxed eateries, shops and free transport.
host_about: I’m a nice close person

name: A Private Rooftop Oasis near the Heart of the CBD
summary: Relax in the cosy living room of this chic apartment. Industrial-style furnishings are set against a backdrop of shiny hardwoods and eclectic accents, including wooden steer horns and photographic art. Soak up the sun on the private rooftop terrace.
space: Unknown
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Holiday studio rent- Melbourne University
summary: Holiday studio rent-private bathroom,bedroom,living room at Melbourne University, close to CBD Adress: 50 Barry St,Carlton -single bedroom studio -walk 3 mins to Tram stop{tram no. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) } -avaliable for one month rent -close to Queen Victoria Market, Melbourne University
space: Unknown
host_about: Hi, I'm JOE. I'm from HONG KONG. And I'm studying in Melbourne now. I'm very friendly and outgoing. I love traveling all around the world.I can speak English and Chinese.

name: Malvern Road Apartment...Free WiFI and Parking
summary: Stylish apartment in a great location.  Comfortable and cosy.  Step outside and enjoy the cafes, antique shops and so much more.... Tram stop right out front on Malvern Road and a short walk to Tooronga Train Station.
space: Unknown
host_about: Nonna, mother friend and colleague.  This apartment is my home, and I just love the location above shops, eateries and much more.  Located on a tram line and close to Tooronga train station.  I hope you enjoy your stay.

name: 舒適寬敞的空間只需帶著隨身行李即可入住,停車方便,大眾運輸工具近在咫尺
summary: 1 living room 1 kitchen & dinningroom  and 2 bed Room   in a quiet Berwick neighborhood. Easy access to Bus and  Berwick train stations only walk 5-10 mins Quiet neighborhood with easy access to M1. Fountain gate shopping center is just less than 15 Mins for drive away. Friendly and helpful host
space: The area you will be staying in is located in front of my home with own access .With ensuite off the main bedroom and bunk bed in the second room.(if you need the fifth bed, in living room,there's sofa bed) Tea and coffee are available in the kitchen area which also has table and chairs . Self catering. Off street parking.
host_about: 喜愛動物,熱愛美食,烹飪和旅行,外向活潑喜歡交朋友

name: Jika Cottage Carlton Experience - inner city
summary: Melbourne is a diverse, multi-cultural city with the best food & coffee in the world (if we do say so ourselves). Experience life like a local at Jika Cottage, all nationalities & cultures welcome. Located in Carlton, just 3 km from the CBD, Jika Cottage is within walking distance to Lygon St (Carlton), Brunswick St, Gertrude St (Fitzroy) & Smith St (Collingwood) so you can sample Melbourne’s best food & drink in the inner suburbs.
space: 5-STAR MATTRESSES Having stayed at hundreds of hotels and Airbnbs it never ceases to amaze us how many provide poor mattresses and bedding. At Jika Cottage you'll sleep on excellent top of the line mattresses more fit for a presidential suite than an Airbnb. You'll feel how comfortable the mattresses are as soon as you lie down and let the fatigue of the day melt away. Each mattress has a plush pillow top giving a luxurious comfort without the mattress feeling too hard or too soft. The 3-zone pocket spring system means you won't feel your partner tossing and turning all night and the double box walls mean you can sleep right up to the edge of the mattress without it caving in or losing comfort, making a queen bed feel more like a king.  5-STAR LINEN AND TOWELS We provide 5-star hotel quality fresh linen and towels. Each guest is given a bath towel and face washer and the beds are made with two fresh sheets and a fresh cover on the quilt. Extra blankets and quilts are provided so you'll
host_about:
My fiancé and I met traveling in Buenos Aires, fell in love and spent two and a half out of the next three years traveling and living together overseas.

I'm Australian, born in Sydney, raised in Tasmania and I've called Melbourne home for the past 10 years.

My fiancé is Brazilian, born and raised in Curitiba until she was 15 before moving to Fortaleza with her family.

We love experiencing new cultures, meeting new people, trying new foods and learning more about ourselves and the world around us.

On our travels, we've stayed in hostels, hotels, Airbnb, friends houses, couches and everything in between. We have a good idea of what makes a place comfortable and enjoyable for a traveler, including for business, and we aim to bring that comfort and enjoyment to our own listings on Airbnb.

name: Healesville homestay
summary: A beautiful home located on one acre (half natural bush ) and open garden with stunning views to YarraValley from great outdoor deck. 3 minute drive to Healesvilles main street, 15 minute walk. Off street parking. Safe play area for children.  Sleeping areas separated with own bathroom. No parties.  Wheel chair access at entrance. Very peaceful and beautiful. Possible flexibility on arrival/departure times depending on other bookings.
space: Open kitchen family area with separate lounge. Small study. Timber decor. Large bathroom with long bath. Stunning views from bedroom and living areas. Large deck for eating and enjoying view. Full menagerie of birds will visit!  Full kitchen amenities with coffee machine. Bathrooms are not attached to bedrooms but right nextdoor.
host_about: Unknown

name: Prahran Perfect - 2 Bed 1BR Private
summary: Fantastic positioned house. Guests will have access to two large bedrooms with Queen Sized Beds with their own bathroom and laundry. This stylish home has two entrances, with guests having their own private entrance area. Access to Trams and Trains.
space: Unknown
host_about: Happy go lucky traveller

name: Modern 2 Bedroom Hideaway in the Heart of the CBD
summary: Welcome to our spacious 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Melbourne's CBD! The beautiful Flinders House, built circa 1860, with its Italian Renaissance Palazzo facade is a very desirable location. Newly renovated, this gorgeous 2 level apartment features a lovely open concept kitchen living/dining area, balcony, modern artwork, designer furnishings & top of the line appliances. You will truly be in the centre of everything - just steps away from the best cafes, restaurants, bars & nightlife.
space: House Overview: - 2 levels - 2 bedrooms - 1 bathroom  - Brand new renovation - Open plan kitchen/dining room/living room Amenities: - Professionally cleaned - Hotel-quality high thread-count bed linen and towels - Designer furniture throughout - 24/7 check-in - Fully-equipped modern kitchen - Green and tranquil balcony - WiFi - Flatscreen smart TV with Netflix - Bose sound system  Living Room: - Fantastic open-plan space - Relaxing living area with comfy furniture - Tons of natural light - Opens to  private balcony Kitchen: - Fully-equipped - Oven and microwave  - Stove - Fridge - Dishwasher Bedrooms: - Bedroom 1: Queen sized bed+ en-suite (also has hallway access for second bedroom) - Bedroom 2: Two Twin beds Bathrooms: - Full bathroom downstairs with two entryways (ensuite and opens to hallway)
host_about: We are a family of 5, with (16, 19 and 21 year old children). We love to travel and enjoy visiting cities throughout the world. We enjoy staying at different types of accommodation when we travel and prefer to stay somewhere close to all amenities.  This is why we love our apartment which is located right in the heart of the city.  You can walk to many superb cafes & restaurants, department stores and tourist spots or jump on the free city circle tram to get around.

name: Light Filled Northcote Gem
summary: A light filled private one bedroom apartment to base yourself for your Melbourne trip. Located in the heart of Northcote (only 20 minutes north of the CBD) our place is only a few minutes walk from High Street, Northcote. Very close to public transport, (a metro station and tram) cafes, restaurants, bars and boutiques.  Great location, with lots to do on your doorstop. You will not be disappointed :)
space: Open plan living, dining and kitchen area with floor to celling windows letting lots of natural light come through. A separate bedroom, bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen.
host_about: Unknown

name: blackburn station旁极具现代感的公寓单间出租
summary: 位于墨尔本东南区blackburn 车站旁的安静公寓,步行五分钟到城轨车站,方便的到达墨尔本的任何区域｡临近box hill商业中心和forest hill商业中心,吃喝玩乐都超级方便｡厨房和洗衣机冰箱等基本设施齐全,可以自己做饭,使用后收拾干净即可｡舒适温馨的房间配有queen size超大双人床和入壁式衣柜｡是来墨尔本的你落脚休息的绝佳地点｡ 5mins walk to blackburn station, convenient for u togo to any place in MEL
space: Unknown
host_about: 在北京暂住的北京人,澳洲留学生.

name: A room or three in the Dandenongs
summary: An unique hills home with touches of modern and mid-century styles. Our home welcomes you to relax, revive in the beautiful public gardens nearby or partake in the great cafes n shops. Lots of brilliant walks or maybe try your hand at some artwork or homemade cocktails.
space: Two queen size bedrooms and a King single room are available upstairs. They're really comfy beds. Plenty of extra quilts and blankets to snuggle up in. Great block out blinds but then how can you shut the blinds on such a pretty view from your window? Lots of birds including kookaburras. George the kookaburra drops by and watches us in the kitchen regularly. An occasional deer wanders through the garden at dawn n dusk.  The kitchen and dining area are large spaces and well equipped. Perhaps you might try a new recipe from the cookbook collection in the bookcase. A Jura coffee machine is easy to use and makes a lovely cappuccino. Cold press juicer available. The bathroom hasn't been renovated yet but you will get to experience the joys and beauty of a mid-century pink bathroom suite! Around the house and gardens we still have some work to do. There's painting the window frames and replanting the garden after we had to bring down some mountain ash gums. We'll schedule any work to be done
host_about:
We, Ron and Suzanne,
Enjoy traveling and exploring new cultures through their people, their sights and their food. 

We also enjoy hosting people in our home and setting it up so they can experience the best our home and area has to offer.

name: Spacious light-filled apartment in Clifton Hill
summary: Our spacious ground-floor apartment is perfectly located in Clifton Hill; close to public transport, cafes/restaurants and parkland.  Recently renovated, the apartment boasts a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking and a dishwasher. There is continuous hot water and split system heating/cooling.  The generous sized bedrooms both have built-in robes and there is a separate study. The apartment has 1 off-street parking space
space: The apartment has been recently renovated and feels light and bright. One bedroom has a queen bed and the other bedroom has 2 single beds. Both bedrooms are spacious and have built-in robes and shelving. The living area has 2 couches (the larger couch can sleep a 5th guest), tv, tv unit and a coffee table. The apartment has unlimited wifi, a separate study area with a desk and an office chair. The bathroom has a shower over the bath and has continuous hot water service. There is a separate toilet and a washing machine.  The kitchen is modern and features gas cooking and stainless steel appliances. There is a 4 seater dining table in the living area. Guests have access to baby/toddler items such as high chair, toys and books. (Ball pit available on request!) Games are also provided (jenga, connect 4, pictionary etc).
host_about: Physiotherapist and researcher living in Melbourne with my young family. I love Melbourne for all it has to offer but also love travelling and seeing new places and experiencing new cultures.

name: "Claremont" - Pearl Apartments
summary: This stylish one bedroom apartment is situated on the 11th floor and is filled with an abundance of natural light.  It faces the lush leafy grounds of historic Melbourne High School and from the balcony, you can take in stunning panoramic city views.
space: Step into this well appointed apartment furnished in a mix of contemporary and classic styles.  Feel at home with a 40" plasma, DVD and iPod docking station.  A fully equipped timber veneer kitchen with stone bench tops and outfitted with Bosch appliances with all cooking utensils and crockery provided. Deluxe bedroom with queen size bed fitted with luxury linen.  It has a sparkling luxury appointed bathroom with a European laundry.   You will also have access to the stunning communal facilities which consist of entertaining deck, lap pool and winter lounge.  Also a gym. If required, parking is available at $25 for 4 nights. For 5 nights and over, parking is $7 per night.  This can be paid in cash on arrival. The car park is off site in Daly St, 3 min walk away.   (This is where I would meet you if you require parking) Wi-fi- I'm happy to provide you with a Telstra mobile connection and leave it up to you to pay for the plan you'd like from the Telstra store just up the road.  There ar
host_about:
25 years in the restaurant industry, a switch to this wonderful life of apartments.  I'm really enjoying looking after you all running between 19 apartments.   You'll love my places, all unique, all stylish and in the right spots for you to explore this wonderful, most livable city in the world- Melbourne.
I'm really well priced with all apartments in prime spots and in great buildings. Happy to help where I can to guide you to all things Melbourne.
Joe Mottola.

name: Room in pretty victorian cottage
summary: Private room in a pretty victorian cottage, close to transport and only 15 minutes to the city center.  Come experience a great location, great food, great people and Melbourne's inner west!
space: Your room in our two bedroom victorian cottage comes furnished with a queen size bed, built in wardrobes, linens, hydronic heating and ceiling fan.  We subscribe to the principle of my home is your home, so you have access to the lounge, dining room and kitchen. Please help yourself to cereal for breakfast.  We ask that you tidy up after yourself and wash and dry any dishs.   We have a great garden, with a deck to sit and drink wine on, a hammock to nap in and a giant jenga set to play with. We believe in talking to people and reading so don't have a television, but do have wifi.  If you really need to watch the latest footy game the pub near us will be showing it.
host_about: My partner David and I have spent many years travelling and know what it is to want a home away from home.  Struggling to control our urge to a) talk to people too much and b) feed them a lot, we are looking forward to sharing some irish/scottish hospitality in our home in Melbourne.

name: CBD 2 bedroom +2 bathroom +free WiFi+ free parking
summary: Fully furnished two bedrooms apartment. State of the art facilities inside and outside enhance a location moments to CBD,  the tram, shopping and Docklands corporate headquarter precinct Two spacious bedrooms both with queen size bed, two bathrooms and open kitchen with Miele equipped stone. Gym and indoor heated swimming pool and free BBQ area deliver an escape from the pressures of everyday living.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Spacious Apartment with Gym, Pool, BBQ & more
summary: Enjoy incredible 12th level views in a modern, spacious & quiet apartment.  Complete with wifi, BBQ, pool, gym & undercover car park, you can take the train to the city, trams to sporting arenas or walk to Chapel St shopping & eateries all in a few mins! A complimentary bottle of wine awaits.
space: This apartment is far bigger that a typical apartment or hotel room, at an affordable price.  Cook up a storm or get take-in and sit out on either of the private balconies to enjoy Melbourne's breath-taking views.  Need to get some work done on your trip?  No problem - the study is fully equipped & ready to go!
host_about:
I grew up in the country overlooking the river which is why I love a room with a view!  City and suburban views may be a little different, but watching the sun come up or a storm roll in while hanging on the balcony is pretty special.  
I'm 30, bubbly and artistic.   I love being close to lots of cafe's and also having the St. Kilda/Port Melbourne beach so close :) It's a must see.
I'm a neat freak so you'll find everything clean and presentable for your stay.

name: Modern 1br place in prime location
summary: Unknown
space: Have the whole place to yourselves! Perfect for a couple or a single traveler who likes to have a comfortable apartment that feels just like home! With a living area, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom and lock up garage, this really is your home away from home! As soon as you walk in you get a warm feeling. I have spent many years renovating it to make the apartment cozy and welcoming. It is clean, modern, and bright and has everything you could think of and need. It is in the perfect location. It is located in a friendly, quiet part of Richmond but only 5 minutes walk to a bundle of restaurants, pubs, bars and shopping. Because it is right in the middle of two main streets, you have the choice of either trendy shopping and cafes on Bridge Road, or bars and pubs on Swan Street. Of course you can always get on a tram or train and go to Melbourne's CBD in a matter of 10 minutes or explore all the other trendy neighborhoods of Melbourne (Oh and it is only 2km from Melbourne's iconic MCG!). Pleas
host_about:
I am from Richmond, Melbourne. I moved here 30 years ago from Budapest and ever since I have been here I have never wanted to move back.
I love to cook, go watch the footy, and especially the tennis when it is on, so it is a bonus that I live so close to the MCG and the Rod Laver Arena. I like to keep fit by going for jogs and riding my bike around Melbourne.
I have two grown up children and now two grandchildren which I love to look after and of course cook for!
I have been working in Southbank (Melbourne CBD) for fourteen years. 
Travelling is my passion. I go for long trips back to Hungary and around Europe as often as I can.

name: Welcoming, private room close to Melbourne CBD
summary: Private room in a beautiful, clean, high-ceiling apartment in Southbank, walking distance to the gorgeous Botanical Gardens, the NGV and the Arts Centre. There are many bars and cafes located by the river, just a few minutes walk from the apartment. Also, the location is perfect if you would like to use public transport, located minutes away from Flinders Street Train Station, trams and bus stops. While you are staying at the apartment you can access the pool and gym facilities.
space: High ceilings apartment with a beautiful balcony view towards the garden and the Art Centre. Having central heating and room heaters we ensure you will be warm and cosy. The space is welcoming and we make sure you feel like home. We are friendly and always enjoy meeting new people.
host_about:
I'm originally from Greece and I currently live in Melbourne, Australia. I love travelling and I'm quite adventurous. I enjoy markets and shopping, hiking, rafting and extreme sports and I love all kinds of animals.
I'm a freelance journalist and I run an online business which means I always need to do some work while travelling and make sure that everything is running well back home. I'm very social and clean, love talking to people and learning about their lives, values and traditions. I speak Greek, Italian, English and a little bit of French and Spanish and I have studied Japanese for 3 years.
Looking forward to memorable experiences and making new friends from all over the world. :)

name: Spacious and Comfortable Home
summary: Beautiful and very comfortable two bedroom home with large open living, dining and kitchen areas. Laundry with top loading washer and kitchen with dishwasher.  8 minute walk from train station and 20 minute car ride from melbourne airport.  Small, tidy garden with fresh herbs and vegetables you can help yourself to.  Very close to a beautiful lake surrounded by parklands.  Quiet neighbourhood but jump in a car and in twenty minutes you’ll be in the heart of Fitzroy on Brunswick street.
space: The entire home is for the guests! Unlimited wifi, washing machine, fridge and dishwasher
host_about: Unknown

name: Spacious comfort stay in CBD
summary: A cosy apartment beside the Melbourne Central (5 minutes walk), it is a huge mall that provides almost everything. There are also plenty of asian markets nearby and a supermarket right beside the apartment. Suitable for couples or friends!
space: Unknown
host_about: Happy, fun and friendly! I am a shy person but I love to meet new people *^_^*

name: Surfnturf Homestay - beach and cafes!
summary: You’ll love my place, it's central, quiet and easy - St Kilda Beach & Pier, Acland St., Sth Melbourne Markets, Spirit of Tasmania, Luna Park, St Kilda weekend markets and the CBD.  Trams are on your door step and then there are the walks along the Esplanade or down to the Pier! Perfect to get away for a few days or even stay awhile!  My place is best for couples, solo and business travelers. Long stays of several weeks to serveral months are accepted.  Please contact me to discuss your stay.
space: Please note the unit currently sits across from “The Block” as the old Gatwick Hotel undergoes renovations as a part of this Australian TV sensation.  During 2018 you may find the shows’ construction and visitors will become a part of your stay and you will need to take this into consideration when booking.   Some may find it an issue, others an up close opportunity to view the stars and contestants!   The unit sits in a quiet central location. SurfnTurf Homestay is an easy and short walk to St. Kilda beach and much more of interest.  Although best for couples, business and solo travellers, there is room for small families or a group. Please message me to discuss your booking. The unit has a mezzanine floor that accommodates an open plan main bedroom and shower/toilet with lots of storage space.  On the lower floor is the open plan kitchen/dining/lounge room.  The sunroom-study has a double futon sofa bed. The unit is sunny and bright. Should you need to use them it is also equiped wit
host_about: Unknown

name: Beautiful Spacious Top Floor 2BR. Sunsets included
summary: Top floor spacious two bedroom apartment. Huge windows, brightly lit throughout the day and stunning sunsets in the evening. Huge fully equip kitchen, separate dining space, lounge room, queen beds in both bedrooms and a north west facing balcony.
space: Top (2nd) floor of the building with big windows through-out that give an amazing sunset in the evening and keep the place bright during the day.  Two bedrooms with queen sized beds, and plenty of closet space, fresh linen.  Bathroom with shower, bath, washing machine, dryer. A separate WC.  Lounge room with  TV, separate dining space. Huge fully equipped house sized kitchen - you'll feel completely at home - Stove/Oven/dishwasher/fridge. Assortment of other appliances.
host_about:
Easy going, clean, respectful, low maintenance. 

Please feel free to ask me anything.

name: Amazing studio in the heart of Melbourne.
summary: This apartment is located at the very heart of Melbourne CBD, in front to Flinders Street Station and Federation Square. Our studio apartment is simply and minimalist. It is ideal for a couple who want to visit Melbourne or people who is travelling for business.
space: This studio is located in the free tram zone. Next to the building you can find supermarkets, cafes and restaurants. Walking you can visit the Yarra river, the Botanic Garden, theatre, casino, libraries, street arts, etc.
host_about: Unknown

name: Room in modern apartment in the inner east
summary: Neat double room in modern two bedroom apartment in leafy Kew. Comfortable open plan living space with sliding glass doors leading onto large balcony, perfect for summer.  Only six Kilometres east of the CBD and only two minutes walking to Kew Junction and the cosmopolitan Kew high street where you can find public transport options, supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and more.
space: Inviting living area and open plan kitchen leads to the guest bedroom with double bed, built in wardrobe, heating and pedestal fans. In the living area, large floor to ceiling windows and sliding glass doors lead onto a huge balcony with outdoor table setting and washing line. Hundreds of fruit bats who sleep in nearby Studley Park can be seen from here when they take off at sun set.  A European laundry with new washing machine and a modern bathroom with towels, and a hair dryer complete this comfortable and clean apartment.
host_about: I love travel, art and being outside.

name: A cozy queen bedroom in Brunswick
summary: A spacious queen size bedroom with lots of space in the room and house. You will enjoy a comfortable bed and a cozy feeling in the house.  The living room is spacious and cozy with all furniture you will need. Plenty of space in closet to store your lovely belongings. The kitchen is large with all appliances: fridge, oven,  pans, cutlery and cooking facilities. There are two separate rooms one for bathroom with a shower and a bathtub and another room where there is a toilet and laundry.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Comfortable Studio Apartment with Wifi
summary: Right in the middle of shopping mecca of Melbourne on Chapel st, this studio apartment has everything to lure someone looking for a break or here for work
space: Its a nice self contained studio apartment. It has a full size fridge, cooking utensils, a washing machine/dryer combo, a queen bed and a balcony. On the top floor there are couple of spas, outdoor decking area, big screen tv etc. for guests to enjoy.
host_about:
I’m living in this beautiful country almost 2 years and every day I have an opportunity to learn more about myself, people and different cultures.
Love Melbourne as my hometown. I have amazing friends and lovely family which I miss a lot.
I enjoy  camping, be in touch with the nature, hanging out with friends, dancing, listen and learn to enjoy different world songs.
Every kid and puppy make me feel fascinated.
I wish I had opportunity to travel more and see each part that the world has made.
I invite you to stay with us and would like to say that I’m happy to help you to make your stay a wonderful experience.
Welcome to Melbourne!

name: Racecourse literally across the road! 2br 1 Car
summary: Bright spacious 2BR apartment right on the doorstep of Flemington racecourse. WIFI, parking, heating, cooling.
space: Guests can experience a luxurious apartment style living with superb finishes just 10min to Melbourne CBD.
host_about: Love cooking, running, playing piano & traveling. Favourite destinations: London, New York, Hong Kong

name: Bouverie Square Apartment
summary: Near CBD (1 mins walk)  Two bedrooms(one bedroom plus one book room ) two double size beds in city Brand new and clean apartment  Please tidy up the apartment before leaving
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Cosy & spacious apartment in perfect location!
summary: The apartment is on the 3rd (and top) floor, in an old style building. safe and secure. It's on a quiet, leafy street near the heart of Hawksburn. 2 minutes walk to Hawksburn train station and 5 minutes walk to tram 72 for transport to the city, and tram 58 to South Melbourne.  Also short walk to a wide range of cafes, restaurants, bars, pubs, nightclubs, shops, cinemas, supermarkets, nail bars, 50m outdoor swimming pool and Prahran market.  My place is good for solo and business travellers.
space: The apartment is light and well ventilated. It has recently been painted and with all new carpets laid throughout and a brand new kitchen giving it a fresh new look & feel.
host_about:
Hi I'm Jo, I'm 33 years old, originally from England but have lived in Australia for over 6 years. I work in Marketing for a big company usually 8.30 - 5.30pm, near the city.

I love Melbourne and everything it has to offer. What an awesome city! I like to make the most of its many spectacular restaurants, shows, sporting events, outdoor pools, bay beaches, coffee and cycle paths! I use my bike regularly because it main mode of transport. If you're new to Melbourne, I'm sure you will love it!

I'm a morning person and I do all my exercise before work so I can be flexible with my evenings to get out and be social or stay home and cook.

name: Fully renovated house, close to Airport & City!
summary: This newly renovated home is located 10 minutes from the airport and 20 minutes from the city. It is in a family friendly residential area close to Keilor Road which is host to cafes, restaurants. Public transport is a 5 minute walk and there is easy access to the freeway. A short trip to Essendon fields business centre & Essendon dfo for shopping. Highpoint shopping centre is also only 10 minutes away. My home is ideal for a family, couples & business travellers.
space: Comfortable newly furnished home is suitable for couples, families & travellers. This house has 3 bedrooms, a master bedroom with queen bed and ensuite, 2nd bedroom with double bed, 3rd bedroom with 2 single beds (all with built in robes). The brand new kitchen has a refrigerator, gas stove, oven, microwave, kettle, toaster & all cooking utensils. The main bathroom and ensuite are also newly renovated. The laundry has a washing machine for guests. The backyard is there for you to relax, have a coffee or host a family barbecue. Thank you for taking the time to read my Airbnb space & happy safe travels.
host_about: I am a mother of 2 children & work within the education system. I enjoy travelling & managing my Airbnb property. Being well travelled I understand the importance of enjoying your holiday.

name: Peaceful Pass Stay Pool&Sauna
summary: (可讲中文)两室两卫,其中带独立卫生间淋浴间主卧出租This brand new Master bedroom, with private toilet/bathroom apartment is within 100 meter away from southern cross station. they are around the supermarket, DFO , restaurant. The airport express Skybus is opposite the street it takes 3 min to walk from the Skybus to the apartment. There’s a king-split bed in the bedroom so that you can choose whether to sleep together with your fellow traveler or you wanna split the bed ( into two king-single size beds).
space: You will be share this 2 bedroom apartment with me. You will stay in the master room with your private toilet. We have a little puppy in the apartment. A bold modern 46 level apartment tower rising high above charismatic Little Lonsdale Street, AUSTRALIS invites residents to enjoy everything that Melbourne's inner city has to offer.
host_about:
Hi, this is Lexie. Welcome to Melbourne-the most liveable city in the world. I love Melbourne, I love meeting different people and that’s why I am becoming a host. 

One of my guests said I must be brave enough to become a host because some people are just hard to satisfy—they paid a little and want to get beyond more. It’s true that being a host is not always an enjoyable experience. 

The essence of Airbnb is to live like a local and to imagine what is the owner of this property like. I’m making my efforts to make your stay comfortable and I’d love to treat you like real friends. BUT Airbnb is NOT a 5-star hotels—PLEASE notice that.

name: CBD area. Only 2 minutes walk to Victoria market.

name: (Hidden by Airbnb) AT COLLINS CLASSIC - 3 BEDROOM
summary: A classic, very large and functional 4 bedroom apartment with two bathrooms and two car spaces located at "The Mark on Collins" building, located at the very heart of Melbourne CBD. This property is located "absolutely" at the very center of Melbourne CBD, with multiple choices for public transportation, tourist spots, shopping, eateries and entertainment all within 200 meter radius. Note: Late check-in fee of AUD50 is required if guest will arrive at the hotel from 9pm onwards.
space: The apartment opens up with a very wide entrance hall & sitting area that is followed by a gourmet kitchen complete with microwave, fridge, electric stove, electric oven and much more. Adjacent to the kitchen is an open plan living/dining area. Central to this kitchen, dinning and master bedroom is a open to sky atrium with a serene & leafy indoor/outdoor sitting area.  The master bedroom offers a stunning en-suite with bath tub, separate shower room, toilet and vanity. Next to it is a spacious second bedroom with built in robes. Near the entrance is the third bedroom. This 3rd bedrooms backs out into a generous fourth bedroom, both with built in robes.  A full second bathroom with shower room, toilet and vanity and laundry facilities are also available. Laundry includes an Euro washer/dryer and ironing board.  The bedrooms are furnished tastefully with king/queen beds that can be split into single beds on request. Four strategically located air conditioners provides heating and coolin
host_about: Unknown

name: Hidden Gem.
summary: A quiet, ground floor bedroom designed for those who appreciate a good sleep in. Soft charcoal carpet, pure white walls - a simple aesthetic creates a calm space.
space: This is my own home. I hope you like it.  I've filled it with art, plants and nice things. I like quality materials and natural things.  Your room is a minimalist Japanese x 90's feel ground floor bedroom, north facing windows onto a foyer filled with plants. East facing bathroom gets nice morning light.  Shared entry to my triple story townhouse, though since your room is on it's own floor, you're extremely private - might as well be a stand alone studio apartment. Relax and listen to your own music on the SONOS sound system. Sleep on a brand new comfortable TEMPUR mattress, under  pure 1000 thread count cotton sheets or when available, beautiful Belgian 100% linen bedsheets, admire the custom one–off CHRISTOPHER BOOTS lighting pieces, all designed to make your stay as comfortable as your own home. The space is perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
host_about:
Hello!

I was born and bred in Melbourne, Australia, a design savvy city, which I guess turned me into a designer. 

I run my own business in designing and building architectural lighting, and have a small team that I manage. Every day we create heirloom quality lighting for a range of clients, mostly abroad. 

Architecture and geography make me tick. Travel is another passion and vice that I undertake as often as possible, usually more for work. Meeting people and sharing culture I believe makes for a global community. 

I eat everything. Love home-cooked, the organic, the considered and the cultured.

I like to be neat and orderly, and also love to have spontaneous times too- the essence of living. Hiking, gym, swimming and nature are part of my oxygen as much a a great urban lifestyle of coffee and books and magazines!

Christopher ;)

name: Melbourne Marvellous Sky High Apartment@Lighthouse
summary: Located in the very heart of Melbourne CBD and within short walking distances to Melbourne Central, QV, The Queen Victoria Market as well as public transport, cafes and restaurants all at your doorstep. This premium executive apartment is located central in the city and having the best view in Melbourne. On the 65th floor of the brand new Lighthouse tower. Wake up in the Melbourne Sky, the best experience you can't imagine. Carpark is available upon request with extra cost $18 - 1 MinsDistance

name: An AMAZING place to call home in Melbourne!

With the city's main attractions such as Royal Park, Melbourne Zoo, Queen Victoria Market, Flemington Racecourse, Melbourne Showgrounds & The University of Melbourne within close reach, you will love its location!
space: Comfortable, spacious , clean and neat for your every need.  There is a 55" LED Smart TV with Netflix and a bluetooth BOSE speaker to play your favorite music from your mobile phone while sipping a cup of coffee. A NESPRESSO machine and capsules are provided with compliments for your enjoyment. Free Local Sim card for overseas guests upon request and Yes, unlimited WiFi access during your stay !
