name: Melbourne 3 BRs Luxury Stay in Exclusive Southbank
summary: Stay in the heart of Melbourne  Melbourne Lux Stay offers accomodation in the exclusive Southbank area, meters away from the Crown Entertainment Complex.  Each of the 3 spacious rooms features stylish modern decor, with complimentary Spectacular unobstructed views throughout the apartment, making this one of the best Melbourne has to offer! Other highlights include LED TV, basic amenities, Kitchen, Washer & Dryer.  Guests are welcomed to take advantage of Gym and Pool facilities on Level 52.
space: Melbourne Lux Stay is conveniently located minutes away walking distance from Crown Entertainment Complex, with many dining options and local attractions nearby.
host_about:
Dear Fellow Airbnb-ers! 

Melbourne is the a renowned for its food, fresh produce, art, culture, authentic  lifestyle, and time and again voted one of the most liveable cities in the world. I love meeting new people and through Airbnb, and have had the opportunity get to know people all over the world. 

I am a keen traveller, love outdoor activities, and adventurous when it comes to food! It would be an absolute pleasure to share my local knowledge and introduce this beautiful city to more people.
 
 Regards,
 Grace

name: Gweld Bryn in the Yarra Valley
summary: A picturesque 10 acre property overlooking the hills on rolling green pastures.  This restored 1930 Californian bungalow has kept the special features that make it unique and one of a kind.  Surrounded by the old dairy, large dam and alpacas create your own memories.  3kms from the Yarra Glen township and in easy reach of all Yarra Valley attractions and activities.
space: Built by the Whites after the First World War for the family with love and detail. The external details and wide verandah provide a sense of wonder in its setting.   Blending of old and new areas gives it identity but an integrated feel.  Special detailing and plastering in the old part plus an updated contemporary bathroom creates a warm inviting space that is your accommodation area.  Separate from the owners end allows you to rest or branch out into the Yarra Valley as you decide.
host_about: As a couple we love to meet people, connect them to the Yarra Valley and enjoy their stay.

We are right next door to popular St Kilda and only 20mins to city.   Watch the sunset from your bedroom window or walk a few minutes to the beach.
space: Your room is private, clean and comfortable with big windows overlooking the trees and loads of cupboard space. There is a very comfortable double bed (everyone says so!), bedside table and separate writing desk and chair with mirror and light. It is beautifully furnished, quiet and spacious with lots of natural light. You can watch the sunset from your room and also see the St Kilda Beach skydivers.
host_about:
Hello! I am a happy, healthy, positive person living and working in Melbourne. I love creating a peaceful and pretty home and enjoying all this city has to offer. 

You can find me down the beach, going to yoga, at bars and cafes and festivals, always up for projects and weekends away. 

I also love to cook, read books and watch Netflix. 

We are looking forward to meeting you and welcoming you to our happy seaside home.

Cheers,

host_about:
Australian guy with an insatiable appetite for travel and all the great things that come with it...learning about cultural differences, discovering music, tasting new dishes (& learning to cook them!), broadening the mind, learning new languages, hours spent on buses, trains & planes to reflect, making new friends...there's so much to love about this lifestyle!

I am fortunate enough to own my own business and have a job that enables me to work and travel at the same (Website hidden by Airbnb) I make the most of it!  I've visited probably around 70-80 countries but still feel as though I have barely touched the surface!  

I relatively recently realised how great AirBnB is as a way of travelling other than staying in hotels and hostels.  Up until now I have had a few wonderful experiences being a guest in somebody's home...and, now, I have my own home which I am looking forward to opening the doors to others!

It's got style, it's got soul, and you can feel the love from the Sinatra's theme...oh you gotta love Frank!   All the extra's of home when you're away. We are always happy to help when needed.

This is availa
host_about:
Hello my name is Helen. Platinum Apartments has been brought to LIFE through the unique collaboration of my husband Heath and I. Our DREAM is to provide apartment style accommodation to the HIGHEST calibre. We have been guided by an uncompromising DESIRE to bring together INTIMATE luxury apartment accommodation that is furnished and serviced to the highest level. 

Beautifully located on the southern BANKS of the YARRA RIVER in Melbourne, PLATINUM APARTMENTS sets the BENCHMARK for LUXURY self-contained apartment accommodation in AUSTRALIA. 

LAVISHLY appointed and offering an IMPECCABLE standard of customer service and attention to detail. Platinum Apartments is a vacation rental that truly UNDERSTANDS the meaning of OPULENCE.

We want our guests to feel WELCOME from the moment they walk through the door.  Our MOTTO is, Enter as strangers, leave as FRIENDS, and for many of our guests, this is exactly what happens. 

Our team strives hard to bring unrivalled PERSONAL touches and QUALITY, ensuring Platinum Apartments is not just an apartment but a HOME AWAY from HOME and an experience you will LOVE. 

All of Platinum Apartments Melbourne luxuriously apartments have SPECTACULAR VIEWS to the city or Port Phillip Bay and feature a TRULY UNIQUE level of comfort and finish. Our inventory also includes PENTHOUSE apartments that overlook the beautiful skyline of Melbourne.

When you are staying in Platinum Apartments you are right in the HEART of Melbourne, close to all the attractions to make your holiday a MEMORABLE one. 

You will find ACTIVITIES and ATTRACTIONS for you and your significant other as well as to suit your entire FAMILY. There will also be many restaurants that will TEMPT your taste buds. So what are YOU waiting for, reserve online today and enjoy a luxurious short stay holiday in beautiful MELBOURNE, Australia.

Our expert TEAM are also HERE to HELP you plan or answer any questions you may have. We are available and on call 24 hours a day for any issues that may arise while you are here. For further information please do not hesitate to CALL us. 

All PHOTOS are TRUE, the apartment booked is the apartment you stay in. The location is the best right in the HEART of the CBD and situated right next door to Melbourne's Crown Casino on SOUTHBANK Promenade.

name: Great Beachfront Apartment in trendy St Kilda
summary: Boasting views of StKilda's Catani Gardens and St Kilda Marina, this renovated 1 bedroom apartment with ultra cool bathroom is perfect for a couple or friends with a comfortable queen size bed. The apartment is only 2 minutes walk to trendy cafe's,bars, restaurants in St Kilda’s Acland/Fitzroy streets and is directly opposite the beach.
space: A classic 1960's apartment building located in a prime position across the road from the beach and St Kilda's Catani Gardens. Apartment is freshly renovated with ultra modern designer bathroom. Stunning views of St Kilda Beach and the Marina. New, clean and modern furniture throughout. The perfect apartment for your stay in Melbourne with easy access to the city and St Kilda's famous attractions, including Luna Park, Bustling Acland Street, Albert Park Lake, St Kilda Beach and the many bars along Fitzroy Street.  Spacious for 2, though possibility to accommodate a 3 rd person with one sleeping on the sofa in the lounge room.  This furnished apartment is ready to go with: BEDROOM - Queen bed (Real Bed)  - Built in Cupboards with hanging and shelf space - Quilt, pillows, sheets, throws & covers BATHROOM  - Shampoo, body wash & hand soap  - Bath, face & hand towels  - Toilet rolls  LIVING AREA  - TV - Coffee table & floor lamp  - Storage/Laundry closet  - Couch pillows & a comfy 3-seater

space: A unique space designed for urban travellers, this apartment has all the basics you need for your stay in Melbourne. Two bedrooms with a queen bed in each room and a sofa bed in the living room make the space convenient for hosting 4-6 people.
host_about:
My family moved to Melbourne around 15 years ago and we feel blessed by every bits and alleys of this gorgeous city.

About me - I am an IT graduate from RMIT University Melbourne and worked in tech company for last few years. Now, I'm running accommodation business with my brother. We are hosting a number of apartments around Melbourne CBD and ensure the rooms are guest-ready all the time.

Aside from working, we love travel and enjoy great coffee, so you bet we can recommend you some of iconic Melbourne brunch places and cafes that definitely make your stay in Melbourne memorable.

name: Resort Living in Melbourne - Orange Room
summary: Relax and unwind in this quiet and peaceful boutique accommodation and feel as if you are on vacation in a tropical location. Unlimited fast internet, Netflix, Foxtel and a library of recorded Foxtel movies and programs provide entertainment. There is also library of books to choose from if you like to read. Sit outside in the covered alfresco watching a movie while having a BBQ with relaxing trickle of water and a light the firepit to keep you warm while watching the sun set or stars.
space: Peaceful boutique room to rent in stylishly and artistically decorated home. High Speed fibre optic internet with WIFI, Foxtel, Netflix, library and fire pits for entertainment. Filtered drinking water for those that are health minded. There is a separate fridge for guests so you don’t have to go shopping every few days. Beautiful tropical landscaped garden to enjoy a relaxing BBQ evening, lunch or breakfast. If you want to cook there is a large kitchen that has everything you would need to create a gourmet meal.  There are 3 separate outdoor seating areas each with a dedicated firepit or fire chimney some under the stars and others under a covered patio. Relax with a glass of wine around a fire pits or lie on the loungers and watch the sunset or stars. Have a movie evening and watch Netflix on your laptop under the stars or read a book on the loungers in the morning with your coffee. Ample street parking with large trees to provide shade in quiet and peaceful street. The home is oppos
host_about: Hi like to garden and combine outdoor activities with exercise. Swimming, running, hiking  and cycling.

name: Amazing Accommodations: SouthYarra5
summary: Right in the middle of shopping mecca of Melbourne on Chapel st, this studio apartment has everything to lure someone looking for a break or here for work
space: It's a really nice apartment building with amazing views from the roof top terrace. The terrace has a spa, a function room and a open air theatre. There are also bike rental and car share available in the building.  The apartment is in one of the best location to live in Melbourne, South Yarra. The Prahran market is just around the corner, which is famous for fresh food and amazing coffee.  The apartment itself is fully furnished and has full size fridge, washing machine, dryer, microwave etc. There is high speed WiFi internet in the apartment.
host_about:
I love travelling. I have travelled extensively around the world(India, China, Thailand, Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Brazil are a few to name) and also lived in many different cities around the globe. 

While travelling, I always felt that there is dearth of affordable home-like places to stay. So, when I returned back to Melbourne, I decided to bridge the gap. All my apartments are furnished with standard size fridge, washing machine, dryer, microwaves, kitchen and kitchenette etc. to give you a home-like feeling. 
This is my small business which I  run more  from heart than mind. You don't have to look at the watch before contacting me. I will try my best to make sure that you have a  great stay in one of my apartment.

my famliy is  warmful and clean.I think It`s like my character--friendly,simple,decent and beauty.

Hi all, I'm Tom. I came from Malaysia and stayed in Melbourne for almost 5 years. I love travelling and making friends from different cultures. I speak Mandarin, Cantonese, English, Malay and Hakka. 
I really enjoyed this Airbnb experience of sharing great places with travellers and business visitors. I hope you will have a great local living experience in my apartment. 
Feel free to contact me and my co-host Miley. We would like to offer you the best holiday experience as we can.

Hello 
I have been using AirBNB for 4 years - to travel and to use for work accommodation overseas. 
I am a university professor - love travelling , music, theatre, food....

name: Large 2 BRM apt, close to restaurants St Kilda bch
summary: A very cool and cozy but large art deco apartment, with very big bedrooms. Close to everything, city, beach, F1 Grand Prix track.  Albert part lake 5km running track or picnic with the swans and ducks!  Luna Park (amusement park for the kids)  Loads of bars and restaurants within 5 mins walk.  Even the airport bus is 200m away!
space: Start your day at the coffee machine to help you consider your options for the day. The kitchen has all the essentials here,  grab some brekkie, pack a picnic, take the esky and head to the beach. 10 min walk! Maybe you wake up and just need someone else to cook your breakfast...head down the road to ample brunch places less than 5 mins away. Or blend a green juice grab your running shoes, albert park is a 5km track across the road, say good morning to the ducks or take a yoga mat and salute the sun. Retail Therapy? jump on the tram at the end of the street and shop to you drop in the city! Tons of market options close by too. These are all the reasons why I choose to live here. Everything is all within reach, but the apartment oozes peace and quiet too. Secluded from the main hub, which is a awesome surprise considering the night life that is also available to you right on your doorstep.  There is some street parking. With some limitations. The apartment is off the main busy street so
host_about:
I work in the tourist industry and a huge traveller myself, I like the idea of opening my home to people who also enjoy travelling. I love connecting with people and hearing their stories. 

As an Airbnb host my priority is for my guests to drive their own experience. I am happy to be around for any advice etc and also happy to let you enjoy your own space. 

I am fond of good food, good wine and good coffee! 

I do warn you with some good cheeky advice: It is a brave and perhaps a foolish move to approach me before I have had my first coffee. But immediately after, I will take a more softer human shape :)

name: 21st Floor Luxury, Very Central, Free Breakfast!
summary: The place is at a walking distance to Crown Casino, Southern Cross Station, Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, Flinders Street Station, Yarra River, DFO, Eureka Skydeck, Sealife Aquarium and Royal Botanical Gardens. Immense natural light on 21st floor, friendly people, unlimited ultra-fast wifi upto 100mbps, free breakfast! Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers :-)
space: High Floor, Walking to Public Transport, 2 mins to the Casino!
host_about: Unknown

name: Self contained 2 Bedroom unit with amazing views
summary: Self contained 2 bedroom unit, beautiful views of the Yarra Valley & the garden. The unit is situated under the main house (some call it a resort) & is nestled into the side of a hill well above the local housing estate & only minutes from Lilydale, shops & public transport. The kitchen has an electric fan forced oven, gas hotplate, microwave, dishwasher & large fridge as well as a laundry complete with a washing machine. You also have your own private courtyard. Breakfast included each morning
space: This is a self contained unit on the ground level of this large home and you have your own privacy and easy access to the unit. Large open plan kitchen lounge room including computer desk for business travellers.
host_about:
Happily married for 31yrs, with a grown family who no longer live at home. We live in the heart of the Yarra Valley which is one of Melbourne's major Tourist Meccas including Wineries, Coffee shops, Australian wildlife, bush walking through hills, hot Air Ballooning and only 40klm's from the heart of Melbourne. Extremely close to Rochford Winery and a day on the green. Our life motto is to make an inspiring difference in the lives of others and our hospitality matches that. We don't travel much because we have so much at our doorstep to enjoy. We love to share those experiences and knowledge with the many visitors we've had locally and from many countries all over the World.
About us: Great sense of humour, we love people but also love and respect space (our own and others). 
Favourite food: we just love food, especially BBQ's (Website hidden by Airbnb) Favourite place to visit: Jody; nature walks and the chocolate shop, Graeme; the footy and riding his Harley through the Yarra Valley.
Most important things in our lives: God and family.

name: Room in Centre of Brunswick
summary: Animal lovers, do I have a home for you! Close to the City and access to Melbourne Uni and RMIT in the heart of trendy Brunswick.
space: Room up for grabs in the heart of Brunswick. Your room will be furnished with Queen size bed, built in cupboards, a desk and a bed side table /lamp  The house is shared with myself, a  Dog (Spencer) A Cat ( Oscar) and  a kitten (Maisy) , so animal lovers are a must.   Sorry But No Meat/Fish in the House.  The house is perfectly located, in between Lygon Street and Sydney Road. With transport nearby in every mode - trams/bus/train. There is a direct tram to the University of Melbourne There is a vast selection of cafes and shops nearby in the trendy Brunswick area. I work full time Monday to Friday. The house is big enough for creating your own space or, should you want it, I'm always up for a little chit chat.

host_about: I am pretty easygoing and love to travel. I have spent a lot of time in Asia and am keen to explore more of the globe.

name: Garden Retreat
summary: The Garden Retreat is fresh, light and clean.  Situated amongst our garden, it is fully contained, private and a 10 minute walk to the Main Street of Healesville.
space: Garden Retreat is a fully self contained unit with a private patio, featuring a comfortable Queen size bed with luxury sheets, Double Shower, TV/DVD, Foxtel, Wi-Fi, a Great AMP for enjoying your music, plug ready and waiting for your phone, Full sized Refrigerator, Oven, all the crockery to eat and cook, just bring your food. Toaster, Wok, Microwave, Kettle - coffee, tea and milk. Split System and Wood Heater.  TV swivels so you can watch it on sofa in lounge or swivel to watch from bed.  This is strictly accommodation for couples. (2 guests only)
host_about:
I am one of three at this residence; myself, husband John and son Jack.  We are a fun loving family who like to meet and talk to new people.  We love our garden, animals and music (you'll be able to plug your phone into the amp in the flat and enjoy your own music).

I take pride in our self contained unit and will do all possible to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We are happy to answer questions about this lovely valley -please don't hesitate to ask and we would love to host you here in the Yarra Valley.

name: Cute & cozy room, perfectly located!
summary: Perfect bedroom for a little get away in Melbourne. Near CBD, beaches, famous Chapel St and more. You have your private cute little room and share a beautiful & vibrant flat with a multi-cultural & easy going couple.
space: Our space is very quiet, filled with natural light and really cozy, with a charming touch from all the inspiration we got from our travels around the world. Our kitchen has everything you could possibly ever want to cook your home-made delicious meals as we both work in hospitality. You will enjoy having breakfast on the balcony, surrounded by the giant green trees. Our bed is brand new, guaranteeing a best sleep ever, in a quiet space. You can have your own secure parking and the building is also secure with an intercom service.

name: Mel's Place
summary: Quirky one bedroom flat in Brunswick West. Near Royal Park and a stone's throw to transport, shopping & great local café's. Take a ten minute stroll to the zoo through beautiful parkland! Or drive the car out of your designated on site car space. Take the no. 58 tram, Melbourne's most scenic tram route to the Queen Vic Market & into the CBD. The flats central location makes it easy to get to all Melbourne's amazing attractions.
space: More information The space My little flat is situated on the second floor of a neat sixties style apartment block. It's location is great! a pleasant 15 minute stroll will see you in bustling Sydney Rd, and the tram stop to the city is a 3 minute walk from the door. There are plenty of local shops & cafe's nearby to cater to your food & caffeine requirements. I work in central VIC alot soo the place is filled with my things however there is a hanging rack and space for your things.  Perc's of this space is because it is on the end it is private and has a double window, view from the bed are treetops to neighboring places.  The flat is bright and airy space.  The kitchen is well equipped with full size gas oven, kettle and refrigerator. . The en-suite bathroom is quite small, but bright, clean & functional. Basic toiletries are provided for your stay. The bedroom is very bright and airy and contains a very comfortable queen size bed. Heating and Cooling.

Additionally, the guests are accessible to four of free car par space inside the building.
space: Welcome to Eureka 87! You are about to be in the position of Melbourne symbolic landmark and highest residential building in the northern hemisphere. You are going to have the panoramic views of the entire Melbourne and imagine you will spend a day or more to have an unique sky-high living experience.  Indeed you are not at a hotel , nor a merely place to stay , but an artistic space where you can arouse the sense of innovation and inspiration. Eureka 87 is made to offer luxurious venues for multiple-functions. The guests are encouraged to have cocktail parties, anniversary celebrations or Weddings etc. Personal-tailored functions are also offered to fulfill your requirements and needs.

space: This apartment includes;   All furniture All housewares Fully equipped kitchen Utilities connection and ongoing usage charges (electricity, water & gas) All Linen and Towels LCD television Heating and cooling Laundry Unlimited wi-fi is an additional $22 per week Secure basement car park availbel $70 per week extra Housekeeping Service available - $120 per service There is a once of exit clean fee of $250 Bond $2,500 Bedding is a King, or two single beds depending on your requirements. host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

host_about:
Having travelled and worked in a number of cities around the world, I realised it was hard for me to know where home really was. A hotel today, and next, the other. Having stumbled across AirBnb during one of the defining moments in my life, I made a clear decision to commit to this fully and have never looked back ever since. I take pride in what I do in having to provide amazing guests from all walks of life with a home even for a night across the properties I manage in major cities all around the world. Home is never a particular place. It truly is where the heart is. 

Have a great & memorable stay with us :)

name: Sunny Sandringham Sanctuary
summary: Our much-loved 1946-era red brick home, sensitively extended with modern contemporary features, is a peaceful five-star haven offering you a wonderful nights' sleep. The shops, cafes and restaurants of Black Rock and Sandringham are each 15 minutes' walk away, and you are near Southlands Shopping Centre, the Royal Melbourne, Cheltenham & Sandringham Golf Clubs, popular Beach Road (beloved by cyclists) and Sandringham Hospital. Within 2 minutes are three good cafes serving breakfast & lunch.
space: Our welcoming 1946-era clinker brick home has been sensitively extended in 2013 with modern contemporary features, from the private patio enclosure at the front to relax with a morning cup of tea or evening glass of wine, to the stunning designer kitchen which looks onto our spacious entertaining deck and paved pool area. There is plenty of off-street parking on the front of our property. My wife Elizabeth works from home Monday-Friday in the front office. We are currently raising a female black Labrador Guide Dog puppy who is 9 months old who is very friendly and affectionate. So you must love dogs! We have fast cable wireless unlimited internet access (just use the password on the photo frame in your room), great for streaming or downloading. Your sunny, north-facing, generously-sized bedroom at the front of the house features a 3-metre long wardrobe with plenty of hanging space, a queen-size bed, side tables with table lamps, a full-length mirror, microwave oven, large TV connected

The space includes 2 bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, open plan kitchen with a wonderful entertainers balcony capturing gorgeous northern views. Each bedroom con
host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

name: ‘Hazelwell’ Grand Home Walk to MCG, Tennis & City
summary: *****Please message us before you pay - let us know the reason you are staying, how many adults/children/pets (and how many beds required).  If you do not do this, we may direct you to cancel an instant booking.  ***** Relax in an elegant 19th C terrace, 10 minutes walk to the city centre through the Fitzroy Gardens, with the MCG, Tennis Centre and city eating and shopping venues nearby. ‘Hazelwell’ is a grand Victorian home on a magnificent block of land in the premium suburb of East Melbourne.
space: From the days of grandeur, this beautifully restored c1851 three bed room and two living area residence, sits on a very large block for this part of Melbourne, approx 450sqm. This home is full of character, charm and history and is just delightful with lots of modern touches!  Our home was originally lived in Ivo Bligh, the captain of the English cricket team to whom The Ashes were presented and our master bedroom fireplace is where Ashes cricket wickets were once burnt after the game.  * Hazelwell is our family home when we live in Melbourne, we travel regularly and when we are not living in Melbourne we offer our home to others to live in. The style of the home is quite modern, yet there are many historical touches including the intricate pressed metal ceilings each with a unique patterns for each room (which I love staring up at whilst in bed – always finding a new pattern inside the patters), four marble fireplaces, and original wide board timber flooring. * The home is in a very q
host_about: Born in Melbourne, a traveller at heart.

name: Very clean house in the West with affordable price
summary: This house has four bedrooms two bathrooms. You will have the entire place independently. As a host, I am living 5 mins away from the property.  Master bedroom has a high quality king size bed, high quality bed sheet and quilt cover. Ensuite is attached. Shampoo, towels and hairdryer are provided. Other bedroom are shared with one bathroom and separated toilet. Kitchen are well maintained by weekly cleaners. High speed WIFI provided. No Party please
space: Unknown

I love everything which is beautiful. 
Like flowers, stars, ocean,music, books, sweet dreams and people.

name: Ride a Steam Locomotive from a Cosy Guesthouse
summary: Relax amid the sounds of birdsong and a babbling creek from the shaded front yard of this quaint, cosy guesthouse. In the heart of the Dandenong Ranges, it's perfect for those looking to spend more time in nature.
space: This fully self contained, detached guest house has been restored and features high ceilings, two bedrooms featuring queen size beds with built in wardrobes, bathroom with deep free standing bath and separate shower, separate toilet, laundry with new washing machine and dryer, fully functioning kitchen with Gas Stove/Electric Oven, fridge/freezer, split system AC/Heating, wifi, wall mounted TV and DVD player. A port-a-cot and high chair available. Continental breakfast will also be provided.
host_about: We are a happily married couple for 35 years and have 4 children. We have decided to take on this joint adventure to not only meet people but to allow other people to enjoy what the Dandenong Ranges has to offer. We love to sit on our back deck over looking our little running creek with our friends  and watch the wildlife fly by.

summary: Live like a Melbourne local in my modern 1-bedroom apartment in one of the best areas in the city – Kensington. This really is top spot from which to enjoy the best the city has to offer. Great for a couple, business travellers or friends on your next Melbourne getaway!
space: I’m really looking forward to hosting you in my stylish, fully furnished, 1 bedroom Kensington apartment, which is located close to Kensington Village shops, cafes and restaurants and also to the Moonee Ponds Creek Trail. The centre of Melbourne is not far away as Kensington and Macaulay stations are both a short walk from the apartment – getting into the CBD is ultra convenient and quick! My apartment is light-filled and spacious and has a lovely balcony to relax on. The open plan living area is beautifully set up. Relax on the comfortable couch in front of the smart TV and have cosy nights at home, that’s if you’re not too busy making the most out of the fabulous nearby restaurants, cafes and bars. The kitchen is modern and ultra functional, and perfect for preparing meals at home. All mods cons are available for your convenience, such as an electric oven, cook top, cooking utensils, appliances (microwave, kettle and toaster), a coffee plunger and a full sized fridge. The bedroom is
host_about: A typical Melbourne couple, we love our coffee, lazy weekends, films of all varieties etc. We have travelled to most continents and enjoyed getting to know this beautiful, crazy world. We love live music, and you can still get that in Melbourne along with all manner of festivals. We use Airbnb when we travel and we invite you to stay in our place, we trust you will enjoy this great city too.

It showcases contemporary style and a clever integration of indoor/outdoor living areas. The amenities include superior massage chair, gas heating, air conditioning , free Wifi, 55” TV, fridge, 10kg washing&dryer combo, hairdryer, oven, toaster, microwave and rice cooker, iron, vacuum and everything you need.

It’s only 100 meters away from the Doncaster Road which is a main road with trams and buses to the city, the supermarket Coles is just at the opposite of the Doncaster Road, which is the best place to buy foods and other groceries to satisfy your daily life. summary: Big apartment in the centre of Port Melbourne. One big bedroom with queen size double bed and private bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin. 2nd bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin. Separate build-in closet with washer-dryer. Big kitchen and living room, separate study. Close to: beach 4min, supermarket 4min and CBD tram109 5min.
space: We have a 90m2 apartment in the centre of Port Melbourne. There is one big bedroom with a queen size double bed and a private bathroom (toilet and shower) attached. There is also a 2nd bathroom (toilet and shower) with a washer dryer to use. We have an open kitchen with a big fridge (and freezer), 4 cooking plates, oven, microwave, toaster, water kettle, blender and juicer. The living room has a big table for 4 (expandable to 8), a big sofa and flat screen TV. The living room gives access to the terrace, where we have a grass mat and some chairs and a table to enjoy sitting outside. There is a second room, used as study with a desk and mainly closet space, but cannot be used as a bedroom.
host_about: Originally from Belgium but now living and working in Australia. Love being outside and doing sports. We are frequent travellers, and while away we rent out our beautiful apartment in Melbourne.

Sleep well in this quiet end of street property close to the train station, cafes shopping centres, only 50 minutes by train or 30minutes drive from Melbourne CBD or the beautiful Mornington Peninsula. name: Swim in a Solar Heated Pool at a Luxury Home
summary: Fire up the barbecue and enjoy al fresco dining next to an incredible solar heated pool. Hampton Haven is a resort-style home away from home featuring comfortable furnishings, modern decor, and plenty of room for the whole family to relax.  We welcome bookings that are happy to be quiet towards our neighbours with a maximum of 6 adults, 12 guests allowed when it's a mix of adults and children. We are the perfect place for families. Significant long stay discounts available, please send an email.
space: Hampton Haven is set up to be your resort style home away from home, with quality furnishings, modern decor and Art through the house,  you will be wowed as soon as you walk through the door.  With two large living spaces, 5 to 6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms there is plenty of room to gather your family and friends.  Full linen supplied.  Outdoor entertaining at its best with a gorgeous solar heated pool, large bbq and outdoor dining area.  It really is a great house.  Please note there is a quite period outside from 10pm at night. There is a strict no party policy at this house, those that think this will be a challenge to abide by are ask not to book.  Upstairs we have:  Master Bedroom with ensuite bath tub and separate shower. King bed and fold out single bed. Bedroom two with shower ensuite: Queen bed Bedroom three: 2 single beds Bedroom four: King single bed, room for fold out bed. Large family bathroom with bath tub and seperate shower. Downstairs: Bedroom Five: King Bed Bedroom six/
host_about: Real Estate Obsessed Mum and now holiday house obsessed.  I love to create beautiful spaces for our guests to gather their family and friends.  We hope you have an amazing time at our houses, we strive to get it perfect every time.  My team and I take great pride in what we do and I hope that shows as soon as you walk through the door.  Enjoy your stay.

summary: Just under 3 years old, this modern & spacious apartment provides the perfect place for your stay. Located off bustling Koornang Road with a huge variety of cuisines, shopping centers & Carnegie station literally across the road from the apartment; we offer a private room & bathroom for either couples or singles with a queen size bed, desk, fresh towels & linen and a friendly host to greet you! The huge balcony with splendid views and calm vibe is the perfect place to relax after a long day or alternatively, put your feet up and enjoy scrolling through the Tv.
host_about: I was born in Australia and have lived here all life, however I have travelled all over the world using the Air Bnb  services and know how helpful and convenient it can be. I love to host and enjoy meeting new people. It's my aim to provide you a nice comfortable place for your stay.

summary: This place is close to EVERYTHING!  Walking distance to Queen Victoria Market, Melbourne Central, State Library, RMIT, QV Square, public transport, stacks of restaurants/bars/cafes and that's just the beginning!!  You’ll love this place because of the neighborhood, the view, the facilities, the food and of course the LOCATION!  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

space: This apartment is on 28th floor of a 31st storey building the first 15 floors are the Sheraton Hotel  This apartment is so light and the views are spectacular from every window and balcony You are walking distance to everything Melbourne has to offer, shopping , Restaurants, Theatres, MCG etc  Tram ride to St Kilda or funky Brunswick everything at your doorstep
host_about: Andy and I are city dwellers, both with busy careers, we travel extensively and personally like to have our own space, rather than the formality of a hotel.  Our apartment is perfectly situated at the top of the city overlooking the Treasury Gardens and the Fitzroy Gardens. We love dining out and the best restaurants are at our doorstop, Bar Larinha and Lumpino are next door and for the meat eaters San Telmo is across the road, or if you fancy Asian we are 2 minutes from Chinatown, Yum Cha is a must. Paris is a special place for us, as is. New York, as I said we are city dwellers.  We are big music lovers and have travelled to New Orleans many times to catch the best Soul and RnB ever there.

We only ask that you leave the apartment in a neat and tidy state, empty the rubbish bins and lock up securely before departure.

Can walk to the city in one hour, Brunswick St 15 minutes. Fantastic cafes, parks, public gym, swimming pool close by.  On street parking. Shared kitchen and bathroom.  Outside living area.
space: A private room cut off from the house with private access through rear courtyard.  The room is comfortable and sunny. More than 20 cafes and restaurants within 2 blocks.
host_about: My husband and I have been living in North Fitzroy for a long time and love the parks and easy access to the city with Melbourne public transport.  I am from Thailand and like to have a peaceful house.

name: 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Free Parking & Wifi
summary: Two bedroom apartment at Centro Collingwood.  -Two bathrooms with bathroom & showers -24-hour Easy self-check-in -Reserved private parking accessible by elevator. -Quite, walking distance to over 100 restaurants, bars, shops & supermarkets. -Rapid responds to all enquirers -24 hour emergency phone number, I'm always available to help. -Access swipe, 24 hr security camera in the building entrances and elevator
space: The building is located in the heart of vibrant Collingwood designed by award-winning architects Elenberg Fraser.
host_about:
Hi my name is Dawei, I started doing Airbnb September 2015. 

I'm a 20 years old undergraduate student currently studying commercial law. I like to watch movies and play video games. Sometimes I could spend my whole day in my room just play games. I thought that there isn't much things to do outside and I thought the World was a boring place. When I'm not playing games, I would read news on the internet just to catch up with the rest of the world. That's how I knew Airbnb. 

One day, my father come to me, talked about doing short term renting. He has got few new apartments that our relatives bought which needs to be rented out. I told him about Airbnb and he thought we could really make it work. So I asked my best friend if he is interested to be my partner for this, and he said yes. We started almost immediately, planning, buying furnitures to started taking guests in just two weeks. 

Then it really changed me.

I met with travellers around the world. Every body was so polite and friendly.  When I talk to them I can feel the excitement and happiness. It's totally  different compare to what I thought people are like. Maybe because this communicate is great, I don't know.  Then I  thought "I want to be people like my guests". I want people around me to feel life is great and there are a lot to look forward to. The guests really gave me a lot motivation towards my work and my life. Here I have to thank you all.

After one month, the revenue was great, however take away the interests and loans, all kinds of fees and salary for my partner, there are really not much left for me. But I think that's enough, I'm still a student, I have to spend time on study and don't have much things to spend money on anyway, being able to save money for a holiday with my girl friend every few month is perfect for me. 

After all these experience, I felt it really changed my life and how I view the world. Doesn't matter if I fail or succeed it's  going to effect the rest of my life in a very positive way, that's something really valuable to me.

name: ☀Luxury Living With a View☀
summary: My apartment is close to Queen Victoria Market, Lygon Street, Melbourne Central Train Station, QV Shopping Arcade, Emporium Shopping Centre. . You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, cleanliness, and the AMAZING VIEW. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
space: Location, Location, Location!!! This luxury and modern gem is centrally located on Bouverie Street, one of the main street of Melbourne. Be at the place that matters, be where the action is, be in a home that puts you at the centre. Open, inviting and beautiful, with striking views, the apartment interiors are designed with the contemporary lifestyle in mind.
host_about:
I'm a mindfulness coach for children who loves travelling, cake decorating, good food and great company.

I would like to make your stay in Melbourne enjoyable and memorable one!

name: Sunny and spacious open plan living
summary: This bright and spacious home is situated only 5 minutes from the busy Centre Road strip. In a safe and friendly neighbourhood with a huge open plan living area and a gorgeous sunroom overlooking the garden.
space: This home offers two generous sized bedrooms in particular the main bedroom with a king size bed and both rooms with built in robes. The open plan living space is huge with modern and stylish furnishings and amenities.
host_about: I’m a new mumma, an Arbonne independent consultant and a photographer who loves to travel and explore.

name: Get Creative at a Real Brunswick Artist's Home
summary: Watch the sunset with a cold beer on the rooftop terrace of this fully remodeled '30s Art Deco studio shop and residence. Immerse yourself in all the original artwork, or relax on the four-seater Chesterfield and soak up the hip Brunswick feel.
space: When you book you have the entire place to yourselves. Our ground floor artist/ceramics studio will be closed, but feel free to view the work, you may even wish to buy a piece:). Key pad entry is via the front door, you will travel up the custom-built staircase to the second level, which enjoys a spacious central living area, cozy leather couches as well as an adjoining kitchen including stone bench-tops and stainless steel Fisher and Paykel appliances. The bright bedroom on this level features a Queen Sized bed, built-in desk, two large robes and leads out to the pet friendly terrace which can also be accessed through the living area. The unique bathroom on this level combines a luxurious full size bath with shower combo.  All flooring on this level is pet friendly floating timber floors. The spacious third level master bedroom is carpeted, has high angled ceilings, dual built-in robes, European laundry, and access to the 2nd larger terrace with clothesline and BBQ area. There is also
host_about:
I am a long time photographer/artist/log home builder and distiller.
Apart from my family (happily married - my lovely wife Carrie is pictured with me), I am devoted to great food and a good gin and tonic.

name: Peaceful haven in leafy Fitzroy
summary: Light filled room in a classic Napier St terrace house. The leafy oaks of the area shade your windows and the only traffic in this quite cul de sac are the bicycles.  Share with the house with Christel,  a 30-something freelance creative producer. Restaurants, galleries and shopping on Brunswick St and Smith St are a 2 min walk, as are trams into the city, a 15 min ride.
space: The room has a comfy queen bed. It's light filled and simple in the best way.  Floorboards, a high ceiling, big windows with the tops of the oak trees waving outside - trademarks of a Fitzroy terrace house. Wifi of course.
host_about: I live in Melbourne Australia, speak English and a little French and I'm curator of contemporary art

name: 3Bed 2Bath Close To Everything! Check in from 7am!
summary: Feel right at home in our modern light-filled apartment! BEST location in Southbank - Crown, Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre right across the road, IGA Supermarket & Liquor literally downstairs, tram stop steps away taking you into the city or the beach and an easy walk to South Melbourne Market!  With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 parking space and all the necessities, our apartment is perfect for family holidays, getaways with friends or work teams exhibiting at the MCEC!
space: We block out one night before and after each guest to allow flexible check in times and late check out. Check in anytime after 7am and checkout before 6pm.  - Modern and stylish corner apartment offering 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms  - ALL bedrooms have floor to ceiling windows (tinted & double glazed), and comfortable king sized beds (all of which can be split into king singles upon request at time of booking) - Large, modular sofa in the living room can be used as two singles, or one large bed if required (approx. 1.86m x 1.98m together, or 1.86m x 0.99m each) - Two full bathrooms (an ensuite for the master bedroom and a family bathroom that also has a bathtub) - Airconditioner in living room for heating and cooling - Fully fitted kitchen and a range of seasoning are available for the master chefs (and a microwave for the micro chefs) – there is a supermarket downstairs and South Melbourne market is just a few minutes’ walk - Clean and comfortable bedding plus fresh towels pro
host_about:
We're two young professionals who have been living in Melbourne for the past 17 years. We're both friendly, easy-going and very helpful.

Having stayed in a few Airbnb apartments whilst travelling through Europe, we now look for holiday accommodation on Airbnb first, and only move on to hotel booking site when there's nothing available here. Why? Because it feels more like home and there's always a kitchen and microwave - super handy for enjoying local produce and reheating leftovers!

name: Tiny bolt hole in vibrant South Melbourne.
summary: Tiny loft bedroom and bathroom, private in a separate part of main house, an 1857 blue stone heritage building, in vibrant South Melbourne, a few doors from the South Melbourne Market. Walk to Albert Park Lake in under 10 minutes. Walk to the city centre along the river in half an hour. 3 different trams within 5 minutes walk.
space: Attractive small space off the main house foyer. Comfortable double bed on a low ceilinged platform. Quality linen. Small desk, free WiFi. Adjoining powder room with good shower. Fridge and kettle.
host_about: Nurse and mother of 4 adult children. We love living a few doors from the market in eclectic South Melbourne walking distance to the city, the beach, Albert Park Lake.

name: Boutique Apartment Near Chapel Street
summary: This apartment brings it all, modern, sleek and homely.   Situated just a short walk to the heart of Chapel Street,  a tram stop out the front that takes you directly into the centre of Melbourne, and all the mod cons that make you feel comfortable,  This will be your new,  home away from home.   Eclipse is a 5 story, 19 apartment complex that will host you and your loved ones.  The security features will ensure that  brunching and shopping remain number 1 on your Melbourne itinerary.
space: The space is a discreet hide-away with modern, yet intimate features.  With Chapel Street around the corner, you are only minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Windsor, South Yarra and Prahran shopping districts.  When you need to retreat, take advantage of the AppleTV and unlimited wifi that is available for you to use.   I absolutely love living here, I know you will too.
host_about:
I am a mid-30's professional who works in the Melbourne CBD, and lives in the leafy inner-suburb of Prahran.   

Over the weekends, I love getting away from the city, and exploring what the State of Victoria has to offer.   Sometimes, that involved an impromptu trip to Halls Gap, or a train ride out to my parents house, near Philip Island.

name: Cute Cottage in Yarraville Village
summary: My place is close to cafe cultured, and trendy Yarraville Village and the `art deco' Sun Theatre. Located in a quiet residential area with a nice park opposite.    You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood and the ambiance with heaps of cafes and restaurants with a 5 minute walk.   The Yarraville train station is a 5 minute walk and only a 10 minute train ride to Melbourne CBD.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
space: Unknown
host_about: I am  married family man living in Melbourne, Australia.  As a Company Director and CEO, I travel regularly and prefer Airbnb over traditional accommodation.  This allows me to experience true city life throughout the world.

name: Top floor luxury apartment w- fancy gym and pool.
summary: Top floor luxury apartment in CBD!Great location, 2 mins to southern cross station and near everything. Suitable for family and business travel. Free parking available.
space: Guests can use all spaces of the apartment including the kitchen. Also guests can access to the building’s gym, pool and function room.
host_about: Unknown

name: 1BR FITZROY TOWNHOUSE - Jul/Aug
summary: My place is located in the heart of Fitzroy, close to Brunswick Street, Smith Street, and Johnson Streets. There are many top notch restaurants, bars & cafes within a 5 minute walk.  You’ll love my place because of the kitchen, the cosiness, the high ceilings, the views, the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Its close to public transport, access to the Freeway, quiet but close to the fun.
space: Two storey town house with timber floor boards and high ceilings. Large bedroom, spacious open living area and fully equipped kitchen. Wifi Internet, Stan & Netflix are installed and can be used.
host_about: Unknown

name: Outdoor Family Lifestyle
summary: If you like outdoor living you will love it here!  The outdoor spaces include a pool and heated spa for year round use, large outdoor dining and a cozy fire.  We have everything you need including a fully equipped kitchen and supply linen and towels.  It is close to Southland Shopping Centre and Cheltenham Railway Station.  We would recommend it for families (with kids), and extended families.  It would make an excellent base for overseas or interstate visitors with all the comforts of home.
space: Our home is perfect for hosting families with children.  It has four bedrooms and two separate living areas.  Outdoor living awaits you in the relaxing outdoor spaces. You choose from the large outdoor dining area, the pool and spa or sit around the fire on a chilly evening.  The house has ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling.
host_about:
We are a working couple with a labrador and three children that are growing too fast!  We like to get involved in our kids activities and volunteer at the local school and sporting clubs.  

We love living where we do and love our house and neighbourhood, particularly in the warmer months when we like to spend a lot of time in our backyard.  We are keen to share our space for others to enjoy, as we do as often as we can.

We mostly eat at home, either cooking on the Weber BBQ or using the Thermomix for a quick meal.  We love our appliances with the induction cooktop and large oven for cooking up a storm. 

We do enjoy dining out and have updated our Airbnb Guide Book with some of our local recommendations for restaurants, family friendly dining, takeaway food and entertainment.  We have also listed nearby parks and playgrounds, however have our local primary school very close by which is a great play space. 

When we are not at home we are usually camping or caravanning around our beautiful country and our dog comes with us.  We are new to Airbnb, but will definitively look at booking as a guest next time we go away without our van.  

As we are a family of five, we think our house would be best suited to another family, or could even negotiate two families.  We will try to make your stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible and are happy for you to call or message any queries when you are staying at our house.  

Enjoy.

name: Convenient, Livable, 3 Beds and plenty more
summary: The most convenient apartment in the centre of world's most livable city! Located within free tram zone, walking distance to train, tram, bus, airport bus and car hire. Shops, restaurants, are just nearby. Supermarket opens till 12 midnight. Plenty of facilities: free gym, swimming pool, sauna, rock-climbing, BBQ area, garden, observation deck… Neat and tidy rooms: two Queen-size (1.5m) beds for 4 persons. Sofa bed can hold extra two. 24 hour hot water, microwave, kettle, TV, etc! Free Wifi!
space: Good news! We've just added a TV in our apartment! So that you can watch free-to-air local digital TV channels!
host_about: Unknown

name: 1BR Fresh & Bright 1Fl central too!
summary: 1st floor renovated, light filled Apartment only few minutes walk for City trams, supermarket, cafes etc.  Own washing machine/dryer, split airconditioner/heater, leather couch, King or 2 single beds.   Enjoy 42" High def LCD TV/DVD/ Stereo.
space: Unknown
host_about: Anna and Tina have lived and worked in St Kilda for over twenty years and as locals are proud to call St Kilda home. Local knowledge has allowed us to put together a portfolio of great apartments in the best locations - all in the heart of St Kilda. Do view stkildastays,  We would love to look after your next St Kilda Stay. To view all of our 23 apartments please click on "View Full Profile"

name: St Kilda/Windsor 1 bed + study full apartment/home
summary: Come and stay in our bright and airy apartment on one of Melbourne's most prestigious, leafy streets while we are on holidays! Minutes walk from lively Chapel Street, fun Fitzroy Street and St Kilda beach. Enjoy the whole apartment in this secure block with shared garden, which is only 5km from the city, over Melbourne's glorious summer.
space: Our apartment is light and bright, recently painted, set in a beautiful garden setting and secure block in a tree lined street. Located on the first floor, the apartment has a large lounge room with open fireplace and leafy views, a large main bedroom with a king-size bed and built in robes, a second smaller room with a study desk, kitchen with gas cooking, and bathroom with shower over bath. It has polished timber floors throughout, timber venetians, one off street carspace for your use, and a clean communal laundry. This is our home so you will no doubt feel at home here yourself!
host_about: 90+ countries and counting!

name: Gem location! Do not miss out!
summary: Location, location. It doesn’t get better than this gem in the heart of Melbourne. Central to everything! This is a must stay location for those that want to experience Melbourne at its finest.  Do you love restaurants, bars, and shopping? Are you new to town and need to get your bearings for your next adventure. Lonsdale st is the destination for you! A quaint place to relax, unwind and enjoy the best of what Melbourne has to offer. You have everything you need here and more!
space: Unknown
host_about: Considerate, kind and honest.

name: comfortable independent room
summary: 我的房源靠近优美的景色｡因为温馨､景观､地段,您一定会爱上我的房源｡我的房源适合商务旅行者｡ 图示两间大床房分开出租,价格为单间价格｡房间由房东随机安排,如需指定房间,请提前联系并确认｡
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Cozy Carlton Apartment on Melbourne's Doorstep
summary: New York living in Melbourne!  On the door step of the iconic Carlton Gardens, the Exhibition Mews is a quick walk to Melbourne's CBD, particularly Melbourne's free tram zone, gardens, hospitals, theater, universities and sporting districts.
space: Open plan studio apartment with double bed. Equipped kitchenette has 2 top burner and toaster oven (which can be used as an oven).  Bathroom has a separate powder room and has is shower and toilet.
host_about:
I am adventurous and social but also enjoy quiet time and my own company.  I enjoy sharing and learning from others, there is nothing like great conversation with good company.   
I like to keep healthy and fit, watch a good movie and read a good book. I take pride in my home and enjoy keeping things neat and tidy. 

As an Airbnb host I am happy to show you around my favorite parts of Melbourne, or give you space and privacy.

name: Private room near CBD
summary: Student Accommodation, but willing to accommodate those a bit older than typical student age. Current lease contract is running until 14/2/2019, but I'm looking to move out by end of November, so I'm urgently looking for someone to stay until the end of the lease. The room is in good condition, communal bathroom and kitchen shared with 4 other students. $240 per week, with electricity, gas, and water all included, which is a great price for accommodation in the city with utilities included.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Cozy studio apartment in a perfect location!
summary: Cozy private apartment, perfect location just few minutes from the city, ideal for single or couples. Comfortable kitchen, living area, dining table, double bed, bathroom/bath, communal laundry with all facilities. Located in a Main street and fully illuminated. Public transport just a few minutes walking, Tram 2 min, Train St 10 min, close to the beach, plenty of shops, cafes, restaurant just at 15 min walking. Located in between Botanical Gardens and Fawkner Park, perfect for a walk or picnic.
space: Unknown
host_about: We are a young couple, we love travelling and meeting people from different cultures.

name: The Little Irish Linen House
summary: Amazing location. Modern and cool decor. Inner city vibe living in the heart of South Melbourne. Near everything Melbourne has to offer. Minutes to the city on the tram. Minutes to the beach. Minutes walk to Albert Park Lake and the Grand Prix. Two bedrooms up a spiral staircase. Very comfy beds. Perfect for a couple plus one. Fully equipped kitchen and washer/dryer. Low maintenance yet funky and cozy.
space: It is compact, but it is perfectly cool and has a little outdoor private courtyard.
host_about:
Hi, I am married with 2 teenage kids and a big beautiful golden retriever called Ralph. I have lived in Melbourne my whole life and love everything about it. The cool city vibe with lanes and bands and buzz and the stunning Mornington Peninsula only an hour away when you want peace and quiet. 
I am never far away if you need anything but respect you want privacy as well.

name: South Yarra 2 Bed 2 Bath Luxury Apt
summary: A stunning north facing corner apartment with city views. This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom comfortably sleeps 4 people & is centrally located on a quiet street just off Toorak Rd, Chapel St & close to the Melbourne CBD.  Free Wi-FI. Secure basement car park available upon request.
space: A stunning apartment with city and park views in this high-energy location, capturing all the electric character & charm of Chapel Street & Toorak Road in South Yarra. Enjoy iconic Chapel Street's famous shopping, restaurants, cafes bars whilst also being in close proximity to Melbourne city. This fully furnished large two bedroom, two bathroom apartment comprises large HD TV, DVD player, fully fitted kitchen with stainless steel Smeg Appliances, dishwasher, microwave, stone bench tops, BIR's, washing machine and dryer. The spacious lounge opens up to a beautiful outdoor terrace with expansive views of the Melbourne South Yarra skyline. Loccitane Toiletries (Shampoo, Conditioner, Body Wash & Soap) are provided free of charge and a secure basement car park is also available upon request. Please advise at time of booking if the car park is required so arrangements can be made. Sleeps up to 4 adults comfortably. Please note extra bed setup in living room is available upon request so pleas
host_about:
We are a couple born and bred in Melbourne. We travel a lot for business and pleasure, passionate about good food and restaurants, love great conversation & connecting with inspirational people. 

Airbnb has given us an amazing opportunity to meet lots of great people. We are passionate about hosting and ensuring our guests experience this beautiful city like locals.

name: Single Room in Residential College
summary: Unknown
space: Medley Hall is a residential college of The University of Melbourne.  What this means is that during the University academic year, our rooms are occupied by students.  In the break times (Dec to mid Feb and July) our rooms are vacant and for $78 per night can live in one of these rooms and located perfectly and accessible by foot to all of Melbourne's favorite spots. Just around one corner is the bistro life of Carlton and The Melbourne Museum and the the University of Melbourne, and around the other are the Exhibition Gardens, the Central Business District, Chinatown, theatres and night life etc. The recent renovations and major building works at Medley Hall includes a lift to help shift between the fully renovated three levels of bedrooms (some doubles), a tv lounge room adjoined to a fully functional kitchen allowing you to cook your own food if you wish, and a modern and beautiful three story high glass atrium. The atrium ties the new with the old, a magnificent Victorian Italianat
host_about: This is a residential student college.  We have 55 rooms available to be rented out to guests during the mid year break and the end of year when the students depart.  We are located a short stroll away from the city and the bustling cafe life of famous Lygon Street.  The rate of accommodation is for a single room, equipped with bedding and towel.  There are 5 showers/toilets on each floor and a kitchenette too.  It is clean, fresh and modern simple accommodation surrounded by a beautiful mansion which is heritage listed and close to everything important to visitors to Melbourne.  Happy to provide you with more information.  Just email me.

name: Elm tree escape
summary: Beautiful, modern, open and bright family home.  Walking distance to the bus stop which will take you to Mitcham station which is approximately 1.5 km away.  Easy going and happy family of four and our 4 legged cavoodle.   Walking distance to shops.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Exquisite scenery-Riverside-@ Heart of Southbank
summary: Experience tranquility in your private bedroom and bathroom! This apartment has an unbeatable location with exquisite views and 6-star amenities, you will love it!  Spaciously decorated lounge for maximum satisfaction. Great getaway for couples or solo trips to explore the best of Melbourne. Super-fast NBN Wi-Fi covered. Transportations are just at our doorstep along with Melbourne's best attractions all within close walking distance! You will be at the heart of Southbank!
space: Dear Guests Welcome to one of the most livable cities in the world---Melbourne. This 6-star luxury apartment is located in the heart of Southbank, just on the edge of CBD. My apartment is secured above 20 stories high facing north. It is the second tallest building in Melbourne and Victoria. You can experience the stunning view of both Yarra River and the CBD. This is a 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment. You will be having a private bedroom and a bathroom. Your private bedroom comprises of a high-quality double bed with a medium firm mattress and beautifully designed bedside tables and lamp. There are 2 floor-to-ceiling mirror doors as an entrance to an enormous built-in wardrobe, a perfect place to hide your luggage and clothing for long trips. The bathroom is private (Not en-suite but at your doorstep). The spacious bathroom contains a combination of a bathtub with overhead showering for multi-purpose use, bathing necessities are provided. A built-in closet adds elegance to cover up the was
host_about:
Hello Guests!

I'm Yueqin from New Zealand, you can call me Leon, very nice to meet you. I was born in Shanghai, China, so feel free to have a chat in either Mandarin or Shanghainese dialect.

Currently completing my Masters of Food Science in Melbourne University. As I also did my 3-year Bachelor of Agriculture here, I have a pretty good sense of what Melbourne is like and can introduce fellow guests around this wonderful city (and never forget the astonishing cuisines here).

I have been to many places around the globe, I could tell you stories over a cup of tea. Other hobbies are left for those talkative guests to discover for themselves :)

If this isn't attracting enough, my co-host Jerry is an excellent tour guild and professional photographer. You can always go to him to design your very own Melbourne experience.

We will do our best to answer any questions or cater to any special needs or requirements in order to make your stay as comfortable as possible! 

Really looking forward to seeing you here!

name: Apartments Of Waverley 1BR
summary: Quiet Residential Hospitality self-serviced Apartment (1 Bedroom) containing: 1 Queen Bed, mirrored wardrobes, spacious lounge/dining; TV & DVD; fully-equipped kitchen & laundry; 1 bathroom, floor shower, large balcony with free Wifi & Foxtel
space: The apartment comes with free Wifi and Premium Foxtel. It's your own cosy home away from home.
host_about: Unknown

name: Complete lower floor privacy in leafy Glen Iris
summary: Spacious and private accommodation in a two story house in the leafy suburb of Glen Iris. Close to motorways and public transport options (including bike trails), this is a convenient, quiet base for your visit to Melbourne and its surrounds. You have your own private entrance and doors fully separating you from the upper levels to give you privacy.  French doors open directly onto the garden for you to enjoy. Your car can be stored in the carport that has a garage door.
space: The area consists of large living room with couch converting into double sofa bed, a large double bedroom with queen size bed, walk-in robe and en suite (bath & shower). There is a kitchenette with microwave, fridge, kettle, toaster, 2 ring hot plate and washing machine. There is an outside barbecue for your sole use.   Maximum number of guests is 3. Including infants.
host_about: Unknown

name: The Shelby
summary: Located on St.kilda rd, 5 min tram from the city. With Albert Park, The botanical gardens at your door step.  A long with a tram stop right at your door step where 10 different tram lines will take you to St.Kilda in 15 min, Chapel in 10 or any where else you would like to go. If you prefer walking 15 min walk from the city.  It's a very spacious apartment surrounded by many cafes and restaurants.
space: The Shelby is very Bright with spacious rooms and living room.  Has two bathrooms (each with toilet) and two spacious bedrooms.  Comes with Shampoo, conditioner, soap, towels any thing you really need to have a comfortable stay.  Our location is AMAZING. Great cafes, restaurants and bars just outside.
host_about: We are a chilled out couple. We are happy to share a beer and tell you about Melbourne.

name: Central City Abode!
summary: Enjoy what Melbourne has to offer staying here right in the heart of Melbourne. Only minutes away from Chinatown and a short stroll to Bourke St Mall the city's delights are on your doorstep. Apartment located near at corner of Russell St and little Collins St
space: A cute and compact 2 bedroom apartment all the modern creature comforts. Enjoy central Melbourne skyline from the comfort of the apartment or go up to the Roof top BBQ area for an even better skyline view.
host_about:
Clean, Easy going and relaxed.
I speak fluent English, Cantonese (廣東話) & Mandarin (普通话).

name: Comfortable, convenient and quiet inner-city pad
summary: Brilliantly located in a cul-de-sac, alongside parklands, trams and the Capital City Trail in trendy Brunswick, this comfortable and quiet 2-bedroom apartment is a great base for accessing the best of inner-city Melbourne.
space: We live in the best area of Melbourne and would love for you to enjoy the pleasures that our diverse city has to offer. Everything is at your doorstep in this trendy and bright self- contained 2 bedroom Brunswick apartment. There is a washing machine, fast wifi, LCD wide screen TV, microwave, fridge, oven, cosy leather couch and dining room table. Located on the top floor of a quiet three-level apartment block this clean and cosy place has it all to make your stay comfortable and easy.
host_about: Unknown

name: Master Suite in Ultimate Carlton Fortress!
summary: My beautiful apartment is located in the ultimate inner north position in  peaceful Carlton, between the Nicholson and Lygon St tram lines, within easy walking distance or a short tram ride to the CBD, surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bars, live music, theatre, sports and all the best that the CBD and inner north have to offer.  Come and enjoy the best of Melbourne from this excellent base with your own large master suite.
space: The apartment is beautiful and modern, clean and warm, with a beautiful  sunny balcony. It is fully furnished (with washer and dryer, iron, gas cooking, dishwasher etc). It is on the top (4th) floor of a small block of apartments, with access to communal gardens with BBQ facilities.
host_about: 32 year old woman from Melbourne, Australia. I love music, art, food, wine and travel.

name: Gorgeous City View Apartment, Free parking space
summary: Enjoy the premium ‘Green Square’ living on the edge of the city. The light filled, fully-equipped one bedroom, one bathroom, full kitchen apartment will satisfy everything you need during your stay. The balcony is the perfect spot to entertain, offering gorgeous city views. Security private parking space is provided.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Designer Selection-Penthouse in Mel CBD +Free Wifi
summary: Treat yourself to a stay at this beautiful apartment and enjoy the amazing views of the city . Rest in a comfortable Queen size bed, and take your time and relax in our swimming pool, sauna or gym.All this in the CBD,heart of Melbourne
space: Located in the CBD(free tram zone) .the building is in front of the Southern Cross Station on Spencer Street. A multitude of public transport options on offer.  Skybus situated directly opposite of the building.  One minute by walk to tram stop lines 86 and 96.  Two minutes by walk to Southern Cross station. name: The Lily Pad,  Warburton
summary: The Lily Pad is a new, architect-designed self-contained luxury Pad sitting atop a billabong.   It has a solid queen quality mattress, ensuite kitchen & bathroom.  Described as a ‘little slice of paradise’ by architect Peter Maddison on a 3 ½ acre block with stunning views of mountains , opposite the Warburton Arch House, a 7-star eco building that appeared on Grand Designs Aust in 2012, home of hosts Hailey & Tyrone.  The Arch House is also available for rent.
space: The Lily Pad is perfect for couples wanting to reconnect to nature (or each other) escape city stress, wanting  a digital detox, as well as Grand Designs devotees who are interested in sustainable architecture and eco building.  We’ve also had a few long term visitors who have stayed for a few weeks to write a book! The large glass doors open up to allow the mountain breeze through, the fly screens keep the critters out and for really hot days there is air con.  For winter there is heating.  This is true luxury accommodation at its best. The Lily Pad is on 3 ½ acres of Australian bush (mostly native) and is covered in chestnut trees and has an orchard.  When you are on the block you think you are in the middle of no-where (or Bali) but the quaint town of Warburton and exquisite Yarra River walks/bike rides are just a 15 minute walk down our hill (a good steep hill that’ll get your heart pumping on the way back!).  Your view from the bedroom and private deck is spectacular – looking acr
host_about:
Tyrone and Hailey made the tree change in 2010 to build their dream home in Warburton.  Tyrone built both the Warburton Arch House and Lilly Pad, designed by local architect firm Soft Loud House Architects.  The entire build was covered by TV show Grand Designs Australia and aired in 2012.  

Tyrone is an artisan builder & sculptor and  built everything on the property from the house to the dry stone walls, the waterfall and native garden.  Hailey is a social entrepreneur that builds partnerships between corporate Australia and charities.  Both live and work from the Warburton Arch house but travel also.

Tyrone is passionate about fly fishing, science fiction, good food and landscape sculpting.  Hailey is known for her gourmet salads (inspired by Ottolenghi) and her quirky sense of humour.  Both appreciate elegant food, good wine and quality conversation.  We're friendly, thoughtful and proud to share our dream home with new people and provide a little distraction from the busyness of daily life.  

Tyrone's ambition for 2017 is to be accepted into the Sculptures by the Sea competition and Hailey is very excited about her upcoming stage appearance alongside His Holiness the Dalai Lama.

We are more than happy to recommend good walks, cafe's and wineries or we can leave you to enjoy the tranquillity - whatever you choose.

host_about:
Hosting people in our lovely old B&B home is what I do. With a lovely team of helpers, we run the award winning Captains Retreat B&B as well as numerous apartments and cottages here in beautiful, historic, waterside Williamstown.  

Interests: Art, Music, Sport, Travel, Movies, Good Food, Good Wine, Good Company and not last by any means Animals, in particular Cats. (note though that Simba and Leo (my so called Lions) are not allowed int the guest part of the house). 

Our lovely old home is just one door from the water, marina and restaurants and has been tastefully renovated so that every room has ensuites (some with spas) and half of the rooms also have gas log fires. One of the rooms has its own private lounge and balcony but other guests can enjoy their choice of two shared lounge rooms as well as a large north facing balcony and delightful private walled garden. 

Other than beds (which are new and very comfortable!!),  I love to buy antique and pre-loved furniture and  have them restored using classic and sometimes quirky fabrics. 

I'm proud to say that we have won numerous awards including 'tourism' and 'hospitality' at the Hobsons Bay region Business excellence awards (3 times) as well as taken out the People's Choice award for the state of Victoria twice in the last three awards. 

Most of our guests are business people or travellers so you can be assured of a quiet, relaxing and private 'home award from home' experience. 
We look forward to welcoming you Williamstown.  
- Melissa

name: Graceburn Gardens: Juliet Room
summary: Graceburn Gardens is in Healesville in the heart of the Yarra Valley and a stone's throw from wineries, a wildlife sanctuary, restaurants and boutique shopping surrounded by glorious scenery. Our historic home and exquisite garden offer the perfect spot to relax. Rated #1 Best Value B&B on TripAdvisor.
space: Graceburn Gardens is an Arts and Crafts historic home and garden, lovingly restored with luxurious modern comforts. There are three spacious and distinctively styled bedrooms each with their own bathroom to choose from. We also offer luxury self contained accommodation in our poolside Gallery. This listing is for the Juliet Room which has a spacious ensuite bathroom with large shower recess, toilet and generous size vanity. Please enquire if you would like to book more than one room or for more than one night. Enjoy exotic curios, antiques, open fires, climate control in your room, a spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries and a lavish cooked country breakfast.
host_about: Keith and I feel privileged to live in Healesville in the Yarra Valley where gourmet produce, first rate wineries and breweries and fabulous restuarants and cultural destinations are close by. The mountain scenery from our garden is breath-taking. We have immersed ourselves in restoring our century old Arts and Crafts style home and glorious garden and we love nothing more than looking after guests and giving them a taste of the best that Healesville has to offer. A favourite shared memory is climbing a mountain in Cambodia and reaching the summit to hear Santana belting across the valley welcoming villagers to a wedding. Our home features many travel momentoes in harmony with family heirlooms and all the modern comforts. We take our cue from our guests in getting the balance just right between pampering and maximising privacy.
