host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

It offers a dining and lounge area with a minimum 42-inch flat-screen TV including 30 Foxtel channels including movies and sports. There is a secure entrance and elevator access in the building.  Our team at Corporate Keys will be your main point of contact and will endeavour to make your stay hassle free, from our consultants that will meet you 24 hours a day to check you in, to our Operations staff that are there if any maintenance is needed. name: Charlotte's Eyrie - Sustainable luxury
summary: Embrace the charm and serenity of Charlotte’s Eyrie. Set amongst 10 acres of trees with views into the valley and the night lights of Healesville, Charlotte’s Eyrie offers luxurious accommodation just 7 minutes from Healesville town centre. This off-grid property embraces sustainable living and strives to create a unique experience for your Yarra Valley getaway. Your suite includes a spacious queen bedroom, sitting room with fireplace, bathroom and terrace. Modest weekend surcharge applies.
space: Weekend packages can be tailored to your specific needs. Book your accommodation and decide which additional goods and services you require to make your weekend special and memorable. Half and full day winery tours, car service to and from attractions and functions, celebratory packages and delicious platters are available for you choose from. If there is anything else you wish to add we will endeavour to organise it for you. Local and home grown produce is used where possible to create delicious cuisine.  Order a cheese and charcuterie board and relax with a bottle of wine from your winery tour. Take afternoon tea on the terrace or in front of a cosy fire or request a platter of canapes to enjoy in the comfort of your suite. Breakfast is included in your accommodation tariff. Beautiful parrots and kookaburras frequent the terrace, and the resident wallaby and wombat put in an appearance periodically. name: LUXICO - Casa Elwood
summary: Add some authenticity to your holiday siesta at Casa Elwood. Situated in the inner-Melbourne suburb of Elwood, this two-level Spanish-inspired family home meets your relaxation and entertainment needs. A large games room, alfresco dining, four spacious bedrooms and free-flowing indoor living is sure to please both young and old. And to complete this picture-perfect Melbourne escape you have beaches, parks and shopping close by.
space: Warmly welcoming your arrival with decorative archways, columns and a detailed entrance door, Casa Elwood embraces a sunny, relaxed mood. Once through the entrance, timber flooring, a neutral palette and thoughtful traditional touches are on display.  As you walk down the hallway to the rear of the home, the open plan living, kitchen and dining takes on an edgy, contemporary design while the indoor-outdoor lifestyle takes centre-stage. Floor to ceiling doors, dark cabinetry, black steel and geometric patterned screens feature throughout the space.  From the sleek kitchen with its dark cabinetry and contrasting white island bench, to the spacious dining area, living room and reading nook, this is a family-friendly zone, so you can be part of the conversation no matter where you are. The family-friendly nature of this home continues outside.  Preparing a family BBQ is a breeze with the large outdoor table and timber deck.  But if you’re seeking some time alone, escape to the outdoor timb
host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

space: You cannot get closer to the beautiful township of Healesville than this. Enjoy the café life of Healesville simply by walking out the front door or sit and relax in front of the cosy gas log fire after cooking up a storm in the modern well appointed kitchen.  Situated on the main street just a stones throw from the cafes and restaurants that Healesville is famous for, a short stroll to the lovely Queens Park, a 5 minute drive to the famous Healesville Sanctuary and a 10 minute drive to most of the Yarra Valley wineries. Not only that but you are only a 30 minute (approx.) drive from Marysville or an hour from the snowfields of Lake Mountain.  Beautifully appointed upstairs apartment with 1 queen sized bedroom and 1 double bedroom, open plan modern living, with gas log fire to keep you toasty warm in winter, split system cooling for those warmer months and outdoor entertaining area with BBQ facilities. We are an independently owned short stay company that specialises in managing, servicing, setting up, and maintaining a wide variety of your property. A lot of time and effort have been put into to ensure that their guests check in to a comfortable home, that feels like a home away from home.

Our goal is to maximise your returns, we will ensure rigorous tenant selection, managing and maintaining your property to the highest industry standard. We’ll go the extra mile to earn the trust of property enthusiasts and landlord, and believe in providing the highest level of service in all areas of our expertise. Each crafted unit is our pride, so leave your property with pros who really care.

name: Lovely Family-Friendly Home Close to City & Beach
summary: Light-filled and welcoming family home. Open-plan living, dining and kitchen. Lots of toys for kids, and books, music for adults! Plus off-street parking. Large rear garden with trampoline, sandpit and room to play ball. Located in Newport, only 9km from the city, with good train and bus access. Good choice of cafes nearby. Close to Williamstown and bay beaches, plus Newport Lakes. Yarraville is close by, known for its excellent restaurants, bars, shops and the local cinema, the Sun Theatre.
space: It's a lovely family home with an enormous back yard. You will have it all to yourselves; we will not be there. There are lots of toys and room for kids to play. We have an outside dining/BBQ area with outdoor speakers which is great for outdoor entertaining. We have a large smart TV and surround sound speakers, fantastic for watching movies.
host_about:
Hi there,

We are a friendly family that live in Newport, a leafy beachside suburb very close to Melbourne's city centre and bay beaches.

We enjoy spending time together at home and also travelling. We have travelled to many different countries and have a good understanding of what it's like to be overseas visitors. That's why we have made our home as comfortable and accessible for you as possible. 

We enjoy gardening and spending time outside, and have an enormous backyard that is great for outdoor entertaining plus very kid-friendly! 

We also love music and books and have a good collection if you're interested in reading (with lots of books for children).

name: Mel Airport <5 Minutes: Private Suite!
summary: Only a few minutes drive from Melbourne Airport the ultimate stay over for the travelling professional, traveller(s) and budget conscious guests.  Private suite with its own bathroom, toilet, shower and kitchen facilities that provides free bottled water, tea, coffee and cereals. The suite comes with both heater and air conditioning to ensure that you have comfort all year round. Take advantage of shared court yard with beatiful garden.
space: Comfortable single room with double bed, shower and toilet, kitchen with fridge and breakfast table or use as a desk, iron and board, double door closet to hang up your travelling gear. Kitchen is supplied with all utensils if you need to cook up something quick at night.
host_about: Unknown

name: The Real Melbourne (Entire house)
summary: A charming vintage home with a sunny courtyard and friendly, helpful hosts. Great location and atmosphere. Close to everything! We list a room usually but sometimes our whole lovely home may be available  :)
space: Situated so close to the center, our home offers a unique Melbourne experience. As locals we have both lived all over Melbourne but we choose this suburb for it's location, beauty and community. As creatives, aesthetics are very important to us. Our home is kitschy and interesting, it is not a 'same same' place. It is something special! Our home is usually inhabited by myself, a 33 year old Artist, my partner Shannon, a 36 year old Music teacher and our two small and friendly pets, a pug faced cat named Sharron and a little sleepy dog named Finnigan (They are actually friends with each other) Our house has a wonderful garden with a courtyard for enjoying the outdoors. A living room, music room that doubles as a bedroom using two single futon beds, with many records, c.d's and guitars. A master bedroom with queen size bed and a third bedroom that we call the guest room, it has a double bed.  It boasts a large fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. I also have a pokey little art studio in
host_about: Hi there! I'm Sarah, a 35 year old Melbournian artist/art therapist. I'm happy, relaxed and easy going. My main interests are in arts and culture, which is why I love living in Melbourne so much. I have lived in this city for over 10 years and know it like the back of my hand. Having grown up in Victoria I also have local knowledge of  many wonderful places to visit in this state, if you would like any travel advice be sure to ask. I am fairly well traveled and have lived in London and Germany. I share this beautiful Victorian home with my husband Shannon, a 38 year old music teacher, a  baroque guitar specialist and all round top guy! (though I would say that!) Shannon is a music nerd and a fine cook. We both enjoy cooking and eating. There are so many fantastic restaurants from many cultures in Melbourne so we are really spoiled for choice. To sum us up, we are happy, creative people who love our city and the culture that surrounds us. We are both guests and hosts on air bnb, so we understand what makes a great stay. We hope you choose to stay with us. Best wishes and happy travels!

name: WELCOME TO THE LAKEHOUSE. WIFI/BREAKFAST INCLUDED.
summary: A private room for you to enjoy, complete with quality bed linens, sheridan towels, fast wifi and continental breakfast options. We are in a quiet area of Melbourne with transport options to the CBD and the airport a 15 min cab ride away. Near a nice lake and parklands area. If you love coming home to a wagging tail, this is the place for you.
space: My home is situated in a quiet part of Reservoir right at the back of Coburg.  We have a beautiful lake and park with great athletics area and walking tracks. There is cafes, shops and utility stores in the heart of Reservoir and plenty in surrounding suburbs. I have listed some in the house manual for you :)   The house is fresh and very clean.  I have a dog named Ollie who is very friendly, but you must like dogs to stay here as he is an indoor/outdoor dog and will be inside the house with us.   We have unlimited fast internet.   Breakfast options available. Lots of different cereals, milk, bread, spreads and plenty of teas and coffee for you to help yourself to.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Carmen :) 
Live for travel, good food, coffee and dogs! 
I love Australia and enjoy giving guests tips to see our beautiful country outside of the city. 
I am also a respite foster parent for our first nations children, when I'm not hosting Airbnb guests in my home. I have a passion for protecting our first nations people and protecting their culture and land. I am open minded, queer accepting and believe in building connection, not bridges. 
As a guest, I'm very clean and appreciate a fresh set of linen and a comfy bed.  I have a laid back approach to travel and my Airbnb stays and would much prefer to be immersed in culture, than resort style living. 
I enjoy meeting new people from around the world and connecting over food. Food for me, means connection. 
I work full time running my Airbnb management business that helps hosts throughout Melbourne run their Airbnbs and assist their guests. 
I am a responsible guest who will leave your home very clean. If my dogs are travelling with me, I will always clean up after them, supervise them and keep them off your furniture. My boys are very well behaved and are used to travelling and staying in new places. 
I look forward to hosting you sometime or being a guest in your home :)

host_about:
LittleStay is a boutique short stay company specialising in homemade hospitality. We are passionate about traveling, exploring, and sharing. Bitten by the travel bug when we were young, we love to jump on a plane and explore the world. Spending our days and nights away from home with new friends, exchanging our experiences, and building new unforgettable memories. LittleStay is here to help create those memories. 

That's the idyllic part, but in our real life we all have bills, mortgages and obligations that we wish we could leave at home and don't have to travel with.

Consequentially LittleStay was born to help with that dream, a company that allow people like us and others to travel, live, experience or start a new life without the everyday struggle of life back “home”.

LittleStay wants you to feel comfortable entrusting us with your largest asset. We will consider your home our home while we manage it. It is our reputation on the line if something is amiss. We do not take that lightly.  LittleStay wants you to be a part of our LittleFamily. We value your partnership and thusly, if you are holidaying and want to stay at one of our properties, you’ll receive insider rates. You can even reserve your own property for your family and friends that are visiting. 

We take care of virtually everything. Our level of cleaning is second to none. Our customer service is beyond compare. Our commitment to you, the owner, our guest, our community is unquestionable. 

We believe a happy home is a filled home so if you have a property that is not happy, please contact us to see how we can help you. 

Or if you're one of our amazing guests helping us, please let us know how we can make your stay more enjoyable. 

Warmest Regards
The LittleStay Team

My favourite way to travel is to hunker down in a temporary home, and spend some time in a little neighbourhood and experience life as a local. I love trying new foods- and prefer local favourites to splashing out at fancy restaurants (though that has its own appeal).

I enjoy walking everywhere, and have a shopping habit. I love baked goods and a great coffee.

name: Home away from home - Prahran
summary: Beautiful 2 bedroom flat in Prahran/Armadale. Our lovely suburb is both near and far enough from the world's most liveable city. It's accessible to everything you may need while also being in a quiet, peaceful suburb.
space: Our two bedroom apartment is on a block of only two. We live with our gorgeous dogs, Poppy and Harriet.  The upstairs apartment is occupied by Courtney's Mother and her AirBNB guests. We have a great yard, an abundance of on street parking, and an outdoor clothes line. We have a  washing machine and provide washing powder too. We do have a dryer but prefer only to use it if absolutely necessary. The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with everything you may need. We have a bookshelf stocked with various types of books including some travel guides and novels (though they're mainly cook books and food guides ;) There's also board games. If we don't have something you want to watch, you can certainly download it on WIFI (which is included) or use the Chromecast to stream your entertainment to the TV in the bedroom.  Your bedroom has a really comfy quality bed, fresh linen, desk, fan/heater, lamp, towels, a mini fridge, some hanging space, and an extra blanket for those chilly night
host_about:
Courtney - Downstairs apartment:
I'm a 29 year old disability support worker in Melbourne but originally from NZ. I love to travel, eat, drink wine, play with dogs, make cakes and hike. 

John - Downstairs apartment:
I'm a 29 year old insurance professional originally a small country town in NSW called Merimbula. In my spare time you'll find me building or flying drones, doing woodwork, eating or drinking craft beer. 

Angela - Upstairs apartment
I'm a 60 year old originally from NZ. I enjoy reading, crafts, dining out, wine and chatting.

Sharing 1 bigger bathroom and 2 toilet, kitchen and 2 living room(TV, Projection,X Box), also sharing toys and books to kids. We will try us best to make you feel comfortable!
space: We have many technological machine to make the house clean and comfortable.  *Our front door is Coded Lock, we will give you the code before you come *We use Telstra network and WIFI signal cover the whole house and full time *Water clarifier could instant heating water, enjoy your coffee or tea anytime *We have download 200+ movies you could enjoy them on Projection just like in theater *X Box 360 is a sensory game machine to play and do some exercise *2 sweeping robot keep room clean everyday

Located only 7 km from the City Centre, 3km from the popular St Kilda Beach and only 15 minutes walk to Melbourne's famous night life, shopping district, and popular cafes, exploring sites couldn't get any easier! Whats more is there is a tram stop right outside the apartment taking you all popular destinations!  Please note, this is an apartment so guests need to be respectful of noise level to neighbours.

space: Unknown
host_about: I'm Alice, a 23 year old medical student from Melbourne Australia. I'm in London for a placement at St Thomas' Hospital for a few weeks. I've done quite a lot of travelling and love meeting new people and exploring cities. I love cooking and am always down for a G&T.

name: Relaxing oasis in great location.
summary: We have a spacey three bedroom ground floor apartment. It's a relaxing oasis in a great location close to trains, 24hr trams and buses, Chadstone, the famous Chapel Street & St Kilda beach. 17 minutes train ride from the CBD and all sporting venues or concert halls.
space: Whether you're coming to Melbourne for business or pleasure our apartment is perfect.  My adult daughter Bri and myself have a beautiful apartment that we have made relaxing away from the bustle of the city. The building was only built seven years ago, so all of the amenities are near brand new. We sit in the middle of 6 ground floor apartments and our neighbours are all friendly.  My daughter Bri is a nurse and I'm a kindergarten teacher. We both have a passion for traveling with over 20 countries visited between the two of us, a fair chunk traveled through Airbnb. We both love to meet new people and share experiences.  We have a cat Lola who is super friendly and promise won't ask to sleep in your room.  The apartment has an open living floor plan with the bedrooms either side of the living area. One of us should nearly always be home to welcome and greet you. If not we will message instructions on how to enter. We look forward to meeting you.
host_about: Unknown

name: 2BR CITY PAD+STUNNING WATERVIEW+PARKING+NETFLIX
summary: * 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms apartment. * Stunning view right on your balcony and bedroom! * FREE unlimited WIFI/Internet * Located in Free Tram Zone (CBD)! * Close to Crown, South Wharf, Etihad Stadium, Southern Cross Station (Skybus). * Lots of shopping and cafes around!
space: This modern and contemporary apartment is set in the best location to enjoy all Melbourne has to offer. Stunning views towards north and west of CBD, Docklands and Southern Cross Station. The apartment is filled with an abundance of natural light. Enjoy the convenient Melbourne CBD living style with shops and cafes across the road. There are even a Woolworth Supermarket and an Asian Grocery shop just across the road. Tramlines are at your doorstep. The free city circle tram is just a 1 minutes walk from the apartment. A short stroll will bring you to the Docklands, Crown Casino and Entertainment Centre and South Wharf DFO. - Stunning view and sunset view of the Docklands and Victoria Harbour. - Secure access to the building and apartment.  - 2 bedrooms, each bedroom featuring ceiling to floor windows and each fitted with a queen-sized bed. Linens and towels are provided. (sleeps 4) - The Master Bedroom is ensuite with your own private bathroom!  - 2 Bathrooms (one ensuite) with shower

name: Balwyn Stunning Home King-size+Carpark+WiFi+Aldi
summary: Hello guests, I'm Eric, it's my pleasure to invite you to live in my stylish and brand new 2-bedroom 1- bath 1-carpark apartment with the lovely balcony located in Balwyn North. It showcases contemporary style and a clever integration of indoor/outdoor living areas. The amenities include security entrance, heating, cooling, free Wifi, TV, fridge, washer, hair dryer, oven, toaster, microwave and rice cooker and iron.This apartment is perfect for families, couples or solo travellers.
space: The larger-than-average floorplan features a spacious lounge/dining zone adjoined by a massive balcony. The kitchen is impressive finished with smoked splashbacks and Smeg appliances as is the bathroom with its European-style laundry facilities. The open plan living/dining zone has access to a sweeping balcony which provides an excellent space to dine or recline with friends. It is designed by Jam Architects, this stunning home is one of 35 boutique apartments surrounded by parkland and public transport options. On the ground floor is an ALDI supermarket which makes up part of the Greythorn Village Shopping Centre.  Run out of bread or milk? Pop downstairs, problem solved without leaving home. The bus from Westfield Doncaster to the CBD at the door. Park + Ride and Eastern Freeway minutes away.
host_about: Married, with a boy and a girl.  I love traveling with my family to see this world, experience the different lives. Thanks to the people who trust me, I am more than happy to welcome you to stay in my place.

name: Luxury Southbank 2BR apartment

space: Modern, clean and convenient apartment close to Crown without the $400 hotel price tag.

host_about:
Hi. my name's Sam, from Melbourne Australia - I love travel - I've been around the U.S. a couple of times and a number of places in Europe and S.E. Asia
.
I'm an IT consultant by profession - I've just finished a long-term role in Australia and am looking to indulge my wanderlust for a few months.

I'm a quiet, considerate, person who's been sharehousing for years and of course that works only based on a respect for others' property and space.

I speak a little German - I'm just a beginner but it's a fun hobby.

name: Resort style living in a modern 2 bedroom home
summary: Fully furnished 2 bed room 2 bathroom modern apartment in scenic Abbotsford.  Located in the middle of a both urban and natural landscape, we have the Yarra River on our door steps and a 10minute tram ride to the CBD, with easy access to MCG and Tennis Centre.  Across the road we have the Victoria Gardens Shopping Mall, Ikea, Hoyts Village Cinema, while within our complex, we have two of Melbournes best Cafes, a heated 25-metre pool, gym, sauna, yoga studio, rooftop spa and a cinema room.
space: The Apartment is in Melbourne's most sought after area, has two bedrooms and two bathrooms with a large court yard that leads directly onto the foot paths along the Yarra River trails and a secure car parking onsite.  Kitchen with stone bench tops and mirror splash back, dishwasher, gas stove top and refrigerator. Split system reverse cycle to lounge room. There is NBN broadband and a 55 inch TV.  You have also have the use of the roof top spa, BBQ area, dining area, swimming pool, gym, and theatre room.  The 109 tram outside the complex goes straight to the Melbourne CBD in 10-15minutes Cafés on site.
host_about:
Hi there, I recently moved to a regional town for work and would love to share this wonderful space with you.

I'm a half Japanese male who is very open to communication and happy to have a chat or to give you the space you need. My aim is to provide you with the best possible holiday while you stay here in Melbourne! 

I like nature, music and most of all good food and company. 

I'm an avid traveller and have a variety of interests. My favourite activities varies from outings to the beach or having a picnic to having a cosy night in with a movie/book and a nice home cooked meal :) 

I hope that you have an amazing holiday at our apartment and get to enjoy the  amazing cuisine, activities and nature that our lovely city has to offer!

space: The house is comfy and spacious with quality items in the kitchen for cooking.  The bedroom is clean, comfortable and bright. Queen size bed with new linen, fluffy towels and a built in-robe to store your things. Freshly painted and newly laid floorboards, it’s the perfect place to relax and feel at home in.
host_about: A lawyer by trade and an avid traveller by heart, I've just set up my profile to host guests in my home.  I'm looking forward to meeting people from Australia and all over the world.  I'm a friendly and easy-going person who respects people's need for space and privacy.  I hope that I can contribute to you having a great stay in Melbourne!  P.S. The dog in the photo does not live at the property unfortunately!

summary: Welcome to a beautiful modern apartment in an amazing location: Chadstone the Fashion Capital, St Kilda, Elwood and the CBD all within a 10-20 minutes drive. Enjoy one of the local restaurants only a few minutes away or take advantage of the fully equipped kitchen. During the evening unwind on your luxurious sofa and watch a movie on the 50" 4K TV with Free Netflix!
space: A beautiful two bedroom apartment situated within the sought after area of Brighton East in Bayside, Melbourne. Our apartment offers modern, spacious living with off road parking. Just moments away you will find public transport, restaurants and shops.  Only a short drive to:  - St Kilda Beach, Restuarants and Bars. - Chadstone the Fashion Capital. - Center Road Restaurants and Cafe's. - Melbourne CBD (20 minutes). - Monash University (only a 10 minute bus ride from the bus stop a 2 minute walk away). This apartment is perfect for families, couples or solo travelers. If you are looking for a modern, safe and relaxing place to stay, this is it. We have tried our best to provide everything that you could possibly need for your stay, regardless of how long you're staying and will always be available to lend a hand if you need it.  We look forward to hosting you soon! APARTMENT This recently renovated modern apartment has plenty of space and has everything you need, with a washing machine,
host_about: Hi my name is Mike, I run a boutique short stay management business called Ready Set Host and have many hand picked properties across selected areas in Victoria. We love being able to help you find accommodation that will fit your every need so please don't hesitate to contact us. We really enjoy what we do. We hear from guests all over the World and have learned so much about the needs of our guests. We have used all this knowledge and hope we can bring it together for you in meeting your experience.

name: Pomegranates Port Melbourne Studio Apartment
summary: Pomegranates is a fully furnished studio apartment for short-term stays, located in Port Melbourne, Australia. The apartment: •is self-contained and has all the conveniences of a well-appointed home •accommodates two people •is very close to the city, the beach, parks and public  It is ideal for those who seek home comforts while travelling. We are child and pet-friendly. Please read our Pet Policy below before enquiring.
space: Pomegranates is a studio apartment located near the corner of Williamstown and Todd roads, in Port Melbourne, an inner-city suburb 5 km south-west of Melbourne. Just around the corner, a quiet residential beach overlooks the city and the piers. It’s a short walk along the foreshore to Beacon Cove, where the ferry to Tasmania and the international cruise ships dock. From Beacon Cove you can take a tram to the city (downtown).  From Pomegranates studio apartment it’s a short drive or bike ride to Bay Street and neighbouring suburbs that boast boutique shopping and excellent restaurants, cafes and pubs. And there are beautiful walks that start right on the doorstep. In the Neighbourhood •Easy access to public transportation with two bus lines within two blocks and the tram line (109) to downtown/city just 20 minute walk along the beach board walk. •350 meters to Port Melbourne Beach  •2 km to Beacon Cove (Port Melbourne piers with cafes, general store) •7 km to St Kilda's Fitzroy and Acla
host_about: The property is owned by a family of 4 (Yvonne and Max and two young adult children) and is at the rear of their family home (semi-detached from owner’s house). The owners like to rent their back unit to friends, acquaintances and friends of friends, and guests when they are not using it themselves.

name: Dream Apartment
summary: Located 15km from Melbourne CBD in the SE suburb of Chadstone, and its fantastic Shopping Precinct of 423 stores this brand new apartment is a dream in shared accommodation. Ideal for a single / couple offering your own Room & Bathroom, economical, clean, safe living and friendly company. 30 % discount for monthly stays. Public transport to Holmesglen TAFE University and the famous multi-cultural restaurants of Oakleigh not far away. You are welcome and assured of a memorable experience.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Olinda Woods Wellness Retreat - Eco Sanctuary
summary: Just opened in February 2018!  Olinda Woods Wellness Retreat is a self contained cottage with extensive views of a private 3 acre forest. Designed by health & wellness professionals with decades of experience; hosts John, Sue and Autumn oversee this newly renovated hideaway amongst the magnificent Mountain Ash forest.  The focus of this space is on offering you a luxurious resting place, complete with organic towels and linens, a double spa and complimentary organic chocolates.
space: You will share your stay with native kookaburras, the resident wombat and exquisite indigenous flora and exoctic plants. It’s a 3 minute walk to the Dandenong Ranges Botanic Gardens (formerly the National Rhododendron Gardens), a 10 minute walk to the Olinda township and a 20 minute drive to the stunning Yarra Valley. With soft organic cotton gowns and polished floorboards underfoot, bird song in the morning calling from the tree-top views, and organic goodies in the pantry, a retreat at Olinda Woods will leave you feeling rejuvenated and deeply inspired - on every level.  Upon arrival you will find a delicious organic breakfast box to tantalise and nourish, and  we are more than happy to adapt to your dietary preferences.  The living room has been renovated to highlight the panoramic views of the forest, a tranquille moving art installation. In the corner of the living room is a cosy wood burning stove and pre-cut firewood for you to use. In the summer months the cottage is fully air

name: Sapphire 1 bedroom
summary: STUNNING , top floor 1 bedroom apartment AND with access to your own private roof top that boasts THE best views in St Kilda.
space: This contemporary 1 bedroom apartment is situated in the stunning "The Face" building. Breathtaking views from this 3rd floor apartment. Located 6km from the city centre, St Kilda is Melbourne's seaside playground and is much-loved by residents and visitors alike. St Kilda is renowned for its expansive view of Port Phillip, safe sandy beach, palm-lined boardwalk, a huge range of beach activities, big skies, gorgeous sunsets, lovely parks and gardens, great restaurants, bars and cafés, fabulous old buildings, and its colourful past and present. All year round St Kilda is the place to head for fantastic things to see and do and great times to be had. With our great places to eat and drink and our wonderful sea air, everything tastes so much better in St Kilda – so come out and join us! My only simple prerequisite is that you leave the apartment clean and tidy. My prices are fantastic in the hope that I have very little cleaning to do once you leave and that you'll look after my gorgeous
host_about:
25 years in the restaurant industry, a switch to this wonderful life of apartments.  I'm really enjoying looking after you all running between 19 apartments.   You'll love my places, all unique, all stylish and in the right spots for you to explore this wonderful, most livable city in the world- Melbourne.
I'm really well priced with all apartments in prime spots and in great buildings. Happy to help where I can to guide you to all things Melbourne.
Joe Mottola.

name: Spacious room right in St Kilda!
summary: Spacious, quiet room in a modern house in the heart of St Kilda! Filled with natural light, a lovely garden, all the modern commodities & comfort, it's a beautiful house with cafes, restaurants, live music, bars & the beach right at your front door!
space: Unknown
host_about:
I am a traveler, lover of the world, and aerial performer and dancer. 
Currently in Melbourne for a few months, I have been enjoying my time here, discovering the city, its little quirks and corners. I greatly enjoy cooking, sharing a glass of wine, good music, dancing and grooving, a good laugh, enjoying every step of the way, as much as I can! :) Come and enjoy!

You will enjoy,  our  large studio apartment  with en-suite adjoining our family home, with all the creature  comforts, including a lounge,  TV.  We are  located on the Yarra river  . We  have hens , veggie patch and pool .On the door step of the Yarra Valley , with wineries only 10 mins away by car, Or a short stroll to Monsalvat (artist colony) and wedding venue.If you wish to bring a dog please contact prior to booking
space: The studio apartment is approx 40 sq m is self-contained with  en-suite and a kitchenette , lounge area with large flat screen TV.  Much nicer than any hotel room ! There is a small deck in front of the studio and you are welcome to use our bbq. Please note we have limited cooking facilities , being mircowave , BBQ.
host_about: Unknown

name: Views on the border of Mt Dandenong national park
summary: Hi. Our home is in a fantastic location as it borders the Mt Dandenong Ranges National park. The property is 3.5 acres in size and has a walking track that links up with many other walking tracks in the Dandenong Ranges.  PLEASE NOTE: We have recently excavated around the house in an 80 metre radius for the Summer bushfire season. This means that the grounds directly around the house are either gravel or bare dirt. Have a look at photo number 3.
space: The home is on 3 levels. There is a bedroom with a bathroom on the top level. This bedroom does not have a door. The bedrooms on the middle level and basement floors both have doors.  The outlook to the forest is quite incredible. The large deck has recently been re-done and is a wonderful place to spend time.  The kitchen is new and has stone bench tops.  The lounge room is large and has a 65 inch TV.  We do not have Wifi at the property.
host_about:
Hi!
We recently moved out to the Yarra Valley for a more peaceful and quiet life amidst the trees, mountains and rivers.
We have a one year old boy and both work part time in marketing and public relations.
We love to ride bikes on the trails and roads here in the countryside and up the mountains.

Big TV, fully stocked kitchen, washing machine and dryer, unlimited internet, wifi. Heated pool, gym, tennis court and bbq area. Amazing views especially in the evenings.

Free street parking.  Close to Glen Waverley shopping Center and train station. Walking distance only 20 minutes.  Primary and secondary school nearby, bus station within 5 minutes walk.

summary: This place is why you come to Melbourne. In the hipster district, find great restaurants, awesome coffee and the "Thunder Road" brewery around the corner.  The best bit about it is it all comes with convenience and reasonable price. Literally sitting on the tram stop (15min into the city, even closer to the uni) , above an IGA (for any instant grocery needs) with a bigger Coles in walking distance, a park and running track sitting aside the building and also a rooftop  for a few outdoor drinks.

summary: Located in the heart of Brunswick, between Lygon St and Sydney Rd, the house is walking distance from many cafés, bars and restaurants, and only a tram ride away from the city (15-20min) Classic Brunswick home. Lots of natural light. A spacious backyard with fruit trees. Multiple living spaces. Close to cafes, supermarkets, trams and train. Ideal!
space: The bedroom is a large well lit, airy room.  There is a comfy queen size bed, lounge chair, desk, draws for your clothes and hanging space. Perfect for short or long term stays. Either business or holiday

name: Comfy Room Near Highpoint Shopping Center
summary: The modern town house is in the north western edge of Maribyrnong and 250m from a park with Maribrynong river view. It is 10-15 mins walk to Highpoint shopping centre.  Victoria University, Maribrynong sport school, Footscray Hospital (Western Health) River, Parks and Aquatic Centre with Pool are also very close by. 15 mins drive to Direct Factory Outlet Essendon.  Tram and bus stops are nearby appx. 5-10 mins walk. Distance from/to Melbourne International Airport is only 30 mins away.  Located appx. 10 kms from CBD.
space: It is a townhouse in a quiet neighborhood. 5-10 mins walk to the huge Highpoint shopping centre. 2 mins to the park with Maribrynong river view. 15-20 mins drive to CBD or to Williamstown. 60-90 mims to Ballarat. House equipped with everything you need.
host_about: I am a dad of a toodler boy. We like to travel and see the world.  My wife (Yenni) and I are  also an airbnb host.

name: MODERN SOUTHBANK HOME CLOSE TO CROWN CASINO
summary: This fully-furnished, contemporary 1-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Southbank with minutes’ walk from Crown Casino, Melbourne CBD, and surrounding shops. With the tram stop located conveniently at your door step, you'll be connected to all locations throughout the city.
space: This cosy and modern 1-bedroom apartment is fully-furnished, and equipped with everything that you need for a comfortable short-stay. It is suitable for couples, solo adventurers, business or corporate travellers as well as families (e.g. 2 adults + 1 child). Packed with attractions, from endless bars and cafes, to hidden lane ways, beautiful parks, libraries and museums, Melbourne is your vibrant and diverse city waiting to be explored.
host_about: Melbourne CBD, Australia. Young professional, been living in Melbourne my whole life.

name: Thornbury Townhouse
summary: This corner Townhouse is situated in Thornbury next to the darebin creek, which is nice for a good walk.  The house exists out of 3 levels. The first level is the front door and a little area with a desk and a shoe rack. The 2nd level has a dining area and living area plus a kitchen and a toilet. The 3rd level has a bathroom - Shower over bath and toilet, plus two bedroom - One kingsize and one queensize.  There is free parking around the block and there is always plenty of space.
space: This is a near to new townhouse and has ducted heating throughout the house. A gas stove and an all-in one oven (gas/grill/defrost/supercook). There are a few board games available in the house  (scrabble and life), a 55" tv with access to Netflix (so plenty of Movies and tv-shows) and there is access to plenty of tea and coffee. A little playground and a bbq just at the front of the house.

host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

summary: Discover the best of Melbourne from my spacious 2 BDR apartment. With monumental views over Albert Park and out towards Port Phillip Bay, and the heart of the CBD within walking distance -providing easy access to Melbourne’s iconic attractions- you will love this great location!  Enjoy the resort style facilities - including a pool, a gym, and a rooftop with a sky-high outlook and a BBQ.  Great for couples, friends or a family - live like a local for your next Melbourne escape in this top spot!
space: Situated in a tree-lined street in a premier building, and between two of Melbourne’s most iconic parks on the city’s edge, you just couldn’t get a better location.  Guests will love the resort style building facilities, which include a rooftop garden, a heated indoor swimming pool, a gymnasium, concierge and a resident lounge with free Wi-Fi and kitchen facilities. There is also secure undercover parking available.  The apartment is modern and spacious and has and large open living area with a very comfortable sofa.  Enjoy nights in with a movie streaming on the smart TV and glass of local wine!  Doors open up to a large balcony - a wonderful place to relax in the morning or the afternoon, and enjoy the views across Albert Park out towards the Bay.  The kitchen is beautifully fitted out with everything you need to really live like a local and prepare meals at home.  Stop in at the nearby South Melbourne Markets and pick up some top quality local produce. The kitchen comes with first c
host_about: Unknown

name: The Cabin_set on 36 acres
summary: A truly unique and secluded property with spectacular views over the Yarra Valley, Warramate Hills and the Dandenongs. Set on 36 acres of forest in the heart of the Yarra Valley with an abundance of wildlife, bushwalking and sunsets. It is easy to forget Healsville town centre is only a 10 minute drive away and is perfect for a little shopping or visit the Fresh Farmers Market for some local supplies. Not far also is the Four Pillars Gin Distillary, TarraWarra, The Chocolaterie and so much more.
space: Wake up to the sunrise from the valley and the most magnificent view. The large open plan living and dining area has a fold down double wall bed and a large fire place to keep you warm and toasty. Comfortable bunk beds for kids or adults in the single bedroom with direct access to the shower room and compost toilet. The cabin is perfect for a group of four but can accommodate an extra guest with a single fold away bed that can go in either in the living space or dining area.
host_about:
My husband and I have been fortunate enough to have spent many years travelling throughout many parts of the world and we have met some wonderful people and experienced their very gracious and generous hospitality along the way.
It is now our time in life to share our home (and our home away from home) with other travellers from near and far. 
Thats not to say travelling is no longer a passion - it's more the road is a little less travelled.

name: Bacchus: Ultimate city pad, architectural icon
summary: In the heart of cosmopolitan central Melbourne, Hero is one of the best buildings in town. Living in this stunning makeover of a classic modernist office block, you'll appreciate the luxury of top-class furnishings and original artwork and enjoy fantastic views from your balcony or living room.  > 24 hour check in > Early check in / late check out may be possible > Luggage storage available > Ideal for leisure or business visitors > Ask me about special long term rates
space: Treat yourself to a stay in a real home in Melbourne's central city, not a bland beige box. Bacchus was fully renovated in 2017, with top quality furniture and fittings, giving you a sophisticated home away from home.  From the moment you step inside onto the plush pure wool carpet, you can relax in your own city refuge.  The apartment boasts a large bedroom with a comfortable queen sized bed and quality linens, well equipped kitchen and bathroom (with bathtub),  and a wonderfully light living area with a balcony and great views over Melbourne's booming city core. The second bed is in a private annex at the entry to the apartment, which is also a comfortable place to relax, giving you a second living area.  In Melbourne for work? The apartment is very close to the eastern end of Collins Street, famous for its collection of high-end corporations and consultancies in the towers above the global fashion boutiques.  The more eclectic fashion trade does a roaring business along Little Colli
host_about: I've lived in Melbourne all my life - well, almost. I'm semi-retired and frequently go travelling. Since I've had such great experiences with AirBnB, I thought it was only natural that I list my home for visitors to Melbourne.

name: Outlook Hill Vineyard & 5 Cottages in YarraValley
summary: Welcome to Outlook Hill. 5 well established and reputable cottages set upon a 60-acre vineyard of rolling hills offering stunning panoramic vistas of the Yarra Valley. Each cottage is heated & airconditioned with comfortable sleeping quarters for 4 and a balcony with Other facilities include indoor spa, fireplace, balcony/patio with outdoor furniture and communal BBQ area.
space: Outlook Hill Vineyard Cottages is the perfect venue for those looking to escape the concrete jungle to a land of pristine natural landforms and breathtaking sunrise and sunsets. Watch from the comfort of your living room or the cottage balcony the hot air balloons taking flight in the crisp fresh morning air over the rim of your mug of hot coffee.  Spend the days exploring the Yarra valley region with numerous famed wine makers within a 5 to 15 mins short drive. Or relax at Outlook Hill’s own ponds and outdoor entertaining areas with BBQ. Throw another log on the fire and toast a marshmallow on a skewer before you dip into your own private spa and call it a night. Each cottage is heated & airconditioned and sleeps up to 4 with a queen bed and large convertible sofa bed. Simple kitchen facilities are available with fridge, cooktop, microwave and tea/coffee making equipment. Highly sought after accommodation with extremely positive reviews on trip advisor. Come see for yourself!
host_about:
We are not Real Estate Agents. 

We are home owners. Our properties are owned by local Australians who are working hard to pay their mortgages and are willing to share their treasured homes with guests from all over the world. This means that we genuinely care about the properties we offer and the services that are available to guests during their stay.

We are accommodating. Regardless of the purpose of your stay, be it for work, a family holiday, a relaxing vacation, a school tour, a family gathering or a special occasion, we love to welcome people to our properties and we always aim to go above and beyond to ensure that your stay is memorable. We will be the first to offer you a safe place to stay should your home be affected by natural causes or if you are waiting for building to be completed. We can accommodate your group no matter the occasion and our homes are the perfect place for you to make unforgettable memories.

We are caring. We cherish our properties, tending to them regularly and treating them like they are our family members. Each property has a unique character and story to tell and we love that we can offer so many diverse homes for our guests to enjoy. Whether you're looking for a slice of history, a unique shape or an out-of-this-world location, we have something to suit every occasion and budget.

We are respectful. We pride ourselves on the 5-Star experience that is offered to all guests from the time of booking right through to your departure. You can expect open communication throughout but we will always respect your privacy and allow you to enjoy your stay. We ask that you are also respectful of our properties, understanding that not every listing is a 5-Star luxury hotel with concierge service but a wonderful space for you to feel at home.

We are good listeners. We support, update, improve and look after our properties to the highest standards and we love to make improvements wherever we can. While we cannot remove the noisy traffic in the CBD or the rocky roads in rural areas, we will always aim to do our best to ensure that your stay is as pleasant as possible. Please let us know if there is anything that we can improve on.

We are welcoming. We welcome all of our valued guests with care and we love being the reason that your trip was faultless. The walls of our homes are filled with the stories and memories of so many people and we hope that we can offer you the perfect place to make memories of your own. 

Why are we not Estate Agents? Because we are so much more.

host_about: Relaxed, happy, colourful house with loads of room indoors and outdoors. Beautiful landscaped garden with outdoor eating in front or back yard, a loaded orange tree and apples on their way, a deck, grass .... lovely.  People say it is a 'zen' front yard. I grow a few herbs, apples and oranges, any of which you are welcome to if you are here when they are in season. This Airbnb offers quiet time or company, you choose. I am an Australian who has travelled,  lived in 4 countries, and enjoy hosting very much.  My life motto comes from a song and is:  "And I think to myself ... what a wonderful world".

Everything we needed was provided and we were very comfortable. * *Thanks again Dilin for a wonderful stay in your apartment. You were a fantastic host who ensured the comfort of his guests
space: Great 23rd floor apartment in the heart of the city.  * Unlimited wi-fi * Foxtel Platinum - Cable TV * In apartment washer and hanger that is free to use * Balcony with great views * Rooftop Spa/BBQ/Cinema My place is close to Queen Victoria Market so you've got Melbourne's best shopping and fresh food at your finger tips. Close to Melbourne Central, RMIT, Melbourne University and the CBD. You’ll love my place because of the location, and the amenities provided. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. The beauty of our fair city is best experienced first hand. Walk our streets. Ride our free transport. Soak in the atmosphere of cosmopolitan Melbourne. Our apartment's central location offers a great proximity to all of Melbourne's best attractions. And once you're done exploring? Come home. Put your feet up. Get comfortable.  We've got everything you need to make yourself at home. Washing facilities provided so you can save more room in your suitcase for
host_about:
I'm a traveller first and foremost, though Melbourne has been my home for the last 18 years. Born in the UK, I've traveled substantially and have always enjoyed seeing new places through the eyes of locals.

What I love most about Airbnb is the fact that I can share beautiful Melbourne with people from all over the world. As a local, I'm always here to help show you the best sites and tastes of the world's most livable city.

For me it's important to provide a consistent and excellent service to our guests. We consider your satisfaction our profession, and spend a lot of time working on improving everything from the layout of our apartments to the information provided in our welcome packs. 

We want your experience to be flawless from start to finish, and work hard to ensure this is the case.

name: Graceburn Gardens: St Leonard Room
summary: Graceburn Gardens is in Healesville in the heart of the Yarra Valley and a stone's throw from wineries, a wildlife sanctuary, restaurants and boutique shopping surrounded by glorious scenery. Our historic home and exquisite garden offer the perfect spot to relax. Rated #1 Best Value B&B on TripAdvisor.
space: Graceburn Gardens is an Arts and Crafts historic home and garden, lovingly restored with luxurious modern comforts. There are three spacious and distinctively styled bedrooms each with their own bathroom. This listing is for the Saint Leonard Room which has a separate bathroom just along the hall for your exclusive use with shower, double vanity, toilet and small bath. There is also an additional option of luxury self-contained accommodation in our poolside Gallery. Please enquire if you would like to book more than one room or for more than one night. Enjoy exotic curios, antiques, open fires, climate control in your room, a spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries and a lavish cooked country breakfast.
host_about: Keith and I feel privileged to live in Healesville in the Yarra Valley where gourmet produce, first rate wineries and breweries and fabulous restuarants and cultural destinations are close by. The mountain scenery from our garden is breath-taking. We have immersed ourselves in restoring our century old Arts and Crafts style home and glorious garden and we love nothing more than looking after guests and giving them a taste of the best that Healesville has to offer. A favourite shared memory is climbing a mountain in Cambodia and reaching the summit to hear Santana belting across the valley welcoming villagers to a wedding. Our home features many travel momentoes in harmony with family heirlooms and all the modern comforts. We take our cue from our guests in getting the balance just right between pampering and maximising privacy.

name: Spacious-Prime Location-3BR-Resort Facilities
summary: Modern Apartment with Everything! space: Our apartment is an medium size space with beautiful light from every room, as we're on the top floor we get a nice view of the city too. We've got a small balcony where you can relax and enjoy the breeze. Our space is particularly unique due to the colourful artwork on our walls!

We're both pretty big fans of underground electronic music, abstract art and vegan food.

name: Queen Room Beautiful Hostel Best location near CBD
summary: Private room with Queen bed + a rollaway bed & minibar in Beautiful Mansion Can sleep 3 people. Good room size 12sqm Free parking 5pm-9am. 2P Otherwise Free breakfast, pillow, blanket, soap, towel Free WIFI, Netflix & Outdoor Cinema Easy self check-in 24/7 Walk to North Richmond station, ALDI, Safeway & MCG Airport Shuttle nearby Only 1.5km to CBD We can help you book tours, hire car/bicycle, store luggage, laundry & purchase myki Host speaks English, Chinese, Spanish & Russian
space: The Mansion has 5 superior private queen rooms, 5 small budget double rooms and 4 bathrooms. Spacious clean and comfortable without the price tag. The location is one of most sought-after suburbs east of CBD. The superior private rooms each has a queen size bed (plus a camping bed if you have more than 2 people), whereas the small double rooms each has a double bed. This booking is for the superior private room with queen bed, not the little double room. All queen rooms are about 10-12sqm in size, fully equipped with wardrobe, tables, furniture and fittings, power points, reading lights, pillow and linen. Free WIFI, blanket, soap & shampoo, towel, bread, tea & coffee also provided. Shared facilities include a communal kitchen, a TV lounge area, a courtyard, backyard garden, a guest coin laundry and dryer. We can also help keep your luggage for early check-ins or late leavers. Host can speak multiple languages: English, Chinese, Cantonese, Spanish, Malay and learning Russian. Would love
host_about:
Hello my name is Frank, and I am a full time young professional in Melbourne.

 I love my job, believe in what I so, love travelling, love the concept of bed and breakfast, and would like to share this 'home' experience with you. 

I understand the need for privacy, cleanliness, keeping everything simple, have someone just a phone call away and a host who cares!

I am an experienced hosts but fairly new to airbnb itself so please feel free to take full advantage of the good price now while I work on getting 100+ good reviews =)

Having been to over 70 countries, hosted over 300 guests and speak about 6 languages. I guess I will have plenty to share with you!

name: South Yarra cosy studio close to 3 major parks
summary: Comfortable studio perfect for 2 people aiming to spend a great time together. The apartment is very well located, right beside Fawkner Park, it is just a short walk either to Albert Park or Royal Botanic Gardens. Public transport is right in front of your door with bus 246 to St Kilda and tram 58 to the city. South Yarra train station is just 7 minutes away walking and it connects you to everywhere in Melbourne. Shops like 7 Eleven and IGA Xpress are 5 minutes away, ATMs are also available.
space: Unknown
host_about: I am brazilian and I have been living in Australia since August 2016. I am a food engineer profesional and at the moment I am working in the quality department of a big factory here in Melbourne. My partner and I live together in a great studio located in South Yarra, we love the location and the neighborhood.

name: Sunny Room in Collingwood Warehouse
summary: Great sun filled room in a converted warehouse in the perfect location, surrounded by Melbourne's best cafes, restaurants and bars.
space: Our warehouse apartment is located one block from trendy Smith Street's many great restaurants and bars and 5 mins walk to Brunswick Street, Fitzroy. Tram 86 takes you directly to the CBD in 10 mins. The available room is spacious and has a queen size bed. Please check your dates before booking! The room is available from the 7-12 April. You will have your own private bedroom (with queen size bed) and access to the whole apartment. Spacious living area with ping pong table, full kitchen and bathroom (shower and bath).  More than happy to provide local info on Melbourne and give tips on what to do while you're here! The apartment is in the heart of trendy Collingwood in Melbourne's inner north. It's a fantastic, creative area. There is always lots going on - especially at this time of year. There are plenty of great bars, restaurants and galleries all within walking distance in the Fitzroy/Collingwood area.  The location is extremely convenient - a 20 minute walk to the centre of the ci
host_about: 30 year old professional relocated to Melbourne after 3 years working in London!

name: Modern Living in Fabulous Fitzroy
summary: This is a two bedroom, two bathroom townhouse with an open floor plan kitchen and living area upstairs. We are located in the heart of Fitzroy, one minute from Smith St and 7 mins to Brunswick St. Tram 86 to the city is 120m away. Perfect location!
space: Downstairs: 2 bedrooms (each with one queen bed) and two separate bathrooms. One bathroom is ensuite and the other is nearly ensuite, just next door to the second bedroom. Upstairs: open floor plan kitchen, dining, and living area. The kitchen is fully equipped and the dining table seats four. One wall of the living room is a giant, sliding glass door which opens onto a balcony - our favorite feature of this house!
host_about:
Hi, I'm Barbara. I'm originally from Philadelphia but moved to Melbourne in January, 2015. I absolutely love it here! I love to travel and enjoy meeting new people. In my free time I like to run, bike, hike, eat tasty food, drink tasty wine, and of course spend time with friends and family.
I'm new to hosting on AirBnb but I'm looking forward to sharing my home with friendly people. Fitzroy is a wonderful place to live and I look forward to showing others just how great it is!

name: Luxury Penthouse with Amazing views
summary: This great apartment has everything!  - 3 large bedrooms all with ensuites - a large lounge with views to the city, river and bay - a separate fully appointed kitchen and dining room - a great location on the corner of Flinders and William Street - 2 secure underground Car park spaces
space: The most amazing thing about this apartment is its breathtaking views. There is literally a great view from every room! It is also very spacious and in a great location, within in easy walking distance of major attractions, shopping and restaurants.  Whether in Melbourne on business or leisure the apartment is a great space to base yourself. The large entry and hallway leads to the dining and kitchen area, then onto the bedrooms (each bedroom has its own ensuite!) and large lounge room with balcony overlooking the Yarra River, Crown Casino,  Southbank Promenade and out over the Bay. The large master bedroom has a comfortable king size bed and a fantastically appointed ensuite, complete with spa bath. The second bedroom is also large with a queen bed and ensuite. The third bedroom, currently with a queen bed, will soon be replaced with a split king bed so that it can either be made up as a king bed or split into two king single beds,  depending on your needs.   The lounge features comfo
host_about:
Hi, I'm Mark a 45 year old professional golfer. I'm originally from the UK but after coming to Australia for nearly 20 years to play the pro tour here I have decided to settle in Melbourne, one of my favorite cities in the world.

I have traveled the world extensively both for golf and pleasure, and enjoy meeting people from different countries and backgrounds.

I also run several other airbnb listings in Melbourne , you can see them here on the link below:



    https://www.airbnb.com.au/users/12189664//listings?user_id=12189664&s=50  


Apart from that enjoy cycling, reading, eating out and especially chocolate (and lots of it, don't leave any lying around :-)

I look forward to meeting you and showing you this fantastic complex and city.

Cheers Mark

There is a free Tram service that runs through the CBD allowing for easy travel to the great array of cafes, unique laneways, restaurants and events that Melbourne offers.
space: Room 1: The master bedroom. It has a queen sized bed, closet and views of the Melbourne skyline  Room 2: A secondary bedroom that fits 1 single bed Room 3: Lounge room couches that can fold out into 2 single beds or join up to make a queen size bed, a great space with surrounding views of the city lights.  Bathroom: Comes with Towels, hair dryer Kitchen: Fully equipped with pots/pans/knives/cutlery/cups/dishes Amenities: Washing machine/Smart TV/Microwave/Fridge Pool/Gym: Located on Ground Floor  We care about you and hope you have an amazing time in our city! Welcome to our home in Melbourne!
My name is Dana, I have a passion for architecture and design and am a keen traveller. I love meeting new people especially those from different cultures. I’ve been living in Melbourne all my life and have discovered quite a few gems in Melbourne’s labyrinth of alleyways. Melbourne offers a great scene of art, food, bars and events, and it would be my pleasure to share all my favourite places with you!

space: This is a wonderful older style family home. The kitchen and dining are located centrally in the house and the large separate living area opens on to a north facing deck with a small garden and grass to play. There is a sand-pit and basketball ring in the back yard (rear studio not for use).
host_about: I live in Melbourne's inner north. I am a Project Manager in the field of public health research at the Royal Children's Hospital. I love the company of friends and family, a good book, dancing, good coffee and being a mum. I have traveled to many parts of the world including Asia, India, Europe and the US and have spent time living and working in London, Osaka and Amsterdam.

The apartment features a quality, fully equipped kitchen with lots of cupboards, finished with stone benches, stainless steel appliances & integrated dishwasher, designer central bathroom, additional ensuite (incl shower) off the Master Bedroom, European laundry, 2 bedrooms with built in robes and a large open plan living area. space: Come relax and unwind in our spacious, tastefully styled house that will leave you rested and eager to stay again. All guests receive a complimentary bottle of wine in the fridge, plus a gourmet welcome hamper including tea, coffee, jams, muesli, milk and some tasty treats. host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

summary: Rm 11 -Single Occupancy private lockable room. Typical guests, professionals 23 - 40 yo All bills, Linen & Towels inc.
space: The property boasts high quality internal fixtures and fittings: a fully equipped kitchen with granite bench tops, chic bathrooms with porcelain finishes. Generously proportioned deluxe single rooms, have warm timber tonings, quality fixtures and fittings, where the focus is on comfort and convenience in a friendly and inviting environment and a ready made home away from home. host_about:
Hi, my name is Valeria. My husband Ben and I own and manage a number of upmarket guesthouses located in the inner Melbourne suburbs. 

We specialise in offering a new and unique opportunity to overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, teachers and other business specialists to gain superior inner Melbourne accommodation and lessen the stresses of moving to a new town, new state or a new country.

We offer fully furnished, centrally located properties with plenty of parking and quality fixtures and furnishings, each has an alfresco entertainment area and BBQ in a garden setting, a fully equipped property in an exclusive professional apartment house environment, where new arrivals, to Melbourne, or people going through a lifestyle transition, can experience an instant community atmosphere for medium (from two weeks), or long term stays, and say goodbye to lonely, restrictive and expensive apartment living.

No more solitary TV dinners! Each property provides apartment house accommodation on a room-by-room basis with shared kitchen, dining and lounge facilities. This style of apartment house living provides opportunities for new arrivals, to Melbourne to quickly, form friendships, build networks with other likeminded people and settle more easily into a new life. This helps to alleviate homesickness and improves their effectiveness in the workplace or place of learning.

A safe and comfortable home life makes for a happier Melbourne experience.

Typical Tenant Profiles

Flexi (Hidden by Airbnb) is open to a wide range of people from professional backgrounds usually between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) years of age. Typical residents are overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, corporate and career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, nurses, teachers and other specialists or people in the throes of re-establishing a home and life in Melbourne.

Ben and I hope you choose to stay with us and we have the opportunity to make your stay in Melbourne a life long happy memory.

summary: Located only 90 metres from the South Yarra station (two stops from the city centre), this charming and convenient Art Deco apartment, with a private double room and shared bathroom, is the perfect base to explore the world’s most liveable city.
space: The apartment's double bedroom, with a large shared bathroom, is available for reservation. It would suit a solo traveller or a couple looking for a comfortable space, while providing ready access to shopping, sporting events and Melbourne's festivals. Equipped with a desk and WiFi internet (included in room rate) it is also ideal for professionals working short term in the CBD/inner city. Coin-operated laundry facilities are available. A residential parking permit allows on-street parking for one vehicle free of charge. *Please review the house rules for this listing before submitting a reservation request.*
host_about:
Hello, I am a professional working in health (epidemiology). I enjoy travel, films, keeping fit, good food, and learning more about the world. I am friendly and hospitable, and look forward to meeting new people.

I have lived in South Yarra for 7 years (returning to my home town after 6 years away working in Belfast and interstate). I love Melbourne and enjoy exploring all it has to offer (including museums, galleries, restaurants), and I would be delighted to share my knowledge of my lovely city.

Some of my favourite travel experiences have been those where I have stayed in apartments or pensions and felt like I was getting a local's perspective and real sense of the city's essence. I hope that people who stay in my convenient and charming Art Deco apartment will feel the same.

name: A Twist of Willow Host Farm
summary: Enjoy a truly memorable overnight experience, being able to enjoy some of Australia's most iconic farm and native animals. A Twist of Willow is ideally suited to families and small groups who would like to see and experience something different.  We have animals from kangaroos, emus, quoll, crocodile, dingoes to  miniature horses, sheep, alpacas, chickens . Guests staying are welcome to join us for a free nocturnal tour to interact and meet our sugar gliders, tame kangaroos, dingoes and more.
space: Interact with our native and farm animals. Meet our sheep, chickens, horses, aviaries during the day, pick some citrus from our orchard when in season and then learn about and meet some of our native Australian wildlife if you join us for a free nocturnal tour. The Lodge has its own outdoor and BBQ area. Foxtel and Wifi. We supply free tea and coffee.
host_about: Our family has a passion for farm and native Australian animals, kangaroos and emus included at A Twist of Willow.  A truly unique Aussie experience. We love seeing people relaxing and enjoying.

The other room   has a small kitchenette with fridge, microwave, kitchen sink  and living area.  The kitchen has cooking utensils, toaster, coffee plunger and a single induction plate if you want to cook a simple meal. There is also a small electric BBQ on the back-deck. The day bed in this room can be used as a single bed if there are two guests who want separate sleeping arrangements or a third person. There is a small TV in the bedroom and a TV/DVD player in the living area. The property itself consists of  13 acres with extensive gardens, orchards and veget
host_about: My husband Tony and I run Lavender Farm.  We have our own house on the property but guests can have complete privacy and only need to see us if they would like some help or suggestions of what to do in the beautiful Yarra Valley.

The Apartment is situated in a location to love, casually stroll to Preston train station, Preston Market,the High Street shops and the Plenty Road tram so you can enjoy the best dining experiences on High Street and Plenty Road. Perfectly placed glazing captures great sunlight throughout the day, while the balcony is a pleasant place to enjoy a relaxing morning or arvo.
space: This new 2 bedroom apartment has an abundance of natural light through the kitchen & living areas and through both bedrooms making full use of the northerly aspect and open unobstructed views. The kitchen includes stunning feature tiles, rose gold accents and of course comes fitted with superior bosch appliances. Other features include split system heating and cooling.
host_about:
I’m very easy going, relaxed, hard working, and fitness enthusiast who also explores different cultures and foods!

 I moved to Australia in 2009 from Galway Ireland and fell in love with the many different aspects of culture that Australia has to offer. It’s an incredible country. 

I have lived a lot of my time in Sydney and moved to Melbourne to further my career. Sydney has beautiful beaches and Melbourne is a Metropolis of diversity and some absolutely amazing food. 

I always find it best to travel with Airbnb as its always best to get the locals perspective on local things to see and do. Hotel Concierge will recommend something they are told to recommend a lot of the time. I also enjoy sharing my apartment with other travellers, and meet people from new cultures.   Feel free to contact me with any questions you may have.

summary: Welcome to Collingwood - The coffee capital of Melbourne.  Our beautiful brand new 1 bedroom apartment is a hop, skip and a jump away from Melbourne's CBD and is located in the heart of Melbourne's hipster cafe centre.
space: Our beautiful one bedroom apartment is located just off bustling Smith St. It is easily accessible by the number 86 tram or via Collingwood and Victoria Park train stations, both of which are just a short walk away. As part of the apartment complex you will also have access to a rooftop BBQ area and a seperate pool area which you can see from our window! This will be the perfect addition to your stay during the summer months.

This lovely house has 5 unique bedrooms, comes with its own spacious private bathrooms; plus 1 study room on top (fitting in a double size sofa bed). It is walkable distance to train station and Williams Landing shopping center. Around 20 mins drive to CBD, within 25 mins drive to Tullamarine internal airport and Avalon civil airport.
space: Williams Landing takes approximately 20 mins to Melbourne CBD by vehicle and only 15 mins walk to Williams Landing train station. It's also close to shopping center with various cafes, restaurants, medical clinic and pharmacy.

name: ★The Ox and Peel★ Cosy. Best locale. All you need.
summary: New apartment in the best spot in Collingwood, just off Smith and Gertrude streets. Excellent cafes, bars and restaurants on your doorstep. Walking distance to the MCG and Rod Laver Arena for all your sporting needs, or walk to the Melbourne Museum, Royal Exhibition Centre or the Abbotsford Convent to get your culture kicks. This cosy apartment has everything you need to feel at home. Suited to couples, singles, friends, LGBTQ and you can even bring your doggo if they're happy in an apartment.
space: The apartment is decked out in hotel quality linens, plush towels and a super comfy Danish designed couch (doubles as a sofa bed). The apartment may be small but it is mighty!  There is Netflix/Stan and high speed Wifi if you'd like to settle in. Plus a desk if you're here for work.  It is situated on the ground floor of a 7 star energy rated building that is two years old. The apartment has air conditioning, hydronic heating and ceiling fans to keep you comfortable in Melbourne's notorious four seasons in one day weather!  There are so many excellent cafes, restaurants and bars in the immediate surrounds that you could easily spend all of your time here without venturing farther than a two block radius.
host_about:
I'm from Melbourne, Australia. So naturally I love a good coffee and brunch! I'm always on the lookout for great cafes when I go travelling.
My husband and I have put our first home, our Collingwood apartment, up on Airbnb due to my husband getting promoted to Canberra. We love the apartment so much and decided to Airbnb it instead of renting it out so we can still come and stay when we're in Melbourne. I wasn't ready to give it up! And I hope other people love it as much as we do. 
My wonderful friend Cade looks after it for us now.
