name: TREEHOUSE APARTMENT with FERNTREE FOREST VIEW
summary: Delight in a unique rustic, authentic & organic private property in fresh air, defrost from technology. A 50min drive from Melbourne. Historical 128+ yrs old RAIWENA, oldest Nobelius homestead located in the hills of Emerald! Relax, peaceful, romantic, spacious, tranquil 2 acre terraced gardens with a stream awaits you. Panoramic 180 view of nature/forest from your own very private floor. Highly suggest 2-night stay to really experience re-energizing! WEEKDAY SPECIAL AVAILABLE, check calendar...
space: Raiwena is an authentic historical rustic, organic private estate. A true oasis located in the hills of Emerald originally built in 1891, surrounded by trees dating over 128+ years with terraced gardens. Of architectural & local significance, modernized in 1930's & 50's. A panoramic view of nature at its best from a very spacious open plan bedroom/living area. You have your own private entry/exit, bathroom. Fridge, crockery, cutlery, kettle, toaster & microwave only are provided in apartment! We recommend takeaway places in the area, bakery, cafes & restaurants. This is a place to really just chill (less cooking) put your feet up, enjoy your snacks/nibbles, glass of wine/beer! Take a train ride on Puffing Billy or cycle along the lake. Emerald Museum & Park is free to the public. Close to the Mt. Dandenong/Yarra Ranges: Sherbrooke Forest, Kallista, Gembrook. Also an ideal place for your wedding night before your trip elsewhere; Wifi very limited to certain areas of the property, for a
host_about: My wife Marvi and I both city people, made a tree change to Emerald. We reside in the main part of house-upper level, are a peaceful & friendly, relaxed couple. We are generally around doing some gardening during our spare time or doing small projects around the property. We made up the lower level as a private organic apartment below us for total relaxation, chilling out, enjoyment of music & view of nature.  We look forward to your bookings! 2 nites is always a better value & really get to bring your stress levels down!!!

name: Modern, Spacious 4BDR St Kilda Home
summary: We love St Kilda; a vibrant area close to everything. Chapel, Acland or Fitzroy Street or maybe the beach, It is a short train trip to the MCG, Tennis Centre or CBD. A very comfortable home, Plenty of Natural light in every room.
space: Our home was built 9 years ago with a reverse living set up (kitchen, lounge upstairs-all bedrooms downstairs). It's in a quiet street and has a very green treetop view. It has all the modern conveniences you will need. Master Bedroom #1 - King Bed + Ensuite Bedroom #2 Queen Bed Bedroom #3 Double Bed Bedroom #4 Queen Property has a Laundry with Washing Machine and Dryer, however, the studio in the plan is not available.  We have both Foxtel & Netflix
host_about:
I'm a Dutch girl living in Melbourne (Australia). I love Australia but being European I always feel the need to travel & experience new places.

My husband (Glenn) and I have two beautiful boys who are growing up way too fast (12 years old & 21 years old). I've been working as an Interior Designer for the last 15 years. Our oldest son is living in Europe at the moment.

We love good food, good company, great coffee,  yoga, and most of all learning from others. Typically we find we are able to share experiences with our guest and we aim to enrich their stay in Melbourne.

Large wardrobe in Master bedroom with ample hanging and storage. Bedside tables with reading lights Bed linen and towels provided. name: Monika, MAGNIFICENT warehouse aptmt
summary: This expansive warehouse is in the heart of Collingwood's historic Foy & Gibson warehouse precinct-  just around the corner from Smith & Gertrude street's vibrant cafe, bar & restaurant scene. The perfect place to explore Melbourne from!
space: This expansive warehouse is in the heart of Collingwood's historic Foy & Gibson warehouse precinct, just around the corner from Smith & Gertrude street's vibrant cafe, bar & restaurant scene. The eclectically furnished apartment offers a vast living/dining zone opening to a timber kitchen, bathroom, separate laundry and a big loft-style bedroom with powder room. Featuring Baltic pine floors, recycled detail and soaring ceilings.
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

host_about:
Oaks on William is one of Melbourne’s newest hotels and serviced apartments. Located on the fringe of the city’s dynamic business district, it features trendy furnishings and offers sophisticated luxury. 

Exuding contemporary Melbourne style and charm, our brand new 4.5 star Oaks on William includes over 250 superbly appointed serviced apartments – comprising studios, studio park view and studio park deluxe and 1 and 2 Bedroom Apartments – all boasting modern amenities and chic furnishings. Each studio has been designed to include full kitchens, free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning, a profusion of modern appliances and private balconies – some with enviable views over the skyline, famed laneways and manicured lawns of Flagstaff Gardens.

The hotel lobby features a collection of bespoke artworks by a handful of renowned Australian artists and designers for guests to appreciate, adding an element of distinct sophistication.

summary: Our apartment is well-located (20 min walk or 5 min car ride to MCG) & has creature comforts such as hairdryer, amazing cooling/heating, building complex gym. We leave a printout of  the best restaurants, bars & cafes in the area so you don’t have to worry about researching on Broadsheet or The Urbanlist!  Building is a 1 min walk to cafes, restaurants,bars, transport and a 5-10 min car ride to city. There’s a rooftop terrace with a stunning city & sunset view, enjoy it with a glass of wine!
space: It’s a light and airy one bed with sliding doors to a balcony so plenty of fresh air! The couch is really comfortable if you need to relax after exploring Melbourne and the air con works SO well during those 30+ degree days! There’s a stunning rooftop Terrace that guests can use on level 10 as well as a fully equipped gym on Level 4. There’s an aquatic centre with a full gym and classes plus a sauna literally across the road if you’re really into your fitness. Even though it’s centrally located its very quiet and extremely secure (keys only grant residents access to their level and common areas).
host_about: I'm from Melbourne, Australia. I work in digital marketing and absolutely love travelling, fashion and brunching.

name: Spacious 1BEDROOM 3kms to beach sleeps4
summary: !Home Away from Home!  Spacious 1st floor, 1 bedroom apartment Free wifi.  30 mins to the City Centre 3kms  to St Kilda Beach 2 beds, sleeps 4  Private car parking for a SMALL car Free, unlimited street parking for a large car Some traffic noise  Please read the WHOLE listing and submit everything that has been requested, otherwise, we will have to cancel your reservation, so please ensure you've read the whole listing, thank you.

I cannot host any guests without this information, so PLEASE make sure you do this when you are making an enquiry. Thank you!** *We do our best to provide an accurate and honest description of the apartment, please read ALL the information before making an enquiry. Please acknowledge that you have read the full listing in your enquiry*  **Living room can get noisy with traffic noise, please do not book if this will be a problem. The bedroom has double glazing so it is much quieter, but it is not suitable for people who want a completely quiet environment. **  A large, 1st floor, 1 bedroom apartment, lovingly decorated with a warm retro interior.  Great option for those visiting family, or moving to Melbourne.  Perfect for families or groups of 3-4 people   Very spacious apartment

space: An apartment is an apartment right? So its all about how welcome you feel, how good your room is, and how comfy your bed is...for 1 or 2 guests you will not be disappointed.
host_about: Im an easy going person with a good sense of humour who loves to travel myself, so will be able to use that to make sure you have a great stay with me. The open plan living zone is spacious and bright ensuring a fabulous environment for hosting, eating and chilling out. The apartments northern orientation also allows wonderful views of the city and the MCG, which you can enjoy whilst firing up the BBQ provided on the gorgeous decking area.  All the bedrooms are only furnished with luxury and comfort in mind ensuring relaxation throughout your entire stay. host_about:
Founded in 2006, the Boutique Stays Accommodation Group is an accredited tourism business providing quality houses and apartments to singles, couples and families in Melbourne. Distinguished by a commitment to high property standards, impeccable presentation and personalised customer care provided by a team located in the bayside suburb of Port Melbourne. 

A bespoke collection of 60 homes in Melbourne’s most iconic and popular neighbourhoods are handpicked to make guests feel at home with peace of mind that a dedicated, professional customer service team are ready to support each and every guest seven days per week.  A range of one, two, three and four bedroom homes are available in a choice of twenty suburbs in Melbourne for guests visiting family and friends, holiday makers travelling with or without pets and business travellers.

The Boutique Stays Accommodation Group has welcomed over 4,000 guests and 150 pets into our homes in the past year and look forward to welcoming you for your first or return visit.

space: Hi everybody, this is a two bedroom apartment with bathroom, kitchen and a living room. It is located in the heart of Melbourne, precisely in the CBD. Definitely convenient if you are looking for a place to stay while visiting the city: it's close to trams stops, buses stops, main trains stations, super markets, restaurants, parks, shops, pubs and the vibrant life of Melbourne. name: Syracuse: The best views in town
summary: Location. Views. Style. Comfort. Sunlight.  You know Melbourne as a great city to visit and enjoy, and there is no better place to explore the city than from the centre of town ... at Syracuse.  This modern apartment is in best part of this cosmopolitan city. Boasting great northern views, full sunlight throughout the day, and a full width balcony, you will enjoy every minute of your stay. A secluded bedroom, huge bathroom, and full kitchen ensure a memorable visit.
space: In the heart of this cosmopolitan city, Hero is a stunning makeover of a classic modernist office block. At Syracuse you'll appreciate the luxury of top-class furnishings and original artwork and enjoy the fantastic views from your balcony, bedroom, and living room. Treat yourself to a stay in a real home, rather than endure one of the many bland beige boxes.  Syracuse was renovated in 2018, with quality furniture and fittings to give you a sophisticated home away from home. From the moment you step inside, you can relax in your own city refuge.  Interested in architecture? Search for "Hero" or "Nonda Katsilidis", the architect, for some background on this great building.  In Melbourne for work? The apartment is very close to the eastern end of Collins Street, famous for its collection of high-end corporate offices and consultancies in the towers above the global fashion boutiques. The internet has no data limit so you can use your subscription to Netflix or Spotify without a problem.
host_about: I've lived in Melbourne all my life - well, almost. I'm semi-retired and frequently go travelling. Since I've had such great experiences with AirBnB, I thought it was only natural that I list my home for visitors to Melbourne.

name: Cosy corner of Richmond with large private garden
summary: Relax in this recently refurbished spacious ground floor apartment.      With a huge private garden filled with pretty flowers, a private parking space, spacious living and dining area complete with Smart TV and a kitchen with all the amenities you could need, including a coffee machine. Enjoy vibrant Richmond and all it has to offer.  The apartment is within close proximity to the MCG and the surrounding sport and entertainment precinct and is a 15 minute tram  ride to the heart of the City.
space: Bedroom: The bedroom is fitted with a comfortable queen sized bed and topped with hotel quality linen and towels, professionally cleaned after every stay. The built-in wardrobes contain hangers, shelving, an iron and ironing board and enough space to store your luggage. Living Room: Relax on our comfortable couch in front of a flat screen smart TV. Garden: Soak up Melbourne’s four-seasons-in-a-day weather! From the bedroom, you can access the spacious and beautiful garden, which is private just for you! Enjoy sitting outside at the garden table and admire the pretty plants.  Kitchen: Our fully-equipped kitchen comes complete with an oven, cook top, cooking utensils, appliances (microwave, coffee machine, kettle and toaster), a fridge and basic pantry supplies for those times when you just want a home cooked meal. Carpark: For those with a car, yes, this apartment does come with its own car parking space. Located just down the street, the carpark is easy to access. Bathroom: The bathroo

During your stay you will have a dedicated bnbpal point of contact who can help you out with anything. Arranging airport transfers, a restaurant recommendation, whatever you might need is just a phone call or text away.

No kitchen as such, but a microwave, fridge, kettle toaster and plug in hotplate plus basic cooking gear. Great location, minutes to trams, train, the CBD, zoo, hospitals and two universities.
space: This is the downstairs level of my home. Until a little while ago it was occupied by my two children, but they are all grown up and making their way, so now it makes a charming self-contained apartment with two large rooms, one a bedroom/study and the other a living room with sofa bed, plus a bathroom and small laundry. The bedroom has a queen sized bed, wardrobe and desk. The other living room/bedroom has a television and a daybed that doubles as a couch and can pullout to create another queen sized bed, or can be used as a single bed. This room also has a fridge, plug-in induction hotplate, dining table, microwave toaster and kettle. You have your own entrance, your own bathroom and a washing machine. While I am available upstairs if needed, there is a locked door between us and your privacy can be total. There is no kitchen as such, but with a fridge, microwave, hotplate, toaster and kettle, plus basic crockery and cutlery, I have provided everything you need to get breakfast and pa
host_about: I am a writer and in recent years an academic. Now empty nesting following the departure of my youngest child for university, I am renting out the self-contained lower half of my house. I love where I live. Flemington is a great community and so close to the city. I'm a keen traveler and I've used Airbnb myself, so I know what makes for a good experience. I'll respect your privacy but be here if you need anything.

host_about: We love to travel when the opportunity arises, especially the overseas winters in places such as Switzerland, Japan and New Zealand. We enjoy being Airbnb hosts because it's fun and love meeting people, we have met some interesting travelers which some have now become friends.

name: LUXICO - Delbridge Terrace
summary: Take some well-earned time out and be a part of the trendy urban scene of Fitzroy North in this stylish single-story Victorian terrace. Indulge in the spacious, contemporary interior and secluded sun-filled outdoor entertaining deck, which easily lends itself to warm relaxing mornings or long evening meals. With two stunning bedrooms and period details throughout, Delbridge Terrace truly is the perfect home for a superb Melbourne break.
space: Exuding sophistication, luxury and charm Delbridge is worthy of its highly desired northern inner-city location. An eye-catching all-white exterior, traditional Victorian terrace façade, delicate iron lacework and a cosy front verandah makes a memorable first impression. The availability of on-street parking makes this home even more appealing.   Once inside, the harmonious arrangement of new and old elements creates a warm, relaxing and refined interior where the white colour palette invites those traditional features to stand out: polished floor boards, high ceilings and hallway arch. At the front of the terrace are two generous sized bedrooms. The main bedroom offers a touch of romance and elegance with detailed cornices, polished floorboards and a decorative marble open fireplace. While the second light-filled bedroom takes a more laid-back approach. At the end of the hallway is a free flowing open plan living/dining/kitchen which has an endless supply of natural light due to a lar
host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

name: Spacious Apartment Near Beach & Cultural Hub
summary: Sip a morning coffee on your private balcony or head out to Melbourne's thriving cultural scene just beyond your doorstep.  Unwind in this bright, open living space featuring modern, homely furnishings and colourful interiors. While the apartment boasts many features, its location is truly alluring. Here, you can explore Melbourne's city and all it has to offer, while only being minutes from the beach too.  This is the perfect base for anyone looking to make the most of their stay.
space: Modern, comfortable and in the heart of St Kilda,  this single-bedroom apartment is the perfect front to explore Melbourne. The home features a private balcony, fold-out sofa bed and is only seconds away from some of Melbourne's most prominent restaurants, cafes, parks and public transport.  Enjoy! The space: Heating/Cooling Wifi Washing Machine The kitchen is set up with European appliances, cookware, and utensils. MASTER BEDROOM - Luxury queen size bed - Side draw - Built in robe - Hangers and shelves - Inside is an iron and ironing board BATHROOM - Fresh towels - Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap - Hair dryer - Toilet rolls KITCHEN - Complimentary coffee, tea, sugar, milk - Refrigerator - Dishwasher - Stove, oven - Pots, pans, dishes, silverware, mugs, cups, cooking utensils - Tea towels LIVING AREA - Fold-out Sofa Bed - TV - CDs, DVDs - Couches, chairs - Coffee table DINING AREA - Table and chairs PRIVATE OUTDOOR BALCONY -Seating and Dining LOCATION - Great, inner city location
host_about:
G'day,

I'm Joel, i'm born and raised in Sydney, which is in my opinion one of the most beautiful major cities in the world. My goal in life is to one day visit every country in the world, I hold no bias to any of them and hope that I get the opportunity. So far I have visited 42 countries. Last year I spent 1 year travelling in South and Central America and loved the opportunity I had to learn Spanish. It was a great experience and one that I will never forget. 

My hobbies include all forms of board sports, skating, surfing and snowboarding primarily. I enjoy learning about new cultures especially their foods. I grew up in an Italian restaurant so my love for food and cooking is deeply engrained in my personality. 

My style of hosting and living life in general is pretty relaxed. I will do my best to greet you at the door and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. But if you just want to chill I can totally relate. 

I also love music and watching live music. I mostly go out to see House, deep house and techno music as that scene in Sydney is easily accessible. However at home you will find me listening to hip-hop, reggae, latin, afro-beat, jazz and anything with a smooth and funky beat. 

If you need recommendations about food or music in Sydney these are probably my two strongest topics, so please don't hesitate. 

Looking forward to meeting more crazy, fun and cool people through Airbnb. 

Joel

name: Comfy, Modern Apartment near Great Restaurants
summary: Gaze over the city lights through the floor-to-ceiling windows of this neat, modern apartment. Warm wooden flooring and contemporary furnishings lend an ambience of functional urban savvy. The building features a shared rooftop BBQ and garden lounge.
space: Our apartment is always full of light and inviting. Night time views from the lounge are beautiful and best enjoyed with a wine! Its a great relaxing space with plenty of room for 4 adults for short or long term. Comfy beds and modern bathroom.
host_about: Unknown

name: STYLISH TOWNHOUSE, HIP LOCATION!
summary: You won’t find a better spot to experience Melbourne. Stay in a gorgeous townhouse in Collingwood next door to Fitzroy & walk to the best eateries & bars. 3km to CBD by tram, train or free bikes. Designer touches, courtyard, parking, Netflix & WiFi!
space: This is a brand new listing, but I've used Airbnb around the world and learn from the best - my mother is an Airbnb superhost; for peace of mind read her reference on my profile, or even her reviews here: www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/403876?s=wz4S39ff. As a journalist and designer, it's our jobs to know the city and our pleasure to show friends and strangers around. Collingwood is the hottest suburb in Melbourne, which is why we've decided to open our home to others so they can experience it too.  Our stylish townhouse is perfectly positioned 400m from Smith Street. With Collingwood on one side and Fitzroy on the other, this is the best spot to stay in Melbourne if you have an appetite and appreciate culture. Keep your eyes peeled for street art, markets and more coffee than you can drink in a month.  Ideal for travelling friends, two couples, a sensible group or even a family. The entertainer's courtyard is perfect for a cheeky vino, the working space and WiFi ensure you won't fall behind
host_about:
Truer words have never been spoken than "eat well, travel often". I live my life according to the three things I love most: food, travel and words. 

I'm lucky enough to be in a position to combine my work and hobbies. I'm a journalist with a copywriting business (Word Salad) and I pen pieces about food and travel for newspapers, magazines and online publications. My partner, Matt, is a graphic designer and also works in the hospitality industry.

I think I live in one of the best cities in the world… but there's no harm in visiting others every now and then, just to make sure!

name: BEAUTIFUL 3 LEVEL TOWNHOUSE - EASY CITY ACCESS
summary: Beautiful, peaceful 4 bedroom home with 3 balconies overlooking the Merri Creek and parklands. The house has 3 toilets and 2 bathrooms, as well as heating and air conditioning. You will have full access to the whole house including the fully equipped kitchen, laundry (washing machine and dryer), lounge area and carpark. Fast, wireless internet is also included in the cost. We also have a cleaner who comes weekly so guests can be ensured of a clean home at all times. Cleaning costs included.
space: Your new Melbourne home is a 3 level townhouse and comes fully furnished. All 4 bedrooms are also fully furnished with double beds, heating, fans, desk, chair, lamps and built in robes. There are 2 bathrooms (one with bath) as well as one extra toilet.  The master bedroom is also very large with an ensuite bathroom (with bath), reverse cycle heating and cooling, as well as a lovely balcony overlooking the Merri Creek. One other bedroom also has a large balcony overlooking the Creek and parklands.  Parking is provided. There is one dedicated carpark and lots of other free parking within a few meters of the house. The house overlooks the Merri Creek and bushlands, so it is very green and lush! We live in a very quiet street so you can relax here with just the sounds of the creek and the native birds. There are eucalyptus trees right outside the house. The creek also has a lovely walking track through the bush which is great for jogging, walking and bike riding. You can also ride your bik
host_about: I am 39 and work as an environmental scientist. My interests include spirituality, yoga, dancing, camping, hanging out with friends and generally enjoying life as much as I can.

name: Spacious 2 Bed Apartment near Casino Complex
summary: The contemporary Oaks Southbank is the newest hotel to join Southbank’s glittering skyline, providing a comfortable and modern base for travellers in the popular arts, dining and entertainment hub of Southbank.
space: Live large in this generously sized 2 bedroom apartment. The apartment is well suited to short or long stays.  It’s got all the basics which means you can relax in homey comfort as soon as you step inside. •Sleep soundly in hotel quality linen •Cook (or don’t) in a fully equipped kitchen •Dine inside or outside on your own private balcony •Freshen up your wardrobe during your stay with in-room laundry facilities
host_about: Providing a comfortable and modern base for travellers in the popular arts, dining and entertainment hub of Southbank, Oaks Southbank provides effortless stays with a collection of one and two bedroom apartments on offer, well suited to singles, couples and families.

name: Stylish beachside renovated 2BR
summary: Our newly renovated ground floor art deco apartment is just a block from Elwood beach and a 2 minute walk to the cafes, restaurants and bars of Elwood village.  The apartment has 2 large bedrooms, living room, separate dining room, brand new kitchen and bathroom, and has been stylishly furnished with new furniture and includes high quality linen to give you a boutique hotel style stay but with all the comforts of home.
space: Our stylish, newly renovated Art Deco apartment is only a couple of minutes walk to the beach and Elwood village cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.   Everything in the apartment is brand new, with 2 bedrooms, living room, separate dining room, kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet.  The apartment will suit any style of travel, from family holidays to weekenders or business travel, we have all the facilities to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable.
host_about: We have 2 young boys so our style of travel is relaxed fun.  We love holidays where we get to spend a few days in a big city to enjoy the food, culture and shopping, followed by a beach resort for some pampering and outdoor fun!

name: Private Oasis -Perfect Location -Ensuite Bathroom
summary: Modern, contemporary style accommodation; bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk in robe overlooking established garden. Access to private rear courtyard with water feature. Peaceful, relaxing oasis only 10km (20-30 minute by car) from the Melbourne CBD; close proximity to bayside beaches; choice of train, bus or tram and Martin Street cafés and restaurants all within 3 km;  Free coffee and tea and wifi. Resident Blue Heeler dog called Jess - super friendly!
space: Renovated and modern quality fit out throughout, garden views from all rooms, t.v in the bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk in robe.
host_about: Unknown

name: Z2 Bedroom City Retreat 5
summary: This is the newest of the 6 apartments that we offer in what we believe is the nicest complex in Melbourne,  set in tranquil gardens, just a stroll across the river from Melbourne's exciting CBD.
space: This recently refurbished apartment has everything you need including: - a super comfy king size bed in one bedroom -  a queen size bed in the second bedroom - a modern fully equipped kitchen - a bathroom with bath and shower - a separate toilet - a wall mounted 50cm TV - air conditioning
host_about:
Hi from Bronnie and Neil ;-)
We love being airbnb hosts and sharing our homes and our beautiful city with others.
We have been airbnb hosts for over four years and during that time we have met amazing and wonderful people from all around Australia and all parts of the world.
We started with the spare room in our own home and now have 20 properties, from high end luxury to family friendly apartments that we offer our guests. We even have a 7 bedroom, 7 bathroom mansion near the sea in St Kilda for larger groups! 
We use airbnb ourselves whenever we travel and feel we know what people are looking for. Good value, great locations, clean, comfortable and friendly! All our properties are in great locations, are professionally cleaned and we use hotel quality, commercially laundered linen on comfortable beds.  We meet all our guests on arrival to say hello and are on hand to offer help, advice and inside tips of places to go and things to see. 
Most of our properties include free parking which is a real bonus in the city and Foxtel (cable) television and other homely touches so you 'can live like a local'. (You can view our properties by clicking the View Full Profile link below and clicking on the listings on the left hand side of the page). 

A little bit about ourselves ... we're pretty easy going, and love getting out and about exploring different places. We are both keen travellers and have done our fair share of it in Australia and overseas - whether backpacking, camping, or an occasional splurge on 5-star resorts! You wouldn't call us 'party animals', but we do like socialising and meeting people.  We enjoy a wide variety of interests, love the movies, eating out, popping down to the beach on our scooter or pushbikes, and enjoying the many exciting sporting events and festivals that Melbourne has to offer.
Our motto is "strangers are just friends you haven't met yet!"
Wishing you happy travels and looking forward to meeting you soon :-)

Best regards
Bronnie and Neil

name: Charnwood Cottages - Jessica's Cottage
summary: This beautiful 120 year old cottage is perched at the top of the property. It sleeps up to 7 and has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two dining areas, full kitchen and lounge with a fire place for the cold winter nights.  For the warmer weather you can on the front verandah and enjoy the view to the township of Warburton or have a bbq out in the courtyard.

summary: PRIVATE ROOM WITH OWN BATHROOM A PRIME LOCATION!!!!!! HI EVERYONE!! We´re a Colombian couple (32 and 29 yo) who is looking for one flatmate or a couple to share our apartment. We are both students, learning English. We enjoy sharing time with friends, cooking and watching series on Netflix. We really love our apartment, so always it´s clean and tidy. Our cozy apartment is fully furnished, so you don´t have to worry about anything just for bringing your suitcase.
space: THE APARTMENT Our apartment is considered a new apartment (less than 1.5 years). It´s on 18th floor and it has some facilities to residents like swimming pool, gym, cinema room, recreation room and gardens/BBQ area.  MASTER BEDROOM (From 1st of December till 18 of January) The bedroom has its own ensuite wardrobes, ensuite bathroom, a queen bed and a 2 bedsides table.

name: Beautiful modern town house in Hawthorn
summary: A beautifully modern and bright town house in the heart of Hawthorn. Only a four minute walk to Glenferrie Station. Located in a beautiful, leafy green and quiet area. Only minutes walk from great cafes, bars/restaurants and the Hawthorn Recreation and Fitness Centre. Newly renovated kitchen, bathroom and living area. Wireless internet and Netflix provided.
space: One bedroom has a king size bed, whilst the second bedroom has a queen bed. Ample storage space for hanging clothes. Both rooms are carpeted and have reverse cyclone air conditioning. There is also a small study area (with a desk and chair) and walk in wardrobe attached to bedroom 2.
host_about: I am a fun-loving Australian girl who loves the outdoors and has a passion for travel. I enjoy exploring new cities and meeting interesting people. I am down to earth, friendly and responsible. My interests include playing tennis, studying italian and enjoying the restaurant scene around Melbourne. I am looking forward to hosting and providing my guests with a fantastic and memorable experience.

name: Eagle's View B & B Cottage
summary: The Cottage is fully self contained with 3 bedrooms (sleeps max 6), separate meals dining area, formal lounge with log fire, full verandah with El fresco dining/relaxing.  It has all the modern facilities such as split systems, TV, DVD, I pod doc.
space: Have you ever wanted to stay in your own country cottage retreat?   Well here's your chance to book your piece of paradise……… The cottage offers three bedrooms, each with their own personal charm. (2 rooms with 1 Queen bed in each and 1 room with 2 King single beds). We offer you our historic family cottage with stunning private gardens and picturesque views of the Yarra Valley.  Escape to Wandin where you will be captivated by the beauty of your surroundings.   The cottage is fully refurbished with three bedrooms and two living areas.  It offers a unique, luxurious and private setting.  It is suitable for that romantic time away or  share with friends for a wedding or family gathering.   Appropriate for mature guests requiring one level.     *  Walking distance to Wandin North township. *  Less that an hour from Melbourne. *  Public transport available. *  Short drive to popular tourist destinations.  See website for details. *  Central to wineries. Continental breakfast awaits in you

The gorgeous cozy style home with all the modern conveniences ensures you feel at ease the second you arrive.   -3 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, 1 Car Garage plus 1 Car parking - 4 Mins drive to Westfield Doncaster the heart of Chinese bustling scene of unique culture, food, bars, parks and activities. -24 Mins drive M3 highway to Melbourne CBD -10 Mins drive to Box Hill Central

name: Relax at Billy Buttons (Fully Self Contained)
summary: My place is close to Emerald, Monbulk, Gembrook, within appeoximagtely 15 minutes drive to many local wedding reception venues, Puffing Billy Station, Emerald Lake Park.  Also a short distance to many local restaurants, cafes and hotels and a 30 minute drive to the Yarra Valley.
space: Your self contained suite is located on the lower level of my home with its own access offering you privacy and a little escape from the world. It consists of a double bedroom, small ensuite and sitting room  There is also access to a patio where you may simply relax taking in the views across to the Warburton Ranges along with the neighboring rural view.  You are welcome to linger over breakfast on a warm summers day, enjoy a cool drink on a hot summers day or a wine in the evening or simply sit back and relax. Perhaps even some of the friendly bird life may pay a visit they are certainly not shy. Please note there is also an additional Queen room located in my home should you require an additional room or the suite is fully booked. The private room is located under ‘Billy Buttons Bed & Breakfast’. I look forward to meeting you soon.
host_about: Hi everyone.  Just a brief note on me.  I have been living in the Hills in Melbourne for the last few years, just heavenly after living in the mad rush of Sydney for many years. I have a new career in the banking industry, a very steep learning curve. I am new to Air B n B, but my preference when travelling is to stay in Bed and Breakfasts as I prefer to meet the locals and enjoy some home comforts. Looking forward to meeting you all.and sharing my home and love of the surroundings with you.  Warmest wishes.

name: Minimalist Melbourne CBD Apartment + Free WIFI
summary: Modern 2 Bedroom Apartment located at the heart of Melbourne CBD with easy access to public transports, shops, and all landmark. Short walk to shopping centres such as Emporium and Melbourne Central. Car park is available subject to availability with an additional charge.
space: The apartment is furnished with queen size bed in each bedroom and a single sofa bed in the living room.  There are also combo washer and dryer, essential cooking utensils, fridge, dishwasher, TV, a split system in the living, and so on. There is also a dining area and bathroom is well equipped with toiletries. Free Wi-Fi with NBN connection is provided as well.
host_about:
We are three young and passionate Melbournians that love to travel and food lovers. Feel free to ask us and we will give our recommendation some of the best food in Melbourne.

We hope you enjoy your stay in our modern cozy apartment!

name: Chic, Nth Melbourne Apt (with parking)
summary: Contemporary North Melbourne apartment (with parking)and NBN wifi.    My modern, new apartment is conveniently located within short walking distance to the Queen Victoria Market, North Melbourne’s lovely village and surrounded by a number of charming local pubs, back street coffee shops, cafes and restaurants. With close proximity to Melbourne’s central business district and university/medical precinct, and easy access to public transport, the apartment makes for a wonderful city fringe stay.
space: The apartment is on the first floor of a newly built, architecturally designed, low rise building. Only 3 floors in total.  As you open the front door you walk in to a large , bright open plan space with a state of the art modern kitchen with Smeg appliances and a large bar bench. For the eager cook or foodie,  it's a wonderful kitchen to be creative and possibly get all your local produce from the nearby Queen Victoria Market.  The kitchen overlooks the living space that consists of a dining table (which can also be a good work space), a sofa and lounge chair facing the TV and book case. There is also a balcony for you to enjoy a little evening wine or morning coffee. A European style laundry houses the washing machine and dryer, and there is compact, modern, clean bathroom with shampoos and body wash. The bedroom is bright and spacious and looks out to the balcony with some partial city views from the floor to ceiling window. The bedroom has a brand new queen size bed and is made up
host_about:
We are a Melbourne couple who love being Airbnb hosts. With our combined properties we can always provide something for everyone's budget in great neighbourhoods of Melbourne. 
We love travelling ourselves, live bands, music, good food and wine, and spending time with our friends and family. Our favourite 2016 travel destination is Slovenia! 
We are very honest and generous people and respect others personal space.

name: Cosy Warehouse Converted Townhouse
summary: Converted warehouse featuring downstairs home office that precedes upstairs to light filled living area, open kitchen living and dining with high ceilings and polished concrete. My place is close proximity to transport to explore Melbourne and walking distance to the area's great range of restaurants and cafes as well as the MCG. Good for couples and solo adventurers. Lowered rates due to early construction noise weekdays currently occurring  next door. Good for those who are early risers.

summary: Situated across the street from South Melbourne beach, this cosy and functional apartment is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. The apartment includes everything you need and is located in one of the best suburbs in Melbourne. It is fairly close to the CBD (20 min by tram) and enough distant from the noise and traffic of the city. Perfect for a relaxing weekend to visit the city, or for business travellers who are looking for a convenient place close to the city.
space: Attractions close by: South Melbourne Beach St Kilda Albert Park South Melbourne Market Botanic Gardens Art Precincts - National Gallery of Victoria Transport to the city: Tram at the door

name: Sleek Ultramodern Flat near the Crown Casino
summary: Get ready for an evening at the casino or an exciting night on the town in this sleek and sophisticated apartment in an ultramodern building. It’s designed for cool efficiency, while selected modern art pieces provide warm splashes of colour.
space: The apartment is conveniently located within 5 minute walk from Crown Entertainment Precinct and the Southern Cross Station. Tram stop within CBD Free Tram Zone is right at your doorstep providing easy access to all other parts of CBD using Melbourne's fantastic transportation system.  Complementing its exceptional location is the thoughtfully decorated art-inspired interior. The walls around the apartment are adorned with a collection of original oil paintings by talented Australian artists - Stuart Evans and Jon Schultz. We provide professionally laundered fresh towels, hand towels, bed linens and premium L'Occitane bathroom amenities. The Queen size bed features a pillow-top chiropedic mattress, high-warmth quilt and four pillows, all to ensure that you receive the support and comfort required for a good night’s sleep. The kitchen well equipped with high-end ILVE appliances, pots, pans, utensils, crockery, salt, pepper and oil is at your disposal during your stay should you wish to
host_about:
Inspired by and dedicated to Australian contemporary artists, Canvas Suites aims to provide boutique hospitality experience to our guests. Each of our Suites are personally handpicked and meticulously setup as the place our guests call home when in Melbourne.

At Canvas Suites, we believe that no visit to a place is complete without immersing oneself in its unique culture and central to any culture is its art. We view each of our art-inspired Suites as carefully curated galleries with walls adorned by original Australian works of art which our guests may enjoy in private during their stay.

But great spaces with great art do not by themselves create great hospitality experience. We know what counts for our guests to have a great stay in Melbourne – a friendly face to meet them, top-of-the-line chiropedic beds made with pristine sheets, the towels and toiletries taken care of to our exacting standards. We also know that our guests want the space and freedom to experience what Melbourne has to offer at their own pace. So we are available 24/7 for when our guests need us, but we step back when they do not.

name: Large Private Rooftop Terrace, CBD
summary: Self contained stylish corner studio apartment with a large outdoor terrace and stunning view of Melbourne city. Set on level 19 above Collins this apartment presents a very unique and very true Melbourne city experience! Complimentary wifi included!
space: ***Inbox me for special deals on longer stays*** A unique corner (dual aspect) apartment with access to a huge undercover rooftop terrace surrounded by city views.  Please note - there is a high rise construction going up two doors down so a part of the view (about 1/3 facing east) shown in the photos in blocked. The north facing aspect is still completely open and the entire terrace very bright and light. Refer to latest photos.
host_about:
Creative director living in Melbourne and often found overseas and interstate. I love life in Melbourne's CBD and everything it has to offer: the laneways, the restaurants and bars, the ambiance and of course the people. The city base on offer is set in a humble rooftop apartment that reflects everything I love about urban life. No matter what I may have been through during my hard working days or weeks, a few minutes on my terrace soaking the city around me gets me right back to normal. 
After a recent visit to New York City I have decided to open and share my city base with like-minded travelers who may be looking for a unique, hidden city apartment that represents a lot more than just a roof over their heads. I hope you enjoy this humble Melbourne Pied-à-terre during your stay!

name: Two bunk beds+single bed 4-6 people family room
summary: Near new modern house located in the newly developed estate with beautiful water features, walkways and parks. Quiet court location with easy access to major roads to the city, Mornington Peninsula, Gippsland and Phillip Island, and Eastlink to the Yarra Valley and City Link.  Choices of elegant double rooms and or bunk rooms available.  4 bedrooms sleeping up to 14 with 2 bathrooms.  Shopping centre, Costco and major roads nearby. 30 minutes drive to the city. 10 minutes to the beach.
space: Very beautiful and comfortable! Here are some details of the bedroom and public facilities. 1,Large bedroom upstairs with a two bunk beds. One has the lower bed that can be adjusted between queen size and single. So can sleep 3 adults.  Another single bunk sleeping one person on each of the upper and lower beds so the room can sleep 5 people. Very good budget room for a whole family. Built-in wardrobe, table, and couch that converts to another bed. 2, Bedroom provide pillows, liners,clothes hangers, tissues and slippers.  3,Provide shampoo,body wash, hand wash,towels,hair dryer, toilet paper.  have shared bathrooms with a vanity and glass shower.   Clothes washing service available. 4. Kitchen downstairs with guest facilities including fridge. Cooking items, wok, pan, bowls, plates available in guest’s cupboard. 5. An 8 seat dining area is available downstairs but for smaller groups (or extra people the kitchen island bar has 6 bar chairs. 6. Shoes and luggage can be stored in my garag

name: Huge 4 bedroom warehouse - vegetarian heaven!
summary: Spacious warehouse conversion, steps from vibrant Smith St in the heart of Collingwood/Fitzroy and close to CBD. Four bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 living areas and serene outdoor terrace make for plenty of space for a family or two. Situated in the heart of a burgeoning vegan/vegetarian scene, we will provide all the info you need on great veggie-friendly places to eat and shop, as well as a fully-equipped kitchen and stacks of vegetarian/vegan cookbooks if you fancy cooking yourselves.
space: Our home is a large four bedroom warehouse conversion in a secure gated community of 9 properties. The house has modern fittings and furnishings and is very comfortable. The large main living area is open plan with a  fully-equipped modern kitchen, dining area, and lounge with polished wooden floors. The lounge has a plasma television (with Netflix) and surround sound speaker set-up. On the lower floor there is a separate living area/reading room and study nook. Of the four bedrooms, two have queen size beds and en-suite bathrooms (each with tub and shower). The third bedroom has a single loft bed and we can also set up a second single mattress below. The fourth and smallest bedroom has a single bed with a trundle. All bedrooms have wardrobes with available hanging space for your clothes. There is a third central bathroom with a shower and a laundry with washer and dryer. Outdoors we have two serene terraces - the upper terrace (off the main living area), is turfed and is the main ente
host_about: Originally from New Zealand (Matt) and England (Anna) we moved from London, to Melbourne, to Brooklyn, New York and then recently back to Melbourne. Matt works in advertising and Anna is a music publicist but is currently taking time out to parent our two kids. We love music, eating out, coffee, soccer, wine, meeting new people and travel.

summary: La Trobe Tower新建于2017年,地处市中心,去餐厅､车站､维多利亚市场等都是步行可达,位置上无可挑剔,绝对适合短期旅游的人士

name: Close to everything in a quiet street in Brunswick
summary: This is a comfortable and very peaceful 2 bedroom house, 400m from train, bus, tram. Close to Melbourne Zoo and the University of Melbourne. Restaurants, music venues specialty grocery stores all a short walk away. Private courtyard garden.  This house would be good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
space: Beautiful renovated bathroom.  Unrenovated but clean and tidy kitchen with no dishwasher. Gorgeous new oven installed October 2016. Very comfortable lounge.  No aircond but house is very well protected and insulated and captures the evening southerly breezes and so is easy to cool down after a hot summer's day. Some cracking in the plaster of the lounge from movement of the house which is very common in Brunswick does not reduce comfort but is a little unsightly.  Very private and quiet.  The best of everything  - perfectly peaceful but in the heart of the action in one the most vibrant arts and music precincts of Melbourne.
host_about: We are a family of four including a 3 yo Archie and 6 mo Spencer, myself  (Bel) and Hamish. We love to travel when we can.  Hamish is a farmer and I'm a conservation biologist. We enjoy the beach and we enjoy coming to Melbourne to visit friends and family.  We have rented out our house in Brunswick because we only come down every so often.  We're looking forward to being guests now as well as hosts.

name: City Views in a Brand New Apartment
summary: Brand new apartment over looking Melbourne's south east suburbs. Luxurious with brand new furniture and facilities it's the perfect place to relax.
space: Enjoy a simple space with modern furniture and huge 55inch smart tv. Close to everything you need with the beach and Southland less than 5min away. The apartment has free unlimited WIFI and Netflix. We have a washing and drying machine you can use.  We have a good size balcony we great views of Melbourne CBD and you can just see the bay through the trees.  The apartment is shared with a couple living in the main bedroom. The other bedroom boast floor to ceiling windows with a suburb view of Melbourne. Most of the room is taken up with a king size bed that has a new very good mattress.
host_about: I'm looking to share my amazing space that my husband and I have. We have both travelled extensively and love meeting people who are doing the same thing. We usually stick ourselves but if you need anything we'd love to help out. International food and healthy cooking our things we do a lot while keeping fit. Sport is a big part of life for us too.

name: Cozy home in the heart of Fitzroy North

space: Unknown

name: Private Room with nearby public transport

host_about: Unknown

name: Newport family oasis - AVAIL. JULY SCHOOL HOLIDAYS
summary: Modern comfortable family home, walking distance to public transport, playgrounds and parks and 5 minute drive to the beach.
space: Our home is a genuine family home in the inner west of Melbourne. We are 13 kms from the Melbourne city centre and a short walk to the train station that will get you their in 20 minutes. We are surrounded by parks and playgrounds and other families and business professionals. It is a safe area. There is unlimited street parking out the front of our home if you have a car.
host_about:
Hey future guests and friends,

Thanks for taking the time to read our profile. 

We are a regular Aussie family with a home that many tell us has a relaxed and welcoming vibe. Which is GREAT because that’s how we want you to feel when you stay with us. 
You need to know that our home is not a sterile hotel, or a grungy hostel or even a display home. There is the normal detritus of modern family life with children. But that aside you can be assured your environment will be clean, your linens fresh and your room cleaned and dusted before you arrive. There can be a lot of laughter, love (the occasional tantrum) in our home, and you are welcome to share in that, or to have privacy and limited interaction if that is your preference. We will be led by you. ☺

Above all we just want you to be comfortable!

We love keeping fit. Enjoying time with friends. A good red wine or a craft beer AND of course travelling!!

We have been having airbnb guests for 5 years now. It has been truly rewarding and we have met remarkable people from every continent, many we are still friends or in contact with. 

We look forward to meeting you too ☺.

name: CBD 2BR+2BA APT with 55th Floor View&Free Carpark

This superb apartment offers incredible views of many landmarks of Melbourne CBD and suburbs, especially the Royal Botanic Garden, Yarra River, Dandenong Mountains, Melbourne Central and St Kilda Beach.
space: This stunning apartment has been meticulously designed and built to service every need of inner CBD living. The generous sized living room and bedrooms are filled with natural light and with views throughout the CBD and suburbs. The kitchen is state of the art with stone benchtops, an abundance of pantry space and stainless steel appliances including full oven, 4 burner gas cooktop and dishwasher. The bedrooms is filled with an abundance of natural light and enjoys spectacular views across Melbourne offering room for a generous sized bed with bed side tables and mirrored built in robes. I will provide you a gorgeous place to stay for your holiday, a high standard accomodation with washing machine & dryer, big steel fridge, kettle and toaster, dishwasher, microwave, oven, pans& pots, dishes& cutleries.  This comfortable, clean and chic apartment is centrally located on the corner of Elizabeth and A’Beckett Street, in the heart of Melbourne CBD. It has 2 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms, fully fur
host_about:
I am always keen to welcome guests to this wonderful vibrant city that holds so much excitement and interest for everyone to enjoy. 
Always looking at the small details to make your stay with ease, comfort and no complication. 
I am well travelled and privileged to have seen a lot of the world and different cultures which adds to ones own experience in life.

name: Bright & Light 2Fl 1BR + Balcony

host_about: Anna and Tina have lived and worked in St Kilda for over twenty years and as locals are proud to call St Kilda home. Local knowledge has allowed us to put together a portfolio of great apartments in the best locations - all in the heart of St Kilda. Do view stkildastays,  We would love to look after your next St Kilda Stay. To view all of our 23 apartments please click on "View Full Profile"

If require airport transfer, or to other touristy attractions, these also can be arranged with the owner at a nominal fee.

name: Funky warehouse apartment Brunswick
summary: Small but comfortable apartment in the historic Hoffman Brickworks complex in Brunswick. Close to Sydney Road, lots of pubs, bars, cafes and restaurants, plenty of public transport in every direction.
space: The apartment has two small bedrooms, both have wall heaters and silent but powerful ceiling fans - no air conditioning.    The main bedroom is small yet perfectly comfortable. It has a comfy double bed. The guest room is small and cozy with a double bed, it sleeps two - but is more suitable for one.   Full bedding is provided in both rooms - including towels.  The windows in both bedrooms are sky lights in the ceiling which you can star gaze through as you drift off to sleep.  The apartment is furnished with all sorts of funky interesting pieces that we have picked up along the way. The sofa is large and comfortable and we have a large white wall that you can enjoy projecting movies onto.
host_about:
Hey-hey, 
We are Jo and Tom! I'm a thirty-something year old English language teacher originally from Oxford. Tom is also a thirty- something year old medical physicist from Leipzig. Between us we speak English, Deutsche and Denglish. We love meeting people and sharing stories about life/the world - any topic worth a mention. We have been to some awesome places over the last ten years and the highlights include cities such as - Petra, Jerusalem, Berlin, Varanasi, Marrakech and of course - in the number one position is Melbourne. We love going to the theatre, live music events and festivals - Dark Mofo being one of our favourites. We are really looking forward to extending our home to being your home where guests are welcome to enjoy the place as we do.......between us, things we can't live without......each other, friends, laughter, Stephen Hawking (Tom not me) our VW kombi and our naughty little cat Laserhawk.

space: Unknown
host_about:
Hi
My name is Lily. I am working with children and I am a happy person. I would like to welcome you to stay with me and my housemates in our lively house.

name: Stunning Art Deco Apartment in St Kilda
summary: Admire the lush, leafy entrance to this stylish apartment. Once inside, stretch out on the long sofa in front of the period fireplace. Bedrooms and bathrooms are luxurious, bright, and white, and the kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances.
space: Are you coming to Melbourne for business and want the luxury of a 5 star hotel but with more space, comfort and amenities?  Or are you a visitor to our beautiful city keen to stay in one of the vibrant neighbourhoods close to restaurants, parks, the beach and live like a local?  Our 1920s apartment is perfect for you! Three large bedrooms, one with ensuite, a stunning light filled living room, dining room with a long solid timber table, new kitchen with Miele appliances and brand new bathrooms - this apartment is a wonderful place for a holiday or corporate stay. Period charm has been carefully preserved and blended with contemporary elements in a location just minutes away from Albert Park lake, Chapel Street and the beach. Make this stylish apartment your home away from home when you are visiting Melbourne, relocating or doing business. This is a place where you are close to all that is Melbourne and it's the place where you can walk in, relax in the luxury of a designer home and swi
host_about: I am a a writer, a mother and a traveller, and those are the things I can't live without. My favourite travel destinations are.... everywhere but I can't go past Berlin, Paris, Budapest, New York and anywhere in France.

name: Sofa bed in a funky apartment
summary: Super comfy fold out sofa in funky apartment! Close to public transport (67 Tram and Ripponlea train station are within 5 minutes walk) and buses to CBD and beyond. Within 15 minutes walk: Point Ormond & Elwood Beach; St Kilda shopping strip; St Kilda Botanical Garden; Elwood shopping strip on Ormond Road; Elsternwick restaurants on Glen Huntly Rd; Ripponlea cafe strip; and coffee and supermarket and bottle shop a hop, skip and jump away on Tennyson St.
space: Top floor with large windows.  Airy and bright with elevated views (literally bird's eye).  Spacious. Tastefully decorated:  80's retro fixtures with a mix of contemporary and vintage furnishings. All mod cons (except a tv!). Nature viewing on the balcony:  If you stay up late enough you can see the fruit bat neighbours that feast on the fruit of the Oriental Pear tree in front of the balcony. These trees line the street so we get several bats in the area.  If you stay up even later you may even see one of  the local foxes!
host_about:
I'm an Early Childhood Educator with a lust for travel! I love exploring and feeling my way through new experiences in lively places! 
Discovering people, food and different cultures makes up a huge part of my leisure time! I love chatting to people, finding out about them and their experiences and sharing mine. But no matter where I go, I love coming back home to this pocket of the world - it's my favourite!
I've lived in Melbourne for most of my life, and have travelled extensively. 
I love a central, convenient and clean place to stay when abroad and this is what I have to offer. It's a one bedroom apartment with a large living and dining area, balcony and with great heating!
Lively restaurants and cafes nearby as well as parks, gardens and the beautiful Port Phillip bay,  showcase Bayside living in the world's most liveable city, glorious Melbourne!  
Look forward to meeting you!

name: North-Facing Luxury, Fabulous Lifestyle
summary: For a pristine pad embracing northerly light and a cool contemporary vibe.
space: Prime location steps to Chapel St, look no further than this sparkling 1-bedroom apartment. Timber floors, concrete ceilings and a distinctly luxurious edge make for an appealing first impression, from the living areas including apple TV and kitchen (stone benchtop, stainless-steel gas appliances & integrated dishwasher) to the full-width undercover balcony set for lapping up the sunshine in absolute style.  A basement car space, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, A/V intercom and secure lift access are all included, with a communal rooftop BBQ/dining area complementing the lifestyle allure of doorstep proximity to South Yarra’s epicentre of café culture, cutting-edge cuisine and vibrant nightlife.
host_about: Unknown

name: Stylish Two-Story Loft in the Best Location in Melbourne
summary: Cook in a full-galley kitchen and have breakfast for two at a cozy table in a tall sunny window overlooking a quiet laneway. This unique loft apartment features a comfy queen-sized bed, spiral, iron staircase, and a modern and open living space.
space: #NAME?
host_about: Hi and welcome to our little sanctuary, nested in one of Melbourne's most vibrant laneways. Lorena and I both work in the city - Lorena in Tourism Marketing and I work in Events. We have travelled extensively across Europe and South America, and Lorena is originally from Chile. We are raising our family in the beautiful city of Melbourne where we get to enjoy amazing parks, visit world-class attractions, dine at top restaurant and bars, watch major events and indulge in endless amounts of shopping! We hope you enjoy your stay.

name: TRANQUIL WATERFRONT 1-BED APARTMENT
summary: Located along the marina at the premier end of Docklands, our stunning 1-bedroom apartment is both cosy and convenient, featuring panoramic views and luxury amenities - a perfect launchpad to explore Melbourne. It's an easy walk to Melbourne CBD and major landmarks, or you can choose to relax among the tranquil leafy parklands, and enjoy stunning views of Yarra River and the city - right from your private balcony. Perfect for couple getaways, city explorers, and business expatriates!
space: Our spacious 58m2 apartment is located along the banks of the Yarra River, amid the lush greenery of parklands directly below. Featuring an abundance of natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows, you also get uninterrupted views up the river to the unique backdrop of Melbourne's skyline (even more amazing at night as you are falling asleep to the city lights and water reflections!) The interior is minimally but beautifully decorated, to avoid cluttering up the space with things you don't need. The bedroom welcomes you with a spacious queen bed and same gorgeous views. The kitchen is fully equipped, and you can stay home to prepare meals if you don't feel like eating out (there is a grocery store and pizzeria downstairs, and Woolworths is just a short drive/walk away). You will also find plenty to do for a lazy night in, with a 50-inch LED TV, and a brand new Playstation 4 with a wide selection of games and movies to keep you entertained. Want a setup for something a bit more fancy? Wa
host_about: Unknown

name: Kensington Apartment
summary: Beautiful 1 Bedroom apartment spacious for 3 adults. Apartment is in a converted warehouse, walking distance to shops and cafes and transport to city.  This apartment is used only for Airbnb, calendar availability is always correct.  4kms to the city of Melbourne, easy access to public transport, near by Flemington Racecourse, Melbourne Showgrounds and Zoo, State Hockey Centre, 20min from Melb airport by car.  We are Neil & Carolina, we look forward to hearing from you!
space: If you want to stay somewhere a little bit unique and enjoy a private place to rest and recover from travelling around Melbourne and or working, this is the place for you. Set in a warehouse in the old industrial area of Kensington, there is a sense of being among the old Melbourne, with a Coffee roaster 2 doors down, a noodle factory where you can buy fresh noodles everyday, and old factory sheds and cobblestone laneways, there is definately a lot of charm around the place. Also the people in these small businesses are always up for a chat and are super friendly and helpful.  We have tried to make the apartment homely and comfortable by making this a contemporary dwelling using natural surfaces and textures to blend the industrial and natural.   Secure Studio Warehouse 1 Bedroom Upstairs Apartment. Recently renovated with own separate entrance.   With 1 King bed and on suite, and sofa bed in the living area. We take care in making sure you have a great experience, the apartment is kep
host_about:
My wife and I are very easy going, we love to entertain and host for our friends. We feel we live life at its fullest when we are amongst friends, eating, dancing and travelling, all at once if possible!. Airbnb has given us the rare opportunity to have the pleasure to meet great people out to have a great experience in this amazing city that is Melbourne. Our aim is to make it as interesting, easy and comfortable possible.
We look forward to meeting you on your visit.

name: Beautiful, spacious private bed/bath in Hawthorn
summary: Beautiful, modern and spacious bedroom / private bathroom in Hawthorn.  The apartment is light, bright and spacious. It’s also very clean and modern. Shared spaces includes the kitchen and lounge room.  Guests will also have access to a washing machine, 2 balconies (incl one upstairs which is huge) and a private car park
space: Guests will have access to a spacious bedroom, which has a queen bed, 2 bed side tables and plenty of cupboard space.  They will also have access to their own private bathroom which is clean and modern.  The lounge room and kitchen space are shared with me.  The house is bright, light and beautifully modern.
host_about: I am a fun-loving Australian girl who loves the outdoors and has a passion for travel. I enjoy exploring new cities and meeting interesting people. I am down to earth, friendly and responsible. My interests include playing tennis, studying italian and enjoying the restaurant scene around Melbourne. I am looking forward to hosting and providing my guests with a fantastic and memorable experience.

North-facing so it gets plenty of light through the large windows. Tea and coffee making facilities in the room. Spacious bathroom. Less than 5 minutes walk (200m) straight up the road to the train station and the Puckle Street precinct where you'll find shops, cafes, supermarkets and anything you'll need. Also close to trams.
space: This room on the first floor and is bright and airy. It has a nice balcony overlooking the street below - a nice place just to sit and relax in the warm sun.  It contains a double bed, armchair, desk and chair, ample wardrobe space, and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hi I'm Linda. 

I've traveled widely to Europe including Switzerland (my favourite, such an amazing country!), France, Germany and Italy, the UK, West-Coast USA, and make regular trips to Thailand. 

My hobbies include meditation, yoga and dancing.

I enjoy meeting people and making friends with people from around the world!

summary: Relax and unwind in this modern and stylish apartment overlooking the Yarra River and Melbourne CBD. It's within one of Melbourne's most modern and luxurious apartment complexes, complete with pool, spa, sauna, and gym.
space: This modern and spacious 1 bedroom apartment, located on the banks of the Yarra River in the heart of Southbank, is the perfect place for a weekend getaway, corporate stay or a special retreat.  Apartment features include: - Fully equipped kitchen - Nespresso coffee machine  - Heating and cooling - Washer and dryer - Full HD TV with Foxtel, Netflix and BluRay - Lightning fast wireless internet  - Study nook with printer  - Floor to ceiling windows - Large balcony equipped with outdoor seating and bar - Breathtaking north facing views of Melbourne - Tempur queen mattress and pillows - A secure car park (prior arrangement required) Building features include: - Security controlled entrance via security passes - Fully equipped gym with cardio, weight and resistance machines - Sauna and stream room - Indoor pool and spa - Theatre and reading room - Outdoor area featuring a stunning 1/2 acre garden equipped with sun beds, BBQ's and seating - Business centre with print and copy facilities Fre
host_about:
We have been lucky enough to grow up by the beach on the Mornington Peninsula. 
We both enjoy the outdoors, good food and wine, travelling and meeting interesting people...and our brown border collie, Nash! 
Our professions keep us busy; Kate, a Primary School Teacher and Lachlan a Business Intelligence Project Manager.

Our overseas adventures have taken us to America, Canada, Southeast Asia, Pacific Islands, Great Britain, France and other parts of Europe.

We are huge supporters of community driven innovation, such as Airbnb and Uber. We utilize these services as much as possible when travelling and always have positive experiences!

We have a love and appreciation for our city, Melbourne. We look forward to meeting you, whether that be as a host or as a guest!

name: Melbourne CBD Apartment (34)
summary: A brand new building located in the heart of Melbourne CBD, with walking distances to Melbourne Central train station, RMIT University and Melbourne University, Monash University City Campus, and Victoria University. Easy access to tourist attractions such as Queen's Victoria Market, museums, and the aquarium via city free tram. It is close to most of the commercial buildings and exhibition centres, suitable for business travellers with a fast NBN network, just like working from home.
space: The apartment is located on the 34th floor, with huge glass window panel and a view of an idyllic and vibrant city view right beneath your eyebrow. A stylish interior design, fully furnished. Kitchen – simple but elegant with kitchenware, dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, stovetop, microwave oven, toaster, electric kettle, iron, ironing facilities, washing machine.  Bathroom – hygiene is our priority, we disinfected every part before guest arrive.  A shower, free toiletries, and a hair dryer are provided. Bedroom has a double size bed. Dining & Lounge – coffee and tea are complementary to the guests. With 42-inch full HD Smart flat-screen TV, stream your favourite programs in a relax environment, make you feel like at home.  Laundry – washing machine and drier.   For the best interest of guests, SMOKING and PETS are not allowed.
host_about:
We are Australian,dedicated to provide warm welcome to overseas visitors. My appartment reflect the Australia Chinese culture.
我们是澳洲本地人,希望通过我们的一流服务,给你千里以外家的感觉,让你澳旅留下深刻的回忆｡

name: Mid-Century Modern Boutique in Fantastic Richmond
summary: This apartment is in the heart of Richmond; nestled amongst the excellent restaurants and cafes of Bridge Rd, Swan St and Victoria St and a stone's throw from all the action of the Tennis Centre, MCG and AAMI Park.  The neighbourhood is fantastic for its people, convenience, renowned abundance of affordable (as well as world-class) cuisine, and its proximity to the Yarra River. A 10-min tram ride or 40-min stroll through the Fitzroy Gardens to the city makes it ideal for any visit to Melbourne.
space: 100% of proceeds from this Airbnb listing go towards the running of the charity that we founded in 2013. So you can feel like a hero and stay at a super awesome Airbnb at the same time! With the CBD just 3km away (either a short tram trip, bike ride or lovely half-hour walk), Richmond is the best place to experience Melbourne. Our place is surrounded by cafes, restaurant and shopping strips (Bridge Road, Swan Street, Victoria Street), shops, boutiques, bars and pubs. We have a lot of natural light, in a very well-maintained building, furnished with beautiful mid-century modern and vintage pieces.  The rooms are bright and towels and locally-made organic soaps are provided.  There's kitchen cupboard space for those who want to do some of their own cooking, and you're welcome to use all appliances and cookware. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
host_about:
I'm 33, open-minded, friendly and reliable. I took my time acquiring a double degree in International Business/Japanese and am now kept pretty busy directing a charity that I founded in 2013. I have lived in lots of different cities around the world and experienced a host of very different living arrangements (pun always intended), so I was pretty well accustomed to this gig before Airbnb even existed.

I like to run, travel, appreciate art, shop, wine, dine, learn Spanish (my wife is Mexican) and love a good board game. I get my kicks from real-life auctions, discovering exotic fruits and vegetables at my weekend farmers market, and meeting interesting people.

name: HFN-BDBF-Center of Melbourne CBD/2BR/2BH

space: * This modern apartment have everything you want! There is a King size bed in master bedroom, a Queen size bed in guest bedroom, also a sofa bed in the living room which is the size of a double sized bed. * This apartment locates at middle floor which gives you the great view toward Melbourne CBD (with view of Shrine of Remembrance) * The huge chef's kitchen is light and bright offering you all the utensils, appliances, crockery and top of the range designer cookware to prepare your own gourmet meals (if you choose). A full sized refrigerator/freezer will provide the ultimate space for your provisions. Dishwasher, microwave, stainless steel full hot plate stove, large oven and automatic espresso coffee machine (including complimentary coffee capsules), will complete your entertainer's delightful kitchen. Various quality tea varieties are also provided. * Air conditioned, quality modern furniture and fittings throughout  * Washer and dryer included. * Fresh quality linen, iron, hairdrye

name: Olivias' in the Forest
summary: Beautiful Rainforest Retreat. - Accommodates 6. - Open fire. - 3 Bedrooms, two with queen, one with twin king singles (also has ensuite). - Main bathroom with rain shower. - Gourmet kitchen with double oven, walk in pantry, dishwasher and fridge. - Separate dining room with large 8 seater dining table. - Comfy 3-4 seater long couch. - Outdoor table and chairs.  - Outdoor fire pit.  -Equipped Laundry.  -Wildlife can include lyrebirds, possums, parrots, wallabies, wombats,deer. - Golf clubs.
space: Nestled amongst the forest, Olivia's is off the grid.  Our electricity comes from a generator that charges a bank of batteries that power the house. Water is from a local stream of mountain water - the water is the most beautiful you will ever drink.
host_about:
We live in Fitzroy in Melbourne and run a property investing business, Michael writes about property investing for NAB and has just released a book The Formula to Successful Property Investing.

We have two grown up boys and love travelling. We notice all the small things that make a big difference when we travel so we have done our best to add some of those features to our beautiful property to make your stay memorable.
