name: Modern, Cozy, Easy Richmond Stay
summary: Located in Melbourne's best suburb, my home is an oasis in the heart of the action. You won't believe you are so close to everything, as the minute you step foot inside my modern apartment, you will notice the tranquility, and feel completely at home. My home has everything you will need to make your next Melbourne stay enjoyable.
space: My modern one bedroom apartment has everything you need to make your next Melbourne getaway enjoyable, fun and relaxing. You will feel completely at ease here and appreciate the amenities, the thoughtful attention to detail, and all the comforts of home. On quiet nights in, my apartment has everything you could want - a comfortable couch, TV with Netflix, Stan & HayU, and a fully decked out kitchen for cooking and food preparation and a beautiful courtyard with easy to use BBQ. The bedroom is peaceful and set up for your extreme comfort and a perfect nights sleep. The quietness of inside is in stark contrast to the hustle and bustle of the extremely central location. Enjoy your morning coffee or afternoon glass of wine in our courtyard! This really is the perfect location to experience everything Melbourne has to offer, but also to have that really relaxing home experience in a modern, clean and comfortable space. You're going to love it.
host_about: Unknown

name: Cozy Apartment in Central Business District
summary: Cozy up in this comfortable apartment. Pull up the orange chair by the bright, bay window and compile an itinerary for around Melbourne from one of the provided maps and visitor guides, or catch up on e-mails at the sleek desk near the bed.
space: LOCATION It’s all about location! Our charming, boutique apartment lies literally a few steps away from cafes, restaurants, shops, theatres, China-Town etc.   You can catch the free city tram network will take you from nearby St Patrick's Cathedral to St Paul's Cathedral, Federation Square, the Melbourne Museum, and Victorian State Library, the new Docklands area and the famous Melbourne Crown Entertainment Complex and Casino... It goes on and on, and a lot of these are within walking distance.  You are also close to the trams in Bourke Street or Spring Street and the underground railway station. St Vincent's Hospital is a 10 minute walk from the apartment so handy if you are visiting relatives or friends in the hospital. Shopping is so close by - just a couple of blocks away there are lots of arcades with interesting and individual shops, department stores, Bourke Street Mall, Melbourne Central Mall, QV Shopping Mall;  the list goes on, as Melbourne is the shopping capital of Australi
host_about:
We live in Melbourne Australia in the heart of the city ourselves and we love traveling around the world and meeting new people.
We love to travel independently and that's why we prefer B&B's as you get to meet some lovely and interesting people.  We always try and live like locals. 
Can't live without great coffee - and the occasional glass of red!

name: LUXICO - Rothesay Avenue (Elwood)
summary: Cutting edge indulgence complete with pool in fabulous Elwood. Bold, bright & beautiful, this architecturally designed home showcases state-of-the-art luxury and is highlighted with premium finishes, expanses of glass & a secluded poolside setting with the ultimate sought after north facing orientation.
space: Bold, bright & beautiful, this architecturally designed home showcases state-of-the-art luxury and is highlighted with premium finishes, expanses of glass & a secluded poolside setting with the ultimate sought after north facing orientation.  Highly innovative, Rothesay Avenue is designed for entertaining pleasure with a warm light-filled open-plan living/dining extending onto an exceptional outdoor area. A separate laundry and conveniently located powder room complete the ground floor amenities. Upstairs, an executive master suite that encompasses a spectacular view of the tree tops is blissfully exquisite, complimented by a sumptuous ensuite and featuring cleverly constructed full floor to ceiling robes. A further 2 bedrooms with built in robes can also be found on the 1st floor, along with a large, modern family bathroom.  A mesmerizing home in every sense of the word with exceptional features including a Miele kitchen, stone benches & soft closing drawers, integrated heating & cool
host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

name: PanoramicView & Rooftop SpaPool in Southbank!
summary: Private room with own bathroom in modern & design 2 bedrooms apartment above 40th floor with large windows giving breathtaking Panoramic view on CBD & Beach! Enjoy your stay with stunning swimming pool on 52nd floor with 360 views on Melbourne ! Admire Impressive sunsets!!
space: Private room with private bathroom for intimancy. Design and Modern appartment with Beautiful light all day long & Impressive sunset to enjoy your stay. Enjoy facilities : gym, spa, swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, sky lounge on 52nd floor with amazing views! Guests are welcome to use the shared kitchen and Living Area, balcony, Washer. This place is perfect for single/couple to enjoy a design place with all facilities with beautiful view on the city!
host_about: We are an adventurous, opened minded couple seeking to travel any time is possible and to enjoy every second of it. We are a mix of cultures... She is French Vietnamese and I am Latin but we met in Toronto, Canada where we lived for 2 years and now we both live in Melbourne, Australia. We love meeting new people, discovering new landscapes and new cultures.

name: Animal Land Settlers Run
summary: Great self contained Farm stay accommodation within 30 mins from Melbourne CBD. 2 Bedroom, king bed in Master, Queen and 2 bunks in second room Fold out settee in Lounge. Limo transfers from airport, city or local train station available.
space: No Alarm clock needed, freedom of spaaaaaace. Large Rooms, and heaps to keep the kids entertained.  Watch the horses cows or sheep from out of your Bedroom window. Collect fresh eggs for breakfast. Hand Milk a Cow. (that's right milk does come from cows) Pick fresh vegies, or herbs. all in our backyard. Main bedroom has king Bed sleeps 2. Second room has a queen bed and set of Bunk Beds. Sleeps 4. Lounge has a settee folds out to a double bed. Porta cot available on request.
host_about:
Very proud Dad.
26 years married with 4 fantastic children.
We are so pleased, proud and excited to offer farm stay accommodation.
we have been having day visitors to the farm for over 30 years. approx. 6500 visitors per year to the farm.
now you can stay and enjoy it even longer with behind the scenes involvement.

space: Kitchen Bathroom Bedrooms Living room Laundry
host_about: I am a outgoing guy and I’d like to share the best I have to the friends from all over the world

name: Beachside haven. Spacious, comfortable, central.
summary: Spacious and bohemian-chic, this 2-storey terrace house is a 2-minute stroll to bustling St Kilda foreshore, Acland St and Luna Park. Located in a lovely quiet street, you wouldn't know you're a skip away from Melbourne's most action-packed iconic spots. Enjoy the comforts of home in this quiet sanctuary including two outdoor areas and a fairy-light adorned sunroom with glass ceiling. Jog along the beach, have a dip in the sea, dine in style or enjoy a drink (or 5) at the many fun iconic bars!
space: Unknown
host_about:
I'm a writer and a voracious reader - hence the many books scattered throughout the house. With the risk of sounding cliche, I love walking along the St Kilda beach, especially at sunset, and I feel very lucky to live in a place where I get to do that daily. I am also thrilled that I get to  share this experience with others. 
I'm gregarious, I love meeting new people and I look forward to connecting with you if you choose to stay at my place. I promise I'll do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

name: Caulfield 2 bed home ~ Princes Park ~ 10km to CBD!
summary: Two bedroom home; large bedrooms; bright & light living space located in sort after suburb Caulfield South.  We are PET and FAMILY friendly.  Only 10 km south-east from Melbourne's CBD. Caulfield is a popular destination because of its beautiful and vast green spaces to explore; parks, ovals, playing fields, sports clubs, playgrounds and walking tracks. Princes Park is literally located across the road from the apartment, a great spot for a picnic (you'll find a picnic rug in the apartment).
space: WELCOME TO MELBOURNE! Caulfield South is a lovely neighourhood suburb where you can enjoy the tranquillity of the village lifestyle.  I am well-travelled and love meeting new people and sharing stories. Having spent many years travelling, I have been an Airbnb guest and really enjoyed the experience. Being a wanderlust, I have also been a couchsurfer in a past life. Now that I am home, it is my turn to return the favour and I would love to host you in the most liveable City in the world, the cultural hub of Australia. I love Melbourne and can't wait to share it with you.   Our apartment: 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms with a secured car space in one of the most sought-after locations in Melbourne. Walking distance to parks, shops, tram stop at the door and only 10kms from the CBD.   Two lovely and large rooms available in beautifully kept apartment.  Both rooms have a very comfortable brand new queen bed ensemble. The bedrooms are dark and quiet for the perfect night sleep. Large built in m
host_about: Hello, thanks for stopping by!  I am originally from Sydney, moved to Melbourne a couple of years ago. I am well-travelled and love meeting new people and sharing stories. Visiting 16 countries in the UK, Europe, North America, Africa and the Middle East, I have been an Airbnb guest many times and in a past life a Couchsurfer.  When I returned home from travelling, I met my beautiful husband and had an instant family (2 bubs under two!). We would love to host you in our lovely apartment in the most liveable City in the world, Melbourne.  If you are a foodie and love culture, you must drop in and enjoy the cultural hub of Australia. There is so much to see and do here.  I love Melbourne and can't wait to share it with you.

space: Just opposite Melbourne Central. You cannot get any closer to the city, you are in the city! The ideal location that brings the best of the city to you within walking distance of RMIT, Victoria and Melbourne Universities, Melbourne Central, Emporium, Myer and David Jones shopping complex and a stone's throw from the fabulous fresh produce of Queen Victoria Market with terrific nightlife and entertainment options on every corner, cafes and restaurants. host_about:
Hi! Thanks for viewing my profile!

What I love the most about living in Melbourne is that Melbourne is a multicultural city where you can enjoy variety of foods, street arts and nature.

Both myself and my co-host Simon (both Airbnb Superhosts) have been hosting for more than 5 years. We will do our best to make sure you enjoy your stay with us! Our reviews speak for themselves!

Also have a look at my Airbnb guidebook where I listed some of the highlights of Melborne. Also I have a 'secret' list of my favorite foods specially prepared just for my guests! ;)

Below are the list of all my apartments :
https://www.airbnb.com.au/s?host_id=10394006
or
https://www.airbnb.com.au/wishlists/209489358

If you are new to Airbnb, you can use this link to get travel credit towards Airbnb booking!
https://www.airbnb.com.au/c/dlee824

Why book with Superhost?
First what is a superhost? https://www.airbnb.com/superhost

As a guest, what could be worst then arriving at the Airbnb and find that the host has cancelled your booking! Your previous time which can be used to explore the city is now spend calling Airbnb and fanatically looking for another accommodation. You may even ended up blowing your travel  budget because what's available in the last minute is higher than what you originally booked.

Booking with Superhost means you peace of mind and much lesser chance of having your booking cancelled.

space: The room has a comfortable Queen sized bed and only shares a bathroom with other Airbnb guests (if any are staying).  We provide a kettle and complimentary tea and coffee. host_about: We are an electrical engineer and a startup business executive.  Nando is an Aussie and Misty is an American.  We met in Seattle, where Misty is from when Nando was there for work and the rest is history!  We love to travel and have visited 22 countries on 6 continents since we met 6 years ago.   We have 2 gorgeous little boys that are 3 and 5 years old, as well as a fluffy little dog named Ovi.

space: THE PROPERTY: With its rich past as a knitting mill, this converted warehouse apartment designed by Patrick Meneguzzi offers breathtaking, luxurious interior design with the highest quality finishes. As you enter the expansive living, dining and kitchen zone, the impressive textural qualities, furnishings and original elements of the building are on show. In fact, wherever you look, unique artworks, custom cabinetry or classic furniture is sure to catch your eye.   This entire level is bathed in natural light thanks to the huge windows off the dining area which offer fabulous views of Richmond Hill. What’s more, a beautiful dining table surrounded by French-style chairs provide the perfect spot to take in those views. From the

This is Amanda and Kevin. We both work full time and have lived in the bayside area for four years. I am from Melbourne and Kevin is from Ireland.

We both love to travel and enjoy meeting new people. We have found it a lot more homely and welcoming to stay in someone's house who can provide great local knowledge so feel free to ask any questions or advice

We do share our home with our beautiful dog Finley. He is a 4 year old Labrador x golden retriever. He is very friendly and loves people including children.

name: 2 Beds 2 Bath Family Apartment, Free Gym & Pool
summary: Location, Location, Location  Very central CBD apartment Everything is convenient, Free trams just outside your door 3 mins walk to Southern Cross Station & skybus Fast unlimited Internet, all necessary amenities included
space: Brand new 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment is only 3 minutes’ walk from Southern Cross Station. There are free tram stops nearby as well as supermarket. Guests have access to an indoor heated pool, a fitness centre and unlimited free wifi. The whole apartment internal build-in 75sqm plus 5sqm balconies. - In total 80sqm for this spacious apartment. This is great for a large family and small group of friends travel together in Melbourne. This self-contained two bedroom apartment has a kitchen with a microwave and full size refrigerator. Laundry facilities and air-conditioning facilities are included.  Basement parking is $45 per night, please ask for availability before you book. But guests don't really need a car - the tram is right there, train nearby and most things in Melbourne can be walked to in 5 minutes from this great location - central but quiet!! Airport transfer is very easy, Take airport shuttle bus (Skybus) from the airport to Southern Cross Train Station then walk 3 minutes

Hello, I'm Bill

A warm and cozy bathroom. A comfy living area with a large 5-seater chaise set. TWO Foldable single beds & pillows. A fully decked kitchen and dining. Complimentary coffee and tea. A laundry area with a washer, dryer, iron and an ironing board. A private balcony. ALL TO YOURSELF! Please click on the photos to view more about this property and it's surroundings. This fully equipped and furnished 50sqm home is ready to go with:     - 32 inch LCD TV     - Air Conditioning & heating     - Wireless internet     BEDROOM     - King sized bed     - Quilt, pillows, sheets, throws & covers     - Bedside table & lamp     - Storage closet     - Hangers     - Full length mirrors     STUDY AREA     - Desk & chair     BATHROOM     - Shampoo, body wash & hand soap     - Bath, face & hand towels     - Floor mats
host_about:
Having travelled and worked in a number of cities around the world, I realised it was hard for me to know where home really was. A hotel today, and next, the other. Having stumbled across AirBnb during one of the defining moments in my life, I made a clear decision to commit to this fully and have never looked back ever since. I take pride in what I do in having to provide amazing guests from all walks of life with a home even for a night across the properties I manage in major cities all around the world. Home is never a particular place. It truly is where the heart is. 

Have a great & memorable stay with us :)

name: The Hamptons Premier 2 Bedroom Apartment
summary: Step inside and enjoy all things Hamptons with our luxury 2 bedroom accommodation offering, located only 130 meters from Port Melbourne beach, vibrant Port Melbourne Esplanade, the amazing Bay Street shopping precinct and all only a short 11 minute light rail trip into Melbourne’s CBD.
space: OPENED ON JULY 1,2017 you can now experience breathtaking beach and city views from your private entertainers balcony in this luxurious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment.  The open plan kitchen, living and dining spaces make the most of the natural light and stunning vistas. The well appointed stone benchtop kitchen with stainless steel 4 burner hob gas cooktop, dishwasher and microwave allows you to engage with guests or family whilst entertaining. A spacious walk in pantry includes access to your own espresso pod coffee machine. The spacious master bedroom includes a luxurious 5 star hotel quality queen bed with a deluxe ensuite, television, built in robes and views out over Port Melbourne. .  An additional bedroom with a queen sized bed and built in robes is located at the rear of the apartment. A functional central bathroom with shower also services guests. A laundry with a separate washing machine and dryer can be found off the main hallway. Your very own private entertainers balcony
host_about: Our goal is to offer our discerning guests with exclusive access to luxury accommodation in an area normally reserved for Melbourne's elite. Being 130 metres from the amazing beach of Port Melbourne it was only fitting that our vision for this building involved styling it in the theme of The Hamptons. Our apartments are designed for everything from a romantic getaway to an executive needing nearby Convention Centre & Exhibition Centre accommodation

name: Modern 3 bedroom fully furnished house
summary: Great house. Modern spacious home with fully equipped kitchen. A lovely and clean place to stay when visiting Melbourne for any occasion.  Three bedrooms.  The main bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom with soaker tub, shower, toilet and large walk in robe.  Two other bedrooms have large built in robes and comfortable beds. There are two separate lounge areas with two TV"s and a separate dining area with large table to entertain.
space: Unknown
host_about:
We hope you enjoy Melbourne and your stay at our Airbnb. I am a friendly, creative person who respects all cultures. I love art, travel,  watching Netflix and trying new things. Airbnb is a great  way to meet people from around the world.

I love Australia and all it has to offer. My motto is treat others as you would want to be treated.

name: Cosmo to Country
summary: You will be in the centre of Bayswater. Bus andTrain one minute walk. Supermarkets, medical, hairdressers restaurants and coffee shops across the road. Public transport accesses Knox City and Eastland or take the train up to Belgrave and explore the shops and country surroundings. Your bedroom and ensuite are private - Ground floor. You can share the 1st  with me (if I am home). You are in charge of the TV channel selections.
space: In addition to your private room and ensuite, you can share my kitchen and living area. This includes a TV, massage chair, guitars, keyboard  and bingo drums. The balcony is another place where you can sit at a table to eat on a nice day.
host_about:
My house is an excellent base for public transport travel. Train and bus are across the road. You are welcome to use all of my kitchen facilities for cooking. Take-aways and cafes are across the road. I can show you around and maybe drop you off if you are going in my general direction.
Your room has a small, private ensuite. TV is in living room. You decide what to watch because I have my own TV upstairs.
If you are a muso, I may let you play my guitars: I have heaps of sheet music to share while you are here. I have a small keyboard and a karaoke setup in living area. I can take you to karaoke or open mic venues Thursday, Friday and Saturday nights.
And for any French visitors......
J'aime parler Francais; donc, si votre Anglais est aussi mauvais que ma  Francais, nous pouvons aider les uns les autres!
I would like to start going on holidays near beaches but haven't done it yet.
I love beaches and water; however, be warned that, in Bayswater, there is NO Bay and NO water!!
My general motto is: If in doubt: DO IT!!

host_about:
Hi my name is Lisa Emrose,
I run a boutique short term rental business called Rejuvenate Stays and I have a number of hand picked properties across selected areas in Victoria. They range from Phillip Island to Clunes to Inverloch and Melbourne CBD. 
 
I love being able to help you find accommodation that will fit your every need so please don't hesitate in contacting me. 

I adore what I do as every day I am dealing with people who have a special story about why they need accommodation with me. I hear from guests all over the World and have learnt so much about the needs of travellers. I have used all this knowledge and hope I can bring it together for you in meeting your hosting experience.

summary: Southern Cross 火车站对面最新公寓,阳光超赞,家具精致齐全,拎包入住｡公寓设施一应俱全,包括最先进的游泳池,水疗,桑拿和健身房｡而且公寓6楼还有空中花园,可供住户攀岩和BBQ｡ 公寓安全性极高,有门禁需要刷卡进楼!绝佳地段交通巨方便!步行2分钟至Southern Cross 火车站,楼下就有免费电车可以去city,还有墨尔本最大火车站､汽车站还有机场的往返巴士,从此开启CBD便利生活｡对面还有商场,Coles超市,华人超市, outlet,附近还有各种餐厅､咖啡厅､subway､7-11,所以永远不愁吃饭｡房间的采光极好, 客厅阳台可看到美丽海景｡ 公寓有两间卧室,有一名友好热情､充满活力的阳光小伙儿(我)住在其中一间,为您提供方便指导｡ 可能由于翻译的问题会造成一些误解,请随时询问,我将尽可能详细回答｡ May be the translation will cause some misunderstanding problems, please feel free to ask and I will answer as much as possible.
space: 我的房子是一个温馨的家,热情欢迎每一个天南海北的有缘人来相聚｡希望与你们成为朋友,希望为你们的旅行增添快乐和温暖｡ My house is a warm home.  Everyone from everywhere is warmly welcome! I hope to become friends with you and  I hope to bring happiness and warmth to your trip. 请大家注意,任何的联系方式都会被屏蔽的,留下手机邮箱等联系方式是看不到的,也不能回复｡ 在到达之后,请通过airbnb与我联系,我会到楼门口迎接｡

name: Sweet South Yarra Studio
summary: Welcome to my studio apartment in lively South Yarra — two train stations away from the city, and close to all the cool cafes, shops, relaxing parks, and cool night spots you need. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Make yourself at home, it's all yours: including a kitchen, laundry facilities, and rooftop with a stunning view of Melbourne.
space: A nifty little studio apartment with everything you need.
host_about:
Hey, I'm Lex!

I work at an education startup and love technology, fitness, and adventure. And coffee.

I have lots of different interests: for example, I studied Linguistic, Psychology and Biology, read about technology heaps, but also read about things like design, architecture and global issues. 

I love travel, and my favourite city would have to be San Francisco, but I'm always on the lookout for a new favourite city.

I can't live without my laptop or the internet, but I also love the outdoors. that means my favourite season is summer, and I spend as much of my free time on the beach if I can.

Finally, as you'll learn, I love to smile, laugh and hear about the stories of different people.

name: 61*Boutique one-bedroom*Boxhill Central*Mall
summary: Completed in Sep 2018, Poplar Street Apartments is only 8-minutes's walking to Box Hill Central. The transport hubs of Box Hill train station, bus and tram complex are 200 meters away. Each apartment offers a well-equipped kitchen with fridge, dishwasher, gas cooktop and microwave, making in-room dining more convenient. Quiet tree lined street just 3 minutes walk to a wide selection of cafes, bars, restaurants.  MSAC, Lake & Beach within 7 mins walk.
space: Guests have a king size bed, fabulous linen and a private bathroom with a free flowing hot shower over bath. Big fluffy towels provided. A fabulous self serve breakfast featuring a range of fresh fruit, yoghurts and cereals.    Albert Park, an upmarket and safe area of Melbourne, 2 km closer to the CBD than St Kilda and just 2 km from St Kilda.  Albert Park 600 metres from the Bay and 3 kms from Melbourne CBD. Guests also have use of the dining room and lounge room.    Much of what Melbourne offers is easily accessed by foot or tram from Albert Park!   3 tram routes  provide direct links (no transfers needed)  to SkyBus Southern Cross station, St Kida, the CBD, South Melbourne Market, Fed Square, RMIT & Melbourne Uni, Fitzroy, Richmond, Lygon St (Little Italy), the Exhibition and Convention Centre and the Casino. Nearby bike share also available. Recently published books that highlight aspects of Melbourne for everyone are available to peruse.  Middle Park Village (3 restaurants, 1 win

Views are down the Mornington Peninsula to Cardinia Reservoir and the Bays.  Relax on the recliner lounge while taking in panoramic views. The Farmhouse was built back in the early 1900’s as one of the original houses in the Kallista area.  The two fireplaces and some of the rooms are original dating from that era.  The Farmhouse is made from Lilydale Stone and has 2 Bedrooms with queen beds, both have an ensuite, (For 2  guests, we lock off the second bedroom). It has been beautifully r

name: Oberon Stylish Art Deco
summary: This apartment has an elegant but comfortable, quality art house feel with air and light minutes from the most exciting and eclectic street in Melbourne, Acland St. Enjoy unusual decor, a mix of old-world and modern close to beach and botanical gardens.
space: This gorgeous apartment has a new Bosch dishwasher, Turkish leather couch, antique lacquered wardrobe, hand knotted Shiraz carpet, luxury linen and original art work. The apartment is a three minute walk from Acland St St Kilda which is the oldest, most popular area of Melbourne. Not only visitors from Interstate and Overseas visit Acland and Fitzroy Streets (nearby), but even Melburnians flock there on weekends. At either end of Acland St are trams to the city (20 minutes) and Balaclava (5 minutes) where there's another whole world of interesting shops. Acland St itself has the best restaurants and cake shops you'll find in Melbourne, from Blue Corn, the best home made Mexican food (hand made burritos, tacos and tortillas) you'll find in this half of the globe, to Leroys, the coffee connoisseur's choice, delicious Chinta Ria's Malaysian kitchen and Santa Anas Tapas Bar to die for. A three minute walk behind the apartment is the 100-year-old St Kilda Botanical Gardens with gazebos, a l
host_about: Hi, I'm Barbara. I'm an Australian author and traveller. An experimenter and love being challenged by life.  I've most recently worked in a remote Aboriginal community but was previously a journalist. Gabriel Garcia Marquez is my favorite author. On my retirement agenda, is a month doing yoga in India, a month in Perguia  at a school improving my Italian and a month at a language immersion school in France to improve my French.

name: Charming garden studio apartment
summary: Cosy bungalow set in extensive, productive garden in Melb's hip inner west. Feels like the country but 20 mins to city by bus. Footscray is foodie heaven. You'll find Indian, Vietnamese, African and Chinese eateries and hipster cafes galore. Enjoy!
space: The separate bungalow faces onto the garden with a toilet and sink. There are chickens and cats and an extensive vegetable and fruit garden. You are welcome to share the kitchen and BBQ and the shower with the window that opens to the garden so you can wash while you watch the birds. There is s large outdoor terrace  is perfect for summer drinks. It also has a wood fired fire if it gets a bit nippy.  My husband and I are artists and we share the house with my 18 year old well behaved daughter who is doing her last year at school.  West Footscray - or WEFO as it is known - is full of groovy places to eat- all within walking distance. It's also close to the Williamstown beach and there is a beautiful river with lovely walks nearby as well as a large shopping precinct with anything you could ever need.
host_about: I am passionate about art and literature and professionally involved in both. I am married to  my partner in crime. We have 3 kids between us, all old enough to have their own ideas about the world. We live in Melbourne and have a place in the country involving caravans and a bus.

We may not always be at home as we both travel quite a bit, mainly to visit our daughter in USA.

name: Essendon Escape 3Br 3Ba near Moonee Ponds
summary: You won't find anything else like this luxury apartment in Essendon. This brand new, extra large, luxurious apartment is in an brilliant location; close to the city. You can easily enjoy its first class entertainment, arts, sporting and social options or just as easily wander to nearby cafes, restaurants and shops; including a DFO and large shopping centre nearby.  Stylish and smart, efficient layouts allow for more living space whilst maintaining access to all modern appliances when required.
space: You won't find anything else like this luxury, three-bedroom apartment in Essendon. If you want high quality accommodation in Essendon, you have found it. If you just want an everyday, cheap stay, this stunning property won't be what you need. With more than 500 reviews for StayCentral on TripAdvisor, Airbnb & other well-known global websites, at 4.9 Stars, why look elsewhere? The sense of space and light in this spacious apartment creates a warm living space that is easy to live in, and is accompanied by modern appliances and premium quality finishes. Stylish and smart, efficient layouts allow for more living space whilst maintaining access to all modern appliances when required.   This spacious apartment includes a large balcony with commanding city views towards the Macedon ranges. You can sit back and enjoy the expansive sunsets and watch the big airlines float in and out of Tullamarine Airport in the distance, or simply entertain family and friends in this large, private space. Ev
host_about:
A mining engineer by profession, I have owned two other service businesses since 1998. I started StayCentral when I purchased one apartment in 2005, and now manage multiple properties in many different locations in inner Melbourne.

Like many of my guests, I love to travel; both overseas on epic journeys (including remote locations like the Mulu Caves in Borneo, ancient cities (in Nepal, Turkey, Peru & Jordan), Antarctica & Alaska, Torres del Paine and colourful markets in amazing places like Fa Long in Vietnam, Jaisalmer in India, & La Paz in Bolivia). I also love short domestic trips for weekends away just to relax. It means I get to be on the other side of the counter, and experience how other people look after their guests: and I take their good ideas back with me. 

(My manager, Max, has also travelled from afar to be here btw, and he can also speak with our guests in Russian and Ukranian).

I even worked as a part-time tourist guide in Melbourne for a couple of years, and really enjoyed the interactions with the tourists off the huge cruise liners that appear in Melbourne each spring and summer. I have tried to extend this experience into my accommodation business here at home, where I really love assisting people with their stays. You only need to read the 550 or so reviews on Airbnb, Trip advisor, Goo gle, and on my own StayCentral website to realise how much our guests enjoy our apartments, and the way we look after them. 

I like keeping fit with gym work and roller-blading; often blading 30 kms or so on a day out. I cook for my mates once a month, and have done so since 2007. I cook and they bring the wine; my other love since coming to Melbourne in 2003.

I love living in Melbourne. It enjoys a unique place in Australia. It is often described as the cultural, business, shopping and sporting capital of the country. The restaurants and cafes in Melbourne are amongst the best in the world. I love living in an urban village amongst these, and all the other everyday shops; and jumping on a tram and avoiding the hassles of traffic. It is a city of great opportunity, experiences, events and lifestyle that can be enjoyed by locals and visitors alike; and I really enjoy facilitating our guests' stays here.

StayCentral Melbourne Corporate Apartments is a unique group of serviced apartments in central Melbourne. We offer boutique short and long-stay accommodation for relocations, family holidays and getaways. Our comfortable apartments have also been enjoyed by employees and contractors, executives and people needing temporary accommodation. We even have many pet-friendly apartments available! We provide excellent customer service from the time you first contact us to make a booking, through to the end of your stay.

All of our properties from one-bedroom apartments to seven-bedroom mansions are close to all the everyday things our guests would need during their stay; from cafes, restaurants and supermarkets, to shops, trams and nightlife - yet all locations are generally very quiet.

All of our interiors have been designed by experienced interior designers, and you will experience that feeling of "I'm home!" when you walk in, make yourself a cuppa and put your feet up. We supply far more than tea and coffee etc. There are many extras that make your stay more pleasant for our guests; including shopping trolleys, free Netflix in most properties, umbrellas and book exchanges.

I do hope I have the opportunity to help you get to know Melbourne and grow to love it as I have.

name: CR11 Single Rm GuestHouse Brunswick
summary: Rm 11 Single occupancy private lockable room.  Typical guests, professionals 23 - 40 y.o. All bills & Linen inc. Internet $16 per wk extra.
space: The property boasts high quality internal fixtures and fittings: a fully equipped kitchen with granite bench tops, chic bathrooms with porcelain finishes. Generously proportioned deluxe single rooms, have warm timber tonings, quality fixtures and fittings, where the focus is on comfort and convenience in a friendly and inviting environment and a ready made home away from home.  The room is furnished with furniture you would find in a 4.5 star hotel. There is a reverse cycle air-conditioning unit, 32” TV and DVD player. King single bed, two seat couch, desk, side drawers, bookshelf. All linen, included towels are provided.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Valeria. My husband Ben and I own and manage a number of upmarket guesthouses located in the inner Melbourne suburbs. 

We specialise in offering a new and unique opportunity to overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, teachers and other business specialists to gain superior inner Melbourne accommodation and lessen the stresses of moving to a new town, new state or a new country.

We offer fully furnished, centrally located properties with plenty of parking and quality fixtures and furnishings, each has an alfresco entertainment area and BBQ in a garden setting, a fully equipped property in an exclusive professional apartment house environment, where new arrivals, to Melbourne, or people going through a lifestyle transition, can experience an instant community atmosphere for medium (from two weeks), or long term stays, and say goodbye to lonely, restrictive and expensive apartment living.

No more solitary TV dinners! Each property provides apartment house accommodation on a room-by-room basis with shared kitchen, dining and lounge facilities. This style of apartment house living provides opportunities for new arrivals, to Melbourne to quickly, form friendships, build networks with other likeminded people and settle more easily into a new life. This helps to alleviate homesickness and improves their effectiveness in the workplace or place of learning.

A safe and comfortable home life makes for a happier Melbourne experience.

Typical Tenant Profiles

Flexi (Hidden by Airbnb) is open to a wide range of people from professional backgrounds usually between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) years of age. Typical residents are overseas, inter and intrastate visitors, corporate and career professionals, academics, post and undergraduates (3rd year and over), trainees, language students, doctors, nurses, teachers and other specialists or people in the throes of re-establishing a home and life in Melbourne.

Ben and I hope you choose to stay with us and we have the opportunity to make your stay in Melbourne a life long happy memory.

summary: Welcome to my superb 1-bedroom apartment located in the best part of Melbourne – South Yarra.  Enjoy the stylish interior, comfortable living, and the local area  - famous for cafes, restaurants, shopping, markets and nightlife.  The Yarra River & Botanical Gardens are also close by – with walking trails and green spaces.  Public transport is also a 2 min walk away. which makes the CBD accessible in less than 10 mins. Great for couples, friends, and business travellers on your next city break!
space: This is simply the best location for making the most of all Melbourne is known for – enjoy excellent cafes and brilliant coffee, restaurants, galleries, beautiful parks, the Yarra river, sporting venues and events, shopping, nightlife and more from this awesome apartment. Relax in the light-filled, modern interior of my comfortable home with it’s stylish design and peaceful atmosphere.  Enjoy the comfort and outlook of the lounge room which comes with a pull-out sofa bed to accommodate any extra guests.  Enjoy cosy nights in, with a movie streaming on the TV and a glass of local wine.  The kitchen is neat, modern, and comes with all your essential appliances including a coffee machine.  This space is perfect for preparing meals at home, so you can really live like a local and settle in to your nearby neighbourhood.  Shop up the road at the Prahran markets and fill the fridge with all kinds of delicious things. Get a restful night’s sleep on the comfortable queen bed and wake up refresh

name: Luxury Port Melb  view, city, beach, food doorstep
summary: Welcome to our apartment set up just for you to enjoy your time in Port Melbourne. A modern apartment with all brand new furnishings with two bedrooms, two bathrooms and 2 car parks for you to make yourselves at home. Great for working in the city, visiting for the Melbourne's great sporting calendar or just relaxing in the surroundings.  Ideal for couples or families with children over 12.
space: There’s more to Port Melbourne than meets the eye at first glance. It is a place where modern lifestyle meets Australia’s yesteryear, as evidenced by its restored historic structures and quaint old pubs tucked into gleaming high-rise neighbourhoods with stylishly designed dining, drinking, and entertainment and shopping venues. Less than 5 km south-west from Melbourne CBD. It offers some of the very best restaurants, pubs, bars, clubs, cafes and hotspots in the entire state of Victoria. Catch your breath in Bay Street’s cafes, dress up for beachfront drinks, or relax in the sun and dip your toes in the water. People-watch at 3 Station Pier or Waterfront as the Spirit of Tasmania ferry arrives, and the international cruise ships dock. Go Shopping On Bay Street Excellent shopping opportunities are available in Port Melbourne on Bay Street. If you want to go for a nice walk and see an abundance of cafes and boutiques, Bay Street is the ideal place for you. It’s also a great destination fo
host_about: I am married with one 22 year old daughter. I work in education.

name: Big & Bright Brunswick Bungalow - A
summary: Spacious, private room in a well-maintained, clean and welcoming house. Trams, trains and buses are only a 3-6 minute walk away, making it a great launching pad to anywhere you want to go in Melbourne and a sanctuary after a day of exploring.
space: The house is a lovely period home with high ceilings and polished floorboards throughout. It’s furnished and styled minimally and maintained exactly as depicted in the photos. Your private room is large and bright and is one of three bedrooms adjoining the main hallway. There is a comfortable queen size inner-sprung mattress bed with electric blanket, fresh cotton sheets, a duck down duvet and soft pillows of varying height. There's a chest of drawers, a rack with hangers for your clothes, plenty of space for suitcases and a small desk can be moved in, if required (and if not already in use by the other guest). A block-out blind does a good job of darkening the room. Also adjoining the hallway is the shared laundry, bathroom and toilet. All of these are separate rooms so there are rarely issues with sharing the facilities with others. At the back of the house is the kitchen/dining area and lounge room which adjoins an enclosed outdoor space with comfortable seating. There's a lovely pa
host_about:
Hello, I'm Kate and I'm 39. I'm originally from Perth but I've also lived in Tasmania, London and New York. I love to travel but I'm now enjoying being stationary in my favourite city and home: Melbourne.

I have my own business that I work on from home and from my studio down the road, mostly selling mid century modern furniture and indoor plants. My hobbies include cooking, making coffee, gardening, walking Freckles and watching addictive TV shows online.

Freckles is my right-hand dog and co-host. I adopted him in August 2016 from a rescue organisation who found him wandering the streets of country NSW. He's a happy and gentle boy whose hobbies include sleeping, eating, herding other dogs at the park, playing fetch, getting belly rubs, meeting new guests and getting them to play fetch/give belly rubs.

name: Apartment close to Chapel Street
summary: My lovely first floor flat is in the heart of Prahran, just a short walk from Chapel Street, but quiet and peaceful.  Public transport is very close by, and a street parking permit is available upon request.  Come and explore Melbourne!
space: Unknown
host_about: I love kids and animals, my favourite colour is green, my favourite book is Persuasion by Jane Austen, and my favourite movie is The Breakfast Club.  I bake as often as I can, and sew and knit to relax.

name: Slick Melbournian townhouse!
summary: I have a great 3 level townhouse in a fantastic spot in Brunswick - near tram, train and a cycle path to the city. Princess park is also close by as well as the Melbourne Zoo and Royal Park Golf course.
space: Modern, cosy and conveniently located townhouse. Make yourself at home and feel like a local in an awesome suburb of Melbourne - close to Melbournes best pub & gig scene. Experience the real Melbourne. Happy to help out wherever possible. Originally from overseas myself and totally know the ins & outs of what travellers are looking for.  Brunswick has a lot to offer - typically Melbourne's hipster scene with lots of bars, restaurants and gig spots on offer. Also very close to heaps of parks and public transport. VERY convenient - located across the road from the 55 tram and the 504 bus goes right outside the door. Jewell station is also about a 5 - 10 min walk away.
host_about: Lover of travel, food, film, music and all the positive things that life has to offer. Recently back from a 5 month trip to south & Central America. Love meeting new people and having great chats of travel and experiences. More than happy to provide insight into the area, good restaurants, pubs, attractions etc.

name: Comfort & Convenience!
summary: With walking distance to both the local shops and train station, 15 minutes from the CBD and a $25 taxi fare from the airport, this charming Melbourne home offers guests their own lounge area, bathroom with spa, computer access and back decking area.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: SKY IN Service Apartment - Doncaster
summary: An outstanding comfortable and convenient place, experience unbeatable shopping, dining and entertainment convenience with the vast Westfield Doncaster on your doorstep. Relax with State-of-the-art resident amenities including: pool, gym, Top-floor rooftop terrace overlooking Melbourne's skyline with BBQ facilities. Chill out in your apartment located on upper floors with stunning views. Self-contained with a queen bed and a sofa bed available at your request.
space: Place is good for couples, family,  solo adventures, and business travellers. Building is well secured with access card or fob required to get in. Has concierge in front desk operating during business hours. Has secure underground parking available.
host_about: Unknown

name: Sleek 30th Floor Apartment with Spectacular View!
summary: Million $$$ View
space: - Million dollar view of Melbourne CBD  - Modern open plan kitchen, everything you need for cooking is provided. -Premium 5-piece-set toiletries provided. -Kids friendly. -Premium bedding furniture. -One queen bed, one double bed (sofa bed), one queen air mattress and two single beds, easily sleep 6 adults -Wash+dryer combo provided. -Unlimited Telstra NBN internet, super FAST!
host_about: I love Melbourne

name: Brighton by the Bay
summary: Home is great for 5 mins stroll to trendy shopping strip, boutique clothe shops, supermarkets, Cafes, licensed International restaurants, train station. Dendy Cinemas & all major banks.  Main bedroom has split air conditioning, wardrobe, new queen size bed & bar fridge in room. Adjoins to modern self contained bathroom with heating & exhaust fan. New kitchen & open plan living that looks out onto a leafy garden. People from all backgrounds & cultures are welcome in my home.
space: Comfortable, spacious living areas look out to sunny courtyard & large outdoor deck & garden area. New open plan kitchen & dining area. New Queen size  comfy bed with split air conditioning, wardrobe, desk & mini bar fridge. Bedroom adjoins to private modern self contained bathroom. Within 5 min. stroll to trendy Church street shops & popular Bayside beaches.  Include many excellent cafés, licensed international cuisine restaurants, trendy clothe shops, 2 main supermarkets, beauty parlours & major banks. Beautiful safe Bayside beaches within 10 mins. easy stroll. Close proximity to Bay Street shops & North Brighton train station. Free Wi Fi & private car spaces available.  My 2 friendly, well behaved poodle pets Mimi & Max share my peaceful quiet home . They are my most adored furry pets.  Guests from all cultures & religions are welcome.
host_about:
I am a retired Secondary Food Technology & Art teacher. I have a Certificate in Hospitality & commercial cookery. Cooking & the Arts are just 2 of my favourite passions. I enjoy art house movies at our local Cinemas.
 I love meeting people from other countries & cultures . Making them feel welcome to our home is essential so that they feel happy to ask me for any queries & to acquaint them to living in the Bayside area.  We are within a short stroll to the Brighton beaches. Church Street Shopping offers many choices of amazing Cafes, Restaurants, trendy clothing shops, Movie Theaters all major banks just 3  mins walk from home.  Public train line & bus lines to city & neighbouring suburbs are reliable transport to City & Westfield shopping Mall. I Love to travel so I can see my 3 adult children who live in London, Uganda & Taiwan where I will be looking forward to attending my youngest sons' wedding in August. Summer is great time to take our 2  beautiful poodle puppies Max & Mimi to the dog beach next to the Brighton Yacht Club.  Can't live without my Cappuccinos & sumptuous lunches at my fav. café Bossy Boots in Brighton.

name: Holly Cottage- Dandenong Ranges Family Retreat
summary: Holly Cottage, is central and walking distance to restaurants and dining, great gardens and bush walks, along with great views along the way. Quirky and antique decor and furnishing, not a hotel but a home. Organically kept house, no harsh chemicals here.;] Easy stroll into both villages of Olinda, yet so secluded, peaceful, and quiet. Netflix, Stan, Foxtel and Telstra TV for your enjoyment. Spacious part of the house, and very private. Off street parking. Suitable for couples and families.
space: Spacious part of the house, cathedral ceilings and radiating beams on ceilings,  unique residence with lots of heating options and so very close to everything in Olinda.   Quality new beds, quality bed linen and towels, locally made toiletries and ample breakfast and day time snacks supplied.  Netflix, Stan, Foxtel, USB full of movies and Telstra TV available. Fresh flowers in season from the garden.
host_about:
Down to earth, honest and reliable.
Love meeting new people and share ideas and experiences.
Gardening is a new passion as is the beekeeping and everything that goes with these two.
Music and dancing warms the soul at any time.
Could not live without my family.
Would like to host in the same manner, accept you as my family.
Life is sooooo short, live in the moment.

name: MODERN 1-BR APT - 5★ REVIEWS + NYE FIREWORKS!
summary: ★ Stunning view from bedroom & balcony!!! ★ Unlimited Internet/WIFI ★ Complimentary Netflix!  ★ Opposite Melbourne's iconic Etihad Stadium & Southern Cross Station (Skybus). ★ In Free Tram Zone! ★ Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. +++ If this apartment is not available, try my new 1 bedroom apartment : https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/14461615 +++
space: This modern 1 bedroom apartment is set in the best location to enjoy all Melbourne has to offer. Uninterrupted stunning seaviews to west of CBD, Dockland, Southern Cross Station and Victoria Harbour. The apartment is filled with abundance of natural light. Enjoy the convenient Melbourne CBD living style with shops and cafes across the road. There is even a Coles Supermarket and a Asian Grocery shop just across the road. Tramlines are at your doorstep. The free city circle tram is just a 4 minutes walk from the apartment. A short stroll will bring you to the Docklands, Crown Casino and Entertainment Centre and South Wharf DFO. The apartment is just opposite the Southern Cross Station which the Skybus terminal is located. So getting to/from the Melbourne airport via the Skybus is really easy!
host_about:
Hi! Thanks for viewing my profile!

What I love the most about living in Melbourne is that Melbourne is a multicultural city where you can enjoy variety of foods, street arts and nature.

Both myself and my co-host Simon (both Airbnb Superhosts) have been hosting for more than 5 years. We will do our best to make sure you enjoy your stay with us! Our reviews speak for themselves!

Also have a look at my Airbnb guidebook where I listed some of the highlights of Melborne. Also I have a 'secret' list of my favorite foods specially prepared just for my guests! ;)

Below are the list of all my apartments :
https://www.airbnb.com.au/s?host_id=10394006
or
https://www.airbnb.com.au/wishlists/209489358

If you are new to Airbnb, you can use this link to get travel credit towards Airbnb booking!
https://www.airbnb.com.au/c/dlee824

Why book with Superhost?
First what is a superhost? https://www.airbnb.com/superhost

As a guest, what could be worst then arriving at the Airbnb and find that the host has cancelled your booking! Your previous time which can be used to explore the city is now spend calling Airbnb and fanatically looking for another accommodation. You may even ended up blowing your travel  budget because what's available in the last minute is higher than what you originally booked.

Booking with Superhost means you peace of mind and much lesser chance of having your booking cancelled.

name: Quiet Neighbourhood Good Location
summary: Older style unit in a quiet neighbourhood. Located on 2nd floor. 2 bedroom unit with 1 bedroom for your use. Living area, kitchen and bathroom shared. Washing machine and dryer can be used. Close to public transport 2 bus lines to city and Brighton beach. 2 tram lines to st kilda beach, Luna park, city, Caulfield and Kew. Train station within 10 minutes walk to city and Sandringham. Shops including 2 supermarkets, eateries and cafes within 10 minutes walking. Pub and restaurant close by too.
space: Quiet place. Heating and Fan provided. TV can be watched in Living area.  Close to shops, eating places and public transport including buses, trams and train
host_about: Friendly, clean, honest and responsible. Work full time. I have been to 21 different countries. Like watching netflix, music, travelling, playing video games.

name: Stylish Self Contained Bunkhouse
summary: Escape to our country retreat with a bunch of friends or family. So much fun to be had in this peaceful spot - whether you stay in house or explore the local delights, which are a drawcard for people from all over the world. We look forward to indulging you with our hospitality in our little bit of heaven!
space: Our bunkhouse is the perfect setup for a group of friends or a family looking for a good value country getaway. It can accommodate a total of ten guests in two separate bedrooms - one bedroom has two single beds (which can be converted to a double) and the other bedroom has 4 bunks, allowing for 8 people. Each bedroom has an entrance doorway to the well appointed, communal bathroom. You can look after all your needs in house with a fully equipped kitchen suitable to cook anything up to and including a Christmas dinner! The lounge area has a 42" flat screen TV, DVD player and stereo if you just want to relax. Surrounded by beautiful Paulownia trees the bunkhouse is well protected from the sun in summer and warmed by effective heating in the cooler months. There is an under cover outdoor sitting area with BBQ and heater which is a popular spot to read or watch the passing horsey goings on from.  Being a working equestrian property, there is the opportunity to have a riding lesson or two
host_about: My husband John and I purchased our property in 1991 and have subsequently built our dream country property. We love living in our idyllic, peaceful spot and sharing it with our very special family that includes a chatty cockatoo, lots of gorgeous horses, two very friendly dogs, a couple of cats and a donkey we adore. We are lucky that our work is our passion - all things equine! We do enjoy entertaining and travel.  Our life mantra is - live well, love much, laugh often! We look forward to meeting you! Happy travels - Leanne

name: Accomodation for One/Two - Private Room
summary: A Furnished bedroom with a doublebed available for visitors in a houseshare. Enquiries welcome at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). House located in a beautiful green estate in Rowville. Close to buses leading to Stud park and knox city. Cooking is allowed at home and internet is included. Child and infant-friendly.
space: The estate has a Gym and a swimming pool, 2 mins walk from the house. Bus stop nearby.
host_about: I love to watch movies and listen to  music. Love to welcome guests at my place and offer them a warm and comfortable place to stay.

name: Delightful Clifton Hill Townhouse!
summary: Set next to the beautiful Darling Gardens, our fully furnished and equipped 2 storey townhouse in charming, leafy Clifton Hill is a perfect base for your trip to Melbourne. Guests will have their own private room with double bed, wardrobe, desk, powerful split system heating/cooling and are free to use the rest of the house as desired. All amenities and public transport to the city are on your doorstep and it is just a short stroll to Fitzroy's iconic cafes, bars and restaurants.
space: The house has dedicated, off street guest parking and private courtyard. Spacious fully equipped kitchen/dining room with adjoining laundry room and downstairs toilet. Separate living room with 2 sofas and TV which overlooks the courtyard. Stairs lead up to the second floor which has 2 bedrooms and a modern bathroom with shower over bath. Both bedrooms have split system, powerful cooling/heating and built in robes. The guest bedroom, at the rear of the house is next to the bathroom and gets lovely afternoon sun. The house is fully furnished and well equipped, having everything you would need for a short or long stay.
host_about: A chemical engineer with a love for travel, sport, music and food. Living in Melbourne with my partner of 10 years but originally from the south west of England. We lead a relaxed, healthy lifestyle and can regularly be found enjoying the great nightlife Melbourne has to offer.

Gas hot water. Fully fenced front & back yards. Off-street & on-street parking. 3 min walk to Southland shopping centre and train station. Buses out the front. 3 min walk to parkland. 1 min walk to local shops incld. cafe, Indian & Italian restaurants, milk-bar, bottle shop...

summary: Great location between Sunny St Kilda, vibrant chapel St and Albert Park Lake. Big apartment with all amenities provided! Quietly set back off the road you'll have access to cafes, beach and shops and walking distance to the Grand Prix.
space: Spacious well decorated apartment sits quietly off the street looking out into the apartment garden. Good sized bedroom with great mattress and air conditioner. Hanging space and mirror provided. Hair dryer, WI-FI, towels and linens provided. Full kitchen, washer, dryer, clothes line, shower and huge spa bath for those days when you've walked the streets and can no longer stand!  My housemate Dan and I will be away during your stay but my lovely friend Adrian will be around to arrange keys, provide advice about the area and answer any questions you might have during your stay.  Chapel St is famous for it's cafes, shopping and nightlife. If you wanted to get some yummy produce and cook something at home Prahran Market is the place to go! My favourite place for coffee, Market Lane, is located just behind Prahran Market. If you're in the mood for Mexican, Fonda does a great burrito! To many to great brunch places so if you're interested I can give you a list!  In the other direction St Ki
host_about: Hi! I'm Jenna and I currently live in Melbourne! I love to travel and explore the day to day of the places I visit (not super into the touristy stuff). I love coffee and it's always the first thing I research when travelling to a new place. That and the food scene! I love plants and ceramics, markets, book stores and great places to perch myself for some breathing and self reflection. I hope to travel more and more as the years continue!

name: Luxury Top Floor Apartment in Hawthorn!!
summary: Welcome to our beautiful YONDER City Living apartment right in the heart of leafy Hawthorn.  You will love this place because of the location, décor, space, balcony views and it’s squeaky clean.  Just one of two on the property, YONDER City Living Apartment is on the top floor/penthouse, located in Scotch Hill, Hawthorn. Get a taste of living in ‘Hawthorn,’ one of Melbourne’s prestigious suburbs and the World’s most Livable City.
space: YONDER City Living apartment building is a gorgeous original Hawthorn Art Deco style with it’s own staircase entrance. The front garden features a lovely large leafy tree, large palm tree, lovely manicured hedges, and a gorgeous water fountain with goldfish. The interior has been renovated into a modern, fresh, airy, light filled apartment.  The apartment interior boasts stunning décor features including oversized natural chandeliers and gorgeous art pieces.  Brand new beds and quality mattresses with fresh 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton sheets to ensure you have a good night’s sleep. Enjoy YONDER City Living’s view of Melbourne city from your balcony including a view of Melbourne Art Centre, Eureka and Melbourne’s AAMI Soccer Stadium. Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families, and perfect for tourists.  Holiday in style and feel at home. Nothing lacking! Be spoiled and enjoy an unforgettable holiday. Enjoy YONDER City Living’s amenities: KITCHEN: Fridge, mi
host_about:
Hello! My name is Renae and I am a true Melbournian. I love food, coffee, wine, shopping, sport, the beach, travelling and having fun in our beautiful city.

Professionally, I am a Finance Manager for a Travel company. However, my main passion is Interior Designing. Hence, my idea to share our ‘YONDER City Living’ Airbnb, with our Guests.

My husband (Mike) helps co-host the Apartment and we are contactable at all times.

Please don’t hesitate to contact us at any stage, as our aim is to make your home away from home as enjoyable as possible and to make it a memorable experience.

We look forward to meeting you!

The size is approx. 63sqm with balcony! 2 min walk to skybus terminal , southern cross station, spencer outlet , coles supermarket , cafe and restaurants. Free tram / train station / skybus terminal - 2 min walk  Supermarket / Asian grocery - 2-3 min walk there are famous Cafe / restaurants downstairs  Spencer outlet is right opposite of the building ***Noted: There is potential noise around the area due to construction going till the end of the year 2018 In room facilities: Aircon/ heater 32" LED TV free wireless internet  3 seater sofa bed can sleep 2 adults- ( we will only set up sofa bed if you have more than 5 guests or there is $15 surcharge ) coffee table Fully equipped kitchen with 4 burners rangehood oven and dish washer  kettle / toaster/ microwave/ cutting board/ can opener/ knife set /tea bags/ coffee Wine glasses/ mugs / plates and cutlery sets Fryin
host_about:
~ Melbourne sky Apartments~
Dear guests:

We are Eden Charmmy and Cony. We are professional management team . 

All our apartments are unique, therefore we do not offer early check in or late check out  as my apartments are unique, we cannot just put guests in a random available room. 

My team members can speak English Korean Indonesian and Chinese . Pls feel free to contact us anytime. Thank you 
我們可以講中文 
Our working hour is from 10AM TO 10PM. 
We always answer your question within 2 hours during our business hours. 

Important information:

* We provide car park for $15 per 24 hours  ( Multi-entry) . The car park is provided by third party, you will be given an allocated car park number a day before you arrive. 

* There are few car rental companies nearby. You can search car rentals in Southern cross station to save the parking fee if you only need car for few hours.

* We are airbnb not hotel. ( Means you are staying in host's house not a hotel).
Therefore, we do not provide daily cleaning service. Additional cleaning service can be provided at extra cost. 


* Please take your personal belongings with you when you check out. We are not responsible for any lost or damage to your personal belongings.

name: IBR Newport spacious granny flat.
summary: Enjoy this very spacious Newport private granny flat with everything you need right at your fingertips. Just a 15 min walk to Newport station. Only 11 kms from the CBD.
space: Our Spacious Light filled granny flat is situated at the back of our home and is private to guests. It is completely separate to our home and you have your own access to the property. The garden is a shared space ( We're only out there to mow the lawn, water the plants). The large and light filled Bedroom has a queen size bed, comfortable Sealy Mattress fitted with underlay. Bedroom also has a wardrobe, 2 X chest of drawers, bookshelf and bed side tables. There is also a single bed set up in this bedroom.  The 2.5 seater very comfortable sofa in the lounge turns into a fold out bed which can sleep 2 people.  The Lounge has a 42" Samsung LED TV, Books and Magazines for you to enjoy. Our Melbourne CBD accommodation offers 122 exceptionally appointed hotel rooms and suites.

Wake up in the morning with the best that Melbourne has to offer right at our doorstep.  Immerse yourself in the comfort and convenience of a spacious studio room, one bedroom or two bedroom suite fully equipped with modern facilities.

Clarion Suites Gateway has more than just standard hotel rooms, it combines four and a half-star full hotel services with all suite style accommodation offering all the warmth and comforts of home.

Clarion Suites Gateway is a stylish and refurbished 4 1/2 star full service, all suite hotel in Melbourne CBD. Ideally located accommodation in Melbourne CBD right next to the Yarra River, Melbourne Aquarium and the Crown Entertainment Complex.

name: Splendid Southbank–A City Location By the River!
summary: My warehouse-style apartment is ideal for your next Melbourne getaway.  Located in the riverside area of Southbank -  with shopping, restaurants, bars and the Crown Casino nearby - my home comes with every convenience including a swimming pool, gym, spa and sauna. The heart of thriving Melbourne, and all its attractions can be accessed on foot, while the stunning Botanical gardens are located 10 minutes walk away.  Whether you are coming to Melbourne for business or fun–you will love Southbank!
space: My fully renovated apartment is located in the heritage listed historic Bonds Store building by the Yarra River.  The façade is reminiscent of a New York warehouse apartment and guests can appreciate the original brickwork in the swimming pool and gym area, and enjoy the charming courtyard. The carpets and timber floors are brand new and the apartment is modern, spacious and comfortable.  The living area is open plan and free flowing, and comes with two large couches – perfect for those nights in curled up with a glass of wine and a movie streaming on the 65” flat screen TV or perhaps a DVD.   Doors open up from the dining/living area onto a balcony with fantastic views.  There are outside table and chairs as well, so during the warmer months you can enjoy a meal or two outside watching the world go by.  Why not live like a local and prepare meals at home!  The kitchen has Smeg cooking appliances, a Fisher and Paykel dishwasher, and a coffee machine as well as a full size fridge and a
host_about: Unknown

name: Delightful 2BR Unit. FTG: Base of The Dandenongs
summary: Time to reflect Imagine a relaxing Summer break near the lush colour of the Dandenong Ranges in Ferntree Gully Introducing 'Clematis' A warm light filled 2 BR unit  A hop skip & jump to public transport & FTG Village Clematis is for leisure & business travel, couple/twin/solo guests   Easy drive to enjoy   *The Dandenongs   *Yarra Valley   *Retail therapy @ Knox City & Chadstone Day trip to   *Phillip Island   *Mornington Peninsula    Do read House Rules before booking :) Quick Instant Book
space: Still reading? Thank you  :) Everything you need in your self contained, light filled unit. Built in the 60’s and unassuming outside, it's clean and cheerful inside, situated in a small complex of two duplexes, mostly occupied by owners.  A neighbour, with whom you share a common wall, both inside  (on the bedroom side of the unit), and between the courtyards,  is quiet and unobtrusive.  Please extend the same courtesy, particularly at night. Thank you Comfortable and simply furnished, relax on the leather couch,  snooze on your comfortable bed, enjoy your own sunny courtyard If you're with a friend, there's a single bed in the second bedroom.   R/C heating/cooling ensures year round temperature control For your convenience there's WiFi a Chromecast and Netflix. To ensure the provision of this service to all guests,  and so the behavior of some does not disadvantage the majority of guests you agree to a fair use policy, i.e. up to an average of 6GB per day of stay The boring bits...
host_about: Hello I'm your host, Christine. My family is growing up and I have recently retired from full time work so I have a little more time on my hands. We enjoy a break now and then at Mt Eliza & Ferntree Gully but our beloved little flats are sometimes vacant: that's where you come in. We delight in welcoming you. My children have often used Airbnb as they've travelled the world. Now it's our turn to contribute to the comradeship of this fine community. Your turn to relax and enjoy!

name: SPACIOUS 2BR apartment 5km to CBD
summary: A great apartment in a fantastic location!
space: Spacious 2bd apartment on 2nd floor (stairs only) in quiet street. Open living & fully equipped kitchen opening onto balcony surrounded by trees with seating & BBQ.  Comfy 3 seater couch with 60" TV & free Netflix. 2 large bedrooms, both with Queen beds. Bathroom with shower/bath & inbuilt laundry. Separate toilet.

summary: STUDIO APARTMENT (one room and bathroom/shower) Value for money here. The block is Neo Georgian style and maintained in good condition for its age. Priced accordingly at aprox $90 per night, $100 on weekends it's fantastic value for money.
space: Fantastic little studio, amazing value for money. I have 2 other apartments in the same building  so your friends or family can stay there in their own room.  Three apartments in total- all studios, for two people each apartment has a double bed. This apartment is a STUDIO APARTMENT (one room and bathroom/shower and balcony)  Spacious for a studio. The block is Neo Georgian style and maintained in good condition for its age. Priced accordingly at around $90 per night, $100 on weekends it represents fantastic value.  The apartments is lovely, decorated with style. You won't find better value for your money.  Lovely bed with beautiful linen. I will personally greet you on your arrival and provide a familiarisation tour. If required, I'll advise you on all things Melbourne such as shopping, attractions, lane way restaurants, how to get there and what to do!  Ask and I'll help.   You're in a fantastic spot with everything is at your door step.  The beach is just minutes away.   Located 6km
host_about:
25 years in the restaurant industry, a switch to this wonderful life of apartments.  I'm really enjoying looking after you all running between 19 apartments.   You'll love my places, all unique, all stylish and in the right spots for you to explore this wonderful, most livable city in the world- Melbourne.
I'm really well priced with all apartments in prime spots and in great buildings. Happy to help where I can to guide you to all things Melbourne.
Joe Mottola.

name: Cosy and Spacious 4BDR Family Retreat + Parking!
summary: Located in the lovely suburb of Wantirna South, find yourself a short drive away from the Dandenong Ranges, Mount Dandenong, the iconic Puffing Billy Railway attraction, and Westfield Knox Mall. This four-bedroom house is perfect for families and large groups that want to indulge in some nature and still have easy access to Melbourne's hustle and bustle of a city - located around 40 minutes away! Free wifi is available throughout your stay, and the garage has four parking spaces for your use.
space: The LIVING AREA is separated into a living room, lounge room, dining room and study. While the living room contains two 3-seater sofas, a coffee table and a flat screen TV, the lounge room contains a 3-seater sofa with an indoor fireplace and the dining contains a 6-seater dining table. There is central heating and air-conditioning available for use in all areas of the house, but please switch it off when not in use - we deeply appreciate it! The master, second and third BEDROOM each contain a queen sized bed, while the fourth bedroom contains 2 single beds -all of which come with fresh, clean luxury linens and an all seasons quilts to keep you warm throughout the year. There is also a baby cot in the master bedroom for families with a young child, and sufficient storage space for your belongings and hangers for your clothes. Upon arrival, you will find the BATHROOMS stocked with body wash, hand soap, shampoo and conditioner for you and your group. We also provide toilet paper and bath
host_about:
Roomerang is an end-to-end short stays team based in Melbourne.

We are avid travellers and know how hard it can be to find comfortable and cosy, yet affordable accommodation. We try to remove all the complications surrounding your stay, so you can focus on other important aspects of your trip. And if you feel we have left anything out, let us know and we would love to help.

Roomerang provides professionally cleaned and well-kept, affordable stays presenting you with a home to return to no matter who you are, where you're from or what you are here for!

Great for 2 guest.

host_about: Hi I am Peter. I use Airbnb for both traveling and hosting. I like to travel around the world with my family. I have two kids here in Melbourne. My wife is also helping me with hosting. I can speak English and Mandarin. If you have any question about my room, no worries to ask me.

name: Queen Vic Market luxury 2br Warehouse Apartment.
summary: A lovely warehouse apartment on the first floor near the Queen Victoria Market. Superbly appointed with plush furnishings and gourmet cookware. Plenty of light courtesy of a small bedroom patio and a dedicated light well. Enjoy the ambience and quiet of an historic building with modern facilities. Each bedroom has fine rich cotton linen and queen sized beds. Fully air conditioned and smart televisions in each room. Secure undercover parking. On the cusp of the CBD, free tram zone, 5mins to train
space: On the first floor of an old Queen Victoria Market warehouse. It is a quiet sanctuary on one level with a street balcony. An abundance of natural light fills the comfortable living areas and bedrooms. A walk in shower compliments a well appointed bathroom. Your Melbourne City Home?
host_about:
We are a couple in our mid fifties with a passion for providing quality homely inner city accommodation.

We work in preschool education and the airline travel industry.

We enjoy living in the vibrant cosmopolitan city of Melbourne.

name: 1 Private Room in fresh & modern, 3BR w/2 bath
summary: 1 room available in a 2 level, 3BR, 2 bathroom, townhouse/apartment, 5 min walk from Smith St (full of bars, cafes, restaurants, supermarket etc) and 20 min walk (10 min tram) from downtown. Access to the apartment/townhouse is via a courtyard. You are welcome to smoke in the courtyard in front of the apartment (not inside the apartment). This listing is accommodates for 2 adults in the available bedroom. The guest bathroom is a shared bathroom between the two guest rooms (is not an ensuite).
space: The complex is a mix between refurbished original buildings and new buildings - typical for Melbourne. Just 15 min walk through fitzroy/treasury gardens, past St Patricks cathederal, to the "Paris End" of downtown (where Parliament House and the Treasury building is.  Alternatively, 10 min on the tram to the city. Collingwood, as well as neighboring Fitzroy on one side and Richmond on other, are popular among the arts and culture scene, with unexpected street art found around random corners, as well as bars, clubs, cafes and restaurants to suit all tastes.
host_about: Australian, 34 years old, male, who is excited to come visit Brazil in September!

name: Caulfield Value Apartment 2rms 1bath 考菲尔德超值公寓!两室一卫
summary: 房源是在Caulfield难得的公寓房,干净安全有保障,进出门需要刷两次卡｡房子闹中取静,小区内有花园､图书馆､酒窖等｡ 位置十分便利,10分钟内到达Caulfield station 火车站 且附近有各类餐厅,超市和便利店,可以满足一切生活基本需求｡ 火车站旁边有巴士900  10分钟直达chadstone,南半球最大的购物中心｡ 这是个两房一厅一卫的公寓 可以使用公寓设施(室内游泳池,桑拿和健身房 使用时间6am-11pm)器材齐全,健身房全天有冷气开放｡ 房子配有Wi-Fi､沐浴用品,绝对干净且保证为一次性使用的床上用品､厨房配有榨汁机,微波炉,烤箱还有冰箱｡餐具､调料可以任意使用｡食材在附近的coles买回来就行了｡ 有家庭影院:客厅一整面墙都可以投影 晚上看电影电视剧综艺节目特别有氛围｡ 房子主要特点就是整洁宜居 平时房主很爱护 经常定期做清理｡所以请租客可以把房子当成自己家一样爱护｡
space: 位置十分便利,步行去 Caulfield station 火车站 不到10分钟 且附近有各类餐厅,超市和便利店,可以满足一切基本的生活需求｡ 巴士900  7分钟直达chadstone—南半球最大的购物中心｡ Uber 17分钟可到达 Middle Brighton Beach  搭火车去City20分钟到达~ 在crown 有购物中心~ 附近有一条亚拉河,很适合晴天在雅拉河边晒太阳｡沿河周围有很多非常好吃的餐厅小酒吧,值得一试｡ 火车一站 5分钟直达South Yarra   充满活力的特色区 local 最爱的区域之一 Prahran market (当地的鲜货市场)值得一看 在Chapel st. 不仅有好吃的好看的餐厅 brunch店 还有许多时尚精品店｡ 对于来留学的学生 Monash Caulfield Campus 就在火车站旁边,Monash H楼底就有校巴直达 Monash clayton Campus 在Clayton的同学也不用住在那么“荒芜人烟”的地方,就有公寓级的享受｡
host_about:
Hi, I'm Maureen, currently studying at Monash University. Please feel free to contact me with my email address ( (Email hidden by Airbnb) and my w~e~c~h~a~t~ (Ling0w0) if you have any questions.
