name: Toorak, Chic, Sunny Apartment.
summary: Beautiful , elegant, leafy light 2 bedroom 2 story townhouse with contemporary finishes. Located in Melbourne's most exclusive address. Surrounded  by Melbourne's most beautiful homes. My apartment is close to Toorak Village, Tram stops and the city.
space: This apartment offers relaxed and very comfortable living with a sun filled, north facing lush garden for enjoying outdoor dining.  Inside there is ample space for dining and sitting or maybe feet up for watching television or foxtel on the smart TV. There is also Internet, a fully appointed kitchen,  a powder room and laundry.  Upstairs there are  2 bedrooms and a bathroom with separate shower.
host_about: I love Melbourne and also spending a lot of my time at the Mornington Peninsula where the coast is quite beautiful.  Here I adore the walking, golf, cafes and community spirit.

name: Comfort that's close to everything!
summary: Living in Melbourne over summer means you will have the ability to do so many great things in one day or only 1 and still have the best time of your life. This is the best city in the world. Our house is the perfect start, so enjoy it.
space: Our house has all you need: internet, access to push bikes, travel cards, DVD player, VIDEO player, CD player, even an old school record player. This kitchen has a microwave, cooktop and oven. We have a nice big courtyard to relax and have a cold drink while using our BBQ. A sofa bed and queen sized bed allows up to 4 people to sleep comfortably.
host_about: Unknown

name: 5* Views in Docklands 2 bed+wifi, netflix, c/park.
summary: Come and enjoy breathtaking, panoramic views over the Yarra river and Port Phillip bay. A tranquil sanctuary with scandi inspired décor, this modern 2 bedroom apartment is light filled and inviting. Indoors fun.. Wifi, Netflix, pool and gym outdoor fun.. barbecue space and gardens, outdoor exercise equipment. This building is located within the CBD free tram zone which means everything Melbourne has to offer is at your fingertips. This is a family friendly space with baby amenities available.
space: Enjoy the amazing views from the kitchen, lounge & both bedrooms, perched above the Yarra River this Docklands 2 bedroom with queen size beds, 2 bathroom apartment is a quiet place to relax and unwind. This is a secure building and access to the architecturally designed building and lobby is via the security fob.  With access to the free tram zone right outside the building, getting around Melbourne is made easy. Walk only 200m to the Woolworths Supermarket for any groceries and needs. Subway and Pita Pit are only 150m from the door for those easy quick bite choices.  This is a family friendly space, with a portable cot, baby bath and high chair available and can be provided upon request. Please let us know when making your booking if you are staying with a baby/ toddler and require any of these items.
host_about:
Hello, we are from Melbourne Australia.. We are on half acre at the foot hills in the Dandenong ranges.. married with two young children.. we enjoy spending time with family, home reno's, motorcycle rides and working our own businesses.. we have 2 cats and a dog. We love travelling and have enjoyed our time as guests and are excited to now also be hosts.

Tony has travelled a lot mainly for work. This has given him great opportunity to enjoy different parts of Australia. Staying with airbnb hosts is awesome and you always feel more at home when meeting and staying with people and not in motels. 

Tony and Stevie look forward to welcoming you.

name: Stylish, private retreat in a great location.
summary: Stroll to Camberwell Station, Auburn Village, boutiques, restaurants, food market, Trash and Treasure market and the Rivoli Cinema. Enjoy the fresh new refurbishment, the natural light, clean and stylish decor and above all else, the peace and quiet. Private and secure (gate intercom), it's perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Positioned on the first floor, admire the views across to Camberwell from each window and the balcony. Car parking available.
space: Light filled first floor apartment, with balcony for indoor/outdoor living, large living/dining, kitchen, quiet bedroom, bathroom with washing machine and rear yard car space. Air conditioned.
host_about: A creative couple who love Italy, design and having a nice home and garden. We have 3 great kids and a pug called George.

name: Pikku-Helmi artist cottage
summary: Our arty, colourful, and fully self-contained cottage, Pikku-Helmi (Little Pearl), has all the basics that you need for both short and long stays. Set within 4 acres of land along the creek, this is a peaceful little spot, and yet only a few minutes drive from Hurstbridge shops and 1 hour on the train from Melbourne CBD. The owners with 2 children live in the cottage next to this one. The price per night includes towels and linens.  It's also possible to rent an outdoor sauna ($25 / session)!
space: The cottage has a combined bedroom and living space with a queen size bed, a sofa bed, 2 comfy chairs, 2 coffee tables, a dresser, a wardrobe for clothes, and a television on the wall. There is also a separate bathroom as well as a kitchenette with a dining table. As already said, this is a peaceful little place, yet it is also within walking distance (1.5km) to two train stations and the centre of Hurstbridge. A bus also stops at the main road not far from the cottage. The train line runs right next to the property (you have to cross the railway tracks to reach us), but it rarely bothers anyone.      Terhi (one of the owners) is from Finland and, besides having a traditional wood-fired sauna at the property, the cottage also has a lot of things from her home country, including our favourite Muumintroll cups, plates and bowls for guest use.
host_about:
We are interested in travel, permaculture, local economies, living sustainably, world history, different cultures, and much much more! 

Jaiden is Australian and Terhi is Finnish and we've been together for 16 years (mostly in Australia, but also some of it in Finland)!! We have 2 kids, Lumi and Miska, who are quite the characters ;)

name: Coventry St Modern Bright 2BR | Wifi Balcony
summary: This bright modern 2 bedroom apartment is in the perfect location. It's hard to find such a nice space so close to the city, the beautiful Botanic Gardens and the sporting precinct.  1 queen bed & 1 single bed, 1 bathroom- access from both bedrooms, perfect for families, friends or work colleagues travelling together. Only 5 minute walk to the Royal Botanic Garden! The tram into the city is around the corner, NGV, Arts Centre, Yarra River & Southbank Boulevard, CBD - all easy to explore!
space: Modern and fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. Lounge with comfy sofa, TV and chromecast. The apartment is fitted with A/C. Master bedroom with a Queen bed and en-suite. Second bedroom with single bed and en-suite. Bathroom with walk-in shower. Combined washer/dryer unit. Furnished Balcony. Wifi.
host_about:
Hi there, we are bnbpal, and we are here to help hosts make your trip great. We work with a number of hosts in Melbourne, all of whom have one thing in common, they want their guests to enjoy a 5-star stay. 

To help our hosts, we cater for all your needs. Just let us know whether you are on a business trip, or on a romantic getaway, and we will make sure your trip runs smoothly and you want to return again.

During your stay you will have a dedicated bnbpal point of contact who can help you out with anything. Arranging airport transfers, a restaurant recommendation, whatever you might need is just a phone call or text away.

The 109 and 48 trams both stop at the top of our street the 48 takes you straight to the MCG and the 109 takes you right into the city. Around the corner on Wilsmere road there is a local grocer/cafes/restaurants and shops (approx 300m away), more options can also be found on High street (approx 800m away).

host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Private cosy room in great location

space: We live in a spacious 3 bedroom villa with lovely natural light, and a fully equipped kitchen to cook in. There is air-conditioning in 3 of the rooms, and heating throughout the house, so you can keep cool during those scorching days, and warm in Melbourne winter! See whole house ad and other private bedroom ad for reviews and photos. You will be sleeping on a comfortable (on the firm side) double sofa bed, and there is also a cot for your baby or toddler. There is free street parking or you we can provide you with a parking permit if necessary. Public transport: Fairfield train station is a short 10-15 minutes walk, and then a 10 min train ride to Melbourne city. We are located close to many great restaurants, pubs and bars. Not to mention, the leafy Fairfield Boathouse which is about 5-10 minutes walk away, where you can run, cycle or walk along the Melbourne famous 'Yarra River'. If you have a car, there is handy access to the Eastern Freeway taking you out to the Dandenong Mountain
host_about:
Hi! I’m Mel from Melbourne, Australia, and I live with my partner, Fabrizio, from Bologna, Italy. 

We try to travel and explore the world, as much as possible. We love experiencing different cultures and enjoying great food!
We prefer to experience the local culture, rather than stopping only a couple of days in a place, and heading on to the next location. Meeting the locals is what makes the experience all the more worthwhile! Airbnb is great for this :)

We have had many people stay with us over the last couple of years, and have really enjoyed each and every experience. 

What is important about Airbnb is the relationship and communication between the host and the guest. So far we’ve had some great experiences, and hope this continues.

Comprising of one queen bed, one sofa bed, a large lounge suite, half of which can be made up into an extra single bed if required, there is a self contained kitchen, bathroom, dining table, underground car space, free wifi now available and one of St Kilda's best cafe's situated on the ground floor of the apartment building. space: A serene and tranquil St Kilda location in this stylish inner urban, self contained apartment. The generously proportioned living zone incorporates a fully fitted study and leads off to a chefs kitchen and expansive dining area. Comprising queen sized bedroom a fully tiled semi en-suite bathroom. Euro laundry and ample storage.  This super convenient location provides easy foot access to a selection of boutique shops, café’s and restaurants on Acland st or nearby Chapel st. Harpers Kitchen café is literally at your doorstep on the ground floor of apartment building, with a mouth-watering selection of food and barista made coffee, you will surely find everything you need at this apartment.  With secured entrance, lift access, a car park and being only a short stroll to anything your heart desires. Free wifi is now available.
host_about:
I decided to place my home on Airbnb because; I recently had a double lung transplant and cannot work while I'm still recovering but I still need a way to pay the bills. A friend of mine suggested I give this a try. So I am. 

I really love my apartment. Living in St Kilda is great, there is always somewhere nice to eat out, go for drinks, take a stroll down to the beach or the botanical gardens and there is always many travellers in the area to meet along the way. I miss living there. 

Now I spend my time with family and have started back my hobby in creating artworks. One thing on my bucket list is to learn Spanish in Spain and hopefully live there for a time. 

“We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.” – Anonymous

name: Queen Room in Resort Style Complex in Southbank
summary: Homely apartment walking distance to Melbourne CBD, Federation Square, Crown Casino, NGV, China Town, MCG, Exhibition Centre. Tram stop outside front door.  Lovely resort style complex featuring pool/spa, gym & tennis court.
space: The apartment is clean and tidy.
host_about: Unknown

name: Stunning City Resort
summary: Stunning modern two bedroom, two bathroom  apartment located on the 13th floor with City to sea views situated in the heart of melbourne.  Relaxing out door resort pool and BBQ area over looking the Melbourne skyline. Has wifi and car space for parking.
space: Light and Bright with amazing views.
host_about: We're from Melbourne Australia. We live near the beach and enjoy the outdoors with swimming surfing snorkelling bush walking and kayaking. We look forward to holidays so we can get away and explore new places.

name: Big comfy private room near Melbourne CBD
summary: This new flat is located across from Melbourne University, flanked by a supermarket within 5 mins of walk and one stop away from free tram zone to CBD, with heaps of vibrant cafes and restaurants around the area. You will have your own well-lighted room furnished with a medium size bed and a closet. This modern-styled apartment is sure to satisfy all that you need! I expect you to be a respectful and tidy person. Please feel free to Direct Message me if you have questions
space: Kitchen and living area is shared with my roommate Adam, my bedroom is located directly on the right side of the main entrance. Bathroom and toilet are separated, and also shared with roommate.
host_about: Hey I'm Amber, a master student studying global media communication at Melbourne University. I'm originally from China and I'm crazy about music and food. I love watching cartoons and going to live music events. I've been interested in psychology but haven't taken time to really work on that. I love fashion and used to work with a few street brands...Tell me something about you :)

space: Perfect for a couple or young family holidaying in Melbourne! Easy on street parking in a leafy part of town. The unit has a queen bed in the master bedroom and a sofa bed in the spare room that sleeps two. There's a barbecue on the deck too.
host_about: Unknown

space: The chalet is behind the main house. You do not need to enter the house to access the chalet. We have a beautiful border  collie dog who will also be there to greet you on arrival. Whilst Toby is very gentle and well trained, if you are not comfortable with dogs this property may not be suitable.
host_about: Unknown

We are Wendy & David

We are artist and designer.
We own this delightful property.

Exceeding guest expectations is what we’re about. 
If you’re looking for a truly special and authentic Melbourne experience, in a warm, stylish inviting space that is close to the many wonderful attractions our city is famous for, then this house is the perfect choice. Feel free to contact us and we’ll be happy to assist you plan your perfect stay. 

Looking forward to hosting you.

I am a stylist who loves to create, I specialise in interiors, food and events.

I have lived and worked in many places around the world and am always ready for more of the same. I'm really enjoying my home town Melbourne and think it's full of whatever you would hope to find.

My place is comfy and furnished with everyday use amenities, and the building has a pool, gym, sauna, BBQ area, visitor sitting lounge, and also a rock climbing wall! Roomy and comfy for 1 or 2, just nice for 4, accommodates a maximum of 6.  Inside the apartment  is modern, nice and comfy. It has a open plan living area including the lounge with a full kitchen, a sleeping loft, dinning area, laundry facilities and a functional shower room.  I have a full size double bed in my apartment for the first 4 guests and a sofa bed which pulls out into another double size bed for 2 more guests, convenient for those who are travelling on a budget. Else the sofa bed can fit your kids nicely and they may love the novelty of sleeping on a pull out bed :-) It has a reverse cycl

Hello :-)

I am BenO, I like to travel around Asia mostly, I have travelled to Europe but haven't been to the US yet

I like to get to know new people and also open up my home to host, looking forward to this new adventure!

Bedroom is separated from lounge. Toiletries, Towels, Linen & Coffee provided. Quiet, Safe corner of city, in front of Free Tram zone. 3 mins walk to Southern Cross Station, Casino & Convention Center.
space: What some of our previous guests have said: Loved our stay here. The apartment is very conveniently located just a block back from the Yarra River with great waterside walks and cafes in both directions and both sides of the river. It's also on the free tram circuit in Melbourne so it's a short distance from everything. The apartment itself is modern and comfortable with good amenities and a FABULOUS VIEW of the river, the amazing Crown Casino flame display (hourly after dark every night) and NEW YEAR'S EVE here is absolutely stunning with displays on top of all the surrounding tall buildings from our balcony on the 28th floor. Ticked all our boxes and we will definitely stay again. " “Shirley's place is amazing. Very quiet apartment. Personally, it was the best Airbnb experience so far. The place lives up to the description and photos, in fact, I promise it is even better. Breathtaking view from a high floor with an incredible city view line. Perfect location for business travelers si
host_about:
We are a semi -retired couple and we have been very lucky to host some really lovely people over the years. 

Our aim is to provide comfortable and affordable accommodation for couples or families as we know that sometimes times are hard but everyone still need a break from the mundane daily routine. That's why you will have the whole place to yourself to relax while watching the fantastic view from the lounge room or balcony of my home.

We love travelling as we love to meet various people of different culture.

If we can help you make your stay more enjoyable at our holiday home, please let us know. We hope you will choose to stay with us.

name: Family cottage in central Emerald
summary: Train Whistle cottage is located in the beautiful Dandenong ranges close to many wedding venues and our famous Puffing Billy train and not to forget our lovely forests with many birds,  wildlife, mountains and cafes.
space: Train Whistle Cottage is a 3 bedroom self-contained cottage suitable for 6 guests in beautiful Emerald. Catering for families and their pets (conditions apply) Train whistle cottage offers a fun stay for all. The property is fully fenced so children and their pets can play in the yard under the gorgeous Japanese maples. As you enjoy your stay at Train Whistle cottage you will hear the ever so gentle Whistle of Emeralds famous Puffing Billy train blowing as it makes its way through  Emerald on its way to the lovely cute town of Gembrook. A 5 minute walk takes you to Puffing Billy Station where you can board the train to either Gembrook or Belgrave, take part of the famous ride through the lush green country side of tree ferns, gum trees, hills, and rolling pastures. Only a 3 minute walk from Train Whistle Cottage, you can enjoy the many café’s, restaurants, and shops that Emerald has to offer. Train Whistle cottage is in a great tourist location, within half an hours drive, you can visi
host_about: Hi our names are Rob and Evelin, we are a middle aged couple full of adventure, we welcome you to the beautiful Dandenong ranges where we have lived most of our lives. We have 7 children between us and 9 Grandchildren. We love to travel and see new places in Australia and overseas. Rob loves steam trains and freight trains, we have chased many of them, I think you would call him a gunzell. we love our 2 dogs, Gypsy our German Sheppard and Tinkerbell our little Terrier. Dinning out either in a restaurant or under the stars, camping and friend & families are our favourite past times.The idea of our holiday rental came from our own travels and experiences and the input from our adult children, some of our children have their own families and have expressed to us what they look for when they go on holidays with their young children and teenagers. Hopefully we have created a pleasant and convenient home away from home for you. We love meeting new people and hearing their travel stories, so please feel free to share them with us if you wish to do so.

name: Allinda, awesome city APTMT living
summary: Our spacious 1 bedroom apartment has stunning views of the city and features all the trimmings including a pool, gym, sauna, and free WIFI!  The massive kitchen/dining area is great for eating in and there is a double sofa for extra guests!
space: This home is in a fantastic location, high above the city.  The balcony has plenty of space to read a book or catch up on a few emails while enjoying some sun.  For longer stays, the kitchen and laundry are perfect amenities.  Enjoy home cooked meals - after you've tried all the amazing restaurants, of course - after hitting the pool or sauna. The sofa bed folds out to become a comfy double bed for up to two adults or it is great for couples travelling with a child.  This is your own private apartment to enjoy and treat just as you would your own home.
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

name: Cosy Room en route to everything
summary: The room is spacious and private with lots of storage space. Guests are welcome to use the ultra comfortable leather sofas in the living room to lounge and watch TV, or hang out in the garden in warmer weather..
space: The space we have created is welcoming and homely. We like people to feel it is their home for as long as they choose to stay with us.
host_about:
I've lived most of my life in Sri Lanka and documenting art and cultural programs like 'Facets of Lanka' for TV and radio has given me an intimate knowledge of the island.
As a travel writer and environmentalist I can help with ideas for what to do and where to go. I love the roads less traveled.
Work keeps me in Melbourne but I take every opportunity to be back home, as I personally believe it’s the most beautiful place on the planet!

name: Matisse Cottage
summary: Uncover a secluded escape in this modern boutique cottage with vaulted wood panel ceilings, a private yard, and an ornate fireplace. Enjoy the serenity of the natural surroundings and the quaint Mount Dandenong villages just up the mountain.
space: This is a perfect little hideaway for two.    Your space to do as you please.  You can lie in bed and watch TV, a little kitchen has all you need and we have provided tea, coffee, sugar, biscuits and fresh milk for you. A lovely double ended soaker bath is luxurious.   A big shower in the shower room. TV with Netflix for your enjoyment, magazines and books.   Wifi is complimentary. Come, relax, enjoy the typical Australian garden with magpies, a lemon tree and a rotary cloths line! The village of Montrose is just behind the cottage, so pop through the fence gate to get anything you may require.
host_about:
After 24 years offering accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges just an hour from Melbourne, we are now offering a beautiful little group of cottages for Air BNB guests.
We live in The Dandenongs, have lived in Fiji and PNG before moving to Melbourne 30 years ago.     
We have a large family, 2 cats and 2 dogs to keep us in hand!     They will not annoy you as your cottage is on a different property.

name: Graceburn Gardens: Riddell Room
summary: Graceburn Gardens is in Healesville in the heart of the Yarra Valley and a stone's throw from wineries, a wildlife sanctuary, restaurants and boutique shopping surrounded by glorious scenery. Our historic home and exquisite garden offer the perfect spot to relax. Rated #1 Best Value B&B on TripAdvisor.
space: Graceburn Gardens is an Arts and Crafts historic home and garden, lovingly restored with luxurious modern comforts. There are three spacious and distinctively styled bedrooms each with their own bathroom to choose from. We also offer additional luxury self contained accommodation in our poolside Gallery. This listing is for the Riddell Room which has a large ensuite bathroom with a large shower, double vanity and toilet. Please enquire if you would like to book more than one room or for more than one night. Enjoy exotic curios, antiques, open fires, climate control in your room, a spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries and a lavish cooked country breakfast.
host_about: Keith and I feel privileged to live in Healesville in the Yarra Valley where gourmet produce, first rate wineries and breweries and fabulous restuarants and cultural destinations are close by. The mountain scenery from our garden is breath-taking. We have immersed ourselves in restoring our century old Arts and Crafts style home and glorious garden and we love nothing more than looking after guests and giving them a taste of the best that Healesville has to offer. A favourite shared memory is climbing a mountain in Cambodia and reaching the summit to hear Santana belting across the valley welcoming villagers to a wedding. Our home features many travel momentoes in harmony with family heirlooms and all the modern comforts. We take our cue from our guests in getting the balance just right between pampering and maximising privacy.

name: Suburban sanctuary

host_about: am driven friendly individual, committed to providing you with an enjoyable stay.  I am trustworthy and bring a loyal and caring dynamic to those around me.

name: Designer Sth Yarra 2BD PAD *WIFI + PARKING
summary: "Orianna" - enjoy GYM, SAUNA, STEAM ROOM, LAP POOL, TENNIS COURT, BBQ AREA! Design & style with amazing city views ideally located in the heart of Sth Yarra. 2 bedrms, great cafes, funky bars, restaurants, & Chapel St downstairs. Secure parking included.
space: Please check my other listings if this property is not available on your preferred dates. Specials for long-term bookings, just ask!! Conveniently set high above the world famous Chapel St, the space and location of this apartment is unmatched. With 2 good sized bedrooms (both with high quality mattresses one queen sized bed, one double (and an additional pull out sofa bed) a party of 6 can be accommodated.  Location wise, you could not be in a better position with the vibrant heart of South Yarra literally at your door step. The apartment is set many floors above ground allowing for lovely views of the city but little to no street noise. You'll be so spoiled for choice with every type of restaurant and bar available in this famous Melbourne area. If you come by car, a secure basement car space is included in the offering with security access providing you with great piece of mind. FREE BROADBAND WIFI & SECURE PARKING
host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

name: Charming 2BD inner-city terrace
summary: A charming terrace with 2 spacious bedrooms, modern kitchen & bathroom, and indoor/outdoor dining area. Trains take you direct to the tennis, MCG and the city. Or relax in the Edinburgh Gardens, breakfast at Mitte, and explore local artisan shops.
space: An immaculately-presented house which has been lovingly renovated to provide all the comforts of a modern house behind a classic Edwardian terrace facade.  With soaring ceilings, baltic-pine flooring, and double-glazed floor to ceiling window in the living/dining room the house is warm and light-filled. Two queen-sized bedrooms, a modern kitchen & bathroom, cosy living room and a beautiful indoor/outdoor living/dining area ensure that it’s a delight to spend time in.  You’ll also have access to free WIFI, a smart TV, and a library of books and music to enjoy. Nearby you can relax in the Edinburgh Gardens, breakfast at Mitte, or enjoy the cafes of Queens Parade, St Georges Road or Brunswick Street. Wander the quirky back streets to find interesting little artisan shops or some of Melbourne’s best street art. There’s some fine coffee poured in nearby cafes and a range of bars and restaurants from cheap to some of Melbourne’s finest dining - we’ll happily give you recommendations to the m
host_about:
We love living in this relaxed inner-city neighbourhood with its quirky backstreets, multiple transport options into the city, arts precinct, MCG and all the other attractions that Melbourne has to offer. Close by we have a range of parks, fabulous cafes, restaurants and artisan shops. 

We also embrace travelling and experiencing some of the world’s rich cultural and natural diversity. So while we find North Fitzroy a delight to live in, we are pleased to have the opportunity to share our home and neighbourhood with you. Just as we have shared the homes and neighbourhoods of people all over the world.

name: Iconic Former Theatre 2level Unit
summary: An iconic former Universal Theatre.  Hello and welcome to my home. I hope you enjoy the place as much as I do. I’ve lived in Fitzroy for 2 years and absolutely loved it. My 2-level apartment (stairs to get to the bedroom) w a balcony, delivers a boutique Fitzroy lifestyle-vibrate & cozy. Close enough to funky bars & restaurants that you can walk everywhere but far-away enough to enjoy a quiet night in. My apartment comprises of a big bedroom (w study desk), & bathroom. You'll feel right at home
space: Located in an amazing place full of character and creativity. Amazing cafes and food spots, amazing coffee and unique shopping. You'll have something to do, someplace to be, and have something to see every night. This is my apartment and I was living there for two years so please expect it to feel like a home and not like a hotel. There are stairs to get to level one where the apartment is (but also ramp access via the garage), and stairs to get to the bedroom therefore may not be suitable for everyone.
host_about: I am a psychotherapist and work with children. I love my job. I’ve lived in Fitzroy for two years and absolutely love the place. I hope you will too. Fell into Airbnb and really enjoyed hosting and meeting new people, so I made it a full time thing

name: Welcome to wonderful West Melbourne!
summary: Private room in cosy flat close to the city centre. Conveniently located next to the Queen Victoria Market and in the Free Tram Zone, this is the perfect location to experience Melbourne from. Also nearby - Errol Street Cafe Precinct, Royal Melbourne Hospital, Melbourne University, Docklands and most other tourist attractions are just a short walk or tram-ride away. In addition to the fantastic location the apartment also has a large rooftop deck with city views perfect for those sunny days.
space: The apartment is small but comfortable and gets lots of natural light. The room is furnished with queen bed, clean linen, bedside table, drawers, free-standing wardrobe and has space for luggage. There is a big window with views to bustling Victoria Street.
host_about: Unknown

Comfy lounge with kitchen, shower & toilet; close to Warburton & Healesville. Horses negotiable at extra charge per horse. You will be able to settle yourself in and enjoy the private accommodation for yourselves. Walking distance to the historic Home Hotel in Launching Place for a meal, or Doon Reserve for a swim!
space: The getaway is completely self contained and you'll have your own driveway, verandah, views and small kitchen. Undercover parking for bikes available upon request if raining. DVD player, but no TV or Wifi.
host_about: We are adventurous, happy-go-lucky, independent and like the simple life.

We were born and raised in Malaysia. We lived in Singapore for 13 years before migrated to Melbourne in 2017. We have 2 young children. 

Migrating to Melbourne is one of the best decisions we have ever made. We love sharing our city to the world. Ask us about all the best places to go when you arrive! 

Melbourne truly deserves to be the Most Livable City in the World for 7 years in a row!

Cheers Gayle

summary: This cutting-edge tri-level 1-bedroom, 148 sqm warehouse conversion opens up to surprisingly spacious interiors and a funky & functional fit-out, with soaring high ceilings, polished floor boards and roof top deck with BBQ. Your home away from home.
space: This cutting-edge tri-level 1-bedroom, 148 sqm warehouse conversion opens up to surprisingly spacious interiors and a funky & functional fit-out, with soaring high ceilings, polished floor boards and carpet in the bedroom.  Your home away from home is in a quiet secure complex with remote control access to your private parking bay. The ground-level  Accommodates an entry-level powder room, alongside the bedroom. A well-proportioned bedroom  consists of a large walk in wardrobe, a private ensuite with shower and separate sunken bath tub. Comfy queen sized bed, with fresh linen provided. The second level Offers a generous open-plan living and dining area, including reverse cycle heating/cooling. The well-appointed kitchen is fully equipped with all the things you require to cook up a storm.  The top level A spectacular open-air rooftop blessed with fresh breezes, an abundance of sunshine & treetop views over the surrounding locale. Roof top includes large outdoor dining table and 4 burne
host_about:
I work in the travel industry and my passion is travel, meeting new people and discovering cultures. 
Even though I've travelled extensively I'm happy to call this beautiful city of St Kilda home. With it's many cafes with great coffee, beaches and sporting  events there's' always something to do.
Keeping fit is important to me and it's handy that the beach is so close to enjoy a run or go for a bike ride.
I generally spend the weekend catching up with friends at one of the many bars, cafes and restaurants in my area. 
I hope you enjoy this area as much as I do. :)

summary: A full - furniture studio apartment on the second floor of a heritage building in the center of the City with big windows where you can enjoy watching and listening all the colors and music of city life.  A few minutes to Flinders Station and the Yarra River, close to all facilities. I live in the studio next door, so I am available to serve my dear guests any time if needed.
space: The location is the centre of the city. Stairs and elevator to the second floor - easy access
host_about:
I am a writer and journalist, interested in photography. I enjoy riding motorcycle side car with Gary, my husband, a nice Aussie bloke and his friends. I also like travelling and experiencing quiet peaceful nature. I love reading romantic novels, listening to classical music and enjoy cooking international cuisines. 

 We live in Healesville, in Yarra valey, (about 65km from Melbourne), where we have a lovely  house by the Watts  River. I have a part time job as a journalist in Melbourne where we have a Cosy  Studio near Flinders Street Station in the center of Melbourne. 
We wish to share our homes with people who want to experience the  extraordinary beauty of Melbourne City as well as Healesville town 

When travelling around the world, we always choose to stay in the places which have 3 important things: Clean, Good Location, and Not Expensive! Those are exactly what we delightfully offer to you.  

My life motto is "Love conquers all".

name: Executive Bay Views St Kilda
summary: This sun filled, open plan apartment has truly wonderful panoramic views over Port Phillip Bay. It is stylish as well as functional and caters for both the business executive and today's modern family.
space: The furniture, beds, bedding and linen are of the highest quality. We provide free access to Netflix and high speed unlimited internet. The apartment comes with security parking with lift access and the building has a security entrance.  It is located a stone’s throw from St Kilda Junction. You will find yourself a hop, skip and a jump away from a large variety of the best café and shopping strips Melbourne has to offer, including Chapel St in South Yarra, Acland St in St Kilda, Glen Eira Rd in Ripponlea, Ormond Rd in Elwood and Carlisle St in Balaclava.  Public transport is easily accessible to all of Melbourne from St Kilda Junction. However, you won’t want to leave the apartment in case you miss any of the boating goings on in the Bay.
host_about: Conscientious and hard working

name: Foxtel Sports WiFi Fresh New Home 23 mins Airport
summary: Not suitable for parties or events. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids). A comfortable 3 bedroom house, centrally heated and cooled, walking distance to an amazing park the kids will love.  A brand new home in a peaceful new neighbourhood, you can be sure everything is shiny and clean. Melbourne (Tullamarine) Airport - 23 mins Hume Highway - 3 minutes Melbourne CBD - 50 mins Craigieburn - 12 mins Great Ocean Road - 2 hours
space: It is a brand new, beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean home in a neighbourhood that is still being developed. Wi-Fi is free and fast. With all new appliances and gorgeous stone benchtops in the kitchen, you and your family can enjoy making memories sharing a meal together.  Basic pantry items, pots and pans are provided for your convenience. Take a walk over to the fabulous new park and let the kids enjoy the ropes course and slides.  Spend some time with the family without the distractions.  The house is located conveniently to the Merrifield Business Park.  Business travellers and families alike will enjoy the unlimited high speed internet connection.  When productivity is what you need, set yourself up at the table to create a focused and efficient workspace, and fuel yourself with the complimentary coffee and tea. Because we’re located in a new area, there are not a lot of shops nearby.  There is a good country pub a 5 min drive away, but for those looking for the hustle and
host_about: I'm an easy-going guy who likes to travel. I work at a university in Melbourne. I enjoy sports, in particular cricket.  I have lived overseas and know what makes a comfortable place to stay.

name: StKilda Treehouse,Amazing Location,Aircon,Parking
summary: FREE PARKING/ WIFI /WALKING DISTANCE TO FITZROY STREET AND TRAM STOP This building has been split into beautiful and tasteful apartments. This apartment has a gorgeous reading room that feels like your in a tree house, a spacious master room, and newly renovated kitchen and beautiful high ceilings.  Fully self contained 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Melbourne's best tourist district, close to CBD and many local amenities and attractions ## please note currently dishwasher is inactive
space: The apartment is a 1 min walk to the trams that take you to Melbourne's attraction spots, this includes direct access into the CBD and St Kilda, esplanade and Luna Park and Albert Park.  Your space has direct access to a lovely shared court yard at the back of the house. If you are coming with kids its a very handy space, as the gate locks and the kids can play within the court yard. Many of my guests have enjoyed this in their stays here.
host_about:
Hey there, I love hosting people from all over the world, I try my best to give my guests accommodation that has very high standards and great coffee! I pride myself on a clean space for your stay and easy communication between the host and the guest.
Airbnb has changed my life for the better as a mum raising a toddler, the gift of having my airbnb apartments booked is immeasurable and in return I offer 100% commitment to my guests working tirelessly to ensure a happy holiday for all my guests and business travellers. 
I believe in kindness and karma and being someone who is a contribution to the world I live in.

name: A very big room, a big bed and close to the city
summary: This house has recently been completely renovated from top to bottom. It has polished floor boards throughout, ducted heating and air conditioning (although it rarely needs either) and runs on 100% renewable energy (except the gas hot water, removing soon). It has high speed unlimited internet and right next to Cafe Bu. It is 3km from the city and Melbourne University. It is serviced by three tram routes and lies on the Canning St bicycle highway. This room is suitable for 2 guests maximum.
space: This is a very big room upstairs at the front of the house. It has double glazed windows.
host_about: I love meeting people through Airbnb and having quality time so they can tell me about their fascinating lives in far off places. I am also fascinated by the power of computers.

name: Artist's home with  studio and pool. Very central.
summary: This is an architecturally designed home with artist studio. The interior is full of art, creativity, colour and light. The rooms are spacious with lots of natural light and beautifully  decorated with an artists special touch. This home is centrally located in walking distance to the Glen Shopping Centre, station, cinema, cafes and restaurants. You can take a 30 min train trip to Melbournes CBD or a 30 minute bus trip to the beautiful Dandenong Ranges and much much more.
space: A spacious and open plan house, with views from upstairs bedroom over looking a pool and garden and Dandenong Ranges. The location is quiet from traffic yet centrally located to all amenities.
host_about:
Hi, I am a painter and mosaic artist and love to create an environment for my guests that is relaxing and inspiring. My home is architecturally designed with open and airy rooms with art and mosaics spilling from the house and into the garden!
I run adult mosaic workshops and children's art classes from my studio.
I love travelling and have travelled to many places around the world. 
One of my greatest travelling achievements was walking 800km alone, on a pilgrimage across Spain. 
My next venture that I am planning to do is the Annapurna circuit in Nepal.
I love coffee shops, discovering new and interesting places and studying courses.  I always want to be learning new things and growing as a person. I am philosophical and spiritual and believe that life is our greatest teacher, bringing to us the experiences and people to challenge and enrich our lives. 
I look forward to sharing with you my home, my art and my heart! ( and my animals)

name: Private room + Free Parking inner CBD
summary: Spacious and well located Apartement in Kensington Area. - Free car space and within walking distance to 5min to train stations.  - Parkland and recreation center across the road. - Just 2 train stop  from Melbourne CBD - Green Neighbourhood  - Close to CBD You will have your own room with comfy double bed and built in wardrobe.
space: Kensington area is one of nice green and quiet area. There's a lot of local shop around and easy just walking distance. Restaurant,Fast Food , Cafe Coffee Shop is just 6min walking from this places. This Apartment location in green area and easy to get public transportation. You will feel like home not like an apartment.  Modern and minimalist decoration.
host_about: Unknown

name: SUPERB STYLING... BLUE CHIP LOCATION...
summary: Moments from magnificent Fitzroy Gardens and just a quick stroll into the CBD. Walking distance to restaurants, cafes, public transport and Richmond’s sporting hub.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Comfy sanctuary in a dynamic suburb
space: Unknown
host_about: Im a liberal minded chef, into food, music, cycling and general creativity. Currently completing a B.A in Anthropology,  I'm easily distracted by hounds, pretty quiet of character and confidently house-trained. Ive travelled and lived all over the world and can mumble my way through a few languages, though French is my preferred way of creating awkward social moments.

name: Garden Bungalow with the Possums
summary: The Garden Bungalow was this year fully booked by former guests from mid January until the 12th May, 2018 .  I apologise to my lovely regulars who have been unable to book with me.  Now everything back to normal and we are open for business again.  Henry and I await your company!
space: The Garden Bungalow with the Possums is fully self contained and en suite. Separate weatherboard bungalow in my lovely garden.  Totally private, own access with parking on the quiet road; fresh flowers or fresh fruit and fresh sheets. The garden bungalow has a new queen sized bed and a bed settee and a easy chair.. There is Wifi internet access for my guests at no extra charge. There is a flat screen TV. Next to the main room is a simple but functional small kitchen which has a hob,  fridge, kettle and toaster and a microwave oven.  Basics for your arrival for a breakfast are always provided along with tea, coffee, milk and sugar and of course a fruit bowl.  I usually put a few extras in for your first few days.  There is also a table and three chairs. A slow 10 minute amble down the road takes you to the safe swimming beach on Mentone Bay where there is a small nice cafe and barbie facilites. A 5 minute walk takes you to the main line railway station at Parkdale for trains to the city
host_about:
My name is Barbara and I migrated from Hampshire, Old England in 2004 and settled here, in Parkdale, on Port Philip Bay and love it.

If you are thinking of staying here, please note, there are no city views, city is 45 minutes away on the train or drive in 20.  No bay views, but you can walk there in 10 minutes and best of all there is a map linking this listing so you can see exactly where you could be laying down your head.

If you need to be staying in Emerald,  Ivanhoe, Carnegie or Essendon then my place is not for you.  These lovely bungalows are in my beautiful garden where the birds sing in a street in Parkdale on the bay where the friendly locals are and the best coffee in town.

name: Big room for up to 3 to stay会讲中文
summary: Self contain big room with air-con, one queen bed and one sofa bed. 11KM to CBD on Tram 70. Bus 766 from Box Hill to Chadstone Shopping Center. 1.2KM to Surrey Hills Train Station. One free secured parking. Coffee machine, ground coffee, milk and tea bag available in shared kitchen.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

summary: My name is Mark, and I am excited to provide a comfortable room for solo adventurers, business travellers and the like. My place is near Melbourne Airport. My property is located in a planned residential community walking distance from shops, restaurants as well as public transport.
space: Unknown
host_about: IT Professional, non smoker, quiet and clean To have me as a guest is to have a friendly and courteous person who treats your place with the same respect and care that I would my own home.

summary: You will love staying in this furnished studio by the beach! 3 minutes walk to cafes, shops, public transport and the airport bus. Explore Melbourne from this perfectly located base, also an easy walk to the vibrant St Kilda precinct.
space: This ground floor bayside apartment perfectly suited for 1-2 people is one of only eight apartments  in a heritage mansion  called “Thalassa”, meaning "The Sea". Its unique architectural features include cathedral ceilings, enormous storage basement/cellar and rare European stained glass window feature; across the road from the Elwood beach.

name: Luxurious and Centrally located.
summary: The apartment has been newly furnished with a luxurious style to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. Wake up to the stunning sunrise over the Dandenong Ranges, see the hot air balloons float by whilst you enjoy a hot cup of freshly made nespresso coffee on the balcony and watch the world go by. The location couldn't be better with Buses, trams and trains at your door step. As well as, a Shopping centre, Degani, Ribs & Burgers and High St Cafes, bars and restaurants at your door step.
space: You can feel safe in this apartment knowing there is a swipe key for entry and lift entry. The convenient lifestyle means you hardly need a car whilst staying here. However, if you do have a car, there is a car spot in the basement for you as well as many spots available for all day parking in the Shopping Centre car park.  We have a nespresso machine and milk frothing machine as well as a kettle. The kitchen is fully equipped with appliances, crockery and utensils.  The bathroom has basic items such as small soaps and spare toothbrushes in case you forget your own. Coles, Kmart, Lincraft, Reject Shop, Massage, Nail and Hair Salons, butchers, Fish monger, fruit and vegetable shops, japanese, smoothie bar and many other stores are downstairs from the apartment. So if you need any other items or some delicious ingredients to cook up a delicious meal, all you have to do is walk out the apartment lobby, into the shopping centre doors. Chrome Cast and Wifi is available. So you will be able

name: MODERN 2BR-2BTH APT 270º View
summary: ★ Newly revamped 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment. Both bedrooms with wardrobes, floor to ceiling windows and balcony! ★ Unlimited Internet/WIFI + Compliementary Netflix! ★ In heart of CBD within walking distant to Victoria Market, Melbourne Central, State Library of Victoria, RMIT University, Emporium. ★ In Free Tram Zone! ★ Great for couples, friends, family and business travellers. ★ All balcony doors can be locked byvkey to ensure kids don't enter the balcony without supervision.
space: Located in the heart of the CBD on 45th floor, this newly revamped 2 bedroom + 2 Bathroom apartment is located at the corner of Elizabeth St and A'Beckett St. You will enjoy 2 bedrooms, both with build in robes, 2 bathrooms, open plan living area leading on to a good size balcony overlooking the city and suburbs, modern kitchen with gas cooking and quality appliances, split-system heating and cooling. Building comes with pool, spa and the breathtaking rooftop Sky Lounge on level 53.  Location couldn't be better! The most ideal location brings the best of the Melbourne city to you.  Within walking distance to major tourist spots (Victoria Market, State Library, Melbourne Goal) and shopping centres (Melbourne Central, Emporium, Myer and David Jones shopping complex) with terrific nightlife and entertainment options on every corner, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is also in the free tram zone, which means you do not need a car and can just hop on the free trams to most CBD tourist s
host_about:
Hi! Thanks for viewing my profile!

What I love the most about living in Melbourne is that Melbourne is a multicultural city where you can enjoy variety of foods, street arts and nature.

Both myself and my co-host Simon (both Airbnb Superhosts) have been hosting for more than 5 years. We will do our best to make sure you enjoy your stay with us! Our reviews speak for themselves!

Also have a look at my Airbnb guidebook where I listed some of the highlights of Melborne. Also I have a 'secret' list of my favorite foods specially prepared just for my guests! ;)

Below are the list of all my apartments :
https://www.airbnb.com.au/s?host_id=10394006
or
https://www.airbnb.com.au/wishlists/209489358

If you are new to Airbnb, you can use this link to get travel credit towards Airbnb booking!

Why book with Superhost?
First what is a superhost? https://www.airbnb.com/superhost

As a guest, what could be worst then arriving at the Airbnb and find that the host has cancelled your booking! Your previous time which can be used to explore the city is now spend calling Airbnb and fanatically looking for another accommodation. You may even ended up blowing your travel  budget because what's available in the last minute is higher than what you originally booked.

Booking with Superhost means you peace of mind and much lesser chance of having your booking cancelled.

name: Camp at The Ranch
summary: We are The Ranch, a working farm of over 700 acres. Yes - 700! Our property has ample space for you to set up a tent and enjoy a relaxed stay surrounded by nature. Your group can be as private as you wish or if you want to be closer to our share facilities you may even meet some new people. Facilities available to you are a camp kitchen, swimming pool, tennis court, shower and toilet. For campers travelling with RVs there is a drop off point available.
space: Our farm is home to pasture range hens, cows, horses and of course wildlife such as kangaroos, birds and koalas. Come show the kids what camping used to be like - only 40 minutes from Melbourne! Also check out our Glamping listing for camping with a touch of luxury: https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/23709017?s=51
host_about: love travel

summary: Safe, comfortable, quite and clean rooms. Short on time, or short of ideas? two minutes drive to DINING ENTERTAINMENT SERVICES & FACILITIES of Chadstone shopping centre.

(for absolute hygiene please bring your own pillow covers and bed sheet )   kind regards shah

summary: Welcome to my apartment in St. Kilda. My dog and I reside here when the property isn’t occupied. The apartment is well presented and cleaned for a comfortable stay.
space: Spacious for 1, Very Comfortable for 2, Suitable for 3. In a quiet cul-de-sac, yet positioned for absolute convenience in the heart of the action! The home has all the creature comforts necessary for a relaxing and pleasant stay.  ALL TO YOURSELF Life essentials - Wifi, Netflix’s, & parking for one car!! Bedroom: - Queen bed with Mattress (Sealy branded). - 2 High/firm pillows, 2 Low/firm pillows, 1 Button cushion.  - Built in robe with Hangers and Mirror.  - Vacuum Cleaner (Hoover branded)/mop.  - Vertical Blinds. - 1 Incandescent Lamp. - 1 iPhone Charger. - 2 Side Drawers.  - Bed storage with fresh Bath Towels.  - 1 Philodendron Plant.  - Iron & Ironing board. - Drying rack. name: Funky 2 bed 2 bath apartment, in amongst it all!
summary: Perfect spot for the AFL Grand Final!  The apartment is located within the Melbourne Arts precinct in Southbank, a 5-10minute walk to Southbank Promenade, Flinders Street Station and into the CBD. Also a short stroll to the MCG or very easy to get to Etihad stadium! We usually only have our spare bedroom available on Airbnb, however we are making our whole apartment available when we occasionally head out of town!
space: You will have our 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment to yourself! There is a queen bed in the main bedroom with ensuite, and a double bed in the second bedroom with a separate bathroom. We also have a double blow up mattress that we can provide if necessary to accommodate up to 6 people.
host_about:
We are young professionals who moved to Melbourne at the beginning of 2016 for work, after 3 months of travelling through Nepal, India and Japan.

When not at work Pat enjoys, watching sport, playing sport and playing sport on the playstation. Kase enjoys complaining about this, reading, cooking and eating. Together we like to plan where in the world we'd like to be holidaying next. 

We generally spend our weekends exploring, shopping, running and eating our way through Melbourne, but are struggling to come to terms with how cold it is  down here after spending our whole lives in sunny QLD.

name: 50th Floor Luxury CBD Skyhome In FREE Tram Zone
summary: Get Astonishing Views at this sensational 50th Floor CBD Skyhome with epic 240 degree views capturing Port Phillip Bay out to the ocean, Albert Park Lake, Yarra River, Parliament, iconic West Gate Bridge & the bustling CBD.  Welcome!
space: Make yourself at home then explore the vibrant city life.  Pack your swim gear too - there's a pool, large spa, spacious sauna, well-equipped gym plus a separate area to work on those abs or fit in a yoga sesh. This immaculately presented luxurious Skyhome is filled with tons of natural light & everything you'll need to rest, refresh and feel fantastic! Browse the photos to see everything you'll be enjoying. Located in the FREE tram zone with a major tram stop at the front door, forget Uber costs - you’ll be just 90 seconds walk from the major Southern Cross train station & 500 metres to the popular Airport bus.  Welcome home. Now you’ve arrived!
host_about: G'day I’m David :) Creating great spaces is in my heart ... you will love our Skyhomes & we’ll do our best to make you feel like a Rockstar up in the sky!!

summary: Take advantage of the luxurious facilities at the 'Pearl' apartment complex but enjoy your own privacy in these idyllically located townhouse. Soak up the rays or take a dip in the luxurious heated Pool whilst the bird cries are the only background noise. 3 mins walk to Westfield Doncaster and at the back of the Thompson's reserve!
space: This fully furnished townhouse has a magnificent air conditioned living room with timber flooring, stunning oversized kitchen with stone benchtops, and stainless steel Miele appliances including gas cooktop, dishwasher and fridge. Both bedrooms are of excellent size with ample robes and have queen sized beds included, the master bedroom also has an ensuite. There is a further full central bathroom and separate powder room. The euro laundry is located within the garage and includes a washing machine on the ground floor and opens to a landscaped courtyard.

Hi, I'm from Melbourne and in loving being a host and would love to help you arrange a perfect stay while you're in Melbourne!

I love Melbourne and hope you love Melbourne as well!

name: Dorcas 2 - Eccentric 1-Bdrm Apt w/ Parking
summary: This one-bedroom apartment is perfect for those who are in town for business or anyone who is looking to be close to the Melbourne CBD yet not wanting to be right in the middle of all the hustle and bustle. You are a short walking distance away from the Melbourne Royal Botanic Gardens and close to many tramlines heading straight into the city within only 10 minutes. Another great advantage this apartment holds is the car park in the secure building garage!
space: Living Space The open plan living room is a very comfortable space decorated with simple yet modern and refreshing accents. We at LittleStay make sure every apartment is equipped with harman/kardon speakers and a Smart-TV connected to our Netflix account and let's be honest: What is better after a long day than relaxing on the couch whilst watching your favourite movie or simply listening to some music? Sleeping Space A cozy and well-sized bedroom with a large built-in wardrobe, a comfortable queen-sized bed and soft Linenhouse sheets will ensure that you can rest well at night. This bedroom offers everything needed for a tight sleep and is just perfect with access to the bathroom.  Eating Space Next to the living space, you will find your dining area. Decorated with many accessories, the dining area will make you - and up to 3 others - feel homey and you will be able to enjoy any meal - whether it is take away or freshly prepared by you in the apartment kitchen. On this note, the brig
host_about:
LittleStay is a boutique short stay company specialising in homemade hospitality. We are passionate about traveling, exploring, and sharing. Bitten by the travel bug when we were young, we love to jump on a plane and explore the world. Spending our days and nights away from home with new friends, exchanging our experiences, and building new unforgettable memories. LittleStay is here to help create those memories. 

That's the idyllic part, but in our real life we all have bills, mortgages and obligations that we wish we could leave at home and don't have to travel with.

Consequentially LittleStay was born to help with that dream, a company that allow people like us and others to travel, live, experience or start a new life without the everyday struggle of life back “home”.

LittleStay wants you to feel comfortable entrusting us with your largest asset. We will consider your home our home while we manage it. It is our reputation on the line if something is amiss. We do not take that lightly.  LittleStay wants you to be a part of our LittleFamily. We value your partnership and thusly, if you are holidaying and want to stay at one of our properties, you’ll receive insider rates. You can even reserve your own property for your family and friends that are visiting. 

We take care of virtually everything. Our level of cleaning is second to none. Our customer service is beyond compare. Our commitment to you, the owner, our guest, our community is unquestionable. 

We believe a happy home is a filled home so if you have a property that is not happy, please contact us to see how we can help you. 

Or if you're one of our amazing guests helping us, please let us know how we can make your stay more enjoyable. 

Warmest Regards
The LittleStay Team

name: Spacious house for peace lovers.
summary: Basically, we have an open separate space with a queen mattress but you can feel living in your own area.

Breakfast is included and if needed lunch and dinner can be added as well with a low price. I also do drop off and pick ups from airport and city with a price lower than the taxi. It would be good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families.

name: Majestic St Kilda Sunrise - Premium Amenities & Parking
summary: The apartment is strategically located between St Kilda Beach and the City. Ideal for those who enjoy the outdoors and want to be close to Melbourne CBD; go for a run around Albert Park lake or cycle along the dreamy seaside bike path, savour a delicious coffee or meal in one of the many cafes and restaurants that St Kilda or Chapel Street have to offer. If you are missing the city life, hop on a tram for a 15 minute journey along the majestic St Kilda Rd, to the CBD. The apartment is in a brand new building with all modern conveniences of a 5 star hotel. Infinity edge pool, a central open winter fire surrounded by banquettes and alfresco BBQ decks that stretch into the city skyline. A mezzanine library, gymnasium, yoga room, sauna and steam room make the offering more resort than retreat, reminiscent of the iconic Beverley Hills Hotel.
space: * One bedroom with a queen bed and spacious wardrobe * Sofa bed in the living room * Fully equipped kitchen to cook a gourmet meal * Comfortable living area to enjoy one of the books available in the apartment *  Nice balcony to enjoy a drink and amazing views * Wifi - please note that we have an NBN package for 100GB per month. This should be enough for everyday Internet use and streaming. However, if you require more data, there is a pay as you go Freedom Internet service in the whole building. Please note that downloading torrents in Australia is largely illegal and the service is not anonymous. * Parking * 5 star building amenities (Pool, Gym, Yoga Room, BBQs, Sauna, Steam Room)
host_about:
We run The Cider Link, an online marketplace which connects cider lovers with cider makers across Australia. We both moved to Melbourne a few years ago from the UK and fell in love with this land of “true blue”. We love travelling, exploring Melbourne or just chilling around St Kilda in a nice cafe, bar or on the beach. 

The BnB Helpers crew manage the flat for us. In this way we ensure our guests have a point of contact 24/7 and any emergencies are taken care of, no matter where we are. So rest assured, both the accommodation and the service are 5 star.

name: ZLovely apartment in city resort
summary: Our bright and spacious apartment is set within an acre of gardens which includes a pool, tennis court,  gym and spa. Located in Melbourne's art precinct, its an easy 10 min walk (or short tram ride) to the city and its many attractions.
space: This lovely apartment is the perfect place to stay while in Melbourne. Set in a garden resort complex and located in the heart of the arts precinct, it is an easy stroll to the city's many attraction including the river front, restaurants, galleries, theatres, gardens and world-class sporting facilities. This is our own apartment which we lease when we go away. The reason we have the apartment listed for such a great price is that you will be sharing the apartment with our two lovely cats and we need you to feed them while you are there! :-)  Buffy sleeps all day and Lucky is usually out all day so they are no trouble - they just need to be fed and the kitty litter emptied occasionally :-) Our friend Mark, who lives in the complex, will be managing things while we are away, and can assist with this if you prefer. All food etc is provided. We have another seven apartments in this complex listed on airbnb. They are all nice and comfortable, however this offers a lot more and we keep the
host_about:
Hi from Bronnie and Neil ;-)
We love being airbnb hosts and sharing our homes and our beautiful city with others.
We have been airbnb hosts for over four years and during that time we have met amazing and wonderful people from all around Australia and all parts of the world.
We started with the spare room in our own home and now have 20 properties, from high end luxury to family friendly apartments that we offer our guests. We even have a 7 bedroom, 7 bathroom mansion near the sea in St Kilda for larger groups! 
We use airbnb ourselves whenever we travel and feel we know what people are looking for. Good value, great locations, clean, comfortable and friendly! All our properties are in great locations, are professionally cleaned and we use hotel quality, commercially laundered linen on comfortable beds.  We meet all our guests on arrival to say hello and are on hand to offer help, advice and inside tips of places to go and things to see. 
Most of our properties include free parking which is a real bonus in the city and Foxtel (cable) television and other homely touches so you 'can live like a local'. (You can view our properties by clicking the View Full Profile link below and clicking on the listings on the left hand side of the page). 

A little bit about ourselves ... we're pretty easy going, and love getting out and about exploring different places. We are both keen travellers and have done our fair share of it in Australia and overseas - whether backpacking, camping, or an occasional splurge on 5-star resorts! You wouldn't call us 'party animals', but we do like socialising and meeting people.  We enjoy a wide variety of interests, love the movies, eating out, popping down to the beach on our scooter or pushbikes, and enjoying the many exciting sporting events and festivals that Melbourne has to offer.
Our motto is "strangers are just friends you haven't met yet!"
Wishing you happy travels and looking forward to meeting you soon :-)

Best regards
Bronnie and Neil

name: Comfy pocket in the thick of it
summary: Room in a lovely Edwardian house with comfy bed, ensuite suitable for people with disabilities, tea & coffee making, fridge, toaster, TV & beautiful lead light bay window. The house boasts a huge kitchen & secluded backyard & another QB room for rent
space: Location, convenience, aesthetics. This is beautiful Edwardian home and the room on offer is quite lovely. It is spacious and comfortable. Our house virtually has its own tram stop (Stop 27 on the 11 route) which is a wheelchair friendly stop serviced by disabled access trams, quick walk to train stations on two different lines, High Street Northcote (86 tram route), close to the city centre and the limitless cafés, bars and music venues of Northcote, Fitzroy, Clifton Hill and Carlton. Think Northcote Social Club, Bar 303, Peacock Hotel, Westgarth cinema, Fairfield Boathouse, Yarra River. Across the road from the house itself you will suddenly find yourself in bushland along the Merri Creek where you can amble along in any direction and find great coffee close by! There's even a noodle shop on the corner!
host_about:
I am a musician and am often tempted by the lure of typing and admin to work part time to feed the pets and petrol tank.
I love to sing, play my uke, mandolin, guitar and kazoo and I get enormous joy and pleasure in the music collaborations I am part of. I adore my critters - Alfred the Great - Maltese x Poodle, Abby, Russet and Sniper (cats) in order of arrival. I've travelled mostly in the UK which I am very attached to. I am very sociable and community minded, could chat for a national title, but I am also fond of quiet.
I am totally house trained, love to cook and muck in to help. I share the house with my partner Patrick, who is also totally house trained, very hospitable and equally smitten with our critters.
As hosts, we offer a comfortable, safe place where you can be assured of complete privacy, personal space or company if you're feeling sociable or fancy a cuppa and chat.

host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.

summary: $17/night if you book a month or more,  $19/night if you book 1 ~ 3 weeks. $25/night if you book 3 ~ 6 nights.
space: It is a lovely stand alone house on Station Street Box Hill VIC 3129. Only 10 minutes walk to Box Hill Centro and Box Hill Train Station(Only 20 minutes to Melbourne City). Bus route 903. Three bedrooms in the house. Maximum 3 people in one room. No mixed room. All electricity, gas and water bills included and free WIFI. Pillow plus cover, quilt plus cover, mattress plus cover all provided. Share facilities: one bathtub, two showers, 2 toilets, 2 fridges, microwave, toaster, stove, oven, pots, pans, cutleries, washing machine. Tip: if you are looking for a part time job while staying, prepare your resume(1 page is enough) and try all around the Box Hill Centro and Westfield Doncaster shopping mall. You will grab a few opportunities to go. Security bonds require when book. Bonds = 1 week rental.  Please notice that the above price is for one person only.

name: Darling Malvern East
summary: We are close to restaurants and dining, parks, art and culture, train station, Chadstone Shopping Centre. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, kitchen and the location. My place is good for families (with kids) and furry friends (pets)
space: In our adults retreat we have a smart tv, study nook and lots of books and cook books. There are boys and girls toys to play with if you bring children.
host_about: Mother of 3 and a wife.

name: STYLE PLUS! With VIEWS *POOL GYM PARKING WIFI
summary: "Patricia", an Impeccably presented, centrally located & stylishly furnished apartment with the best city views in Melbourne a moments walk to the Botanical Gardens, Flinders St Station and so much more. 2 comfy bedrooms, all with a pool, parking, gymnasium, wifi + much more. PLEASE SEE IMPORTANT NOTE BELOW IN THE LISTING re POOL AND GYM ACCESS!
space: Please check my other properties if this is not available on your preferred dates. I offer huge discounts for last-minute bookings and specials for longer bookings too; just ask me! This architecturally inspired building is near new and is located right in the heart of the botanical gardens precinct a moments walk to the CBD. It is the premier location for any visit to Melbourne: the trams along St Kilda road will drop you in the city within a few minutes and also the funky and vibrant restaurants and cafes of Southbank are literally at your doorstep. The space includes 2 bedrooms, open plan kitchen with a wonderful entertainers balcony with views to the CBD of Melbourne, the MCG and beyond. Each bedroom contains 1 comfortable queen bed with an additional sofa  in the living room to accommodate that extra guest or family member if required. If you are visiting Melbourne by car, the apartment has a secure undercover car space accessible 24 hours a day.
host_about:
Hi! My name is Paul, owner of Complete Host apartments! I am an avid traveller (Ive visited more than 55 countries and counting) and enjoy soaking in cultures from all parts of the world whenever i get the opportunity.

When in Melbourne I run a unique short stay apartment business that i am so fortunate to call my day job. I love meeting and hosting guests and doing my best to enhance their Melbourne experience. I do have a small team behind me so it may not always be me you hear from. 

I am very proud to have been named an AIRBNB Superhost for a couple of years now. What does that mean to you? I have never cancelled a guest's  booking and close to 90% of the reviews we receive are rated 5 stars by our guests. You can be confident if you book a property with us firstly the keys will always be there when you turn up and we will do everything we can to ensure you have a wonderful stay.

If you are interested in one of the properties l have listed but the dates are unavailable, please check my other listings or email me an enquiry as l will very likely have another property available that will suit your requirements. 

I can't wait to host you or meet you soon!

Paul, Complete Host

name: Little Bourke Loft
summary: One of a kind converted warehouse laneway loft in the heart of Melbourne. Located within the free tram zone, 5 min walk to Southern Cross Station, 10 mins walk to Bourke St Mall and 15 mins walk to Casino. Modern kitchen & bathroom, internal laundry, wifi, high ceilings, skylight, split level layout, large sofa/chaise, 65" flatscreen with Netflix. Good for couples, solo adventurers. On street parking (2 hour limit before 7:30pm) and Multi-Level parking right next door ($7 per day on weekends)
space: Huge ceiling, loads of natural light and natural features. The imperfections of this building are what make it shine. We love the space and hope you do too
host_about: Hey I'm Sam! I live with my partner who recently relocated from Canada. Considering she is still discovering Melbourne, she's great at understanding what it's like for visitors here. We are happy to help answers any questions you have about the city to ensure you have a great stay!
