summary: Enjoy a modern, clean and fully equipped brand new 2bd 2 bath apartment in the heart of vibrant Box Hill. Just 5 minutes walk to restaurants, dining, cafes, shops, market, and all public transport (bus, train, tram). Secure car park is available with also plenty of public parking spaces surrounding the area for easy access. Equipped with NBN broadband internet, Flat Panel TV, and a dedicated computer/working desk. Perfect place for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids).
space: - LED TV - Air Conditioning & heating - NBN Wireless internet BEDROOM AREAS - Roller blinds for all windows - Quilt, pillows, sheets & covers - Bedside table & lamp - Wardrobe with full length mirrors - Hangers -Queen bed x 1 + Single bed ×2 BATHROOM - Shampoo, body wash & hand soap - Bath & hand towels - Floor Mats - Toilet rolls - Hair dryer LIVING AREA - Roller blinds for all windows - Coffee table - Comfy 3-seater Sofa DINING AREA - Dining table & chairs KITCHEN AREA - Complimentary coffee & tea  - Oven, microwave, cook top & range hood - Fridge & freezer - Dish washer & detergents - Kettle, mugs, cups, wine glasses & dishes - Pots, pans, cutlery & cooking utensils - Kitchen towels & bin LAUNDRY AREA - Washing machine & detergents

name: Sth Melbourne Tropical Retreat
summary: Unique, groovy townhouse set in a tropical oasis with garden views from every room & stunning city views from the top deck.  Minutes to the Sth Melbourne Market, MSAC, Albert Park village, the beach and the city.
space: This fully furnished townhouse is located in a quiet part of South Melbourne close to Albert Park Village, the beach, South Melbourne market and the city.  The house is available for 3-6 months (a longer period can be negotiated).  There are 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fabulous kitchen/dining area and delightful lounge room... all with garden views.  Off-street parking is available.
host_about:
I've travelled extensively both overseas and around Australia and enjoy meeting other travellers and showing off this fabulous city.  
I've lived in the area for 15 years and love being close to vibrant Albert Park Village, the beach, the South Melbourne Market, St Kilda and the city.  MSAC and the grand prix track are also both within an easy walking distance.
You will have a lovely spacious bedroom with garden views from every window, a small private balcony and your own bathroom with the best shower in Melbourne! 
Why not consider staying a few extra days and book my 60s beach house on the Mornington Peninsula!... it's a great area to explore and just an hour's drive from Melbourne.
I hope to see you soon.

name: City 2bed Sleeps 5 Free WiFI
summary: Located in Melb Central Business District, this apartment is within a 10-minute walk of State Library of Victoria, Queen Victoria Market and Melbourne Central. RMIT University and Bourke Street Mall are also within 15 minutes. Each apt provides a kitchen with a fridge, an oven, a stovetop and a microwave. For a bit of entertainment, a flat-screen TV comes with a DVD player, and guests can also appreciate conveniences, such as a washer/dryer and a living room. Weekly housekeeping is available.
space: Unknown
host_about: Unknown

name: Renee, huge 4BD home w/ ROOFTOP
summary: Brand new multi-storey home on the city fringe with easy access to the city and the shops and cafes of North Melbourne. Spend your vacation in styl...
space: Brand new multi-storey home on the city fringe with easy access to the city and the shops and cafes of North Melbourne. Spend your vacation in style and comfort in the huge open plan living spaces or private rooftop terrace. Stone benchtops, wintergarden, massive ensuite bathroom, plenty of storage space for your clothes, TV in the master bedroom, rooftop terrace.. the list goes on. So many reasons to pick this quiet city escape apartment for your next trip to Melbourne. Nearby you'll find amazing cafes and restaurants on Errol St including Auction Rooms, voted Melbourne's best coffee and my all time favourite pizza at Oskars. BEDROOMS There are 4 bedrooms as you'll see in the photos with queen sized bed in the master bedroom and doubles in bedroom 2 and 3 and a bunk beds and study desk in the 4th for the kids or to get some work done away from the living spaces. Laundry facilities are available on site including iron and ironing board and a washing machine tucked away under the stairs
host_about:
I'm Linton, I own and run a short-stay management company, Beyond a Room, here in Melbourne. If you book with me you'll be communicating with both myself and my staff.

I’m an entrepreneur, architecture graduate, photographer, cyclist (NOT the lycra kind), volunteer, adventurer and problem solver.

During my studies I worked at various cafes and architecture offices to save up for shoestring trips around the world. My grandma once told me I had ‘champagne taste but a beer budget’ and it’s a motto I’ve enjoyed applying to different parts of my life to get the more out of less and find enjoyment in the little things.

I love discovering authentic experiences when I travel and I love being able to share the opportunity with others, to live like a local when they travel too.

Some of my most memorable trips have been couch-surfin across Russia while taking the Trans Siberian, living in Helsinki and learning to hand build furniture, riding a vintage steel bicycle through France to race in L’Eroica and buying a car on craigzlist in Los Angeles and driving across the south, east and north coasts to arrive in Vancouver.

My listings are all managed by Beyond a Room and are all given names that I think reflect the character of the property and area. My aim is to give guests a unique and local perspective on the location and share my knowledge and experience of this wonderful city with travellers so that they feel at home. Search Beyond a Room to find out more about how we can help manage your airbnb.

I try to keep all my calendars up to date so if it’s available in the calendar, you can usually just go ahead and book

summary: About 20 mins from International Airport. 3 mins walk to bus stop to Watergardens station. 15 mins walk to bus stop to Sunshine station and Ravenhall station. 15 mins walk to Caroline Springs shopping mall and other amenities, including library, gym, medical clinic, school, public pool, sports oval and restaurants. 5 mins walk to The Grange park with bbq picnic area and playground overlooking a stunning valley. 30 mins drive to Melbourne CBD.
space: Double-storey modern and cozy home close to all amenities while being conveniently located in a peaceful neighbourhood with beautiful valley. Listing is for one bedroom with shared bathroom. Room is furnished with a double bed. This room can accommodate up to 2 adults. Please contact us for further inquiries. Tea/coffee/continental breakfast provided.
host_about: I am a happy stay-home wife and mom. I am an occasional traveller and my favourite destination that I always feel like coming back to is Seoul in South Korea. I love the culture and the people. My passion in life is food, and currently I am also running a small business from home making specialty cakes and cupcakes.

name: Long Island Getaway with private beach access
summary: This beautiful 2 bedroom beach unit has private access to Long Island Beach. The beach is literally steps away, no roads to cross, just out the back door. The residence is in short walking distance to restaurants, bars, Bayside Shopping Centre and Frankston Pier.  Experience all the delights the Mornington Peninsula has to offer, including beaches, wineries, arts, festivals and markets.
space: You have 2 bedrooms, both with queen size beds. We also have a sofa bed for 2 people. Air conditioned and centrally heated.  A fully equipped kitchen, with a full size fridge, dishwasher, microwave, oven and stove.  Tea, coffee and some breakfast are supplied on arrival, including fresh fruit. The unit is at the front of the property and contains its own private courtyard.  At the back of the property you will have access to the beach, a large outdoor entertaining area, including a BBQ, outdoor kitchen and outdoor shower.  Lots of fun beach toys at your disposal for fun water activities! The property is perfect for families or couples.

I enjoy independent traveling to experience different cultures and to get to know people from different backgrounds. Family takes the most important place in my life. I read books on all different topics, enjoy intellectual discussions on philosophy and current affairs, and trekking in Nepal, Switzerland and other parts of the world when I get the chance.

summary: Located just above the CBD, our 3-bedroom + 2-bathroom Victorian terrace in Carlton is the perfect home for your stay in Melbourne!  5-min walk to Lygon Street and less than a 10-min walk to Melb Central, Carlton Gardens, and Victoria Market. Originally built in the 1850s, the property has been newly renovated. With high ceilings, ornate details, original timber floor boards and plantation shutters throughout, we hope that you will adore the traditional touches that we have tried to preserve.
space: Downstairs: -	Newly renovated kitchen with standalone gas cooktop/oven, fridge, and Nespresso machine (though we highly recommend getting your morning coffee fix from our friendly neighbours at Woodside Green!). -	Laundry facilities – separate washer and dryer. -	Third bedroom with double bed, decorative traditional fireplace, wardrobe and desk. -	Compact bathroom – with toilet and shower. -	Cosy backyard retreat with 6 seat outdoor setting.  -	Study/lounge/dining room with 6 seats and reading chair. Decorative antique fireplace. Extensive board game collection (we’re a pair of serious board gamers!).  Please note that our property does not have a television. You are welcome to bring your own devices to connect to our complimentary Telstra NBN WIFI. Upstairs: -	Main bedroom with two single beds (can be combined to form one king-sized bed upon request), decorative traditional fireplace, wardrobe, and desk. -	Second bedroom with double bed, wardrobe and desk. -	Oversized bathroom with sh
host_about: My partner and I are passionate about restoring heritage properties to their original beauty. We adore architecture, art, vintage arcade games and well-designed board games. We also love cats! :)

name: Candlelight Cottage c.1890 - In Olinda
summary: A 1890s cottage with 3 bedrooms, one king, one queen, one single.  Full kitchen & dishwasher, laundry, lounge with open fire, central heating, bathroom with walk in shower & spa.  Garden setting.   Close to Olinda. Pets welcome by arrangement pls.   Modern facilities in a gorgeous garden setting.
space: Set in the township of Olinda, Candlelight is a charming three-bedroom cottage perfectly suited for families or small groups. Thoughtful touches such as a spa bath with a glass ceiling, a log burning open fire and plush bathrobes provided for use during your stay guarantees all the ingredients for absolute rest and relaxation.  The front veranda catches the morning light making it the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or the private garden at the rear, featuring a waterfall, outdoor dining area and a BBQ, is a wonderful spot to cap off the day with a glass of local wine.  With three bedrooms, including one king, one queen and one single, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry, this renovated cottage includes all the mod cons you could want whilst still retaining its historic charm. Ideally located within walking distance to Olinda village, Mt Dandenong village and the Dandenong Ranges National Park you are ideally positioned to enjoy the best of what the Dandenongs Ranges has to
host_about:
After 24 years offering accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges just an hour from Melbourne, we are now offering a beautiful little group of cottages for Air BNB guests.
We live in The Dandenongs, have lived in Fiji and PNG before moving to Melbourne 30 years ago.     
We have a large family, 2 cats and 2 dogs to keep us in hand!     They will not annoy you as your cottage is on a different property.

name: Northcote Live - feel alive, love it & walk
summary: Northcote the energetic centre of , earthy creativity, health food outlets, ethnic and social diversity is celebrated and a hallmark of history. This unit is a short walk from High Street, you can bring a car but don't need to. You can catch the tram to the city or LaTrobe University, walk to the Palace Theatre to watch a movie. You have the most beautiful view to the blue Dandenongs from the unit and at night, from the top of the hill - it's a delightful safe walk in the evenings. Perfecto!
space: On arrival (taxi or uber, tram, train, bus, short walk or drive to your allocated undercover onsite free car park), walk up a few stairs to arrive at the front door of your own private 2 bedroom unit, with separate kitchen where you can become creative, with a full fridge, stove and oven, along with a microwave oven and dishwasher so you don't have to spend time washing dishes! In the lounge you can chill or rock yourself in the iconic Ikea signature chairs, (after 12 Dec use wi-fi or watch Netflix). The bathroom has a full bath where you can luxuriate after travelling, a long day of touring or shopping, and the good news is there's a separate toilet!  There's a washing machine & dryer, an iron & ironing board so you don't need to look 'crinkled' unless of course you want to! There's a lovely double bed in which you can curl up alone or with a partner, and two single beds for those travelling with friends or family members - you don't have to share another bed - at least, while you're
host_about: Brendan and I have lived here since 2000, and love the location. Can walk to mini-supermarket, take-a-way fish 'n' chips, Woolworths Supermarket and a few other take-a-way outlets, as well as Dolly's, a great Irish restaurant-pub with great meals and some entertainment, such as trivia nights or karaoke!  Only 4 mins from airport by taxi, up to $20. Can walk thru Park or walk to Marrarra sports events, as guests have done. Or you can borrow the bikes and ride to Crocodyllus Park, free water park for a cool down, and even to the beach!  We sometimes go to Lee Point Beach for sunset view. We also recommend all the markets and other wonderful events on throughout the year, as well as getting out to Litchfield Park, Kakadu National Park and Katherine. We are happy to suggest ways to spend your time.  We have lots of DVDs to choose from and our favourite comedy is Seinfeld!  You can sit in courtyard and enjoy a variety of birds and lizards and in the Wet season, the green tree frogs! Easy walk to Casuarina Shopping Centre or catch bus to City or Palmerston - whatever takes your fancy!

name: 1Min SouthernCross*FREE(Tram/CarPark/POOL/GYM)*L14
summary: This modern architecturally inspired building is located right in the heart the CBD , just across the street from Southern Cross Station & Airport SkyBus station. Get to the Docklands, Etihad Stadium, Crown Casino just within a walk. It is the premier location for any visit to Melbourne. Within the free Tram Zone, amazing cafes and restaurants, you may never want to leave. Having travelled and worked in a number of cities around the world, I realised it was hard for me to know where home really was. A hotel today, and next, the other. I take pride in what I do in having to provide amazing guests from all walks of life with a home even for a night across the properties I manage in major cities all around the world. Home is never a particular place. It truly is where the heart is.

host_about:
Short-Stay Property Management

Too many properties to host...
...and not enough time to manage cleaning, laundry and other essentials?

Are you tired of late check-ins or overwhelmed by conflicting schedules
— and lost money because of it?

Or simply want a hands-off experience while earning a great income, because your time is precious?
 
If you've had enough, we can help.
 
At iCare Property we offer a full spectrum service:

- Tailored Solutions
At the heart of our service is our highly personalised solution to suit your needs. Because we understand your lifestyle is different from others.

- Listing of your property
We document and list your property on Airbnb and any other portals you may wish to include.
 
- Shared Calendar
Access a shared calendar so you're on top of your occupancy rate, as well as your ROI at a glance. You also have the convenience of blocking rent-out periods for your own use.
 
- Check-in and Check-out Services
We offer a comprehensive meet-and-greet service for easy check-ins and breezy check-outs so you don't spend precious time waiting for delayed arrivals.
 
- Full Cleaning and Laundry Services
As part of the iCare service, we pass on full wholesale cleaning and laundry rates to you. Interior cleaning and laundry fees are typically paid for by guests.
 
- Quarterly Condition Reports
You receive a quarterly condition report of your investment property for complete peace-of-mind.
 
To find out more (no obligations of course!) please contact our friendly team.

"With iCare property, we care for your property as our own"

With a fully stocked kitchen, two comfortable bedrooms, free access to a swimming pool and gym, bring yourself and your toothbrush and embrace living in the heart of Melbourne.
space: Our fully self contained luxury apartment is extremely well located opposite Southern Cross Rail Station and we hope from the time you arrive you will feel at home. The kitchen is fully equipped featuring European appliances enabling guests to cook anything for a tray of brownies to a lamb roast.  The refrigerator is stocked with a complimentary arrival selection of cheeses and biscuits along with a bottle of local Mornington Peninsula wine (non alcoholic available on request) plus a couple of locally brewed beers, and the essentials milk & juice. We also provide provisions for a cooked breakfast including bacon and eggs. Enjoy the ease of using a user friendly pod coffee machine with a selection of complimentary pods.  The slide out pantry is stocked with breakfast condiments , selection of teas, drinking chocolate, sugar, salt & pepper, oil etc. for the length of guests stay. The living area TV features a built in blue ray DVD player with a selection of movies, X Box 360 with a range
host_about:
We have been privileged  to travel to some amazing destinations including South Africa, Maldives, Tahiti & Cuba & then domestically  Broome, Uluru (Ayres Rock) , William Creek, Cooper Pedy, The Great Barrier Reef , Whitehaven Beach & Darwin.
I'm pretty artistic and creative I always have a project  on the go be it knitting, sewing, property painting/renovating, I enjoy doing wedding flowers &  I've just started saxophone lessons and hope to have refresher piano lessons soon. 
My husband is very sports orientated and loves the outdoors, he has just retired and handed over the running of our small business to our manager.
We have been renting our apartment with another short stay company for the past five years but have now decided air BNB is more appropriate for our family owned & managed apartment at this time.
I've drawn inspiration from our travels and things that l look for in accommodation as l have dressed our apartment and particular as a holiday rental ………I've been told my eye detail is perfection.
We prefer to have our apartment  unoccupied than have guests that are disrespectful of what we have willing provided to make their stay comfortable. 
My life motto: "do unto others as you would wish them to do unto you."

host_about:
25 years in the restaurant industry, a switch to this wonderful life of apartments.  I'm really enjoying looking after you all running between 19 apartments.   You'll love my places, all unique, all stylish and in the right spots for you to explore this wonderful, most livable city in the world- Melbourne.
I'm really well priced with all apartments in prime spots and in great buildings. Happy to help where I can to guide you to all things Melbourne.
Joe Mottola.

FITZROY BAKEHOUSE Immerse yourself in all that’s lived & loved about Fitzroy, whilst coming home to an indoor/outdoor space that reflects the art & industry of this vibrant inner city neighbourhood.  Nestled just off the main drag, retreat home to your own oasis of calm and wake to the sounds of birds. Calender always up-to-date, weekly and monthly discounts available.
space: FITZROY BAKEHOUSE Sleeps 2 Originally a dairy & bakery, the Bakehouse is one of three apartments designed within the original shell in Melbourne's first suburb.  Tucked down one of the smallest streets on the Fitzroy/North Fitzroy interface at the northern end of Brunswick Street, this one bedroom apartment will be a pleasure to come home to and not just a bed for the night!
host_about:
Love living in this colourful and relaxed inner city neighbourhood whereby a walk down the street can be full of surprises, awaken the senses and perhaps even change the course of your day.  With everything pretty much on the doorstep, there's really no reason to leave.
If you decide to leave your neighbourhood to visit mine, I'm sure your expectations will be blown away with a wonderful time getting to know this exciting part of town.
I look forward to meeting you.

My calender is always up to date, if the dates are showing as available, they are!

name: Bonbeach Water Fun - *RIVERFRONT + BEACH*
summary: *This townhouse has beautiful views and is situated on Patterson River, and you can easily walk to the beach along the river track, without having to cross a road. A short walk to the railway station and a host family that will make you feel welcome.  Kayak, Pedal Board, walk or cycle the 6km river circuit or stroll along the beach and enjoy the sunset. Situated 30kms from the Peninsula with its fabulous scenic coastline & tourist attractions + 30kms in the other direction takes you to the city.
space: BEDROOMS:  2 x bedrooms available upstairs.  Or, alternatively you can use one of the rooms as a bedroom and the other bedroom with the double sofa bed as your own private lounge room which has a wifi tv.  Even though not listed, the 4th bedroom has 2 single beds, as the trundle underneath has legs which make it the same height as the single bed and therefore can be either a king size bed or 2 singles. BATHROOM:  If you are happy to use a shower over the bath, then the upstairs bathroom and separate toilet can be exclusively yours.  The bathroom is right nextdoor to both the bedrooms. NOTE:  All 4 bedrooms of the townhouse are upstairs. BALCONY:  The large balcony with the view is shared.  You are welcome to use our kitchen and laundry, which are both downstairs. The 1st thing that makes our place unique is that we have views of Patterson River with all the boats & the 2nd amazing thing is that you can walk to the beach along the river track without crossing a road. We are very close t
host_about:
ABOUT US:
I am a friendly and warm person who tries to make you feel welcome.  My husband and I love meeting other people and enjoy being hosts.  We are looking forward to having people stay at our lovely home, where we can show them the beautiful river and beach and share experiences.  My husband usually works from home, so he is available to answer your questions, give directions or recommend things in the area.  Our 20 year old son lives here too, but works full time.  We love to interact with our guests and that's why we chose to open our home to this wonderful opportunity.  You are welcome to share activities and meal times with us, or you can have privacy and limited interaction if that is your preference. We will be led by you. ☺  If you want some time to yourself, upstairs you have your own separate dining room and lounge room with a wifi tv.

Above all we just want you to be comfortable!

ABOUT US (CONT'D) - 4 LEGGED MEMBERS:
2 very friendly pets live here.  The friendly Labrador x Dolphin is a very quiet and docile dog, who adores all water sports, including swimming to retrieve a ball, sharing the kayak and going on the paddle board with you.  The cat has a sweet nature and loves to smooch.  If you leave your bedroom door open at nighttime, he will probably come and visit you.

YOUR ACCOMMODATION:
The house is a double-storey townhouse with 2 x lounge rooms, 2 x dining areas (3 if you include the balcony) and both  upstairs and downstairs bathrooms and separate u+d toilets.  The upstairs area also has a dining table with 6 x dining chairs as well as a lounge room with a 2 seater lounge and 2 x single lounge chairs and a stunning balcony overlooking the river.  The roofed balcony has an 8 seater table and chairs up one end and a 5 seater corner wicker lounge at the other end with a large round coffee table - Fabulous place for having a quiet coffee at sunrise or sunset, reading, or for watching the boats go by, or to watch a sunrise or sunset.

You are welcome to either join us, or if you prefer to have some time to yourself to chill, you can use the upstairs lounge room near your bedroom, which has an internet TV.   On the ground floor, there is a beautifully landscaped outdoor area, with a swim spa, bbq and water feature that has steps that lead to the river track.

BEDROOMS AVAILABLE:
There are 2 x bedrooms available and all 4 bedrooms are upstairs.  The 2 x guest bedrooms are both right nextdoor to the bathroom which you can use exclusively, but which has a shower over the bath. One guest bedroom has a single bed and a desk and an excellent trundle underneath  and the other guest bedroom has a brand new double-bed pull-out sofa.

LIFESTYLE:
Our property is situated on the Patterson River.  The beautiful landscaped garden has a gate that exits onto the river track.  You can walk to the station by using this track and crossing the bridge over the river.  

*****YOU ARE RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF (2) EXCITING OPTIONS TO VIST:

(1) THE CITY:
You are less than a 10 minute walk to Carrum Railway Station, which will take you 30kms into the city of Melbourne

or .....

(2) GATEWAY TO THE PENINSULA:
30kms from Bonbeach in the opposite direction will take you to the stunning Peninsula where you can visit the many tourist attractions, such as the beautiful beaches, wineries, restaurants, gardens and art galleries on the peninsula.
~Take the ferry from Sorrento across the bay to Queenscliff.
~Visit the main street in Mornington, with fabulous shops and cafes.
~See the rock formations of London Bridge at Portsea. Have lunch at the Portsea pub and watch the large ships go by.  You can also visit Port Nepean at Portsea for some WW1 and WW2 history.
~Visit Cape Schanck and check out the lighthouse and  the Boardwalk and take the Two Bays Walking Track at Cape Schanck
~Spend a day at the world famous Peninsula Hot Springs in Rye and enjoy all 24 springs.
~Visit the Manyung Gallery.
~Visit the historic Heronswood Home and Gardens in Dromana.
~Go to Tyabb and spend hours looking at the Tyabb Packing House Antiques.
~Book in to see some dolphin and whale watching.
~Visit the market at Red Hill.
~Visit Ashcombe Maze and Lavendar Garden in Shoreham.
~Walk through the back beaches of Blairgowrie.
~Take a trip through historic Beleura House and Garden in Mornington.
~Go for a walk at The Briars Park in Mornington and find the emus.
~Visit the beautiful Arthurs Seat State Park.
~If naval things interest you, visit the museum of HMAS Cerberus in Balnarring.

WHAT YOU CAN DO FROM THE ACCOMMODATION:
*Walk to the beautiful Bonbeach beach without having to cross a road.
*Walk the full circuit of the river track, which is 6kms.
*Walk to the Carrum train Station in under 10 minutes.
*Walk along the fabulous Boardwalk at Carrum Beach.
*Walk to the cafes in Carrum, along the river track and over the bridge.
*Walk to the Aldi Supermarket in Carrum.
*Catch a beautiful sunrise or sunset from the balcony, river or beach.
*Kayak or pedal board along the river (Yes, Pedal Board not Paddle Board)
*Cycle around the 6km river track.

In WINTER time the house is snug and warm as you sit in front of the mesmerising gas log fire either admiring the beautiful landscaped garden or rug up and make the most of the river and beach.

In SUMMER, AUTUMN & SPRING, it is easier to take advantage of all the outdoor living and water sports and even swim in the swim spa.  Walk, kayak, cycle, it is all here, the lifestyle on Patterson River in Bonbeach.

EATING OUT:
*Lunch at Burgled (Carrum)
*Lunch at Cafe Moto (Carrum)
*Lunch at Freddie's (Carrum)
*Lunch at Patterson Place Cafe - Vietnamese (Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch at Kapers Restaurant (Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch at The Lake (Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch at Bakers Surprise Cafe (Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch at Cafe 4 (Harbour Plaza in Patterson Lakes)

*Lunch/Dine at Kun Yao Thai Restaurant (Harbour Plaza in Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch/Dine at Lakes Restaurant Cafe (Patterson Lakes)
*Lunch/Dinner until 9pm at Yoshino Sushi & Bento  (Patterson Lakes)

*Dine exquisitely at The Little French Deli (Bonbeach)
*Dine at The Cove (Patterson Lakes)
*Dine at Shavan's Indian Restaurant (Patterson Lakes)
*Dine at Ariake Japanese (Patterson Lakes)
*Dine at Crystal Grilled Chinese (Patterson Lakes)
*Dinner at Stirfry'D - Indonesian (Patterson Lakes)
*Dine until 9pm at Crackerjack Waterfront Cafe (Seaford)
*Dine until 10:30pm at A Day in BKK - Thai Food (Chelsea)

**Tapas** at Puerto (Patterson Lakes)
***Late Night Fast Food*** until 11pm/12m at Night Bite - (Chelsea)

OUR EXPECTATIONS:
+ We are an easy come & go as household, but we do expect to be
    informed of where, when & how long you expect to be gone for.
+ We appreciate cleanliness, organization, courtesy, respect
    and friendliness. 
+  We love our pets.

FOOD - ON YOUR FIRST NIGHT THE MEAL CAN BE WITH US:
+ See list of dining experiences above.
+ You are welcome to use our fully equipped kitchen to whip up your meals,
    or for $10 per person, per night, we can include you in our nighttime meals.
+ You can either sit with us downstairs at the large table to have your dinner,
    or you are welcome to use the large dining table upstairs near your 
    bedroom, which has a view of the river.
+  After dinner, we love to walk the dog to the beach, tv, reading, playing cards and board games, kayaking, mirage eclipsing.  You are welcome to join
    us for any of these activities.
+  I don't have breakfast, but feel free to join Geoff for an early
     brekkie or you may help yourself to what you would fancy.

space: Apartment includes: Brand new furniture Fully equipped modern kitchen All utilities connection and usage charges Linen and towels 55” LCD television Split system heating and cooling European laundry Beautiful newly furnished apartment.
host_about:
My husband, Bill and I have been in the furnished accommodation business since June 2006. 

Our company is Apartment Stays Melbourne.

We offer quality fully furnished, centrally located and affordable apartments for short or long stays in Melbourne. Our apartments offer residential and corporate living solutions with savings of up to 60% on hotel stays.

The apartments are situated in the lively and dynamic suburbs of South Yarra and East Melbourne/CBD. 

All of our apartments are within 200metres of a tram AND train stop and in close proximity to other public transport, a range of major shopping precincts and multiple dining and entertainment choices in the pulsating heart of Melbourne’s cosmopolitan districts.

Apartment Stays Melbourne provides a number of different furnished apartment configurations to suit all needs and are therefore ideally suited for the business traveller, academics, students, doctors, teachers, other professionals, long term travellers and families.

We hope that you will choose to stay with us during your time in Melbourne. Our promise to you is that we will help make your time here a life long pleasurable and rich experience.
